

END_TEXT

LawAbt
B14.1.
Æthelberht: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 3-8.



 0.1. Þis syndon þa domas, þe æðelbirht cyning asette on
Agustinus dæge.
 1. Godes feoh & ciricean twelfgylde.
 1. Biscopes feoh xigylde.
 1. Preostes feoh nigongylde.
 1. Diacones feoh sixgylde.
 1. Cleroces feoh þrigylde.
 1. Ciricfriþ twigylde.
 1. Mæthlfriþ twigylde.
 2. Gif cyning his leode to him gehateþ, & heom mon þær
yfel gedo, twibote & cyninge L scillinga.
 3. Gif cyning æt mannes ham drincæþ, & ðær man
lyswæs hwæt gedo, twibote gebete.
 4. Gif frigman cyninge stele, nigongylde forgylde.
 5. Gif in cyninges tune man mannan ofslea, L scillinga gebete.
 6. Gif man frigne mannan ofsleahþ, cyninge L scillinga to
drihtinbeage.
 7. Gif cyninges ambihtsmið oþþe laadrincmannan ofslehð,
meduman/ leodgelde forgelde.
 8. Cyninges mundbyrd: L scillinga.
 9. Gif frigman freum stelþ, III gebete, & cyning age þæt
wite & ealle þa æhtan.
 10. Gif man wið cyninges mægdenman geligeþ, L scillinga
gebete.
 11. Gif hio grindende þeowa sio, XXV scillinga gebete.
 11. Sio þridde: XII scillingas.
 12. Cyninges fedesl XX scillinga forgelde.
 13. Gif on eorles tune man mannan ofslæhþ, XII scillinga
gebete.
 14. Gif wið eorles birele man geligeþ, XII scillinga gebete.
 15. Ceorles mundbyrd: VI scillingas.
 16. Gif wið ceorles birelan man geligeþ, VI scillingum gebete;
aet þære oþere ðeowan L scætta; aet þare þriddan XXX
scætta.
 17. Gif man in mannes tun ærest geirneþ, VI scillingum gebete;
se þe æfter irneþ: III scillingas, siððan gehwylc scilling.
 18. Gif man mannan wepnum bebyreþ, ðær ceas weorð,
& man nænig yfel ne gedeþ, VI scillingum gebete.
 19. Gif wegreaf sy gedon, VI scillingum gebete.
 20. Gif man þone man ofslæhð, XX scillingum gebete.
 21. Gif man mannan ofslæhð, medume leodgeld C scillinga
gebete.
 22. Gif man mannan ofslæhð, æt openum græfe XX scillinga
forgelde & in XL nihta ealne leod forgelde.
 23. Gif bana of lande gewiteþ, ða magas healfne leod
forgelden.
 24. Gif man frigne man gebindeþ, XX scillinga gebete.
 25. Gif man ceorlæs hlafætan ofslæhð, VI scillingum
gebete.
 26. Gif læt ofslæhð, þone selestan LXXX scillinga
forgelde; gif þane oþerne ofslæhð, LX scillingum forgelde; ðane
þriddan XL scillingum forgelden.
 27. Gif friman edorbrecþe gedeþ, VI scillingum gebete.
 28. Gif man inne feoh genimeþ, se man þrigelde gebete.
 29. Gif friman edor gegangeð, IIII scillingum gebete.
 30. Gif man mannan ofslea, agene scætte & unfacne feo
gehwilce gelde.
 31. Gif friman wið fries mannes wif geligeþ, his wergelde
abicge & oðer wif his agenum scætte begete & ðæm oðrum
æt þam gebrenge.
 32. Gif man rihthamscyld þurhstinð, mid weorðe forgelde.
 33. Gif feaxfang geweorð, L sceatta to bote.
 34. Gif banes blice weorðeþ, III scillingum gebete.
 35. Gif banes bite weorð, IIII scillingum gebete.
 36. Gif sio uterre hion gebrocen worðeþ, X scillingum gebete.
 37. Gif butu sien, XX scillingum gebete.
 38. Gif eaxle gelæmed weorþeð, XXX scillinga gebete.
 39. Gif oþer eare nowiht gehereð, XXV scillinga gebete.
 40. Gif eare of weorð aslagen, XII scillinga gebete.
 41. Gif eare þirel weorðeþ, III scillinga gebete.
 42. Gif eare sceard weorðeþ, VI scillinga gebete.
 43. Gif eage of weorð, L scillinga gebete.
 44. Gif muð oþþe eage woh weorðeþ, XII scillinga gebete.
 45. Gif nasu ðyrel weorð, VIIII scillingum gebete.
 46. Gif hit sio an hleore, III scillinga gebete.
 47. Gif butu ðyrele sien, VI scillinga gebete.
 48. Gif nasu ælcor sceard weorð, gehwylc VI scillinga gebete.
 49. Gif ðirel weorþ, VI scillinga gebete.
 50. Se þe cinban forslæhð, mid XX scillingum forgelde.
 51. Æt þam feower toðum fyrestum, æt gehwylcum VI
scillingas; se toþ se þanne bistandeþ: IIII scillingas; se þe ðonne
bi ðam standeþ: III scillingas; ond þonne siþþan gehwylc: scilling.
 52. Gif spræc awyrd weorþ, XII scillingas.
 52.1. Gif widobane gebroced weorðeþ, VI scillinga gebete.
 53. Se þe earm þurhstinð, VI scillingum gebete.
 53.1. Gif earm forbrocen weorð, VI scillinga gebete.
 54. Gif þuman ofaslæhð, XX scillingas.
 54.1. Gif ðuman nægl of weorðeþ, III scillinga gebete.
 54.2. Gif man scytefinger ofaslæhð, VIIII scillinga gebete.
 54.3. Gif man middelfinger ofaslæhð IIII scillinga gebete.
 54.4. Gif man goldfinger ofaslæhð, VI scillingum gebete.
 54.5. Gif man þone lytlan finger ofaslæhð, XI scillinga
gebete.
 55. Æt þam neglum gehwylcum scilling.
 56. Æt þam lærestan wlitewamme III scillingas ond æt
þam maran VI scillinga.
 57. Gif man oþerne mid fyste in naso slæhð, III scillingas.
 58. Gif dynt sie, scilling.
 58.1. Gif he heahre handa dyntes onfehð, scilling forgelde.
 59. Gif dynt sweart sie buton wædum, XXX scætta gebete.
 60. Gif hit sie binnan wædum, gehwylc XX scætta gebete.
 61. Gif hrifwund weorðeþ, XII scillinga gebete.
 61.1. Gif he þurhðirel weorðeþ, XX scillinga gebete.
 62. Gif man gegemed weorðeþ, XXX scillinga gebete.
 63. Gif man cearwund sie, XXX scillinga gebete.
 64. Gif man gekyndelice lim awyrdeþ, þrym leudgeldum hine man
forgelde.
 64.1. Gif he þurhstinð, VI scillinga gebete.
 64.2. Gif man inbestinð, VI scillinga gebete.
 65. Gif þeoh gebrocen weorðeþ, XII scillingum gebete.
 65.1. Gif he healt weorð, þær motan freond seman.
 66. Gif rib forbrocen weorð, III scillinga gebete.
 67. Gif man þeoh ðurhstingþ, stice gehwilce VI scillingas.
 67.1. Gyfe ofer ynce scilling, æt twam yncum twegen, ofer þry
III scillingas.
 68. Gif wælt wund weorðeþ, III scillingas gebete.
 69. Gif fot of weorðeþ, L scillingum forgelden.
 70. Gif seo micle ta of weorðeþ, X scillinga forgelden.
 71. Æt þam oðrum taum gehwilcum healf gelde, ealswa æt
þam fingrum ys cwiden.
 72. Gif þare mycclan taan nægl of weorþeð, XXX scætta
to bote.
 72.1. Æt þam oþrum gehwilcum X scættas gebete.
 73. Gif friwif locbore leswæs hwæt gedeþ, XXX scillinga
gebete.
 74. Mægþbot sy swa friges mannes.
 75. Mund þare betstan widuwan eorlcundre L scillinga gebete.
 75.1. Ðare oþre XX scillingas, ðare þriddan XII scillingas,
þare feorðan VI scillingas.
 76. Gif man widuwan unagne genimeþ, II gelde seo mund sy.
 77. Gif mon mægþ gebigeð, ceapi geceapod sy, gif hit unfacne
is.
 77.1. Gif hit þonne facne is, ef þær æt ham gebrenge,
& him man his scæt agefe.
 78. Gif hio cwic bearn gebyreþ, healfne scæt age, gif ceorl
ær swylteþ.
 79. Gif mid bearnum bugan wille, healfne scæt age.
 80. Gif ceorl agan wile: swa an bearn.
 81. Gif hio bearn ne gebyreþ, fæderingmagas fioh agan &
morgengyfe.
 82. Gif man mægþmon nede genimeþ: ðam agende L scillinga
& eft æt þam agende sinne willan ætgebicge.
 83. Gif hio oþrum mæn in sceat bewyddod sy, XX scillinga
gebete.
 84. Gif gængang geweorðeþ, XXXV scillingas & cyninge XV
scillingas.
 85. Gif man mid esnes cwynan geligeþ be cwicum ceorle, II
gebete.
 86. Gif esne oþerne ofslea unsynnigne, ealne weorðe forgelde.
 87. Gif esnes eage & foot of weorðeþ aslagen, ealne
weorðe hine forgelde.
 88. Gif man mannes esne gebindeþ, VI scillingas gebete.
 89. Ðeowæs wegreaf se III scillingas.
 90. Gif þeo steleþ, II gelde gebete.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawHl
B14.2.
Hlothære and Eadric: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 9-11.



 0.1. Þis syndon þa domas ðe Hloþhære & Eadric,
Cantwara cyningas, asetton.
 0.2. Hloþhære & Eadric Cantwara cyningas ecton þa æ,
þa ðe heora aldoras ær geworhton, ðyssum domum þe hyr efter
sægeþ.
 1. Gif mannes esne eorlcundne mannan ofslæhð, þane ðe sio
þreom hundum scillinga gylde, se agend þone banan agefe & do þær
þrio manwyrð to.
 2. Gif se bane oþbyrste, feorþe manwyrð he togedo & hine
gecænne mid godum æwdum, þæt he þane banan begeten ne mihte.
 3. Gif mannes esne frigne mannan ofslæhð, þane þe sie hund
scillinga gelde, se agend þone banan agefe & oþer manwyrð þær
to.
 4. Gif bana oþbyrste, twam manwyrþum hine man forgelde &
hine gecænne mid godum æwdum, þæt he þane banan begeten ne mihte.
 5. Gif frigman mannan forstele, gif he eft cuma stermelda, secge an
andweardne; gecænne hine, gif he mæge: hæbbe þare freora rim
æwdamanna & ænne mid in aþe, æghwilc man æt þam tune þe
he tohyre; gif he þæt ne mæge, gelde swa he gono hage.
 6. Gif ceorl acwyle be libbendum wife & bearne, riht is
þæt hit, þæt bearn, medder folgige, & him mon an his
fæderingmagum wilsumne berigean gefelle his feoh to healdenne, oþ þæt
he X wintra sie.
 7. Gif man oþrum mæn feoh forstele, & se agend hit eft
ætfo, geteme to cynges sele, gif he mæge, & þone ætgebrenge þe
him sealde; gif he þæt ne mæge, læte an, & fo se agend to.
 8. Gif man oþerne sace tihte & he þane mannan mote an medle
oþþe an þinge, symble se man þam oðrum byrigean geselle & þam
riht awyrce þe to hiom Cantwara deman gescrifen.
 9. Gif he ðonne byrigan forwærne, XII scillingas agylde þam
cyninge, & sio se sacy swa open swa hio ær wes.
 10. Gif man oþerne tihte, siþþan he him byrigan gesealdne
hæbbe, & ðonne ymb III niht gesecæn hiom sæmend buton þam ufor
leofre sio þe þa tihtlan age; siþþan sio sace gesemed sio, an seofan
nihtum se man þam oþrum riht gedo, gecwime an feo oððe an aþe, swa
hwæder swa him leofre sio.
 10. Gif he þonne þæt nille, gelde þonne C buton aðe,
siþþan ane neaht ofer þæt gesem hie.
 11. Gif man mannan an oþres flette manswara hateþ oððe hine
mid bismærwordum scandlice grete, scilling agelde þam þe þæt flet
age, & VI scillinga þam þe he þæt word togecwæde, & cyninge
XII scillinga forgelde.
 12. Gif man oþrum steop asette ðær mæn drincen, buton
scylde, an eald riht scilling agelde þam þe þæt flet age, & VI
scillinga þam þe man þone steap aset, & cynge XII scillinga.
 13. Gif man wæpn abregde þær mæn drincen & ðær
man nan yfel ne deþ, scilling þan þe þæt flet age, & cyninge XII
scillinga.
 14. Gif þæt flet geblodgad wyrþe, forgylde þem mæn his
mundbyrd & cyninge L scillinga.
 15. Gif man cuman feormæþ III niht an his agenum hame cepeman
oþþe oðerne þe sio ofer mearce cuman & hine þonne his mete fede,
& he þonne ænigum mæn yfel gedo, se man þane oðerne æt rihte
gebrenge oþþe riht forewyrce.
 16. Gif Cantwara ænig in Lundenwic feoh gebycge, hæbbe him
þonne twegen oððe ðreo unfacne ceorlas to gewitnesse oþþe cyninges
wicgerefan.
 16.1. Gif hit man eft æt þam mæn in Cænt ætfo,
þonne tæme he to wic to cyngæs sele to þam mæn ðe him sealde,
gif he þane wite & æt þam teame gebrengen mæge.
 16.2. Gif he þæt ne mæge, gekyþe ðanne in wiofode mid
his gewitena anum oþþe mid cyninges wicgerefan, þæt he þæt feoh
undeornunga his cuþan ceape in wic gebohte; & him man þanne his weorð
agefe.
 16.3. Gif he þanne þæt ne mæge gecyþan mid rihtre
canne, læte þanne an, & se agend tofo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawWiProl
B14.3.1.
Wihtræd (Prologue): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 12.



 1. Ðis synd Wihtrædes domas Cantwara cyninges.
 1. Dam mildestan cyninge Cantwara Wihtræde rixigendum þe
fiftan wintra his rices, þy niguðan gebanne, sextan dæge Rugernes, in
þære stowe þy hatte Berghamstyde, ðær wæs gesamnad eadigra
geheahtendlic ymcyme:
 1. Ðær wæs Birhtwald, Bretone heahbiscop, & se ær
næmda cyning; eac þan Hrofesceastre bisceop se ilca Gybmund wæs haten
andward wæs;
 2. & cwæð ælc had ciricean ðære mægðe
anmodlice mid þy hersuman folcy.
 3. Þær ða eadigan fundon mid ealra gemedum ðas domas &
Cantwara rihtum þeawum æcton, swa hit hyr efter segeþ & cwyþ:

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawWi
B14.3.2.
Wihtræd: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 12-14.



 1. Cirice an freolsdome gafola; & man for cyning gebidde, &
hine buton neadhæse heora willum weorþigen.
 2. Ciricean mundbyrd sie L scillinga swa cinges.
 3. Unrihthæmde mæn to rihtum life mid synna hreowe tofon
oþþe of ciricean genaman ascadene sien.
 4. Æltheodige mæn, gif hio hiora hæmed rihtan nyllað, of
lande mid hiora æhtum & mid synnum gewiten; swæse mæn in leodum
ciriclicæs gemanan ungestrodyne þoligen.
 5. Gif ðæs geweorþe gesiþcundne mannan ofer þis gemot,
þæt he unriht hæmed genime ofer cyngæs bebod & biscopes &
boca dom, se þæt gebete his dryhtne C scillinga an ald reht; Gif hit
ceorlisc man sie, gebete L scillinga; & gehwæder þæt hæmed mid
hreowe forlæte.
 6. Gif priost læfe unriht hæmed oþþe fulwihðe untrumes
forsitte oþþe to þon druncen sie, þæt he ne mæge, sio he stille
his þegnungæ oþ biscopes dom.
 7. Gif bescoren man steorleas gange him an gestliðnesse, gefe him
man ænes; & þæt ne geweorðe buton he leafnesse habbe, þæt
hine man læng feormige.
 8. Gif man his mæn an wiofode freols gefe, se sie folcfry;
freolsgefa age his erfe ænde wergeld & munde þare hina, sie ofer
mearce ðær he wille.
 9. Gif esne ofer dryhtnes hæse þeowweorc wyrce an sunnan
æfen efter hire setlgange oþ monan æfenes setlgang, LXXX scillinga se
dryhtne gebete.
 10. Gif esne deþ his rade þæs dæges, VI se wið dryhten
gebete oþþe sine hyd; gif friman þonne an ðane forbodenan timan, sio he
healsfange scyldig; & se man se þæt arasie, he age healf þæt wite
& ðæt weorc.
 11. Gif ceorl buton wifes wisdome deoflum gelde, he sie ealra his
æhtan scyldig & healsfange.
 12. Gif butwu deoflum geldaþ, sion hio healsfange scyldigo &
ealra æhtan.
 13. Gif þeuw deoflum geldaþ, VI scillinga gebete oþþe his
hyd.
 14. Gif mon his heowum in fæsten flæsc gefe, frigne ge
þeowne halsfange alyse.
 15. Gif þeow ete his sylfes ræde, VI scillinga oþþe his
hyd.
 16. Biscopes word & cyninges sie unlægne buton aþe.
 17. Mynstres aldor hine cænne in preostes canne.
 18. Preost hine clænsie sylfæs soþe in his halgum hrægle
ætforan wiofode ðus cweþende: <foreign>Ueritatem dico in Christo, non mentior</foreign>;
Swylce diacon hine clænsie.
 19. Cliroc feowra sum hine clænsie his heafodgemacene & ane
his hand on wiofode; oþre ætstanden, aþ abycgan.
 20. Gest hine clænsie sylfes aþe on wiofode; swylce cyninges
ðeng; ceorlisc man hine feowra sum his heafodgemacene on weofode; &
ðissa ealra að sie unlegnæ;
 21. Ðanne is cirican canne riht: Gif man biscopes esne tihte
oþþe cyninges, cænne hine an gerefan hand, oþþe hine gerefa clensie,
oþþe selle to swinganne.
 23. Gif man Gedes þeuwne esne in heora gemange tihte, his dryhten
hine his ane aþe geclænsie, gif he huslgenga sie; gif he huslgenga nis,
hæbbe him in aþe oðirne æwdan godne oþþe gelde oþþe selle to
swinganne.
 24. Gif folcesmannes esne tihte ciricanmannes esne, oþþe
ciricanmannes esne tihte folcesmannes esne, his dryhten hine ane his aþe
geclensige.
 25. Gif man leud ofslea an þeofðe, licge buton wyrgelde.
 26. Gif man frigne man æt hæbbendre handa gefo, þanne
wealde se cyning ðreora anes: oððe hine man cwelle oþþe ofer sæ
selle oþþe hine his wergelde alese; Se þe hine gefo & gegange,
healfne hine age; gif hine man cwelle, geselle heom man LXX scillinga.
 27. Gif þeuw stele & hi man alese: LXX scillinga, swa hweder
swa cyning wille; gif hine man acwelle, þam agende hi man healfne agelde.
 28. Gif feorran cumen man oþþe fræmde buton wege gange &
he þonne nawðer ne hryme ne he horn ne blawe, for ðeof he bið to
profianne: oþþe to sleanne oþþe to alysenne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawAfRb
B14.4.1.
Alfred-Ine (Headings to Alfred): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 16-20.



 0.1. Be ðon þæt mon ne scyle oþrum deman buton swa he
wille, þæt him mon deme.
 1. Be aþum & be weddum.
 2. Be circena socnum.
 3. Be borgbryce.
 4. Be hlafordsearwe.
 5. Be circena friðe.
 6. Be circan stale.
 7. Be ðon þe mon on cynges healle feohte.
 8. Be nunnan hæmede.
 9. Be bearneacnum wife ofslægenum.
 10. Be twelfhyndes monnes wife forlegenum.
 11. Be cirliscre fæmnan onfenge.
 12. Be wudubærnette.
 14. Be dumbera monna dædum.
 15. Be þam monnum þe beforan biscopum feohtað.
 18. Be nunnena onfenge.
 19. Be ðam monnum þe heora wæpen to monslyhte lænað.
 20. Be ðam þe munecum heora feoh buton leafe befæstað.
 21. Be preosta gefeohte.
 22. Be eofetes andetlan.
 23. Be hundes slite.
 24. Be nietena misdædum.
 25. Be ceorles mennenes niedhæmede.
 29. Be twyhyndum men æt hloþslyhte.
 30. Be syxhyndum men.
 31. Be XIIhyndum men.
 26. Be ungewintredes wifmonnes nedhæmde.
 28. Be swa gerades monnes slege.
 32. Be folcleasunge gewyrhtum.
 33. Be godborgum.
 34. Be ciepemonnum.
 35. Be cierlisces monnes byndellan.
 36. Be speres gemeleasnesse.
 37. Be boldgetale.
 38. Be ðon ðe mon beforan ealdormen on gemote gefeohte.
 39. Be cierlisces monnes fletgefeohte.
 41. Be boclondum.
 42. Be fæhðe.
 43. Be mæssedaga freolse.
 44. Be heafodwunde.
 45. Be feaxwunde.
 46. Be earslege.
 47. Be monnes eagwunde & oðerra missenlicra lima.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIneRb
B14.4.2.
Alfred-Ine (Headings to Ine): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 20-26.



 1. Be Ines domum.
 1. Be Godes ðeowa regole.
 2. Be cildum.
 3. Be sunnan dæges weorcum.
 4. Be ciricsceattum.
 5. Be ciricsocnum.
 6. Be gefeohtum.
 7. Be stale.
 8. Be ryhtes bene.
 9. Be ðam wrecendan, ær him ryhtes bidde.
 10. Be reaflace.
 11. Be ðam monnum þe hiora gelondan bebycggað.
 12. Be gefongenum ðeofum.
 13. Be ðam ðe hiora gewitnessa beforan biscepe aleogað.
 14. Be hloðe.
 15. Be herige.
 16. Be ðeofslege.
 17. Be forstolenum flæsce.
 18. Be cirliscum ðeofe gefongenum.
 19. Be cyninges geneate.
 20. Be feorran cumenum men butan wege gemetton.
 21. Be swa ofslegenes monnes were.
 22. Be ðon ðe monnes geneat stalige.
 23. Be elðeodies monnes slege.
 24. Be witeðeowes monnes slege.
 25. Be ciepemonna fore uppe on londe.
 26. Be fundenes cildes fostre.
 27. Be þon þe mon dearnenga bearn gestriene.
 28. Be ðeofes onfenge æt ðiefðe.
 29. Be ðon þe mon sweordes onlæne oðres ðeowe.
 30. Be ðon þe cierlisc mon flieman feormige.
 31. Be ðon þe mon wif bycge, & þonne sio gift tostande.
 32. Be Wilisces monnes londhæfene.
 33. Be cyninges horsweale.
 34. Be monslihte.
 35. Be þeofslihte, þæt he mote aðe gecyðan.
 36. Be ðeofes onfenge, & hine ðonne forlæte.
 37. Be cirlisces monnes ontygnesse æt ðiefðe.
 38. Be þon ðe ryhtgesamhiwan bearn hæbben, & þonne se
wer gewite.
 39. Be unalefedum fære from his hlaforde.
 40. Be ceorles weorðige.
 41. Be borges ondsæce.
 42. Be ceorles gærstune.
 43. Be wuda bærnette.
 44. Be wuda onfenge butan leafe.
 45. Be burgbryce.
 46. Be stæltyhtlan.
 47. Be ðon þe mon forstolenne ceap befehð.
 48. Be witeþeowum men.
 49. Be unaliefedes mæstennes onfenge.
 50. Be gesiðcundes monnes geþinge.
 51. Be ðon ðe gesiðcund mon fierd forsitte.
 52. Be diernum geðinge.
 53. Be forstolenes monnes forefonge.
 54. Be werfæhðe tyhtlan.
 55. Be ewes weorðe.
 56. Be gehwelces ceapes angelde.
 57. Be cierlisces monnes stale.
 58. Be oxan horne.
 59. Be cuus horne.
 60. Be hyrgeohte.
 61. Be ciricsceatte.
 62. Be þon þe mon to ceape fordræfe.
 63. Be gesiðcundes monnes fære.
 64. Be þon þe hæfð XX hida londes.
 65. Be X hidum.
 66. Be III hidum.
 67. Be gyrde londes.
 68. Be gesiðcundes monnes dræfe of londe.
 69. Be sceapes gonge mid his fliese.
 70. Be twyhyndum were.
 71. Be wertyhtlan.
 72. Be wergeldðeofes forefonge.
 73. Be anre nihtes ðiefðe.
 74. Be ðon ðe ðeowwealh frione mon ofslea.
 75. Be forstolenes ceapes forefonge.
 76. Be þon gif mon oðres godsunu slea oððe his
godfæder.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawAfEl
B14.4.3.
Alfred-Ine (Introduction to Alfred): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 26-46.



 0.1. Dryhten wæs sprecende ðas word to Moyse & þus
cwæð: Ic eom dryhten ðin God.
 0.1. Ic ðe utgelædde of Egipta londe & of hiora
ðeowdome.
 1. Ne lufa ðu oþre fremde godas ofer me.
 2. Ne minne noman ne cig ðu on idelnesse; forðon þe ðu ne
bist unscyldig wið me, gif ðu on idelnesse cigst minne noman.
 3. Gemyne þæt ðu gehalgige þone ræstedæg; wyrceað
eow VI dagas & on þam siofoðan restað eow: forðam on VI dagum Crist
geworhte heofonas & eorðan, sæs & ealle gesceafta þe on him
sint, & hine gereste on þone siofoðan dæg, & forðon Dryhten
hine gehalgode.
 4. Ara ðinum fæder & þinre medder, ða þe Dryhten
sealde, þæt ðu sie þy leng libbende on eorþan.
 5. Ne sleah ðu.
 6. Ne lige ðu dearnenga.
 7. Ne stala ðu.
 8. Ne sæge ðu lease gewitnesse.
 9. Ne wilna ðu þines nehstan ierfes mid unryhte.
 10. Ne wyrc ðe gyldne godas oððe sylfrene.
 11. Þis sint ða domas þe ðu him settan scealt: Gif hwa
gebycgge cristenne þeow, VI gear ðeowige he; ðy siofoðan beo he frioh
orceapunga; mid swelce hrægle he ineode, mid swelce gange he ut.
 11. Gif he wif self hæbbe, gange hio ut mid him.
 11. Gif se hlaford him þonne wif sealde, sie hio & hire bearn
þæs hlafordes.
 11. Gif se þeowa þonne cweðe: Nelle ic from minum hlaforde ne
from minum wife, ne from minum bearne ne from minum ierfe, brenge hine þonne
his hlaford to ðære dura þæs temples & þurhþyrlige his eare
mid æle, to tacne þæt he sie æfre siððan þeow.
 12. Ðeah hwa gebycgge his dohtor on þeowenne, ne sie hio ealles
swa ðeowu swa oðru mennenu: nage he hie ut on elðeodig folc to
bebycgganne.
 12. Ac gif he hire ne recce, se ðe hie bohte, læte hie freo on
elðeodig folc.
 12. Gif he ðonne alefe his suna mid to hæmanne, do hiere
gyfta: locige þæt hio hæbbe hrægl; & þæt weorð sie hiere
mægðhades, þæt is se weotuma, agife he hire þone.
 12. Gif he hire þara nan ne do, þonne sie hio frioh.
 13. Se mon se ðe his gewealdes monnan ofslea, swelte se deaðe.
 13. Se ðe hine þonne nedes ofsloge oððe unwillum oððe
ungewealdes, swelce hine God swa sende on his honda, & he hine ne
ymbsyrede, sie he feores wyrðe & folcryhtre bote, gif he friðstowe
gesece.
 13. Gif hwa ðonne of giernesse & gewealdes ofslea his þone
nehstan þurh searwa, aluc ðu hine from minum weofode, to þam þæt he
deaðe swelte.
 14. Se ðe slea his fæder oððe his modor, se sceal deaðe
sweltan.
 15. Se ðe frione forstele & he hine bebycgge, & hit
onbestæled sie, þæt he hine bereccean ne mæge, swelte se deaðe.
 15. Se ðe werge his fæder oððe his modor, swelte se
deaðe.
 16. Gif hwa slea his ðone nehstan mid stane oððe mid fyste,
& he þeah utgongan mæge bi stafe, begite him læce & wyrce his
weorc ða hwile þe he self ne mæge.
 17. Se ðe slea his agenne þeowne esne oððe his mennen,
& he ne sie idæges dead, ðeah he libbe twa niht oððe ðreo, ne
bið he ealles swa scyldig, forþon þe hit wæs his agen fioh.
 17. Gif he ðonne sie idæges dead, ðonne sitte sio scyld on
him.
 18. Gif hwa on cease eacniende wif gewerde, bete þone
æwerdlan, swa him domeras gereccen.
 18. Gif hio dead sie, selle sawle wið sawle.
 19. Gif hwa oðrum his eage oðdo, selle his agen fore: toð
fore teð, honda wið honda, fet fore fet, bærning for bærninge, wund
wið wunde, læl wið læle.
 20. Gif hwa aslea his ðeowe oððe his ðeowenne þæt eage
ut & he þonne hie gedo anigge gefreoge hie for þon.
 20. Gif he þonne ðone toð ofaslea, do þæt ilce.
 21. Gif oxa ofhnite wer oððe wif, þæt hie dead sien, sie
he mid stanum ofworpod, & ne sie his flæsc eten; se hlaford bið
unscyldig.
 21. Gif se oxa hnitol wære twam dagum ær oððe ðrim,
& se hlaford hit wisse & hine inne betynan nolde, & he ðonne wer
oððe wif ofsloge, sie he mid stanum ofworpod, & sie se hlaford ofslegen
oððe forgolden, swa ðæt witan to ryhte finden.
 21. Sunu oððe dohtor gif he ofstinge, ðæs ilcan domes sie
he wyrðe.
 21. Gif he ðonne ðeow oððe ðeowmennen ofstinge, geselle
þam hlaforde XXX scillinga seolfres, & se oxa mid stanum ofworpod.
 22. Gif hwa adelfe wæterpyt oððe betynedne ontyne & hine
eft ne betyne, gelde swelc neat swelc ðær on befealle, & hæbbe him
ðæt deade.
 23. Gif oxa oðres monnes oxan gewundige, & he ðonne dead
sie, bebycggen þone oxan & hæbben him þæt weorð gemæne &
eac ðæt flæsc swa ðæs deadan.
 23. Gif se hlaford þonne wisse, þæt se oxa hnitol wære,
& hine healdan nolde, selle him oðerne oxan fore & hæbbe him eall
ðæt flæsc.
 24. Gif hwa forstele oðres oxan & hine ofslea oððe
bebycgge, selle twegen wið & feower sceap wið anum.
 24. Gif he næbbe hwæt he selle, sie he self beboht wið
ðam fio.
 25. Gif ðeof brece mannes hus nihtes & he weorðe þær
ofslegen, ne sie he na mansleges scyldig.
 25. Gif he siððan æfter sunnan upgonge þis deð, he bið
mansleges scyldig & he ðonne self swelte, buton he nieddæda wære.
 25. Gif mid him cwicum sie funden þæt he ær stæl, be
twyfealdum forgielde hit.
 26. Gif hwa gewerde oðres monnes wingeard oððe his æcras
oððe his landes awuht, gebete swa hit mon geeahtige.
 27. Gif fyr sie ontended ryt to bærnanne, gebete þone
æfwerdelsan se ðæt fyr ontent.
 28. Gif hwa oðfæste his friend fioh, gif he hit self stæle,
forgylde be twyfealdum.
 28. Gif he nyte, hwa hit stæle, geladige hine selfne, þæt
he ðær nan facn ne gefremede.
 28. Gif hit ðonne cucu feoh wære, & he secgge, þæt
hit here name oððe hit self acwæle, & gewitnesse hæbbe, ne
þearf he þæt geldan.
 28. Gif he ðonne gewitnesse næbbe, & he him ne getriewe,
swerige he þonne.
 29. Gif hwa fæmnan beswice unbeweddode & hire midslæpo,
forgielde hie & hæbbe hi siððan him to wife.
 29. Gif ðære fæmnan fæder hie ðonne sellan nelle,
agife he ðæt feoh æfter þam weotuman.
 30. Ða fæmnan þe gewuniað onfon gealdorcræftigan &
scinlæcan & wiccan, ne læt þu ða libban.
 31. & se ðe hæme mid netene, swelte he deaðe.
 32. & se ðe godgeldum onsecge ofer God anne, swelte se
deaðe.
 33. Utan cumene & elðeodige ne geswenc ðu no, forðon ðe
ge wæron giu elðeodige on Egipta londe.
 34. Þa wuduwan & þa stiopcild ne sceððað ge, ne hie
nawer deriað.
 34. Gif ge þonne elles doð, hie cleopiað to me, & ic
gehiere hie & ic eow þonne slea mid minum sweorde & ic gedo, þæt
eowru wif beoð wydewan & eowru bearn beoð steopcild.
 35. Gif ðu fioh to borge selle þinum geferan, þe mid þe
eardian wille, ne niede ðu hine swa swa niedling & ne gehene þu hine
mid ðy eacan.
 36. Gif mon næbbe buton anfeald hrægl hine mid to wreonne
& to werianne, & he hit to wedde selle, ær sunnan setlgonge sie hit
agifen.
 36. Gif ðu swa ne dest, þonne cleopað he to me, & ic hine
gehiere, forðon ðe ic eom swiðe mildheort.
 37. Ne tæl ðu ðinne Dryhten, ne ðone hlaford þæs
folces ne werge þu.
 38. Þine teoðan sceattas & þine frumripan gongendes &
weaxendes agif þu Gode.
 39. Eal ðæt flæsc þæt wildeor læfen ne eten ge
þæt, ac sellað hit hundum.
 40. Leases monnes word ne rec ðu no þæs to gehieranne, ne
his domas ne geðafa ðu, ne nane gewitnesse æfter him ne saga ðu.
 41. Ne wend ðu ðe no on þæs folces unræd & unryht
gewill on hiora spræce & geclysp ofer ðin ryht, & ðæs
unwisestan lare ne him ne geðafa.
 42. Gif ðe becume oðres mannes giemeleas fioh on hond þeah
hit sie ðin feond, gecyðe hit him.
 43. Dem ðu swiðe emne.
 43. Ne dem ðu oðerne dom þam welegan, oðerne ðam earman;
ne oðerne þam liofran & oðerne þam laðran ne dem ðu.
 44. Onscuna ðu a leasunga.
 45. Soðfæstne man & unscyldigne ne acwele ðu þone
næfre.
 46. Ne onfoh ðu næfre medsceattum, forðon hie ablendað ful
oft wisra monna geðoht & hiora word onwendað.
 47. Þam elðeodegan & utan cumenan ne læt ðu no
uncuðlice wið hine, ne mid nanum unryhtum þu hine ne drece.
 48. Ne swergen ge næfre under hæðne godas, ne on nanum
ðingum ne cleopien ge to him.
 49. Þis sindan ða domas þe se ælmihtega God self sprecende
wæs to Moyse & him bebead to healdanne.
 49. & siððan se ancenneda Dryhtnes sunu, ure God, þæt
is hælend Crist, on middangeard cwom, he cwæð, ðæt he ne come no
ðas bebodu to brecanne ne to forbeodanne, ac mid eallum godum to ecanne;
& mildheortnesse & eaðmodnesse he lærde.
 49.1. Ða æfter his ðrowunge, ær þam þe his apostolas
tofarene wæron geond ealle eorðan to læranne, & þa giet ða hie
ætgædere wæron, monega hæðena ðeoda hie to Gode gecerdon.
 49.1. Þa hie ealle ætsomne wæron, hie sendan ærendwrecan
to Antiohhia & to Syrie, Cristes æ to læranne.
 49.2. Þa hie ða ongeaton, þæt him ne speow, ða sendon
hie ærendgewrit to him.
 49.2. Þis is ðonne þæt ærendgewrit þe ða apostolas
sendon ealle to Antiohhia & to Syria & to cilicia, ða sint nu of
hæðenum ðeodum to Criste gecirde.
 49.3. Ða apostolas & þa eldran broðor hælo eow
wyscað; & we eow cyðað, þæt we geascodon, þæt ure geferan
sume mid urum wordum to eow comon & eow hefigran wisan budon to healdanne
þonne we him budon, & eow to swiðe gedwealdon mid ðam mannigfealdum
gebodum, & eowra sawla ma forhwerfdon þonne hie geryhton.
 49.3. Ða gesomnodon we us ymb ðæt, & us eallum gelicode
ða, þæt we sendon Paulus & Barnaban; ða men wilniað hiora sawla
sellan for Dryhtnes naman.
 49.4. Mid him we sendon Iudam & Silam, þæt eow þæt
ilce seccgen.
 49.5. Þæm halgan Gaste wæs geðuht & us, þæt we
nane byrðenne on eow settan noldon ofer þæt ðe eow nedðearf wæs
to healdanne: þæt is ðonne, þæt ge forberen, þæt ge
deofolgeld ne weorðien, ne blod ne ðicggen ne asmorod, & from diernum
geligerum; & þæt ge willen, þæt oðre men eow ne don, ne doð
ge ðæt oþrum monnum.
 49.6. Of ðissum anum dome mon mæg geðencean, þæt he
æghwelcne on ryht gedemeð; ne ðearf he nanra domboca oþerra.
 49.6. Geðence he, þæt he nanum men ne deme þæt he nolde
ðæt he him demde, gif he ðone dom ofer hine sohte.
 49.7. Siððan ðæt þa gelamp, þæt monega ðeoda
Cristes geleafan onfengon, þa wurdon monega seonoðas geond ealne
middangeard gegaderode, & eac swa geond Angelcyn, siððan hie Cristes
geleafan onfengon, halegra biscepa & eac oðerra geðungenra witena.
 49.7. Hie ða gesetton, for ðære mildheortnesse þe Crist
lærde, æt mæstra hwelcre misdæde þætte ða weoruldhlafordas
moston mid hiora leafan buton synne æt þam forman gylte þære fiohbote
onfon, þe hie ða gesettan.
 49.7. Buton æt hlafordsearwe hie nane mildheortnesse ne dorston
gecweðan, forþam ðe God ælmihtig þam nane ne gedemde þe hine
oferhogdon, ne Crist Godes sunu þam nane ne gedemde þe hine to deaðe
sealde, & he bebead þone hlaford lufian swa hine.
 49.8. Hie ða on monegum senoðum monegra menniscra misdæda
bote gesetton, & on monega senoðbec hie writan, hwær anne dom hwær
oþerne.
 49.9. Ic ða ælfred cyning þas togædere gegaderode &
awritan het, monege þara þe ure foregengan heoldon, ða ðe me licodon;
& manege þara þe me ne licodon ic awearp mid minra witena geðeahte,
& on oðre wisan bebead to healdanne.
 49.9. Forðam ic ne dorste geðristlæcan þara minra awuht
fela on gewrit settan, forðam me wæs uncuð, hwæt þæs ðam
lician wolde ðe æfter us wæren.
 49.9. Ac ða ðe ic gemette awðer oððe on Ines dæge,
mines mæges, oððe on Offan Mercna cyninges oððe on æþelbryhtes,
þe ærest fulluhte onfeng on Angelcynne, þa ðe me ryhtoste ðuhton, ic
þa heron gegaderode, & þa oðre forlet.
 49.10. Ic ða ælfred Westseaxna cyning eallum minnum witum,
þas geeowde, & hie ða cwædon, þæt him þæt licode eallum to
healdanne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawAf 1
B14.4.4.
Alfred-Ine (Alfred): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 46-88.



 1. Æt ærestan we lærað, þæt mæst ðearf is,
þæt æghwelc mon his að & his wed wærlice healde.
 1.1. Gif hwa to hwæðrum þissa genied sie on woh, oððe to
hlafordsearwe oððe to ængum unryhtum fultume, þæt is þonne ryhtre
to aleoganne þonne to gelæstanne.
 1.2. Gif he þonne þæs weddige þe him riht sie to
gelæstanne & þæt aleoge, selle mid eaðmedum his wæpn & his
æhta his freondum to gehealdanne & beo feowertig nihta on carcerne on
cyninges tune, ðrowige ðær swa biscep him scrife, & his mægas
hine feden, gif he self mete næbbe.
 1.3. Gif he mægas næbbe oððe þone mete næbbe, fede
cyninges gerefa hine.
 1.4. Gif hine mon togenedan scyle, & he elles nylle, gif hine
mon gebinde, þolige his wæpna & his ierfes.
 1.5. Gif hine mon ofslea, licgge he orgilde.
 1.6. Gif he ut oðfleo ær þam fierste, & hine mon gefo,
sie he feowertig nihta on carcerne, swa he ær sceolde.
 1.7. Gif he losige, sie he afliemed & sie amænsumod of
eallum Cristes ciricum.
 1.8. Gif þær ðonne oþer mennisc borg sie, bete þone
borgbryce swa him ryht wisie, & ðone wedbryce swa him his scrift scrife.
 2. Gif hwa þara mynsterhama hwelcne for hwelcere scylde gesece,
þe cyninges feorm to belimpe, oþþe oðerne frione hiered þe arwyrðe
sie, age he þreora nihta fierst him to gebeorganne, buton he ðingian
wille.
 2.1. Gif hine mon on ðam fierste geyflige mid slege oððe mid
bende oððe þurh wunde, bete þara æghwelc mid ryhte ðeodscipe, ge
mid were ge mid wite, & þam hiwum hundtwelftig scillinga ciricfriðes to
bote & næbbe his agne forfongen.
 3. Gif hwa cyninges borg abrece, gebete þone tyht swa him ryht
wisie, & þæs borges bryce mid V pundum mærra pæninga.
 3.1. Ærcebiscepes borges bryce oððe his mundbyrd gebete mid
ðrim pundum.
 3.2. Oðres biscepes oððe ealdormonnes borges bryce oððe
mundbyrd gebete mid twam pundum.
 4. Gif hwa ymb cyninges feorh sierwe, ðurh hine oððe ðurh
wreccena feormunge oððe his manna, sie he his feores scyldig & ealles
þæs ðe he age.
 4.1. Gif he hine selfne triowan wille, do þæt be cyninges
wergelde.
 4.2. Swa we eac settað be eallum hadum, ge ceorle ge eorle: se
ðe ymb his hlafordes fiorh sierwe, sie he wið ðone his feores scyldig
& ealles ðæs ðe he age, oððe be his hlafordes were hine
getriowe.
 5. Eac we settað æghwelcere cirican, ðe biscep gehalgode,
ðis frið: gif hie fahmon geierne oððe geærne, þæt hine seofan
nihtum nan mon ut ne teo.
 5. Gif hit þonne hwa do, ðonne sie he scyldig cyninges
mundbyrde & þære cirican friðes mare, gif he ðær mare ofgefo,
gif he for hungre libban mæge, buton he self utfeohte.
 5.1. Gif hiwan hiora cirican maran þearfe hæbben, healde hine
mon on oðrum ærne, & ðæt næbbe ðon ma dura þonne sio
cirice.
 5.2. Gewite ðære cirican ealdor, þæt him mon on þam
fierste mete ne selle.
 5.3. Gif he self his wæpno his gefan utræcan wille, gehealden
hi hine XXX nihta & hie hine his mægum gebodien.
 5.4. Eac cirican frið: gif hwelc mon cirican gesece for ðara
gylta hwylcum, þara ðe ær geypped nære, & hine ðær on Godes
naman geandette, sie hit healf forgifen.
 5.5. Se ðe stalað on Sunnanniht oððe on Gehhol oððe on
Eastron oððe on ðone halgan þunresdæg on Gangdagas: ðara gehwelc
we willað sie twybote, swa on Lenctenfæsten.
 6. Gif hwa on cirican hwæt geðeofige, forgylde þæt
angylde, & ðæt wite swa to ðam angylde belimpan wille, & slea
mon þa hond of ðe he hit mid gedyde.
 6.1. Gif he ða hand lesan wille, & him mon ðæt
geðafian wille, gelde swa to his were belimpe.
 7. Gif hwa in cyninges healle gefeohte oððe his wæpn
gebrede, & hine mon gefo, sie ðæt on cyninges dome, swa deað swa
lif, swa he him forgifan wille.
 7.1. Gif he losige, & hine mon eft gefo, forgielde he hine self
a be his weregilde, & ðone gylt gebete, swa wer swa wite, swa he gewyrht
age.
 8. Gif hwa nunnan of mynstere ut alæde butan kyninges lefnesse
oððe biscepes, geselle hundtwelftig scillinga, healf cyninge, healf biscepe
& þære cirican hlaforde, ðe ðone munuc age.
 8.1. Gif hio leng libbe ðonne se ðe hie utlædde, nage hio
his ierfes owiht.
 8.2. Gif hio bearn gestriene, næbbe ðæt ðæs ierfes
ðon mare ðe seo modor.
 8.3. Gif hire bearn mon ofslea, gielde cyninge þara medrenmæga
dæl; fædrenmægum hiora dæl mon agife.
 9. Gif mon wif mid bearne ofslea, þonne þæt bearn in hire
sie, forgielde ðone wifman fullan gielde, & þæt bearn be ðæs
fædrencnosles were healfan gelde.
 9.1. A sie þæt wite LX scillinga, oð ðæt angylde arise
to XXX scillinga; siððan hit to ðam arise þæt angylde, siððan
sie þæt wite CXX scillinga.
 9.2. Geo wæs goldðeofe & stodðeofe & beoðeofe,
& manig witu maran ðonne oþru; nu sint eal gelic buton manðeofe: CXX
scillinga.
 10. Gif mon hæme mid twelfhyndes monnes wife, hundtwelftig
scillinga gebete ðam were; syxhyndum men hundteontig scillinga gebete;
cierliscum men feowertig scillinga gebete.
 11. Gif mon on cirliscre fæmnan breost gefo, mid V scillingum
hire gebete.
 11.1. Gif he hie oferweorpe & mid ne gehæme, mid X
scillingum gebete.
 11.2. Gif he mid gehæme, mid LX scillingum gebete.
 11.3. Gif oðer mon mid hire læge ær, sie be healfum
ðæm þonne sio bot.
 11.4. Gif hie mon teo, geladiege hie be sixtegum hida, oððe
ðolige be healfre þære bote.
 11.5. Gif borenran wifmen ðis gelimpe, weaxe sio bot be ðam
were.
 12. Gif mon oðres wudu bærneð oððe heaweð unaliefedne,
forgielde ælc great treow mid V scillingum, & siððan æghwylc, sie
swa fela swa hiora sie, mid V pæningum; & XXX scillinga to wite.
 13. Gif mon oðerne æt gemænan weorce offele ungewealdes,
agife mon þam mægum þæt treow, & hi hit hæbben ær XXX nihta
of þam lande, oððe him fo se to se ðe ðone wudu age.
 14. Gif mon sie dumb oððe deaf geboren, þæt he ne mæge
synna onsecggan ne geandettan, bete se fæder his misdæda.
 15. Gif mon beforan ærcebiscepe gefeohte oððe wæpne
gebregde, mid L scillinga & hundteontegum gebete; gif beforan oðrum
biscepe oððe ealdormen ðis gelimpe, mid hundteontegum scillingum gebete.
 16. Gif mon cu oððe stodmyran forstele & folan oððe
cealf ofadrife, forgelde mid scillingum & þa moder be hiora weorðe.
 17. Gif hwa oðrum his unmagan oðfæste, & he hine on
ðære fæstinge forferie, getriowe hine facnes se ðe hine fede, gif
hine hwa hwelces teo.
 18. Gif hwa nunnan mid hæmeðþinge oððe on hire hrægl
oððe on hire breost butan hire leafe gefo, sie hit twybete swa we ær be
læwdum men fundon.
 18.1. Gif beweddodu fæmne hie forlicgge, gif hio sie cirlisc,
mid LX scillingum gebete þam byrgean, & þæt sie on cwicæhtum
feogodum, & mon nænigne mon on ðæt ne selle.
 18.2. Gif hio sie syxhyndu, hundteontig scillinga geselle þam
byrgean.
 18.3. Gif hio sie twelfhyndu, CXX scillinga gebete þam byrgean.
 19. Gif hwa his wæpnes oðrum onlæne, þæt he mon mid
ofslea, hie moton hie gesomnian, gif hie willað, to þam were.
 19.1. Gif hi hie ne gesamnien, gielde se ðæs wæpnes onlah
þæs weres ðriddan dæl & þæs wites ðriddan dæl.
 19.2. Gif he hine triewan wille, þæt he to ðære læne
facn ne wiste, þæt he mot.
 19.3. Gif sweordhwita oðres monnes wæpn to feormunge onfo,
oððe smið monnes andweorc, hie hit gesund begen agifan, swa hit
hwæðer hiora ær onfenge, buton hiora hwæðer ær þingode,
þæt he hit angylde healdan ne ðorfte.
 20. Gif mon oðres monnes munuce feoh oðfæste butan ðæs
munuces hlafordes lefnesse, & hit him losige, þolige his se ðe hit
ær ahte.
 21. Gif preost oðerne mon ofslea, weorpe mon to handa & eall
ðæt he him hames bohte, & hine biscep onhadige, þonne hine mon of
ðam mynstre agife, buton se hlaford þone wer forðingian wille.
 22. Gif mon on folces gemote cyninges gerefan geyppe eofot, &
his eft geswican wille, gestæle on ryhtran hand, gif he mæge; gif he ne
mæge, ðolie his angyldes.
 23. Gif hund mon toslite oððe abite, æt forman misdæde
geselle VI scillinga, gif he him mete selle, æt æfteran cerre XII
scillinga, æt ðriddan XXX scillinga.
 23.1. Gif æt ðissa misdæda hwelcere se hund losige, ga
ðeos bot hwæðre forð.
 23.2. Gif se hund ma misdæda gewyrce, & he hine hæbbe,
bete be fullan were swa dolgbote swa he wyrce.
 24. Gif neat mon gewundige, weorpe ðæt neat to honda oððe
foreðingie.
 25. Gif mon ceorles mennen to nedhæmde geðreatað, mid V
scillingum gebete þam ceorle; & LX scillinga to wite.
 25.1. Gif ðeowmon þeowne to nedhæmde genede, bete mid his
eowende.
 29. Gif mon twyhyndne mon unsynnigne mid hloðe ofslea, gielde se
ðæs sleges andetta sie wer & wite; & æghwelc mon ðe on siðe
wære geselle XXX scillinga to hloðbote.
 30. Gif hit sie syxhynde mon, ælc mon to hloðbote LX scillinga
& se slaga wer & fulwite.
 31. Gif he sie twelfhynde, ælc hiora hundtwelftig scillinga, se
slaga wer & wite.
 31.1. Gif hloð ðis gedo & eft oðswerian wille, tio hie
ealle; & þonne ealle forgielden þone wer gemænum hondum & ealle
an wite, swa to ðam were belimpe.
 26. Gif mon ungewintrædne wifmon to niedhæmde geðreatige,
sie ðæt swa ðæs gewintredan monnes bot.
 27. Gif fædrenmæga mægleas mon gefeohte & mon ofslea,
& þonne gif medrenmægas hæbbe, gielden ða þæs weres
ðriddan dæl & ðriddan dæl þa gegildan, for ðriddan dæl he
fleo.
 27.1. Gif he medrenmægas nage, gielden þa gegildan healfne,
for healfne he fleo.
 28. Gif mon swa geradne mon ofslea, gif he mægas nage, gielde
mon healfne cyninge, healfne þam gegildan.
 32. Gif mon folcleasunge gewyrce, & hio on hine geresp
weorðe, mid nanum leohtran ðinge gebete þonne him mon aceorfe þa tungon
of, þæt hie mon na undeorran weorðe moste lesan, ðonne hie mon be
þam were geeahtige.
 33. Gif hwa oðerne godborges oncunne & tion wille, þæt
he hwelcne ne gelæste ðara ðe he him gesealde, agife þone foreað on
feower ciricum, & se oðer, gif he hine treowan wille in XII ciricum do he
ðæt.
 34. Eac is ciepemonnum gereht: ða men ðe hie up mid him
læden, gebrengen beforan kyninges gerefan on folcgemote, & gerecce hu
manige þara sien; & hie nimen þa men mid him þe hie mægen eft to
folcgemote to ryhte brengan.
 34.1. & þonne him ðearf sie ma manna up mid him to habbanne
on hiora fore, gecyðe symle, swa oft swa him ðearf sie, in gemotes
gewitnesse cyninges gerefan.
 35. Gif mon cierliscne mon gebinde unsynnigne, gebete mid X
scillingum.
 35.1. Gif hine mon beswinge, mid XX scillingum gebete.
 35.2. Gif he hine on hengenne alecgge, mid XXX scillingum gebete.
 35.3. Gif he hine on bismor to homolan bescire, mid X scillingum
gebete.
 35.4. Gif he hine to preoste bescire unbundenne, mid XXX scillingum
gebete.
 35.5. Gif he ðone beard ofascire, mid XX scillingum gebete.
 35.6. Gif he hine gebinde & þonne to preoste bescire, mid LX
scillingum gebete.
 36. Eac is funden: gif mon hafað spere ofer eaxle, & hine mon
on asnaseð, gielde þone wer butan wite.
 36.1. Gif beforan eagum asnase, gielde þone wer; gif hine mon tio
gewealdes on ðære dæde, getriowe hine be þam wite & mid ðy
þæt wite afelle, gif se ord sie ufor þonne hindeweard sceaft.
 36.2. Gif hie sien bu gelic, ord & hindeweard sceaft, þæt
sie butan pleo.
 37. Gif mon wille of boldgetale in oðer boldgetæl hlaford
secan, do ðæt mid ðæs ealdormonnes gewitnesse, þe he ær in his
scire folgode.
 37.1. Gif he hit butan his gewitnesse do, geselle se þe hine to
men feormie CXX scillinga to wite: dæle he hwæðre ðæt, healf
cyninge in ða scire ðe he ær folgode, healf in þa ðe he oncymð.
 37.2. Gif he hwæt yfla gedon hæbbe ðær he ær wæs,
bete ðæt se ðe hine ðonne to men onfo, & cyninge CXX scillinga to
wite.
 38. Gif mon beforan cyninges ealdormen on gemote gefeohte, bete wer
& wite, swa hit ryht sie, & beforan þam CXX scillinga ðam ealdormen
to wite.
 38.1. Gif he folcgemot mid wæpnes bryde arære, ðam
ealdormen hundtwelftig scillinga to wite.
 38.2. Gif ðises hwæt beforan cyninges ealdormonnes gingran
gelimpe oððe cyninges preoste, XXX scillinga to wite.
 39. Gif hwa on cierlisces monnes flette gefeohte, mid syx scillinga
gebete ðam ceorle.
 39.1. Gif he wæpne gebrede & no feohte, sie be healfum
ðam.
 39.2. Gif syxhyndum þissa hwæðer gelimpe, ðriefealdlice
arise be ðære cierliscan bote, twelfhyndum men twyfealdlice be þæs
syxhyndan bote.
 40. Cyninges burgbryce bið CXX scillinga ærcebiscepes
hundnigontig scillinga, oðres biscepes & ealdormonnes LX scillinga,
twelfhyndes monnes XXX scillinga syxhyndes monnes XV scillinga; ceorles
edorbryce V scillinga.
 40.1. Gif ðisses hwæt gelimpe ðenden fyrd ute sie, oððe
in lenctenfæsten, hit sie twybote.
 40.2. Gif mon in lenctenne halig ryht in folce butan leafe alecgge,
gebete mid CXX scillingum.
 41. Se mon se ðe bocland hæbbe, & him his mægas
læfden, þonne setton we, þæt he hit ne moste sellan of his
mægburge, gif þær bið gewrit oððe gewitnes, ðæt hit ðara
manna forbod wære þe hit on fruman gestrindon & þara þe hit him
sealdon, þæt he swa ne mote.
 41.1. & þæt þonne on cyninges & on biscopes
gewitnesse gerecce beforan his mægum.
 42. Eac we beodað: se mon se ðe his gefan hamsittendne wite,
þæt he ne feohte, ær ðam he him ryhtes bidde.
 42.1. Gif he mægnes hæbbe, þæt he his gefan beride &
inne besitte, gehealde hine VII niht inne & hine on ne feohte, gif he inne
geðolian wille; & þonne ymb VII niht, gif he wille on hand gan &
wæpenu sellan, gehealde hine XXX nihta gesundne & hine his mægum
gebodie & his friondum.
 42.2. Gif he ðonne cirican geierne, sie ðonne be ðære
cirican are, swa we ær bufan cwædon.
 42.3. Gif he ðonne þæs mægenes ne hæbbe, þæt he
hine inne besitte, ride to þam ealdormen, bidde hine fultumes; gif he him
fultuman ne wille, ride to cyninge, ær he feohte.
 42.4. Eac swelce, gif mon becume on his gefan, & he hine ær
hamfæstne ne wite, gif he wille his wæpen sellan, hine mon gehealde XXX
nihta & hine his freondum gecyðe; gif he ne wille his wæpenu sellan,
þonne mot he feohtan on hine.
 42.4. Gif he wille on hond gan & his wæpenu sellan, &
hwa ofer ðæt on him feohte, gielde swa wer swa wunde swa he gewyrce, &
wite & hæbbe his mæg forworht.
 42.5. Eac we cweðað, þæt mon mote mid his hlaforde feohtan
orwige, gif mon on ðone hlaford fiohte; swa mot se hlaford mid þy men
feohtan.
 42.6. Æfter þære ilcan wisan mon mot feohtan mid his
geborene mæge, gif hine mon on woh onfeohteð, buton wið his hlaforde:
þæt we ne liefað.
 42.7. & mon mot feohtan orwige, gif he gemeteð oþerne æt
his æwum wife, betynedum durum oððe under anre reon, oððe æt his
dehter æwum borenre oððe æt his swistær borenre oððe æt his
medder ðe wære to æwum wife forgifen his fæder.
 43. Eallum frioum monnum ðas dagas sien forgifene, butan þeowum
monnum & esnewyrhtan: XII dagas on gehhol & ðone dæg þe Crist
ðone deofol oferswiðde & sanctus Gregorius gemynddæg & VII dagas
to eastron & VII ofer & an dæg æt sancte Petres tide & sancte
Paules & on hærfeste ða fullan wican ær sancta Marian mæssan
& æt Eallra haligra weorðunge anne dæg.
 43.1. & IIII Wodnesdagas on IIII ymbrenwicum ðeowum monnum
eallum sien forgifen, þam þe him leofost sie to sellanne æghwæt
ðæs ðe him ænig mon for Godes noman geselle oððe hie on ænegum
hiora hwilsticcum geearnian mægen.
 44. Heafodwunde to bote, gif ða ban beoð butu ðyrel, XXX
scillinga geselle him mon.
 44.1. Gif ðæt uterre ban bið þyrel, geselle XV scillinga
to bote.
 45. Gif in feaxe bið wund inces lang, geselle anne scilling to
bote.
 45.1. Gif beforan feaxe bið wund inces lang, twegen scillinga to
bote.
 46. Gif him mon aslea oþer eare of, geselle XXX scillinga to
bote.
 46.1. Gif se hlyst oðstande, þæt he ne mæge gehieran,
geselle LX scillinga to bote.
 47. Gif mon men eage ofaslea, geselle him mon LX scillinga & VI
scillinga & VI pæningas & ðriddan dæl pæninges to bote.
 47.1. Gif hit in ðam heafde sie, & he noht geseon ne mæge
mid, stande ðriddan dæl þære bote inne.
 48. Gif mon oðrum þæt neb ofaslea, gebete him mid LX
scillingum.
 49. Gif mon oðrum ðone toð onforan heafde ofaslea, gebete
þæt mid VIII scillingum.
 49.1. Gif hit sie se wongtoð, geselle III scillinga to bote.
 49.2. Monnes tux bið XV scillinga weorð.
 50. Gif monnes ceacan mon forslihð, þæt hie beoð forode,
gebete mid XV scillingum.
 50.1. Monnes cinban, gif hit bið toclofen, geselle mon XII
scillinga to bote.
 51. Gif monnes ðrotbolla bið þyrel, gebete mid XII
scillingum.
 52. Gif monnes tunge bið of heafde oþres monnes dædum don,
þæt biþ gelic & eagan bot.
 53. Gif mon bið on eaxle wund, þæt þæt liðseaw
utflowe, gebete mid XXX scillingum.
 54. Gif se earm bið forad bufan elmbogan, þær sculon XV
scillinga to bote.
 55. Gif ða earmscancan beoð begen forade, sio bot bið XXX
scillinga.
 56. Gif se ðuma bið ofaslægen, þam sceal XXX scillinga to
bote.
 56.1. Gif se nægl bið ofaslegen, ðam sculon V scillinga to
bote.
 57. Gif se scytefinger bið ofaslegen, sio bot bið XV scillinga;
his nægles bið III scillinga.
 58. Gif se midlesta finger sie ofaslegen, sio bot bið XII
scillinga; & his nægles bot bið II scillinga.
 59. Gif se goldfinger sie ofaslegen, to þam sculon XVII scillinga
to bote; & his nægles IIII scillinga to bote.
 60. Gif se lytla finger bið ofaslegen, ðam sceal to bote VIIII
scillinga, & an scilling his nægles, gif se sie ofaslegen.
 61. Gif mon bið on hrif wund, geselle him mon XXX scillinga to
bote.
 61.1. Gif he ðurhwund bið, æt gehweðerum muðe XX
scillinga.
 62. Gif monnes ðeoh bið þyrel, geselle him mon XXX scillinga
to bote.
 62.1. Gif hit forad sie, sio bot eac bið XXX scillinga.
 63. Gif se sconca bið þyrel beneoðan cneowe, ðær sculon
XII scillinga to bote.
 63.1. Gif he forad sie beneoðan cneowe, geselle him XXX scillinga
to bote.
 64. Gif sio micle ta bið ofaslegen, geselle him XX scillinga to
bote.
 64.1. Gif hit sie sio æfterre ta, XV scillinga to bote geselle
him mon.
 64.2. Gif seo midleste ta sie ofaslegen, þær sculon VIIII
scillinga to bote.
 64.3. Gif hit bið sio feorþe ta, ðær sculon VI scillinga
to bote.
 64.4. Gif sio lytle ta sie ofaslegen, geselle him V scillinga.
 65. Gif mon sie on þa herðan to ðam swiðe wund, þæt he
ne mæge bearn gestrienan, gebete him ðæt mid LXXX scillinga.
 66. Gif men sie se earm mid honda mid ealle ofacorfen beforan
elmbogan, gebete ðæt mid LXXX scillinga.
 66.1. Æghwelcere wunde beforan feaxe & beforan sliefan &
beneoðan cneowe sio bot bið twysceatte mare.
 67. Gif sio lendenbræde bið forslegen, þær sceal LX
scillinga to bote.
 67.1. Gif hio bið onbestungen, geselle XV scillinga to bote.
 67.2. Gif hio bið ðurhðyrel, ðonne sceal ðær XXX
scillinga to bote.
 68. Gif mon bið in eaxle wund, gebete mid LXXX scillinga, gif se
mon cwic sie.
 69. Gif mon oðrum ða hond utan forslea, geselle him XX
scillinga to bote, gif hine mon gelacnian mæge.
 69.1. Gif hio healf onweg fleoge, þonne sceal XL scillinga to
bote.
 70. Gif mon oþrum rib forslea binnan gehaldre hyde, geselle X
scillinga to bote.
 70.1. Gif sio hyd sie tobrocen, & mon ban ofado, geselle XV
scillinga to bote.
 71. Gif monnes eage him mon ofaslea, oððe his hand oððe his
fot, ðær gæð gelic bot to eallum: VI pæningas & VI scillinga
& LX scillinga & ðriddan dæl pæninges.
 72. Gif monnes sconca bið ofaslegen wið ðæt cneou,
ðær sceal LXXX scillinga to bote.
 73. Gif mon oðrum ða sculdru forslea, geselle him mon XX
scillinga to bote.
 74. Gif hie mon inbeslea & mon ban ofado, geselle mon ðæs
to bote XV scillinga.
 75. Gif mon ða greatan sinwe forslea, gif hie mon gelacnian
mæge, þæt hio hal sie, geselle XII scillinga to bote.
 75.1. Gif se mon healt sie for þære sinwe wunde, & hine
mon gelacnian ne mæge, geselle XXX scillinga to bote.
 76. Gif ða smalan sinwe mon forslea, geselle him mon VI scillinga
to bote.
 77. Gif mon oðrum ða geweald forslea uppe on þam sweoran
& forwundie to þam swiðe, þæt he nage þære geweald, &
hwæðre lifie swa gescended, geselle him mon C scillinga to bote, buton him
witan ryhtre & mare gereccan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIne
B14.4.5.
Alfred-Ine (Ine): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 88-122.



 0.1. Ic Ine, mid Godes gife Wesseaxna kyning, mid geðeahte &
mid lare Cenredes mines fæder & Heddes mines biscepes & Eorcenwoldes
mines biscepes, mid eallum minum ealdormonnum & þæm ieldstan witum
minre ðeode & eac micelre gesomnunge Godes ðeowa, wæs smeagende be
ðære hælo urra sawla & be ðam staþole ures rices, þætte
ryht æw & ryhte cynedomas ðurh ure folc gefæstnode & getrymede
wæron, þætte nænig ealdormonna ne us undergeðeodedra æfter
þam wære awendende ðas ure domas.
 1. Ærest we bebeodað, þætte Godes ðeowas hiora
ryhtregol on ryht healdan.
 1.1. Æfter þam we bebeodað, þætte ealles folces æw
& domas ðus sien gehealdene:
 2. Cild binnan ðritegum nihta sie gefulwad; gif hit swa ne sie,
XXX scillinga gebete.
 2.1. Gif hit ðonne sie dead butan fulwihte, gebete he hit mid
eallum ðam ðe he age.
 3. Gif ðeowmon wyrce on Sunnandæg be his hlafordes hæse,
sie he frioh, & se hlaford geselle XXX scillinga to wite.
 3.1. Gif þonne se ðeowa butan his gewitnesse wyrce, þolie his
hyde.
 3.2. Gif ðonne se frigea ðy dæge wyrce butan his hlafordes
hæse, ðolie his freotes.
 4. Ciricsceattas sin agifene be sancte Martines mæssan; gif hwa
ðæt ne gelæste, sie he scyldig LX scillinga be XIIfealdum agife þone
ciricsceat.
 5. Gif hwa sie deaðes scyldig & he cirican geierne, hæbbe
his feorh & bete, swa him ryht wisige.
 5.1. Gif hwa his hyde forwyrce & cirican geierne, sie him sio
swingelle forgifen.
 6. Gif hwa gefeohte on cyninges huse, sie he scyldig ealles his
ierfes, & sie on cyninges dome, hwæðer he lif age þe nage.
 6.1. Gif hwa on mynster gefeohte, CXX scillinga gebete.
 6.2. Gif hwa on ealdormonnes huse gefeohte oððe on oðres
geðungenes witan, LX scillinga gebete he & oþer LX geselle to wite.
 6.3. Gif ðonne on gafolgeldan huse oððe on gebures gefeohte,
CXX scillinga to wite geselle & þam gebure VI scillinga.
 6.4. & þeah hit sie on middum felda gefohten, CXX scillinga
to wite sie agifen.
 6.5. Gif ðonne on gebeorscipe hie geciden, & oðer hiora mid
geðylde hit forbere, geselle se oðer XXX scillinga to wite.
 7. Gif hwa stalie, swa his wif nyte & his bearn, geselle LX
scillinga to wite.
 7.1. Gif he ðonne stalie on gewitnesse ealles his hiredes, gongen
hie ealle on ðeowot.
 7.2. X wintre cniht mæg bion ðiefðe gewita.
 8. Gif hwa him ryhtes bidde beforan hwelcum scirmen oððe
oþrum deman & abiddan ne mæge, & him wedd sellan nelle, gebete XXX
scillinga & binnan VII nihton gedo hine ryhtes wierðne.
 9. Gif hwa wrace do, ærðon he him ryhtes bidde, þæt he
him onnime agife & forgielde & gebete mid XXX scillingum.
 10. Gif hwa binnan þam gemærum ures rices reaflac &
niednæme do, agife he ðone reaflac & geselle LX scillinga to wite.
 11. Gif hwa his agenne geleod bebycgge, ðeowne oððe frigne,
ðeah he scyldig sie, ofer sæ, forgielde hine his were.
 12. Gif ðeof sie gefongen, swelte he deaðe, oððe his lif be
his were man aliese.
 13. Gif hwa beforan biscepe his gewitnesse & his wed aleoge,
gebete mid CXX scillingum.
 13.1. Ðeofas we hatað oð VII men; from VII hloð oð XXXV;
siððan bið here.
 14. Se ðe hloþe betygen sie, geswicne se hine be CXX hida
oððe swa bete.
 15. Se ðe hereteama betygen sie, he hine be his wergilde aliese
oððe be his were geswicne.
 15.1. Se að sceal bion healf be huslgengum.
 15.2. Þeof, siððan he bið on cyninges bende, nah he þa
swicne.
 16. Se ðe ðeof ofslihð, se mot gecyðan mid aðe, þæt
he hine synnigne ofsloge, nalles ða gegildan.
 17. Se ðe forstolen flæsc findeð & gedyrneð, gif he
dear, he mot mid aðe gecyðan, þæt he hit age; se ðe hit ofspyreð,
he ah ðæt meldfeoh.
 18. Cierlisc mon gif he oft betygen wære, gif he æt
siðestan sie gefongen, slea mon hond oððe fot.
 19. Cyninges geneat, gif his wer bið twelfhund scillinga, he mot
swerian for syxtig hida, gif he bið huslgengea.
 20. Gif feorcund mon oððe fremde butan wege geond wudu gonge
& ne hrieme ne horn blawe, for ðeof he bið to profianne: oððe to
sleanne oððe to aliesanne.
 21. Gif mon ðonne þæs ofslægenan weres bidde, he mot
gecyþan, þæt he hine for ðeof ofsloge, nalles þæs ofslegenan
gegildan ne his hlaford.
 21.1. Gif he hit ðonne dierneð, & weorðeð ymb long
yppe, ðonne rymeð he ðam deadan to ðam aðe, þæt hine moton his
mægas unsyngian.
 22. Gif ðin geneat stalie & losie ðe, gif ðu hæbbe
byrgean, mana þone þæs angyldes; gif he næbbe, gyld ðu þæt
angylde, & ne sie him no ðy ðingodre.
 23. Gif mon elðeodigne ofslea, se cyning ah twædne dæl
weres, þriddan dæl sunu oððe mægas.
 23.1. Gif he ðonne mægleas sie, healf kyninge, healf se
gesið.
 23.2. Gif hit ðonne abbod sie oððe abbodesse, dælen on
þa ilcan wisan wið þone kyning.
 23.3. Wealh gafolgelda CXX scillinga his sunu C, ðeowne LX,
somhwelcne fiftegum; Weales hyd twelfum.
 24. Gif witeðeow Engliscmon hine forstalie, ho hine mon & ne
gylde his hlaforde.
 24.1. Gif hine mon ofslea, ne gylde hine mon his mægum, gif hie
hine on XII monðum ne aliesden.
 24.2. Wealh, gif he hafað V hida, he bið syxhynde.
 25. Gif ciepemon uppe on folce ceapie, do þæt beforan
gewitnessum.
 25.1. Gif ðiefefioh mon æt ciepan befo, & he hit næbbe
beforan godum weotum geceapod, gecyðe hit be wite, þæt he ne gewita ne
gestala nære, oððe gielde to wite VI & XXX scillinga.
 26. To fundes cildes fostre, ðy forman geare geselle VI
scillinga, ðy æfterran XII, ðy ðriddan XXX, siððan be his wlite.
 27. Se ðe dearnenga bearn gestrieneð & gehileð, nah se
his deaðes wer, ac his hlaford & se cyning.
 28. Se ðeof gefehð, ah X scillinga, & se cyning ðone
ðeof; & þa mægas him swerian aðas unfæhða.
 28.1. Gif he ðonne oðierne & orige weorðe, þonne bið
he wites scyldig.
 28.2. Gif he onsacan wille, do he ðæt be ðam feo & be
ðam wite.
 29. Gif mon sweordes onlæne oðres esne, & he losie, gielde
he hine ðriddan dæle; gif mon spere selle, healfne; gif he horses
onlæne, ealne he hine gylde.
 30. Gif mon cierliscne monnan fliemanfeorme teo, be his agnum were
geladige he hine; gif he ne mæge, gielde hine his agne were; & se
gesiðmon swa be his were.
 31. Gif mon wif gebyccge, & sio gyft forð ne cume, agife
þæt feoh & forgielde & gebete þam byrgean, swa his borgbryce
sie.
 32. Gif Wilisc mon hæbbe hide londes, his wer bið CXX
scillinga; gif he þonne healfes hæbbe, LXXX scillinga; gif he nænig
hæbbe, LX scillinga.
 33. Cyninges horswealh, se ðe him mæge geærendian, ðæs
wergield bið CC scillinga.
 34. Se ðe on ðære fore wære, þæt mon monnan ofsloge,
getriewe hine ðæs sleges & ða fore gebete be ðæs ofslegenan
wergielde: Gif his wergield sie CC scillinga, gebete mid L scillingum, &
ðy ilcan ryhte do man be ðam deorborenran.
 35. Se ðe ðeof slihð, he mot aðe gecyðan, þæt he
hine fleondne for ðeof sloge, & þæs deadan mægas him swerian
unceases að.
 35. Gif he hit þonne dierne, & sie eft yppe, þonne
forgielde he hine.
 35.1. Gif mon to þam men feoh geteme, ðe his ær oðswaren
hæfde & eft oðswerian wille, oðswerige be ðam wite & be
ðæs feos weorðe; gif he oðswerian nylle, gebete þone mænan að
twybote.
 36. Se ðe ðeof gefehð, oððe him mon gefongenne agifð,
& he hine þonne alæte, oððe þa ðiefðe gedierne, forgielde
þone þeof his were.
 36.1. Gif he ealdormon sie, ðolie his scire, buton him kyning
arian wille.
 37. Se cirlisca mon, se ðe oft betygen wære ðiefðe, &
þonne æt siðestan synnigne gefo in ceape oððe elles æt openre
scylde , slea him mon hond of oððe fot.
 38. Gif ceorl & his wif bearn hæbben gemæne, & fere
se ceorl forð, hæbbe sio modor hire bearn & fede: agife hire mon VI
scillinga to fostre, cu on sumera, oxan on wintra; healden þa mægas þone
frumstol, oð ðæt hit gewintred sie.
 39. Gif hwa fare unaliefed fram his hlaforde oððe on oðre
scire hine bestele, & hine mon geahsige, fare þær he ær wæs
& geselle his hlaforde LX scillinga.
 40. Ceorles worðig sceal beon wintres & sumeres betyned; gif
he bið untyneð, & recð his neahgebures ceap in on his agen geat, nah
he æt þam ceape nan wuht: adrife hine ut & ðolie æfwerdlan.
 41. Borges mon mot oðsacan, gif he wat, þæt he ryht deð.
 42. Gif ceorlas gærstun hæbben gemænne oððe oþer
gedalland to tynanne, & hæbben sume getyned hiora dæl, sume
næbben, & etten hiora gemænan æceras oððe gærs, gan þa
þonne, þe ðæt geat agan, & gebete þam oðrum þe hiora dæl
getynedne hæbben, þone æwerdlan þe ðær gedon sie.
 42. Abidden him æt þam ceape swylc ryht swylce hit kyn sie.
 42.1. Gif þonne hryðera hwelc sie þe hegas brece & ga in
gehwær, & se hit nolde gehealdan, se hit age oððe ne mæge, nime
se hit on his æcere mete & ofslea; & nime se agenfrigea his fel
& flæsc & þolie þæs oðres.
 43. Ðonne mon beam on wuda forbærne, & weorðe yppe on
þone ðe hit dyde, gielde he fulwite: geselle LX scillinga; forþamþe fyr
bið þeof.
 43.1. Gif mon afelle on wuda wel monega treowa, & wyrð eft
undierne, forgielde III treowu ælc mid XXX scillingum; ne ðearf he hiora
ma geldan, wære hiora swa fela swa hiora wære: forþon sio æsc bið
melda, nalles ðeof.
 44. Gif mon þonne aceorfe an treow, þæt mæge XXX swina
undergestandan, & wyrð undierne, geselle LX scillinga.
 44.1. Gafolhwitel sceal bion æt hiwisce VI pæninga weorð.
 45. Burgbryce mon sceal betan CXX scillinga kyninges &
biscepes, þær his rice bið; ealdormonnes LXXX scillinga; cyninges
ðegnes LX scillinga; gesiðcundes monnes landhæbbendes XXXV; & bi
ðon ansacan.
 46. Ðonne mon monnan betyhð, þæt he ceap forstele oððe
forstolenne gefeormie, þonne sceal he be LX hida onsacan þære
þiefðe, gif he aðwyrðe bið.
 46.1. Gif ðonne Englisc onstal ga forð, onsace þonne be
twyfealdum; gif hit ðonne bið Wilisc onstal, ne bið se að na ðy
mara.
 46.2. Ælc mon mot onsacan frymþe & werfæhðe, gif he
mæg oððe dear.
 47. Gif mon forstolenne ceap befehð, ne mot hine mon tieman to
ðeowum men.
 48. Gif hwelc mon bið witeðeow niwan geðeowad, & hine mon
betyhð, þæt he hæbbe ær geðiefed, ær hine mon geðeowode,
þonne ah se teond ane swingellan æt him: bedrife hine to swingum be his
ceape.
 49. Gif mon on his mæstenne unaliefed swin gemete, genime
þonne VI scillinga weorð wed.
 49.1. Gif hie þonne þær næren oftor þonne æne,
geselle scilling se agenfrigea & gecyðe, þæt hie þær oftor ne
comen, be þæs ceapes weorðe.
 49.2. Gif hi ðær tuwa wæren, geselle twegen scillinga.
 49.3. Gif mon nime æfesne on swynum: æt þryfingrum þæt
ðridde, æt twyfingrum þæt feorðe, æt þymelum þæt fifte.
 50. Gif gesiðcund mon þingað wið cyning oððe wið
kyninges ealdormonnan for his inhiwan oððe wið his hlaford for ðeowe
oððe for frige, nah he þær nane witerædenne, se gesið, forðon
he him nolde ær yfles gestieran æt ham.
 51. Gif gesiðcund mon landagende forsitte fierd, geselle CXX
scillinga & ðolie his landes; unlandagende LX scillinga; cierlisc XXX
scillinga to fierdwite.
 52. Se ðe diernum geðingum betygen sie, geswicne hine be CXX
hida þara geðingea oððe CXX scillinga geselle.
 53. Gif mon forstolenne man befo æt oþrum, & sie sio hand
oðcwolen, sio hine sealde þam men þe hine mon ætbefeng, tieme þonne
þone mon to þæs deadan byrgelse, swa oðer fioh swa hit sie, &
cyðe on þam aðe be LX hida, þæt sio deade hond hine him sealde.
 53. Þonne hæfð he þæt wite afylled mid þy aðe,
agife þam agendfrio þone monnan.
 53.1. Gif he þonne wite, hwa ðæs deadan ierfe hæbbe,
tieme þonne to þam ierfe & bidde ða hond þe þæt ierfe hafað,
þæt he him gedo þone ceap unbeceasne oþþe gecyðe, þæt se
deada næfre þæt ierfe ahte.
 54. Se þe bið werfæhðe betogen & he onsacan wille
þæs sleges mid aðe, þonne sceal bion on þære hyndenne an
kyningæde be XXX hida, swa be gesiðcundum men swa be cierliscum, swa
hwæþer swa hit sie.
 54.1. Gif hine mon gilt, þonne mot he gesellan on þara hyndenna
gehwelcere monnan & byrnan & sweord on þæt wergild, gif he
ðyrfe.
 54.2. Witeðeowne monnan Wyliscne mon sceal bedrifan be XII hidum
swa ðeowne to swingum, Engliscne be feower & XXX hida.
 55. Ewo bið mid hire giunge sceape scilling weorð oþþæt
XII niht ofer eastran.
 56. Gif mon hwelcne ceap gebygð & he ðonne onfinde him
hwelc unhælo on binnan XXX nihta, þonne weorpe þone ceap to honda;
oððe swerie, þæt he him nan facn on nyste, þa he hine him sealde.
 57. Gif ceorl ceap forstilð & bireð into his ærne, &
befehð þærinne mon, þonne bið se his dæl synnig butan þam wife
anum, forðon hio sceal hire ealdore hieran: gif hio dear mid aðe gecyðan,
þæt hio þæs forstolenan ne onbite, nime hire ðriddan sceat.
 58. Oxan horn bið X pæninga weorð.
 59. Cuuhorn bið twegea pæninga; oxan tægl bið scillinga
weorð, cus bið fifa; oxan eage bið V pæninga weorð, cus bið
scilling weorþ.
 59.1. Mon sceal simle to beregafole agifan æt anum wyrhtan VI
wæga.
 60. Se ceorl se ðe hæfð oðres geoht ahyrod, gif he
hæbbe ealle on foðre to agifanne, gesceawige mon, agife ealle; gif he
næbbe, agife healf on fodre, healfe on oþrum ceape.
 61. Ciricsceat mon sceal agifan to þam healme & to þam
heorðe, þe se mon on bið to middum wintra.
 62. Þonne mon bið tyhtlan betygen, & hine mon bedrifeð to
ceape, nah þonne self nane wiht to gesellanne beforan ceape.
 62. Þonne gæð oðer mon, seleð his ceap fore, swa he
þonne geþingian mæge, on ða rædenne, þe he him ga to honda, oð
ðæt he his ceap him geinnian mæge.
 62. Þonne betyhð hine mon eft oþre siðe & bedrifð to
ceape.
 62. Gif hine forð nele forstandan se ðe him ær ceap
foresealde, & he hine þonne forfehð, þolige þonne his ceapes se,
ðe he him ær foresealde.
 63. Gif gesiðcund mon fare, þonne mot he habban his gerefan mid
him & his smið & his cildfestran.
 64. Se ðe hæfð XX hida, se sceal tæcnan XII hida gesettes
landes, þonne he faran wille.
 65. Se ðe hæfð X hida, se sceal tæcnan VI hida gesettes
landes.
 66. Se ðe hæbbe þreora hida, tæcne oþres healfes.
 67. Gif mon geþingað gyrde landes oþþe mare to
rædegafole & geereð, gif se hlaford him wile þæt land aræran
to weorce & to gafole, ne þearf he him onfon, gif he him nan botl ne
selð, & þolie þara æcra.
 68. Gif mon gesiðcundne monnan adrife, fordrife þy botle,
næs þære setene.
 69. Sceap sceal gongan mid his fliese oð midne sumor; oððe
gilde þæt flies mid twam pæningum.
 70. Æt twyhyndum were mon sceal sellan to monbote XXX scillinga,
æt VI hyndum LXXX scillinga, æt XII hyndum CXX scillingum.
 70.1. Æt X hidum to fostre X fata hunies, CCC hlafa, XII ambra
Wilisc ealað, XXX hluttres, tu eald hriðeru oððe X weðeras, X gees,
XX henna, X cesas, amber fulne buteran, V leaxas, XX pundwæga foðres &
hundteontig æla.
 71. Gif mon sie wertyhtlan betogen & he hit þonne geondette
beforan aðe & onsace ær, bide mon mid þære witerædenne, oð
ðæt se wer gegolden sie.
 72. Gif mon wergildðeof gefehð, & he losige ðy dæge
þam monnum ðe hine gefoð, þeah hine mon gefo ymb niht, nah him mon mare
æt ðonne fulwite.
 73. Gif hit bið niht eald þiefð, gebeten þa þone gylt
þe hine gefengon, swa hie geþingian mægen wið cyning & his
gerefan.
 74. Gif ðeowwealh Engliscne monnan ofslihð, þonne sceal se
ðe hine ah weorpan hine to honda hlaforde & mægum oððe LX
scillinga gesellan wið his feore.
 74.1. Gif he þonne þone ceap nelle foregesellan, þonne mot
hine se hlaford gefreogean; gielden siððan his mægas þone wer, gif he
mægburg hæbbe freo; gif he næbbe, heden his þa gefan.
 74.2. Ne þearf se frige mid þam þeowan mæg gieldan, buton
he him wille fæhðe of aceapian, ne se þeowa mid þy frigean.
 75. Gif mon ceap befehþ forstolenne, & sio hond tiemð
þonne, sio hine mon ætbefehþ, to oþrum men, gif se mon hine þonne
onfon ne wille & sægþ, þæt he him næfre þæt ne sealde, ac
sealde oþer, þonne mot se gecyðan, se ðe hit tiemþ to þære
honda, þæt he him nan oðer ne sealde buton þæt ilce.
 76. Gif hwa oðres godsunu slea oððe his godfæder, sie sio
mægbot & sio manbot gelic; weaxe sio bot be ðam were, swa ilce swa sio
manbot deð þe þam hlaforde sceal.
 76.1. Gif hit þonne kyninges godsunu sie, bete be his were þam
cyninge swa ilce swa þære mægþe.
 76.2. Gif he þonne on þone geonbyrde þe hine slog, þonne
ætfealle sio bot þæm godfæder, swa ilce swa þæt wite þam
hlaforde deð.
 76.3. Gif hit biscepsunu sie, sie be healfum þam.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawAGu
B14.5.
Alfred and Guthrum: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 126-8.



 1. Ðis is ðæt frið, ðæt ælfred cyninc &
Gyðrum cyning & ealles Angelcynnes witan & eal seo ðeod ðe on
Eastænglum beoð ealle gecweden habbað & mid aðum gefeostnod for hy
sylfe & for heora gingran, ge for geborene ge for ungeborene, ðe Godes
miltse recce oððe ure.
 1. Ærest ymb ure landgemæra: up on Temese, & ðonne up
on Ligan, & andlang Ligan oð hire æwylm, ðonne on gerihte to
Bedanforda, ðonne up on Usan oð Wætlingastræt.
 2. Ðæt is ðonne, gif man ofslægen weorðe, ealle we
lætað efen dyrne Engliscne & Deniscne, to VIII healfmearcum asodenes
goldes, buton ðam ceorle ðe on gafollande sit & heora liesengum, ða
syndan eac efen dyre: ægðer to CC scillinga.
 3. & gif man cyninges ðegn beteo manslihtes, gif he hine
ladian dyrre, do he þæt mid XII cininges ðegnum.
 3. Gif ma ðone man betyhð, ðe bið læssa maga ðone se
cyninges ðegn, ladige he hine mid XI his gelicena & mid anum cyninges
ðægne & swa ægehwilcre spræce ðe mare sy ðone IIII
mancussas.
 3. & gyf he ne dyrre, gylde hit ðrygylde, swa hit man
gewyrðe.
 4. & þæt ælc man wite his getyman be mannum & be
horsum & be oxum.
 5. & ealle we cwædon on ða dæge ðe mon ða aðas
swor, þæt ne ðeowe ne freo ne moton in ðone here faran butan leafe, ne
heora nan ðe ma to us.
 5. Gif ðonne gebyrige, þæt for neode heora hwylc wið ure
bige habban wille oððe we wið heora mid yrfe & mid æhtum, ðæt
is to ðafianne on ða wisan, þæt man gislas sylle friðe to wedde
& to swutulunge, þæt man wite, ðæt man clæne bæc hæbbe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawEGuProl
B14.6.1.
Edward and Guthrum (Prologue): Liebermann 1903-16, I, 128.



 1. Þis syndon þa domas ðe Ælfred cyncg & Guþrum
cyncg gecuron.
 1. And þis is seo gerædnis eac, þe ælfred cyng &
Guðrum cyng & eft Eadward cyng & Guðrum cyng gecuran &
gecwædon, þa þa Engle & Dene to friþe & to freondscipe fullice
fengon; & þa witan eac, þe syððan wæron, oft & unseldan
þæt seolfe geniwodon & mid gode gehihtan.
 1. Ðis ærest, þæt hig gecwædon, þæt hi ænne
God lufian woldon & ælcne hæþendom georne aworpen.
 2. & hig gesetton woruldlice steora eac, for ðam þingum
þe hig wistan, þæt hig elles ne mihton manegum gesteoran, ne fela manna
nolde to godcundre bote elles gebugan, swa hy sceolde; & þa woruldbote
hig gesetton gemæne Criste & cynge, swa hwar swa man nolde godcunde bote
gebugan mid rihte to bisceopa dihte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawEGu
B14.6.2.
Edward and Guthrum: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 128-34.



 1. & þæt is þonon ærest, þæt hig gecwædon,
þæt cyricgrið binnan wagum & cyninges handgrið stande efne
unwemme.
 2. & gif hwa Cristendom wyrde oððe hæþendom weorþige
wordes oððe weorces, gylde swa wer swa wite swa lahslitte, be þam þe
syo dæde sy.
 3. & gyf gehadod man gestalie oððe gefehte oððe
forswerige oððe forlicge, gebete þæt be þam þe seo dæde sy, swa
be were swa be wite swa be lahslitte, & for Gode huru bete, swa canon
tæce, & þæs borh finde oððe carcern gebuge.
 3.1. & gif mæssepreost folc miswyssige æt freolse
oððe æt fæstene, gylde XXX scillinga mid Englum & mid Denum
þreo healfmare.
 3.2. Gif preost to rihtandagan crisman ne fecce, oððe fulluhtes
forwyrne þam þe þæs þearf sy, gylde wite mid Englum & mid Denum
lahslit, þæt is twelf oran.
 4. & æt syblegerum þa witan geræddan, þæt cyng ah
þone uferan & bisceop þone nyþeran, butan hit man gebete for Gode
& for worulde, be þam þe seo dæde sy, swa bisceop getæce.
 4.1. Gif twegen gebroðra oððe twegen genyhe magas wið an
wif forlicgan, beten swyþe georne, swa swa man geþafige, swa be wite swa be
lahslitte, be þam þe seo dæde sy.
 4.2. Gif gehadod man hine forwyrce mid deaþscylde, gewilde hine
man & healde to bisceopes dome.
 5. & gif deaþscyldig man scriftspræce gyrne, ne him man
næfre ne wyrne.
 5.1. & ealle Godes gerihto forðige man georne be Godes mildse
& be þam witan þe witan toledan.
 6. Gif hwa teoþunge forhealde, gylde lahslit mid Denum, wite mid
Englum.
 6.1. Gif hwa Romfeoh forhealde, gylde lahslit mid Denum, wite mid
Englum.
 6.2. Gif hwa leohtgesceot ne gelæste, gylde lahslit mid Denum,
wite mid Englum.
 6.3. Gif hwa sulhælmyssan ne sylle, gylde lahslit mid Denum,
wite mid Englum.
 6.4. Gif hwa ænigra godcundra gerihto forwyrne, gylde lahslit
mid Denum, wite mid Englum.
 6.5. & gif he wigie & man gewundie, beo his weres scyldig.
 6.6. Gif he man to deaþe gefylle, beo he þonne utlah, & his
hente mid hearme ælc þara þe riht wille.
 6.7. & gif he gewyrce, þæt hine man afylle, þurh
þæt hine man gean Godes ryht oððe þæs cynges geonbyrde, gif man
þæt gesoðige, licge ægylde.
 7. Sunnandæges cypinge gif hwa agynne, þolie þæs ceapes
& twelf orena mid Denum & XXX scillinga mid Englum.
 7.1. Gif frigman freolsdæge wyrce, þolie his freotes oððe
gylde wite, lahslite.
 7.1. Ðeowman þolie his hyde oððe hydgyldes.
 7.2. Gif hlaford his þeowan freolsdæge nyde to weorce, gylde
lahslitte inne on Deone lage & wite mid Englum.
 8. Gif frigman rihtfæsten abrece, gylde wite oððe lahslite.
 8. Gif hit þeowman gedo, ðolie his hyde oððe hydgyldes.
 9. Ordel & aðas syndan tocwedene freolsdagum &
rihtfæstendagum; & se ðe þæt abrece, gylde lahslit mid Denum,
wite mid Englum.
 9.1. Gif man wealdan mage, ne dyde man næfre on Sunnandæges
freolse ænigne forwyrhtne, ac wylde & healde, þæt se freolsdæg
agan sy.
 10. Gif limlæweo lama, þe forworht wære, weorþe
forlæten, & he æfter þam ðreo niht alibbe, siððan man mot
hylpan be bisceopes leafe, se ðe wylle beorgan sare & saule.
 11. Gif wiccan oððe wigleras, mansworan oððe morðwyrhtan
oððe fule, afylede, æbære horcwenan ahwar on lande wurðan agytene,
ðonne fyse hi man of earde & clænsie þa ðeode, oððe on earde
forfare hy mid ealle, buton hig geswican & þe deoppor gebetan.
 12. Gif man gehadodne oððe ælðeodigne þurh enig ðing
forræde æt feo oððe æt feore, þonne sceal him cyng beon
oððan eorl ðær on lande & bisceop ðere þeode for mæg &
for mundboran, buton he elles oðerne hæbbe; & bete man georne be ðam
þe seo dæde sy Christe & cyninge, swa hit gebyrige; oððe þa
dæde wrece swiðe deope þe cyning sy on ðeode.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIEw
B14.7.1.
I Edward: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 138-40.



 0.1. Eadwerdes gerænesse.
 0.2. Eadwerd cyning byt ðam gerefum eallum, ðæt ge deman swa
rihte domas swa ge rihtoste cunnon, & hit on ðære dombec stande.
 0.2. Ne wandiað for nanum ðingum folcriht to geregceanne; &
ðæt gehwilc spræce habbe andagan, hwænne heo gelæst sy, þæt
ge ðonne gereccan.
 1. & ic wille, ðæt gehwilc man hæbbe his geteaman;
& nan man ne ceapige butan porte, ac hæbbe þæs portgerefan
gewitnesse oððe oþera ungeligenra manna, ðe man gelyfan mæge.
 1.1. & gif hwa butan porte ceapige, ðonne sy he cyninges
oferhyrnesse scyldig; & gange se team þeah forð, oð þæt man
wite, hwær he oðstande.
 1.2. Eac we cwædon: se ðe tyman scolde, þæt he hæfde
ungeligene gewitnesse ðæs ðæt he hit on riht tymde, oððe þone
að funde, ðe se gelyfan mihte ðe onsprece.
 1.3. Swa we cwædon be þære agnunge ðæt ylce, þæt
he gelædde ungeligene gewitnesse ðæs, oððe ðone aþ funde, gif
he mæhte, ungecorenne, ðe se onspeca on gehealden wære.
 1.4. Gif he ðonne ne mehte, ðonne namede him man VI men on
ðam ylcan geburhscipe, þe he on hamfæst wære, & begete þara
syxa ænne æt anum hryðere, oððe æt þam orfe þe ðæs
weorð sy; & syððan wexe be ðæs ceapes æhte, gif þær ma
to scyle.
 1.5. Eac we cwædon: gif enig yfelra manna wære ðe wolde
oðres yrfe to borge settan for wiðertihtlan, ðæt he gecyþe ðonne
mid aðe, ðæt he hit for nanum facne ne dyde, ac mid fulryhte butan brede
& bigswice; & se dyde þonne swa ðer he dorste, ðe hit man
ætfenge: swa he hit agnode swa he hit tymde.
 2. Eac we cwædon, hwæs se wyrðe wære þe oðrum ryhtes
wyrnde aðor oððe on boclande oððe on folclande; & ðæt he him
geandagode of þam folclande, hwonne he him riht worhte beforan ðam
gerefan.
 2.1. Gif he ðonne nan riht næfde ne on boclande ne on
folclande, þæt se wære þe rihtes wyrnde scyldig XXX scillinga wið
þone cyning, & æt oðrum cyrre eac swa, æt ðriddan cyrre
cyninges oferhyrnesse, ðæt is CXX scillinga, buton he ær geswice.
 3. Eac we cwædon be þam mannum ðe mansworan wæran, gif
ðæt geswutelod wære, oððe him að burste oððe ofercyðed
wære, þæt hy siððan aðwyrðe næran, ac ordales wyrðe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIIEw
B14.7.2.
II Edward: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 140-44.



 1. Eadweard cyning myngode his wytan, þa hy æt Exanceastre
wæron, þæt hy smeadon ealle, hu heora frið betere beon mæhte,
þonne hit ær ðam wæs; forðam him þuhte, þæt hit mæctor
gelæst wære, þonne hit scolde, þæt he ær beboden hæfde.
 1.1. He agsode hy þa, hwa to ðære bote cyrran wolde & on
ðære geferræddenne beon ðe he wære, & þæt lufian ðæt
he lufode, & ðæt ascunian ðæt he ascunode, ægðer ge on sæ
ge on lande.
 1.2. Ðæt is ðonne, ðæt nan man oðrum ryhtes ne
wyrne.
 1.3. Gif hit hwa do, bete swa hit beforan awriten is: æt forman
cyrre XXX scillinga & æt oðran cyrre ealswa & æt þriddan mid
CXX scillingum ðam cyninge.
 2. & gif hit se gerefa ne amanige mid rihte on ðara manna
gewitnesse, ðe him to gewitnesse getealde syndon, þonne bete mine
oferhyrnesse mid CXX scillingum.
 3. Gif hwa ðifþe betogen sy, þonne niman hine on borh ða
þe hine hlaforde befæston, þæt he hine þæs getrywsige; oððe
oþere frynd, gif he hæbbe, don þæt sylfe.
 3.1. Gif he nyte, hwa hine on borh nime, þonne niman þa ðe
hit togebyreð on his æhtan inborh.
 3.2. Gif he naðor næbbe ne æhta ne oðerne borh, ðonne
healde hine man to dome.
 4. Eac ic wylle, þæt ælc man hæbbe symle þa men
gearowe on his lande, ðe læden ða men ðe heora agen secan willen,
& hy for nanum medsceattum ne werian, ne ful nawar friðian ne feormian
willes ne gewealdes.
 5. Gif hwa ðis oferhebbe & his að & his wæd brece,
ðe eal ðeod geseald hæfð, bete swa domboc tæce.
 5.1. Gif he ðonne nelle, ðolige ure ealra freonscipes &
ealles ðæs ðe he age.
 5.2. Gif hine hwa feormige syððan, bete swa seo domboc
sæcge, & se scyle ðe flyman feormige, gif hit sy herinne; gif hit sy
east inne, gif hit sy norð inne, bete be ðam þe þa friðgehwritu
sæcgan:
 6. Gif hwa þurh stæltihtlan freot forwyrce & his hand on
hand sylle, & hine his magas forlætan, & he nyte, hwa him forebete,
ðonne sy he ðæs ðeowweorces wyrðe, ðe ðærto gebyrige; &
oðfealle se wer ðam magum.
 7. Ne underfo nan man oðres mannes man butan þæs leafe ðe
he ær fyligde, & hær he syl laðleas wið ælce hand.
 7. Gif hit hwa do, bete mine oferhyrnesse.
 8. Ic wille, þæt ælc gerefa hæbbe gemot a ymbe feower
wucan; & gedon, ðæt ælc man sy folcrihtes wyrðe, & ðæt
ælc spræc hæbbe ende & andagan, hwænne hit forðcume.
 8. Gif hit hwa oferhebbe, bete swa we ær cwædon.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIAs
B14.8.
I Æthelstan: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 146-8.



 1.0. Æðelstanes cinyncges gerædnes.
 1.1. Æðelstan cyningc, mid geþeahte Wulfhelm arcebiscop
& eac minra oðera biscopa, cyð ðam gerefan to hwilcere birig &
eow bidde on Godes naman & on eallum his haligra & eac be minum
freondscipe.
 1.1. Þæt ge ærest of minum agenum gode agifan ða
teoðunga, ægðer ge on cwicum ceape ge on ðæs geares
eorðwæstmum, swa man rihtost mage oððe gemetan oððe getellan
oððe awegan.
 1.1. & þa biscopas þonne þæt ilce don on heora agenum
gode, & mine ealdormen & mine gerefan þæt silfe.
 1.1. & ic wille, þæt biscopas & þa gerefan hit
beodan eallum þam þe him hiran sculon, þæt hit to ðam rihtan andagan
gelæst sy.
 1.2. Uton geþencan, hu Iacob cwæð se heahfæder: <foreign>Decimas
et hostias pacificas offeram tibi</foreign>; and hu Moyses cwæð on Godes lage:
<foreign>Decimas et orimitias non tardabis offerre Domino</foreign>.
 1.3. Us is to ðencanne, hu ondrislic hit on bocum gecweden is:
Gif we þa teoðunga Gode gelæstan nellað, þæt he us benimað
þara nigon dæla, þonne we læst wenað, & eac we habbað þa
synne to eacan.
 1.4. & ic wille eac, þæt mine gerefan gedon, þæt man
agife þa ciricsceattas & þa sawlsceattas to ðam stowum þe hit mid
rihte togebirige & sulhælmessan on geare, on ða gerad þæt þa
his brucan æt ðam haligum stowum, þe heora cirican began willað &
to Gode & to me geearnian willað.
 1.4. Se þe þonne nelle, þolige þare are oððe eft to
rihte gecirre.
 1.5. Nu ge gehirað, cwæð se cyngc, hwæs ic Gode ann,
& hwæt ge gelæstan sculon be mynre oferhyrnesse.
 1.5. & gedoð eac, þæt ge me geunnon mines agenes, þe
ge me mid rihte gestrinan magon.
 1.5. Nelle ic, þæt ge me mid unrihte ahwar aht gestrynan; ac
ic wille eowres geunnan eow rihtlice, on þa gerad þe ge me geunnan mines;
& beorgað ægðer ge eow ge þam þe ge mingian sculon wið Godes
irre & wið mine oferhirnesse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawAsAlm
B14.8.1.
Æthelstan Almsgiving: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 148.



 1.1. Ic Æþelstane cyning eallum minum gerefum binnon mine rice
gecyþe, mid geþeahte Wulfhelmes mines ærcebisceopes 7 ealra mina oþra
bisceopa 7 Godes ðeowa,a for mina sinna forgyfenesse, þæt ic wille,
þæt ge fedaþ ealle wæga an earm Engliscmon, gif ge him habbaþ,
oþþe oþerne gefindaþ.
 1.1. Fram twam minra feorma agyfe mon hine elce monaþ ane ambra
meles 7 an sconc spices oþþe an ram weorþe IIII peningas 7 scrud for
twelf monþa ælc gear.
 1.1. 7 þæt ge alysaþ an witeðeowne.
 1.1. 7 ðæs ealle sie gedon for Drihtenesse mildheortnesse 7
mine lufu under þæs bisceopes gewitnesse, on ðæs rice it sie.
 1.2. 7 gif se gereafa ðis oferheald, gebete XXX scill.
 1.2. 7 sie þæt feoh gedæled ðæm ðearfum ðe on ða
tun synd, ðe ðis ungefremed wunie, on ðæs bisceopes gewitnesse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

LawIIAs
B14.9.
II Æthelstan: Liebermann 1903-16, I, 150-64.



 0.1. Æþelstanes gerænesse.
 1. Ærest þæt mon ne sparige nænne þeof þe æt
hæbbendre honda gefongen sy, ofer XII winter & ofer eahta peningas.
 1.1. & gif hit hwa do, forgylde ðone þeof be his were &
ne beo þam þeofe no ðe geþingodre oþþe hine be þam geladie.
 1.2. Gif he hine þonne werian wille oððe oðfleo, ðonne ne
sparige hine mon.
 1.3. Gif mon ðeof on carcerne gebringe, ðæt he beo XL nihta
on carcerne, & hine mon ðonne lyse ut mid CXX scillingum; & ga sio
mægþ him on borh, ðæt he æfre geswice.
 1.4. & gif he ofer ðæt stalige, forgildon hy hine be his
were oþþe hine eft ðær inne gebringan.
 1.5. & gif hine hwa forstonde, forgilde hine be his were, swa
þam cyninge swa ðam ðe hit mid ryhte togebyrige; & ælc man ðara
ðe þær midstande gesylle ðam cyninge CXX scillinga to wite.
 2. Ond we cwædon be þam hlafordleasan mannum, ðe mon nan
ryht ætbegytan ne mæg, þæt mon beode ðære mægþe, ðæt
hi hine to folcryhte gehamette & him hlaford finden on folcgemote.
 2.1. & gif hi hine ðonne begytan nyllen oððe ne mægen
to þam andagan, ðonne beo he syþþan flyma, & hine lecge for ðeof
se þe him tocume.
 2.2. & se ðe hine ofer ðæt feormige, forgylde hine be
his were oþþe he hine be ðam ladige.
 3. Be ryhtes wærnunge.
 3. Se hlaford se ryhtes wyrne ond for his yfelan mon licge: &
mon/ ðone cing foresece, forgilde þæt ceapgild & gesylle þam
cynge CXX scillinga.
