gebicge oþþe gebidde.
 24. Of þære oþre healfre hide æt twam Holaforda, <foreign>II</foreign>
circsceattas & eall þæ geylcan gerihta þe ma deð of Cedon.
 25. Ðises ys gewitnes, Gisa bisceop & ælfsie abbod &
Wulgeat abbod & ælfnod mynsterprauost & Wulfwerd wita & Godwine
Eadwies sunu & ælmer þæs abbodes broþor & ælgelric æt
Healswege & Heardinc Eadnoðes sunu & Garmund & ælfric tigel
& Ordgar se wite & ælfwerd Leofsunes sunu & Brichtric se calewa
& Dodda æt Curi & ælmer werl & Sæwold æt Iliacum &
Wulfric æt Pauleshele & Ealdred æt Sulfhere & Wulger æt Hiwerc
& æilwine wunge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch Lambourn (RobAppI 5)
B15.5.39.
Record of the Dues Rendered to the Church of Lambourn: Robertson 1956, App. I, no. 5.



 1. Þis syndan þa gerichte þe liccaþ into þam minstre on
Lambourne.
 2. Þæt is an hyde landes sker & sacleas sake & soken
tol & team & þanne teoþeu æker on þæs kynges lande &
tuwegen scriftækeres on hærfeste & þat teoþe lamb & þat
teoþe fearh & on Michaeles meassan ane wæge cyses an on Martines
meassan twegeu sester corues & au swyn & on Eastrian <foreign>XV</foreign> panigas to
elefen & þas preostes tyn eoxene & twa ky mid þæs kinges &
his gielde hryþere mid þære hæman & þæs preostes scyp forþ
æfter þas kynges ealre next swa þæt heo ne mængen togædre &
feowerti swyne æuer freo on wude and on feolde and ælce dæge on hors
berinde odðe twegen men of þæes kynges wude to dæes preostes fyre and
þæs preostes twa horis mid þær gerefan.
 13. & of ælcere hide geneatlandes on vp hæme toune and on
byrihæme tune oenne æker to teoþunge odðe an hundred sceafa on
hærueste and ælc geneat ænne sester cornes to syricsceatte and bunan
Cobbaudoune twelf pænigas æt ælcere hida on Martines meassan to
cyricsceatte and ælc gebur æt Eastbury aune sester cornes to cyricsceatte
& of þan þegenlande upe tun twegen ækeres to teoþunge & twegen
sester cornes to cyricsceatte & on Bokhamtoune R twegen akeres to
teoþunge & twegen sester cornes to cyricsceatte & of Eadwardes twegen
akeres to teoþunge & of Eastbury twegen akeres to teoþunge &
ænne cyricsceat.
 23. Se þe þis benime þan minstre æt Lambourne & þan
preoste Cristes cours habbe he & Sancta Maria & Sancte Michaeles &
Sanctus Petrus & Sanctus Nicholaus & ealra Cristes halgena.
 26. Þis is bitealð be þæs kinges hase innan þare scire
& innan þan hundred on Lambourne.
 28. Þars to is gewitnesse.


END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1482 (HarmD 2)
B15.6.1.
Will of Abba, Sawyer 1482: Harmer 1914, no. 2.



 1. Ic Abba geroefa cyðe & writan hate hu min willa is
þæt mon ymb min ærfe gedoe æfter minum dæge.
 3. Ærest ymb min lond þe ic hæbbe, & me God lah, &
ic æt minum hlafordum begæt, is min willa gif me God bearnes unnan wille,
ðæt hit foe to londe æfter me & his bruce mid minum gemeccan &
sioððan swæ forð min cynn ða hwile þe God wille ðæt ðeara
ænig sie þe londes weorðe sie & land gehaldan cunne.
 8. Gif me ðonne gifeðe sie, ðæt ic bearn begeotan ne mege,
þonne is min willa þæt hit hæbbe min wiif ða hwile ðe hia hit mid
clennisse gehaldan wile.
 10. & min broðar Alchhere hire fultume & þæt lond
hire nytt gedoe & him man selle an half swulung an Ciollandene to
habbanne & to brucanne, wið ðan ðe he ðy geornliocar hire ðearfa
bega & bewiotige & mon selle him to ðem londe <foreign>IIII</foreign> oxan & <foreign>II</foreign>
cy & <foreign>L</foreign> scepa & ænne horn.
 15. Gif min wiif ðonne hia nylle mid clennisse swæ gehaldan,
& hire liofre sie oðer hemed to niomanne, ðonne foen mine megas to
ðem londe & hire agefen hire agen.
 17. Gif hire ðonne liofre sie an mynster to ganganne oðða
suð to faranne, ðonne agefen hie twægen mine megas Alchhere &
Aeðelwold hire twa ðusenda & fon him to ðem londe & agefe mon to
Liminge <foreign>L</foreign> eawa & <foreign>V</foreign> cy fore hie.
 21. & mon selle to Folcanstane in mid minum lice <foreign>X</foreign> oxan &
<foreign>X</foreign> cy & <foreign>C</foreign> eawa & <foreign>C</foreign> swina & higum ansundran <foreign>D</foreign> pending wið
ðan ðe min wiif þær benuge innganges swæ mid minum lice swæ
sioððan yferran doqre swæ hwæder swæ hire liofre sie.
 25. Gif higan ðonne oððe hlaford þæt nylle hire
mynsterlifes geunnan, oðða hia siolf nylle, & hire oðer ðing liofre
sie, þonne agefe mon ten hund pending inn mid minum lice me wið legerstowe,
& higum an sundran fif hund pending fore mine sawle.
 30. & ic bidde & bebeode swælc monn se ðæt min lond
hebbe ðæt he ælce gere agefe ðem higum æt Folcanstane <foreign>L</foreign> ambra
maltes & <foreign>VI</foreign> ambra gruta & <foreign>III</foreign> wega spices & ceses & <foreign>CCCC</foreign>
hlafa & an hriðr & <foreign>VI</foreign> scep.
 33. & swælc monn se ðe to minum ærfe foe, ðonne
gedele he ælcum messepreoste binnan Cent mancus goldes & ælcum Godes
ðiowe pending & Sancte Petre min wærgeld twa ðusenda.
 36. & Freoðomund foe to minum sweorde & agefe ðeræt
feower ðusenda, & him mon forgefe ðeran ðreotene hund pending.
 39. & gif mine broðar ærfeweard gestrionen ðe londes
weorðe sie, þonne ann ic ðem londes.
 40. Gif hie ne gestrionen oðða him sylfum ælles hwæt
sele, æfter hiora dege ann ic his Freoðomunde gif he ðonne lifes
bið.
 42. Gif him elles hwæt sæleð, ðonne ann ic his minra
swæstarsuna swælcum se hit geðian wile & him gifeðe bið.
 44. & gif þæt gesele þæt min cynn to ðan clane
gewite ðæt ðer ðeara nan ne sie ðe londes weorðe sie, þonne foe
se hlaford to & ða higon æt Kristes cirican & hit minum gaste nytt
gedoen.
 46. An ðas redenne ic hit ðider selle, ðe se monn se ðe
Kristes cirican hlaford sie, se min & minra erfewearda forespreoca &
mundbora, & an his hlaforddome we bian moten.
 50. Ic Ciolnoð mid Godes gefe ærcebiscop ðis write &
ðeafie & mid Cristes rode tacne hit festniæ.
 52. Ic Beagmund preost ðis ðeafie & write.
 53. Ic Wærhard preost abbod ðis ðeafie & write.
 54. Ic Abba geroefa ðis write & festnie mid Kristes rode
tacne.
 55. Ic Aeðelhun preost ðis ðeafie & write.
 56. Ic Abba preost ðis ðeafie & write.
 57. Ic Wigmund preost ðis write & ðeafie.
 58. Ic Iof preost ðis ðeafie & write.
 59. Ic Osmund preost ðis ðeafie & write.
 60. Ic Wealhhere diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 61. Ic Badanoð diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 62. Ic Heaberht diacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 63. Ic Noðwulf subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 64. Ic Wealhhere subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 65. I Ciolwulf subdiacon ðis write & ðeafie.
 66. Heregyð hafað ðas wisan binemned ofer hire deg & ofer
Abban ðæm higum et Cristes cirican of ðæm londe et Cealflocan.
 68. Ðæt is ðonne ðritig ombra alað & ðreo hund
hlafa, ðeara bið fiftig hwitehlafa an weg spices & ceses, an ald
hriðer, feower weðras, an suin, oððe sex weðras, sex gosfuglas, ten
hennfuglas, ðritig teapera, gif hit wintres deg sie, sester fulne huniges,
sester fulne butran, sester fulne saltes.
 72. & Heregyð bibeadeð ðem mannum ðe efter hire to
londe foen, on Godes noman, ðæt hie fulgere witen ðæt hie ðiss
gelesten ðe on ðissem gewrite binemned is ðem higum to Cristes
cirican, & ðæt sie simle to higna blodlese ymb twelf monað agefen.
 76. & se mann se to londe foe, agefe hire erfehonda <foreign>XIII</foreign> pund
pendinga.
 77. & hio forgifeð fiftene pund for ðy ðe mon ðas
feorme ðy soel gelæste.
 79. Abban geroefan arfegedal, his geðinga to Kristes cirican.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1483 (Whitelock 2)
B15.6.2.
Will of Ælfgar, Sawyer 1483: Whitelock 1930, no. 2.



 1. Þis is Alfgares quide.
 1. Þat is erst þat ic an mine louerd tueye suerde fetelsade and
tueye bege, ayther of fifti mancusas goldes, and þre stedes and þre
scheldes and þre speren.
 3. And me kidde þeodred bisccop and Edric Alderman þa ic selde
mine louerd þat suerd þat Eadmund king me selde on hundtuelftian mancusas
goldes and four pund silueres on þam fetelse þat ic moste ben mine quides
wirde.
 7. And ic nefre forwrouht ne habbe on Godes witnesse wið mine
louerd buten ic so mote.
 8. And ic an Athelflede mine douhter þe lond at Cokefelð and at
Dittone and þat at Lauenham ouer min day on þe red þat heo be þe bet
for mine soule and hire moder soule & for hire brother soule & for hire
seluen.
 12. And þanne ouer vre aldre day ic an þat lond at Cokefeld
into Beodricheswrthe to seynt Eadmundes stowe.
 14. And ic wille þat Athelfled vnne ouer hire day þo londes at
Dittone into suilke halegen stowe suilk hire redlikest þinge for vre aldre
soule.
 16. And ouer vre aldreday ic an þat lond at Lauenham mine douhter
childe gif þat God wille þat heo ani haueð buten Atelfled her wille him
his vnnen.
 18. And gif heo non ne habbe gange it into Stoke for vre aldre
soule.
 19. And ic an þat lond at Babingþirne Atelflede mine douhter
and after hire day min other douhter hire day and ouer here bothre day mine
douhter berne gif he bern habbe.
 22. And gif he bern ne habbe þanne go it into sancte Marie Stowe
at Berkynge for vre aldre soule.
 24. And ic an þat lond at Illeye mine ginger dohter hire day and
ouer hire day Berthnoðe his day gif he leng libbe þanne heo.
 26. Gif he bern habben þanne an ic hem.
 26. Gif he non ne habbeþ þanne an ic it Athelfleð mine
douhter ouer here day and after hire day into Cristes kirke at Caunterbiri
þen hirde de brite.
 29. And þe lond at Colne and at Tigan ic an min gingere douhter
and ouer day gif heo bern habbe hire bern.
 31. And gif heo bern ne habbe bequeðe it Bernothe his day and
ouer his day into Stoke for vre aldre soule.
 32. And ic an þat lond at Piltendone and at Mereseye into Stoke.
 33. And ic an þat Athelfled bruke þe lond þer wile þe hire
lef beth one raða heo it on riht helde and on þe red þat heo do þan
hirde so wel so heo best may into Stoke for mine soule and for ure aldre.
 36. And ic an þat lond at Grenstede into Stoke for mine soule
& for Athelwardes & for Wiswiðe.
 38. And ic Athelfled þere brice wille hire lif beth on þe red
þat heo do for þa saule so wel so heo best may.
 39. Nu his me God uþe & min lauerd.
 40. And ic an þat lond at Tidwoldingtone Alfwold ouer mine day
þe he formige ilke ihere þen hird at Paulesbiri for vre aldre soule.
 42. And ic an þat lond at Totham Berchnoðe and mine gingere
douhter here day.
 43. And after here day wende lond into Mereseye Athelfled mine
douhter.
 44. And ic an þat wudelond at Aisfeld into Stoke also Eakild self
it her bouhte.
 46. And ic mine moder þat lond at Ryssebroc gif heo leng liuið
þan hic.
 47. Þanne after vnker bother day ic an it Winelme gif heo
Athelfled on richte hird.
 48. And ic wille bidden suilc louerd so þanne beth, for Godes
luuen and for alle hise halegen, werken min bern þat he werken þat he nefre
ne mugen forwerken mine quide þe ic for mine soule cueden habbe.
 51. And gif it wo awende habbe him wið God gemaene and wið þe
holi sanctas þe ic it to becueþen habbe þat he it nefre ne bete buten on
helle wite se þis quide awende boten it me seluen wende er min ende.
 55. And ic Athelgar an an hide lond þes þe Aeulf hauede be
hundtuelti acren, ateo so he wille.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1484 (Whitelock 8)
B15.6.3.
Will of Ælfgifu, Sawyer 1484: Whitelock 1930, no. 8.



 1. Þis ys ælfgyfæ gegurning to hiræ cinehlafordæ.
 1. Þæt is þæt heo hyne bitt for Godæs lufun and for
cynescypæ þæt heo mote beon hyre cwydes wyrðæ.
 3. Þonnæ cyð heo þæ, leof, bæ þinre geþafiunga
hwæt heo for þæ and for þyræ sawlæ to Godæs ciricean don
wylæ.
 5. Þæt is æræst þæt heo ann into ealdan mynstær
þær heo hiræ licaman ræstan þæncþ, þæs landæs æt
Hrisanbeorgan eallswa hit stænt buton þæt heo wylæ bæ þinre
geþafunga þæt man freoge on ælcum tunæ ælne
witæþæownæ mann þæ undær hiræ geþeowuð wæs and twa
hund mandcussa goldæs to þam mynstær and hire scrin mid hiræ
haligdomæ.
 10. And heo an innto nigean mynstær þæs landæs æt
Bleddanhlæwe and hund mancussa goldæs and annæ offringdisc into nunna
mynstær and þæs landæs æt Hwætædunæ into Rummæsigæ
Xriste & sanctan Marian and æt Cæstæleshammæ into Abbadunæ
and æt Wicham into Baþum.
 15. And ic ann minæn cinæhlafordæ þæs landæs æt
Weowungum and æt Hlincgeladæ and æt Hæfæresham and æt
Hæðfælda and æt Mæssanwyrðæ and æt Gyssic and twegea
bæagas, æigþær ys on hundtwælftigum mancussum, and anræ
sopcuppan and syx horsa and swa fala scylda and spæra.
 20. And þam æþelingæ þæs landæs æt Niwanham
and anæs beages on þritægum mancussum.
 21. And þæra hlæfdigan anæs swyrbeages on hundtweltifgum
mancussum and anæs beages on þritegum mancussum and anre sopcuppan.
 23. And ic ann Aþelwoldæ bisceopæ þæs landæs æt
Tæafersceat and bidde hinæ þæt hæ symlie þingiæ for minæ
modor an for me.
 25. And ic ann bæ minæs hlafordæs geþafiungæ þæs
landæs æt Mundingwillæ and æt Beorhþanstædæ ælfwerdæ
and æþelwærdæ and ælfwaræ him to gemanan hira dæg and
ofær hira dæg into ealdan mynstær for minnæ cynehlaforð and for
mæ.
 29. And syllan hi ælcæ geare twa dægfæorman into þam
twam mynstrum þa wilæ þæ hi his brucæn.
 31. And ig an ælfwæræ miræ swystær eallæs
þæs þæ ic hiræ alenæð hæfdæ and æþælfledæ
minæs broþur wifæ þæs bændes þæ ic hire alæneð
hæfdæ.
 33. And ælchum abbodæ fif pund pæniga to hira mynstres
bote.
 34. And, leof, be þinre geþafiunga þæt ic motæ
bætæcen þam bisceope and þam abbodæ þonæ ofæreacan to
þære stowe botæ and earmum mannum for me to dælænne swa swa him
þincæ þæt mæ for Godæ þearflucustþ si.
 38. And ic biddæ minnæ cinelaford for Godæs lufum þæt
næ forlæte minæ mænn þe hinæ gesæcen and him wyrðæ
syn.
 40. And ic ann ælfwerdæ anræ sopcuppan and
æþelwerdæ anæs gerænodæs drincæhornæs.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1485 (Whitelock 9)
B15.6.4.
Will of Ælfheah, Sawyer 1485: Whitelock 1930, no. 9.



 1. Her is geswutelod an ðis gewrite hu ælfheah ealdorman his
cwidæ gecwæðen hæfð be his cynehlafordæs geþafuncge.
 2. Þæt is þonnæ æræst þæt he gean his drihtne
for his sawlæ þæarfæ þæs landæs æt ællændune and
þæs æt Crundelom to ealdan mynstære to Winticeastræ and þæra
twæntiga hida æt Ceorlatunæ into Mealdælmæsbyrig and þæra
fiftyna hida æt Suðtune into Baðan.
 7. And he gean his cynehlafordæ þæra hundtwæntiga hida
æt Wyrðæ and þæs landæs æt Coccham and æt þæcham and
æt Ceolæswyrðæ and æt Incgenæsham and æt ægelesbyrig and
æt Wændofron and þreo hund mancusa goldæs and annæ dics an þrym
pundom and anæ soppcuppan an þrym pundan & an handsex and þæræ
lecge is hundeahtati mancussa goldæs & seax swurð and seax hors mid
geredan and swa fæla spæra and scylda.
 14. And he gean ælfriðæ ðæs cyninges wifæ his
gefæðeran þæs landæs æt Scyræburnan ealswa hit stænt and
þam yldran æþælingæ þæs cyngæs suna and hiræ þritiga
mancussa goldæs and anæs swurdæs and þam gincgran ðæs landes
æt Wolcnæsstedæ.
 18. And he gean ælfhære his breðær þæs landæs
æt Færndunæ and æt Ealdincburnan.
 19. And Godwinæ his suna þæs æt Tudincgatunæ and
ælfwerdæ æt Wyritunæ and æþelwerdæ his mege æt Wicumun
and ælfwine his swustur suna þæs æt Froxafelda.
 22. Þonnæ an ic ælfsiþæ minon wifæ gyf heo leng
beoð þonne ic and it swa gehylt swa ic hiræ truwan to hæbbe ealra
þara oðæra landa þæ ic læfæ.
 24. And heo þanne gæornlicæ of þam God geþæncæ
and for uncre sawle geornlicæ beo.
 26. And brucæ heo þæs landæs æt Batancumbæ hyræ
dæg and æfter hire dæge ga hit an ælfwærdes hand uncres suna gif
hæ lifæs beo.
 28. Gyf hæ næ beo gyf hæ næ beo for mine broðorn to
þa hwilæ þæ hi beon and æfter hyra dege ga into Glæstingabyrig
for urnæ fædær and for uræ modor and for us eallæ.
 30. And ic wullan þæt man gefreogen ælcne witeþeowne man
on ælcum þæra landæ þæ ic minon freondon bæcwedden
hæbbæ.
 32. And þisseræ geþafiuncga þæ sæ cyning geuþæ
is to gewitnæssæ, ælfþryþ þæs cynincges wif and Aþelwold
bisceop and ælfhære ealdorman and æþelwine ealdorman and
ælfwinæ and æscwig abbod.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1486 (Whitelock 15)
B15.6.5.
Will of Ælfflæd, Sawyer 1486: Whitelock 1930, no. 15.



 1. Ælflæd gæswytelaþ on þis gewrite hu hæo wile
habban gefadad hiræ æhta for Gode & for worldæ.
 2. Ærest þæt ic an minum hlaforde þara <foreign>VIII</foreign> landa
æfter minum dege, þæt is erest æt Douorcortæ & æt
Fulanpettæ & æt Ælesforda & æt Stanwægun & æt
Byrætune & æt læxadyne & æt Ylmesætun & æt
Bucyshealæ & twægra bæha on twera punda gewihte & twa
sopcuppan & an sæolfran fæt.
 7. & þæ, leof, æadmodlice bidde for Godes luuan &
for mines hlafordæs sawle lufan & for minræ swystor sawlæ lufan
þæt þu amundie þa halgan stowæ et Stocæ þæ mine yldran on
restaþ & þa are þæ hi þiderin sæadon a to freogon Godæs
rihte, þæt is þonno þæt ic gean æalswa mine yldran his er
gæuþan, þæt is þonne þæt land æt Stoce into þeræ
halagan stowæ & æal þæt þæt þær to tunæ gæhyrð
& þonæ wuda æt hæþfælda þæ min swystar gæuþæ
& mine yldran.
 14. Þonne synd þis þa land þæ minæ yldran þærto
bæcwædon ofær minre swystor dæg & ofær minne, þæt is
ðonne Stredfordæ & Fresantun & Wiswyþetun & Lauanham &
Byliesdyne & Polstyde & Wifærmyrsc & Grænstydæ &
Peltandune & Myræsegæ & þæt wudæland æt Totham þæ
min fæder geuþæ into Myresiæ & Colne & Tigan.
 19. Þonne synd þis þa land þe minæ yldran becwædon
into oþrum halgum stowum, þæt is þonne into Cantwarabyrig to
Cristæs circan þan hired to brece þes landes æt Illanlege & into
Paules mynstre into Lundene þes landes æt Hedham to biscophame & þes
landes æt Tidwoldingtune þan hirede to brece into Paules mynstre &
into Beorcingan þam hirede to brece þes landes æt Babbingþyrnan.
 26. & ic gean Ælfþræðe minæs hlauordæs medder
Wuduhamæs æftær minum dæge & æfter hiræ dege gange hit
into sancta Marian stowæ into Beorcingan æalswa hit stænt mid mæte
& mid mannum.
 29. & ic gæan into sancte Æadmunde þara twegra landa
Cæorlesweorþæ & Cochanfelde þam hirede to brece æalswa mine
yldran his er geuþan & þæs landes æt Hnyddinge æftær Crawan
degæ miræ magan.
 32. & ic gæan into Myresie æfter minum degæ ealswa min
hlaford & min swester geuþan, þæt is Fingringaho & þara six
hida þæ þæt mynstær on stent.
 35. & ic gæan efter Crawan dege þes landes æt
Wealdingafelda into Suðbyrig to sanctæ Gregoriæ ealswa min swestar hit
er foræwyrde.
 37. & ic gean into Ælig sanctæ Petre & sanctæ
Æþældryþe & sancte Wihtburhe & sanctæ Sexburhe &
sancte Æormenhilde þer mines hlafordes lichoma rest þara þreo landa
þe wit buta geheotan Gode & his halgan, þæt is æt Rettendune þe
wes min morgangyfu & æt Sægham & æt Dictune ealswa min hlaford
& min swæstar his er geuþan & þaræ anre hide æt Cæafle
þe min swystar begeat & þes bæahges gemacan þe man sæalde minum
hlaforde to sawlescæatte.
 44. & ic gean Æðelmære æaldorman þes landes æt
Lellinge ofer mine deg mid mete & mid mannum æalswa hit stent on þet
gerad þæt he beo on minum life min fulla freod & forespreca & mira
manna & efter minum dege beo þara halgan stowe & þeræ are ful
freod & forespeca æt Stocæ þe mine yldran on restaþ.
 49. & ic gean þes landes æt Lissingtune Eðelmere mines
mid mete & mid mannum ealswa hit stent & hine eadmodlice bidde
þæt he min fulla freod & mundiend beo on minum dege & efter minum
dege gefelste þæt min cwide & mira yldran standan mote.
 53. Þis sind þa landmearca to Byligesdyne, of ða burnan æt
Humelcyrre, fram Humelcyrre Heregeresheafode, fram Heregeresheafode æfter
ðam ealdan hege to ðare grene æc, þonne forð þæt hit cymð to
þare stanstræte, of þare stanstræte andlang scrybbe þæt hit
cymð to Acantune, fram Acyntune þæt hit cymð to Rigendune, fram
Rigindune æft to þara burnan.
 59. & þær is landes fif hida.
 59. Þis sind þa landgemæra to Hwifermirsce & to
Polestede, of Loppandune to Scelfleage, fram Leage to Mercyl, andlang Mercyl
into Sture, andlang Sture to Leofmannes gemære, andlang Leofmannes
gæmære to Amalburnan, fram Amalburnan to Norðfelda, ðonne forð to
Bindhæcce, fram Bindhæcce to Tudanhæcce, fram Tudanhæcce to
Giddincgforda fram Giddingforda to Hnutstede, fram Huntstede to Hwitincgho,
fram Hwitingho to Wudemannestune, fram Wudemannestune to Cæresige
gæmære, fram Cæresige gemære to Hædleage gemære, fram
Hædleage gæmære to Hligham gemære, fram Hligham gemære eft to
Loppandun.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1487 (Whitelock 13)
B15.6.6.
Will of Ælfhelm, Sawyer 1487: Whitelock 1930, no. 13.



 1. Her is on sio swutelung hu Ælfhelm his are & his æhta
geuadod hæfð for Gode & for wurulde.
 2. Þæt is þonne ærest his hlaforde an hund mancosa goldes
& twa swurd & feorwer scyldas & feower speru & feower hors, twa
gerædode, twa ungerædode.
 5. & he gean for his sawle þæs landes æt Wrættincge
into sancte Æþeldryðe buton þam twam hydon þe Æþelric
hæfð.
 7. & ic gean þæs landes æt Brycandune into sancte Petre
to Westmenstre buton ic wylle þæt man mæste minum wiue twa hund swyna
þænne þær mæsten sy þider hire leouest sy.
 9. & ic gean Ælfgare minum suna þæs landes æt
Hwipstede & þæs æt Wealtune his dæg & æfter his dæge
ga hyt for uncra begra sawle þider him leouest sy.
 12. & ic cyþe hwæt ic minum wiue to morgengyue sealde,
þæt is Beadewan & Burgestede & Strætford & þa þreo hyda
æt Heanhealan.
 14. & ic gef hire þa wyt ærest togædere comon þa twa
hyda æt Wilburgeham & æt Hrægenan & þæt þærto
lið.
 16. & ic gean hire Carletunes & ic gean hire þæs
heauodbotles æt Gyrstlingaþorpe & ealra þara æhta þe þæron
standað mid mete & mid mannum buton ic gean Godrice & minre dehter
healues þæs landes be wuda & be felda buton þam þe ic minum
preoste gean.
 20. & ic gean minum wiue & minre dehter healues þæs
landes æt Cunningtune to gedale buton þam feower hydon þe ic
Æþelrice & Alfwolde gean & þa healuan hyde þe ic gean
Osmære minum cnihte.
 23. & ic gean Ælfmære & his breðer Ælfstane
þara twegra landa to gedale æt Hættanlea & æt Pottune buton
þam þe ic Osgare gean.
 25. & ic gean Godere þæs þe ic æt Wimunde gebohte.
 26. & ic gean Leofsige Lytlanbyrig æfter minum dæge on
þæt gerad þe þæt stande þe wyt beforan þan ealdormen lucan.
 28. & ic gean him & his wiue þæs landes æt Stoctune
wið an hund mancosa goldes & ic wylle þæt man selle minum hlaforde
þæt gold to minum heregeatum.
 30. & ic gean minum þrym broþron to gedale þæs landes
æt Trostingtune buton þam þe ic gean Alfwolde þæs þe Æþelric
hæfde.
 33. & ic gean Ælfhelme þære hyde æt Icelingtune
& þæs æt Mawyrþe & ic gean Wulfmære þæs þe ic æt
Byornham hæfde.
 35. & ic gean minre scæðe for mire sawle into Hramesege,
healfe þan abbode & healue þam hirede.
 36. & ic gean minum wiue healues þæs stodes æt
Trostingtune & minan geferan healues þe me mid ridað.
 38. & fo min wif to healuan þe on wealde is & min dohter
to healuan.
 39. & ic wylle þæt min wif fo æfre to healfan æhtan
on ælcon tune fo to lande se þe fo swa hio to forgyuen wæs.
 41. Nu bydde ic þe leof hlaford þæt min cwyde standan mote
& þæt þu ne geþauige þæt hine man mid wuo wende.
 42. God is min gewyta, ic wæs þinum fæder swa gehyrsum swa
ic fyrmest myhte & fullice hold on mode & on mægene & þe
æfre on fullon hyldon hold & on fulre luue, þæs me is god gewyta.
 46. Se man se þe minne cwyde wende buton þu hyt sy, leof, &
ic hæbbe geleauan þæt þu nelle, God afyrre hine of his rice buton he
þe hraþor ongen wende.
 48. & God & ealle his halgan gehealde æcne þara þe
þærto gefyrþryge þæt he standan mote.
 50. Gif hwa æfre ænig þinc of þysum cwyde awende oþþe
ætbrede sy him Godes ar & his ece edlean æfre ætbroden & he
næfre ne wurþe on his myltse gemet ac he sy amansumod of þam gemanan
ealra gecorenra Cristes heapa, ge nu ge on ecnysse, buton he þe hrædlicor
þæt forlæte & on riht eac eft gewende.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1488 (Whitelock 18)
B15.6.7.
Will of Archbishop Ælfric, Sawyer 1488: Whitelock 1930, no. 18.



 1. Her sutelað hu Alfric arcebisceop his cwyde gedihte.
 1. Þæt is ærest him to saulsceate he becwæð into
cristes cyrcan þæt land æt Wyllan & æt Burnan &
Risenbeorgas.
 3. And he becwað his laford his beste scip & þa
segelgeræda ðarto & <foreign>LX</foreign> healma & <foreign>LX</foreign> beornena.
 5. & he wilnode gif hit his lafordes willa wære þæt he
gefaestnode into sancte Albane þæt land æt Cyngesbyrig & fenge sylf
wið þam eft to Eadulfingtune.
 7. An he becwæð þæt land æt Dumeltun into Abbandune
& Ælfnoðe ðarof <foreign>III</foreign> hida his dæg and suððan to þan
oþaran to Abbandune.
 9. & <foreign>X</foreign> oxan & <foreign>II</foreign> men he him becwæð & filgan hi
þam lafordscype þætte þæt land to hyre.
 10. And he cwæð þæt land æt Wealingaforda þe he
gebohte Celewærde & hofer his dæg into Ceolesige.
 12. & he becwæð into sancte Albane þæt land æt
Tiwan & standan þa forword betweonan þan abbode & Ceolrice ðe
ær wið ðæne arcebiscop geforwyrd wæron, þæt is þæt
Ceolric habbe ðæne dæl þæs landes þe he hæfð his dæg
& eac ðæne dæl þe se arcebisceop for his sceatte him to let,
þæt wæs ehtoðe healf hid wið <foreign>V</foreign> pundun & <foreign>L</foreign> mancusum goldes,
& ga hit ofer his dæg eall togædere into sancte Albæne.
 18. & heora forewyrd wæron þæt Osanig æfter
Ceolrices dæge gange eac þyderin.
 19. & þæt land on Lundene þe he mid his feo gebohte he
becwæð into sancte Albæne & his bec ealle he cwæð eac
þyderin & his geteld.
 21. And he becwæð þæt man fenge on þe feoh ðe man
hæfde & ærest ælcne borh agulde & suððan tilode to his
hergeatwæn þæs ðe man habban sceolde.
 24. And anes scipes he geuðe þam folce to Cent & oþres to
Wiltunescire.
 25. & elles on oðrum þingum gif þæs hwæt wære he
bæd þæt Uulfstan bisceop & Leofric abbud dihton swa heom best
þuhte.
 27. And þe land be westan æt Fittingtune & æt Niwantune
he becwæð his sweostrun & heora beornun.
 28. & Ælfheages land Esnes suna ga a on his cyn.
 29. And he becwæð Uulfstane ærcebiscope ane sweorrode &
anne ring & anne psaltere & Alfheage biscope anne rode.
 31. And he forgeaf on Godes est Centingan þæne borh þe hy
hym sceoldan & Middelsexon & Suðrion þæt feoh þæt heom
foresceat.
 33. And he wyle þæt man freoge æfter his dæge ælene
witefæstne man þe on his timan forgylt wære.
 34. Gif hwa þæt is awende hæbbe him wið God gemaene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1489 (Whitelock 26)
B15.6.8.
Will of Bishop Ælfric, 1489: Whitelock 1930, no. 26.



 1. Her swytelað on þissum gewrite hu ælfric biscop wille his
are beteon þe he under Gode geernode & under Cnute kyncge his leofue
laforde & siþþan hæfð rihtlice gehealdan under Haralde cyncge.
 4. Þæt is þonne ærest þæt ic gean þæt land et
Wilrincgawerþa into sancte Eadmunde for mira saule & for minas lafordas
swa ful & swa forð swa he hit me to handa let.
 6. & ic gean þæt land æt Hunstanestune be æstan
broke & mid þan lande et Holme into sancte Eadmunde.
 8. & ic wille þæt þa munecas on Byrig sellan syxtig
punde for þan lande et Ticeswelle & et Doccyncge & þæt þerto
geherað.
 10. & ic gean Leofstane dæcane þæt land et Grimastune
swa ful & swa forð swa ic hit ahte.
 11. & ic gean mine cynelaforde Haralde <foreign>II</foreign> marc gol.
 12. & ic gean mire hlefdigen an marc gol.
 13. & gelæste man Ægelrice <foreign>IIII</foreign> pund mire fatfylre.
 13. & sela man mine cnihtas þa mina stiwardas witan <foreign>XXXX</foreign>
punda & fif pund into Elig & fif pund into Holm & fif pund
Wulfwarde muneke minne mæge & fif pund Ælffæh min sæmestre.
 16. & ic wille þæt man sella þæt land et Walsingaham
swa man derast mage & gelesta man þæt feoh swa ic gewissod hæbbe.
 18. & ic wille þæt man selle þæt land et Fersafeld
swa man derast mæge & recna man iungere Brun an marc gol & mid þan
laue scytte man mina borgas.
 20. & ic gean Ælfwine minan preoste et Walsingaham <foreign>XXX</foreign>
akera et Eggemera & Uui prouast habba þone ofaræcan.
 22. & ic gean Ædwine muneke þa mylne et Gæssæte þe
Ringware ahte.
 24. & ic gean Ælfwig preoste þæt land et Rygedune þe
ic bohte to Leofwenne.
 25. & ic gean þæt myln þe Wulnoð ahte into sancte
Eadmunde .
 26. & ic gean Sibriht þæt land þe ic gebohte on
Mulantune.
 27. & ic gean þæt fen þe þurlac me sealde into
Ælmham þa preostas to foddan.
 28. & ic gean into Hoxne þa preostas an þusend werð fen.
 29. & ic gean þæt fen þe ælfric me sealde into
Holme.
 29. & ic gean þon hage binnon Norðwic for mire saule &
for ealra þe hit me geuðon into sancte Eadmunde.
 31. & ic gean þan hage into sancte Petre binnon Lunden.
 32. & ic gean iungre Brune þæt healfe þusend fen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1490 (Whitelock 28)
B15.6.9.
Will of Ælfric Modercope, Sawyer 1490: Whitelock 1930, no. 28.



 1. Þis is se quide þe Alfric biquath er he ofer se ferde.
 1. Þat is erst Lodne into seynt Eadmunde be wude and by felde and
be fenne so ful & so forth so ic it formist ahte.
 3. And ic an þat lond at Birthe into seynt Aþeldrithe so ful
& so forth so ic it bigeten hauede eyþer on wude oþer on felde and into
Holm to sancte Benedicte Berton al so ful & so forth so ic it ahte.
 6. And ic an into Rameseye six marc silures and þat schal Godric
mine brother lesten.
 8. & ic an Þurwineholm into Lodne and Fuglholm into Berhe.
 9. And þa schep delen men on to, half into Lodne & half into
Beorthe.
 10. And ic biquethe to min heregete ane marc goldes and þat schal
Godric mine brother lesten.
 11. And Alfric biscop I biquethe mine teld & min bedreaf þat
ic best hauede vt on mi fare mid me.
 13. & be Alfric biscop & Tofi Prude & þrunni þese
quides mundes hureþinge þat it no man awende.
 14. & gif it wa wille awenden God almithen awende is ansene
fram hym on domesday.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1491 (Whitelock 4)
B15.6.10.
Will of Bishop Ælfsige, Sawyer 1491: Whitelock 1930, no. 4.



 1. Þis is Ælfsiges biscopes cwide.
 1. Þæt is þonne ærest þæt ic wille þæt man
gefreoge ælcne witeþeowne mannan þe on þam biscoprice sie for hine and
for his cynehlaford.
 3. And minum cynehlaford mine heregeatya and þæs landes æt
Tantune þe he me ær to let.
 5. And ic gean þæs landes æt Crundelan ofer mine dæg
Ælfheage and ofer his dæg gange hit into ealden mynstere.
 6. And Io gean minum mægcnafan þæs landes æt Anne his
dæg, and ofer his dæg into niwan mynstere and þæs landes æt þan
twan Worþigum minre magan þa hwile þe hyre lif biþ, and siþþan
minre swistlr and minum magcnafan, ægþer ge þara landa ge þæs æt
Cleran and þa oþerra lalra þe mine fæder ahte.
 11. And þæs landes æt Tioceburnan Wlfrice Cufing his dæg
and ofer his dæg into ealdun mynstere.
 13. And þæs landes æt Runcwuda swa hit ær gecweden
wæs to ealdun mynstere and Ælfwige þæs landes æt Ciltrigtune ofer
þære wuduwan dæg and Wlfrice æt Wicham þæs æt lætanlia.
 16. Þonne bidde ic minnan leofan freond Ælfheah þæt
bewite ægþer ge þa land ge þa þe mine mgas sien and þæt þu ne
geþafige þæt man þis on ænig oþer wænde.
 18. Gif hit þonne hwa do God hine fordo ge mid sawle ge mid
lichoman, ge her ge on þan to feondan, buton Io hit self on oþer wænde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1492 (Nap-Steven 10)
B15.6.11.
Will of Bishop Ælfwold, Sawyer 1492: Napier and Stevenson 1895, no. 10.



 1. Þis is Alfwoldes bisceopes cwyde, þæt is ðæt he
geann þæs landes æt Sandforda in to þam mynstre in to Crydian tune
him to saulsceatte mid mete & mid mannum swa hit stent butan witeþeowum
mannum.
 4. & anes hiwscypes he geann Godrice þærof & an
sylhðe oxna.
 4. & he geann his hlaforde feower horsa, twa gesadelode &
twa unsadelode, & feower scyldas & <foreign>IIII</foreign> spera & twegen helmas
& twa byrnan & L mancsa goldes þe Ælfnoþ him sceal æt
Wudeleage & ænne scegð <foreign>LXIIII</foreign> ære.
 8. He is eall gearo butan þam hanon he hine wolde ful gearwian
his hlaforde to gerisnum gif him God uðe.
 9. & Ordulfe twegra boca, Hrabanum & martyrlogium.
 10. & þam æþelinge <foreign>XL</foreign> mancsa goldes & þæra
wildra worfa æt Æscburnan lande & twegra getelda.
 11. & Alfwolde munuce <foreign>XX</foreign> mancsa goldes & anes horses
& anes geteldes.
 12. & Byrhtmære preoste <foreign>XX</foreign> mancsa goldes & anes
horses.
 13. & his þrim magon Eadwolde & Æþelnoðe &
Grimkytele hira ælcon <foreign>XX</foreign> mancsa goldes & hira ælcon anes horses.
 15. & Wulfgare his mæge twegra wahryfta & twegra
setlhrægla & þreo byrnan.
 16. & Godrice his aðume twegra byrnena.
 16. & Eadwine mæssepreoste V mancsa goldes & his
kæppan.
 17. & Leofsige mæssepreoste þæs mannes þe he him
ær tolet Wunstan hatte.
 18. & kenwolde helm & byrnan & Boian anes horses &
Mælpatrike <foreign>V</foreign> mancsa goldes & Leofwine Polgan <foreign>V</foreign> mancsa goldes &
Ælfgare writere an pund penega.
 20. He lænde Tune & his geswysternon, gehealdon hi hine.
 21. & Eadgyfe his swyster an strichrægl & <foreign>I</foreign>
hrigchrægl & <foreign>I</foreign> sethrægl & Ælflæde offestran <foreign>V</foreign> mancsa
penega & Spilan <foreign>III</foreign> mancsa goldes & <foreign>LX</foreign> penega & Leofwine Polgan
& Mælpatrike & Byrhsige hira þreora ælcon an hors &
ælcon hiredmen his onrid þe he alæned hæfde.
 25. & his hiredcnihton eallon <foreign>V</foreign> pund to gedale ælcon be
þam þe his mæð wære.
 26. & in to Crydian tune þreo þeningbec mæsseboc &
bletsungboc & pistelboc & an mæssereaf.
 27. & on ælcon bisceophame ælcon men freot þe
witeþeow wære oðþe he mid his feo gebohte.
 29. & in to Wiltune calic & disc on <foreign>CXX</foreign> mancsa goldes
butan þrim mancsa.
 30. & burþenon his beddreaf.
 30. & þises is to gewitnesse, Wulfgar Ælfgares sunu &
Godric be Crydian & Eadwine mæssepreost & Alfwold munuc &
Byrhtmær preost.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1494 (Whitelock 14)
B15.6.12.
Will of Æthelflæd, Sawyer 1494: Whitelock 1930, no. 14.



 1. Þis is Æþelflæde cwyde.
 1. Þæt is ærest þæt ic gean minum hlaforde þes
landes æt Lamburnan & þæs æt Ceolsige & æt Readingan
& feower beagas on twam hund mancys goldes & <foreign>IIII</foreign> pellas & <foreign>IIII</foreign>
cuppan & <foreign>IIII</foreign> bleda & <foreign>IIII</foreign> hors.
 4. & ic bidde minne leouan hlaford for Godes lufun þæt min
cwyde standan mote & ic nan oðer nebbe geworht, on Godes gewitnesse.
 6. & ic gean þæs landes æt Domarhame into
Glestingabyrig for Ædmundes cinges sawle & for Æadgares cinges &
for mire sawle.
 8. & ic gean þes landes æt Hamme into Cristes cyrcan æt
Cantwarebyrig for Eadmundæs cinges sawle & for mire sawle.
 10. & ic gean þes landes æt Wudaham Bæorhtnoðe
æaldormen & mire swustær hyre dæg & ofer hire deg into sancta
Marian cyrcan æt Byorcingan.
 13. & ic gean þes landes æt Hedham Bæorhtnoðæ
ealdormen & mire swuster hæora dæg & æfter hæora dæge
into Paulusbyrig æt Lundænæ to bisceophamæ.
 15. & ic gean þæs landæs æt Dictunæ into Ylig to
sanctæ Æþælðryð & to hire geswustran.
 16. & ic gean þara twegra landa æt Cohhanfeldæa &
æt Cæorlesweorþe Bæorhtnoðæ æaldormen & miræ swuster
hire dæg & ofer hire dæg into sanctæ Eadmundes stowe to
Bydericeswyrðe.
 19. & ic gean þæs landes æt Fingringaho Bæorhtnoðe
æaldermen & mire swuster hiræ deg & ofer hire dæg into
sanctæ Pætres cyrcan æt Myresigæ.
 22. & ic gæan þæs landes æt Polstede Bæorhtnoðe
æaldormæn & mire swuster hire deg & ofor hira dæg into Stocy.
 23. & ic gæan þæs landæs æt Hwifersce into Stocy
ofer minnæ deg.
 24. & ic gæan Bæorhtnoðæ æaldermen & mire
swuster þæs landes æt Strætforda hire dæg & ofer hire dæg
ic his gæan into Stocy.
 26. & ic willæ þæt Lauanham ga into Stoce ofær þes
æaldermannes dæg & mire swuster.
 28. & ic gean þæs landes æt Byligesdynæ into Stocy
ofer þæs æaldermanes dæg & mire swuster.
 29. & ic gean þara landa æt Peltandune & et Myresige
& æt Grenstede into Stocy ofer minnæ dæg & ofer
Bæorhtnoðes æaldormannæs & ofær mire swuster.
 32. & ic gean þes landes æt Ylmesæton Beorhtnoðe
æaldormen & mire swuster hira dæg & ofær hira dæg ic his
gæan Æadmundæ.
 34. & ic an þæræ aræ hide æt þorpæ into
Hedlæge for mire sawle & for mira eldrena ofer minne dæge.
 35. & ic gean ðæra X hida æt Wicforda Sibrihte minum
mægæ ofer minne dæg.
 37. & ic gean Ægwinæ minum geræfan þara <foreign>IIII</foreign> hida
æt Hedham ofer miminne deg swa hit on æalddagum gestod.
 39. & ic gæan Brihtwolde minum cnihtæ þara twegra hida
on Dunninclande ofer minnæ dæg.
 40. & ic an Alfwolde minum preoste twægra hida on
Dunninglande ofer minne dæg.
 41. & ic gean Æþælmære minum præoste twægra
hida on Dunninglandæ ofær minne dæg.
 43. & ic gæan Ælfgæate minum megæ twegra hida on
Dunninglande ofar minnæ dæg.
 44. & ic gæan ðæs landæs æt Wæaldingafælda
Crawa mira magan ouær minnæ dæg.
 45. & ic wille þæt man frigæ hæalue mine men on
elcum tune for mine sawlæ & þæt man dele æal healf þæt yrue
þæt ic hæbbæ on ælcum tune for mire sawle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1495 (Whitelock 22)
B15.6.13.
Æthelflæd to St. Paul's, London, Sawyer 1495: Whitelock 1930, no. 22.



 1. Her swutelað on ðam cwide ðe ægelfled gecweden
hæfð God to lofe and hire saule to þerfe and hire hlafordes.
 2. Þæt is ðonne ða feower hida landes at Lagefare and twa
hida æt Cochamstede ðe hy gean for hire saule and for hire hlafordes into
sanctes Paules mynstre on Lundene ðam gebroðran to bigleofan ðam ðe
ðæs dæghwamlice Gode þeniað be ðes cynges fulle geleuen
æðelredes on ðera manna gewitnesse ðe heora naman her standað.
 8. Þæt is ðonne ægelnoð arcebiscop and Wulfstan
arcebiscop and ælfun biscop on Lundene and ælfric abbot and Wigard abbot
and ælsi abbot on Cowwaforde and ælfere ealdorman and Briðnoð
ealdorman and Eadric ealdorman and ælfsige cynges þegn and Ufegeat
scireman and Frena cynges þegn.
 13. And swa hwilc man swa þisne cwide awende sy he Iudas gefere
ðe urne Drihten belewde on helle wite.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1496 (Whitelock 6)
B15.6.14.
Æthelgeard to New Minster, Winchester, Sawyer 1496: Whitelock 1930, no. 6.



 1. Ic Æðelgeard an þæs landes æt Stottanwelle ofer
mine dæge minra wifan hera dæge and þonne on niwan mynstera on
Wintanceaster uncer begea sawle þarfa þæm to brocon and næfre utan
seallan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1497 (Whitelock-Ker)
B15.6.15.
Will of Æthelgifu, Sawyer 1497: Whitelock and Ker 1968, 7-17.



 1. Æþelgifu cyð hire cwide hire cynehlaforde, & hire
hlæfdian, & hire freondon, hwæt hio gode wile don, hwæt hire
hlaforde, hwæt hire freondon.
 2. Þæt is hyre hlaforde þam cynge <foreign>xxx</foreign> mancessa goldes,
& twegen stedan, þe him to beodonne bioð, & mine headerhundas,
& mire hlæfdian <foreign>xxx</foreign> mancessa goldes.
 3. And þæt lond æt westwicum swa gewered, & þæt
lond æt Gætesdene into sancte Albane, on þa gerad þæt æfra þa
munecas his brucan gemænsumlice.
 4. And <foreign>xxx</foreign> mancessa goldes & <foreign>xxx</foreign> oxana, <foreign>xx</foreign> of
gætesdæne & <foreign>x</foreign> of acyrsce, & <foreign>xx</foreign> cuna, <foreign>x</foreign> of gætesdene <foreign>x</foreign>
of Acyrsce, & drifo mon þæt ongen hire lic.
 5. And oðer healf hund sceapa of Langaforda, <foreign>l</foreign> ewna mid heora
lambum & <foreign>l</foreign> gyldscepa & æt Acyrsce ane heorde swina & þæne
heorde mid.
 6. And frige mon of þam tune Ymman, & Ealdelm, &
Wulfhelm, & his bearn, & Siwynne gingran sunu, & þa oðre ealle
into Sancte Albane.
 7. And twa sealfrene cuppan & twegen hornas & ane boc &
þæt betste wahrift & þæt betste setrægl for hio, & for
hire hlafordes sawle.
 8. Æt Gætesdene fryoge mon Eadmund & his sunu &
Heahulf & Eadwig, Æþelwine & his wif selle mon Æþelstane,
& freoge mon hira cild, & freoge mon heora cild.
 9. Wynstan & Heremod & Cuðmundes dohter & Osmund
& his wif into Sancte Albane.
 9. And þæt land æt langaforda ælfnoðe his dæg,
& <foreign>V</foreign> men.
 10. And Mangod & Mantat freo.
 10. And Wine mylnere & þæs swanes sunu & wif &
þone gingran sceaphyrde hæbbe ælfnoð, & <foreign>cc</foreign> sceapa, <foreign>c</foreign> hund
ewna, & <foreign>c</foreign> geldsceapa, & þa heorde swina, & an sylhða oxana,
& <foreign>iiii</foreign> oxan on þa gerad þe he selle ælce gære into Hyccan
þreo dægfeorma.
 12. And ofor his dæg þæt land æt Langaforda æt
Langaforda into Hyccan.
 12. And Leofwine mire swyster suna þæt lon æt Cliftune him
& Eadric & his wif, & freoge mon heora cild.
 14. And <foreign>L</foreign> ewna mid heora lombum into Hiccan of Langaforda &
<foreign>L</foreign> sceapa into Bedaforda & <foreign>xxx</foreign> to Flittan, & <foreign>xx</foreign> to Æsceswellan
& <foreign>x</foreign> to Heanhlæwe, butan hio feoh hæbbe.
 14. Geþence mon þa nehtwæccan mid þam oforeacan & hire
preoston.
 15. & þa healfan hide þe Wineman ahte into þære cyrcan
& freoge mon Eadwine preost & hæbbe he þa cyrcan his dæg on
þa gerad þe he hi abotege, & selle him man anne mannan.
 16. & freoge man Ufic & þone fullere.
 16. Byrhstanes swustur into standune, Eadwine on þa gerad þe
heo & hire hlaford habban ælce gere on ælcere wucan <foreign>iii</foreign> mæssan
& a heora gebedrædenne arære.
 18. & freoge man Tiddulf & Bogan & Domic & his wif
& Siric & his steopdohtur.
 18. & ælfwyðe hæbbe Eadwine freo & hire cild &
þæs mylneres wif & hire cild.
 19. Gif þær oforeaca sy, dæle hit mon hire hirede.
 19. Þæt lond æt Mundene hæbbe Alfwold his dæg on þa
gerad þe he selle ælce lengtene to Brahingum <foreign>vi</foreign> mittan mealtes, &
þær meolo to, & fisc, & swa micel into Welingum & to
ægðeran mynstere <foreign>iiii</foreign> swin to mærtines mæssan.
 21. & hæbbe twa sylhða oxana & <foreign>iiii</foreign> wæpmen Oswig
& his wif & Cinesige & his wif, & freoge mon heora cyld, &
Brihtwine & Godere & his heord.
 22. Selle man to Heortfordingabyrig <foreign>iiii</foreign> oxan & to Welingum
<foreign>iiii</foreign> of þam tune & ælfwolde <foreign>x</foreign> cy.
 22. Gif þær eaca sy, selle mon Manne <foreign>ii</foreign>.
 23. & freoge mon Bogan & his hiwisc eal, & Winsige
& his wif, & Man & his wif, & Dufan þa ealdan &
Æþeldryðe.
 23. And þæt lond æt Mundene ofor ælfwoldes dæg, sille
hit mon healf into Brachingum, healf into Welingum, & hie singan ælce
gere <foreign>xxx</foreign> mæssan.
 24. & þæt lond æt Standune Leofsige.
 24. And selle man to Brachingum <foreign>iiii</foreign> oxsan & <foreign>ii</foreign> cy þanan
of.
 25. And freoge man Eatstan swan, & healde his sunu þa heorde
& freoge man elles þæt hiwisc, & Grim & his wif &
Eadgiðe & Eadflæde & Byrnferð & Wulfrune & Byrnstan se
swan.
 26. And hæbbe Leofsige þæne gingran swan & þa heorde
þe Eatstan healt.
 26. And selle man þær of tune Wulfrice huntan <foreign>ii</foreign> oxsan,
& twa cy.
 27. And hæbbe Leofsige eal þæt oðer his dæg, &
æfter his dæge sylle hit man Alfwolde, ofor heora dæg into sancte
Albane.
 27. And hy gesingon for hy & for hire hlafordes sawle ælce
gere <foreign>xxx</foreign> mæssana, & <foreign>xxx</foreign> saltera, & æfre þa munecas his
brucen gemenelice.
 28. Selle man Leofsige þæt land æt Offanlege & eal
þæt seo boc tæcð, & þæt lond æt Twingum him to swinlande
on þa gerad þe he gefeormige of þam twam tunum þone hired æt Sancte
Albane <foreign>iii</foreign> dagas ælce gere oððe <foreign>xvi</foreign> mittan mealtes & <foreign>iii</foreign>
melwes & anne sester huniges of Offanlege mid þam lonfeo, & <foreign>viii</foreign>
weþeras, & <foreign>vi</foreign> lomb, & an slegeryþer, & <foreign>xxx</foreign> cysa.
 31. And of Standune anne oman wines, & <foreign>xx</foreign> cysa, & <foreign>vi</foreign>
swin, & an hryðer.
 31. And nyme man of æghwilcum tune to þam þryttyguþan
dæge gelice mycel ge of Gædesdene ge of eallum þam oþrum þe
þær on lande sint.
 32. And freoge man æt Offanlege Cyneleofe, & Mærtin &
his wif, & Deormod & his wif, & Bryhtware, & þeodilde, &
Wulfstan æt Cocerenho, & hys stwegyn suna & hys steopdohtur.
 33. And þæt land æt Weodune hæbbe Leofsige on þa gerad
þæt he ælce geare læde ane tunnan fulle ealoð for hire fæder
sawle & hir modor & hire broðor & for hy selfe & for hire
hlaford & gel þæt þærto gebyrge.
 35. Gif he bearn hæbbe, selle hit him, gif he næbbe, selle
hit on his riht cyn.
 35. And freoge man Leofric æt Weowdune, & ælfric, &
Bryhtelm, & his sweostor.
 36. And þæt land æt Offanlege selle his cilde.
 36. Gif he cild næbbe be rihtwife selle hit mon into Sancte
Albane butan þam lande þe Tatulf on sit, & Æþelferð, &
Æþelswið.
 37. Selle mon þæt ælfgyfe hire hlafordes dohtur gif heo
libbe.
 37. Gif heo ne lybbe, selle hit mon into Sancte Albane.
 38. And singe man ælce gere <foreign>xxx</foreign> mæssena, & <foreign>xxx</foreign>
saltera feor hy & for hire hlafordes sawle.
 38. And heo bit hire hlæfdian hyre to ælmessan þæt þu
hine bewite, & he mote fylgan þam æþelinge & ne geþafige
þæt hine ænig man bereauige his landa, & þæt ðu hyne hate
scridad of þam lande.
 39. And ælfwolde þone hagan healfne on Lundanne &
ælfhege healfne.
 40. And ælfgife selle man ane heorde swina æt Gætesdene
& þone gingran swan & twegen men þæt to.
 41. And Leofwine mire swustur sunu selle mon þa heorde þe
Brihtelm heold, & his ginra sunu & Wulfstan & his wif.
 41. And selle man Leofrune mire mægan, þæt land æt
Wadforda & æt Weodune <foreign>ii</foreign> men & <foreign>viii</foreign> oxsan, & hire
sadulgerædo & hire cuppan & hire hornas buton hio hit ær agifen
hæfde.
 43. And þæt lond æt Watforda ofor hire dæg hire dehter
Godwife.
 43. Æt þæt lond æt þrope selle ofor hire dæg innan
hire agen cyn on þa gerad þe heo selle hire wed & ælc yrre forgife,
& heo na mare ne bidde.
 44. Gif heo nelle, dæle hit man hire cildon.
 44. And Wulfwunne mire mægan ane bledu & anne preon & an
wahrift & an sethregl & eal betstow swylce heo þærto betst
hæfð, & hire rotostan cyrtel.
 45. And Wulfmære hire mæge þa læssan seolfrenan cuppan.
 46. And ceorfe man of hire bende Witsige <foreign>v</foreign> mancessas buton heo
hit ær gedon hæfde, & <foreign>v</foreign> Leofwine Wulfmæres suna, & <foreign>v</foreign>
Wulfmære mire swustur sunu, & <foreign>v</foreign> Godwife & fv ælfgife mire
swustor dohtor.
 47. And selle mon Beornwynne minne blæwenan cyrtel is neaþene
unrenod, & hire betstan heafodgewædo.
 48. And selle man lufetate & ælfgifu & godwife hire
<foreign>iii</foreign> godwebbenan cyrtlas & wulfgife selle mon oðera hire dunnan cyrtla.
 49. And syðþan dælen hiredwifmen þæt oðer him
betwinum, & selle man Leofsige <foreign>iii</foreign> wahrift swylce þær þonne bet
sint, & <foreign>ii</foreign> sethrægl, & <foreign>ii</foreign> betstow.
 49. And dæle Godwif & ælfgifu þa oðra him betwinum,
& hira ægþer <foreign>ii</foreign> mydercan.
 50. And Leofsige hire ferdwæn & fo him siðþon to eallum
þam staðule & sitte þæron.
 50. And freoge mon Man hire goldsmið, & his eldestan sunu,
& þone ginstan, & his wif, & Wulfrices wif, þæs huntan,
& hira cild & ælfwaru heora dohtur on þæt gerad þe heo singe
ælcere wucan iiii sealtereas binnan xxx nihtan, & on xii monðum
ælcere wucan sealtere.
 52. And freoge mon Leofrune on þæt ilce rad &
Æþelflæde.
 52. And freoge mon Liofing æt Heanhlæwe & hæbbe his
land on þæt gerad þe he ælce gare gemune hy & hyre hlaford.
 53. And freoge mon Mannes cnapan.
 53. And heo byt for godes lufon þæt mon of þære manlafe
of Mundene & æt Gætesdene & of Langanforda þæt man selle
Wulfrice & his wife ii men, & Manne & his wife ii, & selle mon
Georie preoste Dufan sunu æt Mundene.
 55. Freoge mon þæne sceaphirde, & hæbbe alfwold þa
dægan.
 55. & gemune mon Æþeric hire godsunu mid suman men, &
selle mon Æþelwearde preoste þæne læssan sceaphirde, &
hæbbe ælfnoð Godere ogen þæt.
 56. And selle mon Gundbuþe Æþelferþes sunu se healta
cnapa.
 56. And Bogan hire preoste finde him mon of þære lafe anne
gionne mannan gif þær sy.
 57. Gif ne selle mon of Offanlege ane cu.
 57. And hæbbe Leofsige Æþelwynne & Siðemon & his
wif & Æþewine & his wif, & freoge mon hira cild &
Dudewine.
 58. Ælfgife hire magan Cynewynne dohtor, & Godwife Eadwynne
& Byrnflæde butan heo sealf heo frige & hire oðor selle.
 59. Eall se freot & eall seo ælmesse þe her gecweden is,
hyo wile þæt hit beo heore ælmessa for þon hit wæron hire
hlafordes begeto.
 60. And heo bit hire cynehlaford him to ælmissan for his
cynescipe for godes lufan & for Sancte Marigan þæt git ne læton
nænne monnan, mid feo hire cwide awendan.
 61. Leof hit becwæð hire hlaford hire to sellanne þam þe
hyo wolde, þe ne gelefde hire hire hlafordes magas.
 61. Þa lædde heo að to Hyccan, xx hund aða.
 62. Þær wæs ælfere on & ælfsige cild &
Byrnric wæs þa gerefa, & ealle þa yldestan men to Bedanforda, &
to Heortforda & heora wif.
 63. Ufonan þone cwide & þær þa of ærdo de Eadelm
hire hlafordes swustur sunu hire lond hire æt Standune.
 63. Þa sohte ic þæne cing & gesealde hym xx punda.
 64. Þa agef he me myn lond on his unþonc.
 64. Heo ne anbit na hyre cynehlaforde ne hire hlæfdian, ac gif
hwa bidde þæt ðes cwide standan ne mote, wurðe he aworpen on þa
wynstran hand þonne se hælend his dom deme & he wurðe gode swa lað
swa iudas wæs þy hyne selfne aheng.
 66. Buton hio hit get self awende, & þa ne lybben þe hit nu
becweden ys.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1498 (Whitelock 10)
B15.6.16.
Will of Æthelmær, Sawyer 1498: Whitelock 1930, no. 10.



 1. Æðelmær ealdorman cyð on dysum gewrite his
cynehlaforde and eallum his freondum his cwyde wæs to his nyhstan dæge.
 3. Þæt is þonne þæt ic gean Gode ærest for mine
sawle to Wintanceastre into Niwan Mynstre þære ic me restan wille, an hund
mancesa goldes and tyn pund peneta and min scrin and XIII hida landes ðær
þe Lufa ahte mid mete and mid mannum salswa hit stent, and ic æt minum
hlaforde gebohte ða hit to his handa forwyrht mid hundtwelftigum mancesum
goldes æt Cyrthugtune on Aþelwoldes bysceopes gewitnesse and ealra minra
geferena.
 10. And ic gean þæs landes æt Tudanwyrðe minum wife hire
dæg and æfter dæge gange mid hire lice þær ic reste for uncere
begra sawle.
 12. And ic gean into ealdan mynstre into sancte trinitate an hund
mancesa goldes and tyn pund penaga and II pund into nunnena mynstra and II pund
into mæssepreosta gylde and I pund into diacona gylde.
 15. And into Cristes cyricun on Cantuwarabyrig III pund and II pund
into sancte Agustyne and II pund into Hrofeceastere and II pund into Abbandune
and II pund into Rumesige and II pund into Wiltune and II pund into
Sceaftesbyrig and VI pund into Glæstyngabyrig and II pund into
Mealdelmesbyrig and I pund into Baðan and I pund into Cracgelade and I pund
into Burnan.
 21. And minum hiredcnihtum V pund to gedule.
 22. And ic becweðe minum cynehlaforde to heregeatuwum IIII beagus
on ðrym hund mancesum goldes and IIII sweord and VIII hors, feower
gerædode and IIII ungerædode, and IIII helmas and IIII byrnan and VIII
speru and VIII scyldas.
 25. And ic and minan yldran suna ðæs landes æt Igeneshamme
and þam gingran þæs æt Cottesmore and þæs ðe ðær.
 27. And ic an minum bearnum to gedale þreo hund mancesa goldes.
 28. And ic gean syððan minum wife ealles ðæs ðe ic gean
ge on lande ge on æhtum to þam forewordun þe wit mid wedde unc betweonan
gefæstnodon.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1499 (Whitelock 35)
B15.6.17.
Bishop Æthelmær to St. Edmunds, Sawyer 1499: Whitelock 1930, no. 35.



 1. On vre Drichtines name, ic Ailmer biscop kithe alle manne ihwat
ic habbe vnnen into sancte Eadmunde.
 2. Þat is þat lond at Hindringham and þat lond at Langham and
þat lond at Hildoluestone & þat lond at Suanetone mid alle þe þinge
þat ic þerto bigeten habbe and þertoeken half hundred marc silueres.
 5. And ihu so ic wende mine cuide ic wille þat þis stonde euere
vnawent mine soule to lisidnesse.
 7. And se þe þise quide wenden wille wende God his ansene him
from on domisday.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1500 (Rob 3)
B15.6.18.
Will of Æthelnoth, Sawyer 1500: Robertson 1956, no. 3.



 1. Æðelnoð se gerefa to Eastorege & Gænburg his wif
aræddan hiora erfe beforan Wulfrede arcebiscope & æðelhune his
mæsseprioste & Esne cyninges ðegne.
 3. Suæ hueðer hiora suæ leng lifes were foe to londe &
to alre æhte.
 4. Gif hio bearn hæbbe ðonne foe ðæt ofer hiora boega
dagas to londe & to æhte.
 5. Gif hio ðonne bearn næbbe & Wulfred archibiscop lifes
sie þonne foe he to ðæm londe & hit forgelde & ðæt wiorð
gedæle fore hiora gastas suæ ælmeslice & suæ rehtlice suæ he
him seolfa on his wisdome geleornie.
 9. & ða sprece nænig mon uferran dogor on nænge oðre
halfe oncærrende sie nymne suæ þis gewrit hafað.
 11. Þisses londes earan ðrie sulong æt Hægyðe ðorne.
 11. & gif hiora oðrum oððe bæm suð for gelimpe
biscop ðat lond gebycge suæ hie ðonne geweorðe.
 14. Heagyþe ðornes boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1501 (Whitelock 16.1)
B15.6.19.
Will of Æthelric, Sawyer 1501: Whitelock 1930, no. 16/1.



 1. Her cyð æþeric on þissum gewrite hwam he geann ofor his
dæig þæra æhta þe him God alæned hæfð.
 2. Þæt is ærest sona minum hlaforde syxti mancusa goldes
& mines swyrdes mid fetele & þarto twa hors & twa targan &
twegen francan.
 4. & ic geann Leofwynne minan wife ealles þæs þe ic
læfe hire dæig & ofor hire dæg gange þæt land on Boccinge
into Cristes circean þam hirede for uncera saule & for mines fæder
þe hit ær begeat, eall buton anre hide ic gean into þære cyrcean
þam preoste þe þar Gode þeowaþ.
 9. & ic geann þæs landes æt Rægene be westan into
sancte Paule þam bisceope to to geleohtenne & þar on Godes folce
cristendom to dælenne.
 11. & ic geann þarto twegra hida þe Eadric gafelaþ
ælce geare mid healfum punde & mid anre garan.
 13. & ic geann be eastan stræte ægþer ge wudas ge
feldas ælfstane bisceope into Coppanforde & þæs heges on
Glæsne.
 14. & ic geann þæs landes æt Norðho healf into sancte
Gregorie on Suþbyrig & healf into sancte Eadmunde on Bedericeswyrþe.
 16. Nu bidde ic þone bisceop ælfstan þæt he amundige mine
lafe & þa þincg þe ic hyre læfe & gif him God lifes geunne
lencg þonne unc þæt he gefultumige þæt ælc þara þinga stande
þe ic gecweden hæbbe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1503 (Whitelock 20)
B15.6.20.
Will of Ætheling Athelstan, Sawyer 1503: Whitelock 1930, no. 20.



 1. On Godes ælmihtiges naman.
 1. Ic æþestan æþeling geswutelige on þysum gewrite hu
ic mine are & mine æhta geunnen hæbbe Gode to lofe & minre saule
to alysednysse & mines fæder æþelredes cynges þe ic hit æt
geearnode.
 4. Þæt is ærest þæt ic geann þæt man gefreoge
ælcne witefæstne mann þe ic on spræce ahte.
 6. & ic geann in mid me þær ic me reste Criste &
sancte petre þæs landes æt Eadburgebyrig þe ic gebohte æt minan
fæder mid twam hund mancosan goldes be gewihte & mid V pundan seolfres.
 9. & þæt land æt Merelafan þe ic gebohte æt minum
fæder mid þridde healf hund mancosan goldes be gewihte & þæt land
æt Mordune þæt min fæder me to let ic gean into þære stowe for
uncer begra saule.
 12. & ic hine þæs bidde for Godes lufan & for sancta
Marian & for sancte Petres þæt hit standan mote.
 14. & þæs swurdes mid þam sylfrenan hiltan þe Wulfric
worhte & þone gyldenan fetels & þæne beh þe Wulfric worhte
& þone drencehorn þe ic ær æt þam hirede gebohte on ealdan
mynstre.
 17. & ic wille þæt man nime þæt feoh þe
Aþelwoldes laf me ah to gyldene þe ic for hyre are gesceoten hæbbe &
betæce ælfsige bisceope into ealdan mynstre for mine saule, þæt synd
XII pund be getale.
 20. & ic geann into Cristes cyrican on Cantwarabyrig þæs
landes æt Holungaburnan & þæs þe þærto hyrð buton
þære anre sulunge þe ic Siferðe geunnen hæbbe & þæs landes
æt Garwaldintune.
 23. & ic ann þæs landes æt Hryðerafelda into nunnan
mynstre Sancta Marian þances & ænne sylfrene mele on fif pundon &
into niwan mynstre ænne sylfrene hwer on fif pundon on þære halgan
þrymnesse naman þe seo stow is forehalig.
 27. & ic geann to Sceaftenesbyrig to þære halgan rode
& to sancte Eadwearde þara VI punda þe ic Eadmunde minon breðer
gewissod hæbbe.
 30. & ic geann minon fæder æþelræde cynge þæs
landes æt Cealhtune buton þam ehta hidan þe ic ælmære minon cnihte
geunnennen hæbbe & þæs landes æt Norðtune & þæs
landes æt Mollintune & þæs seolferhiltan swurdes þe Ulfcytel ahte
& þære byrnan þe mid Morkære is & þæs horses þe
þurbrand me geaf & þæs hwitan horses þe Leofwine me geaf.
 35. & ic geann Eadmunde minon breðer þæs swurdes þe
Offa cyng ahte & þæs swurdes mid þam pyttedan hiltan & anes
brandes & ænne seolforhammenne blædhorn & þara landa þe ic
ahte on East Englan & þæs landes æt Peacesdele.
 39. & ic wylle þæt mon gelæste ælce geare ane
dægfeorme þam hirede into Elig of þysse are on Sancte æþeldryðe
mæssedæg & gesylle þær to mynstre an hund penega & gefede
þær on þone dæg C þearfena & sy æfre seo ælmesse
gelæst gearhwamlice age land se þe age þa hwile þe Cristendom stande.
 44. & gif þa nellað þa ælmessan geforðian þe þa
land habbað gange seo ar into sancte æþeldryðe.
 45. & ic geann Eadwige minon breðer anes seolforhiltes
swurdes.
 46. & ic geann ælfsige bisceope þære gyldenan rode þe
is mid Eadrice Wynflæde suna & anne blacne stedan.
 48. & ic geann ælmære þæs landes æt Hamelandene
þe he ær ahte.
 49. & ic bidde minne fæder fur Godes ælmihtiges lufan
& fur minon þæt he þæs geunne þe ic him geunnen hæbbe.
 51. & ic geann Godwine Wulfnoðes suna þæs landes æt
Cumtune þe his fæder ær ahte.
 53. & ic geann ælfswyðe minre fostermeder for hire myclon
geearnungon þæs landes æt Westune þe ic gebohte æt minon fæder
mid þridde healf hund mancusan goldes be gewihte.
 56. & ic gean ælfwine minon mæssepreoste þæs landes
æt Heorulfestune & þæs malswurdes þe Wiðer ahte & mines
horses mid minon gerædon.
 58. & ic geann ælmære minon discþene þara ehta hida
æt Cateringatune & anes fagan stedan & þæs sceardan swurdes
& mines targan.
 60. & ic geann Siferðe þæs landes æt Hocganclife
& anes swurdes & anes horses & mines bohscyldes.
 62. & ic geann æþelwerde Stameran & Lyfingce þæs
landes æt Tywingan.
 63. & ic ann Leofstane Leofwines breðer Cwattes þære
landare þe ic of his breðer nam.
 64. & ic geann Leommære æt Biggrafan þæs landes þe
ic him ær of nam.
 65. & ic geann Godwine Dreflan þara þreora hida æt
Lutegaresheale.
 67. & ic geann Eadrice Wynflæde Sunu þæs swurdes þe
seo hand is on gemearcod.
 68. & ic geann æþelwine minon cnihte þæs swurdes þe
he me ær sealde.
 69. & ic geann ælfnoðe minon swurdhwitan þæs sceardan
malswurdes & minon heardeorhunton þæs stodes þe is on
Colungahrycge.
 71. & gehealde mon of minon golde ælfric æt Bertune &
Godwine Drefelan æt swa miclon swa Eadmund min broðor wat þæt ic heom
mid rihte to gyldanne ah.
 74. Nu þancige ic minon fæder mid ealre eadmodnesse on Godes
ælmihtiges naman þære andsware þe he me sende on frigedæg æfter
middessumeres mæssedæge be ælfgare ælffan suna.
 77. Þæt wæs þæt he me cydde mines fæder worde
þæt ic moste be Godes leafe & be his geunnan minre are & minra
æhta swa me mæst ræd þuhte ægðer ge for Gode ge for worulde.
 80. & þysse andsware is to gewitnesse Eadmund min broðor
& ælfsige bisceop & Byrhtmær abbod & ælmær ælfrices
sunu.
 82. Nu bidde ic ealle þa witan þe minne cwyde gehyron rædan
ægðer ge gehadode ge læwede þæt hi beon on fultume þæt min
cwyde standan mote swa mines fæder leaf on minon cwyde stænt.
 85. Nu cyðe ic þæt ealle þa þingc þe ic to Gode into
Godes cyrican & Godes þeowan geunnen hæbbe sy gedon for mines leofan
fæder sawle æþelredes cyncges & for minre & ælfþryðe
minre ealdemodor þe me afedde & for ealra þara þe me to þyson godan
gefylstan.
 89. & se þe þysne cwyde þurh ænig þingc awende habbe
him wið God ælmihtigne gemæne & wið Sancta Marian & wið
Sancte Peter & wið ealle þa þe Godes naman heriað.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1504 (HarmD 20)
B15.6.21.
Will of Ealdorman Æthelwold, Sawyer 1504: Harmer 1914, no. 20.



 1. Her geswutelad þæt Eadred cing geuþe þæt land æt
Wilig þa twelf hida to scrudfultume þam hirede into Ealdan Mynstre.
 3. Leof, æþelwold ealdarman cyþ his leofan cynehlaforde
Eadred cynge hu ic wille ymbe þa landare þe ic æt mine hlaforde
geearnode.
 5. Ærest Gode & þære halgan stowe æt þam
bisceopstole æt Wintanceastre, þam bisceope & þam hiwum, þæt
land æt Wilig þa twelf hida to scrudfultume, þæt hi me on heora
gebeddredenne hæbben, swa swa ic him to gelyfe.
 9. & þam cinge minne hæregeatwa, feower sweord &
feower spæra & feower scyldas & feower beagas, twegen on
hundtwelftigum mancosun & twegen on hundeahtatigum, & feower hors &
twa sylfrene fata.
 12. & minum breðer Eadrice þæt land æt Oceburnan
& æt æscesdune & æt Cegham & æt Wessingatune.
 13. & æþelstane minæ breðer þet land æt
Bradanwætere & þet æt Niwantune.
 15. & ælfsige mine broðorsuna þet land æt Carcel.
 15. & ælfstanes suna mines broþor þæt land æt
Cleran.
 16. & eall þæt yrfe þæ ic hæbbe on lænelandum,
þonne wylle ic þæt þæt sie gedeled for mine sawle swa swa ic nu
þam freondum sæde þæ ic to spræc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1505 (Whitelock 12)
B15.6.22.
Will of Æthelwold, Sawyer 1505: Whitelock 1930, no. 12.



 1. Þis is Aþelwoldis cwyde.
 1. Þæt is ærest þæt he bitt his cynehlaford for Godes
lufon and for his cynescipe þæt his cwyde standen mote on þæm
þingon þe he æt þe gegearnod hæfþ and æt þinum foregengan.
 4. Þæt is ærest þæt he gean for his sule XX mancusas
goldes into Niwan Menstre and ane cuppan him to sawelsceatte and XX mancusas
goldes his gebroþrun into Abbandune.
 7. And he becwæþ his cynehlaford him to heregeattewan ænne
beah on XXX mancusas and twu lecga and II hors and II sweord and II scyldas and
twa speru.
 9. And he becweæþ his wife þa X hida æt Maningforda þa
hwile þe hire dæg wære and aftær hire dæge into Niwan Mynstre
for heora begra sawle.
 11. And he hire becwæþ XXX mancusas goldes and ane cuppan.
 12. And ic gean minum suna anre hide landes æt Uptune and anre
lecge.
 13. And ic gean þæm ealdermen anre crusnan and ic gean
Leofwine oþere crusnan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1506 (Rob 32)
B15.6.23.
Will of Æthelwyrd, Sawyer 1506: Robertson 1956, no. 32.



 1. Þis is æðelwyrdæs cwide mid geðæhte Odan
ærcebisscopæs & ðæs hioredæs æt Cristæs cirican.
 2. Þæt is ðonne þæt æðelwyrd bruce ðæs
landæs on Geocham his dæg on freodome be Godes leafe & be ðæs
ærcebisscopæs & be ðæs heoredæs, ðonne yftær his dæge
Eadric, gif he libbe, his dæg wið ðon gofole ðe hit gecwedæn is,
ðæt sint V pund & ælce gære æne dæg feorme in hiowum.
 6. Þæt is ðonne XL sæstra ealað, LX hlafa, weðær
& flicce & an hriðres læuw, II cesas, IIII hæn fugulas & V
pænningas to beðe.
 8. & ðis sio gelæst to sancte Michaelæs tide.
 9. & bio he ælces wites wyrðe.
 9. & gif hwilc forwyrht man hiowan gesæce bio se ðingað
swa hit medlic sia be ðæs geltes meðe.
 11. Gif hit ðonne gebærige ðæt æðelwyrd læng
libbe ðone Eadric ðonne fo æðelgifu to wið ðan ilcan gofole ðe
hit hær beufan gecwedæn is hire dæg.
 14. Gif hit þonne geberige ðæt æðelwyrd læng libbe
ðone Eadric oððe æðelgifu & he ða unætnessa gebidan scel
agefe man land & boc in yfter his dæge in mid him selfum for hine &
for ða ðe him land fram com.
 18. Ðisæs is Oda ærcebisscop gewita & Byrhtere mæsse
preost Cænwig mæsse preost Wealdred mæsse preost Sigefreð diacon
Osweald diacon Freðegod diacon Sigered diacon Heared diacon Sired preost
Byrhtmund Eadsige Eadelm Byrhtsige æðelm Byrhtsige Byrhtwig Liofric Sielm
Wulfred Cænric Eadweard.
 18. Ðisæs wes gewita Eadelm abbod æt sancte Agustine &
Byrhtsige diacon æorlebyrht mæsse preost Roðin mæsse preost
Bærhtram mæsse Beornmund preost & ða <foreign>III</foreign> ælfstanas
æðwlweald Eadmund Wenelm Cynsige Eadric Liofing Eadsige Wulfelm Sigefreð
Liofric Liofstan Eadstan Eadmund stan cynges ðægen Byrhtric Wyhtgar
Wulfstan & ða <foreign>III</foreign> geferscipas Innanburwara & utanburhwara &
micle mættan.
 20. Þis is seo gerednæs þe Eadric hæfð wið ðane
hired to Cristes cirican.
 21. Þæt is ðonne ðæt Eadric gesealde ðan hirede to
gerisenum V pund, twa ðæm ældæstum & ðreo eallum hirede, an
þæt gerad þæt he hebbe land mid fullre unnan ælde & gegeðe
mid eallæn ðan netwyrðan ðingum lessan & maran ðe to ðæm
lande belimppað unbesprecæn wið æghwylcne lifes man.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1507 (HarmD 11)
B15.6.24.
Will of King Alfred, Sawyer 1507: Harmer 1914, no. 11.



 1. Ic ælfred cingc mid Godes gife & mid geþeahtunge
æþeredes ercebisceopes & ealra Westseaxena witena gewitnesse, smeade
ymbe minre sawle þearfe & ymbe min yrfe þæt me God & mine yldran
forgeafon & ymbe þæt yrfe þæt Aðulf cingc min fæder us
þrim gebroðrum becwæð, Aþelbolde & æðerede & me &
swylc ure swylce lengest wære, þæt se fenge to eallum.
 6. Ac hit gelamp þæt æðelbold gefor.
 7. & wyt æþered, mid ealra Westseaxena witena gewitnesse,
uncerne dæl oðfæstan æþelbyrhte cingce uncrum mæge on þa
gerædene þe he hit eft gedyde unc swa gewylde swa hit þa wæs þa wit
hit him oðfæstan.
 11. & he þa swa dyde, ge þæt yrfe, ge þæt he mid
uncre gemanan begeat, & þæt he sylf gestrynde.
 13. Þa hit swa gelamp þæt æþered to feng, þa bæd
ic hine beforan urum witum eallum þæt wyt þæt yrfe gedældon &
he me ageafe minne dæl.
 15. Þa sæde he me þæt he naht eaðe ne mihte todælan
forþon he hæfde ful oft ær ongefangen.
 16. & he cwæð þæs þe he on uncrum gemanan gebruce
& gestrynde æfter his dæge he nanum menn sel ne uðe þonne me.
 18. & ic þæs þa wæs wel geþafa.
 19. Ac hit gelamp þæt we ealle on hæðenum folce gebrocude
wæron.
 20. Þa spræce wyt ymbe uncre bearn, þæt hy sumre are
beþorftan, sælde unc on þam brocum swa unc sælde.
 22. Þa wæron we on gemote æt Swinbeorgum, þa gecwædon
wit on Westseaxena witena gewitnesse þæt swaðer uncer leng wære,
þæt he geuðe oðres bearnum þara landa þe wyt sylfe begeaton &
þara landa þe unc Aðulf cingc forgeaf be Aðelbolde lifiendum butan
þam þe he us þrim gebroðrum gecwæð.
 26. & þæs uncer ægðer oþrum his wedd sealde,
swaðer uncer leng lifede, þæt se fenge ægþer ge to lande ge to
madmum & to eallum his æhtum butan þam dæle þe uncer
gehwæðer his bearnum becwæð.
 31. Ac hit gelamp þæt æðered cingc gefor.
 31. Þa ne cydde me nan mann nan yrfegewrit ne nane gewitnesse
þæt hit ænig oðer wære butan swa wit on gewitnesse ær
gecwædon.
 33. Þa gehyrde we nu manegu yrfegeflitu, nu þa lædde ic
Aþulfes cinges yrfegewrit on ure gemot æt Langandene & hit man
arædde beforan eallum Westseaxena witum.
 36. Þa hit aræd wæs, þa bæd ic hy ealle for minre
lufan, & him min wedd bead þæt ic hyra næfre nænne ne oncuðe
forþon þe hy on riht spræcon, & þæt hyra nan ne wandode ne for
minan lufan ne for minum ege þæt hy þæt folcriht arehton, þy læs
ænig man cweðe þæt ic mine mægcild oððe yldran oððe
gingran mid wo fordemde.
 41. & hy þa ealle to rihte gerehton & cwædon þæt
hy nan rihtre riht geþencan ne mihtan ne on þam yrfegewrite gehyran.
 43. Nu hit eall agan is þæron oð þine hand, þonne þu
hit becweðe & sylle swa gesibre handa swa fremdre swaðer þe leofre
sy.
 45. & hi ealle me þæs hyra wedd sealdon & hyra
handsetene þæt be hyra life hit nænig mann næfre ne onwende on nane
oðre wisan butan swa swa ic hit sylf gecweðe æt þam nyhstan dæge.
 49. Ic Ælfred Westseaxena cingc mid Godes gyfe & mid þisse
gewitnesse, gecweðe hu ic ymbe min yrfe wille æfter minum dæge.
 51. Ærest ic an Eadwearde minum yldran suna þæs landes
æt Strætneat on Triconscire & Heortigtunes & þa bocland ealle
þe Leofheah hylt & þæt land æt Carumtune & æt Cylfantune
& æt Burnhamme & æt Wedmor, & ic eom fyrmdig to þam hiwum
æt Ceodre þæt hy hine ceosan on þa gerad þe we ær gecweden
hæfdon, mid þam lande æt Ciwtune & þam þe þærto hyrað.
 57. & ic him an þæs landes æt Cantuctune & æt
Bedewindan & æt Pefesigge & Hysseburnan & æt Suttune &
æt Leodridan & æt Aweltune.
 60. & ealle þa bocland þe ic on Cent hæbbe & æt
þam nyðeran Hysseburnan & æt Cyseldene, agyfe man in to
Wintanceastre on þa gerad þe hit min fæder ær gecwæð, &
þæt min sundorfeoh þæt ic Ecgulfe oðfæste on þam neoðeran
Hysseburnan.
 64. & þam gingran minan suna þæt land æt Eaderingtune
& þæt æt Dene & þæt æt Meone & æt Ambresbyrig
& æt Deone & æt Sturemynster & æt Gifle & æt
Crucern & æt Hwitancyrican & æt Axanmuðan & æt
Branecescumbe & æt Columtune & æt Twyfyrde & æt
Mylenburnan & æt Exanmynster & æt Suðeswyrðe & æt
Liwtune & þa land þe þærto hyran, þæt synd ealle þe ic on
Wealcynne hæbbe butan Triconscire.
 71. & minre yldstan dehter þæne ham æt Welewe &
þære medemestan æt Clearna & æt Cendefer & þære
gingestan þone ham æt Welig & æt æsctune & æt
Cippanhamme.
 73. & æðelme mines broðer suna þone ham æt
Ealdingburnan & æt Cumtune & æt Crundellan & æt Beadingum
& æt Beadingahamme & æt Burnham & æt þunresfelda &
æt æscengum.
 76. & Aþelwolde mines broðor suna þone ham æt
Godelmingum & æt Gyldeforda & æt Stæningum.
 78. & Osferðe minum mæge þone ham æt Beccanlea &
æt Hryðeranfelda & æt Diccelingum & æt Suðtune & æt
Lullingmynster & æt Angemæringum & æt Felhhamme & þa
land þe þærto hyran.
 81. & Ealhswiðe þone ham æt Lambburnan & æt
Waneting & æt Eðandune.
 83. & minum twam sunum an þusend punda, ægðrum fif hund
punda.
 84. & minre yldstan dehter & þære medemestan &
þære gingstan & Ealhswiðe, him feowrum feower hund punda, ælcum
an hund punda.
 86. & minra ealdormanna ælcum an hund mangcusa &
æþelme & Aðelwolde & Osferðe eac swa & æþerede
ealdormenn an sweord on hundteontigum mancusum.
 88. & þam mannum þe me folgiað, þe ic nu on Eastertidum
feoh sealde, twa hund punda agyfe man him & dæle man him betweoh,
ælcum swa him to gebyrian wille æfter þære wisan þe ic him nu
dælde.
 92. & þam ercebisceope C mancusa & Esne bisceope &
Wærferðe bisceope & þam æt Scireburnan.
 93. Eac swa gedæle for me & for minne fæder & for
þa frynd þe he foreþingode & ic foreþingie, twa hund punda, fiftig
mæssepreostum ofer eall min rice, fiftig earmum Godes þeowum, fiftig
earmum þearfum, fiftig to þære cyrican þe ic æt reste.
 97. & ic nat naht gewislice hwæðer þæs feos swa micel
is, ne ic nat þeah his mare sy, butan swa ic wene.
 99. Gyf hit mare sy, beo hit him eallum gemæne þe ic feoh
becweden hæbbe.
 100. & ic wille þæt mine ealdormenn & mine þenigmenn
þær ealle mid syndan & þis þus gedælan.
 102. Þonne hæfde ic ær on oðre wisan awriten ymbe min
yrfe þa ic hæfde mare feoh & ma maga & hæfde monegum mannum
þa gewritu oðfæst & on þas ylcan gewitnesse hy wæron awritene.
 105. Þonne hæbbe ic nu forbærned þa ealdan þe ic
geahsian mihte.
 106. Gif hyra hwylc funden bið, ne forstent þæt naht,
forþam ic wille þæt hit nu þus sy mid Godes fultume.
 108. & ic wille þa menn þe þa land habbað, þa word
gelæstan þe on mines fæder yrfegewrite standað swa swa hy fyrmest
magon.
 110. & ic wylle gif ic ænigum menn ænig feoh unleanod
hæbbe, þæt mine magas þæt huru geleanian.
 111. & ic wylle þa menn þe ic mine bocland becweden
hæbbe, þæt hy hit ne asyllan of minum cynne ofer heora dæg.
 113. Ac ic wille ofer hyra dæg þæt hit gange on þa
nyhstan hand me butan hyra hwylc bearn hæbbe.
 114. Þonne is me leofast þæt hit gange on þæt stryned
on þa wæpnedhealfe þa hwile þe ænig þæs wyrðe sy.
 116. Min yldra fæder hæfde gecweden his land on þa
sperehealfe næs on þa spinlhealfe.
 118. Þonne gif ic gesealde ænigre wifhanda þæt he
gestrynde, þonne forgyldan mine magas, & gif hy hit be þan libbendan
habban wyllan.
 120. Gif hit elles sy, gange hit ofer hyra dæg swa swa we ær
gecweden hæfdon.
 121. Forþon ic cweðe þæt hi hit gyldan, forþon hy foð
to minum, þe ic syllan mot swa wifhanda swa wæpnedhanda swaðer ic
wylle.
 124. & ic bidde on Godes naman & on his haligra þæt
minra maga nan ne yrfewearda ne geswence nan nænig cyrelif þara þe ic
foregeald.
 126. & me Westseaxena witan to rihte gerehton þæt ic hi
mot lætan swa freo swa þeowe, swaðer ic wille.
 127. Ac ic for Godes lufan & for minre sawle þearfe wylle
þæt hy syn heora freolses wyrðe & hyra cyres.
 129. & ic on Godes lifiendes naman beode þæt hy nan man ne
brocie ne mid feos manunge ne mid nænigum þingum þæt hy ne motan
ceosan swylcne mann swylce hy wyllan.
 132. & ic wylle þæt man agyfe þam hiwum æt Domrahamme
hyra landbec & hyra freols swylce hand to ceosenne swylce him leofast sy,
for me & for ælflæde & for þa frynd þe heo foreþingode
& ic foreþingie.
 135. & sec man eac on cwicum ceape ymbe minre sawle þearfe
swa hit beon mæge & swa hit eac gerysne sy & swa ge me forgyfan
wyllan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1508 (HarmD 10)
B15.6.25.
Will of Alfred, Ealdorman, Sawyer 1508: Harmer 1914, no. 10.



 1. Ic elfred dux hatu writan & cyðan an ðissum gewrite
elfrede regi & allum his weotum & geweotan, & ec swylce minum
megum & minum gefeorum, þa men þe ic mines erfes & mines
boclondes seolest onn, ðet is þonne Werburg min wif & uncer gemene
bearn.
 5. Þæt is þonne et erestan an Sondenstede & on
Selesdune XXXII hida & on Westarham XX hida & on Cloppaham XXX hida
& on Leangafelda VI hida & on Horsalege X hida & on Netelamstyde
VI hida.
 8. Ic elfred dux sello Werburge & Alhdryðe uncum gemenum
bearne, æfter minum dege, þas lond mid cwice erfe & mid earðe
& mid allum ðingum ðe to londum belimpað.
 11. & twa þusendu swina ic heom sello mid þem londum, gif
hio hio gehaldeð mid þare clennisse þe uncer wordgecweodu seondan.
 13. & hio gebrenge et Sancte Petre min twa wergeld, gif
ðet Godes willa seo þet heo þæt fereld age.
 15. Ond efter Werburge dege seo Alhðryðe þa lond
unbefliten on Sondemstyde & on Selesdune & on Leangafelda.
 16. Ond gif heo bearn hebbe, feo ðet bearn to ðem
londum efter hire.
 17. Gif heo bearn nebbe, feo ðonne an hire rehtfederen sio
neste hond to þem londe ond to ðem erfe.
 19. & swa hwylc minra fedrenmega swa ðet sio þæt
hine to ðan gehagige þæt he þa oðoro lond begeotan mege &
wille, þonne gebygcge he þa lond et hire mid halfe weorðe.
 22. Ond swe hwylc mon swa ðet sio þet ðes londes bruce
ofer minne deg on Cloppaham, þanne geselle he CC peninga eghwylce gere
to Ceortesege for elfredes sawle to feormfultume.
 25. Ond ic sello eðelwalde minum sunu III hida boclondes, II
hida on Hwetedune, anes hides an Gatatune, & him sello þerto C swina.
 27. & gif se cyning him geunnan wille þes folclondes to
ðem boclonde, þonne hebbe he & bruce.
 28. Gif hit þet ne sio, þonne selle hio him swa hwaðer swa
hio wille, swa ðet lond an Horsalege, swa ðet an Leangafelda.
 30. Ond ic sello Berhtsige minum mege an hide boclondes on
Lencanfelda & þerto C swina.
 32. & geselle hio C swina to Cristes cirican for me & fer
mine sawle, & C to Ceortesege & þone oferecan mon gedele gind
mynsterhamas to Godes ciricum in Suþregum & in Cent þa hwile þe
hio lestan willen.
 35. Ond ic sello Sigewulfe minum mege ofer Werburge deg þet
lond an Netelhæmstyde.
 36. Ond Sigulf geselle of ðem londe C peninga to Cristes
cirican ond eghwylc þara erfewearda þe efter him to ðem londe
foe, þonne ageofen hio þa ilcan elmessan to Cristes cirican for elfredes
sawle, þa hwile þe fulwiht sio, & hit man on ðem londe begeotan
mege.
 41. Ond ic sello Eadrede minum mege þet lond on Fearnlege
efter Eðelredes dege, gif he hit to him geearnian wile.
 42. & he geselle of ðem londe XXX ombras cornes eghwelce
gere to Hrofescestre.
 44. Ond sio ðis lond gewriten & unbefliten efter Eadredes
dege in Aelfredes rehtmeodrencynn ða hwile þe fulwihte sio on Angelcynnes
ealonde.
 47. Ðeos foresprec & þas gewriotu þe herbeufan awreotene
stondað, ic ælfred willio & wille þæt hio sion soðfestlice
forðweard getrymed me & minum erfeweardum.
 49. Gif ðet ðonne God ællmehtig geteod habbe ond me
þet on lene gelið þet me gesibbra erfeweard forðcymeð
wepnedhades & acenned weorðeð, ðanne ann ic ðem ofer minne
deg alles mines erfes to brucenne swa him leofust sio.
 53. And swa hwylc mon swa ðas god & þas geofe & þas
gewrioto & þas word mid rehte haldan wille ond gelestan, gehalde hine
heofones cyning in þissum life ondwardum & eac swa in þem towardan
life.
 56. Ond swa hwylc mon swa hio wonie & breoce, gewonie him God
almahtig his weorldare ond eac swa his sawle are in eona eonum.
 59. Her sindon ðæra manna naman awritene ðe ðeosse wisan
geweotan sindon.
 61. Ic æðered arcebisceop mid ðære halgan Cristes rode
tacne ðas word & ðas wisan festnie & write.
 63. Þis is elfredes erfegewrit.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1509 (Rob 27)
B15.6.26.
Bequest of Alfred, Thegn, Sawyer 1509: Robertson 1956, no. 27.



 1. Ic ælfreod ðein an þæs landes æt Stanham ofer
minne dæge minan wifan to hire dægi & ofer hiere dæg on niwan
minister on Winceacester uncer begea sawla þearfe swa freolre swa cing
æthelstan minan leofan leord ge me gegifan.
 4. & nanan manan hit on enig oþer wænde gif þonne ic
heafan gifan foran ic hit self on noþer wænde gifan.
 6. & nanan on niwan minister on Winceacester hit ut sillan on
enig wænde.
 7. & si habban on æcnisse & sind gewritan gewitenesse
& hiera handa setene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1510 (Rob 6)
B15.6.27.
Will of Badanoth Beotting, Sawyer 1510: Robertson 1956, no. 6.



 1. Ic Badanoð Beotting cyðo & writan hato hu min willa is
ðet min ærfe lond fere ðe ic et Aeðeluulfe cyninge begæt &
gebohte mid fullum friodome on æce ærfe, æfter minum dege & minra
ærfewearda, ðet is mines wifes & minra bearna.
 4. Ic wille ærist me siolfne Gode allmehtgum forgeofan to ðere
stowe æt Cristes cirican & min bearn ðer liffest gedoan & wiib
& cild ðæm hlaforde & higum & ðære stowe befestan ober
minne dei to friðe & to mundbyrde & to hlaforddome on ðæm
ðingum ðe him ðearf sie.
 9. & hie brucen londes hiora dei & higon gefeormien to
minre tide swæ hie soelest ðurhtion megen & higon us mid heora
godcundum godum swe gemynen swæ us arlic & him ælmeslic sie.
 11. & ðonne ofer hiora dei wifes & cilda ic bebeode on
Godes noman ðæt mon agefe ðæt lond inn higum to heora beode him to
brucanne on ece ærfe swæ him liofast sie.
 14. & ic biddo higon for Godes lufe ðæt se monn se higon
londes unnen to brucanne ða ilcan wisan leste on swæsendum to minre tide
& ða godcundan lean minre saule mid gerece swe hit mine ærfenuman
ær onstellen.
 18. Ðonne is min willa ðæt ðissa gewriota sien twa gelice,
oðer habben higon mid boecum oðer mine ærfeweardas heora dei.
 20. Ðonne is ðes londes ðe ic higum selle, XVI gioc ærðe
londes & medwe all on æce ærfe to brucanne ge minne dei ge æfter
swæ to ationne swæ me mest red & liofast sie.
 23. Ceolnoð ðiss writo & festnie mid Cristes rode
tacne.
 24. Alchhere ðiss writo & ðeafie.
 25. Bægmund ðiss writo & ðeafie.
 26. Hysenoð ðiss writo & ðeafie.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1511 (Whitelock 11)
B15.6.28.
Will of Brihtric and Ælfswith, Sawyer 1511: Whitelock 1930, no. 11.



 1. Þis is Byrhtrices & ælfswyðe his wifes nihsta cwide
ðe hi cwædon on Meapaham on heora maga gewitnæsse, þæt wæs
Wulfstan Ucca & Wulfsie his broðor & Sired ælfredes suna &
Wulfsie se Blaca & Wine preost & ælfgar on Meapaham & Wulfeh
Ordeges suna & ælfeh his broðor & Byrhtwara ælfrices laf &
Bryhtric hyræ mæg & ælfstan bisceop.
 6. Ærest his kynehlaforde ænne beah on hundeahtotigan
mancysan goldes & an handsecs on ealswa miclan & feower hors, twa
gerædede, & twa sweord gefetelsode & twegen hafocas & ealle his
heador hundas.
 10. & ðære hlæfdian ænne beah on ðrittigan
mancysan goldes & ænne stedan to forespræce þæt se cwyde standan
moste.
 12. & for his sawle & his yldrena into sancte Andreæ twa
sulung æt Denetune.
 13. & hio for hire sawle & hire yldrena twa æt
Langanfelda & þiderin for hy ðrittig mancys goldes & ænne
sweorbeah on XL mancysan & ane cuppan seolfrene & healfne bænd
gyldenne & ælce geare to heora gemynde twegra daga feorme of
Hæslholte & II of Woðringaberan & II of Bærlingan & II of
Hærigeardeshamme.
 18. & to Cristes circan LX mancys goldes XXX ðam biscope, XXX
ðam hirode, & ænne sweorbeah on LXXX mancys & twa cuppan seolfrene
& ðæt land æt Meapaham.
 21. & to sancte Augustine ðrittig mancys goldes & twa
cuppan seolfrene & healfne bænd gyldenne.
 23. & þæt land æt Dæræntan Byrhwara hire dæg
& æfter hire dæge into sancte Andree for unc & uncre yldran.
 24. & Bærlingas Wulfehe & he selle X hund pænega into
sancte Andree for unc & uncre yldran.
 26. & Wulfsie Woðringabyras innon þæt gecynde.
 27. & Sirede Hæslholt innon þæt gecynde & Wulfege
& ælfege his breðer Herigeardeshamme innon þæt gecynde, Wulfege
þæt inland & ælfege þæt utland.
 29. & Wulfstane Uccan Wolcnesstede innon þæt gecynde &
an handsecs on ðrim pundan.
 30. & ða tyn hyda on Strættune into þæm mynstre to
Wolcnesstede.
 31. & þæt land æt Fealcnaham æfter Byrhwara dæge
into sancte Andree for ælfric hire hlaford & his yldran swa heora cwide
wæs.
 33. & Bromleah æfter Brihtwara dæge into sancte Andrea
swa ælfric hire hlaford hit becwæð for hine & his yldran.
 35. & Snodingcland eac into sancte Andrea æfter hire dæge
swa ælfere hit becwæð ælfrices fæder & he seoððan on
gewitnesse Eadgife ðære hlæfdian & Odan arcebisceopes &
ælfeges ælfstanes suna & ælfrices his broðor & ælfnoþes
Pilian & Godwines æt Fecham & Eadrices æt Ho & ælfsies
preostes on Crogdæne.
 40. & Wulfstane LX mancos goldes to dælanne for unc &
uncre yldran & oðer swilc Wulfsige to dælanne & hæbban heom
wið God gemæne gif hy hit ne don.
 43. & Wulfsige Tydiceseg & ða boc innon þæt gecynde
& II spuran on III pundan.
 44. & ic bidde for Godes lufan minne leofan hlaford þæt he
ne ðafige þæt ænig man uncerne cwide awænde.
 46. & ic bidde ealle Godes freond þæt hi ðarto filstan.
 46. Hæbbe wið God gemæne þe hit brece & God him sy
symle milde þe hit healdan wille.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1512 (Whitelock 7)
B15.6.29.
Brihtric Grim to Old Minster, Winchester, Sawyer 1512: Whitelock 1930, no. 7.



 1. Her is geswutulad þet Brichtric Grim gean þes landes æt
Rimtune into ealdan mynstre æfter his dege mid þere hide þe he
