Ch 175 (Birch 346)
B15.8.25.
Bounds, Sawyer 175: Birch 1885-99, no. 346.



 1. Ærest up of crægean on fulan riðe.
 2. Andlang riðe oð þone fæstendic.
 2. Andlang dices oð þæt gebyhte.
 2. Of þam gebyhte andlang hagan oð cyninges healh.
 3. Þanon andlang hagan ut on crægean.
 4. Andlang crægean oþ ðone hagan.
 4. Andlang hagan oð pæðfeld.
 5. Þanon andlang hagan oð æscburnan.
 5. Of ðam burnan andlang hagan on casincgstræt east andlang
stræte on scoffoces sæ.
 6. Þanon norð andlang stræte oð lytlanlea.
 7. Þanon east andlang mearce oð enede mere suð rihte of ðam
mere to burnes stede.
 8. Þanon andlang hagan oþ casingstræt.
 9. Andlang stræte on þone calewan telgan.
 9. Þanon ut on crægean.
 10. Swa eft on fulan riðe.
 10. <foreign>Hæc sunt nomina pastuum porcorum</foreign>:
 11. Helfreðingdenn, Hunbealdinghola, Frumesingleah, Burnes
stedesdenn, Heanyfre.
 12. Þæs gemære is on easthealfe spachrycg.
 13. On suðan plumwearding pearrocas.
 13. On westan lind cylne.
 14. On norþan auene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 179 (Birch 356)
B15.8.26.
Bounds, Sawyer 179: Birch 1885-99, no. 356.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemæru to hal hagan wudes & feldes
þ is ærest æt þæs bernes ende æt þæs wæteres sprynge.
 2. Æfter þam wætere into hallinga homme.
 3. Of þam homme into rames cumbe.
 3. Æfter þam grenan wege into þære mylnstige.
 4. Of þære mylen stige into cyles dene to þam haran stane.
 5. Of þam stane into scobbe stane.
 5. Of scobbe stane suþ to þam lytlan beorge.
 6. And swa suþ ofer turcendene into þam crum dæle.
 7. Of þam crum dæle suþ & west to þære ealdan dic.
 8. And <foreign>II</foreign> æceras wið utan.
 8. And swa west wið þan heafdan.
 8. Þ hit cymð to þære ealdan dune.
 9. Andlang dune west þ hit cymeð into dina more.
 10. Of dina more into hehstanes pytte.
 10. Of hehstanes pytte eastward east weard bi þam heafdan to
þam hæðenan byrigelse wiþ heallinga weallan.
 12. Swa east ofer þa sealt stræt.
 12. To þam crundælan.
 13. Of þam crundælan bi þam heafdan.
 13. To þæs bernes ende.
 14. Ðis is þæs wudes gemære ærest of hram broces forda
svþ þ hit cymeþ to þam slæde.
 15. Of þam slæde þæt hit cymþ to bacga slæde.
 16. Of þam slæde þ hit cymeð up to þam hrycge.
 16. Of þam hrycge west þæt hit cymeþ to þam lytlan
sceagan.
 17. And swa west ofer þa salt stræte.
 18. To þæs wudes efese west swa þæt hit cumeð to
þære hwitan dic.
 19. And swa adun ofer þa ecge þ hit cymð to crimes hylle.
 19. Of grimes hylle þ hit cymþ to sponwælle hæfdan.
 20. And swa west þ hit cymð to þære bradan ac.
 21. Of þære bradan ac þ hit cymð to þære wohgan
apeldran.
 22. Þanon norð rihte þ hit cymeþ to þære haran
apeldran to þam broke.
 23. Æfter þam broce þ hit cymð to þam gemyþan.
 23. Of þam gemyþan eastriht þ hit cymeþ to Buddinc wican
eastrihte.
 24. Swa ut of þam wudu.
 25. Of þæs wudes efese.
 25. Þ hit cymeþ to sibbe stapele.
 26. Of sibbe stapole æfter þam slæde þ hit cymeþ to
þeofa dene.
 26. And swa eastriht be þam wuda.
 27. Þ hit cymeð to mær apeldran.
 27. And swa æfter þa norðmæstan port weig.
 28. Þ hit cymð eft into ramforda.
 29. Ðis his þa lond ge mæra of halhegan into wontes forda.
 29. Of wontes forda in wontes dic.
 30. Of wontes dic in Ceor.
 30. Of þa Ceore in cisburne.
 31. Of cisburne in cattes stycc.
 31. Of cattes stycce in grene weg onlong þæs grene weges in
þreom ac.
 32. Of þreom ac.
 32. In gundes stige.
 33. Of gundes stige in neowe heg.
 33. Æfter þæm neowe hege þæt cyme in laure.
 34. Æfter laure þ cyme in lauric.
 34. Æfter lauric þ cyme in balde næsces ford.
 35. Of balde.
 35. Næsces forde in þa wærriht ac.
 36. Of þ wærriht ac bi þ wadlond.
 36. Of þa wad londe in gearri ford.
 37. Of gearri ford in bradi burne.
 37. Of brade burne in þa alde dic.
 38. Of þære alde dic in sice æt halheogan betweonen griman
& halheogan in wær legan.
 39. Of pærlega in sæferne stream.
 40. Ðis synd þa lond gemæra in halheogan on west half
sæferne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 201 (Birch 462)
B15.8.27.
Bounds, Sawyer 201: Birch 1885-99, no. 462.



 1. Ðis syndon ðæs landesgemæru æt Grimanleage.
 1. Ærest of Seferne be higna gemære on sceacan halh & swa
be þære alra ofesce in ða neowan dic.
 3. And swa up ondlang þære neowan dic þæt on þa aldan
hegestowe.
 4. And syððan a andlang þære ealdan hege stowe on þone
folc hearpað þæt up ondlang þæs hearpoðes to þæm Criste
mæle.
 6. And swa fram þam Cristes mæle of dun weard ondlang anre
ealdre dic west weard & norð weard þæt in ælr broc.
 7. And seoððan a swa alr broc ligeð upweard to mos setena
gemære.
 8. And swa big mos setena gemære ofer siht ferð on þone
ealdan kyninges hagan.
 9. Þæt swa andlang þæs aldan cyninges hagan norð weard
to ðam aldan stod falde.
 11. And þonne fram ðam aldan stod falde bi beonot setena
gemære on sihferð.
 12. And swa ondlang sihtferdes in bæle.
 12. Swa ondlang bæles in Seferne.
 14. Ðis syndon ðæs londes gemære æt mosleage of
ðæm aldan felda west reht on gearnec.
 15. Swa ondlang broces on ðone gemær hagan ofer fild burnan on
timber rycg.
 16. Ðonon on beosting hrycg swa east weard on blacan brygce.
 17. Þanon eft on þone ealdan feld.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 202 (Birch 466)
B15.8.28.
Bounds, Sawyer 202: Birch 1885-99, no. 466.



 1. Ðis syndon ðæra <foreign>XII</foreign> hida landgemære into cyrnea
& to calmundes dene þe Beorhtuf cyninc gebocode Ælfhege his fædeer
sune ærest on bere forda of ðæm forda on willan dic of ðæm dice
þ/ on swiftan beorh of ðæ beorhge þ on ebbel dic west wearde of
ðære dic þ on ea in brihtinc broc of ðæm broce þ on cyrnea a
ongean stretun ðæt on hrindan broc of ðæm broce þ on gerihte
ðæt on ðone stan of ðæm stane þ on winter wellan of ðære
wellan ðæt on ðeofan dene andlong dene þ on fos andlonges fos ðæt

Ch 203 (Birch 482)
B15.8.29.
Bounds, Sawyer 203: Birch 1885-99, no. 482.



 1. Ðys synd þa lond ge mære into wylleres ege.
 1. Ærest of þere ege on sondbroc.
 2. Of sondbroce on heig weig.
 2. Onlong weiges on norð bommes broc.
 3. Up onlong broces on þa ealdan dic.
 3. Andlong þere dic þ on badsetena gemære.
 4. Of badsetena gemære on tunwealdes stan.
 5. Of tunewealdes stane on wudanhammes broc.
 5. Up onlong broces þ on burhwellan.
 6. Of burhwellan on ða burhwalles of þam burhwallan onbutan
eadulfing garan.
 7. And þer onlong stræt þ on suðwardne þone burhwal, And
westwardne.
 8. Swa nord oð þa egge.
 8. Þ on bleccan mære.
 9. Onlong riðies.
 9. Þ on ge rihte a be ðan heafdan þ æft on wylleres eige.

END_TEXT

Ch 211 (Birch 514)
B15.8.30.
Bounds, Sawyer 211: Birch 1885-99, no. 514.



 1. Ðis synd þa land ge mære æt wulfweardig lea.
 1. Of sture on hunig broc.
 2. Up æfter broce.
 2. On þone ealdan hege.
 2. Onlang hæges.
 3. Oððone ealdan weg.
 3. Ondlang weges on ða mycclan strete.
 3. Ondlang stræte on feower gemære.
 4. Þ swa on calcbroc.
 4. Ondlang broces þ swa on horsa broc.
 5. Ondlang broces þ swa on þa dic.
 5. Ondlang dices on sture.
 6. Eft of sture on þa dic.
 6. Ondlang dices þ on cuðredes treo.
 7. Ondlang dices on heasecan berh.
 7. Of heasecan berge on ða dic.
 8. Ondlang dices on wenferð.
 8. Ondlang wenferð þæt eft on sture.

 2. Of sture on hunigbroc.

 2. Ondlong hæges, on ðone aldan weg.
 3. Ondlang weges on ða miclan strete.
 4. Ondlong strete on feower gemære.
 4. Þ swa on calcbroc ondlong broces þ swa on horsa broc.

Ch 214 (Birch 524)

 1. On sceomman hrycge willering wic.

Ch 216 (Birch 541)
B15.8.33.
Bounds, Sawyer 216: Birch 1885-99, no. 541.



 1. Ðis synd ða land gemæru into Vfera byrig.
 1. Ærest of kærent in eomot sic.
 2. Ondlang þæs sices in rumwoldes mor.
 2. Of rumwoldes more in holan stan.
 3. Of holan stane in mær cumb.
 3. Of þam cumbe in eorðnutena þorn.
 4. Of þam þorne in þæt wudu gæt.
 4. Of þam geate ondlang ecge into þam stodfalde.
 5. Of þane stodfalde in duddan stane.
 6. Of duddan stane in swalawa bærh.
 6. Of ðam berhge in þiccan stan.
 7. Of þam stane big lytlan wudu in simæres ford.
 7. Of þam forda ondlang hwate broc into kærent.
 8. Ondlong kærent in edrices ford.
 9. Of edrices forda in eomodes poll.

Ch 217 (Birch 547)
B15.8.34.
Bounds, Sawyer 217: Birch 1885-99, no. 547.



 1. Þis earon þara manna noman þe gewritene earon from
bynsincgtune to readanoran in þ bisceoprice to uueogerna cestre mid heara
teame & mid þy tudre þe from him cume a on ece yrfewardnysse.
 4. Alhmund, Tidulf, Tidheh, Lull, Lull, Eaduulf.
 5. <foreign>Hoc autem rus his finibus ambitur</foreign>.
 5. Æt byrhtan wellan from teolulfes treowe ondlong longanhylles
on fildena weg þonan on holandene up on cadandune to æðelheges
gemære.
 8. Þonan to ecgfriðes gemære þonne a big ecgfriðes
gemære to cuces hæma gemære þ to incghæma gemære þ swa
ondlong incghæma gemære suð þurh east leh þ to gisles bæce þ
ondlong gisles bæce þ eft to ceolwulfes treowe.
 11. And þ mæð lond be betweonum egsafordam &
strætforda be norðan broce & þone wudu þærto þe scylfhrycg is
haten.

Ch 219 (Birch 552)
B15.8.35.
Bounds, Sawyer 219: Birch 1885-99, no. 552.



 1. Ðis sindon ða land gemæro ærest on ðane blacan pyt
of ðan pytte þ upon þ eaþland eal swa ðe oxa went þ hit cymeþ on
ðone mær hege to graftune þ in þ æscbed of ðæm æscbedde þ
on ðrim gerum ðanane on ðone holan weg of ðan wege to ðæs
bisceopes wuda þ in dic weg.
 5. Of ðam wege in ðone lytlan graf ðonene in ða ealdan
dic.
 6. Ðonene þ in grobbes dene.
 6. Ðanene on ða portstræt of ðan wege in mærford of
ðan forda in hnutfen.
 7. Of ðan fenne in eald cotan þ to graf hrygce.
 8. Of ðan hrygce in ðane wic weg of ðan wege on uffan lege.
 9. Of ðære lege on lytlan broc ðanene on hymelbroc andlang
broces þ op of ðan broce in Egcbyrhttigc croft þ upward be ðan croft in
ða stræt æt ipwæl hylle æfter stræte in hennuc ðanene in
rugan mædewan of rugen mædewan þ eft on ðone blacan pyt.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 222 (Birch 537)
B15.8.36.
Bounds, Sawyer 222: Birch 1885-99, no. 537.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemæru æt mearnan clyfe X hida.
 1. Þ is þonne ærest of turf hlawan in þone holen weg.
 2. Of þam holan wege innon afene þ hit cymeþ wiþ ufan
wearroces yge.
 3. And se mæd hom þær to.
 4. Þ swa up on þone lytlan hlauw.
 4. Of þam hlawe on þa mær dic.
 5. Of þære dic on bradan wege.
 5. Ondlang weges innan þ sic.
 6. Ondlang þæs sices innon þone þyrs pyt.
 6. Of þæm pytte innan pidewællan.
 7. Of pidwællan æfter þam wege to þam uferan heafdan.
 8. Þæt æfter heafdan æft in turf hlawen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 229 (Birch 27)
B15.8.37.
Bounds, Sawyer 229: Birch 1885-99, no. 27.



 1. Þis synt þa landgemaro to Duntune.
 1. Erest of cradwan crundul on wereþan hylle, on fyrdinges
leæ.
 2. On Ebblesburnon to Afene, On pysere.
 3. On þa fulan lace, On earnesbeærh.
 3. On dic æt Beredes trowe.
 4. On þone herepað to headdan grafe.
 4. Þonne on þone hagan to witan wyrþe on dyre broc on
welewe.
 5. On þa dic æt Hiceles wyrþe, þonne ofer þone feld on
hagan ut þurch brember wudu.
 6. On þone stenenan stapol, anlang herepaþes to fobban wylle,
anlang herepaþes to ðas hagan ende to fegerhilde forde.
 8. On þone hagan, on ceorles hlawe, on cradan crundul, þonne on
þa yferan gemere on Ebblesburnan.
 10. On Stretford, on hrofan hric, andlang weges.
 10. On þa dic to bymera cumbe, and þes þwyres ofer þry
crundelas.
 11. Ofer þa stret, þwyres ofer þa dune to wudu beorch hylle.
 12. Ofer berigancumb, on Ybbles burnan.
 13. On beordune, on þes hlinces ende.
 13. On þone smalan weg, ofer higcumb.
 14. On þan smalan wege, on ðon stan.
 14. On þet heþ westeweard.
 15. On þone beorh to þan rigwege.
 15. Þonne eæst andlang hrigweges to Bryt Fordingea
landscære þonne suð on Stretford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 236 (Birch 61)
B15.8.38.
Bounds, Sawyer 236: Birch 1885-99, no. 61.



 1. Of eobbanlege up anlang broces to totanlege.
 1. Thonon east andlang slædes.
 2. Of tham slæde on thone burnan.
 2. Sua to cullanbyrig.
 3. And east to stangedelfe.
 3. Thonon north anlang uueges to there stænenanbrycge.
 4. On hone aldan pyll.
 4. And sua andlang mores ut on briuu.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 242 (Birch 102)
B15.8.39.
Bounds, Sawyer 242: Birch 1885-99, no. 102; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd þa landgemere to Alresforda.
 1. Ærest of Cendefer, on ða andheafda.
 2. Andlang andheafda on þa witan dic.
 2. Andlang dic on beorlea.
 3. Of beorhlea andlang mearcweges on smalan dene.
 3. Þonon to Bucgan oran, þonon ford be wyrtdene.
 4. Andlang dene to wuda.
 4. Swa be mearce to grenmenes stigele.
 5. Þonon to lammeres geate.
 5. Of þam geate to bohmeres stigele.
 6. Þonon to bealmmeres geate.
 6. Of þam geate to Hamerdene geate.
 7. Þonon to hremmescumbes geate.
 7. Þonon to etges geate.
 8. Þonon to dunnes stigele.
 8. Þonon on wytleage.
 8. Þonne to þere bradan æc.
 9. Þonne andlang mearce to Dregtune on þone ford.
 9. Of ðam forda to Wudaforda.
 10. Þonon suð andlang mearce to þes gores suð ende.
 11. Þonne andlang mearce inon ewillas.
 11. Andlang ewillas inon Ticceburnan.
 12. Andlang Ticceburnan on Icenan.
 12. Andlang Icenan þer Cendefer & Icene cumað to
gædere.
 13. Andlang Cendefer þer hit ær up eode.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 244 (Bates)
B15.8.40.
Bounds, Sawyer 244: Bates 1899, 96.



 1. In oriente the Rede leygh et deinde on Lanschareweye
nytherwardon deinde on an diche in a meroe.

Ch 247 (Birch 112)
B15.8.41.
Bounds, Sawyer 247: Birch 1885-99, no. 112.



 1. Limites of driganhurste andlang pillis þanen on þe olde Gore
an soan Roanleighe on þe olde hege rewe so up endlang humbers bi twixe
douningleighe.
 3. Þanen on crichhulle and soa bi linen bitwixe abbingleie and
soa on Doultingstrem up endlanges at Winterwelle of þan Welle on
lincombesleighe on þe rizte on the stanleie Wal.
 6. Þanen on croppanhulle and soa endlang dich on trindleaie
mideward.
 7. Þanen on rizt on midden merkesburi.
 8. Þanen endlange weies on Ramer þanen estrizt endlang pathes
on þan olden fosse andlang fosse south on pulle a doune bi pulle on lutletone
south op on pennard and soa bi Wyrt taman West to Weie endelang weies north est
on pil.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 249 (Bates)
B15.8.42.
Bounds, Sawyer 249: Bates 1899, 35-6.



 1. Erest on estewarde on Chelkwilles hevod.
 2. West þanene on catschaga, þanene bi wyrcrumme on
langelinch.
 3. Þanene on douelish, þanene bi wyrcrumme on carsford.
 4. Of carsford on witewey, þanene bi wyrcrumme on stikelepaþe.
 5. Þanene on stonberninge, of stonberninge on dunnegete.
 6. Þanene on dunnepool, þanene on dungraf, þanene on red
þorn.
 7. Þanene on slap, þanene on eþynford, þanene on rith on
rugelege.
 8. Þanene on caducburne on strim, þanne on manneswyþyg.
 9. Þanene on dikedene ford on strim at eswelleschyt on yle.
 10. Þanene on riht on landbrok on strim.
 10. On chelkwilles hefod.

Ch 251 (Birch 143)
B15.8.43.

 1. Ærest of Wilbrittispathe on midde Pedredistrem adoun endlange
stremes on Bridweresmere ðanen northrizt endelang midmores on kari.
 3. Ðanen up endlang kari on Hamelondesmere on Poholte.
 4. Ðanen south bi line endlang midwardmores est on Wilbrithes
pathes more.

Ch 254 (Birch 158)
B15.8.44.
Bounds, Sawyer 254: Birch 1885-99, no. 158.



 1. Ærest on Uþing ford.
 1. Of ðæs cumbes heafode on ðone smalan weg þurh þone
more to wiðig slede þæt to brocenan beorge.
 2. Swa to wudu forda.
 3. Þ to Lulles beorge.
 3. Swa forð andlang hærpaðæs to Mægenstanes dæne.
 4. Swa to wiðig leagate.
 4. Þæt to næddran beorge.
 5. Þæt þurh ðone mor bæriht gemære on wiðig mor.
 5. Ðæt æft on Ucing ford.
 7. Ærest of sæ upp on Hængestes ricg.
 7. Þonan norð on gyrd weg.
 8. Swa norð andlang rihges on middeweardna sealtera cumb.
 8. Þ bæ cumbæ ingon holan broc.
 9. Þonne andlang streames in on hlosmoc.
 9. Adune on stream on seofan æceras.
 10. Þær of streame æft on butan seofan æceras.
 11. Æft suð on hlosmoc.
 11. Ðæt a dune on stream of ða suran apældran.
 12. Ðæt suð on þa norð rewe.
 12. Ðanan eft ofer Cærn on gata forð.
 13. Ðet suð bufan litlan graf swa suð on earnes hlinc.
 13. Of earnes hlince æft utt on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 255 (Birch 1331-3)
B15.8.45.
Bounds, Sawyer 255: Birch 1885-99, nos. 1331-3.



 1.1. Ærest of cridian brycge on herpað.
 1.1. Andlanges herpaðes on sulhford to exan.
 1.2. Þonne andlang eaxan oð focgan igeðas.
 1.2. Of focgan iegðum on landsceare hricg.
 1.3. Of landsceare hricge on luhan treow.
 1.4. Of luhan treowe on hagan get.
 1.4. Of hagan gate on doddan hrycg.
 1.5. Of doddan hrycge on grendeles pyt.
 1.5. Of grendeles pytte on ifigbearo.
 1.6. Of ifigbeara on hrucgan cumbes ford.
 1.6. Of hrucgan cumbes forda on fearnburh.
 1.7. Of fearnbyrig on earnes hricg.
 1.7. Of earnes hrycge on wealdan cumbes forda.
 1.8. Of wealdan cumbe on tettan burnan.
 1.9. Of tettan burnan up on stream oð lyllan broc.
 1.9. Of lyllan broce on middel hrycg.
 1.10. Of middel hrycge on herepað ford.
 1.10. Of herepað forda on cyrtlangeat.
 1.11. Of cyrtlan gate on suran apuldre.
 1.11. Of suran apuldran on grenan weg.
 1.12. Of grenan wege on wulfpyt.
 1.12. Of wulfpytte on stream oð þa laca tolycgaþ.
 1.13. Þonne up on hrycg myddeweardne andlang hrycges oð þone
pað.
 1.14. Of þam paðe sceaftrihte on alr suð ofer on hlypan.
 1.15. Of hlypan on byrccumbes heafod.
 1.15. Of byrccumbes heafode on hanan forda þanon on bradan
æsc.
 1.16. Of bradan æsce on foxcumbes heafod.
 1.17. Þanon on stanford on eowan.
 1.17. Of stanforda on arlscagan.
 1.18. Of alrscagan on eorðgeberst.
 1.18. Þanon on grenan dune.
 1.19. Of grenandune on herepað on puttan stapul.
 1.19. Þanon on beornwunne treow.
 1.20. Þanon on bucgan ford.
 1.20. Of bucgan forda on brunwoldes treow.
 1.21. Þanon on æsccumb þone on wonbroc.
 1.21. &langes streames on teng upon stream on teng oð
paðford.
 1.22. Þanon on francancumb.
 1.23. Of francumbe on drosncumbes heafod.
 1.23. Þanon on deormere.
 1.23. Of deormere on langan stan.
 1.24. Þanon on hurrancumbes heafod.
 1.24. Of hurrancumbes heafde on riscford on nimed.
 1.25. Þanon on healre dunæ.
 1.26. Of healre dune on wærnan festen.
 1.26. Þanon on cyddanford.
 1.26. Of cyddanforda on cæfcan græfan.
 1.27. Þanon on caines æcer.
 1.27. Of caines æcere on wulfcumbes heafod.
 1.28. Þanon on stanbeorg.
 1.28. Of stanbeorge on cærswille.
 1.29. Of cærswille on diðford.
 1.29. Þanon on dices get.
 1.29. Of dices gate on unnan beorh.
 1.30. Þanon on swincumb.
 1.30. Of swincumbe on egesan treow.
 1.32. On nymed oð doflisc up oð wiðigslæd.
 1.32. Of wyþigslade on eahta æc.
 1.33. Þanon on hafoccumb.
 1.33. Of hafoccumbe on haganget.
 1.33. Þanon ut on hlypan.
 1.34. Þanon on beonnan ford on crydian.
 1.34. Þonne on stream oð hafoccumb.
 1.35. Þonne on hagan get.
 1.35. Þonne on ðone ealdan herepað oð þa eastran
crydian.
 1.36. Þonne andlang streames to cridian brycge.
 2.1. Þis sint þa landgemæro cridian landes.
 2.1. Ærest of cridian brycge on herepaþ andlang herepaþes on
sulhford to eaxan.
 2.2. Þonne andlang eaxan oþ focgan igeþas.
 2.3. Of focgan igeþum on landscare hrycg.
 2.4. Of landscare hrycge on luhan treow.
 2.4. Of luhan treowe on hagan get.
 2.5. Of hagan gate on doddan hrycg.
 2.5. Of doddan hrycge on grendeles pyt.
 2.6. Of grendeles pytte on ifigbearo.
 2.6. Of ifigbeara on hrucgan cumbes ford.
 2.7. Of hrucgan cumbes forda on fearnburg.
 2.7. Of fearnbyrig on earnes hrycg.
 2.8. Of earnes hrycge on wealdan cumbes ford.
 2.9. Of wealdan cumbe on tettan burnan.
 2.9. Of tettan burnan up on stream oþ lillan broc.
 2.10. Of lillan broce on middelhrycg.
 2.10. Of middelhryge on herepaðford.
 2.11. Of herepaðforda on cyrtlan geat.
 2.11. Of cyrtlan gate on suran apuldre.
 2.12. Of suran apuldran on grenan weg.
 2.12. Of grenan wege on wulfpyt.
 2.13. Of wulfpytte on stream oþ þa laca tolicgaþ.
 2.13. Þonne up on hrycg middeweardne andlang hrycges oþ þone
paþ.
 2.14. Of þæm paþe sceaftrihte on alr suþ ofer on hlypan.
 2.15. Of hlypan on byrccumbes heafod.
 2.16. Of byrccumbes heafde on hanan ford.
 2.16. Þanon on bradan æsc.
 2.17. Of bradan æsce on foxcumbes heafod.
 2.17. Þanon on stanford on eowan.
 2.18. Of stanforda on alrscagan.
 2.18. Of alrscagan on eorþgeberst.
 2.19. Þanon on grenan dune.
 2.19. Of grenan dune on herepaþ on puttan stapul.
 2.20. Þanon on beornwynne treow of beornwynne treowe on stanford
on eowan.
 2.21. Þanon on bucgan ford.
 2.21. Of bucgan forda on brunwoldes treow.
 2.22. Þanon on æsccumb.
 2.22. Of æsccumbe on won broc andlanges streames on teng.
 2.23. Up on stream on teng oþ paþford.
 2.23. Þanon on francan cumb.
 2.24. Of francan cumbe on drosncumbes heafod.
 2.24. Þanon on deormere.
 2.25. Of deormere on langan stan.
 2.25. Þanon on hurran cumbes heafod.
 2.26. Of hurran cumbes heafde on riscford on nymed.
 2.26. Þanon on healre dune.
 2.27. Of healre dune on wærnan fæsten.
 2.27. Þanon on ciddan ford.
 2.28. Of ciddan forda on cæfcan græfan.
 2.28. Þanon on caines æcer.
 2.28. Of caines æcere on wulfcumbes heafod.
 2.29. Þonon on stanbeorg.
 2.29. Of stanbeorge on cærswille.
 2.30. Of cærswille on dyðford.
 2.30. Þanon on dices get.
 2.31. Of dices gate on unnan beorg.
 2.31. Þanon on swincumb.
 2.31. Of swincumbe on egesan treow.
 2.32. Þanon on riscbroc mid streame oþ scipbroc.
 2.32. On scipbroc mid streame oþ nymed.
 2.33. On nymed mid streame oþ doflisc.
 2.34. Of doflisc up on stream oþ wiþigslæd.
 2.34. Of wiþigslade on eahta æc.
 2.35. Þanon on hafoccumb.
 2.35. Of hafoccumbe on hagan get.
 2.35. Þanon ut on hlypan.
 2.36. Þanon on beonnan ford on cridian.
 2.36. Þonne on stream oþ hafoccumb.
 2.37. Þonne on hagan geat.
 2.37. Þonne on þone ealdan herepaþ oþ þa easteran
cridian.
 2.38. Þonne andlang streames to cridian brycge.
 3.1. Fyrst fram Crydian brugge to herpaþ and ewn langys herpath
to Sulford to Exe and þan ewn lang Exe anonto fogan flodys fram fogan flode
to landsceare rygge fram landscear rygge to luhan tre.
 3.4. Fram luantre luhan tre to hagan yate fram hagan yeate to
doddan rygge fram doddan rygge to gryndelys pytte fram gryndelys pytte to
yfigbearo.
 3.6. Fram yfigbeara to herl hurgan cumbes ford fram hurgan cumbes
ford to fearnburgh fram fearnburgh to yearnys rygge.
 3.8. Fram yearnys rugge to Weldecomys rugge forde fro Weldecome to
Tettanburna fram Tettanburna vp by the stream to lyllan broke and fram lyllan
broke to myddelrugge.
 3.10. Fram myddlerugge to herpaþ ford fram herpaþ ford to
Kyrtelane yeate fram Kyrtelane yeate to Suran apuldre fram Suran apuldre to
grene way.
 3.12. Fram grene way to Wolfpytte fram Wolfpytte by þe streame
þat þe lake tolythe.
 3.14. Than vp on the rugge mydway langryggys anon to þe paþ.
 3.14. Fram þe paþ ewnryght south wardys ouerto lypan fram lypan
to brygcombes heauyd fram brygcombys heauyd to hanonford fram thans to
bradanaysch.
 3.17. Fram Bradanaysch to foxecombys heade fram thans to Stanford
on ewyn fram Stanford to Arlschag fram Arlschag to yeorþberst fram that to
grene downe.
 3.19. Fram grene downe to herpaþ on puttanstapyl fram thens to
bernwone tree fram thens to bugganford fram Bugganford to Brymwoldys tree.
 3.22. Fram thens to Ayschcomb fram thens to Wonbroke ewne langes
stremys of Teynge and apon the stream on Teynge anon to Paþford fram thens to
Francancumbe.
 3.24. Fram Francancumbe to Droscombyshede fram thens to Deremere
fram Deremere to langestone fram thens to Hurrancombysheade.
 3.26. Fram Hurrancombysheade to ryschforde on nimed fram thens to
Alre down fram alre downe to warnan fasten fram thens to Kyddanford fram
Kyddanford to cafcan grefa.
 3.29. Fram thens to Kaynys aker fram Kaynys aker to Wolfcombysheade
fram thans to Stansbrygg fram Stanbrugge to Carswyll fram Carswyll to
Dyþford.
 3.31. Fram thens to Dychys yeate fram Dychys yeate to Vnnan burgh
fram thens to Swyncomb fram Swyncomb to egesan tree fram nymed to Doflysch vp
anonto þe Wydeslade.
 3.34. Fram þe Wydeslade to <foreign>VIII</foreign> oke fram thens to Haffoccomb
fram Haffoccomb to hagon yeate.
 3.35. Fram thens out to lypan fram thens to beannanford on crydyan
þan by þe stream anon to Haffoccomb þanne to hagan yeate þan to þe
olde herpaþ anon to þe yester crydyan þan ewnlang þe stremys to Crydyan
brugge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 258 (Birch 179)
B15.8.46.
Bounds, Sawyer 258: Birch 1885-99, no. 179; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest of Hildan hlewe on hunig weg.
 1. Andlang weges on Bregeswiðestan.
 2. Of þam stane on sceapwæscan.
 2. Andlang sceapwæscan, on Aleburnan.
 3. Andlang Aleburnan on beueres broces heafod.
 3. Þanon on coferan treow.
 4. Of coferan treowe, on þa bradan ac.
 4. Of þara bradan æc on stuteres hylle niðewearde.
 5. Þonon on weard setl.
 5. Of weard setle on wiðig grafas, þæt on scipdel.
 6. Of scipdelle, on cypmanna del.
 7. Of cypmanna delle andlang weges.
 7. Þæt eft on Hildan hlew.

Ch 265 (Birch 327)
B15.8.47.

 1. Ærest of Swinforda upp andlang broces to Ceolnes wyllan.
 2. Andlang hegeræwe to luttes crundele.
 3. Ðanon to grafes owisce.
 3. Andlang owisc to wege.
 3. Andlang weges to ælesbeorge nyðer on Alercumb.
 4. Andlang Alercumbes ut on Afene.

Ch 266 (Birch 242)

 1. <foreign>id est</foreign> fram doddinc hyrnan oð ða bradan gatan east be
wealle & swa eft suð oð ðaet eastgeat & swa west be strete oð
doddinc hyrnan, & ðreo hagan be eastan porte butan wealle & ðar to
feower aeceras mæde be westan, ee.

Ch 270a (Birch 300)
B15.8.49.
Bounds, Sawyer 270a: Birch 1885-99, no. 300



 1. <foreign>Hæc sunt territoria</foreign>.
 1. Erist on bregedeswere þanen on langen esher so on
lancherpille.
 2. Þanen on ucking Echer so on þe suellen to strete so to
stanpille onlanges þan weies on holenweie to coppanleighe so on þa
Woldespaþ.
 4. Þanen on bodekaleie so on driganleghe.
 5. Þanen on Wriuwoldeswei of þan on Goldwei.
 5. So on cranhunterestone of þan on þa oldelake to hoctanyth on
þe olde yo.
 7. Þanen on selfith so on Welesith.
 7. Of þer ythe on bregredeswere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 272 (Birch 390)
B15.8.50.
Bounds, Sawyer 272: Birch 1885-99, no. 390.



 1.1. Ðis is Aweltunes land boc & þara XV hida swutulung
þe Egbyrht cining gesealde into Ealdan mynstræ on Winceastræ for his
sawlæ alysednessæ Godæ to lufæ & to wuldre.
 1.3. And his eadigan apostolæ sanctæ Petre & sancte
Paulæ on ece yrfæ.
 2.1. Ðes londes ge mæro syndon to Aweltune.
 2.1. Ærest of þam westmæstan æwylle þe is bradewlle
gehate an gerihta upp to þam ealdan herepaðe be westan wodnes beorge.
 2.3. Þonne on ænne stan æt Ceorlacumbes heafde.
 2.4. Þonne on ænne stan on woncumb neoðe wearðne is
ufeweard hol.
 2.5. Þonne ofer randune to þære ealdan dic on æfen
þær licgeð on oðre healfe an litel crundol.
 2.6. Þonon on þane gemænan garan be uton þære dic oþ
þæt hit æft geð in on þæt riad geat.
 2.8. Þonon on anne micelne stan ær þær hlinca
eastheafdum.
 2.8. Þonon on oðerne micelne stan on þam wege middan on
þære dæne bytnan þe ligeð ut on woddes geat.
 2.10. Þonon on ænne crundol on þan suþliðe
nioþeweardum.
 2.11. Þonon upp ofer þa dune on ænne þorn stent inne on
þære dic be eastan Ciceling wege.
 2.12. Þonon andlang þæs hlinces of moxes dune on þane
ealdan walweg to weascing wege nioðe weardun on þone dic.
 2.14. Þonon on wic leage.
 2.14. Þonon on anæs hlinces heafod on Beorhtnoðes ge
mæro.
 2.15. Þonon on ge hrihta to ruwan hlincæ.
 2.15. Þonon andlanges þaes hlinces to Heaðobrihtinge leage
nioðoweardne.
 2.16. Þonon on anne ealdne holne weg andlang þæs slades to
æwelforda.
 2.17. Þonon andlang þæs broces be þam ealden eadenne
æft to þæm æwylle.
 2.19. Fram moxes dune suðe weardre on þa dic.
 2.19. Þanon andlang dic þæt wið ealdan cealfa mære.
 2.20. Þonon of þære dic on þone mid mestan scrippan.
 2.21. Þonne on howeres leage ufe wearde.
 2.21. Þonne andlang rodæ on þone litlan garan midd weardne.
 2.22. Þonan andlang ge wyrpes to herpaðe.
 2.23. Þonan to þære dican hyrnan.
 2.23. Þonan andlang dic to Creodan hylle.
 2.24. Þonne to hærepaðe on gean þa XV æceras.
 2.24. Þonon of þæm andlang herpoðes to tæsan mæde.
 2.25. And se hæðfeld eal ge mæne.
 3.1. Her swytelað on þissum ge write þa foreweard þe
Stigand bisceop & se hired on ealdan mynstre worhtan wið Wulfric þa
ða hy letan him to þa twa hida landes æt Aþeltune & ane gyrde.
 3.3. And æt Weattan igge þreo gyrda.
 3.4. And þa mæde þa gebyrað to ðam ge ref lande &
twegra ge tymæna læse.
 3.5. And tyn cuna ford mið þas hlafordes.
 3.5. And his sceapa læse æfter þæs hlafordes his dæg
& anes mannes deg æfter him swylce hæ best ge unne wið swylcan
sceatte swylce he hit þa findæ mihte.
 3.9. Þises is to ge witnesse Stigand bisceop.
 3.9. And Godwine eorl.
 3.9. And se hired on ealdan mynstre.
 3.10. And ælfwine abbod.
 3.10. And se hired on niwan mynstre and ealle scirþegenas on
Hamtunscire.
 3.11. Þissa ge writa syndan þreo an is on ealdan mynstre.
 3.12. And oþer is on Wiltune.
 3.12. And þridde æfed Wlfric.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 273 (Birch 389)
B15.8.51.
Bounds, Sawyer 273: Birch 1885-99, no. 389; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þara <foreign>V</foreign> hida boc æt Worðie þe Egberht cing
bocode Sancte Petre & Paule into ealdan mynstræ.
 3. <foreign>Hic sunt termini terræ</foreign>.
 3. Ærest ðer sæ dic utt scætt æt þam bihtæ
bætweog Igtunæ & Eastunæ.
 4. Ðonan ðeowres ofer þanan bradan hærpað ðæ
ligeð to worðig forda & to Alresforda.
 5. Ðæt on Igsætmearce & Eastuninga.
 6. Þonnæ forð to Osmundæs garstunæs hyrnan.
 7. Ðonan forð oð bican gerstunes hyrnan.
 7. Ðonan feorðe healf girð be westan þam beorgan þæ
adolfen wæs.
 8. Swa utt to stræte.
 9. Ðæt up to wassan dunæ ðweores ofer ða dunæ to
deopan dæne.
 10. Ðæt ðweores ofer ða dæne on bitan sled
suðewearð & westewearð oð ðæs ealdærmannæs mearcæ
andland þæs ealdermannæs mearcæ oð ðiccan þornæs to ðam
land gemære oð bisceopes mearcæ ðæt ford andlang rode ford on
Ycænan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 274 (Birch 392)
B15.8.52.
Bounds, Sawyer 274: Birch 1885-99, no. 392; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synt þara XXX hida land gemæro to Cawelburnan on
Wiht.
 2. Ærest of sæ up on æsctede.
 2. Þanon on þæne gemot beorh.
 3. Of þam beorge on swines heafod.
 3. Þanon on suð sæ on Eadgylses muþan.
 4. Andlang Eadgylses muþan on bican dæne þanon on
Cawelburnan.
 5. Andlang Cawelburnan utt on norð sæ.

START_TEXT

Ch 275 (Birch 391)
B15.8.53.
Bounds, Sawyer 275: Birch 1885-99, no. 391.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemere to Duntune.
 1. Erest on crawan crundel.
 2. On wereðan hylle On syrdinges lea.
 2. On ebles burnan to Afene on pysere.
 3. On ða fulan lace on earnes beorh on dic et betret trowe.
 4. On ðone herepað to headdan grafe.
 4. Þonne on þone hagan to witan fyrðe.
 5. On dyre broc on welewe on þa dic et hyceles wyrðe.
 5. Þonne ofer ðone feld on hagan ut þurch brember wudu on
ðone stenenan stapol.
 7. Andlang herepaðes to fobban wylle.
 7. Anlang herepaðes to þes hagan ende to fegerhylde forda.
 8. On ðone hagan on ceorles lewe on crawan crundul.
 9. Þonne on ða yferan ge mere on stretford on hrofan hrige.
 10. Þ &lang herepaðes on ða grettan dic.
 10. Swa to cealcan gemere þ to weodu beorh hylle.
 11. Swa to ebles burnan þ on beordune.
 12. Swa to hafuc hlince swa on ðone rugan beorh.
 12. Þ &lang herepaðes on ða land ge mere to brutforda.
 13. Of ðem herepaðe eft on stradford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 276 (Birch 393)
B15.8.54.
Bounds, Sawyer 276: Birch 1885-99, no. 393; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Egbyrhtes cininges landboc to Drocenesfordæ into Ealdan
mynstræ.
 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæro to Drocenesforda.
 1. Ærest æt clefer dæne on þæt del.
 2. Of þam dælle &lang wæges on þa hwitan floda on
norþ healfæ hærepaðes on ðone litlan þorn.
 3. Þ on swalwan þorn.
 4. Þonne on þæs hlinces norþ ændæ swa andlang
hlincæs suð on ðæs cumbæs heafod.
 5. Þonne on ðæs hlincæs wæst ænde æt þæm
hwitan fox holum.
 6. Þonne on stan burg.
 6. Þonne andlang dic utt on hwitan forð.
 7. Swa andlang Meone on midnæs stream on þa dic on
nordhealfæ þæs fordæs.
 8. Þonnæ on þanæ ealdan þorn swa æft utt on Meone
andlang streames oðða dic.
 9. Andlang dic to ðem heþenum birigelsum.
 10. Þonnæ suð andlang hling ræwe to ðæs niðær
langan hlincæs eastænde.
 11. Andlang hlincæs eft utt on ea þonnæ swa oð þæt
wæst mæste how.
 12. Þonon wæst for þonæ seal stub oððæt yrdland
syð bæ þæ landæ on ðes willæs heafoð.
 13. Þonnæ utt on ea.
 14. Swa forð suð on wuda.
 14. And þonnæ git oð wic hæma mearce.
 15. Þonon west bæ hagan on Cyneburgan hyrstæ suþæ
weardæ oððet scirhiltæ on þonæ greatan beam.
 16. Þonne on þunres lea middæ weardæ swa gæ rihtæ
to þroc briggæ on þonæ fulan broce.
 17. Þonne utt on bitnan burnan.
 18. Andlang burnan on þæs bisceopæs mearcæ swa norð to
filæ leage geatæ.
 19. Þonnæ on bromburnan.
 19. Andlang burnan on bromfæld.
 20. Þonne upp bæ tweonæ þa twægen bromfeldas andlang
þæs alar sceatæs on þonæ fulan broc.
 21. Þonne to þæs cumbæs heafdæ.
 22. Þonne to þære stigelæ to þæs bisceopæs
mearcæ.
 22. Þonne utt on langan leagæ.
 23. Þæt þweores ofer þa leage norð to wuda.
 23. Þonon to þære stigelæ oð Meonwara snaðe.
 24. Swa to domnes hlincæ.
 24. Þonnæ to þæm wulfpyttæ swa on ge rihna to
hæsæl holt.
 25. Þonnæ to clæfær dæne æft on þæt del.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 277 (Birch 410)
B15.8.55.
Bounds, Sawyer 277: Birch 1885-99, no. 410.



 1. <foreign>Territoria enim hujus agelli ista sunt</foreign>.
 1. Primitus of alorriðe uppe on anne þoure.
 2. Þanen on anne Walle dich.
 2. Þanne þurh reowe on delesburg middenwearde.
 3. Þanen to cylberge.
 3. Þane on wyrtruman þane on burg þanne on anne dich.
 4. One þane ealdene hage.
 5. Þanen anlang ðies hagen oð anne þorn on hacggen hamme.
 6. Þanen on anne hege ðat on irichte on anne oc ðonne est
over melenbroc on anne þ on anne stapel eft to anne alerriðe.

END_TEXT

Ch 282 (Birch 396)
B15.8.56.
Bounds, Sawyer 282: Birch 1885-99, no. 396.



 1. Þis lan salde Ecgberht cyning Eþerice <foreign>pro ejus pecunia hoc
est</foreign> L mancusas hoc est V sulung landes & þis sint þa land gemera æt
Worahornan & æt Flod hammam.
 3. On easthealfe Cealfhammas.
 4. And on suðhealfe Seaxana meare & on westhealfe Genlida
& on norðhealfe þes hiredes land to Folcanstane.
 5. And þis sindan þa den þe ðerto geberigað.
 6. Wilfreðincg den & sænget den and æalhfreþinc den.

Ch 283 (Birch 377)
B15.8.57.
Bounds, Sawyer 283: Birch 1885-99, no. 377; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara <foreign>xxii</foreign> hyda boc æt Meone þæ Egbyrht cing
gebocodæ Wlfwarde his reve on ece yrfæ.
 1. On uestan þan londe æt riscmere eastan andlang ðes weges
on ðone gemer hagan andlang hagam on ðone elebeam.
 2. Ðanon andlang þæs hagan betuen falod leah &
siladæne.
 3. Swa anlang hagan þið on ceorles beame.
 4. Ðonne on west eal be strete.
 4. Andlang sleades þið luhhes gaetes.
 5. Ðanon on þone boc hagan þið ðere boc stigele.
 6. Ðonne andlang hagan wið wiðig meres ðueres ober ðone
mere swa ford andlang hagan wið sceadeles sceates fore weardes.
 8. Þanan east up suae ðet ealden faesten scaðe andlang ðes
faestenes on readan cumb.
 9. Ub an weardne þæt hit stent on þam sieran boc hagan.
 10. Andlang ðes sieran hagan on rindgesella þeores ofer done
mere.
 11. Ðanon on readen bexean.
 11. Þonne andlang hagan on þan bæces weaste heafod.
 12. On oðeres eastheafod.
 12. Þanon wið eastan hriðres heafod .
 13. Þanon on timber hricges snad fore wearðne þær he ut
cymeð.
 14. Þonne on synd hilde mere.
 14. Þonne an on re eadburge geat.
 15. Þonne þweores ofer beor done ut on þa rode.
 15. Þæt up andlang norð be eastan hyblea on ðone ealdan
her pað.
 16. Ðreores ofer Meone on granan treou.
 17. Andlang þæs hlinces on þara þreore acra ende.
 18. Up on uecær hege siodðan hege rauue on gaen da furh up
wið reofnes beorges.
 19. Þanon on þona cumb al swa seo forg scaðeþ on þat
cymed in sceolles uuille.
 20. Andlang seolesburnan eft in Meone.
 21. On ge rihta up on uuorres sol inne on restes lea þanon
andlang bæces ut to bromdene.
 22. Þreores ofer bromdene on ðone here pað on crutte bracca
on weodu on þone healf.
 23. Þonne on þone hagan up to tycc ham stede þonan on rihc
mere eastan wearðne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 284 (Birch 398)
B15.8.58.
Bounds, Sawyer 284: Birch 1885-99, no. 398; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synt þa land ge mero to Alresforda erest of cendefer on
þa andheafda.
 2. Andlang andheafda on þa witan dic.
 2. Andlang dic on burclea.
 2. Of burchlea andlang mearc weges on smalan dene.
 3. Þanan to bucgan oran.
 4. Þonan ford be wyrt walan to Wiglummes putte.
 4. Þonon to spreot mere.
 5. Þonan on þ twigbutme del.
 5. Of þam delle on beran del.
 6. Þonne on feld dene.
 6. Andlang dene to wuda.
 6. Swa be mearce to grenmeres stigele.
 7. Þonan to lammeres geate.
 7. Of þam geate to bocmeres stigele.
 8. Þonan to beammeres geate.
 8. Of þam geate to hamerdene geate þonne to hremmescumbes
geate.
 9. Þonan to eacges geate.
 10. Þonne to dunnes stigele.
 10. Þonan on witleage.
 10. Þonne to þere bradan æc.
 11. Þonne andlang mearce to dreigtune on þone ford.
 11. Of þam forda to wuda forda.
 12. Þonan suð andlang mearce to þes gares suð ende.
 13. Þonne andlang mearce in on æwyllas.
 13. Andlang ewyllas in on to Ticceburnan andlang Ticceburnan on
Icenan andlang Iccenan þær cendefer & Iccene cumað togædere.
 15. Andlang cendefer þær hit ær up eode.

END_TEXT

Ch 286 (Birch 419)
B15.8.59.
Bounds, Sawyer 286: Birch 1885-99, no. 419.



 1. <foreign>Hiis autem notissimis predictus agellulus circumcingitur
terminis</foreign>.
 2. On eastan ealles folcesweg.
 2. And an suðan se weg se ðe lið to ðam ilcan lande oð
ðone hyge.
 3. And swa up be trindteaganhrucge.
 4. Þurh ðone wude forð be culufransola oð ðane dic.
 4. And an weastan sealta dic norð to rode.
 5. And on norðan sioilta roda.
 5. Oð ða east roda.

Ch 290 (Finberg)
B15.8.60.
Bounds, Sawyer 290: Finberg 1964, 162-3, no. 567.



 1. This synd thæs landes landgemære æt Halgastoke.
 2. Ærest up on thone esc, Thonne ut on preosta lege an ane dic.
 3. Thonene on thone ealdan herpath æt nitherstoce.
 4. Thonne on thonne ford on livedic.
 4. Thonne up on livedic oth holan broc.
 5. Thonne up an holanbroc, Thonne on hlosbroc.
 6. Of hlosbroce on withighege, Thonne on horsford.
 7. Thonne up on horsford on fyres hylleford.
 7. Thonne up on hlidan, Thonne ut on hunalege.
 8. Thonne up on cric, Of cric on hunda troh.
 9. Thonne on tymbercumb, Thonne on æsclege.
 10. Of æsclege on faldhege, Thonne on readan weg.
 11. Thonne up on stigele, Thonne an wibbelescumb up on æsc eft.

END_TEXT

Ch 292 (Birch 438)
B15.8.61.
Bounds, Sawyer 292: Birch 1885-99, no. 438.



 1. Erest on dicheforde on alum endlang stremes on mereforthesthorn
þanen suth on wirte on an wei endlang weies on an stapel on hennegraue.
 3. Þanen on ramesleighe suthward on londscher dich endlang diches
to bru endlang stremes on alum semido up on alum on bolamtre.
 5. Þanen on þe olde alum on ane dich endlang diches on strete
yate endlang diches þare est to dichforde.
 7. Lotthesham:
 8. Ðanen is þis þare fif hide londmere.
 8. Erest on nymede of wideres weþes forde þanen on hagen on
whateleighe þanen est on hazen on winwares wik þanen on landchereþorn
þanen on anne stapel þanen on lippe stapel.
 11. Þanen on longar thorne þanen est on nimede and þer
limpatz to twelf mede acres on scheobanwerzthe twentin bi suthan bru an twen bi
northan.

Ch 298 (Birch 451)
B15.8.62.
Bounds, Sawyer 298: Birch 1885-99, no. 451.



 1. Ærest on mercecumb ðonne on grenan pytt ðonne on ðone
torr æt mercecumbes æwielme ðonne on dene waldes stan.
 3. Ðonne on ðone dic ðær Esne ðone weg fordealf ðonon
of dune on ðæs wælles heafod ðonne ðær of dune on broc oð
tiddesford.
 5. Ðonne up on broc oð heottes dic to ðære flodan from
ðære flodan of dune ðær fyxan dic to broce gæð & ðonne of
dune on broc oð sæ.
 7. Ðonne from ðyrelan stane up on broc oð smalan cumb fram
smalan cumbes heafde to græwan stane ðonon wiðufan ðæs wælles
heafod on odencolc.
 9. Ðonon on ðone healden weg wið huitan stanes ðonon to
ðæm beorge ðe mon hateð æt ðæm holne ðonon an haran stan.
 11. Ðonon on secgwælles heafod ðonon on ða burg
eastewearde ðonon on ða lytlan burg westewearde ðonon to stræte.
 12. Ðonan benioðan wuda on geryhte ut on hreodpol ðonne up on
afene oððæt ðe se alda suinhaga utscioteð to afene ðonne be
ðæm hagan on anne beorge.
 15. Ðonne on sueordleage wælle ðonon on wulfwælles heafod
ðonon on wealweg on ðone stan æt ðære flodan from ðæm stane
forð on ðone herepað on ðone dic.
 17. Ðonon of dune oð wealdenes ford ðonon on ðone holan weg
ðonon of dune on broc on hunburgefleot & ðæt to sæ.

END_TEXT

Ch 300 (Birch 459)
B15.8.63.
Bounds, Sawyer 300: Birch 1885-99, no. 459.



 1. <foreign>Hec sunt territoria prefate telluris</foreign>.
 1. Wiltuniam ninhinga westmerc ðaræ hina land to scaerege
norðmearc East Leanaham eastmearc Cyningessnade to feferesham suðmearc
& his teares les on Cyninges dune to teninge faledun & his ceares les,
to Beringtune on Cyninges firhðe suue to ðeon lond belimpe.
 5. And widunga on Cyningessnade suue to ðiam londe belimpe.
 6. Ðis sind ða daen hæra ðes londes ninsila herst rusting
den ðorn den, on mapol der hest ðrio den friððingden twa on
friðesleas <foreign>IIII</foreign> on tun laf hirste in on haðdune suðan an be suðan
stan ea an.

Ch 304 (Birch 468)
B15.8.64.
Bounds, Sawyer 304: Birch 1885-99, no. 468; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is ðara <foreign>III</foreign> hida boc to Worðie ðæ æþelwlf
cing bocode Hunsie his þegne on ece yrfe ærest on dic þonne upp uuið
hliðgeatas.
 3. Ðonnæ on bradan hærpað.
 4. Þonnæ on healfan dell.
 4. Þonnæ on eafan hling ðonne ðueræs ofer suran
dænæ.
 5. And ðueræs ofer foran dune on ðæs hlinces ænde.
 6. Þonnæ on ænne þorn be westan hriðer lea þonnæ
upp to Wida.
 7. Ðueres ofer þa dæne þonnæ ofer þa stræte on
ðiccan þornas to þæs ealdermannæs mæarce.
 8. Þonnæ andlang þære mæarce oð bisceopes mearce.
 9. Ðonnæ andlang Bisceopes mæarce utt on ycenan.

Ch 308 (Birch 469)
B15.8.65.
Bounds, Sawyer 308: Birch 1885-99, no. 469.



 1. Heregeardingc hiwisce, <foreign>istis terminis circumdatis</foreign>, &
ærest on ða norðigge eastewearde ðone on ða miclanmed.
 2. Ðone on tydgincmæd ðonne on ða mylendic ðone up to
mealmehtanleahe ðone to scelces stede ðone on æschyrste æstewerde
ðone to hunigyrste.
 4. Ðone to ðunres felda ðonne on fontanhlewe ðonne on
wernanbroc ðonne on wrennanwylle ðonne on þ wæterslæd ðæt for
ðon hagan eft to ðere norðigge, eastewearde.
 8. Ðis seondan ðes landes bec ðe æðelulf cyning
Wiferðe his ðegne salde.

Ch 309 (Birch 473)
B15.8.66.
Bounds, Sawyer 309: Birch 1885-99, no. 473; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þara <foreign>III</foreign> hida boc æt Wordige <foreign>Donum regis</foreign>
Aðulfi.
 3. Þis synd þa land gemæra to Wordige þæt is of icenan
andlang þæra dic up to þære hylle.
 4. Of þære hylle andlang þære dic.
 4. Eft sona up to heafod stoccan.
 5. Of heafod stocca andlang stræt to lusan þorne.
 6. Of lusan þorne to deopan delle up to kinges stane.
 6. Fram kincges stane up to holan stane.
 7. Of holan stane up to fyrd geate.
 8. Of fyrd geate to wic herpaðe.
 8. Andlang wic herpæðes æft to kynges stane.
 9. Of kynges stane to ysan pyttan.
 9. Of isan pyttan to twelf ækeran.
 10. Of twelf ækeran ut ford bufon scortan hlince æt þæs
furlanges ende.
 11. And swa forð to þære byrig and swa into hydiburnan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 310 (Birch 475)
B15.8.67.
Bounds, Sawyer 310: Birch 1885-99, no. 475.



 1. <foreign>His territoriis. Hoc rus complectitur</foreign>.
 1. Aerest of blacan broce on taan.
 2. Þonne of dune on taan of beaddig broc þonne upp on beadding
broc on halgan welle.
 3. Þanon of halgan wylle on curig ie mære upp on æt
guldæs geate þonne to readan flodan.
 4. Þonne &lang dic to alor broce.
 5. Þonne upp on igen stream to orcerd cumbe.
 6. Fram orcerdcumbe on mædwegas sylfe.
 6. Fram mæd wegum to fearn leage on þa stigele.
 7. An ge mær hagan to hrimwoldes beorge to þæm ealdan
wege.
 8. Of dune on wice hrycg.
 8. Of wice rycge ofdune on þone eastenan stream andlang streames
to buchanforda.
 9. Ðonon west be wyrrttrume to egwulfes ge mære.
 10. To ge menan hylle midde weardne.
 11. Ðonne to wealacan dic to ludanalrum.
 11. Þonne andlang streames to wisforda ufan werdu.
 12. Þonne east to offan dic.
 12. Þonne suð on þa for yrþe to þæm beorge of dune to
þæm wylle.
 13. Ðonne forð rihte to broce ofer wiðan mæd.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 312 (Birch 477)
B15.8.68.
Bounds, Sawyer 312: Birch 1885-99, no. 477.



 1. <foreign>Hiis metis eadem XX manse circumgirantur</foreign>.
 1. Ðis synd þara twentig hida land ge mere æt Wenbeorgan of
smitan on þone stan of þam stanæ on þone ealdan an of þan eadenne
innan lentan.
 4. Of lentan on gean þone stream on þone greatan þorne stent
bæ lentan scaðe of þan þornæ on þa weter furh innan smalan broc.
 6. Of smalan broce on þan stenihte hlinc.
 6. Of þam stenihte hlince on glottos wylle.
 7. Of glottes wylle on wylles heafod on wylles heafodde on
Wulfheres cumbe of Wulfheres cumbe on Wulfheres clif of Wulfheres clife on þa
furh.
 9. Of þære furh on Winfles beorg of þan beorge on þonne
holan stan of þam holan stane on þone haran stan.
 10. Of þam haran stane on þa holan wannan on þone wugan
hlinc.
 11. Of þam rugan hlincæ on þone durnen crundel of ðam
durnen crundelle on þone þorn of ham þorne on þone stan.
 13. Of ham stanæ on þa dic.
 14. To ðere dic ende on þere dic ende on þone wogan hlinc.
 14. Of ðam wogan hlince on þa catt hola.
 15. Of þan catt holan on Wenbeorge of þan beorge on þone
mycelan cumbe.
 16. Of mycelan cumbe on smalan combe of smalan cumbe on þone
ealdan treow stede of þam ealdan treow stede on þa wogan apoldran of þere
wogan apoldran on folces dic.
 19. Of folces dic on Ealcheres dic of Ealcheres dic.
 19. On þa apoldran.
 20. Of here apoldran innan smitan.

Ch 317 (Birch 491)
B15.8.69.
Bounds, Sawyer 317: Birch 1885-99, no. 491.



 1.1. Ðis is þara XX hida boc to æscesbyrig þe
æðelwulf cing gebocode aldrede his þegne on ece yrfe.
 2.1. Ðis synd þæra XX hida gæ mæro æt
æscesbyrig.
 2.1. Ærest on þonæ garan suþæweardnæ.
 2.2. Ðonnæ andlang wægæs oð þonæ mægen stan.
 2.3. Þa non uuon hlinc.
 2.3. Andlang hlincæs oð loddæræs sæccinge.
 2.4. Andlang hlincæs oð þonæ brystæ del.
 2.4. Þanon andlang fyrh ænnæ æcer to þam hlincæ.
 2.5. Ðanon on ða heafda on hrycwæg.
 2.5. Of hrycwæge on þonæ þorn styb.
 2.6. Þanon on hordwyllæ on þonæ ealdan hord wyllæs
wæg.
 2.7. Andlang þæs ealdan wægæs.
 2.7. On hrysc slædes bygæ.
 2.8. Andlang riðæ on swynbroc.
 2.8. Andlang brocæs on beahhildæ byrigels.
 2.9. Þonon on þonæ ealdan wæg.
 2.9. Andlang wægæs on þonæ garan norðæ
wearðnæ.
 2.10. Þonon east andlang wæges on hnottan mæræ
norþæ weardnæ.
 2.11. Þanon on ða dic.
 2.11. Andlang dic on þæt on bulan mædæ norþæ
wæardæ.
 2.12. Þonon on þa brembæl hyrnan.
 2.12. Of þæræ hyrnan on stan mæræ.
 2.13. Þonon to þæn æþænan byrigelsæ on
æoccænen upp andlang stremæs on þonæ æwulm.
 2.14. Þonon on wæardæs bæorh.
 2.15. Of þam bæorgæ on hrung putt.
 2.15. Þonon on þa æaldan hola.
 2.16. Of ðam holum æft on þonæ garan suþæ
wæardnæ.
 2.16. Þonnæ þæt on tættucan stan.
 2.17. Of þam stanæ on þa æaldan dic.
 2.17. Ðær hit ær onfæng.

Ch 321 (Birch 548)

Bounds, Sawyer 321: Birch 1885-99, no. 548.



 1.1. <foreign>Hæc sunt termina trium aratrum circum acentia</foreign>.
 1.2. In oriente miodowæge in meridie healling wara mearc up
wið halles meres.
 1.3. In occidente briogoningwara mearc oð norðdune norðan.
 1.4. In aquilone east andlangnes dune oð cinges mear.
 1.5. And ut fram cinges merce.
 1.5. Oð ða aldan stræt east be ðare aldan stræte oð
hlið.
 1.6. And þanan ut be ðan hlide oð þa ea medewegan.

 1. <foreign>Hec sunt termini terre</foreign>.

 2. On brochenenberge ðat on hoddes clif.
 3. Þanen on abbenbeorg ðat on stortencumb on ðes linkes
havede suthward.

þanne.
 5. Onne þat furch ðe is aðe riuen to nodre þannen on
funtnesford þannen on herepaþ on þe reden wege on þa two meades oþer
be nodre oþer be wilig ðe ðarto herað.

Ch 327 (Birch 502)
B15.8.72.
Bounds, Sawyer 327: Birch 1885-99, no. 502.



 1. Ðannæ is ðær se leah ðe man ðæt lond mid
friðæ haldan scæl.
 2. An easthealfe sio ealdæ stret.
 2. An suð halfæ horsum stydæ.
 2. An westhalfe biddanstiorf, an norð half pume lond.
 4. Ðannæ sint ðes londes gemæra an westhealfæ
scipfliot an norðhalfe meodowæge an easthalfe liofwynne mearc ðanne fram
cioldryðæ londe west be ðaræ aldan strætæ swæ sio twoentig
æcra.
 7. LXXX æcera boc be eastan porte & ðæs mersces.
 8. Þærmundes biscopes, Ethelbertus Rex.

 1. <foreign>Hiis terminis circumdatis</foreign>.

 3. Þanen wið clahgraues.
 3. Þanne on erðerburg.
 3. Þanen on ceadenford.
 4. Þanen þar suth over on þare oþer ea.
 4. Þanen up on nodre on þat rede clif.
 5. Þanen north on dic.
 5. Þanen on hrycg leah estward.

Ch 331 (Birch 506)
B15.8.74.
Bounds, Sawyer 331: Birch 1885-99, no. 506.



 1. <foreign>Hæc sunt etenim termini predicti agelli circum jacentia</foreign>.
 1. An norðan fram ceddan leage to langan leage bromleaginga mearc
& liofshema ðanne fram langan leage to ðam won stocce ðanne fram
ðam won stocce be modinga hema mearce to cinta stiogole.
 5. Ðanne fram cinta stiogole be modinga hema mearce to earnes
beame ðanne fram earnes beame cregsetna haga an easthalfe sced hit to liowsan
dene ðanne fram liowsan dene to swelgende ðanne fram swelgende cregsetna
haga to sioxslihtre.
 8. Ðanne fram sioxslihtre to fearnbiorginga mearce fearnbiorginga
mearc hit sced to cystaninga mearcæ cystaninga mearc hit sced suðan
toweard setle ðanne fram weard setle cystaninga mearc to wichæma
mearcæ.
 11. Ðanne sio west mearc be wichema mearcæ ut to
bipplestydæ ðanne fram bipplestydæ, to acustydæ to biohahhema
mearcæ fram acustyde to ceddanlege.
 15. Ðanne belimpoð ðer to ðam londe fif denn an anut
walda.
 15. Broccesham ðes dennes nama.
 16. Ðes oðres dennes nama sænget hryg.
 17. Billan ora is ðes ðriddan nama.
 17. Ðanne twa denn an gleppan felda.

Ch 339 (Birch 518)
B15.8.78.
Bounds, Sawyer 339: Birch 1885-99, no. 518.



 1. Her sint þa gemæra oþ miadowegan fram doddinghyrnan west
andlanges stræte ut oð weall & swa be norðan wege ut oð
liabingescota.
 3. And swa be liabinges cotum oð þæt se weall east sciat.
 3. And swa east binnan wealle oðða miclan gatan an gæn
doddinghirnan.
 4. And swa ðanne suðan geriaht fram ða gatan andlanges weges
be eastan ði lande suð oð doddinghyrnan.
 6. Þanne be norðan wealle mers & mæða.
 7. Oð mediwægan sindan þa gemæra.
 8. Fram miadawegan binnan twam fliatum tiala sint genemde
Pirifliat.
 9. And scipfliot ða gesceadað þæt land westan & eastan
oð ðæt weallfæsten þus hit is befangen mid friodome amen.

Ch 340 (Birch 520)
B15.8.79.
Bounds, Sawyer 340: Birch 1885-99, no. 520; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis seonde ðæs landes boc þæ Æðelred cing
Hunsige his ðegne saldæ æt Worðie.
 1. <foreign>Hic sunt termini terræ</foreign>.
 1. Ærest ðes se dic ut sæt.
 1. Æt þam byhte betuonh Igtune and Eastune.
 2. Þonon ðueres ofer dune braðan herpað ðer ged to
worði forda & to alresforda ðonon on ig setna mearce and eastuninga.
 4. Ðæt ford to osmundæs gærstunes hyrnan.
 5. Þonon ford on bycan gærstunes hyrnan.
 5. Ðonon forðe half gerð bæ wæstan þam beorga ðæ
adolfen wæs.
 6. Þonan ut to stræte.
 7. Ðonon up to wassan dune ðueres ofer þa dune to deopan
dæne.
 8. Ðæt ðueres ofer þa dæne on bitan sleð suðæ
ward.
 8. And westæ werð oð ðæs aldær mannæs mearce.
 9. Andlang þæs aldærmannes mearce oð ðiccan þornes to
þam land ge mære oð bisceopes mearce.
 10. Ðæt forð andlang rode forð on icenan.

Ch 343 (Birch 546)
B15.8.81.
Bounds, Sawyer 343: Birch 1885-99, no. 546.



 1. Ferst on Chelbroke, from Chelbroke up to Harepath, endelang
Harepath to Merfronford, from Merfronford endlung strate on Ryshwyll, from
Ryshwyll to Foulwille into Anhence, endlanges Penheved unto Foxhole.
 4. From Foxhole unto Erthenote eastwards, out of Erthenote into
Cuttleston, from Cuttleston unto Herpath, endelang Herpath unto Dyrston ynto
Anhence, from Anhence endelange the more unto Boyledych, from Boyledyche into
the Lake, endelang the Lake unto the Dyche.
 8. Out of the Dyche endlang Mores unto Benham eastwards, from
Benham unto Swanmore, out of Swanmore into Yevel, out of Yevel into Pedryd, out
of Pedryd into Abanlake, out of Abanlake est into Chelbroke.

Ch 345 (Birch 550)
B15.8.82.
Bounds, Sawyer 345: Birch 1885-99, no. 550.



 1. Þis synt ðara fiftene hida land ge mæro æt
Cyricestune.
 1. Ærest fram bradan forda.
 2. Upp on stream of tude ford.
 2. Þonne upp on stream on helfæres ge mære.
 3. On wiðig sled.
 3. Þanon norð on wiðig slæd.
 4. Þanon norð on an mor sled.
 4. Norð to ie.
 4. Þonne norð upp of þære ie.
 5. Upp on þone ibihttan alr.
 5. Of þam ibihtan alre on scortan dic.
 6. Þonne of scortan dic on llullan sleð.
 6. Þonne of lullan slæde.
 7. On þa ealdan burg.
 7. To herepoðe.
 7. Ðanon of þam herepoðe.
 7. To fælet hamme.
 8. And be westan fylet hamme nigon æceras.
 8. Ðanon on fylet hamme nioðoweardum on stream.
 9. Þonne on dune on ælfredes gemæro on stream.
 10. Þonne of dune on mylen burnan.
 10. On ælfnodes ge mæro on cunecan forð.
 11. Þonne of cunecan forda of dune on stream on næglesburnan.
 12. Þonne of dune on mylenburnan on orcerd ford.
 13. Ðonne of dune on stream on tan.
 13. Þonne upp on tan on horsford.
 14. On alr ford.
 14. Þonne upp of alr forda on mylenburnan upp on beamford.
 15. Þonne up on stream.
 15. On bradan ford.

Ch 354 (Birch 565)
B15.8.88.
Bounds, Sawyer 354: Birch 1885-99, no. 565.



 1. Ðis sindon ða land gemere to ceolsige ofer sunesforda upp on
grenan dune.
 2. Ðonon on higran hongran norðe weardne.
 2. Þonon on bullanholt on diopan wei.
 3. Ðonon on marge wei and grim gelege.
 4. Ðonon on romes leg on stanwei.
 4. Ðonon andlang dices on west welle.
 5. Ðonon andlang mores on tibbælde lace.
 5. Ðonon on maccan eige andlang mores.
 6. Ðonon on ðone ealdan dic est to temæse æt
welingaforda.
 7. Ðis sind ða landes gemære æt bestles forda cæccam
wæl ðonon andlang hagan on ealden halh.
 8. Ðonon on lid geat.
 8. Ðonon to wæst legæ.
 9. Ðonon to rah slede.
 9. Ðonon to mules hamstæde.
 9. Ðonon to hiorotlege.
 10. Ðonon to blacan mære.
 10. Ðonon to cylf hongran.
 10. Ðonon eft to temæse on wiredes wær.
 12. Ðis sindon ðes landes ge mære æt hacceburnan ðonon
of haccebroce on ealdan lace.
 13. Ðonon to tottencumbe ufeweardon.
 13. Ðonon to burgilde treowe.
 14. Ðonon to drægeles bæce.
 14. Ðonon andlanges drægeles bæce to gemær weige emb
cylda tun.
 15. Ðonon flecges garan suðe wardan.
 16. Ðonon to widan geate.
 16. Ðonon to eadulfes mære.
 16. Ðonon to stoccæs wælle.
 17. Ðonon of stocces wylle on wittan mære.
 17. Of wittan mære on cyninges dic.
 18. Of cyninges dice on hæðbyrg.
 18. Ðonon of hæðbyrge on haccaburnan emb mortun.

Ch 360 (Birch 596)
B15.8.89.
Bounds, Sawyer 360: Birch 1885-99, no. 596; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæra to Myceldefer.
 1. Ærest on hafoc hlinc þonne swa andlang herpaðes on
ecgulfes treow.
 2. Þonne andlang herpaðes oð myceldefer.
 3. Þonne andlang myceldefer.
 3. Þonne of myceldefer to ðam pole.
 4. Þonne of ðam pole to næsan byrig.
 4. Þonne of næsan byrig to wæter hlince.
 5. Þonne of wæter hlince to stapola ðorne.
 6. Þonne of stapola ðorne to horgan wege.
 6. Ðonne of horgan wege to forsæðan pylle.
 7. Ðonne of forsæðan pylle to ðyddan þorne.
 8. Ðonne of ðyddan þorne to tettan grafe.
 8. Þonne of tettan grafe to ceortes beorge.
 9. Þonne of ceortes beorge to cleara flode.
 9. Þonne of cleara flode andlang stræte on herwes ham.
 10. Þonne of herwes ham to lin leage.
 11. Ðonne of lin leage to bulloces sole.
 11. Ðonne of bulloces sole to ticces ham.
 12. Þonne ofer ðone feld to bearcelea.
 12. Þonne of bearcelea forð on æp lea.
 13. Þonne of æp lea swa forð on hean hangran þ ofer ðone
feld on kendefer.
 14. Þonne andlang kendefer on duddan dune.
 15. Þonne andlang streames to brocenan beorge.
 15. Of brocenan beorge innan ða rode on beaga lea.
 16. Of ðære rode on middeweardan weard hangran.
 17. Of weard hangran swa forð on papan holt suðeweardne.
 18. Þonne on ðæt gemot hus.
 18. Þonne ofer ruwan dune þ eft on hafoc hlinc.
 20. Þis syndon ða land gemæra to cramburnan, ærest on
myceldeferes stream fornangean ðone cyric stede on wynsiges tune andlang
streames on waddan ige.
 22. Of waddan ige.
 22. Andlang streames on ðone blacan pol.
 23. Of ðam blacan pole.
 23. On hwelpes dell.
 23. Of hwelpes delle on ðone burnan.
 24. Of ðam burnan norð andlang weges on tuccingc weg.
 25. Of tuccingc wege.
 25. Andlang weges on greatan dic.
 25. Of greatan dic on ruwan beorh.
 26. Of ruwan beorge þurð þone wuda on cealc grafan andlang
paðes on frigedæg.
 27. Of frigedæge on horweges norð ende.
 28. Of horweges norð ende andlang weges eastweard on ðone
smalan pæð.
 29. Of ðam smalan pæðe ut ðurh cealc grafas on ðone
readan pyll.
 30. Of ðam readan pylle andlang fyr innan greatan dic on þæt
smale dell.
 31. Of ðam smalan delle ut to lytlan dune on ðæs hundes
hylle.
 32. Of ðæs hundes hylle andlang weges on crammere.
 32. Of crammere andlang weges on nanes mannes land.
 33. Of nanes mannes land andlang weges eft innan myceldefer.
 35. Þis syndon ða land gemæra to cuðredes hricgce.
 35. Ærest of ðam readan clife.
 36. In to bican forda andlang weges to winter burnan.
 36. Of winter burnan on ða fearnigan hylle.
 37. Of ðære fearnigan hylle ut on mattuces feld.
 38. Of mattuces felda up to ðam garan on þæt twyslede
treow.
 39. Of ðam twysledan treowe to ðam more.
 39. And ofer ðone mor be eastan ðan more on brom burnan.
 40. Andlang brom burnan to syle forda.
 41. Of syle forda eft to bican forda.
 42. Ðis syndon ða land gemæra to deorleage.
 42. Ærest on cysle burnan innan hamele þær cysle burnan
ærest in gæð.
 43. Up andlang cysle burnan to wifeles stigele.
 44. Of wifeles stigele on þæt read leafe treow.
 45. Of ðam read leafan treowe on ðone ealdan stocc.
 45. Of ðam stocce be westan burnan on þone grenan weg.
 46. Of ðam grenan wege andlang ðæs smalan paðes to
cnollgete.
 47. Of cnollgete on þæt hwite treow.
 48. Of þam hwitan treowe on ðæt norð healde treow.
 48. Of ðam norð healdan treowe to cuntan heale.
 49. Of cuntan heale on ðone lytlan wyll.
 50. Of ðam lytlan wylle forð ofer beorh holt on ða langan
byrce.
 51. Of ðære langan byrce innan wohburnan.
 51. Andlang wohburnan to stapol forda.
 52. Up of stapol forda to awelwican.
 52. Of awelwican into ðam holan more.
 53. Andlang ðæs holan mores innan hamele andlang hamele
þær cysle burnan gæð into hamele.
 55. Þis syndon ða land gemæra to rige leage.
 55. Ærest on seaxea seað.
 56. Of seaxe seaðe on þone holan æsc.
 56. Of ðam holan æsce on trindeleage.
 57. Of trindeleage on fæstan æc.
 57. Of fæstan æc on eadulfes hamm.
 58. Of eadulfes hamme on ða readan dic.
 58. Of ðære readan dic on þa leage.
 59. Of ðære leage on bær heal.
 59. Of bær heale.
 59. On tæppe leage.
 60. Of tæppe leage eft on seaxeseað.
 61. <foreign>IN nomine Jhesu christi</foreign>.
 61. Þis syndon ðæra syx hida land gemæra æt kendefer.
 62. <foreign>Primitus</foreign>.
 62. Fram ðære burn stowe.
 62. To ðam stan cistele.
 63. Ac deinde on ðone greatan þorn.
 63. <foreign>Indeque</foreign>.
 63. On bican hyrste to wuda.
 64. <foreign>Sic deinceps</foreign> to ruwan beorge.
 64. <foreign>Illincque</foreign> to ðam widan herpaðe.
 65. <foreign>Sicque promtim</foreign>.
 65. To beofan stane to norð sceate to wuda.
 66. And ðurh ðone wuda inn on widan dæll middewerd.
 66. <foreign>Ex hoc</foreign>.
 67. Ut ðurh tigel hangran.
 67. Et de post ut ðurh trindlea.
 67. Swa andlang ðæs smalan weges to bucgan oran on ða miclan
dic.
 68. <foreign>Sic denique</foreign> andlang dune on west healfe to ðære burn
stowe ðe we ær on fruman nemdan, & ða seofan hida æt worðige
hyrað to þam hund hidan to myceldefer.
 71. Eall swa ða land gemæra hit on butan belicgceað.
 72. And an wer on ycenan & healf þæt hwite clif & ses
syðemyste mylen on winteceastre binnan wealle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 361 (Birch 607)
B15.8.90.
Bounds, Sawyer 361: Birch 1885-99, no. 607.



 1. <foreign>Circumcincta est hec terra his terminibus</foreign> þ is þonne
ærest from wifeles lace þ swa up andlang riðiges þ hit cymð to fagan
floran & þonne swa andlang slædes be þam twam lytlan beorgan þ hit
cymð to wulfunes treow stealle will.
 4. An suna þ swa þwyres ofer þ furlang þ on þa þyrnan
westewarde þær se mycla þorn stod þ swa on fugelmere þ þonne a
ondlang dices oð þ hit cymeð to horwyllan þ swa ondlang riðies þ
hit cymð to cearwyllan þonne mæreð hit cerwelle seoððan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 362 (Birch 595)
B15.8.91.
Bounds, Sawyer 362: Birch 1885-99, no. 595.



 1. Ðis is þæra land boc to bi Wilig þæ Eadweard cing ge
bocade Aðelwulf bisceope on æce yrfe.
 3. Ærest on codan ford.
 3. Þonne an dune andlang wilig on hyssa pol.
 4. Þæt on þære gebyge.
 4. Þæt be eastan cynelming ham ofer þa mæde on
hafocwylle.
 5. Þonne andlang mær fyr on greatan þorn þonne andlang
weges on land score hlinc þonne andlang score hlinces on alercum.
 7. Þonne ofer radune sweoran ofer nacum on trind lea.
 8. Þæt swa on wilafes treow.
 8. Þæt ofer þone heðfeld on dic geat.
 9. Ðet west andlang dic on wylle weg.
 9. Ðæt andlang wylle weges on widancum.
 10. Ðonne &lang weges æft on oden ford.
 10. Of odan forda on codan ford.
 12. Ðis ge writ cyð Deormodes foresprece & æðulfes
ymb.
 12. Þæt land æt Wilig.
 13. Þæt is þæt Aþulf hit ge sealde Deorswiðe.
 13. On agene æht.
 14. To ateonne swa hire leofest wære ægðer ge on hire lyfe
ge æfter hyre lyfe.
 15. And ageaf hire þa bæc ðy ilcan deg ðe hi man him
geaf.
 15. On dissa manna ge witnesse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 364 (Birch 588)
B15.8.92.
Bounds, Sawyer 364: Birch 1885-99, no. 588.



 1. <foreign>Item</foreign> Fobbanfuntan boc.
 1. Aerest on hanan welle.
 1. Siððan on hanan wurðe.
 1. Ðonne forð on stan mære.
 2. Þonne on sigewunne dic westewearde.
 2. And swa up on land scare hangran.
 3. Þonne bi eastan cester slæd byrg.
 3. XXX gerda swæ up to here paþe.
 4. Þæt swa uest on here paþe anlang hrygges þæt of here
paþe on rugan dic.
 5. On ber hulle westewearde þonne forð ofer here pað þæt
on sticelan pað on wadding gerstun easte weardne.
 7. Þæt forð ofer chealf hylle middewearde þonne on
wulfcumb ufeweardne swa ðurh dellwuda on landscoraac.
 8. Swa on stream on nodre.
 9. Swa of dune on stream þat up of streame on hanan welle.

END_TEXT

Ch 365 (Birch 597)
B15.8.93.
Bounds, Sawyer 365: Birch 1885-99, no. 597; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd þa landgamero to Anne: Arest on þone garan on
þat land aestweard. þonon on þone ford norþewarde: þonon anlang
straete on Burnstowe, þonon est on Prullanþorne, of þam þorne east.
 4. Þonon up on þa dune to þaer dic on þa hbew, of þaer
hbeaw to þane greatan þorn, þonon east betweox Brenninggrafe on
Cufanlea.
 6. Þonon ut þorw Horleac on þes cinges mearce, þonon on
þone wuduweg, þaer þa þreo landmearca gaþe togaedere, of þane
wuduweg eft on þone garan þaer onfengon, and in on cyt on Beagildestoc
norþ.
 9. Þonon on Wadancampe estweardne, þonon norþ to Bedesdene,
forþe be Bedesdene to Beddesseaþe, þonon on þone garan ufeweardne of
þam Waranford, be hagan to þam readen hamme, þonon ut to þam elebeame.

END_TEXT

Ch 366 (Birch 598)
B15.8.94.
Bounds, Sawyer 366: Birch 1885-99, no. 598.



 1. Aerest of Eorthebyrg to Symbroce innan blaec pytte, of blaec
pytte innan Dorceri, andlang Dorceri on tha straet, andlang straet thaet on
Fridan byrgilis, of tha byrgelse on grenan byorh.
 3. Of ðan biorge, on Fugan biorge, on Eorthebyrg, of ðære
byrg on Audulfes cnol, of Audulfes cnol on thone thornestyb, of tha thornstib
on Mearcumbe, of Mearcumbe on Hordestan, of Hordestan thaet eft on
Eorthebyryg.

Ch 367 (Birch 603)
B15.8.95.
Bounds, Sawyer 367: Birch 1885-99, no. 603.



 1. Ðis synt þa land gemæro.
 1. Ærest of þam garan innan þa blacan hegcean.
 2. Of þære hegcean nyþer innan þone fulan broc of ðam
fulan broce wiþ westan randes æsc þanon on þæne ealdan dic wið
westan þa herde wic.
 4. Of þære dic þ innan wealdan hrigc on eadrices gemære.
 5. Andlang eadrices gemære þ innan cynebellinga gemære
andlang gemære þ on icenhylte.
 6. Andlang icenhylte oþ þone hæðenan byrgels.
 7. Þanon on cynges stræt.
 7. Up andlang stræte on welandes stocc.
 8. Of þam stocce nyþer andlang rah heges ðæt on heg leage
of ðære leage nyþer ðæt eft on ðæne garan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 368 (Birch 600)
B15.8.96.
Bounds, Sawyer 368: Birch 1885-99, no. 600.



 1. Þis his þa landes boc æt Stantune.
 1. Þis his sio land seten æt Stantune þe Cenwold hafede.
 1. Aerest on holan wylle þonne from holan wille on holan weg
midde weardne ðonne þonan on þrifing dene & ðonne of ðryfing dene
on sceobban stan.
 4. Ðonne þonan on blacan graf.
 4. Ðonne of blacan graue on gemerstan ðonne of merstane on
gemer beorgas ðonne on longan dene netðe wearde to anan stane.
 6. Ðonne ofer wodnes dic.
 6. Ðæt to þare eorðbyrig ðonne þonan to axna mere
midde weardne ðonne þonan on lytlan beorg to anan stane ðonne þonan to
eas more to þare burgilsan ðonne þonan to brom lace ðonne andlang
broces æt eddes ford ðonne eft from eddes forda up weard andlang broces
ðæt eft to holan wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 369 (Birch 601)
B15.8.97.
Bounds, Sawyer 369: Birch 1885-99, no. 601.



 1. An swinbroc ærest þ up of swinebroc in on riscslæd of
þæs riscslædes byge foran ongean hordwylles weg.
 2. Þ andlang þæs weges oð hit cymð to Iccenhilde wege.
 3. Þonne of þan wege up on þone ealdan wude weg.
 4. Þonne of þæn wude weg be eastan telles byrg on ænne
garan.
 5. Þonne of þan garan on ænne gar æcer þ andlanges
þære fyrh to anum andheafdum to anre forierðe & seo forierð
gæð in to þam lande þanne on gerihte to þam stane on hricg weg.
 8. Þanon west on anne goran andlanges þære fyrh to anum
anheafdum þanon of dune on fearn hylles slæd þ þanon on ane furh an
æcer near þæm hlince.
 10. Þonne on þene hlinc æt fearn hylles slæde suþe
wearde.
 11. Of þæm hlince on anon heafde forð þær on ane furh
on ane stan ræwe þanon on gerihte on hricg weg.
 13. Þ þanone on ane gar æcer on anon heafde & se gar
æcer in on þ land.
 14. Þanone andlanges anre furh oþ hit cymð to anum byge
þanone of þaem byge forð on ane furh oþ hit cymð to anre forierðe
& sio forierð in to þam lande.
 16. Þonne on Icenhilde weg be telles burh westan þanone norð
ofer Icenhilde weg on sican wylle þ hþweres ofer an furlang on gerihte on
an ælrbed on hæg hylles broces byge.
 19. An lang þæs broces oþ hit cymð to twam gar æcer.
 20. And þan gar æceras in on þ land þanon on ane
forierðe on an on heafde þanon on gerihte on readan clif on swin broc.
 22. Þonne andlang þæs broces on þæt riscslæd.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 371 (Birch 606)
B15.8.98.
Bounds, Sawyer 371: Birch 1885-99, no. 606



 1. Erest on preosteselwe.
 1. Of preosteselwyn on wrythwey.
 1. Of Writhweie of wryoheme on Egelescombe.
 2. Of Egelescombe on etecombe.
 3. Of etecombe on Wulfcombe.
 3. Endelanges Wolfcombe midewardes þar on Stificleie northward of
þar leighe on wynter acres estward.
 5. Þanen on Swynhage.
 5. Þanen þoru atteleighe to farnhamme of farnhamme on
histlyngdene estward.
 6. Þare on þane Berghe of þan Berghe to likelan.
 7. Of likelan to credelinghales of credelinghale on suwardynglegh
estward to Wetheleighe brok and endelanges broke to merewollen.
 9. Of merewollen on estmedewen of estmedewen on wilbicanhulle.
 10. Of wilbicanhulle on the heghe rewe bi southensuddonne.
 11. Of þare heghe rewe on mererigge of mererigge on hagennedewe
of hagenedewe endelang stremes on wring to wringforde.
 13. Of wringforde on þe heghe rewe est to schirebourne elm of
þan elme on carstie on þa heghe rewe.
 14. Eft endlang þare heghe rewe on wythescombe.
 15. Of þan combe on brokenanbrugge of þar brugge to stanbrugge
of stanbrugge to wetmedewen of wetmedewen to watercombe of watercombe to
ethecombe of ethecombe to elkanleighe of elkanleighe to hilisbrok on þane
holm þane endelanges thes brokes eft in on wryng.
 20. Þanen endlang wryng.
 20. Eft on the mede westward þanen on preostwlwe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 374 (Birch 604)
B15.8.99.
Bounds, Sawyer 374: Birch 1885-99, no. 604; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðes synd þa land gemaera to Myceldefer.
 1. Arest on Myceldefer, andlang mearc weges on þone sand pytte,
þonan anlang þara ealdena dala, þonan oster þone beorh þæt lið
betweol þan twan langan beorgan.
 4. Þonan to Worðigsaetena mearc, andlang Wordihaema mearc on
þone hlinc bufan Friþelinga dic, of þan hlinc on þat suðmyste gat,
andlang dic on þat ealden fyrd gat.
 6. Of þam fyrdgat on ða hocedan dic, of þaere hocedan dic on
Dennerdes treow, of þam treow on weg gelaetan, norðrihtis to Waddanyge swa
innan þone broc to Miceldefer.

START_TEXT

Ch 376 (Birch 620)
B15.8.100.
Bounds, Sawyer 376: Birch 1885-99, no. 620; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest on icenan æt brombrigce up andlang weges to
hlidgeate.
 2. Þanon andlang slades to beanstede.
 2. Þ be hagan to searnægles forda.
 3. Þ up be swæðelinge to sugebroce.
 3. Ðæt forð be mearce to cules felda.
 4. Forð be gehrihtum gemære to stodleage.
 4. Swa to ticnes felda.
 5. Þ to mearcdene.
 5. Swa to tæppeleage.
 5. Swa forð to scipleage.
 5. Þ to bradan ersce.
 6. Swa to þære ealdan cwealmstowe.
 6. Þ forð be deopan delle.
 7. Þ be craweleainga mearce to bacegeate.
 7. Forð be mearce to ðæm ealdan falde.
 8. Swa norð & east to hearpaðe.
 8. A be hearpaðe to heafod stoccum.
 9. Swa be hideburninga gemære on icenan.
 9. Þ up be streame.
 10. Þ swa wið easton wordige þonan be rihtre mearce to
ðæm gemærðornan.
 11. Þ to ðære readan rode.
 11. Swa forð be ealdormonnes mearce.
 12. A be mearce.
 12. Þ hit cimð on icenan.
 12. Up be streame to alresforda.
 13. Þonon on ticceburnan.
 13. Up andlang burnan.
 13. To hearpaðe swa to tyrngeate wiðinnan ða æfisc to
sceap wican.
 14. Þ be riht gemære to ellenforda.
 15. Swa to bradan dene.
 15. Þ to meoluc cumbe.
 16. Swa to meolæn beorge.
 16. Andlang weges to wealthæminga mearce.
 16. Be rihton gemære to hige leage.
 17. Þ to clænefelda.
 17. Swa on are dene forð be hagan on sceatte leage.
 18. Þ forð on icenan be norðan stanforde.
 19. Swa mid streame ðæt hit cymð eft on brom bricge.
 20. Cyltan cumbes boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 377 (Birch 625)
B15.8.101.
Bounds, Sawyer 377: Birch 1885-99, no. 625; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest æt stræt lea.
 1. Forð þon andlang stræt to langan leage eastewearde.
 2. Þær suð to ðære stanehtan dæne.
 2. Þonon suð on wrobban lea æfisc on þone hegðorn.
 3. Swa on þa hreadleafan æc.
 3. Þæt on cissan beorg middan weardne.
 4. Þæt ofær ea on clofenan hlinc.
 5. Þanan on beam leage.
 5. Swa on ac hangram.
 5. Þonan innan suð lea.
 6. Swa on cobban lea dæne.
 6. Þæt to ðære dic þonan to hærices hamme.
 7. Swa to heafoð beorge westeweardon.
 7. Þæt to þæm heþenan byrigelse.
 8. Þonne norð ofer ea on clofenan hlinc.
 8. To witan lea.
 8. Swa to stræt lea.
 9. Ðis is seo bær ðer to hyrð.
 10. Ærest of brunan hylle on wisclea geat.
 10. Þa non to oxan hæðfelda þæt east þonan to
wihtelmæs treowe swa to fulan riðe.
 11. Ðonan to ænedwille.
 12. Swa to wiðig forda.
 12. Ðæt to brynes hylle.
 13. To Wealtham.
 14. Ærest æt clearan floda to witleage.
 14. Ðet utt on þa stret.
 14. Andlang stret to hyrpes hamme þanon to clearan floda.
 16. To bradanleage.
 17. Ærest upp of ulan delle.
 17. To micæs dæne.
 17. Þanon on bæran leage.
 18. Swa to riscmære to sibbes lea.
 18. Of sibbes lea.
 18. On hean lea.
 19. On ulan del.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 378 (Birch 624)
B15.8.102.
Bounds, Sawyer 378: Birch 1885-99, no. 624; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is hwitan cirican land boc.
 1. Ðis synð þa land ge mære to hwitan cyrican.
 1. Ærest þær seo dic sciet of terstan andlang dic to
þære haran apoldræ þanon on geapan garan weste weardne.
 3. Ðæt andlang þæs weges þæ lið andlang ðære
dæne.
 4. To ðære stræt.
 4. Ðet þanon to bradan lea.
 4. Þæt andlang þæs ealdæs weges to wifan stoccæ.
 5. Ðonon andlang wintres dæne oðða stræt.
 6. Þanon andlang stræt on þonæ easternan æsphangran
wæste weardnæ.
 7. Þonon suð on ge rihta utt þurh hwitan lea þæt on
whitan leasheal ðæt forð on geryhta be eastan weræles wellæ.
 9. Þonon forð on wulflea wæste weardnæ.
 9. Þæt swa forð on grawes þorn wið earna leas.
 10. Þæt þurh earna lea be eastan forseaþas on þæt
del.
 11. Þonon wæst to cealc grafon.
 11. Þar horo weg utt sceat utt þurh cealcgrafas on fearnbraca
suðe weardæ on þonæ ealdan stapol.
 12. Þanon forð on hocing mæda weste weardnæ.
 13. Þonon norð on þa rodæ be eastan mæredunæ.
 14. Þæt swa forð to æþelheahes þornæ.
 14. Þonon forð on blacan wylles heafoð þæt ofer
þonæ igaþ utt on terstan.
 15. Þæt andlang terstan to æscwaldæs byge.
 16. Þæt æft to þære dic þær hio sciet of
terstan.
 18. Ðis synt þa ge mæra þa bæra ðe hierað to whitan
cirican fiscesburnan and felghyrste.
 19. Ærest on þing leage on ðæs wielles heafod.
 20. Ðonon andlang hagan on gerihte to clat leage.
 20. Þat ðuores ofer clat leage on ge rihte to grænan leage.
 21. Þæt ofer þa leage to nafæ on gearihte to eanan
leage.
 22. Þæt andlang hagan to ham tun stigelæ.
 23. Þonon andlang hagan to nican snadæs forda.
 23. Þonon andlang hagan to wissan leage gatæ.
 24. Þonon on þonæ wæst mæstan snad on beaggan hyrste.
 25. Ðæt þonon ofer þonæ fæld on þing leage æft
to þæs wielles heafde.
 27. Ðis synt þa land ge mæru to æscmeres wierðe ðæ
to witan cyrican hierð.
 28. Ærest on hyldan hlawe.
 28. Þonon for bealdan ærsc easteweardnæ andlang þæs
hlinces ðæt to goos dænæ andlang dænæ.
 30. Þæt bæ westan hwyðian pyt.
 30. Þæt ofer wat oran.
 30. Þæt andlang þære denæ to þam hagan.
 31. Þæt andlang hagan for middel oran norðe wearðnæ
andlang hagan on cealfa leage norðe wearde.
 33. Þonnæ andlang weges utt to baggan leage.
 33. Þonon andlang hagan to ullan crywelæ.
 34. Þæt andlang hagan to æcsbyrhtæs geate.
 35. Ðonon andlang hagan to mint leage.
 35. Andlang mynt leage riple utt on alorburnan.
 36. Þonon andlang alorburnan oð sceap wæscan upp andlang
sceap wæscan to sceap wæscan forda.
 37. Þæt andlang hunig wiellæs weges to bræges wiþæ
stanæ upp andlang ealdhunæs dæne utt þurh afocan lea on þonæ
wæsterran wæg.
 39. Ðæt andlang weges.
 40. Æft to hildan hlawe.
 41. Friðestan biscop & þa hiwan on Winteceastræ bebeodad
on Godas naman ælmihtiges & on sanctæs Petres ðæs
ealdorapostolæs & on ealra Godæs haligra naman þæt ðæt land
æt æcsmæres wierðe sie agifen ofer Eadwardes cingæs dæg
umbæ sæcæn to Wintæceastræ.
 45. Þam hiwon into heore beoddærn & gif hit hwa wænde.
 46. Þænnæ wændæ he hit of Godæs bæbod.
 46. And ofer ealra ðissa witena þæ heora naman hær on a
writæne standad.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 379 (Birch 635)
B15.8.103.
Bounds, Sawyer 379: Birch 1885-99, no. 635.



 1. Ærest, feovertyne gearda beneoþan þam pytte, þanon of
Collengaburnan west, up to þam hæþenan byrgelsan, þanon on scortan
dyc.
 3. Þonne to scealdan crundle, þanon to preostan lypan, þanon
andlang grenan dene on þa fox holo westweard, þanon on Bradanbeorg, þonne
on Blerianhylle.
 5. Þanon on Wylberhtes stan, swa forth eall herpathes and dunes,
þanon on Guþredesburg norþweard, þonne on Pendes clif, þanon on
Blerianhylle, þanon on þa swelgende.
 8. Þonne on iebyng crundele, þanon on Sceorran hlinc, þanon
east to þara þreora æcera and heafdon, þanon to þan wylle on
Collengaburnan.

Ch 380 (Birch 610)
B15.8.104.
Bounds, Sawyer 380: Birch 1885-99, no. 610.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro æt Boclande & æt
Welingtune.
 2. Ærest uppan dune æt Achangran of Achangran adune on
Sandford landgemære, þonne adune an þa ealdan dic, þanon oþ
Sandford, þonne andlang þæs ealdan weges oþ Cytelwylle.
 4. Of Cytelwylle andlang streames oþ Tan.
 5. Adune andlang Tan streames oþ Bradanford.
 6. Þanon andlang streames oþ Herpoþford.
 7. Þanon on þeod herpoð oþ þa estas.
 7. Þanon on land gemere oþ Stanford.
 8. Þanon upp on Fiduc andlang landgemæres swa upp on Mær
broc oþ Byrnan hris.
 9. Þanon on ðeod herpoð.
 9. Swa eft on Achangran.
 11. Þis synt þa land gemæro to Lidgerd.
 12. Ærest on Linlege.
 12. Of Linlege uppon strem to Costanforda.
 12. Of Cottanforda upon strem to Gosforda.
 13. Of Gosford uppon strem to Stanforda.
 14. Of Stanforda on Fasingafeld.
 14. Of Fasingafelde.
 14. On Pytt apuldre.
 15. Of Pytt apuldre on æst, Of æste adun cousled to
Readanclife, of Readanclife to Ruwanbeorge, of Ruwanbeorge to Ludanwylle.
 17. Of Ludanwille to Fricanfenne.
 17. Of Fricanfenne uppon streme.
 18. To Gattibricge.
 18. Of Gattibrige to Wibbanwille.
 19. Uppon an slæd to Holan wege.
 19. Of Holanwege uppon slæd to Bacganbeorge.
 20. Of Bacganbeorge to Wynestane.
 20. Of þam stane to Ruwanbeorge.
 21. Of þam beorge to Cwichemhamme.
 21. Of ðam hamme to Collelade.
 22. Of Collislade.
 22. Adune on strem to Horspadesforda.
 23. Of þam forda uppon stræm to Oxenagete.
 23. Of þam gete to Motlege.
 24. Of Motlege on Fideroces torre.
 24. Of Fideroces torre to Frecanðorne.
 25. Of Frecanðorne on Snoccanmere.
 25. Of Snoccanmere on Stangedelfe.
 26. On Hreod alras.
 26. Of Hreod alron on Tideford.
 26. Of þam forda adune on strem to Cunecanforda.
 27. Of Cunecanforda on Cincgesget.
 27. Of Cincgesgete on Suran apuldran.
 28. Of Suran apuldran oth hit cymth eft on Linlege.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 381 (Birch 629)
B15.8.105.
Bounds, Sawyer 381: Birch 1885-99, no. 629; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest to beast man lea.
 1. Ðonne norð to lunden hærpaðe.
 1. Swa to winstanes stapole.
 2. Of þam stapole to þære dic.
 2. Forð andlang dic.
 3. Utt to stræt.
 3. And swa suð andlang dic.
 3. Oð fora gean þane niwan stan.
 4. Þonne west andlang dic.
 4. Of þære dic innan sceaftes hangran.
 4. Swa forð be æfisc to fearn leage suð be herpaðe.
 5. Þonne to baccan geate.
 6. And swa forð be efisc to lippan hamme.
 6. Þ to þam scamelan.
 7. Swa forð to beatan stapole.
 7. Þæt west andlang dæne to deopan delle.
 8. Þæt west andlang slades to swinburnan.
 8. Swa norð of þone æþena byrigels.
 9. Þonne andlang dæne.
 9. Of fearn dune.
 9. Þet forð to screotes dune.
 10. Swa on sænget þorn.
 10. Þet to trind lea.
 10. Swa on bæstman lea.
 11. Ðis sind þa wic.
 11. Ðe hyrað þer to.
 12. Ærest æt ticcenesfelda wicum.
 12. Swa nord andlang hagan þæt man cymð to fearburnan.
 13. Þæt forð to mearc dene heafdum.
 13. Swa norð to seaxes seaðe.
 14. Swa suð þonan of hit cymð to þære holding stowe.
 15. Þonne þer suð andlang hagan of hit cymð æft to
ticcefeldes wicum.
 16. To hundatune.
 17. Ærest fram ðære ea foran gean þæs abbodes byrig.
 17. Þonne swa norð andlang þæs grenan weges.
 18. To crammære.
 18. Þonne þær up to þam hricge.
 19. Ðæt andland dune to cealc grafan.
 19. Þonne innan cealc graf on þone wyl.
 20. Swa on ðæt ruge dæl.
 20. Ðonan east on þone weg.
 21. Andlang weges upp to þam ricge.
 21. Swa norð to þam þorne.
 21. Þær se stapul stent.
 22. Swa &lang weges to þam slade.
 22. Þonne be slade to þære byrig.
 23. Swa nyðer &lang weges on þone forð.
 23. Forþ be ea oð hit cymð æft to þæs abbodes byrig.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 382 (Birch 627)
B15.8.106.
Bounds, Sawyer 382: Birch 1885-99, no. 627.



 1. <foreign>Donum Edwardi regis</foreign> to Fernham.
 1. Ærest æt VII dican to ottan forda.
 1. Swa to sumæres forda.
 1. Þonan to ocan lea.
 2. Þæt to wudan more.
 2. Swa to crudan sceate.
 2. Þonan innon hegcumbe.
 3. Ðæt on ge rihtne to wulf horan.
 3. Swa to fin leage.
 3. Ðet west andlang burnan suð seaxna ge mære &
bisceopes.
 4. And upp andlang leage to witfaldes geate.
 5. Swa to wulfredes beame.
 5. Ðæt to brydelades forda.
 6. Swa to bæran forda.
 6. Þonan to doccena forda.
 6. Ðæt to bindwaldes stigele.
 7. Swa to dic geate.
 7. Þonan to weo leage.
 7. Ðæt to col riðe.
 8. Swa to weter geate.
 8. Þonan to hig geate.
 8. Ðæt utt on þone hæðfelð.
 9. Swa to æcges dæne.
 9. Þonne to gloran ige.
 9. Ðæt on hlos wuda midde weardne.
 10. Swa æft to VII dican.

 1. Ærest on hildan hlewe.
 1. On hunig weg.

 3. Andlang aleburnan.
 3. On beueres broces heafod.
 3. Swa on coferan treow.

 5. Swa on weard feld.

 5. Ðet on scir del.
 6. Swa on cypmanna delle.
 6. Andlang weges eft on hildan hlæw.

Ch 386 (Birch 724)
