Bounds, Sawyer 386: Birch 1885-99, no. 724.



 1. <foreign>Hujus agri termini hæc sunt</foreign>.
 1. Ærest on hacapenn foreweard adun on secgwyll þanon on
craducc þonne anlang streames on culumford of þæm forde to þorn
wylle.
 3. Þanon to bryd wylle þanon to þære ænlipan æc
þanon anlang herpoðes on heanhangran middeweardne þanon on hwitan beorh
þanon on gerihtne on fengel.
 5. Þanon on gerihtne to ðam ealdan geweorce þanon on
byrichangran þonne up on gyran torr þanon on þone hwyrfel þanon on
þone þorn þanon on peon mynet easteweard.
 8. Þanon ongerihte on þa lace adun on culum up of culum on ða
ealdan lace on burhgeardes worðig þanon ongerihtne to rancumb þanon west
on gerihtne be ecge on hacapenn foreweardne.

Ch 387 (Birch 726)
B15.8.109.
Bounds, Sawyer 387: Birch 1885-99, no. 726.



 1. <foreign>Hu us agri termini hæc sunt</foreign>.
 1. Ærest of sceoca broces forda upp on stream oþ ðær seo
dic onfehð.
 2. Swa andlang þære dic of þære dice hyrnan.
 3. Swa adun on þone cumb on þa lace.
 3. Adun on þa lace on ceacga broc.
 4. Adun on ceacga broc on þære dice ende.
 4. Swa east on þa dic of þære dice hyrnan.
 5. Swa suð on þa dic on þone þeod herpað west on herpað
eft to sceoca broces forda.
 7. Munecatunes boc; to Muneca tune.

Ch 388 (Birch 725)

 1. <foreign>Hujus agelluli termini hi sunt</foreign>.
 1. Þis sind þa landgemæro to nywantune.
 2. Ærest on wuduford.
 2. Þonne upp on stream oð þone lyttlan broc.
 3. Þonne andlang broces oð hreodmores heafod.
 3. Þonne on gerihte suð ofer dune to loddan broces æwylman.
 4. Þonne adune on loddan broces stream oð toric.
 5. Þonne upp on toric stream eft to wuduforda.

Ch 389 (Birch 723)
B15.8.111.
Bounds, Sawyer 389: Birch 1885-99, no. 723.



 1. <foreign>Hujus agelluli termini hæc sunt</foreign>.
 1. Ærest of sulforda east anlang herpoðes on culum þanon
eastrihte to langan forda þanon suð anlang streames oð culum lace.
 3. Anlang lace of þære lace up to þære ealdan dic anlang
þære dice on ceaggan cumb þanon on cinges sloh þanon anlang weges to
þæm mægen stane þanon suð þær ða wegas to licgan.
 6. Þanon on þone norðmystan hrycweg anlang hrycges to
ðære eorðburh middeweardre þanon on brydena wyll þanon ut on exan.
 8. Up anlang exan oð scræwanleges lace & scræwanleg
þærto þænne fram æðelstanes hammes forda on sulforda &
feower eceras bewestan exan fornagean edferðes eald lande.
 11. Six gyrdaboc to stoctone.

Ch 393 (Birch 690)
B15.8.113.
Bounds, Sawyer 393: Birch 1885-99, no. 690.



 1. Þis is þæra C hyda land boc þe æþelstan cyng
edniwan gebocode into þam bisceopstole to ealdan mynstre to lofe þære
halgan þrynnysse.
 3. And þam halgan apostolum petre & Paule swa swa cynewalc
cing hit ær þydær in gæ bocode hæfde for his sawla & for
ellæs his leodscypes gesund fullnessæ.
 7. Ðis synd þa land ge mero to Duntune erest of crawan crundul
on wereðan hille on fyrdinges lea.
 8. On ebles burnan to afene.
 8. On wisere.
 9. On ða fulan lace.
 9. On earnes beorch.
 9. On dic.
 9. Æt beoredes treowe.
 10. On þone hearepoð to healdangrafe.
 10. Þonne on þone hagan to witan wyrðe.
 11. On dyre broc.
 11. On welewe.
 11. On þa dic æt Hicheleswyrðe.
 12. Þonne ofer þone feld on hagan ut þurh brember wudu on
þone stenenan stopul andlang herepaðes to fobban wylle.
 13. Andlang herepaðes to þes hagan ende to feger hylde forda.
 14. On þone hagan on ceorles hlewe.
 15. On crawan crundul.
 15. Þonne on ða yferan gemere.
 16. On ebles burnan.
 16. On stretford.
 16. On hrofan hric.
 16. Andlang weges on þa dic to bymera cumbe.
 17. And þer þwyres ofer þreo crundelas.
 17. Ofer þa stret.
 18. Þwyres ofer ða dune to wudu beorh hylle ofer berigan cumb
on eblesburnan.
 19. On stretford.
 19. On beordune.
 19. On þes hlinces ende.
 20. On þone smalan weg.
 20. Ofer higcumb.
 20. On þan smalan wege.
 20. On ðene stan.
 21. On þ heð westeweard.
 21. On þone beorch.
 21. To þam hric wege.
 22. Þonne est andlang hricg weges.
 22. To bryt fordinga land sceare.
 22. Þ suð on stret ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 396 (Birch 659)
B15.8.114.
Bounds, Sawyer 396: Birch 1885-99, no. 659.



 1. Ðær se dic sceot in wæclinga straete anlanges
wæxlinga stræte ðæt in ðane ford þæt anlang broces in þanne
oðerne ford þonne of ðæm forde up on þane welle & þanan in
ðæt dele.
 4. Þanan of ðæm delle in ðone dic of ðæm dic in
ðone oþerne dic þone of ðæm dice in þone borc þonne of þam
broce to cynburge wellan þanne anlang dices.
 6. To east coten þat þanan in þane ealdan broc up of þam
ealdan broce.
 7. On æfem ðæt riþig þæt up rihte in ðiod weg
æftær ðiod wege in þone dic.
 8. Æft dice in pæxlingga strate.
 10. Þis sind ða lande þe æþelstan cyng ge bocade Ealdred
wið his clæne feo on ðas gewitnesse þe her on sind.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 399 (Birch 664)
B15.8.115.
Bounds, Sawyer 399: Birch 1885-99, no. 664.



 1. Erest of the menewelle west ouer þan bourne on
stroddunecrundel þanne on þe elde dich end lange dich on stancangoren
þanen on smalegoren.
 3. Þanen on goteburgh.
 3. Þanen on bradenburgh þanen on aganpol.
 4. Þanen nether endlang brokes on egenwelle.
 4. Þanen on rigt to redencnolle þanen to moscrundel þanen to
nelesburghe þanen to stoncroundel.
 6. Þanen to þan sladen.
 6. Þanen to Gildeneburgh anen eft on þe merewelle of
alwoldesmede tenacres auingmede þanen on Winterburne and so to Woderede erest
on heddengraue þane to athamme þanen to enlipanberwe.
 9. Þanen to haldanleghe þanen eft on heddengraue.

Ch 400 (Birch 663)
B15.8.116.
Bounds, Sawyer 400: Birch 1885-99, no. 663.



 1. Ðis is seo land boc to Stoce þe Eðelstan cing gebocode
Byrhtferþæ his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 1. Ðis synd þa hryct land ge mæro þysses landes.
 2. Ærest æt Stoce æt linforda.
 2. Þonne andlang streames of þone garan eastweardne.
 3. Þonne norð &lang dic.
 3. Þonne æft andlang dic eastericte on ðone stream midde
weardne.
 4. Ðonne æft on andlang streames on þa fulan lace.
 5. Þonne of þære fulan lace east be eastan middel
mærsce.
 6. Ðonne of þære fulan lace upp to wic herepaðe.
 7. Fram wic herepaðe.
 7. Upp on andlang weges of þone litlan garan eastweardne.
 8. Of þam garan andlang dic to þam east lea.
 8. Þonne upp bæ þam wyrttruman on ða dic.
 9. Fram þære dic.
 9. Ford be þam east clife ufe weardum oð weardan hylle.
 10. Fram weardan hylle oþ crawan crundæl.
 11. Fram crawan crundel west on fif beorgas.
 11. Fram fif beorgum to widan crundle.
 12. Fram widan crundle to ðam snawan fram þam snawan to hean
hlincum.
 13. Fram hean hlincum on ðone broc.
 13. Æt ðam wyllum.
 14. Of þam wyllum andlang streames oft æft on lin forð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 401 (Birch 665)
B15.8.117.
Bounds, Sawyer 401: Birch 1885-99, no. 665.



 1. Þis sindon þa land gemæro to austan.
 1. Ærest of sæfern & swa forð be tatan grafes wurt
wale.
 2. And þonne swa forð þ hit sticað on miclan cumb.
 3. And of miclan cumbe þ hit sticað on litlan cumb.
 3. And of litlan cumbe þ on irfurlanges dic.
 4. And of irfurlanges dic þ on mær dic.
 5. And of mær dic.
 5. Þ on ealdan dic & of ealdan dic.
 5. Þ on bradan bricge.
 6. And of bradan bricge þ on holan pyl.
 6. And of holan pylle on wincan hammes dic.
 7. And of wincan hammes dic innan miclan pyl.
 7. And of miclan pylle þ æft on sæferne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 402 (Birch 666)
B15.8.118.
Bounds, Sawyer 402: Birch 1885-99, no. 666.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæro to eatune.
 1. Þæt is þonne ærest from wifeles lace þæt swa up
andlang riðiges þæt hit cymð to fagan flora.
 3. And þenon swa andlang sledes be þam twam lytlam beorgan
þæt hit cymð to wulfunes treow stealle.
 5. Þæt swa þwyres ofer þæt furlang þæt on þa
þyrnan westewarde þær se mycla þorn stod.
 7. Þæt swa on fugel mere þæt þonne andlang dices oð
þæt hit cymð to horwyllan.
 8. Þæt swa andlang riðiges þæt hit cymð to
cerwullan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 403 (Birch 669)
B15.8.119.
Bounds, Sawyer 403: Birch 1885-99, no. 669.



 1. Ærest æt thrim beorgum, æt tham forda, thonne æt
langanstona, thær se flod up scyt.
 3. This sunðe the gemeare thes gerstunlandes and thære mede.
 4. Ærest æt tham heagam.
 4. This hure swa suth andlang there stanstrete on kingesham.
 5. Swo thanne suth and west andlang weges to than hegeleten bufan
than litlan stenenan forda.
 6. Swa suth and gerihte on ther eastren willes heafed.
 7. Swoa west andlang streams to stockbrugge.
 8. Swo north andlang thare fore street to suthgate.
 9. Thises londesbok swa etefast on tha gerad here sealmsang sye
ealning ge least there biscop tham cyninge gebet.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 404 (Birch 667)
B15.8.120.
Bounds, Sawyer 404: Birch 1885-99, no. 667.



 1. <foreign>Primitus ad</foreign> Dumoltan eastan on is esingeburna, ðonne suþan
of esingburnan westwardes ondlong dices ðæt swa upp on gerihte on dagan
oran.
 3. Ðæt swa ondlong scæð broces in gemare dic, ðæt
swa ondlong in secgmere, ðæt swa of secgmere east ryhte in esingburnan in
derna ford.
 6. Ðonne sind ðis ða landgemæru æt pid wellan: of pid
wellan in crundelu, of crundelum suð ryhte ondlong hrycges on tittandune, of
tittandune west on ealdan wellan ðonon in winterburnan.
 8. Swa in pid wellan, of pid wellan on eomeres medwa & swa on
oþerne winter burnan, ðæt in pid wellan, & swa ondlong pid wellan
oppo crundelu.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 405 (Birch 1343)
B15.8.121.
Bounds, Sawyer 405: Birch 1885-99, no. 1343.



 1. Ærest of fintes leage west on herepaþ oþ holancumbes
heafod.
 2. Norþ þanon on dic.
 2. Sceaft ryht on cuddan cnoll easteweardne.
 3. Þær west on here paþ oþ þornisces weg.
 3. On þornisces weg þonne norð on scip broc.
 4. Up on stream oð herepaþ.
 4. Þonne sceaft ryht oð lillesforda.
 5. Þonne on cealdan hlinc weste weardne.
 5. Þonne on wyrtrum oþ cealdan hlinc easteweardne.
 6. On wyrtrum þonne git norð oþ broc heardes hamm.
 7. Þonne of dune on hagan on brom leage niþe wearde.
 8. Þonne sceaft ryht oþ pideres leage.
 8. Þonne sceaft ryht oþ hlos leage nioþe wearde.
 9. Þonne on stream oþ fileð leage.
 9. Norþ on herepaþ oþ ðel brycge.
 10. Þonne up on stream oþ æsculfes weorðig.
 11. Norð þanon sceaft ryht oþ efes.
 11. Þonne on wyrtrum oþ lucan weorðig.
 12. Norð on hagan oþ cyneferðes broc.
 12. Þonne of dune on stream.
 13. Of dune on cridian.
 13. Oþ cridian.
 13. Oþ þone broc þe scyt from fileð leage.
 14. Up on stream oþ stan ford.
 14. Suþ þonne on wyrtrum oþ henne stigele eastewearde.
 15. Þonne sceaft ryht oþ hroces ford.
 15. Þon on weard setl suð þonne on wyrtrum oþ fintes leag.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 411 (Birch 682)
B15.8.122.
Bounds, Sawyer 411: Birch 1885-99, no. 682.



 1. Þis sindan þa land gemæro þe to fearn beorgan
gebyriað of fearn beorge west on þone weg to þam stanne of þam stanum
suð on þone weg oð þa andheafda.
 3. Of þam andheafdum on þa hlinc ræwe up to þære dic be
norðan stodfaldon þonne forð on þa dic to mær flodan be eastan
lilliglea þonne forð andlang þæs suþeran weges oð þæt lange
treow.
 6. Þonne forð west on þone weg ofer beo cumb to þam stan
crundle þonne north on þane smalan weg wið eastan brocenan beorg to þam
wege þær east ligð.
 9. Þonne forð on þone weg to cytelflodan be westan mulescumbe
þær þa wegas twisligað þonne forð to scyldmere þonne forð on
þa furh to furcumbe andlanges furcumbes midde weardes to þære dene.
 12. Þonne forð on þa denu to þæra wega gemyþan þonne
forð to þam hwitan wege to þam haran þornan þonne of þam witen wege
on fearnbeorg & se leag be eastan catmere þe þær to gebyreð.
 14. Þ is on þone weg þe lið to stan leage þonne forð
siððan suð on þone stanihtan weg of stan meringa gemære.
 16. Þonne forð on þone smalan weg to þam fulan wege se
hatte stific weg þ is catmæringa gemære & þaes landes to fearn
beorgan.
 18. Þonne forð andlang þæs weges ut on þonne feld &
þonne ealle þa hangram be tweonan þam wege & þam þe to stanleage
ligð ge byriað ealle to fearnborgan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 412 (Birch 674)
B15.8.123.
Bounds, Sawyer 412: Birch 1885-99, no. 674; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is seo landboc X hydæ to clearan ðe eþelstan cing
bocodæ ælfricæ biscope on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ærest on easthealfe þær ecelesburna scyt on aleburnan.
 3. And swa suðwearð up andlang ecelesburnon to þam mearc
broce andlang þere ealdan dic to ceotan stapole.
 5. And of cæotan stapole to ðon crundele þe se igþ
onstent.
 6. And of þam crundele on þ lange grauet.
 7. Of þam lange grafette.
 7. Suðeweardon to ðon hnottan seale on searleage stent.
 8. Of ðam seale to ðon pæðe.
 8. Up andlang paðes to þære apoldre.
 9. And be eastan bunteles pyte forð.
 9. To þam ealdan adfini.
 9. Of þam finie up to þam ealdan elebeame.
 10. Of þam elebeame to þam hricgwege on gean þone haran
ðorn.
 11. West andlang weges to þære easteran dic.
 12. Suð andlang dic on ðone lytlan pað.
 12. Of þam paðe on ge richte to secges geate.
 13. Of secges geate andlang paðes to hamleas sceagan.
 14. And swa andlang paðes on hremres wyrðe.
 14. Þonne ut on ðone herpað.
 15. Þonne andlang herpaðes to ðere ealdan stret.
 16. On suðeweardon & on easteweardon þam lande.
 16. And swa west andlang stret to bradanhamme midde weardon.
 17. Of bradan hamme up to witan hamme.
 18. Of witan hamme on ðone miclan hæslwrið wið neoðan
þ grafet.
 19. Of þam hæslwriðe on ge rihte wið þæs lytlan stan
beorges up on hæsl hille.
 20. Of þam stan beorge ofer ða dene be suðan hil grafon to
ðon lytlan stan beorge.
 21. Of ðam stan beorge to ðon oðerum lytlan stan beorge be
eastan hulgrafum.
 22. Swa andlang þæs lytlan hricges be ðere west mearce
oððone miclan hlinc andlang hlinces oððone lytlan eastlangan hlinc.
 24. Æt norðe weardon þam miclan hlince.
 25. Andlang þæs lytlan hlynces.
 25. Þ ofer þa dene on ðes hlinces heafod.
 26. Up an gemanan hylle.
 26. Swa on ge rihte norð east ofer ge manan hylle.
 27. To ðam herepaðe ðe scyt to meres byrig.
 28. East andlang herpaðes to holan wege.
 28. And nyðer andlang holan weges.
 29. Þonne lið be westan wege X eceras to ðon easteran lande.
 30. Forð norð andlang weges to ðon herpaðe ðe scyt to
þære byrig to west cleran.
 31. West andlang herpaðes to ðere miclan flodan.
 31. Æt eadrices coton.
 32. Of þære flodan norð west to þære miclan apoldre.
 33. West on ge rihte wið suðan þa mede þ it sticad to
emnes þam wiðigðyfelum be westan fucges flodan & ðer norð ofer
ða mede.
 34. And went ðer eastweard.
 35. And swa benorðan fucges flodan to rugan hlince.
 36. And swa norð be rugan hlince.
 36. Of rugan hlince norðe weardne.
 36. And ðer east hwon to ðere broc riðe.
 37. Þ' norð andlang broces to ðere riðe.
 38. Ðe scyt east andlang dene be norðe beorh dune oð to emnes
þes hlinces heafde.
 39. And ðer up þ norð andlang æþeles wyrðe.
 39. Ongerihte to ealdan wyrðe suðe wearðne to ðon ðornum
norð on ge rihte wið westan ealdan wyrðe to ðon lytlan grafette up on
wuncges dune.
 42. And ðer west hwon to ðon norð langan grafette.
 42. Þ norð to ðere lytlan dic.
 43. Æt þam Crundelum.
 43. Swa nord east to ðære lytlan riðe.
 44. Of ðere riðe norðe weardre on riht to gos leage wege.
 44. To wuda andlang weges to Cleran.
 45. Finie.
 45. Þ to ðere gemearcoðan æfsan.
 45. Of ðere gemearcodan æfsan.
 46. To ðon readan slo.
 46. Of þam slo to ðon rihte treowe æt gosleage wicum
westeweardon.
 47. Of ðam treowe to ðere wican æt þam boxe.
 48. Of þam boxe to ðære ge mearcodan æc æt aleburnan
æt þam liytlan egilande æt weste weardon & æt norðe weardon
þære land mearce.
 50. And swa be norðam þam lande east andlang alerburnan.
 51. Þ hit sticad æt eclesburnan on easteweardon.
 51. And on norðe weardon þære mearce ðisses fore cwedenan
landes.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 413 (Birch 675)
B15.8.124.
Bounds, Sawyer 413: Birch 1885-99, no. 675.



 1. Ærest on ðone stan æt þæm hæðnan byrgelsan
þanne ut on prilleces hæssecas ufe wearde þonne on cocbroc.
 3. Anlang streames þæt on mylenbroc.
 3. Þonne andlang streames.
 4. Þæt on lentan.
 4. Þonne andlang streames þæt on mærpol.
 5. Þonne of þæm pole on bean boroc ðonne and stremes on
headdan mere.
 6. Þonne of ðam mere on þan lace þær þa brocas
twisliað.
 7. Þanne of ðæm twislan on mær beorh.
 7. Þanne of þæm beorge on þone herepað.
 8. Þonne andlang herpaþes seofan & fiftig gyrda.
 9. Ðonne andlang fyrh on ðone stan beorh.
 9. Þonne of þæm stan beorge on ðone hæþenan byrgels
eft to þam stane.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 414 (Birch 670)
B15.8.125.
Bounds, Sawyer 414: Birch 1885-99, no. 670.



 1. Þis sindon þæra X hida land gemæru æt Prisctune.
 1. Ærest on þone ealdan edenan ford of þam forda on hwitda
cumb.
 2. Andlang cumbes on gæn strem.
 3. On þone herepaþ.
 3. Andlang herepaðes west on þone þyrla stan.
 4. Of þam stane on þone haran stan.
 4. And of þan stane.
 5. Innan þone ealdan sele.
 5. And of þam sele norþ on gerihte innan loxan.
 6. Andlang loxan.
 6. On genstren on leommannes graf.
 6. Westeweardan þonne norþ andlang þære ealdan dic on
readan ford.
 7. Of reada forda on þa stræt.
 8. Andlang stræt up on gerihte on wynma dune westewearde on
þone herepað.
 9. Andlang herepaðes east on gerihte on ælfsiges stan.
 10. Of þam stane eft adun on þone ealdan edenan ford.
 11. <foreign>Divisiones æsctunæ</foreign>.
 12. Þis synd þa land gemæru þara III hyda to æsctune.
 12. Þ is fram heort leage westeweardre andlanges mærheges þ
up on wadham.
 13. Þonne be egce on eanswyþe wyllas.
 14. Þonne up rihte on þa hwyrfel dic.
 15. Fram þære dic.
 15. To þam crundelum.
 15. Fram þam crundelum oþ midne þone þone readan weg.
 16. Þonne adun rihte ut þurh þone sceagan.
 17. Oþ þa lege þonne be wyrttruman oþþa rode
neoþewearde.
 17. Þonne be westan rode oþ sticelan stig.
 18. Þonne be þære stige oþþa ealdan dic.
 19. Þonne west andlang dic.
 19. On þone æsc.
 19. Þonne norþ on gerihte on þ ealde hlipiget.
 20. Of þam gete &lang herpoþes.
 20. On þ fule sloh.
 20. Of þam slo west be wyrttruman to cocggan hylle.
 21. Þonne be graue neoþeweardan oþ cattys gett.
 22. Þonne be ecge oþ holan wege.
 22. Eft be ecge oþ holan wylle.
 23. Þonne to þam lam pytte.
 23. Fram þam pytte east on þa hæþenan byrigelsas.
 24. Þonne of þam byrgelsum to þam sealtherpoþe.
 25. Andlang herpoþes oþ æþelmodes wudu.
 25. Þonne suþ be wuda oð eddes dene.
 26. Of þære dene middeweardre licgaþ twegen æceras on
norþhealfe.
 27. Þ eft on þa ilcan dene.
 27. Andlanges dene eft on mærweg.
 28. Andlang mærweges on mapodor leage.
 28. Be easton þere leage twegen æcreas.
 29. Of þam æcerum on hlemmes dene.
 29. Andlang dene on hlamnys wylle.
 30. Andlang broces to þæs cinges gemyþan.
 30. Of þam gemyþan west be broce to linleg wylle.
 31. Of þære wylle on þa hyle.
 31. Þonne be þære hyle upp andlang slædes to hafoc
wylle.
 32. Of hafoc wylle.
 32. Eft on heort leage westeweardre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 416 (Birch 677)
B15.8.126.
Bounds, Sawyer 416: Birch 1885-99, no. 677.



 1. Ðis is þæra land boc to Hamme þæ Aðelstan
cing/ gebocade Wulfgare bisceope on æce yrfe.
 1. <foreign>Prædicta siquidem tellus. His terminis. Circumcincta
clarescit</foreign> ærast on eastewardan.
 2. On lin leage geat.
 2. And ðonne in lin leage middewearde.
 3. And ðonon suðrihte wið ðara stan ceastla.
 3. And ðonne of ðæm stan ceastlum to pyddes geate.
 4. Ðonon to oswaldes berghe.
 5. Ðonon ondlong herpoðes.
 5. On burghardes anstigo.
 5. Ðonne forð to bares anstigon.
 6. Ðonon on heardanleage middewearde.
 6. Ðonne suð on ge rihte.
 7. Ondlong henna dene.
 7. Oð hit cimeð to ðære dic.
 7. Ðonne west ut ðurh henna leah.
 8. Oð hit cimeð to ðære efese.
 8. Ðonne a norð be wyrtwalan ðæt on efen ðone greatan
æsc, ðonne norð ondlong ðæs hlinces.
 10. Ðæt on bofan hangran, ðonne ondlong hagan.
 11. On wifiling falod weste weardne, ðonne norð ofer dune.
 11. On meos hlinc weste weardne, ðonne a dune on ða yfre.
 12. On beowan hammes hecgan.
 13. On bremeles sceagan easteweardne, ðonne on ða blacan
græfan.
 14. Ðonne norð be ðem & heafdan.
 14. To ðære scortan dic.
 15. Butan anan æcre, ðonne to fugel mere to ðan wege,
ondlong weges.
 16. To ottes forda, ðonon to wudumere, ðonne to ðære ruwan
hecgan, ðæt on langan hangran, ðonne on grendles mere, ðonon on dyrnan
geat, ðonne eft on lin leage geat.
 19. Þis is þæs landes boc æt hamme.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 417 (Birch 689)
B15.8.127.
Bounds, Sawyer 417: Birch 1885-99, no. 689; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þara XII hida boc þe eþælstan cing ge bocode
aðelwardæ his þægne æt meonæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ærest of mearc beorge weste weardum.
 3. Andlang here paðes norð innan Meone.
 4. Þanon andlang hege rewe on ðone hlinc easteweardne.
 5. Æt þære efisc.
 5. Þonne þurh þone lea on þam leage.
 5. Ðurh þone lytlan lea weste weardne.
 6. Þanon norð on ðone wudu.
 6. On an del weste weard.
 7. And þanon norð on oðer del eac weste weard.
 7. Norð to eaces stede midde weardum þanon on ge rihte to brom
dæne on þæt bec.
 9. Þonne east andlang þæs becæs.
 9. Of þæm bæce ofer þone ham on þone scagan ute weardne
to hure ðes treowe þonne east andlang dic to þam eastram bæce.
 11. Þonne norð andlang bæces on hnut leage bære.
 12. Eastewearde.
 12. Ðanon norð on lin leage eastewearde.
 13. To ticces stede.
 13. Þonne east be efisc.
 13. Þurh þone lea norðe weardne.
 14. And þanon on risc mere.
 14. Of þæm mere to þæm wege.
 15. Andlang weges on sciteres flodan.
 15. Þanon on crute brece leage weste eastewearde.
 16. And swa to weawan hocan.
 16. Þanon on þa heafod stoccas.
 17. Þanon on worres sol.
 17. Of worres sole to Meone.
 17. Up andlang meone on seolesburnan.
 18. Andlang burnan.
 18. On ðone æwylm.
 18. Of þam ewylme.
 19. Andlang weter weges.
 19. Up to strete andlang strete on himan beorgas.
 20. Ðanon on trind lea.
 20. Andlang hære paðes.
 20. Þonne betweox ða twegen wegas.
 21. Þurh þone lea.
 21. And ofer fearnleage.
 21. Þonne on west healfe weges.
 22. On gerihte to curdan heale.
 22. Ðonne andlang hlinces.
 22. On tollan dene ufe wearde.
 23. Þonne andlang hlinces norð to mearc beorge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 418 (Birch 692)
B15.8.128.
Bounds, Sawyer 418: Birch 1885-99, no. 692; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Aerest of Swæðelingforda west to Smerebrocesforda, and
þanon westweard andlang herepaðes to Hrumbrocesæwelme.
 2. And swa foriþ andlange weges on suþhealfe gætes hlæwe
þæt hit cymþ to feower treowum; þonon þanen norð andlang
herepaðes to Gyþerices wille.
 5. And swa forþ andlang weges oþ hit cymþ to fearnbedde,
þanon east on þæt slæd oþ hit cymþ to holan broce.
 6. Þonne þanon norþ andlang holan broces oþ þa sand
pyttas, þanon on Byrewege oþ hit cymþ on Cytanbroces ælwilme.
 8. And swa andlange broces oþæt hit cymþ to Ippingwanne,
þonne suþ be Efist oþæt þæt slæde þa scit to mæran broce,
andlang broces oþ hit cymþ to wærgiþe forda.
 11. Þanon on gerihte to eastlea wearden þone norþ, swa se
haga scyt to Baranleage norþwearden, þonne þanon norþ oþæt hit
cymþ to þere fotyhtan æc and swa suþ.
 13. Andlange stræte, oþ hit cymþ to grenan leage, þon
þær east and suþ oþ hit cymþ to Cynninges dic.
 15. Andlange þere dic, oþ hio bygð ongean mucelinge mæde
norþwearde ut on Icenan, þon swa Icenan scyt oþ hit cymþ foran ongean
hierdes wylles æwylm, þanon weast to scortan þorne.
 17. Þanon suþ to þane herepaðe þe lyþ to Mannes brycge,
and swa weast andlange herepaðes on Swæþelingeforde and þær hyrde
sio mæde to æt Woþhringe and nigon æceras on eal norþweardun
geonun æscun.
 21. And a mylansteall benorþan Mannesbrycge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 419 (Birch 691)
B15.8.129.
Bounds, Sawyer 419: Birch 1885-99, no. 691



 1. Arest on wde brigthe.
 1. And þanen up on beteswirþe sled.
 2. Þanen, to snelles hamme weghe.
 2. Þanne on þurch þo aelres to holencumbe.
 3. Of panne cumbe, to holenwelle.
 3. Of þan welle.
 3. On hamelendune north ecge.
 4. Þanen, to langencumbes hauede.
 5. Þanen, on dollen berch.
 5. An þanne to wde on done hagen oð þas soces seað ðanen,
on holewei.
 6. Of holleweie on sledwich.
 6. Of sledweie, on hriycsweg.
 7. Þannen anlang hricg weges.
 7. Of rig wei ut to þe wines weie þanen, to burch linken dannen
on þa gereþrenc withinne da chealc seðas þanen, to holebroke.
 10. Þanen on ðæs lutlen searpennes suð eke þane on
sandhellesled.
 11. Þanne on ða riwe to styrd þanen anlang streames eft to
wde bricge.
 12. Þanne, on halgan weies lake.
 12. Þanen, to þanen welle siluen.
 13. Þanen on þa hege reawe to þane shamelen.
 13. An to þan herepaþe.
 14. Þonne west be Winteintune.
 14. Ut þurch sulangraf.
 14. Þanne one þe hegen.
 15. Be weste hegen paðe and þar of dune to þare stigele
þanne west anlang hegen to heldmannes wrthe suthward þanne north.
 17. To ludmannes putte.
 17. Þanne be wirtrune, on hlinches broc.
 18. Of þanne broke, to Wigheardes stapele.
 18. Fram Wigheardes stapele, to cludesleghe.
 19. Of þare lege, to þanen ealden herepaþe þ schet to
hlinchesfelde.
 20. Þanen forð be wyrttrune to scearpenhame.
 21. Þanen one þat lake to stirchel an lang streames eft to
wdebrige, and at suttune ligð XXIIII akeres meade þat hirð in to
funtmel.
 23. On ðes horderes land oþerhalf hewisse of suttune erþe in
to þis land.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 422 (Birch 695)
B15.8.130.
Bounds, Sawyer 422: Birch 1885-99, no. 695.



 1. Ærest on easthealfe, of eastan wylles heafde, andlang lace to
mylenburnan, thonne andlang streames oth gifle.
 2. Thonne eft andlang streames oth ænnan pol thanon andlang lace
oththa ealdan dic, thonne andlang dic oth hloscumbes heafud.
 4. Thanon on ecge, andlang ecge oththa dic thanon andlang dic, oth
ecgulfes treow, thanon east to ættandene middeweardre andlang dene eft to
ættan wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 423 (Birch 696)
B15.8.131.
Bounds, Sawyer 423: Birch 1885-99, no. 696.



 1. Ærest of Cirichylle on horgan sloh thanon on beorhleage,
thanon on west mæd ufewearde, thanon on bydeburnan, thanon on anna mapulder
thanon on bilian wyrthe, swa forth on hagan, thæt on beorreding mæd
northewearde, thanon on tha greatan ac, thæt forth on hagan oth stanbroc.
 5. Thonon on hean wifeleshylle oth thone ealdan weg andlang weges
oth fyldena wylle, thanon on thone ealdan hagan, thæt swa forth ut on
bealtunes ersc nytheweardne thonon on æsc leage of tham æsce forth on
hagan on gerihte ut on feld on anne stan, thæt swa forth east andlang weges
eft on ciric hylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 424 (Birch 699)
B15.8.132.
Bounds, Sawyer 424: Birch 1885-99, no. 699.



 1. Þis his norþ niwan tunes boc.
 1. Aerest on Auene æt stintes forde þæt andlang weges on
teoltan ford.
 2. And swa on gean stream on wifeles ford.
 2. Þonne andlang þæs frið herpaþes on sand beorh.
 3. Of þam beorge to botan wylle.
 3. Þonne forð be streame on blacan lace.
 4. Þ andlang lace on afene.
 4. And swa andlang stremes eft on stintes ford.
 6. Þis synt þa land gemære æt þam oran.
 7. Ærest on hæsel wylle.
 7. Þ andlang weges on beorh dic.
 7. Þonne andlang þære dic on risþysel.
 8. And swa west on butan on bradanstan.
 8. Of þam stane on rugan dic.
 9. Þonen on lusa beorg.
 9. Þ andlang weges on readan sloh.
 10. And swa to wodnes dic.
 10. Þonne forð be þare dic on crypel geat.
 11. Þonne to dræg stane.
 11. And swa to meos leage.
 11. Of þare leage andlang oxna pæþes eft on hæsel wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 425 (Birch 702)
B15.8.133.
Bounds, Sawyer 425: Birch 1885-99, no. 702



 1. Ærast on æscwoldes hlaw.
 1. Ðonne on gemot biorh.
 1. Ðonne on setl ðorn.
 2. Ðonne on lytlan biorh.
 2. Ðonne on gat ham.
 2. Ðonne on æðelgiðe deno.
 3. Ðonne on widan leh.
 3. Ðonan on wulfa biorh.
 3. Ðonne betweonan twæm biorgum.
 4. Ðonon on wæbbeles hol.
 4. Ðonon on mearc biorh.
 5. Ðonon on pis berh, & ðis synt ða denbæra ðe to
ðissum londe mid rihte belimpað.
 6. Hlos dionu.
 6. Swanu dionu.
 6. Gehæg holt.
 7. Prentsan hlaw.
 7. Ruwan biorg.
 7. Ecgwealdes cumb.
 7. Wæter ðorn.
 8. Eofor sol.
 8. Ðyrran mere.
 8. Biohhan dun.
 8. Wiðig wic.
 8. Garunga leah.
 9. Hudelinga scydd.
 9. Scealces hom.
 9. Broc hyrst.
 9. Byring falod.
 9. Fæstan falod.
 10. Hæcinga hleah.

Ch 429 (Birch 708)
B15.8.134.
Bounds, Sawyer 429: Birch 1885-99, no. 708.



 1. Arest of pimpernwelle.
 1. And þanen, to þare rede hane.
 1. And þanen, to þare hwitendich.
 2. And þanen andlang dich, to dungete ut þurch þane wde &
þanen, to þan stanegan crundel & þanen to fildene lane uppende &
þanen, to terrente & þanen anlang streames oð þanne ford.
 5. And þanen eft anlang herepaþes od littlen wde & þanne
an lang þere fures one dat dich & þanen to tatanbeorge.
 7. And of þane berge an lang wic herepaþes to chircelford &
of þanne forde.
 8. To bacging berghe & þanen on þane oþerne beoit.
 8. And þannen to horsedich & þannen on worres berg of
þane beorge.
 10. Est on þone med ham suðe wardne & þanen on þat
beorhlem be westen cockes þorne.
 11. And þanen þiyres ouer chelesbergh & þanen wið
norþen þanen graetem beorge & þanne of dune to pimpern.
 13. On þa burnestowe middewarde & þanen eft to
pimpernwelle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 430 (Birch 707)
B15.8.135.
Bounds, Sawyer 430: Birch 1885-99, no. 707; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Hamafuntan land boc þe æþælstan cing bocode Wihtgare.
 2. Ðis synd þæs landæs ge mæro æt Hamanfuntan.
 3. Ærest þær ocerburna utt scyt on sæ.
 3. Þæt upp andlang oceburnan to halelan mærscæ
eastæweardan andlang brocæs.
 4. Þæt ofer þa stret.
 5. Æt utelan bricge.
 5. Þenne ofær þa stræt.
 5. Twam les þæ þrittig gyrda andlang burn stowæ.
 6. Þænne þer east to stucan wisc æt þæne mearc beorh
þænnæ andlang ræwe on þorn wic eastæweardæ to þon witan
stoccæ.
 8. Þonne of þam hwitan stoccæ.
 8. Þurh þæt wudu geheg to neddan leage.
 9. To þam hære paðe.
 9. Þænne andlang næddan leage be þam wege oþþa norð
efes þonne andlang hærpaðes to dundeburnan on þæne wear rihtan
stocc.
 11. Þonne andlang dundeburnan on þæne easthærepað.
 12. On þa twa æcc.
 12. Þæ standad in on þan hær paðæ.
 13. Þonnæ andlang hagan on lam hyrsðæ eastæwearda on
iwwara hagan.
 14. Þonnæ andlang iwwara hagan on þæne ifihtan stocc.
 15. Þonnæ of þam ifihtan stoccæ suþ bæ hrycg wege
oþþa hyrnan.
 16. Þonnæ of þære hyrnan andlang iwwara hagan suþ &
east on þa burn stowæ.
 17. Þonnæ of þære burn stowe andlang hagan on herredes
leage.
 18. Wesþæ wearðæ.
 18. Þonnæ be þære leage on þæne stocc þe þæt
lid geat on hangodæ.
 19. Þænnæ of þam stoccæ utt þurh beorc leage midde
weardne on þæne ealdan æsc.
 20. Þonnæ of þam æscce suþ ofer þonæ weg on þa
apoldre.
 21. Þonnæ of þære apoldre on þæne hwitan hæsl.
 22. Þonnæ of þam hwitan hæsle on hnutt wic eastæwearde
andlang grænan wegæs oþ wuhing landæs hyrnan.
 23. Þænnæ wæst andlang weges oðða westran wuh ing
landes hyrnan suþ þonnæ andlang hege ræwe oþ imbæs dæl.
 25. Þonne of imbæs dællæ.
 25. Andlang hege ræwæ utt on limburnan.
 26. Þonnæ andlang limburnan utt on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 431 (Birch 709)
B15.8.136.
Bounds, Sawyer 431: Birch 1885-99, no. 709.



 1. Þis beth þe land mere at Merkesburi.
 1. On radanforde þanen endlang brokes on Conigrave est and
nortward þanen on rigte to Wedergrave southward þanen bi Wyrtwalen to
Aldresyate of Aldresyate on Middilgrave suthward þanen endlang weies of the
wei birth west.
 5. Þanen bi wirtwallen.
 5. Þanen on Widencombe southward þanen endland Widecombes on
Southbrok endlang brokes on Holendich þanen endlang þes Mere hawen on
Kalwendoune þanen endlang calwendoune to þis forlang estende.
 8. Þanen þar north on the heved to grave þanen on
wirþwale.
 9. Þanen on smale wey endlang weies in wondes dich schot and
foure acres bi northe þan dich of wondes dich by wirtwalen þaron
brigtingleighe estward panen on rigt up on Pinckesbrugge þanen on merewelle.
 13. Þanen on rgit to þis est long furlang estende endelang
þar lete to þan north lang furlang north ende endlanges þar lete þar on
stan wei endlanges stan weies þar eft on Radenforde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 432 (Birch 715)
B15.8.137.
Bounds, Sawyer 432: Birch 1885-99, no. 715.



 1. First into Gorlak thanne to Bykenstill, from that still to the
Whitston, thans unto the old ditch, from thulk dick to Depebroke in the old
dicke place, then to the five acres, from the five acres unto the Hundslawe,
and swo adoun to the Slo, and from the Slow to Riselheie, thans to
Whatcombshey, and so adoun to the Olderworth, and thennes to Brodemersh to the
Reddich, endelong the dich anon to the Inrek.
 7. From thenns to PrivetesMoreshed, from Moreshed anon to the
middle of Privates Brigg, and thens endelong the more anon to Threskwold, and
thens to Ashlake.
 10. From Ashlake unto the old lake up into Chesterlake and unto
Toteyate.
 11. From Toteyate to Hengestwere.
 11. From Hengestwere unto Hornwere.
 12. From Hornwere unto Shirwold lode, eftsones unto Gorlake.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 433 (Birch 721)
B15.8.138.
Bounds, Sawyer 433: Birch 1885-99, no. 721.



 1. <foreign>Territoria autem istius agri hec sunt</foreign>.
 1. Ærest fram toppes oran up on exan on þone nearan team pol.
 2. Þanon up on exan.
 2. Þonne of exa on þa smala lace.
 3. Of þære lace eft on exa.
 3. Þanon up andlang exa on þone uferan team pol.
 4. Þanon up on exan stream oð pole.
 5. Upp of pole on þone ealdan herpað to dyran treowe.
 5. Þanon suð on wynford up on stream on wyndeles cumbe midde
weardne up on þa pyrian.
 7. Þanon andlang dic on þone weig.
 7. East andlang weiges on þære dice hirnan andlang dic ut on
clyst.
 8. Andlang streames eft on toppes oran.
 10. Þis synd þære anre gyrde land gemæro æt
æschyrste þe gebyrað in to þære hyde æt toppeshamme.
 11. Ærest fram æschyrste.
 11. To æsc wylles lace.
 12. Þanon up to herpað.
 12. And fram þam herpaðe suð rihte oð hit cymð to gyrde
hrigces forda.
 13. Fram gyrde hricges forda adun on stream to wungyfe fordan.
 14. Þanon west on þone herpað oð þ hit cymð to æsc
willes lace heafdon.
 16. Toppeshammes boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 437 (Birch 712)

 1. Þæs ben þe land mæro æt Niwantune ærest of
stanwege andlang slædes on ða fulan rode of þare fulan rode andlang
slædes to dinnes hangran ut þurh denegiðegraf to þan hagþorne.
 3. And þan to þam hlæwe & þan to þam ellene &
þan to Use staeþe on ealferðes hlaew & þan on suðfelde & swa
be wirtwalam on þa efsan & þan on þone wiðig & swa be wirtwalan
on þone mereþorne on eastehalf branteswyrðe & þanne on þone
Stanwege.

Ch 438 (Birch 714)
B15.8.140.
Bounds, Sawyer 438: Birch 1885-99, no. 714.



 1. Þis his brydancumbes land boc þe æþelstan cing ge
bocode þam hiþum at Wiltune for hine & for eadflede his swistor on eche
yrfe.
 4. Þis syndon þa land gemæro æt Brydancumbe.
 5. Of noddre staþe up ofer east cumb swa se stan hrycg scyt ut to
þan hæþanne byrgelse.
 6. Þonne west andlang hricges swa se herepoþ sceat to þam
beorge to scorte hryþrum.
 7. Þonne forþ be yfre oþ hringwoldes treow.
 8. Þonne andlang herpoþes in on beorge.
 8. Forð þonne andlang streames oþ oxnaford.
 9. Þonne þær ofer on ane lake.
 10. Þonne andlang lake eft in on noddre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 440 (Birch 729)
B15.8.141.
Bounds, Sawyer 440: Birch 1885-99, no. 729.



 1. Þis is ðæra sextunæ hyda land boc æt
Pipingmynstræ þe eðælstan cing gæ bocodæ elfheagæ his
þægnæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þæra XVI hida land ge mere to Pipingmynstre.
 4. Ærest of searrescumbes heafde west on ðone herepað swa
west andlang herepaðes þ hit cume on easteweardne acbeara.
 5. Þ norð on gerihte of acbeara weste weardan on þæs
biscopes gemere on bennancumb.
 7. Swa dun æfter þæs biscopes gemere on bennancumbes ford.
 8. Þ hit cumð be norðan fyrs leage swa of norðen wardre
fyrsleage.
 9. On bennancumbes broc.
 9. Þ up on gean stream east en tucheles mor.
 10. Of þam more on ge rihte on heardan geat.
 10. Of þam geate on hagan on deopan ford.
 11. Of þam forda on þæ rihte land sceare adun on sciteres
stream.
 12. Of þan streame on gerihte on witan stan on þ ge beare
norðe wearðne.
 13. Ðanon on readan ford.
 13. Of þam forda east on þone herepað.
 14. Of þam herepaðe suð þ on langan ham.
 15. Of þam hamme þanon binnan euisc on gregan stan.
 15. Of þam stane on lind oran.
 16. Of lind oran on þone ealdan hagan on wealdenes weg.
 17. Of þam wege upp an dune on hringwoldes beorh.
 18. Of þam beorge west andlang dune on wiðisled to henna
þorne.
 19. Þanon west on ða ealdan dic.
 19. Þonne sume hwile andlang þære dice.
 20. And þænon norð ofer wiðan cumbe.
 20. Þ east on fearres cumbes heafd.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 441 (Birch 730)
B15.8.142.
Bounds, Sawyer 441: Birch 1885-99, no. 730



 1. Þis is rimtunes land boc ðe æþelstan cing gebocode
æþerede his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis syndon þes landes ge mære æt Rimtune.
 3. Ærest of hig broce suþ andlang dic on ðone herpað.
 4. West andlang herpaðes on wendan mære on morþ dic.
 5. Þonon norð &lang herpaðes on wiðig leas wyrttruman.
 6. Þonne ealling be wyrttruman oþ aclea eastewearðne &
nordþe weardne.
 7. Þanon on hig broc east &lang broces on þes hiwisces
dic.
 8. Nord &lang dices on þæt strod east &lang strodes.
 9. Of þam strode on wederangrafe scagan.
 9. Utt þurh þone scagan.
 9. Andlang beas broces þonne suþ be wyrttruman eft on hig
broc.

END_TEXT

Ch 442 (Birch 728)
B15.8.143.
Bounds, Sawyer 442: Birch 1885-99, no. 728.



 1. Erest of se in sigilmere þanen up on clif of clive to
farngoren þanen on here paþ on sirdeheved þanen on mappilleknap of
huneforde þanen on þe sour appeldore of þe waynlete þanen on enlipes
exe berghes.
 4. On here paþ forþ on here paþ forth bi þan combes heved
to þan rede wey þanen on lullisburghe to crowan stapele.
 5. Of þan stapile to dalisberghe on monnisclive.
 6. Þanen to estbroke on doune on streem on saltforde.
 7. Of saltforde on þa sweluende þanen on lym.
 8. Of lym up on þe hasil.
 8. Of þan hasil on somersete.
 8. Of somersete on werboldiston.
 9. Þanen up on to þan weyzate.
 9. On wiþilake eft out on soe.

Ch 443 (Birch 727)
B15.8.144.
Bounds, Sawyer 443: Birch 1885-99, no. 727.



 1. Ærest on ucingc ford of ðæs cumbes heafde on þone
smalan weg þurh ðone mor to wiðigslæde þæt to brocenan beorge.
 2. Swa to wudu forda.
 3. Þ to lulles beorge.
 3. Swa forð andlang harpaðes to mægenstanes dene swa to
wiðleagate þ to nædran beorge.
 4. Þ ðurh þone mor beriht ge mære on wiðig mor ðæt
eft on ucingc ford.
 6. Ærest of sæ up on hengestes rigc.
 6. Ðonan norð on gyrdweg.
 6. Swa norð andlang hricges on middeweardna sealtera cumb.
 7. Þ be cumbe ing on holan broc þ andlang streames ing on hlos
moc.
 8. Adune on stream on seofan æceras.
 9. Þær of streame eft onbutan seofan æceras.
 10. Eft suð on hlos moc.
 10. Ðæt adune on stream oð ða suran apeldran.
 11. Þ suð on ða norð ræwe.
 11. Ðanan eft ofer cern on gata ford.
 12. Ðæt suð bufan litlan graf.
 12. Wwa suð on earnes hlingc.
 12. Of earnes hlince eft ut on sæ.
 14. Þis is seo boc þe æþelstan cing gebocode Frithestane
bisceope to Wiþiglea & to Cearn þis syndon Tantunes land.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 444 (Birch 731)
B15.8.145.
Bounds, Sawyer 444: Birch 1885-99, no. 731; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is seo boc þæ æðelstan cing gæbocode
ælfheagæ bisceope to þam bisceop stolæ on Winceastre of
Ticceburnan.
 3. <foreign>Termini telluris prescripte sic dilatantur</foreign>.
 3. Ærest on ellen forð.
 4. Of ellen forda on cealc swyðe dell.
 4. Of cealc swyðe delle on melan beorh.
 5. Of mælan beorge on hig leage.
 5. Of hig leage.
 5. On langan leage.
 6. Of langan leage.
 6. On tyrig hege.
 6. Of tyrig hege.
 6. On æscs.
 6. Of þam ægscce to steortan leage.
 7. Of steortan leage.
 7. Eall swa þæt heah hylte scæt to scagan.
 8. Of scagan eall swa þio wrid wale scæt of hit cymð to woh
hlincan on þæne ymb stocc.
 9. Of ðam ymb stocce on wiðig mære.
 10. Of wiðig mære on þæne æscstubb.
 10. Of þam æscstubbe.
 11. On earnes beorh.
 11. Of earnes beorge on syfan wyllan.
 11. Of syfan wyllan on hafeces del.
 12. Of hafeces delle.
 12. On isen grafas.
 12. Of isen grafan to aþulfes heale.
 13. Of aþulfes heale to langan leage.
 13. Of langan leage to mænan leage.
 14. Of menan leage.
 14. To wines heafdan.
 14. Of wines heafdan on ellen ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 445 (Birch 744)
B15.8.146.
Bounds, Sawyer 445: Birch 1885-99, no. 744.



 1. Þis sent þa land imare to archet þare westere fif hide.
 1. Arest suthward of ealdmannes wyrde at langhecgan to sugging
made.
 3. Þane on i richte to stirthel on þane alr beneþen scealden
forð & þanen anlang higweges þ of higeweges ande funtemel þry
akeres wid eastem þane broc þonne anlang funtmeales oþ eadelmes melne of
funtemel to þane twam þornen þat forð on irichte to stigel hege ouer
stirtel & þonun on irichte to ginum hocum to þrem land sharen þat on
archet hamm.
 8. And þanen cagbroc up anlang cagbroges to land share hegen
þonne anlang heges to ealdmannes wyrþe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 446 (Birch 742)
B15.8.147.
Bounds, Sawyer 446: Birch 1885-99, no. 742; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is drocenesforda land boc ðe Æðelstan cining bocode
Eadburge his swister on ece yrfæ.
 3. Þis syndon þa land ge mæro to Drocenesforda.
 4. Ærest æt clefer dæne on ðet del.
 4. Of þam dellæ andlang weges on þa hwitan flodan.
 5. Of þære flodan on norþ healfæ hærepaðæs.
 6. On þone litlan þorn.
 6. Þonon on swealwan þorn þonon on þæs hlincæs norð
ændæ.
 7. Þæt andlang hlincæs.
 7. Suþ on þæs cumbæs heafod.
 8. Þonon on þæs hlincæs wæst ændæ æt þam
hwitan fox holum.
 9. Þonon on stan burg of stan byrig andlang dic utt on hwitan
forð.
 10. Þonon andlang Meone on midnæ stream on þa dic on norð
healf þæs fordas &lang dic on þone ealdan þorn of þam þorne
æft utt on Meone &lang streamæs oþþa dic.
 12. Andlang dic to þam æþænan byrigelsum.
 13. Þonon suð andlang hling ræwe to þæs niþær
langan hlincæs eastændæ &lang hlincæs æft ut on ea &lang
ea oð þæt wæst mæste how.
 15. Þonon wæst for þonæ seal styb od ðæt yrð land
suð bæ þam landæ on þæs wyllæs heafod þonon æft utt on
ea þæt andlang streamæs suþ on wuda & þonne on giet oþ
wichæma mæarcæ þonon west be hagan for cyneburgæ hyrstæ suþe
weardæ oþ þæt scir hiltæ on þonæ greatan beam of þam
beamæ on þunres lea middæ weardnæ.
 20. Of þam lea on ge rihtæ to þrocbyrgæ on þonæ
fulan broc andlang fulan brocæs utt on bytnan burnan andlang burnan
oþþæs bisceopæs mearcæ þæt norð to filæ lea geatæ.
 23. Þonon on brom burnan.
 23. Þæt andlang burnan oþ bromfælde þonnæ upp bæ
tweoh þa twægen bromfældas andlang þæs alar sceatæs of ðone
fulan brocc andlang brocæs to þæs cumbæs heafdæ þonnæ to
þære stigelæ to þæs bisceopes mearcæ þonne utt on langan
leagæ þæt þwæoræs ofær þa leage norð to wuda.
 27. Þonon to þære stigelæ oþ meon wara snadæ þonne
forð.
 28. To domnæs hlincæ þonon to þam wylf pyttæ
þonnæ on gærihta þurh hæsel holt to clæfær dæne æft on
þæt dell.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 447 (Birch 741)
B15.8.148.
Bounds, Sawyer 447: Birch 1885-99, no. 741.



 1. <foreign>Istis terminibus predicta terra circumgyrata esse videtur</foreign>.
 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to meapham on suþan & on
westeweard setl þonne norþ fram setle to netles stede to þære hane
þonan norþ on gerihte andlang hrycges oþ hredles stede.
 4. Þæt forþ þonan to fearn leage geate þonne norþ
þonan to cobba hammes mearce þonan east on gerihte to heorot felda geate
fram þam geate east & suþ on hludes beorh.
 7. Of þam beorge forþ be þære mearce oþ þone calewan
stoc þonan suþ to blacan meres geate þæt suþ þonan on þone oran
foran wiþ eastan ecgulfes setl west be þam oran eft toweard setle.
 10. Þis synt þa den bæra on wealda þe þærto
gebyriað be suþan ea stanihtan hyrst.
 11. And ceolan hyrst & be norþan ea gelecan camp &
gumbrihting hyrst & ceorla den.
 13. Þis is Meap hames land boc þe æþelstan cing gebocode
Ealdulfe his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 448 (Birch 743)
B15.8.149.
Bounds, Sawyer 448: Birch 1885-99, no. 743.



 1. Ðis sinden þa landan gemæro to beorhtwaldingtune.
 2. Ærest of curspandic up on acdene of acdene to wigferþis lea
ge of wigferðis leage to pippes leage of pippes leage norð &lang hagan
to þan brandan stane of þam stane to dunian mere þonen þonon norð
rihte to hæsel lea.
 5. Of hæsel lea þest rihte to borsenan beorge of ðam beorge
west riht on þone haranstan of ðan stane norð rihte to stan crundele
þonnan &lang weges to þam langan treowe of þam trowe &lang weges
to mærfloden þonne giet &lang weges þæt eft on cyrspandic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 449 (Birch 734)
B15.8.150.
Bounds, Sawyer 449: Birch 1885-99, no. 734.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to uferan tune.
 1. Of cynetan to þon ellene.
 2. Þonne On wodnes dene.
 2. Þonne to wuda on mær wege.
 3. Þonne on hyrs leage up to wodnes dic on titferþes geat.
 3. Þonne on wiþigmeres hege easteweardne suþ on butan to
æþelferþes setle on þone stanihtan weg.
 5. Þonne on smalan leage.
 5. Þonne þurh scyt hangran andlang þæs weges to þæm
hlince.
 6. Þonne to west heafdon þonne norð ofer dune on þæt
riht gemære.
 7. Þær to tune.
 7. Þonne on cynetan on sealt ham.
 8. Of sealt hamme up betweox þa twegan beorgas.
 9. Of þam on þæs furlanges west heafde.
 9. Þonne on scropes pyt þonne on þone.
 10. Pan crundel midde werdne.
 10. Þonne on coltan beorh.
 11. Oþ þæne herpoþ an hacan penne.
 11. Þonne andlang herpaþes on þa dic.
 12. Wiþ suþan æþelferþes stane.
 12. Þonne suþ andlang hric weges.
 13. On þone dunnan stan.
 13. Þonne west & suþ ofer þæt yrdland on pyttel dene.
 14. Þonne up on lamba pæþ suð on þone hlinc ufeweardne.
 15. On hole weg.
 15. Þon eft on cynetan.
 15. Þonne is þis þara feoh wicuna gemære & þæs
dun landes on mappeldrelen west weardre.
 17. Þonne norþ up anlang stan ræwe.
 17. Þonne on þa byrgelsas.
 18. Þonne suþ andlang weges of þam wege andlang hlinces on
þæt suþ heafod.
 19. Þonne adune on þæt slæd.
 19. Þonne up andlang weges eft to mappeldre lea.
 21. Þis is Oferan tunes landes boc þe æþelstan cing
gebocode Wulfswyþe on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 452 (Birch 735)
B15.8.151.
Bounds, Sawyer 452: Birch 1885-99, no. 735.



 1. On ðam halgan naman ures halendes Christes se ðe us gescop
ða ða we sylfe næron, and us eft alysde mid his agenum life, ða ða
we fordone wæron þurh ðæs deofles lare, and mid ealle forscylgode in
to ðam ecan susle, ac his myccle arfæstnesse us alysde of ðam.
 5. Nu ic æðelstan cyning ofer ænglaðeode cyðe minum
witum, and on ðisum gewrite mid wordum afæstnige, ðæt ic wille
friggen ealle ða lande are into sanctes Paules mynstre, and ðæreto
gesetan ðysne frivelige.
 8. Ðæt is synderlic freols, sanct Paul to lofe ðan halgan
apostle ðe ðeos stow is halig, minre saule to alyssednesse and mine synnan
to forgifenesse.
 10. Be ðam ðe Sybba cyng hit ærest gefreode and se halga
Erkenwold, and hig beggen ðærto gebugen mid ealle Gode geðeowode, and
ða stowe ge godeden, and se mære biscop sanct Erkenwold ðæne freols
gefette on Romebirig ðe on ðisse cartan is awriten.
 14. And manega oðre freolsas heron gewriten synd ðe mine
forgengan gesettyn heora saule to alysnesse.
 16. Se ðe ðysne freols geeacnige God his lief her on life and
him heofonarices myrcðe sylle ðonne he heonan faran sceole.
 17. Se ðe ðænne ða are þænce to þeofigenne oððe
on oððre wison to awaddene on oðre hit her beforen awriten is sy his lif
her gelittled, and ðenne he heonan faran sceole sig a his wunung on helle
grund, buton he hit her ær his ænde ðe stiðelicor gebete wið
ðæne æcan God ðe ah ealra þinga geweald.
 22. Forði we swa fæstlice ðysne freols bebeodað ðæt
we swa moten eft ealle ætgædere heofonan rices myrhðe habban mid ðam
ecan Gode ðe ah ealra þinge ge weald, Amen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 455 (Bates)
B15.8.152.
Bounds, Sawyer 455: Bates 1899, 38.



 1. Þis syndon þa lang meare to Curi þe adþelstan Kyng gef
criste to lofe and sancte Petre.
 2. In to Muchelnie for hys yldrena sawla & for hys sawla &
for ealra þara Kyngena þe after hym were þat ys erost of Pederedan.
 4. On aþlongabig, of athlangabig on þene lypston.
 5. Of þan lypstane on þa stankestlas ant swa þanne on
spedeway.
 6. Of spedewege on bulestan, of bulanstane on ilestream.
 7. Of ilestreame on þa Haran apoldran, & swa þanon of
þaere Haran apoldran on þone docc þyfel.
 8. Of þam docc þyfele on pedan maede & swa andlang more on
hrocabeara.
 9. Of hrocabeara on þone pol, of þam pole ou eastheal.
 10. Of eastheale on þa myþa, of þam myþum on horsies land
pyll.
 11. Of horsies land pylle, eft on pederidan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 459 (Birch 754)
B15.8.153.
Bounds, Sawyer 459: Birch 1885-99, no. 754.



 1. Þis sand þe land imare to lidentune.
 1. Arest of dorcyn on ða to brokene strate.
 2. Anlang strate.
 2. On lyden up anlang liden on þe estre lyde cumb.
 3. Þanen on feden þorn.
 3. Of fedenþorn.
 3. On wllenestan.
 4. Þanen on badherdes slede estward.
 4. Of dun slede anlang dere dich on bechilde treu.
 5. Þanan anlang bergedune on þane red stan.
 6. Of þane stane west onlang weies on þere tweie iberges.
 6. Of þo iberghen on þe foer stanes.
 7. Þanen on teppen cnolle.
 7. Of þane cnolle.
 8. On olencumb þanen.
 8. On grinescumb.
 8. Þanen on þere herepade on þane pet.
 9. Of þane pitte.
 9. On bicendich.
 9. Þanen ut durth done ordceard.
 10. Of þane ordcearde.
 10. On þare odere herepað on ðone pet.
 11. Þanen on gosanwelle.
 11. Of gosanwelle.
 11. On medeburne up one þat strate.
 12. Of þare strate on det rede sloh.
 12. Of þane slo.
 12. On snodeshelle.
 13. Of snodesdelle eft on dorcyn.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 461 (Birch 762)
B15.8.154.
Bounds, Sawyer 461: Birch 1885-99, no. 762.



 1. Ðis send þa land gemæro þe to Wealtham hyrþ þara
þritiga hida.
 2. Ærest of wassam hamme on gerihte to ceaggan heale.
 3. Þonne of ceaggan heale to dyrnan garfan of dyrnan grafan to
weg cocce þonne of weg cocce to godan pearruce.
 5. Of godan pearruce to hild leage of hild leage to swæfes
heale.
 5. Þon of swæfes heale to wulfa leage.
 6. Of wulfa leage to cawel dene.
 6. Of cawel dene to þære syrfan.
 7. Þonne of þær syrfan to heal wicum.
 7. Of heal wicum eft to wassan hamme.
 9. Þonne heafþ Eadmund cing gebocad ælfsige feowertyne hida
binnan þam þritigum hidum land gemæro ofer wudu ofer feld ofer ecen
læse and to ecan urfe.
 11. And XII maeð æceras at þære standan buton þam land
gemaerum.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 462 (Birch 749)
B15.8.155.
Bounds, Sawyer 462: Birch 1885-99, no. 749.



 1. Þis is þe landmere at batecombe.
 1. At austien on þan put.
 1. Of þan putte on þan olden wei of þan weie.
 2. On þe harenapuldre þanen endelang weie rigthwei þat it
comit on combisberghewei endlang þis weies to þis kingesmere.
 4. Þane end lang þis weies þat it comit on þan Wodestou pin
þanne a doun on mere wei þat it comigt on þere hevedstock þanen on þa
herenwirnen.
 6. On þene pulle.
 6. Þanen endlang stremes þat it comigt on alum.
 7. Þanne get it over alum on merebrok þanen endlang stremes op
atte þa water sweliend þanen up on þa hille of þare hulle on
folanbrok.
 9. Of þan broke on þa ealde dich endlang dich þat it comigt
to þan combe over þan combe on wliate on wolfgate on alum awwilman of alum
awwilman on bradeston.
 12. Of þan stane out atte þere folanmede of þere mede over
þane feld to þa wode þanen endlang rigtes to fileleighe on dikemor of
dikemour eft on þane put.

END_TEXT

Ch 464 (Birch 753)
B15.8.156.
Bounds, Sawyer 464: Birch 1885-99, no. 753.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to oswalding tune.
 1. Ærest ælfgyðe mearc on eastan oð teting ford þonne
þonan west oþ done þonne þonan oþ eadgife mearce þonne þonan to
þæs biscopes mearce to cirringe of cirringe norþ þonan to emecing
mere.
 5. To oswalding tune hierþ.
 5. Holen hyrst.
 5. And byrhttring den.
 5. And eoreding den.
 6. And liccing den.
 6. And hereferþes lea.
 6. And dynning den.
 6. And cyrþring hyrst.
 7. And trip hyrst & insnadis into oswalding tune.
 7. And seo mæd æt brunes forda & seo mæd æt beo
broce hierþ into oswalding tune.
 10. Þis is Oswalding tunes boc þe Eadmund cing gebocade
æþelswiþe on ece yrfe.

Ch 465 (Birch 763)
B15.8.157.
Bounds, Sawyer 465: Birch 1885-99, no. 763; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara V hyda boc æt Polhamatunæ þæ edmund
cining gæbocodæ æðeldriðæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Þis synt þa land ge mero to Polhæmatune.
 4. Ærest of þrim beorgum to ruwan beorge þonon to deopan
wege.
 5. Þonon on yddeles hammas þonon on wiles yge ðonon be westan
fecces wudu þær ða weges togeðre licgað þonon on ruwan hammas
midde wearde.
 7. Þonon andlang stret to bosan hangran þonon on fecces wudu
easte weardne þonon on entan hlew þonon on mearc þorn of mearc þorne on
terstan.
 9. Of terstan andlang weges on þistel leage of þistel leage to
bean leage þonon on suð leage easte wearde þonne þonon andlang cobban
dæne æft of þrie beorgas.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 466 (Birch 752)
B15.8.158.
Bounds, Sawyer 466: Birch 1885-99, no. 752.



 1. Erest on cristemalforde endlang afne on an litil dich endlang
þar dich eft on afne on clifwere þanen on þe withibed þanen on þe
mere fourh and soa on rigt over dauntesbourne.
 3. On þer ellene stub eft on þer brembelwernan eft on þer
merhawen eft on swinesheved on þe grete mapildore þanen on þa olde oden
missenne.
 5. Endland þis clives on þen hen ayssh on hoddisclive foryerd
bi wirtwalen on sand riddriate on þe hage þar eft on grete tre endlangis
hawyn on þe elde strete.
 8. Eft on teonescanen southward þanne endlanges þare brodefurgh
on þe hegeberghes in on þe toun northward endelang þar forerthe be a aker
heved þar eft on cristemalforde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 467 (Birch 764)
B15.8.159.
Bounds, Saywer 467: Birch 1885-99, no. 764.



 1. Ðis is Wudetunes boc þe eadmund cing bocode eadrice his
þegne þreora mannæ deg þam þe him leofost biþ æfter him.
 4. Þis seondon þa lond gemero to Wudutune.
 5. Eræst of þæm æsce andlong æge on tigel leage and
swa ondlonges þæs gemæres þet hit cymþ to þæm torre.
 6. Þonne on þa dic on þæt londe gemere on medestran.
 7. Þæt swa andlang streames on ballestran þæt hit cymþ
to huntena forda þæt of þam forda on hwingles burnan þæt.
 9. Up andlang streames swa up to þæm æwylme.
 9. Þæt swa on þone ealdan brac weg þet hit cymþ to
hnibban lege.
 10. Swa ofer þe legæ þæt ofer nybban beorh easteweardne
on þone weg andlang weges to rah slede.
 12. Þonne to dofer lan andlang dofærlan on aler cymbe midde
weardne andlang cymbes to wræccena wyllan on þa stret andlang stræte to
alberhtes treowe swa þe wyrtwala scadet to turlan homme on þone lyttlan
stapel.
 15. Þet hit to cymþ to þa ric hide.
 15. And seoþþan þa ciric hida & eall þæt þær to
gebyreð & oslan wyrþ & eall þæt þær to gebyreþ.
 17. And an feorðan dæl æt byrnes wyllan into wudetune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 468 (Birch 756)
B15.8.160.
Bounds, Sawyer 468: Birch 1885-99, no. 756.



 1. Þis his swealewan clifes boc þe eadmund cyng gebocade
Garulfe his þegne on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land ge mæro to swealewanclife.
 3. Ærest on þane hwitan weg þonon on þa readan hane.
 4. Of þære hane on þone herpaþ to posses hlæwe of
þæm hlæwe to lytlan crundelle.
 5. Of þæm crundele on þa lytla hwitan geryþra beneaþan
yfre on þane þorn.
 6. Þonne of þam þorne to þam herepaþe on hoddes stocc to
uncer wulfrices eald ge mære.
 8. Þone andlang chealfa dune to þam holan paþe.
 8. Of þam holan paþe on wida ford andlang broces oþ myþford
of þam forde on wærmundes treow of þam treowe andlang weges oþ
wilburge mere.
 11. And twegen æcras mealcing mæde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 469 (Birch 757)
B15.8.161.
Bounds, Sawyer 469: Birch 1885-99, no. 757.



 1. Þis his þare X hida boc be wilig þe eadmund cing gebocade
Ordwolde his þægne on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis syndan þa land gemæro æt Wilig.
 4. Ærest of Wilig staþe up andlang maerfyrh on þane won
hlinc.
 4. Of þæm hlince to wege.
 5. Andlang weges to mærhlince.
 5. Andlang mærhlinches to stancumbe.
 6. Þonen andlang stancumbes.
 6. Of stancumbe up ofer þa eorþburg.
 7. Fram þære eorþburg to wulf flodan.
 7. Þonen ændlang þare dic from wulfflodan to teofuntinga
gemære þonne andlang þare dic oþ sidan hamme on þare hina gemære
on ðone stan hlinc.
 10. Þonne of stan hlince wiþ westan hæþ slæd.
 10. Þonne of hæþ slæde on billan dene on þone mær
hlinc þonne andlang mær hlinces oþ þara þreora æcera heafod
þonne eft be þare þreora æcera heafdum on oþerne mærhlinc.
 13. Þonne andlang þæs mær hlinces oþþe well
bærninge &lang weges oþ þæt hit cumþ to þam herpaþe.
 15. Þonne ofer ðone herpaþ & niþer ofer þone mersc
þæt hit cumþ on wilig stæþ þonne niþer &lang stremes on
butan þone hors gærstun þæt hit sticað on þære ea sulfre
þonne andlang ea oþ þat hit cumþ to þam eastlandgemære æt
mær furh þæt hit ær onfeng.
 20. And þis is þæt land gemære æt brembelcumbe æt
þam wicum þe into wilig hurþ.
 21. Ærest æt punteles treowe.
 21. Þonne &lang weges þæt ofer tilmannes dene.
 22. Þonne forð be þam urþlonde þæt hit sticaþ on
æþerices gemære on þam wege.
 23. Þonne andlang weges þæt hit sticaþ on hunan wege.
 24. Þonne &lang hunan weges þat hit cumþ to mær dic.
 25. Þonne &lang mær dic þat eft to punteles treowe.
 26. And se mæd æt dutten hamme hurþ into wilig & se
hage æt wiltune þe hurþ into wilig & þæs tunes heges bot on
grafan lea & þ þridde treow on monnes pol bære.
 28. Þis hurþ eal in to wilig to Ordwaldes tune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 470 (Birch 748)
B15.8.162.
Bounds, Sawyer 470: Birch 1885-99, no. 748.



 1. Þis syndon þa land gemæro æt peuesige.
 1. Ærest of ðare anlipigan æc to mætelmesburg weste
weardan þonon adune to ealhheardesleage westeweardre þonon on mærdenum
of mærdenum on mærwylle þonon forð to heafodstoccum of heafodstoccum
to hundesgeate of hundesgeate to mærðorne of mærþorne to ðære
hylle þe is suð on ðære hyrnan.
 6. Þonne west ðonon to wroht ðorne of wroht ðorne on
ceolbrihtes seað of þam seaðe to twig beorgas of twig beorgum on
lusebeorg of lusebeorge up on smeðandune of smeðandune on ellen grafan fram
ellen grafan to hafuc Cnollum from hafuc Cnollum on ðone þorn.
 10. Of ðam ðorne on ðone stan of þam stane on merce ford of
ðam forda andlang þæs smalan weges on ðone ford æt wil cotum of
þæm forda on wippes þorn of þam þorne on ðone ford æt
ebbanbroce of þam forda on abbodes wylle of abbodes wylle on ða haran
apoldre of ðære apoldre on ða hwitan hola of ðam holum on meos leage.
 15. Of meos leage on wadleage norðeweardre of wadleage on hremnes
geat of hremnes geate to emnan leage of emnan leage eft to ðære æc þe
we ær æt fruman nemdon.
 18. Þis is Wevesiges boc þe Eadmund cing gebocode þam hiwum
æt Wintan ceastre to scrud fultume for his fæder sawle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 471 (Birch 761)
B15.8.163.
Bounds, Sawyer 471: Birch 1885-99, no. 761.



 1. Þis syndon þæs landes gemæro æt garan forda.
 1. Of garanforda andlang eoccen oþ þaet þær cilla suþ ut
scyt þonne up andlang cilla Riþe oþ linfordinga gemære þonan on
wintres hlæwe þæt þonan eft ut on eoccen.
 4. Þonne andlang eoccen oþ eft on garan ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 472 (Birch 750)
B15.8.164.
Bounds, Sawyer 472: Birch 1885-99, no. 750.



 1. Erest of elde dich above stibbe þanne endlang weies on strete
so bi strete on holedene endlang denes.
 2. To springwellen þanen to olde Gore so on cleyate on þe elde
stibbe.
 3. Þanen on olde burgh suthward of þare berwe in on þe
foullelake on thone bithe of þan bithe in on thone welle bi este foxcotone.
 5. Of þan welle west on þone mer aker of þan acre endlang
weies eft to þe olde dich.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 473 (Birch 751)
B15.8.165.
Bounds, Sawyer 473: Birch 1885-99, no. 751.



 1. Erest at þan gren aken þanne endelang merebrokes of þan
broke on southlinleygh of þar leighe adoun to þan lypgate of þan lypgate
over ergespath to þan Ragheye þar þen endlang Ragheyes out on þan feld
þanne bi southe of weofwelle þanne of þan welle endlang beuer bourne on
stanforde.
 5. Of stanforde on þe olde hegge rewe on sondermede þar one of
sundermede endland weies out bi weste smalehammes þanne over þane feld
endelang þere hegge rewe þat Alfric made on schortegrove þare þanne in
on þe grove on þer wester swolle.
 9. Of þer swelle on þer dich of þer dich on thene ellenstubbe
of þane stubbe over stanleyghe to þer elde elde heggerewe þare þanne
endelang heggerewe eft on þer one doune estward.
 12. On þer one doune to bradewellebroke to þan stone of þan
stone eft to þan seswelwe at clinanfelde of þan seswelwe to þar appildore
of þar appildore to trindscathin.
 14. Of trinscathin to holendene to acforde to acford south on þan
stone of þan stone to þan Rym aken peginhullis þe mere of þar yo
endlang dich þar eft on þe ya.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 474 (Birch 768)
B15.8.166.
Bounds, Sawyer 474: Birch 1885-99, no. 768.



 1. Erest on Scherdenberwe endleng weies on an burghen þanen on
ane firesrewe þanen on langengroue suthward adun on anne rige to streme
endelang stremes on doggeneford þanen up on doggeneberwe þanen on amesheal
þanen on þar elde lidyate a doun on herebrittescombe on þane streme
endlang stremes on babbanmede. 
 6. Þanen on hawen endlang hawen on þan here path.
 6. Þanen on ane dich endlang dich on birninge þanen on
bradeleighe.
 7. Þanen on stiþeleighe southward þanen on sic of þan sice
on bournandigne.
 9. Þanen up on dounen tit on anne heued Wrigt þanen on þar
Elde Waldich.
 10. Þanen a doune on here path þanen on þe merhawin.
 11. Endlang hawin on risshdene þanen on neodbournen endlang
stremes þanen on þan rissbed þanen on apildore þanen rigt on
cristemeleighe.
 13. Þanen on þar thre landschere of þan on þe merhawe
endlang hawin on hengersten þanen on an withi þanen rigtwey þanen on
igland on an pirnen þanen on streme endlang stremes on þan merehawe endlang
hawin on bledhildewelle þanen houndesete.
 17. Þanen on þan southerne Wistonwey þanen on anne þorthn.
 17. Þanen on Schepleghe.
 18. Þanen endelang here pathes eft on Scherdanbourgh.

START_TEXT

Ch 475 (Birch 770)
B15.8.167.
Bounds, Sawyer 475: Birch 1885-99, no. 770



 1. Ðis is þara XVI hida boc æt Pipigmynstræ þe Edmund
cing gebocode Elfegæ his þegnæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mere to þan XVI hidum æt
Pippingmynstre.
 4. Ærest of fearres cumbes heafde west on ðone herepoð.
 4. Swa west andlanges þes herepoðes  þet it cyme to
eastewearðre acbeara.
 5. Þ norð on ge richte of acbeara westeweardre on þæs
biscopes ge mere and bennacumbes.
 6. Swa adun æfter þæs biscopes ge mere & bennacumbes
forð.
 7. Þ hit cymð be norðe fyrs leage.
 7. Swa of norðe werðne fyrs leage.
 8. On bennacumbes forð.
 8. Þonne up on gean stream.
 8. East on tuhhele mor.
 9. Of þam more on ge rihte on heardan geat.
 9. Of þam geate on hagan on deopan ford.
 10. Of þam forda on þa land sceare.
 10. Adun on sciteres stream.
 10. Of þan streame on ge rihte on witan stan on higean beara
norðe wearðre.
 11. Þanon on readan forð.
 11. Of þam forda east on þone herepoð.
 12. Of þam herepoðe suð.
 12. Þonne onlang ham.
 12. Of þan hamme þanon binan efisc on gregean stan.
 13. Of þam stane on lind horan.
 13. Of lind horan on þone healdan hagan on wealdenes weg.
 14. Of þam wege upan dune on hringwoldes beorg.
 15. Of þam beorge west andlang dune on wiðigsled.
 15. To henna þorne.
 16. Þanon west on þa ealdan dic.
 16. Þonne sume hwile be þere dic.
 16. And þanon norð ofer wiðancumb þ eft on fearrescumbes
heafod.

END_TEXT

Ch 476 (Birch 767)
B15.8.168.
Bounds, Sawyer 476: Birch 1885-99, no. 767.



 1. Þis syndon þa land gemæro þe hyraþ to Corsantune.
 2. Ærest on corsan stream up oþ þone ealdan stan weall suþ
oþ þa hyrnan.
 3. Þonan west rihte oþ cilda stan.
 3. Of cilda stane on merces burh norðewearde.
 4. Þonne west on ða burh oþ þa west hyrnan.
 5. Þonne norð on herepað oþ þone anlipigan þorn.
 5. West þonan on þone hrycg.
 6. Þæt on þone anlipian stan.
 6. Þonan norð rihte on mære mæde westewearde.
 7. Þonan rihte on þone herepað oð wifeles cumbes heafod.
 8. Þonne of wifeles cumbes suð ecge on æsc wylle.
 8. Þonan suð on ecge oþ þæt niehste slæd.
 9. Þonne of þam slæde on stan wealles broc of dune on
afene.
 10. Up on afene oþ corsan.

END_TEXT

Ch 478 (Birch 769)
B15.8.169.
Bounds, Sawyer 478: Birch 1885-99, no. 769.



 1. Þis sand þes landes i mare at Stoke up anlang ninge burne
oð ðat hrisc lad.
 2. An lang þese richtledes on þane ealde treo stede.
 3. Þanan an lang weies on stanforde.
 3. Þanen an langstreame on botenwelle.
 4. And of boten welle on prestes Setel.
 4. Þanen anlang weges on Wiuelesford.
 5. Þanen up an lang mercdene onne stokebroc.
 5. Þanen anlang stocbroc on hringheburne þar iuarest on feng.

Ch 480 (Birch 777)

 1. Þis synt þa landemæro to ærmundes lea & oþre
namen æt æppeltune.
 3. Ærst up of temese on ða dic æt doccan grafe þaet on
þæt sic þe scyt þurh hæsel lea foran ongean þa dic þe scyt to
wasan siþþan &lang wasan þæt it sticað on tubban forda.
 5. Þonon on þæt Riþig oþ hit cymð to þære
stræte.
 6. Of þære strete on þa dic þe scyt to þam heafod
lande.
 7. Þonne on west healfe þæs heafod landes VI gyrda be westan
yttinges hlawe.
 8. Þonon on þa ræwe of þaere reawe on temese.
 9. On þæt in fyrde andlang temese eft on doccan dic.

Ch 481 (Birch 776)

Bounds, Sawyer 481: Birch 1885-99, no. 776.



 1. Þis bet þe land mere.
 1. To Milne.
 1. Erist of todanbrigge of þare muchel dich on mordrancombe.
 2. Of mordrancombe on slacombe.
 3. Of slacombe on boreswelle.
 3. Of boreswelle on þan merkeden ok to feger ok þanen on
þinaswelle of Ineswelle on Worhanan berghe.
 5. On Wolfberghe.
 5. Þanen on Wolfpol.
 5. Of Wolfpole endlang stremes on schippeburg westward on
harenapildorewei þere he out lit þanen on merestan.
 7. Of þan stone endlang mereweies to likan trowe.
 8. Þanen est lang dich to redwines thorne.
 8. Þanen on baddanpille.
 9. Of þan pille on berleighe mideward þanen endlang hagen on
petanberberwe þanen on þa stanenpile of þere stanenpile eft on
todanberghe on the muchel dich.

Ch 487 (Birch 787)
B15.8.174.
Bounds, Sawyer 487: Birch 1885-99, no. 787; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þara XV hida boc æt clearan þæ edmund cing
gæbocodæ ælfswiþæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mera to Clearan.
 3. Ærest þær merc broc scyt on seolesburnan of mearc broce
on punges done midde wearde þonon on ðone greatan hlinc easteweardne
þæt þonon on ðone fearn garan easteweardne & swa on ceacgan
seað.
 6. Þæt swa suð andlang gemeres þæt be easten þone
holancumb up on dune þæt swa on þa byrgelsas þæt swa to meres byrig
westan on ða dic.
 8. Andlang dic to cumbran wylle.
 9. Þanon to botnes flodan.
 9. Þæt swa &lang dic to þan ealdan wege.
 10. Up on brochylle &lang hlinca þæt on pir graf þær
andlang herpaðes to weard setle swa &lang wic herpaðes be westan
stutes hylle.
 12. Þæt ut on ceofering treow.
 12. Þanon andlang þæs feldes swa on befer broces heafod
andlang broces ut on alerburnan andlang brocan burnan on gagel broce þonon on
ðone ge mer hagan &lang hagan on seolesburnan & swa up andlang burnan
þæt eft on mer broce.

Ch 490 (Birch 781)

 1. Þis sanden þe land imaren to Mapeldertune.
 2. Arest of elmere up anlang streames on Winterburne on þa dich.
 3. And þanne anlang riscemeres oþ hit cumd to þere alde dich
þanne andlang diche foren ongen Wiþig þeuel þanen.
 4. On ruwanþorn.
 4. Of þane þorne.
 5. On sex þorn.
 5. Of sex þorne on anne þorn þinel with Winterburne.
 6. And þanne andland Winterburne on anne water pet.
 7. Of þane pitte.
 7. On stanhecheres ande.
 7. Of stanhecheres ande.
 7. On grenenhille of þa hege reawe onlang heie reawe on hwete
cumb.
 9. Anlang cumbes to wþe.
 9. Innen wde.

 10. On þe elþen stret.
 10. Of þare streate.

 13. To cellor.

 1. Ðis synd þes landes gemæro æt lecham stede.

 3. Of wines treowe on ðan readan hane.

 4. Of stigeal hammum on wigferðes leage norþe wearde.

Ch 492 (Birch 782)
B15.8.178.
Bounds, Sawyer 492: Birch 1885-99, no. 782.



 1. Þis his niwantunes boc & fyrstes feldes.
 1. Þe eadmund cing gebocade Wulfgare his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis syndon þa land gemæro to niwantune.
 4. Aerest on suþeweardan of oteres hole up andlang wiliges
oþþa lace.
 5. Þonne andlang þære lace oþ pynding mersc.
 5. Þonne be þæs hlinces niþer ecge oþ þæt hit
cymþ to þæm yrþlande.
 6. Þonne eft on wilig on pynding ford ufewerde.
 7. Þonne of pyndingforda up andlang þære westemestan lace.
 8. Oþ eft innan wilig on þa ealdan dic.
 8. Þonne andlang þære dic oþ ðæs furlanges up ende.
 9. Þonne norþ on gerihte to þære ealdan dic.
 10. Þonne andlang þære dic oþ þæs clifes norþ
hyldan.
 10. Þonne east andlang be þam yrþlande oþ hit cymþ to
þam wic herpaþe.
 11. Ðonne andlang þæs wic herpaþes to þam stænenan
stapole.
 12. Þonne suþ andlang þæs weges oð þone stænan
stapol.
 13. Of þam stapole on dune on þorn dune cumb to þære
mæde.
 14. Forþ be þære to þære ealdan dic.
 14. Andlang þære ealdan dic ut on afene.
 15. Þonne andlang afene oð þæs poles heafod.
 16. Þonne of þæm pole up on ættan dene.
 16. Norþ hyldan swa swa seo ealde furh ryct up to þæm
stænenan stapole.
 17. And swa west to þære ealdan hlinc ræwe.
 18. And swa beþære yrþ mearce niþer to hig forde.
 19. Þonne of hig forda eft ofer wilig on oteres hol.
 20. Þis is seo mæd þe hyrþ to niwantune æt Weolces
clife.
 20. Þonne gæþ þæt gemære suþ up of wilig on þa
lace to þæs clifes west ende.
 22. Þonne a up be þam yrþlande þæt eft on wilig æt
þare dic.
 23. Þis sindon þa land gemæro to fyrste felda westewearden
þeg byrgeþ to þæm þrim hidum.
 24. Þæt his ærest æt hlidgeat leage.
 24. Þonne of hlidgeat leage andlanges hagan on hæ cumb on
sceard hweogl on hemede weg.
 26. Of hemede wege on hean hylle on þa rugan þyrnan.
 27. Of þære þyrnan on þa brembel þyrnan on þære
dice norþ ende.
 28. Þonne andlang dic oþ þone suþ ende.
 28. Of þam ende on þone weg.
 28. Of þam wege on þa ealdan dic.
 29. Of þære dic on wulfstanes heges byhte.
 30. Of þam byhte on þæs cumbes heafode on cealc crundel.
 30. Of cealc crundle on ceab wisce.
 31. Of ceab wisce on þæt reade land.
 31. Fram þam readen lande on eadeages treow.
 32. Of þam treowe on dyrbroc.
 32. Of dyrbroce eft sona on hlidgeat leage.
 33. And seo læs is to foran eallum mannum gemæne on þam
hæþ felda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 493 (Birch 795)
B15.8.179.
Bounds, Sawyer 493: Birch 1885-99, no. 795.



 1. Vis his þare þreora hida boc be rollandune þe eadmund cyng
ge bocode ælfgyþe nunnan on eche yrfe for Godes lufan & for hire
gebedrædenne.
 4. Þis synt þa land gemæra to wrollendune.
 5. Aerest up of noddre staþe on easteweardne hunda ham.
 5. Þonnen up on gerihte to þam stapole.
 6. Þonon up ofer deor hlinc.
 7. Of þam hlince to þam beorge.
 7. To ælfredes land scare.
 7. Þonne is hit þær feower furlanga brad butan feower
gyrdan.
 8. Þonne gæþ hit þaer niþer be þara wyrhtena land
scare oþ wines hlinces heafod.
 9. And þonon niþer oþ þæt hit cumð in on noddre
þonne six æceras be norðan noddre þæs mersces.
 11. And þonne eft in on noddre niþer andlang streames of
þæt hit cumð to pures fenne þæt hit ær on feng.

Ch 494 (Birch 798)
B15.8.180.
Bounds, Sawyer 494: Birch 1885-99, no. 798.



 1. Ðis sint þa land gemæro to Linforda betweox eccene &
cillariþe.
 2. Be tweox eoccene & cilla riðæ synd þa land gemæro
to linforda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 495 (Birch 792)
B15.8.181.
Bounds, Sawyer 495: Birch 1885-99, no. 792.



 1. Ðis sint þa land gemæra & se embe gang þara landa
to baddan byrig & to doddan forda & to efer dune.
 2. Ðæt is þone ærest æt baddan byrg westeweardre &
norðeweardre æt þam lytlan toclofenan beorge.
 4. Þonne on gerihte of ðam beorge norð to wearge dune.
 5. Betweox þa lytlan twegen beorgas.
 5. Þæt þær norð andlang ðære lytlan dic æt
þæs grafes ende oð ða smalan ðornas.
 6. Ðonne of ðam þornum up on ða lytlan dune middeweardre.
 7. Þonne of ðære dune east on fox hylle easteweardre.
 9. Þonne geuðe ic ælfwine & Beorhtulfe þæs leas
& þæs hammes be norðan þære lytlan dic.
 11. Ðonne lið ðæt gemære on gerihte of fox hylle
norðeweardre on þone holan weg æt hinde hlypan.
 12. Þonne of hinde hlypan on þone wylle æt þam lea
ufeweardan.
 13. Of ðam wylle on ðæt heorot sol.
 13. Of ðam heorot sole norð on gerihte on ðone beorg.
 14. Þonne of ðam beorge on gerihte to ðam lea.
 15. Þ forð be lea on wiðig wylles heafud.
 16. Of ðam wylle norð on gerihte on ða ðornehtan dune to
emnes þam geate æt þære ealdan byrg.
 17. Þæt fram ðam geate on gerihte east to mær pytte.
 18. Þonne of ðam pytte on gerihte to ðam stane æt þam
wylle wið norðan mæres dæl.
 19. Þonne suð on gerihte andlang wæclinga stræt on þone
weg to weoduninga gemære.
 20. Þonne west andlang weges on ðone lytlan beorg.
 21. Ðær se stoc stod.
 21. Ðæt þonan suðrihte on ðone ealdan mylier þær
þa welegas standað.
 22. Ðæt west andlang burnan oð hit cymð þær bliðe
utscyt.
 23. Þæt andlang bliðan oð ða stan bricgge.
 24. Þ east of ðære bricgge.
 24. Andlang dic oð ðone hæþenan byrgels.
 25. Of þam byrgelse forð norð be wyrttruman oð ðæs
heges ende be weoduninga gemære.
 26. Þ þonan andlang gemæres on gerihte to ðam stocce on
easteweardan þam lea.
 27. Of ðam stocce suðrihte on þære stræt.
 28. Andlang stræt to þære fyrh ðe scyt suðrihte to
þære miclan stræt æt þæs wylles heafde æt snoces cumbes
gemære.
 29. Þ west andlang stræt on ðone æsc.
 30. Þæt fram ðam æsce andlang stræt betweox þa
twegen leas on ða ealdan sealt stræt oð ðone steorte.
 32. Fram þam steorte andlang þæs fulan broces oð
bliðan.
 33. Ðonne is þ land æt snoces cumbe healf þæs cinges
healf uncer brentinges.
 34. Buton me God geunne & min hlaford þæt he his me
geunnan wille.
 36. Þonne gæð sio mearc forð andlang bliðan west oð
ðæt seo lacu utscyt on bliðan wið ufan stan bricgge.
 37. Þ norð andlang lace.
 37. Oð ða dic þonne andlang dic oð ðone weg þe scyt to
fealuwes lea on þam slade.
 39. Þæt on fealuwes lea þær.
 39. Ælfric biscep redan het to þære ealdan dic.
 40. Andlang dic to ðam wege þe scyt up to ðam hricgge.
 41. Andlang hricgges to þam wege þe scyt fram fealuwes lea to
baddan by ane lytle hwile.
 42. Þonne of ðære apuldre þe stent wið westan þam wege
þurh þone lea to þam miclan hæsl wride.
 43. Of þam hæsl wride adun on þa blacan rixa.
 44. Of þam rixun on þa lytlan hecggan æt þam wege þe
scyt fram baddan by to cear wyllun.
 45. Andlang weges oð ðone broc þe scyt to fealuwes lea to
þam forda ðæt west æfre andlang broces oð ðone weg þe scyt to
stæfer tune wið suðan þa ealdan burh æt baddan byrg þ west
andlang weges oð to emnes þære micelan dic oð westewearde þa burh.
 49. Andlang ðære dic & be þære byrg westeweardre
norð oð ðone tobrocenan beorg.
 50. Ðe þær is toclofen on norðweardre & on
westeweardre baddan byrg.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 496 (Birch 801)
B15.8.182.
Bounds, Sawyer 496: Birch 1885-99, no. 801.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land gemæro to bleobyrig.
 1. Ærest on eastewardum þam lande æt amman welle þæt
swa suð on gerihte on wæter slædes dic þæt andlang dic oþ þone
suð ende on þone þaet riht land gemære þæt up to þam miclan
beorge beneoþan hrameslea.
 4. Þæt of þam beorge up andlang stanweges to þam langan
cyrstel maele æt hafuc þorne þonne of hafuc þorne to þan langan
þorne æt ichenilde wege þæt swa to þan þriddan þorne æt
wirhangran.
 7. Of þam þorne to þam feorþan þorne on wrangan hylle
fore weardre stent þæt swa forþ to þam fiftan þorne to þam
elebeame þæt west andlang þæs lytlan weges up to þon þorne.
 10. Up to teonan hylle þæt swa west on þone ruwan hlync
andlang þæs rowan linces to þon hæþenum byrgelsum æt þære
ealdun dic þæt andlang oþ þaet treow steall.
 12. Þonne of þan treow steall on ge rihte to þon bradan
beorge be eastan wrocena stybbe þæt swa to wrocena stybbe þonne of
wrocena stybbe on meoces dune on þone byrgeles.
 15. Of þam byrgelse to þære flodan æt swin weges slo
æt þære wege gelæton þaet up to þam eorþgeberste to foxes
beorge.
 17. Of þam beorge west.
 17. Andlang drægeles bæces oþ þone hricg weg andlang
weges oþ þa readan hane.
 18. Of þare hane norþ andlang þæs smalan weges to totan
cumbe æt þam beorge þæt swa norþ on ge rihte andlang þæs
smalan weges to þone here page þæt to þæs linces ende.
 21. Þaet swa forþ norð andlang weges oþ ordstanes dic
þæt andlang dic of þære dic wiþ norþan þæt yrþland þonne
bi þam yrþlande to þære lace þe lið on stoc welle.
 23. Þonne of stoc wylle norþ andlang broeces to þaere dic
þære se æþeling mearcode þæt andlang dic to þære sceap
weascan on haccan broc þonne andlang haccan broces to huddes igge þæt
swa forð norþ andlang broces wiþ westanhunddes ig þæt up andlang
þæra andheafda to þære lytlan dice ende.
 28. And þam norð andlang þara andheafda to þan langan
cyrstel mæle æt hæþ dune þæt swa norð andlang þæs smalan
paþes on þa dic sticcea to þone stodfalde þæt swa eaþ andlang
þære ealdan dic oþ aeþelstanes treow steal to þare dice byge
þæt swa suþ east andlang dic be byrgwylla gemære þat swa suð est
ofer þone mor to mæringes þorne of mæringes þorne to sulgeate.
 33. Of sulgeate be wyrt walan to þone read leafan mapuldre of
þam mapuldre on þa lace þæt on gerihte on west wylle þen on oþre
naman hæt æt amman wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to ealdingtune.
 1. Ærest on westan raculfinga mearce be þære ea norþ be
raculfinga mearce on þone hrycg peg &lang weges oþ þone niwan dic
andlang dices oþ mildryðe mearce suþ andlang merce on þa ea wantsume
andlang wantsume oþ raculfinga mearce.
 5. Þis is þara twelf sulunga boc æt Ealdingtune þe Eadmund

Ch 498 (Birch 799)
B15.8.184.
Bounds, Sawyer 498: Birch 1885-99, no. 799.



 1. Erest so landschere geth of exan up on erfdion þane up on
conanleyghbrok þane up on thene wey þanen north on.
 2. Wulwythelandschere at alfredes þane þare of dune to
cridican.
 3. Þanen on lactancumbesbrok on midlisso.
 4. Þanen up on grenewey on þar nedesslo þanen on dich of
fulere.
 5. Þane a doun on geganbrok.
 6. Þane up on geganbrok of fonlangford þane on herepath of
kingeslandschere.
 7. Þe elde dich.
 7. Þane up rigt on bedesberghe of beddesberghe on bright hulle
Briggemores/ heved þanne a dun on streme on brigges mores biche
midward/ þanne up rich overe drotarshulle on blakanhulle.
 8. Þanen on bradenanhulle.
 9. Þanen a doun on lake so eft right on exan.
 9. Þane a doun of exan of Kirfdian.

Ch 500 (Birch 802)
B15.8.185.
Bounds, Sawyer 500: Birch 1885-99, no. 802.



 1. Ðis synt þa landes meære to bryning tune.
 1. Ærest on heafd beorh þonne on wyrt walan on þæs hagan
ende.
 2. Þonne andlang hagan þær fisces burna and alaburna to
gædre scotaþ.
 3. Þonne of alaburnan ut on herred snad.
 4. And swa norþ to herpaþe andlang herpaþes to þære
efisc.
 5. Þonen eft on wyrt walen to croh hamme þonne on hunnes wylle
þonne west be yfre þæt hit sticaþ on weala brucge þonne þaer ut on
cynetan andlang cynetan on myþ ford þonne on middel ea þæt swa on
befer ige þonne on fyrs ige of dune andlang ea.
 9. Þær ala burna scyt ut on cynetan.
 9. Þonne up andlang alaburnan on scealdan ford þonon andlang
hagan ut on heaþ felda swa to herpaþe andlang herpaþes to imman beorge of
imman beorge eft on heafod beorge.

 1. Of cymesing on otþunes hyldan ufewyrde andlang ricges oð
ða stret niðer andlang strete and swa norð on aggint beorgas of hagging
beorgan.
 3. On brynessole of brynessole andlang colredinga ge mercan oð
helfesdene oð helfesdene oð lectan æcer, oð lectan æcere, oð

 5. Oð bealdessol of bealdessole, west oð stylfing on ðone

 1. Þis sand þe landes imare at hamtune.

 2. Of minnene linche.
 2. On litiges heuede.
 2. Of litiges heuede.
 3. Anlang diche on sture at oxene bricge unen up anlang sture at
sudwde.
 4. Þannen.
 4. Of þane hegen.
 4. Of þane hegen.
 4. To dich.
 5. Þanen anlang dich.
 5. Ouer cinerget mor.
 5. On þane mapelder.
 5. Of þane mapeldere be þane akere heueden on chelbrichtes
dich.
 6. Anlang cuterget mores on þane stream anlang streames.

Ch 503 (Birch 796)
B15.8.188.

 1. Ðis is þara XX hida boc æt æscesbyrig þe eadmund
cing gebocode Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis syndan þæs landes ge mæro æt Ascesbyrig.
 3. Ærest on ðone garan suþæ weardnæ þænne andlang
wæges on þonæ mægen stan þonon on þon won hlinc.
 5. Andlang hlincæs oþ loddæres sæxcingæ.
 6. Andlang hlincæs on þonæ byrstæ del.
 6. Þanan andlang furh ænne æcer to þam hlincæ.
 7. Þonon an þa and heafda on hrucg weg of hrucg wægæ on
þonæ þorn stub.
 8. Þonon on hord wyllæ of hord wyllæ on þonæ ealdan

andlang riþæ on swynbroc andlang brocces on beaghildæ byrigels þonon

norðæ wæardnæ þonon on þa dic andlang dic on þæt onbulan
mædæ norþæ weardæ þonon on þa bræmbæl hyrnan.
 14. Of þæræ hyrnan on stan mæræ.
 15. Þonon to þon æþænan byrigelsæ on æoccæn
upp andlang streamæs on þonæ æwulm.
 16. Þonon on weardæs beorh of þam beorgæ on hryng pyt.
 17. Þonon on þa ealdan hola of þam holum æft on þone
garan suþæ weardnæ.
