Ch 507 (Birch 808)
B15.8.190.
Bounds, Sawyer 507: Birch 1885-99, no. 808.



 1. This sindon tha land gemere the Eadmund king gebocade in to
sancte Eadmunde.
 3. Thonne is thær ærest suth be eahta treowen.
 4. And thonne up be Alhmundes treowen.
 4. And swa forth to Osulfes lea.
 5. And swa forth on gerihte be manige hyllan.
 5. And thonnen up Hamarlunda.
 6. And swa forth to fouuer hagas & sua æfter than we se
Lytlantune & thonen ofer tha ea æfter than wege to Bertenedene.
 7. And swa on gerichte east to Holegate.
 8. And swa forth an furlang be easten Bromleage & thonan suth
to niwantune meaduwe.

Ch 508 (Birch 814)
B15.8.191.
Bounds, Sawyer 508: Birch 1885-99, no. 814.



 1. Þis synd þa land ge mæru þa VIIII æceras þe
æþelere ahte.
 2. Þa sceotaþ on oden æcer.
 2. Of oden æcere dun to þæs hegges hyrnan.
 3. Andlang hegges.
 3. Swa adun to þam broce.
 3. On kynges wudu.
 4. Andlang broces up to bytles cumbe to þam hege.
 5. Of þam hege up anan ænne æcer innan wudu.
 5. Of þam æcere to þam ealdan hole.
 6. Of þam hole to þam ealdan hylle buuan ellen cumbe.
 7. Of ealdan hylle to sclæt æcere to þam wegge.
 7. Of þam wegge to þam III æcere.
 9. Ðis synd þa land gemeru þe sceotað dun to pucan wylle.
 10. Of pucan wylle andlang broces to hida wudu.
 10. Of hida wuda up to þam III æceran.
 11. Of þam III æceran to þam garan.
 11. Of þam garan to þam oþran garan.
 12. Andlang riges to þam lytle mappeldre.
 12. Of þam mappuldre dun to þam oðeran stan up oð a hylle.
 13. Of þam mappeldre to þam hæg þorne.
 14. Of þam hæg þorne to þam broce.
 14. Swa up be broce þar blac wylle ut scyt.
 15. Of blac wylle to þam wic.
 15. Be westan blac wylle ut scyt.
 16. Of þam wice to þare hapuldre.
 16. Of þare haran apuldre to þan alre stan onforan þam
hylle.
 17. Of þam alre to þam twam wycan standað on gerewe eal swa
þ gemere gæð swa up to þam wice stynt.
 19. Beneoþan bælles wæge of þam wice innan bælles
weg.
 20. Andlang bælles wæge up to þære styge.
 20. Andlang styge ut to þam holan.
 21. Of þam holan to þam mappuldre.
 21. Of þære mappuldre to þam wæge to huttes æsce.
 22. Swa be bege to lytle wylle.
 22. Of lytlan wylle into pucan wylle.
 23. On þam ealdan ham stealle þe æþelere ahte to
plegidic.
 24. Of plegi dic to higi wegge.
 24. Of higi wegge into anlipi þyrnan.
 25. Up anlipi þurnan into selardes pole into loxan.
 25. Of loxan into afenan.
 26. Swa bei ea to brihtwoldes were.
 26. Of þam were to þere dic.
 27. Of þere dic to þam wealle.
 27. Of þam wealle into hlipgete.
 27. Of þam hlipgete into þam hachan.
 28. Of þam hachan in to clænan feldan.
 29. Þaran on loxan.
 29. A be loxan in to þam gemyþan.
 29. Of þam gemyþam up be midderice.
 30. Of midderice to stutardes cumbe.
 30. To rawuwe.
 30. Of þere rawuwe to stennihta wege.
 31. Of þam stænihtan wege a be egge þ þu cymmes to þam
wealle.
 32. Of þam wealle swa norð þ þu cyme to þæs wealles
hyrnan.
 33. Of þere hyrnan a be wealle þ þu cyme to elle beorhan.
 34. Of elle beorhan into stanclude a be hege to ealdan wycan to
þam wealle.
 35. Of þam wealle a be hege æft into loxan XIII æceras
liggat buuan þere byri wið þes abbudes gemære.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 509 (Birch 816)
B15.8.192.
Bounds, Sawyer 509: Birch 1885-99, no. 816.



 1. Of cleuan hithe on yone mide mestan thorn bi thyythe to
landscharleighe on Wormester ist andlang ifre on Wormesleighe welle þanen on
ya vor saide ake on humberwe stede.
 4. Of gere ak on þa tyo sirsas þanen on thar eorð briste and
þanen on ruwanleighe on þan ealde heie rewe þanen on þan schiren mor
midward.
 6. And soa west after streme bi twixe bradan mede and driganhurste
soa forth bi suthene herthine on tettanstaples þanen on clewan hithe on þan
midde mestan thorn.

stræte on eala wihing pyt þonan andlang weges þonan oþþa ea.

Ch 513 (Birch 817)
B15.8.196.
Bounds, Sawyer 513: Birch 1885-99, no. 817; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis beth þe landmere of Domerham.
 1. At þare aissh at penegeforde from þan stede endlang brokes
to þis erlisford of þan ford' to brinesforde and so endelang mereborne to
þare heghe brugge and soa endelang þis elde weyes to brocliford.
 4. And endlang brocliford to wulewe and so endelang þer wite lak'
up on kingberwes and þanne rigt up an brokhurste and endelang þare lake to
ther hide.
 7. Of lospushale and so bi talayate an þanne to þar dich bi
weste widemere and soa endelang rigges to upiate and from upyate endelang dich
to wideyate.
 9. Ant þanne to þan gore and þanne so to cotelesburgh' and
þanne so to ther seuenestrete and of þer seuenestrete to coteleshed and soa
endelang þer strete dich to wilteneweie.
 11. And endelang weyes to þan langeberghe ant þanne rigt in the
wide dich and of þer dich ouer knolle to acclei and so to hedstokke and
þanne to þes drakenhorde in on þar siderer.
 14. And so endelang þare dich to þan frimde dich and so in on
þe mere and of þan mere in on þan landschere stok and of þare stokke in
on coppenthorn and þanne to þan ellene bem.
 17. And so walke stille and þanne to prestes yate endlang weies
up on holebrok' hulle and so to þe sladisheuede of þe sladisheuede in to
þan aissh'.
 19. To pennegaford þare þer ongunne yat.
 20. Stant in wiltschire dorseteschire and hampteschire.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 514 (Birch 779)
B15.8.197.
Bounds, Sawyer 514: Birch 1885-99, no. 779.



 1. Ðis syndon ða land gemæro ðæs bufan cwedenan
landes.
 1. Ærest on suð healfe oð cincges firhðe.
 2. Of cincges fyrhðe on offahames gemære.
 3. Ðanan on here stræt.
 3. Andlang stræte ofer lylle burnan oð east meallinga
gemære.
 4. And swa riht suð be eastan ðam cwyllan oð þa wyde
stræte.
 5. Suð andlang stræte on geriht oð cincges fyrhðe.
 6. Ðænne syndon þis þa denbæro.
 6. East lindrhycg.
 6. And otanhyrst.
 7. And fræcincghyrst.
 7. And sceorfestede XXX penniga & wihtherincg falad sto.
 8. Gafol And holan spic.

Ch 516 (Birch 894)

 1. This synd tha land ge mæru.
 1. On easthealfe on Cumtun bricgge upon tha lace oth ranwylle, of
ran wylle upon thone eastemestan holan weg up to hricgge.
 3. Andlang hrigcges west be ecge on mere, thonon on lyngærstun
eastewerdne, thonon on slæw, thone andlang streames on gifle, oth
mylenburnna ut scyt up on stream eft to Cumtun bricgge.

Ch 517 (Birch 810)
B15.8.199.
Bounds, Sawyer 517: Birch 1885-99, no. 810.



 1. Ðis is þara XXX hidæ boc æt Beorhtanwylle þæ
eadred cing gæbocode æþelgeard his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mæra þæra XXX hida to
Beorhtanwille.
 4. Ærest of þam more be westan þam tune on þa ealdan dic.
 4. West andlang dic on þa hæþenan byrgylsas.
 5. Þonne east andlang weges Of þam wege on ænne littelne
þorn.
 6. Of þam þorne east & hwon suð on ge rihte to þam wege
to gafer bice.
 7. Þanon norð be þam and heafdon oð þa lace.
 8. Andlang lace ut on temese oð midne stream.
 9. Andlang ea.
 9. Of þa ealdan stret.
 9. Ford andlang gea to holan wylle.
 10. Of holan wylle.
 10. On holan weg.
 10. Of holan wege on bric weg.
 10. Of bric wege.
 11. On ærnincgweg.
 11. Of ærningewege on meosdene.
 11. Of meosdene on meldanige.
 12. Eastewerdne.
 12. On sandlace.
 12. Andlang sand lice to ceolesige to þam hnottan stocce.
 13. Of þam stocce norð andlang gybhilde to þære ealdan
dic.
 14. Þær we her on fengan.
 15. Þonne ligcaþ be norðam þam porte XXXVI ækera yrþ
landes.
 16. And X æceras mæde.
 16. And I myln.
 16. And binnan porte fram eastgeate on norð healfe strete on
þæne broc.
 17. And VII heorþas butan þam & þreo cyrican.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 518 (Birch 1345)
B15.8.200.
Bounds, Sawyer 518: Birch 1885-99, no. 1345.



 1. Hec fynteali mearc þis sindon Swalewanclifes land gemero.
 1. Ærest of þære se.
 2. To þam burnan of þam burnan be þere eastmearke.
 3. Swa to ælfwoldes mearke.
 3. Of ælfwoldes mearke.
 3. To kynges mearke to se.
 4. Et seo wudu reden þe þer mid rihte to gebirede.
 4. Et wdændere cæt hærst hatte.
 5. And þ sealttærn steal æt here pit.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 519 (Birch 818)
B15.8.201.
Bounds, Sawyer 519: Birch 1885-99, no. 818.



 1. Þis his þære V hide boc æt dydelingtune þe eadred
cing gebocode Wulfrice lis þegne on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis syndon þa land gemæro into dydelingtune.
 3. Arest on lindune easteweardre to þare hina gemære on
cheoles burge eastgeat.
 4. Þonon ut on þæt westgeat of þam westgeate on
dydelingdune.
 5. Of dydelingdune on winburnan.
 6. Up andlang winburnan oþ hore tuninge gemære.
 7. Andlang hore tuninge gemæres oþ stigla pæþ of stigela
paþe ofer þone readan weg þæt eft on lindune.
 8. And þa men þe on þæm londee standeþ & seo mæd
liþ on ige þe þær to gebyred.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 522 (Birch 832)
B15.8.202.
Bounds, Sawyer 522: Birch 1885-99, no. 832.



 1. Þis is þara V hyda boc æt eblesburnan þe eadred cyng
Gebocode elfsige on ecæ yrfæ.
 3. Ærest on bican bricge andlang dic on þone here pað.
 3. Of ðan her paðe uppan beor dune on þes uferan hlinces west
ende.
 4. Of ðan hlince on þa ðri beorgas æt þere dune.
 5. Of ðan beorgan andlangan þes smalan waðes on rugan beorh.
 6. Of þan beorge andlang herpaðes fornan gean menandene.
 7. On sceapacumb.
 7. Of sceapacumbe.
 7. On land sceara geat.
 8. Of land sceara geate.
 8. On ludan beorh.
 8. Of ludan beorcge on eblesburnan.

Ch 523 (Birch 830)
B15.8.203.
Bounds, Sawyer 523: Birch 1885-99, no. 830.



 1. Ðis is þara X hidæ boc æt beorhtanwylle þe ædred
cing gebocode æþelwearde his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mæro to Beorhtan wille.
 3. Þara X hida.
 4. Ærest of þam more be westan þam tune.
 4. On þa dic.
 4. West andlang Dic of þa hæþenan byrigelsas þonne east
andlang þan an heafdan on anne litelne þorn.
 6. Þonon east & hwon suð on ge rihte to þam wege to
gafær bæce.
 7. Þo nord be þam and heafdan of þa lace andlang lace ut on
temæse of midne stream andlang ea of ða ealda stræt andlang stræte
on þone ford of þam forde west andlang mores of þæt man ær on
feng.

Ch 524 (Birch 828)
B15.8.204.
Bounds, Sawyer 524: Birch 1885-99, no. 828.



 1. Erest of buckansticke west on buckanmere to þan ruancroundele
þaron middeward burnestowe to þan stone.
 2. Þanen west endelang smaleweies on þare croundel bi este þa
ertheburgh and so north on rigt to hordenestone þanen to elden berwe.
 4. And soa endelang diches north to þan white stone þanen to
þan Stanberwe yate þanen to þe litel berwe þanen endelang meres to
middel dich þanen north to rigt weie to þan ston on mid rigt weies.
 7. And soa to loppancombe ouerward þar forth endlang furch on
rigte to merewelle endlang stremes to folanruwers ouer þan ridde to þan
stone whit oute þar irwelonde þar forth to þan beche.
 10. Þanen of piwannere on lippanstibbe þar on kingesdich
endland dich to melanbroke of milanbrok on lortanbroke þanen on lortanberwe
so vp endlang furtg to mereberwe.
 13. Þanen out to þan widen yate of þan gate to þan horeston
ford to rammesburi yate of rammesburi so forth endelang weies to buckansticke.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 525 (Birch 834)
B15.8.205.
Bounds, Sawyer 525: Birch 1885-99, no. 834.



 1. Ðis syndon þa landgemaore to wasinga tune.
 2. Ærest on duhan lea of duhan lea on readan wylle.
 2. Of readdan wille to lydgeardes broge.
 3. Of lidgeardes beorge to tatmonnes apoldre.
 3. Of tatmonnes apoldre to deneburge hleawe.
 4. Of deneburge hleawe to stan beorge.
 5. Of stanbeorwe to haþeburge hleawe.
 5. Of þam hlæwe to here grafe of here grafe to twam beorgum.
 6. Of twam beorgum to hremnes dune.
 7. Of heremnes dune to bidan holte.
 7. Of bidan holte þæt to wigan campe.
 8. Of wigan campe to bennan beorge.
 8. Of þam beorge to blæccan pole.
 9. Of þam pole to þære apuldre þonne to dunan heafde.
 10. Þæt to hunes cnolle.
 10. Þonne eft on duhanlea.
 11. Ðis synt þa den þe þær to ge byrigeaþ.
 11. Wynburgespær & þreo crochyrsta & horsham &
yffeles leah & hæslwic & gatawic & ridan fald & scacalwic
& hundsæding fald.

END_TEXT

Ch 526 (Birch 824)
B15.8.206.
Bounds, Sawyer 526: Birch 1885-99, no. 824; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synt þa landgemæro þe hyraþ to Leahtforda.
 1. Ærest of Leahtforda þæt up to þære dic.
 2. Þæt þonane on gerihte to haran grafan.
 3. Þæt þonan on gerihte to renget þorne, þonne, up to
Heardulfes hlæwe.
 4. Þonne suþ to þære holan dic beniþan Welnabyrig.
 5. Þonne from þære dic to ættanho, of ættanho in wer
Inon Terstan.

END_TEXT

Ch 527 (Birch 821)<extent></extent>

 1. Þis syndon þara þreora hida landgemæra.
 1. To west hanecan hamme & to glindlea.
 2. Ærest of þære landriðe andlang rode oð gænes
riþe swa west.
 3. Iammor Be nidde wearde more oð mæres hammes gemæra swa
norð.
 4. Be middan fænne oð gifrecis hammes gemæra swa to
horsiges gemæro þanan in to ðone land fleot & an sealtearn wiþ
pelenes ea be norþan land fleote.

gif/.

Ch 528 (Birch 820)
B15.8.208.
Bounds, Sawyer 528: Birch 1885-99, no. 820.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to mearsætham on þone þorn
be norþan eadrices stane þonon up to bean stede betwih þam twam hammum.
 3. Of bean stede swa forþ on þa ruwan apuldre.
 3. Þonon on esnes ham.
 4. Of esnes hamme on cusesstede beorh of þam beorge on tunles
weorþ easteweardne.
 5. Þonon þurh þa ige on þone fulan broc.
 5. Of þam broce andlang streames on þone blæc pol.
 6. Of þam pole ut to þam beorgum þæt þonon on becces ham
westeweardne þonon forþ to bade woldes hagan westeweardne of þam hagan on
todan camp of todan campe on ceomman treow þonon on scynes weorþ
westeweardne of scynes weorþe on þone hundes þyfel.
 10. Of hundes þyfele forþ be wyrtwalan on þone þorn be
norðan eadrices stane.
 12. Þis synt þa den to mearsætham.
 12. Pedan hrycg & æt lace þæt forræpe on þunres
feld norþan an hid.
 14. Þis is þara twentiga hida boc æt Mearsætham þe
Eadred cing gebocode Oswige his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT

Ch 529 (Birch 833)

 1. Þis sind þa landgemæra æt deniceswurþe.

gemære to ceawan hlæwe andlang dic on landbroc andlang broces to þan
norðran denceswurþe.
 3. Þonne eastrihte eft to cillan Riþe.

licgað þær þa þreo hida on þan norðran denceswurþe
undælede.

cytan on cuffes cnol.
 5. Of cuffes cnolle on widan leage of widan leage on wulfa broc of

Ch 532 (Birch 865)
B15.8.211.
Bounds, Sawyer 532: Birch 1885-99, no. 865.



 1. Ðis is þara XI hida boc æt stoce þe eadred cing
gebocode ælfricæ his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land ge mæro to Stoce.
 3. Ærest of sæ ofer þone stanhricg on þonæ easteran
weg þonon on gagol mor.
 4. Þonne norð andlang þæs mores oþ ruwan oringa ge
mæro.
 5. Þonne east on þa ealdan dic oþ idel hiwisce easteweard.
 6. Þonne norð &lang mearcæ on þa wiþegas weste
wearde.
 7. Þonne east be þam ealdan herpoðe to æþelswiðe
tuninga lea.
 8. Þonon suð on þa ealdan dic.
 8. Andlang dic utt on sæ þonon utt on solentan west on midne
stream.
 9. Of hit cymð upp þær mon ær onfeng.
 10. & fyrþ ora is on wudu to Stoce.
 10. And se wudu be norðan þam.
 11. And seo læs & þæt mæsten is ge mæne to þam
an & twentigum hidum.

END_TEXT

Ch 533 (Birch 871)
B15.8.212.
Bounds, Sawyer 533: Birch 1885-99, no. 871.



 1. Þis sindon þa landgemæro to ægelesuurðe.
 1. Ærest up of nyn to þere ealdan dic wið suðtun ge
mære.
 2. Fram þere dic to þere ealdan strete to maman þorne.
 3. Þanon to marmedue a gerihte to wyda.
 3. Swa innan wyda be uptun ge mære.
 4. Swa to uffawyrða ge mære.
 4. Þanon to hylpestun ge mære swa to Kyneburga cæstre ge
mære swa ut of wyda.
 6. Fram þam wyda be Cyneburge cæstre ge mære to þam
wege.
 7. Ofer þone wege andlang þere æaldan dic.
 7. Of þere dic eft ut on nyn.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 534 (Birch 868)
B15.8.213.
Bounds, Sawyer 534: Birch 1885-99, no. 868.



 1. Þese sanden þe land imare.
 1. Arest fram wicanforð on beam broc.
 2. An ðonnen anlang broke on anne wiþig.
 2. Þefele þiers ouer þane merse þare weilaite.
 3. Þanne.
 3. Or anne ston.
 3. Of þanne stane.
 4. On alle þiscan.
 4. Of alle discan.
 4. On anne dich.
 4. Þannen suth at lang dich.
 5. On ðone here paþ of þen here paþe suth anlang dich on
þanne cumb.
 6. Þonne anlang cumbe on þen hirnen.
 6. Onne strut heardes paþe of þane paþe forðe anlange
welles.
 7. One þane westrene cumbe þanne.
 8. A dun anlang cumbes on þane broc.
 8. Þonne anlang stremes on þe schort mannes pol þerth ut on
sæ.
 10. Þanne is þis seo westere land sceare.
 10. Of sa.
 10. An anne stan tor.
 11. Of þane tore.
 11. On þane clif upward on anne dich.
 11. Þanen north anlang safundune on þene richte herepath.
 12. Þanen north an lang dich.
 13. Oþ þane ealden stodfald estward.
 13. Þane forþ on ða ealden hege rewe anlang þare hege rewe
oþ þa dich.
 14. Of þare dich on anne linc reawe.
 15. Of þane linche on bl þanne anlang broces oþ olle
discan.
 16. Of olle discan north ouer þane on scyleford.
 16. Þane anlang streame.
 17. Þat it cometh eft to Wikenforde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 535 (Birch 869)
B15.8.214.
Bounds, Sawyer 535: Birch 1885-99, no. 869.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to wicham.
 1. Ærest se burna on easthealfe on suþhealfe sanctæ
Agustines gemæro & eft sanctæ Agustines land on westhealfe be
þæl brycge.
 3. Swa forþ andlang broces oþ hose graf & þær west be
mearc fleote to sture & swa east be sture oþ burnan muþan & swa
forþ oþ Eadulfes mearce & þær forþ be broce oþ ealdan stræt
& se wuda on trind lea.
 6. & þæt den on blean earnes hyrst on easthealfe þening
den & seo burh stræt on suþhealfe Ælfrices mearc on westhealfe.
 8. Cluse & haming ford on norðhealfe þæs hiredes mearc
to Sancte Mildryþe swa forð oþ langan leagas swa oþ ælfweardes
mearce.

END_TEXT

Ch 536 (Birch 864)
B15.8.215.
Bounds, Sawyer 536: Birch 1885-99, no. 864.



 1. Ðis is þara tyn hida boc æt macaniæ & æt
Suttunæ Wylle þe eadred cing gebocode æþelwearde his þegnæ on
ece yrfæ.
 2. <foreign>Ter duodenas segetes cum bis quinis prati jugeribus, quod
anglice dicitur XXXVI</foreign> æcera yrþ landes & <foreign>X</foreign> æceras mæde.
 3. Ðis synt þa fif hida æt Maccanige.
 3. Þe gibhild seo lacu.
 3. Eallan butan bælið.
 4. On ælce healfe.
 4. Ðonne ligþ bæ norþan þam porte XXXVI æcera yrþ
landes.
 5. And X æceras mæde.
 5. And an mylen.
 5. And binnan þam porte fram geast geate on norþ healfe

 6. Of þone broc.
 7. And VII heorþas butan þon.
 7. And þreo cyrcan.

 8. Ge butan.
 8. Eall swa æþelwold bisceop hit ær hæfde.

Ch 540 (Birch 862)
B15.8.216.
Bounds, Sawyer 540: Birch 1885-99, no. 862.



 1. Þis is ðæs landes boc æt Duntune ðe Eadred cyng
edniwon gæ bocodæ sanctæ trinitate & Sanctæ Pætræ &
Sanctæ Paule into ealdan mynstræ.
 1. On wereðan hylle.
 1. On fyrdinges lea.
 1. On ebles burnan to afene.
 2. On pysere.
 2. On ða suðan lace.
 2. On earnes beorh.
 2. On dic.
 2. Æt beoredes.
 3. An to pytan wyrðe.
 3. On dyre broc.
 3. On welewe.
 3. On ða dic æt hiceles wyrðe.
 4. Þonne ofer ðone feld on hagan ut þurh brember wudu.
 5. Anlang herepaðes to ðæs hagan ænde to fæger hylde
forda.
 6. On ðonne hagan on ceorles æwe.
 6. On crawan crundul.
 7. Ðonne on ða hric.
 7. Anlang weges on ða dic to bymera cumbe.
 8. And ðær ðwyres ofer ðreo crundelas.
 8. Ofer ða stræt.
 9. Ðwyres ofer ða dune to wudu.
 9. On ðæs hlinces ænde.
 10. On ðone smalan weg.
 10. Ofer hig cumb.
 10. On ðæm smalan wege.
 10. On ðæne stan.
 11. On ðæt hæð westeweard.
 11. On ðone beorh.
 11. Dingealand sceare.
 12. Þ suð on strætford.
 13. Þis is ðæs landes boc æt duntune.
 14. Ðe Eadred cyngc ednywon gebocade sanctæ trinitate.
 14. And sanctæ Petre.
 15. And Paule ing to ealdan mynstre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 541 (Birch 867)
B15.8.217.
Bounds, Sawyer 541: Birch 1885-99, no. 867.



 1. Þes beth þe land mere to Idemestone þare X hide.
 1. Erest to þan elde were.
 2. Of þan elde were endlanges þar wiresheued to þan weie.
 3. Of þan weie wires ouer þan dene to þan holon of þan
holon to Piscrundel þanen on þan wey endlang weies on þan dich corf.
 4. And forth ouer wirfuldoune suthward to þan crundele þanen
endelang weies at litelhulle to þan stane þanne vp ouer handoune to þan
birgilsond.
 7. Þanen vp on menhulle of menhulle est to þer strete endlang
þer strete to ernebergh þanne south to þa stone.
 8. Of þan stone ouer hendoune on þe furs.
 9. Endlang þer furghs to þan bourne þanen endlang borne as
hit schet vp to þan knolle at Smalwey þanne west to kingesdich for to hit
kemet to fimbergh.
 11. Þanen þer north endelang weyes on hehelmeslandschere
þanne endlang wei wires ouer brouningbergh northward on northond þe weies X
acres þanen on þe dich þar hit geth eft on þe eldewere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 542 (Birch 866)
B15.8.218.
Bounds, Sawyer 542: Birch 1885-99, no. 866.



 1. Þis sind þa landgemæro to stanmere.
 1. Ærst of þan crundelun þær to stræte &lang
stræte to Aþulfes þorne þonnon on fyrd hammas anlang stifig weges
þonne on cat beorh þonne on ælfheages gemære.
 4. Þonon &lang mære weges on wulforan þonon andlang
gemæres to ines dene ufewearde þæt þonon on stiele þonne &lang
gemæres þæt on lic hangan.
 6. Of lic hangan on pocging rode þonnon on dunan wyrþe.
 7. Þonon on loceres weg andlang weges on þa ealdan stigele of
þære stigele þwers ofer rammes hryeg þonnon on þone ealdan hyrne weg
þannon on beden weg of beden weg suþe wearde innan &lang hecgan onbutan
hunes dune þæt eft on þa crundelas be suþan haran grafas.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 543 (Birch 879)
B15.8.219.
Bounds, Sawyer 543: Birch 1885-99, no. 879.



 1.1. Þis his þas anes hiwisces boc at Winterburnan, & ðas
oþres hiwisces on whit þe þær to hyrþ, þe Eadred cyng gebocode
Ælfsige his goldsmiþe on eche hyfte.
 2.1. Þis synt þa land gemæro þæs hiwisces æt
winterburnan: ærest of byrhtferþes hlæwe andlang burhweges to beornwyne
stane, of þam stane andlang burh weges to þære stan hypan.
 2.3. Þonne niþer andlang burnan swa seo læfer scæt to
healdan hlince, þonen swa seo læfer scæt on þæs deopan fordes
ende.
 2.5. Of þam forda swa seo læfre scæt on chypmanna ford, of
þam forda swa seo læfer scæt on hors wylle, þonon swa seo læfer
scæt eft on byrhtferþes hlæw.
 2.8. Þis his þæs hiwisces land gemæro þe þær to
hyrþ on whit: fram hyrste andlang slades to wullafes hlipan, þonon andlang
lanan to beorhtnaþes stane.
 2.10. Of þam stane andlang lanan to þæs mores heafde,
ðonon andlang slades ut on scos fleot, þonne andlang streames ut on
scealdan fleot, þonnen andlang scealdan fleotes up to hyrste.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 544 (Birch 883)
B15.8.220.
Bounds, Sawyer 544: Birch 1885-99, no. 883.



 1. Æþelmæres booc æt cetwuda & hildes dune twuentig
hida on ece yrfe.
 2. Þis seond ða londgemæru ðæs londes æt Cetwuda
& æt hildes dune.
 3. Ærest on ða halgan æc.
 3. Swa ollonc ðæs gemær heges to ðæm slo æt
ðæm more ufewerdan.
 5. Of ðam more on dunes pyt.
 6. Ðonon ðurh wippan hoh.
 6. Þæt swa be ðæm gretan wyrtruman on ðone holan weg.
 7. On þone oðerne weg to þæm rugan hlawe.
 8. On þone oðerne weg to þæm rugan hlawe.
 10. Up of ðæm sice to cufanlea.
 10. On ða dic to þæm readan slo.
 11. Ðæt swa on þane lytlan dic.
 11. Þonon on ðone oðerne dic.
 12. Þæt swa ollonc þæt gemære heges.
 12. On butan hreodlege þæt swa on þone mærhege þe sceot
to þære halgan æc.
 13. Þis lond ælfstan sald æþelfled wiþ þæm.
 15. Lond æt Ceadeles funtan & eft Eadred cing hit ageaf.
 16. Æþelmære wið þæm ilcan land.
 16. A on ece yrfe þæm ðe him leofast seon.
 17. Oda aercabiscop, Oswulf <foreign>ad bebb</foreign> hehgr, Vrm eorl, Vhtred
eorl, Wulfhelm biscop.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Bounds, Sawyer 545: Birch 1885-99, no. 885.



 1. Ærst of þære suð mærdic, &c.

Ch 546 (Birch 880)
B15.8.222.
Bounds, Sawyer 546: Birch 1885-99, no. 880.



 1. Ærest on norð healfe.
 1. Æðelferðes londe swa forð be sande oþ norð muþan
from norþ muþan to macan broc ðonne to ærne wege of ærne wege to
Eanflæde muþan of Eanflæde muþan on mearc fleotes muþan of mearc
fleotes muþan eft on Eanflæde muðan ðonne on easthealfe to mylen
fleotes muðan oð suð tun of suð tune andlang broces to haðe
mæringe ðonne on suðhealfe of haðe mæringe to stoccum.
 7. Of stoccum andlong stræte oð sancte Agustines mearce from
sancte Agustines mearce oð broc andlang broces oð stan brycge suð from
stan brycge oð wifelinge to Cristes cirican gemære from Cristes cirican
gemære oð ealdan hege on west healfe ealdan hege to feaxum.
 11. Ðonne west from feaxum to celdan to cinges gemære from
cinges gemære oð gata gehægge.
 13. Ðonne siendan feower swulung binnan ea ðæs londes þe
gebyreð innto raculfe.
 14. On tænett feower swulung ond an læs on waru ðe
gebyreð innto raculfe.
 15. Ðonne is ealles þæt landes XXV swulga & an swulung
on ceolulfing tune suð be wealda þære cirican to bote.
 17. Raculfes boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 547 (Birch 875)
B15.8.223.
Bounds, Sawyer 547: Birch 1885-99, no. 875.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemero to ofertune.
 1. Ærest & lang wusan oþ þa riþe inon þone wuda
þweores ofer þone wuda on þa stræt & lang stræte ofer þone
broc þonon on þa dic.
 3. Andlang dic oþ þer dices heafod & þonne eft on þa
ea.

START_TEXT

Ch 550 (Birch 882)
B15.8.224.
Bounds, Sawyer 550: Birch 1885-99, no. 882.



 1. Þis synd þara twentiges hida land gemæra to burhtune
ærest of widig forda andlang weges to pippenespenne.
 2. Of pippenespenne, andlang slades on turcandene.
 3. Up andlang dene to þære swelstowe syððan andlang foss
to þan ealdan sice wið slohterword.
 4. Andlang sices on wenris, andlang streames eft on wiðig ford.
 6. Þonne is þis þara VII hida land ge mæra æt
mæþelgares byrig þe hyrd into burghtune.
 7. Ærest of mæþelgeres byrig on deopancumb of deopancumbe
on cwenena broce of cwenena broce up be þam geride.
 9. To þam beorgan, of þam beorgan on fiscwille.
 9. Of fiscwille on mæswille, of mæswille on sealter wille.
 10. Of sealter pille &lang broces to þam greatan þorne.
 11. Of þam þorne on þorn beorh, of þorn beorge on foss eft
&lang foss.
 12. Þæt in on da ea on wænric.
 12. Up on stream oð ðone garan suð weardne.
 13. Of þam garan on horwyt of horpytte eft on foss.
 14. Wid suðan þone garan, andlang foss eft on mæþelgares
byrig.
 16. Þon is þis þara VII hida land gemæra æt dægeles
forda þe hirð into burgtune.
 17. Ærest of blædene on mules hlæw þ forð up to
heortdune.
 18. To hwettan stanes wylle of hwættan staneswille on heort broc
of þam broce on þa stige.
 19. Andlang stige dic &lang dic on þa stræt to þære
oðere stræt.
 20. Oþ þære stræt on beagan wille anlang broces eft on
blædene.
 22. Oscetel circwærd.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 552 (Birch 877)
B15.8.225.
Bounds, Sawyer 552: Birch 1885-99, no. 877.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to weligforda.
 1. Ærest of wines treowe andlang dene þæt up on þone weg
þonon on bradan leage norþe weardre on anne ham & þonne þurh ut
þone lea on anne ham suþe weardne on þa ealdan hege ræwe in on wopig
hangran of þam hangran on scilling hangran.
 5. Þonon on bradan ham westeweardne on þam hamme on cardan
hlæw on þam hlæwe on lamburnan þonon up on deoran treowe of þam
treowe on þone elebeamstyb þonon on ceolbaldes wylle of þam wylle on cyta
sihtes ford os þam forda to wulfrices gemære þonon to hord hlince
ufeweardum of þam hlince onsihtre mæde norþeweardre swa forþ on
cenelmes stan.
 10. Of þam stane on þone grenan weg on þam wege to rige hamme
þonon ut on þa lam pyttas on þane crundel of ðam crundele on þone
æsc þonon forþ ofer burnan andlang mylen paþes on þa þrie þornas
& swa forþ andlang hlinces on cardan ham.
 14. Of þam hamme ut þurh þone lea on grenan beorh of þam
beorge on ecgunes treow of þam treowe on mearc weg þonon on þa dene &
swa forþ to þam þrim gemærum of þam gemærum eft on wines treow.
 18. Þis is þara XVIII hida boc æt welig forda þe Eadred
cing gebocode Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfe.
 20. Wiþ þæs landes gewrixle þe on wealum is æt
Pendyfig.

END_TEXT

Ch 553 (Birch 887)
B15.8.226.
Bounds, Sawyer 553: Birch 1885-99, no. 887, corrected by Abrams 1989, 43-56.



 1. Ærest of Stanforda on þa apuldran, on þone haran stan.
 2. Swa on Hennamere.
 3. Of Hennamere on Gosamere, on stan oran.
 3. Of stan oran on þ hlypiget, of þam hlypgete andlang hamma
of ðam hammum on ða sadeludan ac.
 5. Of þære sadeludan æc, on cwenan brigce.
 5. Of cwenan brigce on kynges rode.
 6. Of cynges rode on Eadwaldingstan.
 7. Of ðam stane in Mucan treow of Mucan treowe on ða apuduran.
 8. Þ ðanon rihte on Fulan broc.
 8. And swa andlang broces on Bydincel of Bydincele on Loddrawyllon
of Lodderawyllon on clæg weg.
 9. Andlang clæg weges on sulan ford.
 10. Of ðam forda on þa ealdan byd andlang byd on Deorham.
 11. Of Deorhamme on Mærbroc.
 11. Andlang broces on þone wyrtwalan to þam acholte.
 12. Þonne swa se Wyrtwala sceat on Fearn beorhg.
 13. Of Fearn beorhgan on þa eggce.
 14. Andlang eggce swa be þam heafdon on þone graf.
 15. Swa be ðam Wyrtwalan on þa stræt.
 15. Andlang stræte on Esnes stan.
 16. Of Esnastanne on þone ealdan weg.
 16. Andlang weges adun be ðam graue.
 17. Swa be þam heafdon on Hundes geat.
 18. Of Hundes geate on þone mere.
 18. Of ðam mere swa be Wyrtwalan on þa ealdan dic.
 19. Of þære dic on sticelan stige of þære stige on Fearn
leage on Mærbroc.
 20. Andlang Mærbroces on Cuðwealding leage.
 21. Of þære leage on Mærbroc andlang broces on Baddanham.
 22. Of ðam hamme on Byd.
 22. Andlang Byd on Hreodmorwyllon þanon on haranstan & swa on
Fileðham.
 23. Ðanon on Cearcesleage.
 23. Of Cearces leage.
 24. On Headdan rode.
 24. Of Headdan rode on Bydewyllon & swa on Emelhylle þonne on
west weg.
 25. Of west wege on hric weg.
 26. Andlang weges on Wrænnan leage suðewearde.
 26. Þ swa on Oxnahealas.
 27. Of oxena healon on Bicanstige.
 27. Of Bican stige on Merces feld of Merces felda on Mærbroc of
Mærbroce on Hlidan.
 28. Of Hlydan on Mersic of Mærsice on Hegestaldes setl.
 29. Þ ðanon rihte on Willerdes pol.
 30. And swa andlang Fromes.
 30. Þ up on Cweorn cleofu.
 31. Þanon rihte on Befer pyttas.
 31. And swa on Hyddes burhg.
 31. Þ on æscburhg.
 32. Of æscbyrig on clæghyrste on þa ealdan wic.
 32. Of ealdan wic on Bydanwyrð.
 33. Of Bydanwyrðe on Sinder ford.
 33. Of Sinderforda andlang Frome eft on Stanford.

END_TEXT

Ch 556 (Hart)
B15.8.228.
Bounds, Sawyer 556: Hart 1966, 156.



 1. Þis aren þe landmæres into Haddedune.
 1. Erest of erningestrete into Sumerlededic, and of þare dic into
billingbroc.
 2. Andlang broces, and of þan broce into þe mære.
 3. Norð of þan mære andlong Weyes into aldandic.
 4. East andlang dices into ellen styb and on þa stræte.
 5. And suð andlang stræte þat it comeð foren on gean
sumerlededic þer it ær bigan þat fiue hiða land mære.

END_TEXT

Ch 557 (Sawyer 11)
B15.8.229.
Bounds, Sawyer 557: Sawyer 1979, 17.



 1. Ærest of deues broke an gillundes dic.
 1. Of ðere dic, on hine hylle.
 1. Of hine hille, on pire broc.
 2. Of pirebroke, on pirewasse.
 2. Of pirwasse, on ðæne hwitan mor.
 3. Of þan witan mor, on ðæn michalen ac.
 3. Of ðære mycelen æc, on stenges healh.
 4. Of stenges heale, on potteres lege.
 4. Of potteres leage, on cundesleage.
 5. Of cundeslege, on cundes fenne.
 5. Of cundes fenne, on lind broc.
 6. Of lind broce, on holan broce.
 6. Of holan broke, an dufan.
 7. Andlong dufan, eft innan denes broc.
 8. <foreign>Duces</foreign> & oerles <foreign>sex conscribebant</foreign>.

Ch 558 (Birch 892)
B15.8.230.
Bounds, Sawyer 558: Birch 1885-99, no. 892.



 1. Þis is þara fif & twentiga hida boc æt cifanlea þe
eadred cing gebocade Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemara to Cifanlea.
 4. Ærest of catbeorge andlang weges on Aþelunes þorn þonon
andlang weges on seal hangran estweardne.
 5. Þonon andlang weges on þa byrgelsas.
 6. Þonon andlang byden hæma gemæres on þa haran apoldre
þonon on orhæma gemære andlang þæs gemæres on Ciltewudes
gemære to þan stane.
 8. Þonon west andlang weges to þan hæcce þonon andlang
gemæres to þan crundle.
 9. Þonon andlang gemæres to þan oþrum crundle þonon to
þan won stocce & þær to wuda.
 10. Þonon on þa syrfan.
 11. Þonon ofer hean hrycg.
 11. Þonon on þæs cinges hagan.
 12. Þonne þær west andlang hagan on Hnæfleage
suþewearde þonon andlang hagan to þam bæce of þam bæce þær
norþ ut an þone lytlan hæþfeld þonon andlang weges be Winterburninga
gemære be westan þære ealdan byrig on þone stanihtan weg to þam
stan cystlun.
 16. Þonon on þa andheafda þonne þær west on þone
burnan butan six æcerun.
 17. Þonne þær norþ an furlang þonne þær west ofer
þa twegen beorgas to þam hearpoþe.
 18. Norþ andlang herpoþes on bradan ford þær west andlang
burn stowe to ibban stane þonne þær east andlang weges on stan dene
þonon west to þam wyrtwalan þonon norþ to sceaphammas.
 21. Þonon gerihta þær tun wegas ut sceotaþ.
 22. Þonon on gerihta to þære haran apoldre.
 22. Of þære haran apoldre þurh þone tun to þan ruwan
crundle.
 23. Þonon andlang gemæres on þone lytlan beorh.
 24. Up on mules dune.
 24. Of þam beorge andlang gemæres on hrycg weg andlang hrycg
weges oþ catmeres gemære.
 25. Þonne þær east andlang gemæres on puttan pyt.
 26. Of þam pytte andlang gemæres eft on catbeorh.

END_TEXT

Ch 559 (Birch 895)

 1. Ðis is þara þreora hida landboc æt beorchamme þe

 4. Þis synd þara þreora hida londgemæro to Beorcham.

þæs hagan end þonne andlang hagan to Cnottinga hamme þonne of

Ch 560 (Birch 900)

 1. Þis synd þa land gemære æt Cusan hricge þara fif
hida ærest on mær weg onlang mær weges on þa heccan &lang heccen
on þa haran þyrnan of þære þyrnan on cyneeahes treow þ andlang
heorpaþes on grenan dene þonne &lang þæs ealdan weges on linleahe
þ ondlang heccan on þa crundol þ ofer þone hric eft on merweg & on
þan gemanan lande gebyrað þarto fif & sixti æccera.

Ch 561 (Birch 899)
B15.8.233.
Bounds, Sawyer 561: Birch 1885-99, no. 899.



 1. Ærest in æt þam suð geate & ut æt þan norþ
geate on dude beorh & þanne on eceles beorh.
 2. & þanne on hring pyt.
 2. And þanne on þa and heafdu.
 3. And þanne on þa cealc seaþas & þanon on þone
bradan.
 4. Meare & þanon &lang dices on clænan mæde &
þanne on þone bradan weg on butan mor dune on ðyreses lace & þanon
on læces mere norþe wearde & þanne &lang mores be þan norþ
stane & þanne þwyres ofer þone mor on bulan dic & swa andlang
dices to æþelferðes mearce.
 8. On bulen dices ende on þone þorn styb.
 8. And þanne on talleburnan & þonon to þæres halgan
stowe & sua up andlang broces.
 10. To aþelferþes mearce weste wearde & swa andlang mearce
to hremnes byrig to þan norþ geate & ut æt þan suþ geate on
hodan hlæw & þanne on stan hlæwan & þanne to þan redan hole
& þanne to þan dunnanhole & swa be þan hlide & þanne on
domferðes hest on tættaces stan & þanne on hundes hlæw &
þanne on hafoces hlæw.
 15. And þanne on þone scortan dic.
 15. And þanne on þa langen dic to æscesbyris eft to þan
suþan geate.

Ch 562 (Birch 898)
B15.8.234.
Bounds, Sawyer 562: Birch 1885-99, no. 898.



 1. Arest of elmerespole on biken muþe swo anlang brines fleotes.
 2. To tilbirhes forde.
 2. Swo on sa of sa, on þane stapel.
 2. Of þanne stapele, eft in tilbirhthes forde.
 3. Of þanne forde, eft þanen on stanford.
 4. Of stanforde, eft on almeres pol.

Ch 563 (Birch 903)
B15.8.235.
Bounds, Sawyer 563: Birch 1885-99, no. 903.



 1. Ærest on bulan setl þanon on stod leage of stodlege.
 1. On þone meal mihtan ford.
 2. Of þam forda on þone langan þorn.
 2. Of þam þorne on weste werde hina dune on þone ellen styb.
 3. Of þam stybbe on þone risc pyt.
 4. Of þam pytte on þa haran apuldre.
 4. Of þære apuldre on swynget.
 5. Of swyngete on þa ealdan dic.
 5. Of þære dic on þone burnan.
 6. Of þam burnan on þone hæc.
 6. Of þam hæcce on eobban slæd.
 7. Of þam slæde on þa seocan aac.
 7. Of þære æc on þone burnan.
 8. Of þam burnan on cullan burh norðe wearde.
 8. Of cullan byrg on þæt stan gedelf.
 9. Of þam gedelfe on þone mærðorn.
 9. Of þam þornne on bican ham.
 10. Of bican hamme &lang hricge on widan cumb.
 10. Of widan cumbe on wyl wyrðe weste wearðe.
 11. Of ðare wyrðe on þæt pyl.
 12. &lang pylles on þone stan nihtan ford æt Eadmundes
byrig.
 12. Of þam stanihtan forda on þa lace.
 13. &lang lace on þa stræt &lang stræt æt
stocwudu norðe weardne on þæt pyl.
 14. Andlang pylles on þa dic æt þæs biscopes gemære.
 15. Of þære dic on east wylle.
 15. Of east wylle on hnut cumb.
 16. Andlang hnut cumbes east.
 16. On fulan broc.
 16. Of fulan broce on þa miclan dic.
 17. Of þære miclan dic.
 17. On þæt stræt get.
 18. Of stræt gete suð &lang stræt.
 18. To bulan setle.
 19. <foreign>Carta Edredi regis de Pennard minster et est LXVIII</foreign> in
landeboke.
 20. Boc to Pennerd <foreign>DCCCCLV</foreign>
 21. Penerd mynstres boc.

Ch 564 (Birch 908)
B15.8.236.
Bounds, Sawyer 564: Birch 1885-99, no. 908.



 1. Ðis sint þæs landes gemære æt cumtune ærest of
hricg wege on þæt wide geat of þan widan geate on æþelmes hlinc on
forwerde dune of æþelmes hlince on icen hilde weg of icenhilde wege on
bican dic of bicandice in on swyn broc.
 4. Of swyn broce on þone bradan þorn be westan mere of þan
þorne on þa readan dic &lang þære dic on hildes hlæw.
 6. Of hildes hlæwe on blæc pytt.
 6. Of blæc pytte &langes þære westran risc ræwe
innan swynbroc of swynbroce on read.
 8. Of Ræde on hwittuces hlæwe on icen hilde weg.
 8. Of icen hilde wege on mæres crundel.
 9. Of mæres crundelle on dinra beorh.
 10. Of dinra beorge on hricg weg of hricg wege on fearn hylles
slæd.
 10. Of fearn hylles slade to hæsl hylle suþe weardre.
 11. Of hæsl hylle west on þone grenan weg &lang weges to
þære gedrifonan furh andlang fyrh oþ hit cymð on þ wide geat be
eastan welandes smidðan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 565 (Birch 905)
B15.8.237.
Bounds, Sawyer 565: Birch 1885-99, no. 905; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara X hida boc æt cleran þe eadred cing
gæbocodæ ælfsigæ biscopæ feower manna dæg.
 2. And æftær heora daga into ealdan mynstræ.
 4. Ðis synð þa land gemere.
 4. Ærest of hilda hlæwe on hunig wege.
 5. Andlang weges on brege stipe stan.
 5. Of þan stane on scæp wescan andlang sceapwascan on
aleburnan.
 6. Andlang aleburnan on bæueres broces heafde on coferan treowe
on þa bradan ac.
 7. Of þære bradan ac on stuteres hylle niþewearde on
stuteres hylle on wearð setl.
 9. Of weard setle on wiþig grafas.
 9. Of wiþig grafan on scip del of scip delle on cyp manna delle.
 10. Andlang weges eft east on hyldan hlew.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 567 (Birch 906)
B15.8.238.
Bounds, Sawyer 567: Birch 1885-99, no. 906.



 1. Ærest on eoccenforda.
 1. Up &lang eoccenes to abbes dic.
 1. Þet to cealdenwulle.
 2. Þ to mearcforda &lang broces oð þene grenen weig.
 3. Andlang weiges to broce þ to wuduforda.
 3. Þ adune be broce oð pippel riðiges ut scyte þ þurhð
dene mor a be riðige.
 4. To guman graue.
 5. Þ to pippel bricge þ on þene sic æt þære fulan
æc.
 5. Þ to hæglea on þæne bradan mere.
 6. Þ a be wyrt walan to bromcumbes heafod.
 7. Þ on gerihtum to abbendune to þære port strete.
 7. Þ andlang stret on hiwege þ to ecgunes wyrðe.
 8. Þenne on bacgan leah þ on scæceling æcer.
 9. Þ ut on stanford þ to mægþeforda &lang lace ut on
temese þ on forð mid streame wið ufan micclanige on cearewyllan eft wið
neoðan berige on temese þ þer up be streame þ on bacgan broc.
 12. Þ on heafoces oran.
 12. Þ on holan dene.
 12. Þ on tidewaldes wylle.
 13. Andlang broces ut on temese þ forð mid streme oð geafling
lace &lang lace.
 14. Eft ut on temese þ up be streame on occenes grestun dic.
 15. Þet a be dic on eccen þ þer up eft on eccen forda.
 17. Æðeleaing uude colmanora.
 17. And Geatescumbe hyren into ðys twentigum hidum.
 18. Þa ic sylf studum gerad studum ge reow & rumoðlice
gescarode me sylfum & minum foregengum & eftyrgengum to ecum rymete.
 20. For Gode & for worulde.
 20. Gif hwa þurh deofles lare ge nyrwe.
 21. Þ ic Gode & sancta Marian meaglum mode on ece yrfe ge
seald hæbbe.
 22. Drihten his andweald genyðrige her & on ecnesse.
 23. Nymþe he mid fulre dead bote geinnige þ he on urum drihtne
gereafoð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 568 (Birch 904)
B15.8.239.
Bounds, Sawyer 568: Birch 1885-99, no. 904.



 1. Erest on bwelescroundel þanen on þe strete endlang strete on
þe berghes þanen on þe þorn.
 2. Bi stonestrete as þe linche stant ofþan þorne on þe
stanbrugge þanen on oþer stanbrugge þanne to lake atte þan litel linche
þanne endelang lake to dorternebrok þanne endelang brokes on þe fif acres
westward þanen endlang þare acre on þe dich ofþer dich est on þan
eldene heghewey þanene endlang weyes on þa tenstones bi este þe weye.
 7. Þanen on crowenthornisstibbe þanen on þe wey ende lang
weyes to þan redensloheued þanen on heggenberles of þan bugle þanen on
þe þorn stubbe þanen on þe brokenestret þanen on þe Northheued þa
schirlaundes.
 10. Þane to þa Staureweye at tammereslade eft þer on
medebourne þanen on rishlak þanen on hewinput þanen on þe hane of þer
hane vp on þan enlippanberwe on þan weie þanen endlang weies biweste
brokenanberwe on þe olde dich þanen endlang dich to vphammere of þer dich
on þe heued londe southward þanen on þe stourewe þare eft on
bowelescrundel. 

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 570 (Birch 923)
B15.8.240.
Bounds, Sawyer 570: Birch 1885-99, no. 923.



 1. Arest of horspoles heauede anlang dich on ludenham.
 1. Of ludenhame alang streames on eldenham.
 2. Þannen forð to þere ealden hege þannen forder be hegen
one stoc wey.
 3. Of stok wei anlang hecgham to filed hamme.
 4. Of filed hamme ut þurth þere groue on irichte to þere eald
dich.
 5. Of þere eald idich.
 5. On irichte to here pað.
 6. Of here paþe anlang richtes to lortenwille on ða elden dich
of þere ealden dic, on duccenhulle.
 7. Of duccenhulle, on cawel andlang dich.
 8. On wincawel, þannen anlang streames.
 8. On hors poles heaued.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 571 (Birch 931)
B15.8.241.
Bounds, Sawyer 571: Birch 1885-99, no. 931.



 1. Ðis is þara V hida boc æt rimtune þæ eadred cining
gebocode brihtrice his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mæra To Rimtune.
 3. Ærest on mearh forda upp on hunig broces stream of
beorhtulfes ge mær dic.
 4. Ðonon suð on þa dic of ða west langan dic.
 5. Of þære dic on wændan mæres lace.
 6. Þonon on mor dic.
 6. Æft of mor dic norð on wendan beorges hear pað.
 7. Of þam hear paðe on wiðig leas wyrtruman ofer cattes flot
on eatan beares wyrtruman.
 8. Þonon east oþ oslaces leas eastende norð be wyrttruman on
ða eastlangan dic wale.
 9. Oðða ealdan dic weste wearde.
 10. Þonon east on dic oþ heo wend norð on hig broces stream
þonon æft upp andlang streames on mæreforð neoðo weardne.
 12. Þonon norð andlang dic utt þurh wynna wudu on stroð
norð wearð.
 13. Þonon east on þone mær hagan.
 13. Andlang hagan suþ on feld on wyrttruman oþ wederan grafes
suð ende.
 14. Þonne west andlang hear poðes suð on þa ealdan dic
æft on mer forð.
 16. Her is geswutulad þet Brichtric grim ge an þes landes æt
rimtune in to ealdan mynstre æfter his dege mid þere hide þe he
syþþan be geat in to þan lande.
 18. And a gyfþ þa boc þe Eadred cyning him ge bocode into
þam ealdan mynstre to þære ealdan bæc.
 19. Þe æþestan cyning ær ge bocode on þet gerad þet
he hæbbe þone bryce þes landes swa lange swa his tyma sy.
 21. And gange syððan into þære stowe swa ge wered swa hit
stande mid mete & mid mannum.
 23. And mid ælcum þingan his sawle to frofre.
 23. And þyses is to ywitnesse.
 24. Dunstan arcebisceop.
 24. And Aþelwold bisceop.
 24. And ælfstan bisceop.
 24. And æþelgar abbod.
 25. And se hired on Glestinga byrig.
 25. And þa twegen hiredas.
 26. On ealdan mynstre.
 26. And on niwan mynstre on wintan ceastre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 573 (Birch 910)
B15.8.242.
Bounds, Sawyer 573: Birch 1885-99, no. 910.



 1. Þis sand þare XVI hyde land i mare at Corf þe Adred king
bokien Wihsige his þegene on elche halue.
 2. Arest of sa on anne dich, an lang dich.
 3. Upp on swuren.
 3. Þwert ouer swuran on þ þwers dich.
 4. Of þare diche on ecge ford be ecge, on Alfricheswelle.
 4. Of þane welle, on anne weg.
 5. Of þane wige, on an dich.
 5. Anlang dich north richte on wicun niþer anland wicum
streames.
 6. Of þanne streame, on anne þorn north anlang dich.
 7. On anne walle, onlang walles, on stanwei.
 8. Of þane dich, on anne dich.
 8. Onlang diche, north irichte.
 9. On wicum niþer anlang wicunstreames.
 9. Of þat streame, on anne þorn.
 10. Of þane þorne, on þa holendich.
 10. Anlang dich uppen iricht þurch þane wde on þare dich, on
þane rupemor.
 12. Of þane more, on þone crundel of þane crundel up irichte
on þat holenbedde.
 13. Of þat holnebedde, on þare holne stoke.
 13. Of þane stocke, on þare stream anlang streames, on auenes
broc.
 14. Of þane broke, on þane ealde weg andlang weies, on hecgan
sled.
 15. Of þane slede, on þare streame.
 16. Anlang streames, on þat stanene bregge.
 16. Of þare brigge on þare wei anlang weies of irichte on
þane richt wei.
 17. Of þane weie, on anne stan wal.
 18. Of þane walle nither irichte on Wickenford.
 19. Onlang Wickenforde.
 19. Uppen irichte on beambroc swo.
 19. Up anlang streames.
 20. Of þane streame, on þat withi begh.
 20. Of þane wiþibedde, on anne stan.
 21. Of þane stane, on þane oþerne.
 21. Of þan stane, on holen wicken.
 22. Eft on þare stan.
 22. Of þane stan, on þa ealdene dich, anlang dich.
 23. On þane wal, anlang welles.
 23. On struthgeardes cum anlang welles on struthherdes wege.
 24. Of þane wege eft on anne wal onlang welles.
 25. On seuen willes þry anlang streames ut a irichte on
seortmannes pol.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 575 (Birch 902)
B15.8.243.
Bounds, Sawyer 575: Birch 1885-99, no. 902.



 1. Ðis is þara XX hida boc æt æscesbyrig þæ eadred
cing gebocode Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synd þa lang ge mæro to æscesbyrig.
 3. Ærest on þa ealdan dic andlang hlincæs on þa foxhola.
 4. Þanon on hringpyt.
 4. Of þam pytæ on weardæs beorh.
 5. Þonon on þonæ smalan cumb andlang cumbæs on ocenne
wyllas.
 6. Andlang streamæs on þa mylne.
 6. Þonne wænt hit þær up on þone æþænan
byrigels.
 7. Þonon andlang þæs grænan weges on stan mære þonon
to þam bræmbel þyfelan.
 8. Þanon on ða mæd norðe weardæ on þone þorn
þonnæ andlang wæges on þonæ ællen stub.
 10. Þonon utt on baccan mor.
 10. Þ imbutæ þonæ mor on bulan mædæ norðæ
weardæ on þa dic.
 11. Þonnæ utt on þonæ mære.
 11. Þonon upp on þa and heafda on þonæ þorn.
 12. Of þæm þornæ þonnæ on þonæ pyt.
 13. Þonon on æceles beorh ufæ wæardnæ of æceles
beorgæ a bæ ecgæ on þonnæ beorg.
 14. Of þam beorgæ in on þ norþ geatt.
 14. Þonon on þæt suð geat.
 15. Þær utt andlang dic on scortan dic þonon on hean dunæ
ufæ wæardræ on þonæ beorh of þam beorgæ on þonæ
oþærne þonnæ on tæt tucæn stan of þam stanæ on þa ealdan
dic þær hit ær onfænc.

END_TEXT

Ch 577 (Birch 1022)
B15.8.244.
Bounds, Sawyer 577: Birch 1885-99, no. 1022.



 1. Ðis sint þa land gemæra to Boxorran.
 2. Ærest æt wines treowe þ andlang herpaþes to dene pitte
þonne up on æscmeres hammas suþewearde of þan hammum andlang mærce
ut on þone heað feld easteweardne þ ut on linden norð wearde þonne
andlang mearce on weocan þorn of þan þorne þ andlang mearce on lam
burnan on clat ford.
 6. Of clat forda on meos broces heafod þ þonne to allan stapule
þonan andlang herpaþes ut on þone mersc þa be mersce to þan tune on
þa hege ræwe þ on ða dic andlang dic ut on þone burnan þonne up on
þa blacan græfan of þære graefan on Rinda crundel of þan crundle to
þrim þornun þ andlang weges eft on wines treow þær hit ær on
fæng.

Ch 578 (Birch 888)
B15.8.245.
Bounds, Sawyer 578: Birch 1885-99, no. 888.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land gemæro.
 1. Ærest on hunda leage on grægsole burnan &lang burnan
on grægsole hagan &lang hagan to hagena gemyðum of þen gemyþun on
tichan stedes hagan &lang hagan ut to felda þæt a be wyrtwalan oþ
hit cymð ut on fulan Riþe.
 5. Andlang Riþe ut on doccena ford of þan forda west be more
oþ hit cymð on þone licgendan stoc of þan stocce &lang hagan ut to
heað felda to beorhfeldinga gemaere to þen hagan.
 7. Andlang hagan bur.

START_TEXT

Ch 579 (Birch 1023)
B15.8.246.
Bounds, Sawyer 579: Birch 1885-99, no. 1023.



 1. Burhelmes boc a on ece erfe.
 2. Ærest on swynford.
 3. Of swinforda on pecges ford.
 3. Of pecgesforda on ðeonfanforð.
 4. Of deonfanforda in deonflinc ford.
 4. Of deonflinc forda in holan bæce.
 5. Of holan bæce in eorgbrycge.
 5. Of eorthbrycge in tigwellan.
 5. Þ swa in ymman holig.
 6. Of ymman holigne in cudan dene.
 6. Of cudan dene on ða ðic bufan foxcotun andlang dices to
þam broce to þam stangedelfe.
 8. Of tham stangedelfe be þære efese to wala crofte.
 8. Of wala crofte in þone suðeran holan bæce.
 9. Andlong bæces wið neoþan eostacote.
 10. Andlong dices in grendelsmere.
 10. Of grendelsmere in stancofan.
 11. Of stancofan andlong dune on stiran mere.
 11. Of stiran mere on þa strete.
 12. Andlong stræte on þa stapelas of þan stapulum on
windofer of windofere in acleg.
 13. Of aclea to lusdune of lusdune on sican byrig.
 14. Of sicanbyrig on þa stræte.
 14. Et long stræte to meredic of mæredice on sture.
 15. Andlong sture þ eft on Swinford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 583 (Birch 981)
B15.8.247.
Bounds, Sawyer 583: Birch 1885-99, no. 981.



 1. Ðis sind þa land ge mæro to Gæinge.
 1. Ærest of lillan hlæwe crundele middeweardan to loddera
beorge þonne to grenan hlince westewardan of þan hlince to earnes dune
westewearde.
 4. Þonne to holan dic eastwearde andlang þære dic twa
furlang norð weard ðonne east be heafdan twa furlang andlang fura andlang
weter dene west to þære deopan dene.
 6. Of þære dene to þan readan stane.
 7. Of þan stane eft on lillan hlæwe crundele.

END_TEXT

Ch 584 (Birch 967)
B15.8.248.
Bounds, Sawyer 584: Birch 1885-99, no. 967.



 1. Ðis synt ða land gemæro ðara X hyda.
 2. Ærest of eoppan wyllan broc þ on ða blacan wyllan þ of
blacan wyllan on ðone heafodæcre.
 3. Of ðan æcre &lang gemærrees on hæslburh
middeweardre of hæslbyrg on hæslford &lang streames on ðone ealdan
ford of ðan forda a be gemære þ on ða stræt of ðære stræt
on ðone læg æcer of ðam læg æcer a be gemære þ on ðone
hrigc weg.
 6. Of ðam hric wege be gemære þ on ða ealdan dic &lang
dices on landgares brigce of ðære brigce ongean stream þ on
cærswyllan broc of ðam broce on fule wyllan of ðam wille be gemære on
scearpannæsse a be gemære þ on ðone steort.
 8. Of ðam steort on ða stræt &lang stræt on hunburg
leah of ðære leah þ eft on eoppan willan broc.
 11. Ðis synton ða landgemæro æt þo V hidyn in
Tademærton.
 12. Ærest of Eadwardes mylne þ on ða ealdan dic on mær
broc.
 12. Of mærbroce on þ eastre sic.
 13. Of ðam sice on mærstan.
 13. Of mærstane on ðone ealdan garan.
 13. Of ðan garan a be heafdan þ on ðone broc of ðan broce
ongean stream þ on þ risc bed.
 14. Þ on ðone peg þ suð &lang weges þ on þ slæd
þ of ðan slæde up on þa ecge þ &lang ecge on heortwyllan.
 16. Of heort wyllan on ða ealdan stige þ andlang styge on
ðone mærpit.
 16. Of þam pitte on wilbaldes ecge of wilbaldes ecge þ eft on
eadwardes mylne.
 18. Ðis synt þa landgemæro to oþer V hidin.
 19. Æræst on halhford þ &lang woburnan þ on eoppan
welles stream þ up ongean stream on sandford.
 20. Of sandforda on be gemære þ on ða heaford stoccas.
 20. Of þan stoccan on ðone mærstan of ðan mærstan o be
gemære þ on landgares bicge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 585 (Birch 948)
B15.8.249.
Bounds, Sawyer 585: Birch 1885-99, no. 948.



 1. Ðis is þara XXX hida boc æt Ellandune þe Eadgi cing
bocode ælfæge his mege on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mære to Ellendune.
 3. Ærest of þam æþenan byrgelsæ andlang wegæs to
cærscumbæ.
 4. Þonon on mædena coua.
 4. Of mædæna coua on ðone hric weg to ealhæræs
byrgelse.
 5. Þonon andlang þære dic, to hafuc þornæ.
 6. Of þam þornæ on ðone bradan stan.
 7. Þonon on clæfær mære.
 7. Of þam mære, on hælnes þorn.
 7. Of þam þorne on þone broc.
 8. Þonon to ðam ællen stybbæ.
 8. Of þam stybbæ on ðære ciricean heow wah.
 9. Þonon on hrud wylle.
 9. Of hrud wyllæ to hrysan beorge of ðam beorge to cealdan
beorge of þam beorge andlang weges to þam stane.
 11. Of þam stane æft to þam æþænan byrgelse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 586 (Birch 1030)
B15.8.250.
Bounds, Sawyer 586: Birch 1885-99, no. 1030.



 1. Þis his þare, feower hida boc be noddre æt þare
Pyrigean, þe eadwic cyng gebocode, ælfheahe his mæge on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þara feower hida land gemera be noddre æt
þære pyrgean.
 4. Arest of noddre andlang þes port her paðes on þone garan
þ andlang þare land ge wirpa up to hricg dic west andlang þare dic on
beornolfes stan.
 6. And swa forð on þa rugan hylle.
 6. Þonene adune rihte on ðone hæðenan byrgels.
 7. Of þan hæðenan byrgelse on þone stanigan beorh.
 8. Of þan stanigan beorge oð ða hefada west be heafdan æt
þa fore yrðe.
 9. And swa forð on gate hlinces heafde.
 10. & swa adune to þam port herpaþe, þonan on ucganford.
 10. And swa adune andlang streames on þa mylen ware.
 11. Of þare mylen ware to þare swete apuldre.
 12. Þonne eft on þone herpað þær we ær on fengan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 587 (Birch 945)
B15.8.251.
Bounds, Sawyer 587: Birch 1885-99, no. 945.



 1. Þis syndon þa land gemæru to cuþenes dune XX hida.
 1. Of hryþera forda on holan ford.
 2. Of holan forde on lahhan mere andland riþiges on bradan
mædwa.
 3. Þæt swa norð andlang fura on set þorn.
 3. Of set þorne on fulan riþig on anne pyt.
 4. Of þam pytte andlang riþiges on þæt heafod lond.
 5. Of þam heafodon andlang fura.
 5. On pric þorn on foreweardne eanferþes hlau.
 6. Of eanferþes hlawe andlang fure.
 6. Þæt on an riþig.
 7. Andlang riþiges þ on ane dic.
 7. Andlang dices on drygean broc.
 8. Þæt swa andlang dices on mærwelle broc.
 8. Andlang broces on mærwelle.
 9. Of mærwelle on þæt heafod long on gerihte to stræt.
 9. Þonne east andlang stræte.
 10. Oþ þæra stræta gelæto.
 10. Þonan rihte norþ ondlong weges oþ þa heafdo þ on
mær weg.
 11. Andlong mær weges þ onbutan ceorla graf.
 12. On fost broc.
 12. Of fost broce on þone hlið weg.
 12. Andlong weges on hina gemæro.
 13. Andlong hina gemæres on þa hlydan.
 13. Þ of þær hlydan on þa stan bricge.
 14. Andlong healhtunes gemæres on risc dene.
 15. Þæt of risc dene on gerihte on þæt þri ex.
 15. Of þan þri exe on þa stræt.
 16. Andlong stræte on holan broc.
 16. Andlong broces on herpaþ ford on tame andlong tame þ eft on
hryþera ford.
 18. Þis is seo lanboc to Cuþenes dune to þan twentigan hidan
þe Eadwig cync gebocede ælfhere his ealdormen on yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 588 (Birch 946)
B15.8.252.
Bounds, Sawyer 588: Birch 1885-99, no. 946.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæra æt Wilmanlehtune ærest
æt cranmere & of þæn mære andlang broces.
 2. And swa on þone þorn.
 2. And of þan þorne andlang ðære stræte in on hore pyt
of þan pytte on ðane blacan pyt þonan on langdune ende of langandun swa
to ðan hlæwe.
 5. Of ðæn hlæwe to þære sealtstræt & efter
stræte to wilman forda.
 6. Of wilman forde on cyneferþes pyt þonan in þa hwitan dic.
 7. Of ðære dic andlang hricg weges þ in cran meres broce
andlang broces in to cranmere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 589 (Birch 938)
B15.8.253.
Bounds, Sawyer 589: Birch 1885-99, no. 938; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara XL hyda boc æt alresforda ðe edwig cynig
gæbocodæ ælfrice his þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land gemere to alresforda.
 3. Ærest up on cendefer andlang mearce on þa witan dic
þonne andlang dic on merc wege be þam wege on hæ dene þanun on smalan
dene þanune andlang hlinces on bocgan ora þonne forð andlang wyrt wale on
þa rode andlang rode on wilames ord þanun on spreot mere þonne on þ
twybytme del.
 8. Þanun on beran del.
 8. Þonne on mint mere.
 8. Þonne on fel dene þonne andlang feld dene on þone hagan.
 9. Þ andlang hagan to blacan sole.
 10. Þonne to grenmeres stigele þanun andlang hagan on boc meres
sðile.
 11. Þonne on hemer denegat.
 11. Þanun on hremmescumbe geat þanun on dun sðihle andlang
mearce ut æt ricg sceate þonne andlang mearce to dreg tune on þone
ford.
 13. Þonne on wuda ford.
 14. Þonne andlang mearce on þone garan uf werðne of ðam
garam norð ofer þa streat andlang mearce on þa andwulmas andlang wylla on
ticceburnan þonne endlang streames on icenan & lanð icenan oð þ
ær cendefer ut scyt þer up andlang cendefer oð þer hit on feng.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 590 (Birch 932)
B15.8.254.
Bounds, Sawyer 590: Birch 1885-99, no. 932.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæro to Bægen weorþe.
 1. Ærest of gorgræfan up andlang slades on þone þorn
þonne on þæt crundel suðeweard.
 3. Þonne to þan wulle þ on læces ford þonne up andlang
Riþe on gemærweg andlang weges on þa dic æt scobban oran.
 5. Andlang dic on gemær weg.
 5. Andlang weges on butan þorn hangran on ceobba stan forþ
andlang gemær weges on þone weg æt cealfes wulle forð andlang weges.
 7. To yfemestan leage þonne forð ofer sciteres clif to hig wege
up andlang weges to þan rahhege andlang weges on hæsel dic.
 9. Þonne on wulfstanes dic.
 9. Of þære dic on maduces lea þurh þone lea on þone put
of þan putte on þone ellen stub þonne on lippan dic andlang on seofen
æceras westewearde þonne on þone hæþenan byrgels þonne on
þæt scorte land suþeweard þæt andlang fyrh on þone healfan
æcer.
 13. Þonne on þæt wiþig bed þonne on dunan ford of þan
forda andlang sunnigga wullæ broces on wudæford þonne andlang hricges
on west mor innon þone broc up andlang broces on gorgraues þær hit ær
on feng.
 17. Þis sint þara mead ge mæra þe to þan lande ge
byriaþ.
 17. Ærest of þære brycge on berige up andlang mid stremes
oþ foran ongean þa niwan dic þonne oþ midne streamen niþer andlang
streames up on þone greatan wilig þonne andlang þære hege ræwe ut
on þa ea oþ midne stream.
 22. Þonne synt þis þa ge mæro þære mæde æt
ennan beorgum.
 22. Of þære dice ende ford þon þa ea niþer andlang mid
streames up on þa won lace oþ foran ongean þone beorh þær be tweonan
meade & dune eft on þa dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 591 (Birch 942)
B15.8.255.
Bounds, Sawyer 591: Birch 1885-99, no. 942.



 1. Ðis syndan þa land ge mæro æt Bennanhamme.
 2. Ærest of cynetan on þa meardic of þære dic on
hæddes wyl of þan wylle on clænan crundel.
 3. Of þan crundele on þa readan hane.
 4. Of þære hane on wigmundes swelgende of þan swelgende up
on þane hryc andlang hrycces to ællan stapole.
 5. Of þan stapole on accan ge fyrhðe of þan gefyrhðe on
meos broces ford of þan forda on scrget of þan gete on holan broces
hæffod ðonne on þæt hæcget þanne on þa rode easteweurde of
þære rode on mær lace of þere lace on stapelford ut on cynetan
þanne up andlang healfan stræme eft on mærdic.
 10. And codan med þerto.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 592 (Birch 943)
B15.8.256.
Bounds, Sawyer 592: Birch 1885-99, no. 943.



 1. Þis sint þa land ge mære to Cytringan.
 2. Cranslea bricg andlang ðes burnan.
 2. Hit cymð to Hunan bricge.
 3. Fram Hunan bricge to þam galhtreowe on deopandene.
 4. Of deoppendene on Cynestanes heafod.
 4. Of Cynestanes heafde on þa langan dic of þere dic to wiclea
forde andlang ysan.
 5. Þet cymð to pihteslea forda.
 6. Of þam forda andlang þes broches þ hit cymð eft to
Cranslea bricge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 593 (Birch 957)
B15.8.257.
Bounds, Sawyer 593: Birch 1885-99, no. 957.



 1. Þis is þara X hida land gemære æt Corsatune.
 2. Ærest of Afene up andlang corsan on ecles cumb suðeweardne
ðat west be wealle.
 3. Eft syð be welle þær up ofer feld on ða riht land
gemære on þone sidlingweg to wuda.
 4. Of wuda be ecge on þa ðreo land gemære.
 5. Þanon norð to wege on gerihte on wimundes stan.
 5. Of þam stane norð andlang weges þær est of þam wege
on gerihte to brynes cumb suðweardne.
 7. A norð be ecge.
 7. Of ecge east on stanwell broc.
 8. Andlang broces eft on Afene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 594 (Birch 935)
B15.8.258.
Bounds, Sawyer 594: Birch 1885-99, no. 935.



 1. Þis sint þa land gemæra.
 1. Ærest of cealc forda on ealdan lacing þanune on dyðmere
þanune on sceortan mor þanune on þone anlipan beorh þanune on hæsel
broc þanune up to gynan bæte þonne to þam stodfalde þanune to seofan
þornum þonne to smalan wege & on lacing & syx cotsetlan.
 6. Þis is þara <foreign>XV</foreign> hida boc æt Middeltune þe Eadwig cing
gebocode Ælfwine on ece yrfe.

 1. Þes aren þe land mere to Geaces lea to þam ten hiden.
 1. Þanne lyð ægþeres landes mæres her togeder to dic
hyþe of.

Ch 596 (Birch 960)
B15.8.260.
Bounds, Sawyer 596: Birch 1885-99, no. 960.



 1. Ðis is þara feower hyda boc æt Wiþiglea þe eadwig
cyng gæbocode ælfwoldæ his þegnæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mere to Wiþiglea ærest of lulles
beorge andlang burnan to cynulfes treowe þonon suþ on þerpaþ to
megstanes dene þonon on Wiþigleageat.
 5. Of þam geate to seg broce þonon on ucing cumb þonon
andlang weges to wyddan beorge þonon on wiþig sled andlang sledes on
gericte to þam smalan wege andlang weges on gerihte to brocenan beorge
þonon eft on lulles beorge.

Ch 597 (Birch 949)
B15.8.261.
Bounds, Sawyer 597: Birch 1885-99, no. 949.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæra þara XX hida æt hannige þe
Eaduuig cing ge bocede ælrice his mæge on ece yrue.
 3. Ærest of þes cinges ge mære on wanotingc broc andlang
streames þ hyt cymð ut on cyllan Rið.
 4. Þ þonne andlang Riðe þ hyt cymð ut on eoccene þæt
andlang eoccene þ hit cymð to wulfmeres mylne þæt þonne suð on
þone ealdan broc andlang broces þ hyt cymð to snoddan fleote.
 7. Of þan fleote to þan bradan her paðe.
 8. Andlang her paðes þæt hit cymð eft to þes cinges ge
mære.

END_TEXT

Ch 598 (Birch 976)
B15.8.262.
Bounds, Sawyer 598: Birch 1885-99, no. 976; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is ðara X hida boc æt Cittandene þe edwig cing
gebocode æþelgerde his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land gemera to Cittandene.
 3. Ærest on þone þriddan hlinc þe to hamelandunæ hyrþ
of þam hlince on mearcdene andlang dene to þam westmestan beorgan.
 5. Þonon east andlang weges on þonon hwitan weter weg.
 6. Of þam wege forþ inon mearclea.
 6. Þonon east andlang hlinces on þa here stræte.
 7. Þonon to cittanwara becum.
 8. Andlang beca forþ to wealtham inon þa mearce þe to
hamelandune hyrþ.

END_TEXT

Ch 600 (Birch 953)
B15.8.263.
Bounds, Sawyer 600: Birch 1885-99, no. 953.



 1. Ðis is þara XX hida boc æt Drocenesforda þæ Eadgi
cing bocode Æðelhildæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Þis syndon þa land ge mæro to Drocenesforda.
 3. Ærest of Drocenesforda to biene stede.
 4. Of biene stedæ to scida felda.
 4. Þanon utt to langan leagæ middæ wærdræ.
 5. Þanon upp to þære stigælæ.
 5. Þanon utt to wulf pyttun.
 6. Þanon utt on meone.

Ch 601 (Birch 952)
B15.8.264.
Bounds, Sawyer 601: Birch 1885-99, no. 952.



 1. This is seo boc to iplanpenne & to doddingtune & to
cærswylle the eadwic kyning gebocode æthelhilde on ece yrfe.
 4. Thys synd tha land gemæra to Ipelanpænne & to
Doddingtune & to Cærswylle.
 5. Of Mæscumbe on land score on Horsa tor thonon on streame oth
Eoth of eoth on pen.
 7. Of pænne on riht land score on lytlan tor thonon on land
score to Langandene.
 8. Thonon un land score to thære linde.
 9. Of thære linde to tham beorge.
 9. Thonon to Oddingtorre on landscore to mædercumbe &
Cærswellan landscore on tha lace of thære lace on Switheredes stan.
 11. Thonon on herepath to woggan wylle.
 12. Thonon on herpath on tha rode.
 12. Of thære rode on herpath oth tha laca.
 13. Thonne up be streame on mædercumbe on tha wic the tharto
hyrth.
 14. And æt Bitelanwyrthe an hiwisce.
 14. And æt Bromleage an hiwisce.

Ch 602 (Sawyer 17)
B15.8.265.
Bounds, Sawyer 602: Sawyer 1979, 27.



 1. Þis synd þa land gemæra to Deorlafestune.
 2. ærest hit fehð on trentan þær fulan broc scyt on
trentan.
 3. Þonne andlang broces ongean stream on fulanford.
 3. Of ðæm forda on bradan ford.
 4. Of bradan forda west andlang stræte on hwæte croft.
 4. Of ðæm crofte on grenan hylle.
 5. Of ðære hylle andlang slædes.
 5. Þ hit cymð on þa stræt to þam ðrym landgemæren.
 6. Þonne andlang weges on ðære dic ende.
 7. Of ðære dic on gerihtna to sceortan stane.
 7. Of ðæm stane on ðone wylle.
 8. Of þæm wylle on færdene.
 8. Of ðære dene þæt eft on trentan.

END_TEXT

Ch 603 (Birch 977)
B15.8.266.
Bounds, Sawyer 603: Birch 1885-99, no. 977.



 1. Ðis sind þara XIII hide land gemæra þe to fif hidum ge
byriad ærest on ydeles ige.
 2. Of ydeles ige andlang ge mæres to þat teles wege andlang
weges on mearan mores heafod andlang mænan mores heafud on eoccene up mid
stræme to hudes lade of hudes lade to þære scortandic.
 5. Of þære scortan dic on ælfðryþe dic.
 5. Andlang dic on holan broc andlang holan broces on wasan.
 6. Andlang wasan eft to ydeles ige.
 7. Þonne is þæs landes ealles XIII healf hid.

END_TEXT

Ch 604 (Birch 979)
B15.8.267.
Bounds, Sawyer 604: Birch 1885-99, no. 979.



 1. Þis is þara fif hida boc to heglingaigæ æt east stoce
þe ædwig cing bocode æþelsige his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mære to hæglinga iggæ æt
east stoccæ ærest utt to þam ealdan stod faldæ fram þam stod
faldæ to þam lea of þam lea innan ceanninga mære of ceanninga
mæræ utt on sæ.

Ch 605 (Birch 924)
B15.8.268.
Bounds, Sawyer 605: Birch 1885-99, no. 924.



 1. Ðis is ðæra XX hyda boc æt abbandune ðe eadwig
cyning gebecte on ece yrfe in to sancta marian cyricean.
 3. Arest on temese be suðan fordwere ðære up on ða dic on
eoccenes gærstun suð weardne þonne ondlang dic to eoccen ondlang
eoccenes to abbodes dic ondlang dic to cealdan wylle of cealdan wylle on
ðæt risclæd middeweard.
 6. Oð torht woldes mor þæt þær on þa dic ondlang dic
to mearcforda þonne up ondlang broces oð hyt cymþ to emnes þam ealdan
læg hrycge.
 8. Þonne ongeryhte betweoh.
 8. Potteles treow on þone ellen styb ðæt þær on
wuduford on sunninga wylles broc ondlang broces to dunnanforda ðæt
þær on ðæt wiðig bed þonne on ðone healfan æcer norðe
weardne þonne andlang fyrh.
 12. To ðon heafdon þæt þær suð ofer ðone healfan
æcer þæt þær east on þa furh.
 13. Ðæt to ðam sceortan lond þær on ðone hæþenan
byrgels þonne þær on ða seofan æceras westwearde þæt ðær
norð to lippan dic ondlang dic ðurh sucgan graf ðæt on ðone ellen
styb ðonne on ða brembel ðyrnan on ða dic ondlang dic to horopytte,
ðonne ðurh madoces leah.
 18. On ða ealdan dic ðonne on ða æcerdic ðonne on
hæseldic of hæseldic on ðonne gemær weg on bægan wyrðe onlang
weges to hig wege ondlang hiweges to ecgunes wyrðe.
 21. Þonne on bacgan leah þæt abe wyrtwalan þæt on
bacgan broc of bacgan broce on hafoces oran ondlang ðæs gemær hagan
þæt ut on rige wyrðe weste weardne on ða ealdan dic þonne ondlang
dic to perhangran.
 24. Ðonne on wulfrices broc þonne on gerihte ofer hyrdyige to
ðam greatan welige þæt ðær ut on temese ðonne ondlang temese
ðæt est on occenes gærstundic suðeweardne.
 27. Ðis syndon ðæs londes gemæro to abbandune ðe Eadwig
cyning syleð gode to lofe in te ðam mynster ond him sylfum to ecer are.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 606 (Birch 959)
B15.8.269.
Bounds, Sawyer 606: Birch 1885-99, no. 959.



 1. Ðis is þæræ XV hida land boc æt bleodune.
 2. Ðis syndon þa land ge mæro to Bleodunæ.
 2. Ærest on wel pill.
 3. Of wel pyllæ on smalan hlinc.
 3. Of smalan hlincæ on wæl wæg nyþæwerdnæ.
 4. Of well wæge on æsc wyllæ.
 4. Of æsc wyllæ on þa ealdan med dic.
 5. Of þære dic on færsc mærus west snocan.
 5. Of þam snocan on fulan mære eastweardne.
 6. Of þam mære on stod fald.
 6. Of þam faldæ on þa ealdan lanan nyþe wearde.
 7. Of þære lanan on sugga denescumb.
 8. Of þam cumbæ on cyric stædc.
 8. Of þam stæde on trindel lea.
 9. Of þam lea on wrostlan wyl.
 9. Of þam wyllæ on genesþorn.
 10. Of þam þorne on þa wærhroda.
 10. Of þam rodun on loxan wuda wyrtruman.
 11. Of wyrtruman on þiccan stanas.
 11. Of þam stanun on scypeladæs pyllæ.
 12. Of þam pyllæ on mer pyll.
 12. Of þam pyllæ on axan mid stream.
 13. Swa andlang streames eft on well pyll.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 607 (Birch 919)
B15.8.270.
Bounds, Sawyer 607: Birch 1885-99, no. 919.



 1. Ærest on panganburnan þ on þa dic þ ab be dic on
þæne hagan þætnon cristel mælbeam þæt andlang hagan on þa
þornihtan leage þ forð on byrgford þ a be hagan on stan wege.
 3. Of stan wege ab weortwalan on þa flex æcyras þ a be
weortwalan on masan mere of þam mere on cuðulfes cotstowe of þam
cotstowum on panganburnan þ up mid streame eft on þa dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 608 (Birch 969)
B15.8.271.
Bounds, Sawyer 608: Birch 1885-99, no. 969.



 1. Þis is þara IIII hida boc æt Wudatune þe eadwig cing
gebocode alfwolde on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis synd þa land gemæro to Wudetune.
 3. Ærest on þam ge middum andlang þære weal dic on canuc
ufeweardæ swa andlang þære weal dic on canu rih ufæ weardne swa
andlang hrigges on ðone weg þæ scyt on stænæ wæg swa adun on
stan wæg of stan wæge east andlang hærpaðæs.
 7. Swa forð be clyfæ oð ða coc rodæ.
 7. Swa of þære coc rode adun east andlang weges and deoh holes
hyllæ of deoh holes hyllæ on þonæ cealc pyt swa ford wyð þonne
weg westan oðða ða dunæ ufe wearde on þa æþenam byrigelsas.
 10. Swa adun be wyrtruman æft to ge miðum.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 609 (Birch 958)
B15.8.272.
Bounds, Sawyer 609: Birch 1885-99, no. 958.



 1. Þis his þara V hida boc æt Dydylingetune and þas anes
hiwisces æt uddingc þe eadwig cing gebocode ælfrede his þeine on eche
yrfe.
 4. Þis sint þare V hida land gemære to dydylingtune &
þas syxtan æt udding þe þær to gebyreð.
 5. Ærest on roddan pol nioþeweardne.
 6. And of roddan pole on þane langan hlinc.
 6. And of þan langan hlince on fugelan pæþ.
 7. From fugelan paþe on þa twegen ærcas þær boddingc
weg ut gæð.
 8. And from bodding wege ofer þane redan weg.
 8. And of þam readan wege on lindune estawearde þær to þam
ealdan wege.
 10. And swa andlang weges to mearc broces heafde.
 10. From mearc broces heafde.
 11. Andlang weges in an cheoles byrig eastgete.
 11. And of þam estgete eft ut æt þam westgeate.
 12. And of þam westgeate on dydeling dune middewearde.
 13. And of dydeling dune on þa haran apuldran.
 13. And of þære haran apuldran þære adune innan winburnan
oð midne stream.
 15. And swa andlang streames oþ roddan pol.
 15. And at crawan forda synd VI mæd æcras þe þær to
gebyriað & on ige twegen.
 17. And þis sint þæs hywisces land gemære æt udding.
 17. Ærest on cucan dene.
 18. And of cucan dune on cran mor middeweardne.
 18. And of cran more on þæne heal.
 19. And of þam heale on þa fulan lake.
 19. And of þære fulen lake on secg broc.
 20. And up þanan andlang brokes oþ þa brydenan bricgge.
 21. And of þare brycgge andlang weges on ham woldes þorn.
 21. And of ham woldes þorne on cucan.
 22. And on ige II mæd æcres þær to.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 610 (Birch 927)
B15.8.273.
Bounds, Sawyer 610: Birch 1885-99, no. 927.



 1. Þis synd þa land gemæra to dyddan hamme.
 1. Of wægemuþan to iwes heafdan.
 2. Of iwes heafdan on stan ræwe.
 2. Of stan ræwe on hwitan heal.
 3. Of hwitan heale on iwdene.
 3. Of iwdene, on bradan mor.
 4. Of bradan more on twyfyrd.
 4. Of twyfyrde on æst ege pul ut innan sæfern.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 611 (Birch 966)
B15.8.274.
Bounds, Sawyer 611: Birch 1885-99, no. 966.



 1. Ðis is ðara V hida boc æt tadmertune de eadwig cing
gebocode beorhtnoðe ealdermen ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synt þa land gemæro to tadmertune þara V hida
ærest on halhford þ andlang wo burnan þ on eow anwelles stream þ up
ongean stream an sandford.
 5. Of sandforda a be gemære þ on ða heafod stoccas.
 6. Of ðan stoccan on ðone mær stan.
 6. Of ðan stane a be gemære þ on landgares bricge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 612 (Birch 934)
B15.8.275.
Bounds, Sawyer 612: Birch 1885-99, no. 934.



 1. Þis his þære VI hida boc æt langanforde þe eadwig
cing gebocode byrnrice his þegne on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemæra to langanforde.
 3. Ærest of þare ea on east cumb.
 4. Þonon on æs dune.
 4. Of æs dune to puntes stane þonon andlang grimes dic to
hunan wege to þam stane.
 5. Þonon on botes cumb.
 6. Þonon on þone to brocenan beorh.
 6. Þonon adune andlang weges on þone lytlan to brocenan beorh.
 7. Þonon eft on þa ea.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 613 (Birch 974)
B15.8.276.
Bounds, Sawyer 613: Birch 1885-99, no. 974; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara V hida boc æt Polhamatunæ þæ eadwig
cing gæbocodæ byrnrice his þegnæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land gemere to Polhamatune.
 3. Ærest of þære strete on midde weardne mearc þorn
þonon to þisteleage þonon þweores ofer þone beorh on eastan cobban
lea.
 5. Þonon on þone beorh þonon to þære apoldre þonon to
þæm þorne of þæm þorne æft to þære strete.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 614 (Birch 971)
B15.8.277.
Bounds, Sawyer 614: Birch 1885-99, no. 971.



 1. Ðis sint þa land gemaro to cenigtune of temese stæðe on
wulfrices broc uppan rige weorðe on þa ealdan dic of þære dic ut on
Rige wurðe heal.
 3. Þanne on þone rah hege andlang þæs hege on baggan
wurðe æfre Be efic þ hit cymþ on sceaceling æcere.
 5. Þonne ut on stanford þanne ut on temese on þone igoð
ðwyres ofer berege on ceane wyllan and stremes ut temese andlang temese þ
hit cymð on hyrd ige þonne ut eft on wulfrices broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 615 (Birch 986)
B15.8.278.
Bounds, Sawyer 615: Birch 1885-99, no. 986.



 1. Þis is þara V hida boc æt stowe þe eadwig cing gebocode
byrhtelme his mæge on ece yrfe.
 3. Þis sint þa land gemæro in to stowe.
 4. Ærest of þam halgan wylles forda suð andlang wætlinga
stræte on hludan wylles broc &lang broces on þa fyrdstræt
&lang þære stræt on þa oþre stræt &lang þære
stræt on ramboldes dene adune.
 7. Wyl adune &lang streames eft on halgan wylles ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 617 (Birch 964)
B15.8.279.
Bounds, Sawyer 617: Birch 1885-99, no. 964.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemære ðara X hida.
 1. Ærest of coppan wyllan broc þonne ða blacana wyllan þ
of blacan wyllan on ðone heafod æcer of þan æcere andlang gemæres
on hesl burh midde wearde.
 4. Of hæselbyrg on hæsl ford andlang streames on þone
ealdan ford.
 5. Of þan forde a be gemære þ on ða stræt of þære
stræt on þone læg acer.
 6. Of þan læg æcere a be mære þ on þone hrigc weg.
 7. Of þan hric wege be gemære þ on þa ealdan dic andlang
dices onlang dices brigce.
 8. Of þære brigce on gean stream þ on gres wyllan broc of
þam broce on fule wyllan of þam wylle be gemære on scearpannesse a be
gemære þ on ðone steort.
 10. Of þan steorte on ða stræt andlang streate on hun burhge
leah of þære leahe þ eft on eoppan wyllan broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 618 (Birch 965)
B15.8.280.
Bounds, Sawyer 618: Birch 1885-99, no. 965.



 1. Ðis syndon ða land gemæro æt tademærtune ðara V
hida.
 2. Ærest of eadwardes mylne þ on ða ealdan dic of ðære
dic on mær broc of mærbroce on þ eastre sic of ðam sice on mær
stan.
 4. Of mær stane on ðane ealdan garan of ðan garan a be
heafdan a be heafdan þ on ðone broc of ðam broce ongean stream þ on þ
riscbed of ðam riscbedde þ on ðone weg.
 6. Þ suð andlang weges þ on þ slæd þ of ðan slæde
up on þa ecge þ andlang ecge on heort wyllan.
 8. Of heort wyllan on ða ealdan styge þ andlang styge on ðone
mær pyt of ðam pytte on wilbaldes ecge of wilbaldes ecge þ eft on
eadwardes mylne.
 11. Ðis is ðara V hida boc æt Tademær tune ðe Eadwig
cyning gebocaþ Brihtrice on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 619 (Birch 982)
B15.8.281.
Bounds, Sawyer 619: Birch 1885-99, no. 982; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara L hida boc æt meonæ þæ edwig cing
gæbocode eadrice his þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mera ærest of cit wara beca on
hremnes beorh be þære fyr on spedige ðorn andlang weges to luhesforda of
luhesforda.
 5. Andlang weges ut to lang port.
 5. Andlang dæne ut on þa ealdan rode ofer bord dene on wunces
hyl.
 6. Of wungces hyl on ryþæres heafod.
 7. Of ruðeres heafde on rindesele þonan on sædeles sceate
steorte utan clað heale.
 8. Of claðleahe utan acsceates forð.
 9. Of acsceates forda up on sceaftles oran of sceaftles oran ut to
heofes bricge andlang scire on hweðels heal of hwæðeles heale andlang
hlude burnan.
 11. Of hludeburnan forð andlang weges up to penne of penne be
wyrttruman ut to wowbincg andlang wowbincg ut an tihel leahe.
 13. Of tihel leahe utan ham wudelace andlang ham wudelace utan
greot burnan andlang greot beornan to cirscumbe lace of cirscumbe lace on mearc
ham on þ heow bæc.
 15. Of ðam heow bæce up on bryttes oran on medeman oran nyþe
weardne ðonan andlang lea fore weardne andlang langan lea on finces stapel of
finces stapole andlang wuda of æscstedeget.
 18. Of æscstedegeate andlang wuda on citwara mearce &lang
bæces to citwara becon.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 620 (Birch 984)
B15.8.282.
Bounds, Sawyer 620: Birch 1885-99, no. 984.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæro to peadanwyrðe.
 2. Ærest of ælflæde gemæra norð on þone hagan
&lang hagan on standan þonne on þa dic þ þonne on þa ea andlang
ea on ðone mulen ger þonan andlang ðære mylen dic eft on þa ea
andlang ea.
 5. Oþ þa byrcg & se mylen stede & þ land be norþan
ea, þe þær to hyrð.
 6. And þara oxena wic.
 6. And seo mæd on tun ege þe þær midrihte to gebyreð
& seo eastmearc eal se haga sceat eft on ælflæde mearce & þa
wer bæra & seo mead be norþan ea & þa hammas þa þer midrihte
to gebyriað.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 621 (Birch 955)
B15.8.283.
Bounds, Sawyer 621: Birch 1885-99, no. 955.



 1. Ðis sind þa land ge mearo to Pyrianforda.
 2. Ærest of pyrianforda andlang wægan on fisces burnan.
 3. Andlang burnan on þone mearc hagan up be hagan oþ þa
gedela west on gerihta to snawes mere wuestewearden þonne on þone ho
foreweardne þonne on gerihta ofer ufandune þonne on þone gyrd weg andlang
weges on þone meac hagan.
 6. Up be hagan on weorþe hege forð be þan hege on weorþ
apeldre þonne on per leage þonne suþ to efes on þone ealdan hrunan
þæt to hagan op be hagan to eceles hamme þonne a be hagan to mylen
felda.
 9. Þonne a be hagan to mint felda þonon on gerihta on mint
byrge þær to burnan &lang burnan on þa flex waran on þone hagan
þonon ut on þone felde þ ut to mil gemete þonon þa ferhþe forwearde
þonon to þære twicene.
 13. Andlang twicene on weahhes fen þonon ut on wegan andlang
wegan on pyrianford & si þæt wuda hyrþsum into pyrianforda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 622 (Birch 963)
B15.8.284.
Bounds, Sawyer 622: Birch 1885-99, no. 963.



 1. Ðis sint þa land ge mære þe hirað in to Wellig forda
of wines treowe andlang weges on þane holan weg anlang weges of þan holan
wege on bradan lea norþe wearde on enne ham þurh ut þone lea suð ut on
oþerne ham of þan hamme anlang hege ræwe innan popping hangran innan
scilling hangran on ænne ham of scilling hangran of bradan ham weste weardne
of bradan hamne on cerdan hleaw of cærdan hlæwe ut on lam burnan on eccan
ford on eccan forda on dyran treow.
 9. Of dyrnan treowe on ylfing dene on ænne ele beam of þan ele
beame on cedboldes wylle of cedboldes wulle on cytan seohtres ford.
 11. Of cytan seohtres forda andlang hricgges on syntri mæde
norþe wearde.
 12. Of syntri mæde on flex hammas of flex hamman on mint hammas
on cylman stane.
 13. Of cylman stane on þone þryscytan crundel of þan crundele
on þone rugan crundel of þan ruwan crundele þurh ut clod hangran.
 15. Of þan hangran andlang rode ut on mules dene andlang dene
utan lam burnan andlang burnan on wæter weg.
 17. Of þan wæter wege on waterhammes of þan hamman on grenan
beorh of þan beorhe onlang heccan on eccunes treow.
 19. Of þan treowe onlang gemæres to wines treow.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 623 (Sawyer 14)
B15.8.285.
Bounds, Sawyer 623: Sawyer 1979 22-3.



 1. Þis syndon þa landgemæro to brantes tune of þes stod
faldes easthyrnan on þone pyt.
 2. Of þam pytte on þone suðran beorh.
 2. of þam beorge on þone þorn styb.
 3. of þam stybbe to þes cumbes heafde.
 3. of þam cumbe on geriht in on limenan adun &lang streames
oð hit cymð on wiliabys on þone lytlan ðorn.
 5. of þam ðorne on middan þone mere.
 5. of þam mere on riht to þam lytlan broce up &land cumbes
to þam sceardan beorge.
 6. of þam sceardan beorge to þam rugan hlæwe.
 7. of þam rugan hlæwe on stan beorh.
 8. of stan beorge eft on þone stod fald.
 9. Þis is seo land boc to Brantestune þe Eadwig cing gebocade
Eadwige his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 624 (Birch 961)

 1. Þis sint þa land ge mæro to anninga dune ærest on þa
deopan riþe be eastan bremre swa west ofer bremre to cumb hæma ge mæro
swa be cumb hæma ge mæra to den tunninga ge mære of den tunninga ge
mære swa to suntinga ge mære swa be suntinga ge mære to bidelinga ge
mære swa þanne forþ east be bidelinga ge mære oþ eft ut on bremre.
 6. Þis sint þa den stowa broc hyrst & beaddan syla &
æt fyrnþan & hliþ wic & strod wic.
 8. Þis is þara XVI hida boc æt Anninga dune þe Eadwig cing
gebocode Eadmunde ealdormen on ece yrfe.

 1. Heryst of Tunsing, þere on þe rihte on Midemede.
 2. Of Midemede upon þe ryhte on Oslakesleage westþard.
 2. Þanon on þe rihte on Condenesham, þanon ut on Midnemor,
enlang moris est on Ea.
