Ch 627 (Birch 973)
B15.8.288.
Bounds, Sawyer 627: Birch 1885-99, no. 973.



 1. Þis synd þa land gemæra to Hamtune.
 1. Vpp of afene on mærbroc on ðryllen stan upp on gerihte on
herces næs.
 3. Suðe wearde andlang mærhagan on herces dic.
 3. Andlan dic on herces get.
 4. Of þam gete on Cyninga þyrnan.
 4. Eastewerde andlang weges on hemlec lege eastewearde andlang
stige on ulfan treow west andlang weges adune on þone crundel æcer
eastewearde adune on þone mær hagan on þone nearuan byge on afene.
 7. Upp andlang stremes þ eft upp on mær broc.

Ch 630 (Birch 970)
B15.8.289.
Bounds, Sawyer 630: Birch 1885-99, no. 970.



 1. Þis sent þe fiftiga hide land imare to dunheued and to
estune and to cumtune ðe man þa hiwen offet on Sceaftesburi.
 3. Ærest on heaued lakes þanen, on hert mere forder on wermes
hore fordward þanne forð be dine on laiboc heued þanen, on berg hore
uuewearde þanen, on cealuelege þanen, on stanburne up anlang streames.
 7. Þanne up on dune þanen est be wirtrume oð bridinghe dich
þanen on þa gereðe of þane dune forþerwarde.
 9. Þanne up anlang scordene swo on þanne ealdan hole weg to
becheshlewe.
 10. Þanen on mad alleres on land cumbes up on on gemanen cumb.
 11. Þanen, on þat michle flode oð alfsiges land imare
þanen, anlang cumbes hracan þannen on watdune beorch þanen on cheluedune
þannen eft on heued stockes.
 14. Ðis sant þe fiftiþe hide þe sex hide at Estune.
 15. Þane sant þis ðane sex hide landimare.
 15. Arest on offen weg þanne, on þone ellen stub þanen, on
miclen diches get þanen, on esnes diges get.
 17. Þanen, on stan stylien.
 17. Þanen, on elchene seað.
 18. Þanen, on mapeldere cumb.
 18. Þanen, on empenboerch.
 18. Þanen, on bican pet þanen, on þornwelles þanen, onlang
stret eft offenweg.
 20. Þis X hide hereð.
 20. In to þanne fiftigen hiden atte Cumtune.
 21. Þis sent þare X hide lande gemare.
 21. Arest on tor scylget.
 22. Þanen be wirtrume oð dollen beorge.
 22. Þanen, on þane imeren hole weg þanen, on holenwylle.
 23. Of hollenwelle, on holencumb.
 24. Þanen on þa lake to smale broke þanen, adun one þat
lake to smale broke þanen adun one þat lake at here weg on stirchel anlang
streames on þat litlen lake at Meleburge imare.
 27. Þanen, on fern helle forð þanen, on anne hus þanen on
meleberig dune duneward on þat ealde ad þonne þanen, on lippen stagen swo
be wirtrume eft on torchil gat þanen sent at heanlegen.
 29. And at Iwern and forþe hide ða es fostodr landes.
 30. And þis sent þa landimare.
 32. Arest on litlen aclee estward of aclee on pegan beorh.
 33. Þanen on berendes beorh.
 33. Þanen, on þere herepað at mes delle.
 34. Þanne on þat get at seuen diche suð ende anlang diche o
þes sledes Northecge þanne, on þan an lipien þorn.
 35. Þanne be þane on heueden adun to wege.
 36. Andland weges, on þannen mylen stede.
 37. Þanne.
 37. On þane hege reawe oð ða furuh.
 37. On land furuh.
 37. On toten bergan.
 38. Þanne, on achylle on til luches lege.
 38. Þanen, on biken settle.
 39. Þanen, on mealeburg norþewarde.
 39. Þanne, eft to anclee estward.
 40. Þanne sent þis landimare at Iwern.
 41. Arest on terente dene.
 41. Þanen, to fideriches dene uueward þanne on þare crundel
at þare weie itþislen, on þane crundel.
 43. Þanen, on budencumbe hracan þanne, on wung wylle þane, on
þane ealden forð þanen, on cranmere.
 44. Þanen on cing hille þanen, on ne smal þornes þanen, on
swylles þanen on lacmere.
 46. Þanen anlang streames od sandford.
 46. Þanen, on ears mores heaued þanen, on styb.
 47. Þanen on foxlee nortwarde.
 48. Þanen, on agen þorn.
 48. Þanen, on þere crundel northwarde þannen, on waddene
uuewarde.
 49. On hlinc reawe, þanen on þone grenwai at merewege uue
þanen on þa heren apeldre.
 50. Þ eft.
 50. On terente dene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 631 (Birch 985)
B15.8.290.
Bounds, Sawyer 631: Birch 1885-99, no. 985.



 1. Þis is þare IIII hida land boc be noddre þe eadwi cing ge
bocode Wistane on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemære æt leofsiges gete up to þare
dic.
 3. Þonne up to þam ðorne.
 4. Þonne up to grimes dic.
 4. Andlang dic to oþeren ðorne.
 5. Þonne ta ðam grægan stane.
 5. Þonne to þam wudu wege þat hit sticat innan nodre.
 6. Þonne andlang noddre þat hit sticað on eatstanes land
scare þat hit sticað up to herpoþe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 632 (Kem 435App)
B15.8.291.
Bounds, Sawyer 632: Kemble 1839-48, no. 435, Appendix, III, p. 433.



 1. Ðis sand ða landimare to Corf and to Blechenenwelle ðare
VII hide.
 2. Ærest of wikenforde, anlang wiken of Scylenford, of
Scylenforde on richt wege, of ðanne weie on olle discan, ðanen on Blechene,
of ðanen welle on ðane hlinc, anlang hlinkes on anne dich, ðanen one ðo
ealde rode, onlang rode onne ðo alde stodfald, of ðanen falde on anne dich,
suð anlang dic on ðare herepað, of ðanne herepað suð anlang
sawendune on anne dich, onlang dich oðe clif, ðanen ut on se.
 10. Ðanen sant ðis ðat westrene landimare.
 10. Of se one ðe stoddic, ðanen forð be wertrumen on anne
stanweal.
 12. Of ðanne walle þweres ouer smalen cumbe, of ða þorne
upwarde, ðanen forð be euisc one ðat norðene stodich, of ðare dich on
anne stanen wal, nord onlang walles on Stanwege, anlang weies on anne dic,
ðanne norð anlang dich, of ðare diche on Wicean, of Wichen on anne
þorn, and ðanen on anne diche, of þare diche on anne þorne, and ðanen
norð on iricht wege, of ðane iwege on ælfstanes pað, ðane forð be
eficlif on aneres broc, adune anlang brokes oð ðane bige, of ðane bige on
anne þorn, ðanne suð on irichte on anne mor, adune anlang mores on
Wicean, up anlang Wicean eft on Wichenforde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 633 (Birch 937)
B15.8.292.
Bounds, Sawyer 633: Birch 1885-99, no. 937.



 1. Ðis syndon ða gemæru to Fepsetnatune.
 2. Ærost of hymel broc.
 2. And swa.
 2. On suð dene.
 2. Of þære dene on fleferð.
 3. And swa on ða dic.
 3. Ondlang dices on mær ford.
 3. Of ðam forde on nut fen.
 4. Þ swa ondlang dene.
 4. Of ðære dene on æþelflede sige.
 5. Swa on scylf wege of þæm wege on hymel broc.

Ch 635 (Birch 962)
B15.8.293.
Bounds, Sawyer 635: Birch 1885-99, no. 962.



 1. Þis is þara V hyda boc æt ebblesburna þæ edwi cyng
gæbocodæ Wulfrycæ his þegnæ on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mere to Eblesburnan.
 4. Ærest of crund wylle on bronæs ford þonon onlang broc
þonon andlang streames.
 5. To þere mearce.
 5. Andlang mearce on bryd beorh.
 6. Þonon on ruwan beorch.
 6. Of þam beorche andlang mearce on þeth wite sceard.
 7. On þa greatan dic.
 7. Þonon endlang mearce on þone stapol.
 8. Of þam stapole on biccan hlew.
 8. Þonon on middel geat.
 9. Of middel geate on middel done.
 9. On þone beorch.
 9. Þonon endlang mearce on middel hlinch.
 10. Þonon eft on crund wylle.
 10. And seo med þe þar to ge byred wiþ humming tun þes is
fifta healf æcer seo his sunder med.

END_TEXT

Ch 636 (Birch 926)
B15.8.294.
Bounds, Sawyer 636: Birch 1885-99, no. 926.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to melebroce.
 2. Ærest of hreodbrycge andlang stræte on fearninga broce
andlang mearce on melebroces ford east andlang mearce on þunres lea
norþeweardne þonon andlang weges on cinges dic þonon andlang mearce on
holan weg of þam wege on þa ea oþ midne stream andlang streames on
hreodbrycge.
 6. And se haga an ham tune þe þærto gebyret.
 8. Þis is þara VII hida boc æt Melebroce þe Eadwig cing
gebocode Wulfrice his þegne on ece yrfe.

Ch 638 (Birch 983)
B15.8.295.
Bounds, Sawyer 638: Birch 1885-99, no. 983.



 1. Ðis is þara XX hidæ boc æt mordune þæ edwig cing
gæbocode wynsige hys þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mero to Mordune ærest of headdam dune
slade nyðer on hred burnan andlang burnan on wurf.
 4. Andlang streames on foslace.
 4. Þonne andlang foslace on þara ecera & heafda an lang
þære heafda on ettan pæn on þonne ellem stub þonon a be ecge on
þa medemunge of þære medemunge nyðer on þone ealdan wiðig.
 7. Þonon on hnottan forð of ðam forda on þone ealdan wylle
þonon eft on headdan dune sled.

Ch 639 (Birch 1005)
B15.8.296.
Bounds, Sawyer 639: Birch 1885-99, no. 1005.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land gemaro to Boclande.
 1. Ærestð sprindles ham hyrð to boclande & eal gama feld
to boc landes ge mære.
 2. Of lytlan mores heafde to laurocan beorge of laurocan beorge to
casan þorne of casan þorne to bradan wege of bradan wege andlang þara
heafod æcera oþ fisceres dene of fisceres dene to þare mæde of
þære mede ut to wasan.
 6. Of wasan ut to ea.
 6. Andlang hea to healh were.
 7. Of healh were to þan westran wiþige of þan wiþige to
þam yrð lande.
 8. Of þam yrð lande on þone hig weg of þan hig wege þurh
boc land to kynan wylle on þone heafod æcer.
 10. Of þan heafod æcere ut on þone steort of þan steorte
on þone yrnendan mor of þan yrnandan more on ælfsiges mor.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 640 (Birch 1004)
B15.8.297.
Bounds, Sawyer 640: Birch 1885-99, no. 1004.



 1. Þis is þara V hyda boc æt eblesburnan þe eadwig cing
gebocode ælfrice his þægne on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mere to eblesburnan þonne geð hit
ærest on bican bricge of þere bricge on beor dune fore warde on hafoc
hlinc of hafoc hlince on stod peð uf perdne þanon on þone bradan her
pað of þam herepaðe on eangyðe hlew þanon on menendene.
 6. Of menandene on land sceargeat.
 6. Of land sceorgeate on ludan beorh.
 7. Of ludan beorge on eblesburnan up on stream æt bican bricge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 641 (Birch 988)
B15.8.298.
Bounds, Sawyer 641: Birch 1885-99, no. 988.



 1. Ærest of Maccaniges forda andlang stræte ut on Temese oð
midne stream, andlang streames to holan pylle þære gerit, of holan pylle
up andlang dic to Brycgwege, andlang Brycgweges an furlang, of Brycgwege to
meosdene, andlang meosdene wið easten Meldanige oð midne mor, up andlang
mores on Langanforda suðweardne, andlang Langanforda oð Maccanige, swa be
Maccaniges wirðland swa swa oxa went, and swa on Maccaniges forda
suðweardne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 642 (Birch 992)
B15.8.299.
Bounds, Sawyer 642: Birch 1885-99, no. 992.



 1. Þis his þare X hida boc æt ubban tune þe eadwig cing
gebocode æþerede his þeine on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemere to Ubbantune.
 3. Aerest of langan forda on hægdune westewearde.
 4. Þonon forþ andlang dic on bican brache andlang dic on
finbeorh.
 5. Þonon on hundes geat.
 5. Of hundes geata swa cynrices gemære sceat & ubbantuninga
gemære on wilig þonne up andlang wilig eft on langan ford.

END_TEXT

Ch 643 (Birch 1001)
B15.8.300.
Bounds, Sawyer 643: Birch 1885-99, no. 1001.



 1. Þis synd þa land gemæra to Forda.
 1. Ærest of Afene andlang stræt on þane anne stan.
 2. Of þam stane on beonnan lehe.
 3. Of beonnan lehe innan wæfer.
 3. Andlang wæfer on wibyrht leage.
 4. Of wibyrht leage on hnæs leage.
 4. Of hnæs leage on cunuca leage.
 5. Of cunuca leage ut on afene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 645 (Birch 994)
B15.8.301.
Bounds, Sawyer 645: Birch 1885-99, no. 994.



 1. Þis synd ða land gemære æt loceresleaga & æt
tuneweorðe.
 2. Ærest of tateburnan andlang mærce on wiðimære þonon
andlang mærce on holen riðe andlang riðe on sulue ðonon on wiðipol
þonon andlang mærce on wætlingan stræte to ðam tunstallan andlang
stræte oð tunwæorðinga gemære west of wætlinga stræte
&lang mærce on liuyssac mere ðonon andlang mærce on ða
wicstræte andlang stræte to ðæs hredes mærce æt Sancte Albane
ðonon andlang mærce on wætlingan stræte suð andlang stræte on
ða deopan fura þonon inon sulh ðonon andlang mærce to ðara apoldre
þonon to ðam gemearceden stocce ðonon eft on tataburnan.
 11. And se wuda gemæne þe into loceres leage hyrð oð
ðæs cinges inwuda.
 12. And her is se wuda ðe into tune weorde hyrð.
 12. Of hylfes hæcce innon sulc up æftær sulue on ða
holan riðe andlang riðe on ðæt brade wæter þonon andlang
wætlingan stræte to hylfes hæcce.
 15. Ðis synd ða landgemære to Batriceseie.
 15. Ærst at hegefre.
 16. Fram hegefre, to gætenesheale.
 16. Fram gætenesheale, to gryndeles syllen.
 17. Fram gryndeles sylle, to russemere.
 17. Fram ryssemere, to bælgenham.
 18. Fram bælgenham, to bernardes byrieles.
 18. And swa ðanon to þam blachemore, fram blachemore, to ðam
coppede ðorne, fram ðam coppede ðorne, to bænces byri.
 20. Swa ðonon to bæueriðe.
 20. Ealswa feor swa an man mæi mid anen bille ge wurpen.
 21. And an friman, mid fif bere cornen.
 22. Swa eft ongen, to fugele riðe.
 22. Ðanon norð into tæmese.
 23. Be middan stræme.
 23. Be healfen streame, eft into hegefre.
 24. Herto ge byreð se wude þe hatte pænge.
 24. Seofen milen.
 25. And seofen furlang, and seofen fet embeganges.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 647 (Birch 998)
B15.8.302.
Bounds, Sawyer 647: Birch 1885-99, no. 998.



 1. Þis his þare XX hida boc æt stantune þe eadwig cing ge
bocode osulfe biscope on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis sint þa land gemæra to stantune.
 3. Aerest of hole wille on þa ruwan hola þonon on þone ealdan
weg up to þan hæþenan byrgelse þonan on þryfyld dene of þære
dene on þane scearpan stan.
 5. Þonon on cobban stan of þam stane on ane hlinc reawe oþ
hit cymð to blacan grafum þonon on þane mær stan of þam stane on
þa foxholu.
 8. Þonon on þone stanigan beurh on þorn dune.
 8. Norþewearde of þan beorge on þa stanes andlang dene
neoþewearde.
 9. Of þam stane on anne stan.
 10. Þonon on anne þorn.
 10. Þonon on þa wearh roda on wodnes dic.
 11. Þonon on þa ealdan burh middewearde of þære ealdan on
oxna mere.
 12. Þonon on anne crundel liþ an stan.
 12. On of þam stane on þone midmestan hrycg on east cumbum.
 13. Þonon on east mores heafod to þam hæþenan byrgelse on
brom lace.
 14. Þonne andlang streames eft on holen wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 648 (Birch 1000)
B15.8.303.
Bounds, Sawyer 648: Birch 1885-99, no. 1000.



 1. Ðis synd Heahtunes landgemæra.
 1. Of þære ea in to Wulfstanes fleote, of Wulfstanes fleote
andlang dices on hokes clif, of hokes clive andlang mærces on Snelles pitte,
of Snelles pitte andlang mærke on Hafokes boerh, of Hafokes beorhge on
þonne wyte wege, on þæet sclæde, of þam sclæde on Echilde
hlæwe a þa smye wicce, of Echilde hlæwe on hengstes earas of hengstes
earas on litil healle andlang mearke on Warmundes stan, of Warmundes stan on
Foxslades eande, of Foxslades ænde on þære hole wege of þære hole
wege to Kynewirdtreow, of Kynewirdtreow andlang mærke on Howille, of Howille
in to þære ea.

 1. Þis synt þa land gemæra to cunic tune.

þonon on þone mere of þam mere on holan broc &lang broces to upwylle
þonon to glædtuninga wege of þam wege on earninga stræte þonon on
seaxa broc &lang broces on gyruwan fen þa eft on bugla fen.

Ch 651 (Birch 1035)
B15.8.306.
Bounds, Sawyer 651: Birch 1885-99, no. 1035.



 1. Ðis sint þa land ge mæro cinrices by Cern þara twegra
hyda ærest þære lund score broc scyt on cern.
 2. Þonen of land score broce on þæt ænlipe ellyn.
 3. Þonne of þan ænlupan ellynne on hodduces hancgran.
 4. Of hodduces hancgran on þa ænlypan ac.
 5. And of þære æce on þæne hearapod.
 5. Þonon anlang hearpodes oð þere þorn of þær þorne
on aniges ham of haniges hamme on cern þonne of cern on þone broc.
 7. Of þan broce on hæðennan byriels.
 8. Of þan hæðenan byrielse on heað dune on stod lege get.
 8. Of þæne gete on þone broc.
 9. Andlang broces eft on cern.

END_TEXT

Ch 653 (Birch 1027)
B15.8.307.
Bounds, Sawyer 653: Birch 1885-99, no. 1027.



 1. Ðis is þaræ þriddan healfan hide boc æt æscforda
& æt beohylle þe eadwig cing gebocode eadeage his þegne on ece
yrfe.
 4. Ðis synt þe land gemere to æscforda & to beohille.
 4. Erest on won broces ford þonne andlang dices on luhhambeorh
þonne on an rewæ þonon on ane dic þonon on annæ weg andlang weges
on stanford þonon eft on anne weg oþ hit cymð eft an ane dic andlang dic
to holon broces heafdum andlang broces on anne stanihtne ford þonon east on
ane dic andlang dices to fileþ leage forda up on stream on anne hagan andlang
hagan on holancumbes land scare þonon on ane dic þonon on ruwan cnol
þonon on anne hagan þonon on þet swelgend þonon on anne broc þonon to
linor andlang linor to æscforda þonon to þere dic wale þonon on
wiþig slæd þonon to holan broce of þam broce on ane dic.
 14. Þonon eft on won broces ford.
 14. Þonon is her butan þam gemæne les stræt.
 15. Þonon synt þær manega hylla þæ man erien mæg.

END_TEXT

Ch 654 (Birch 1028)
B15.8.308.
Bounds, Sawyer 654: Birch 1885-99, no. 1028.



 1. Ðis sint þa land gemære æt wurþe þara þritiga
hida.
 2. Ærest on stan bricgge.
 2. Of stan bricgge east onlang temese þæt hit cymð to cing
hæma gemære suð ondlang gemæres þæt hit cimð to þam heafud
stoccun.
 4. Of þam heafod stoccun up on wærnan hylle to þam þorne
of þæm þorne ondlang mearce on eccene ondlang stremes oð hit sticað
on cearninga gemære ondlang mearce þat hit sticað on heantunninga
gemære.

 2. Of bitelesmore, on wyndrede dic.
 3. Of þare diche, on bokenwelle.

 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæro æt dencesuurþe.

to þam norþarn deneceswurþe gemæra þonon eastryhte eft on cillan

Ch 659 (Birch 1029)
B15.8.311.
Bounds, Sawyer 659: Birch 1885-99, no. 1029.



 1. Hir sinda dam landgemære into Sudwellan.
 2. Of dam forda andlang greotan sid se ealdartreau þo est be
eastan & be sudan dam grete þon ge rihte ðurh niwatunes brok sofot on
streotan up be broce be sudan sunningale holme þ on bradan lege þe astey
forde þan on to coitan of coitan andlang strat on holan broc andlang broces
þ/ up be þan hlmecan furlang wid innan þane graf þ ut on þa ac of
þ/ fre ac a be þan heafdan on þone nordran þorn of þam þorne on
streatan andlang streatan þ eft on þone ford.
 10. Hir sint þa longemaere et Normantune.
 10. Of streatan to þere dichacce andlang þan hagan on þaene
broc andlang broces þ on þa dene andlang dene a be þan heafdan on dam
lenbroc of þan on luse a be þare lucse on þa ealdarn streot andlang
straet þ eft on steotan.
 15. Hir sindan hocer wuda of þe fre strat ofer þaene mor to
dreas haga nordeweardan þanen up to dare aeppeltreou of þere appelstreou on
gerihte ofer mid þaene miclan beorh in on þaene mor on þ fule fleot
andlang fleotes þ eft on streatan.
 19. Hir sint þa landegmare to Fiscetune.
 19. Andlang Streotan on Traentan on haseleford of dam forda andlang
streot to moorn dune of sy forndune on gerihton on niwantunes broc &lang
broces þ east on streotan.
 23. Hir sint dam tunes de birad in to Sudwellan mid sacce & mid
sacne Fearnes feld.
 24. Cyrlingtune.
 24. Nordmantune.
 24. Uptune.
 25. Mortune.
 25. Fiscertune.
 25. Gypesmere.
 25. Blise mere.
 25. Geofertune.
 26. Healhtune.
 26. Healum.
 26. On Fearnes felda gebyrað twega manna hlot landes in to
Sudwellan on Healum are seoxta acer & dreon manna Hlot on Norman tone a se
dridda acer on Fiscestune dam twegen dales & feower manna hlot ealles dans
landes.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 661 (Birch 1009)
B15.8.312.
Bounds, Sawyer 661: Birch 1885-99, no. 1009.



 1. Þonne syndon her þa land gemæra.
 1. Ærest of cortimæde upp to þam æsce.
 2. Of þam æsce on pleg dic.
 2. Of pleg dic be swin cumbes hefde to crawan hylle.
 3. Of crawan hylle upp to dune.
 3. West be ecgge to lacwege.
 4. Of lacwege to ceoles cumbe.
 4. Of ceoles cumbes est be ecgge to þam weallon.
 5. Of þam wealle to þam tune.
 5. Of þam tune on higweg.
 6. Andlang higweges to ænlypan þunan.
 6. Of ænlypan þunan on selardes pol.
 7. Of selardes pole ut on auene.
 7. Þonne eft ærost on þa ealdan lanan to horpytton upp on
epenn.
 8. Of þam penne on hean æsc.
 9. Of hean æsce upp andlang weges to blacan lege.
 9. To þere ealdan dic.
 10. Of þere ealdan dic a be graue to wulf slæde.
 10. Of wulf slæde a be wege.
 11. Andlang weges to alesbeorge.
 11. Of alesbeorge to þam hlypgete.
 12. Of þam hlypgete a be wealle to lincumbe.
 12. Of lincumbe to midda hriccges wege.
 13. Of midda hriccges wege to stutardes cumbes grafe.
 14. Of stutardes cumbe to starforda andlang broces to tune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 663 (Birch 1002)
B15.8.313.
Bounds, Sawyer 663: Birch 1885-99, no. 1002.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land gemæro þæs ge burlandes to
abbendune þ is gadertang on þreo genamod þ is hengestes ig.
 3. & seofocan wyrð.
 3. And wiht ham.
 3. Ærest on meagðe ford þ mid streame on stan ford.
 4. Forð mid streame wiþ utan cytan igge on þa land lace of
þære lace on scæcyling æcer þ on hi wege to yfemestan leage
þæt on preosta leage þ to catleage þ to cybban stane of þæm on
þa þrio gemæru ðaet innan ruwan leage to brogan gete þ to sundran
edisce on þone greatan þorn of þan þorne on cotan healas þ on tiddan
cumb of þæn cumbe on tetan hylle.
 10. Of tytan hylle to þaen heafod wege ondlong cumbes to þæm
hecce of þam hæcce to paþe stocce þ to plum leage þ on friþela
byrig ðæt to ydyr leage of ydyr leage to þam stane þ on temese æt
eanflæde gelade þæ amid streame þ hit cimeð eft on mægþa
ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 664 (Birch 936)
B15.8.314.
Bounds, Sawyer 664: Birch 1885-99, no. 936.



 1. Þis synd þara V hida land gemæru æt Alfestune.
 2. Ærest on hring wylle.
 2. Of hring wylle duddingdene.
 3. Andlang denes on þa ealdan mær dic.
 3. Andlang dice west on gerihte on smita pull.
 4. Of smita pylle west rihte on blaca ford.
 4. Of blaca forda innan hreodham.
 5. Of hreodhamme on cildes hammes west ende.
 6. Þonne norð on gerihte to hreodwican on þa ealdan
stræt.
 7. Andlang stræt to norðwican.
 7. Of norðwican eft andlang strete to billes ham.
 8. Of billes hamme eft on gerihte innan myccla pyll.
 8. Of myccla pylle on smala pyll.
 9. Andlang pylles on hwita gærstune.
 9. Of hwita gærstune on ða mær dic.
 10. Andlang dice to mormæde norð hyrnan.
 11. Þonn norð rihte on ða dic innan hola pyll.
 11. Andlang hola pylles eft on ða mær dic.
 12. Ðonne eft be ðære dic to ðær stanenan bricge.
 13. Of þære bricge suð innan wærbyrdes croft.
 13. Eall on buton.
 14. Eft on þa mær dic.
 14. Andlang dic to mærcumbe.
 14. Andlang cumbes midwerd to ðære ealdan stræt.
 15. Andlang stræte to beadan healan.
 16. Of beadan healan est rihtes innan rige cumb norðe wærd to
þære smalan æc.
 17. Of þære æc andlang cumbes to pislege.
 17. Of pislege on doggiþorn.
 18. Of þam þorne to eadingham.
 18. Of þam hamme to fotmæle.
 19. Of fotmæle est rihtes on wulfputt.
 19. Of þam pytte on ða wogan æc.
 20. Of ðære ac on þa foryrðe eastewerde æt langalege.
 20. Of langalege to wulfhricge.
 21. Of wulfhricge to grenhylle.
 21. Of þam hylle to mannes dæle.
 22. Of mannes dæle to æccelcumbes heafdan.
 22. Þanon west rihtes on þa ealdan stan reawe to þare ealdan
bec.
 23. Of ðare bec innan cucan healas on ðone æsc.
 24. Of þam æsce on scypa cumb to þam broke.
 25. Andlang brokes to ðam gemære.
 25. Þonne þar norðrihtes andlang ludescumbes to þam ealdan
herepaðe.
 27. West andlang herepaðes to ælla treowe.
 27. On hola wæg.
 27. Of hola wæige to hafoc hylle.
 28. Of hafoc hylle be þare ealdan dic eft on hring wylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 666 (Birch 956)
B15.8.315.
Bounds, Sawyer 666: Birch 1885-99, no. 956.



 1. Þis sint þa land gemæro þa X hida to Cnugel.
 1. In þæs cumbes heafde to þas cingis gemære west ofer
þone cnol to þæn seoh tore to þru broce of þruce on wulfa broc.
 3. Þonan on welinga ham.
 3. Þonan on winterburnan.
 4. Þanon on nunnena dene on þes hlinces heafod.
 5. Þanon to sahl beorge.
 5. Þær of dune andlanges shlades up andlang dene up to gosa
beorge & so to eadan dic.
 6. Andlang eadan dic to þas cumbes heafode.


END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 668 (Birch 1145)
B15.8.316.
Bounds, Sawyer 668: Birch 1885-99, no. 1145.



 1. Þis is þara tyn hida land boc at Winter burnan þe eadgar
cing ge bocode eadrice his þegene on ece yrfe fif hida be Westan tune
syndries landes fif be eastan tune ge mænes landes.
 5. Þis syndon þara fif hida land gemæra into Winterburnan be
westan tune syndries landes.
 6. Ærest æt þam haran stane innan winterburnan þon
andlang burnan on þa ellen stybbas þonne of þam ellen stybban andlang dic
on þone mere þonne of þam mere on þa ealdan mæd dic þonne andlang
dic on þone weg þonne andlang weges on þistel beorh suðe weardne
þonne þanon andlang weges on þa dic.
 14. Þonne andlang dic on þone haran stan on hig dune þonne
andlang fyrh up to þam heafdon þonne forþ be heafdon on stan mere norþe
weardne þonne of stan mere on þære pyrigean styb þonne of pyrigean
stybbe on þone þorn þonne of þam þorne on þone hlæw uppe on
hwæt hylle of þam hlæwe andlang fura eft on winterburnan on þone
haran stan.
 17. Þonne syndon þa fif hida be Eastan tune gemænes landes
on gemænre mearce swa swa hit þær to be limped.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 669 (Birch 1103)
B15.8.317.
Bounds, Sawyer 669: Birch 1885-99, no. 1103.



 1. Æryst up of clyst on ða ealdan dic.
 2. Of stræt on sicgan mores heafod.
 2. Þanon on þa ealdan dic on grendel up anlang grendel on
þone ealdan ford.
 4. Þanon on piðig pytt.
 4. Þanon on wiðig ðyfel.
 4. Þanon on ða ealdan dic.
 5. Þanon on grendel of þæt reade clyf.
 5. Þanon on blindan wyll.
 6. Þanon on clænan splott suðe weardne.
 6. Þanon on gerihte on þone stan beorh.
 7. Þanon west rihte on ðone ealdan weg.
 7. Fram þam ealdan wege on þa ealdan þyrnan.
 8. Þanon west sceft rihte ofer ðone mor on þone weg on suð
healfe þære langan dic.
 9. Þanon on grendel.
 10. Þanon on þa wiðig ræwe.
 10. Þanon forð eft on grendel.
 10. Þanon on clyst.
 12. Þis ys þære hyde land boc þe Eadgar cing gebocode
æðelnoðe his þegne on ece yrfe.
 13. Boc To Clistwicon.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 670 (Birch 1048)
B15.8.318.
Bounds, Sawyer 670: Birch 1885-99, no. 1048.



 1. Ærest up of temese andlang merfleotes.
 1. To pollene stocce.
 1. Swa on bulunga fenn.
 2. Of ðam fenne æfter ðær ealdan dic to cuforde.
 3. Of cuforde upp andlang teobernan to þære wide here
stræt.
 3. Æfter ðære here stræt to ðære ealde stoccene
sancte andreas cyricean.
 5. Swa innan lundene fenn.
 5. Andlang fennes sud on temese on midden streame.
 6. Andlang stremes be lande & be strande eft on merfleote.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 671 (Birch 1295)
B15.8.319.
Bounds, Sawyer 671: Birch 1885-99, no. 1295.



 1. Billanoran be lind hyrste.
 1. And on glæppan felda.
 1. Scearn dæn.
 1. And þar rihte wið þorn dæn.
 2. And brocces ham be eastan ea.
 2. And tannera hole.
 3. And trind hyrst.
 4. Þis synt þara tyn sulunga land gemæro to brom leage.
 4. Ærest on eastan cysel hyrstes gemæro.
 5. Þonne on crop tunes gemæro.
 5. Þonne þanon on ruge beorges gemæro.
 6. Þonne on suð healfe.
 6. Cysse stanes gemæro forð be weard setlan.
 7. Þonne be westan wic hammes gemæru.
 8. And beohha hammes gemæru.
 8. Þonne be norðan beringa hammes gemæru.
 9. And modinga hammes gemæro.
 9. And þonon eft east on cinges gemæro.
 10. Þæt on cysel hyrst.
 11. Þis is þara X sulunga boc æt Bromleage þe Eadgar cing
gebocode sancte Andree Cristes apostole on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 672 (Birch 1183)
B15.8.320.
Bounds, Sawyer 672: Birch 1885-99, no. 1183.



 1. Ðis is þara VII hidæ boc æt Warawylle þe eadgar
cining gæbocodæ ælfstanæ his þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land gemæro æt haranwylle.
 3. Of þa ellen stubbe on ðane oðerne ellen stubbe þanone on
þa ealdan fyrh þanone to smalan wege on butan flegges garan.
 5. Ðonne andlang þæs smalan weges þ hit sticað on
humbracumb.
 6. Þonne on icenilde weg.
 6. Þæt eft on ellen stubb.
 7. Þonne on þone herepað.
 7. On haran dune.
 8. Þonne be herepaðe on cranwylle.
 8. Þonne on hesleabroc on hreodmede þonne on þa ealdan cot
stowe.
 9. Þonne on smalan broc.
 9. Þonne on þæt longe furlang þonne on cylmes cumbe on
snelles garan.
 11. Ðonne ys þis sio með þe þærto ge byreð.
 11. Andlang þæs ealdan broces.
 12. Þ hit sticad on syðtuninga lace.
 12. Þonne on stocwylle broc.
 13. Þonne on þane ealdan broc þanone on wudubricge.
 13. And ðes land sint VII hyda ðe þes land ge mæro to ge
byriað.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 673 (Birch 1047)
B15.8.321.
Bounds, Sawyer 673: Birch 1885-99, no. 1047.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to gaing.
 1. Ærest of lillan læwes crundle middewærdan to loddere
beorge þonon to grenan lince westewardan of þan lince to earnes dune west
wærde.
 3. Þonon to holan dic eastwærde andlang þære dic twa
furlang norþweard þonne east be heafdan twafurlang andlang fura on þone
lytlan pyl andlang pylles on lacing broc andlang broces on gæing broc
andlang broces on þa æwylma þonne andlang hearpaþes on frigedæges
trow of þan treowe andlang weter dene west to þære deopan dene.
 7. Of þære dene to þan readan stane of þæn stane eft on
linlan læwes crundele.
 8. Þis sind þa langemæra to gosige.
 8. Ærest on þa mærdic estwærde þ innan tealeburnan
andlang tealeburnan þ innan eccen.
 9. Andlang eoccen þ innan þa mærdic.
 10. Of þa mær dic þ innan þa furh of þa furh þ innan
þ riþig of þam riþige þ innan land broc andlang land broces forð on
uten þone ham eft on þa merdic estewearde.
 13. Þis sind þa land gemære to wyrþe.
 13. Ærest of eoccen on þa ge mær lace.
 14. Andlang lace be westan cearna graf be þan andheafdan to
eadulfes pytte þonne andlang slædes to þan heafod æcere norþe
weardon þonon ondlang æceres to þan andheafdan þ to þan hæþan
byrgeles on þa ealdan dic andlang dic to þæn port wege.
 18. Þonne on þa deopan furh þonne on þa stanbricge on
temese ondlang temese to þam þorn stybbe aet cingtuninga ge mære þonne
to þan heaþan byrgelese þonne on þa meardic be eastan ælfsiges
cotan.
 21. Andlang dic a to þan pæþe þonne ofer þonne mor on
þa heafda þ on þone wænweg andlang weges to þæm þorn stybbe
wiþ þone weg þonne on eoccen on þæt mor slæde estwærde andlong
eoccen þæt eft on þa mær lace.
 25. Þis sind þa land ge mæra to Earmundes lea.
 26. Ærest of sand forda on þa fulen lace andlang þæs ge
mærhagan ut to þan coten þonan andlang gemæres on heasel dic andlang
stræte ut on styrian pol.
 28. Andlang þære dic east to wasan þonon on hrocan leage
norþewærde andlang dic on ufewearde hæg dune þ up on snoddes hylle
ufe wearde to þan haran stane þonon to þæn ealdan wulfhagan þonne
andlang slædes þæt to læces forda þonne andlang lucringes eft on
sandford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 675 (Birch 1042)
B15.8.322.
Bounds, Sawyer 675; Birch 1885-99, no. 1042.



 1. Ðis is þæra landes boc æt Wudutune þe eadgar cining
gebocode æþelrice his þegne on ecen yrfe.
 3. Ærest æt meolforda upp andlang streames oþ ramma ford of
þam forda andlang ramma dæne to eadweardes ge mære of eadweardæs ge
mære to glim.
 5. Andlang glim adune on þone stream oþ hit cymþ to þam
stream þæ scyt fram meolcforda up andlang þæs streames þæt hit
cymþ æft to meolcforda.
 7. And ymb þone wudu swa ælfsige & æþelricg wurð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 676 (Birch 1037)
B15.8.323.
Bounds, Sawyer 676: Birch 1885-99, no. 1037.



 1. Ðis is þæra land boc to hamme.
 1. Þæ eadgar cing ge bocade aðelstane bisceope on æce
yrfe.
 3. Ærest of eadelmes dic on stoc fliot.
 3. Of þam fliote to ilmere andlang wynsies mearce on þone
langan þorn.
 4. Of þam þornæ on wehinc leage þanon on byrc mære
andlang mære on þara hina mearcæ andlang mearæ to wortan beorge
þanon on bæde wyllan.
 7. Andlang wylle þæt innan hile andlang ealdan hilæ æt
þæra hina mæde þanon innan fleot andlang þes fleotes on
træfesing muðan andlang hile on eadelmes dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 677 (Birch 1040)
B15.8.324.
Bounds, Sawyer 677: Birch 1885-99, no. 1040.



 1. Ærest of myle forda ondlong erge þ in wæsceford.
 2. Of wæsceforda ondlong erge ymb holaneige ufeweardre.
 3. Of holaneige ufe weardre on þa acecge ufe weardre þ
&lang þære acecge ufe wearde þ on snæd weg foreweardre.
 5. Of snæd wege ymb heanlege on æcnabrycge up ondlong broces
þ in ða dic.
 6. Ondlong dices in tanes bæce.
 6. Of tanes bæce ondlong mærgeardes.
 7. Þ on lionhina gemære.
 7. Ondlong leonhiena gæmeres þ on aðelwoldes hege.
 8. Of aðelwoldes hege in hean oldan.
 9. Of hean oldan in mærðorn.
 9. Of mærþorne ondlong geardes in ðæt hlid get.
 10. Of ðam hlidgete ondlong stræte on dicesgeat of dicesgeate
in ðæt ðridde geat.
 11. Ðæt ondlong stræte þ eft in myleford.
 13. And Eadgar cyning gean Healhstane his þegn hagan on hereforda
on boc a on ece yrfe.
 15. Her is Stantunes boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 678 (Birch 1036)
B15.8.325.
Bounds, Sawyer 678: Birch 1885-99, no. 1036.



 1. Þis sindon þa land gemæro to Duclingtune XIIII hida &
þa ealdan cyricean æt æstlea & þær to XL æcera.
 2. And byrnan lea eal into Duclingtune.
 3. Ærest of duclingtune on weric &lang wenrices on þone
byge of þam byge on þa ealdan lace.
 4. Andlang lace on þa norð ea &lang streames on folgor
hyrste neoþewearde þonon on þa ealdan dic.
 6. Andlang dic þ suð eft on wænric up on gean stream on
þone ealdan ford.
 7. Of þone forda up on þa Riþe an furlang wið svþan þa
cyrican &lang Riþe on þa wurtwalan þ ut þurh þone hagan on burh
dic ufeuuearde.
 9. Of þære dic on þa ealdan Rode of þære rode on
scottes healh of þam heale on uuenburge byrgge of þæra brucge on þa
dic.
 11. Andlang dices on east hæma gemære on þone bige to þan
heafdan on gate þyrnan.
 12. Of þære þyrnan on blace þyrnan on þa dic of
þære þyrnan to uurt walan to þan furan &lang fura on þa ealdan
dic to þan ellere &lang dices to þan oþerne ellene.
 14. Of þan ellene to þære apoldre ðanon to æglesuullan
broce up on gean stream on stanford of þan forda on fugelslæd of þam
slæde on coluullan broc &lang broces on swyllan healas.
 17. Of þan healan on hastinges lace &lang lace on þone ea
stream.
 18. And twegan hammas æt loppede þorne hyrað in to
Duclingdune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 679 (Birch 1044)<extent></extent>
B15.8.326.1.
Bounds, Sawyer 679: Birch 1885-99, no. 1044.



 1. Ðis sint ða land gemara to Scroppen þorpe.
 2. And yuresby.
 2. Of langanforda dic andlang dices þ on þa miclan dic andlang
dices on blidan et celfa se yeade.
 3. Andlang blidan on beo lese suðerewearde þ up da miclan strat
andlang strat ut þurh beolease norð ut þone feld þ adun on blidan up be
blidan on iddil.
 6. Up be iddel on þone fulan broc andlang brocci eft on
langanford.
 7. Ðis sint ða land gemaree to Suttune.
 7. Of fulanforda andlang stret to þam drape þ on geriht mid
þone draf on þone broc andlang broces on langan ford.
 9. On gerihte of scyrinda midde weardne on iddel at brodan fleote
þ up a be iddel eft on fulan forde.
 10. Ðonne is sisotef land binnan ðisum gemaree.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 679 (Birch 1349)<extent></extent>

 1. Ðis sint ða land gemara to scroppen þorpe &
þuresby.
 1. Of langanforda dic andlang dices þ on þa miclan dic andlang

ða miclan strat andlang strat ut þurh beolease norð ut þone feld þ
adun on blidan up be blidan on iddil.
 5. Up be iddel on þone fulan broc andlang broces eft on langan
ford.
 7. Ðis sint ða land gemara to suttune of fulan forda andlang
stret to þam grafe þon geriht mid þone graf on þone broc andlang broces
on langan ford on gerihte of scir wuda midde weardne on iddel at brodan
fleote.
 10. Þ up a be iddel.
 10. Eft on fulan ford.
 11. Ðonne is sisotef land binnan þissum gemara.

Ch 680 (Birch 1051)
B15.8.327.
Bounds, Sawyer 680: Birch 1885-99, no. 1051; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara X hida land boc æt west clearan þæ
eadgar cyning gebocodæ ælfwine his þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mere to West Clearan.
 3. Erest þær sceapwæsce scet on aleburnan andlang
aleburnan.
 4. Þ on efer broc.
 4. Of þam broce on cofring treow.
 5. Of þam treowe on ge rihte to weard rode.
 6. Þanone an frangsing æcer.
 6. Of þam æcere on wic herpað.
 6. Andlang herpaðes on wearð seð.
 7. Of þam sede andlang weges on wiði graf.
 8. Of þam grafe.
 8. On sciddell.
 8. Of þam delle andlang weges.
 8. On hyldan hlef.
 9. Of þam hlewe on brið swiðe stane.
 9. Of þam stane.
 9. On humwill.
 10. Of þam wille on sceapwæscan andland sceapwascan oþ þ
easte on aleburnan.

END_TEXT

Ch 681 (Birch 1052)
B15.8.328.
Bounds, Sawyer 681: Birch 1885-99, no. 1052.



 1. Þis sind þa land ge mære to hæafuddene.
 2. Of Usan up on wilbaldes fleote.
 3. Of wilbaldes fleote on þa dic andlang dices on Deorwentan.
 3. Of Deorwentan on ge rihtne on Cærholm of Cærholme andlang
dices eal ombutan þane wuda on fulan ea.
 5. Andlang fulan ea on ealdan Deorwentan.
 6. Andlang ealde Deorwentan þ eft on Usan.
 6. Þa seond þa hærað to heofoddene mid sace & mid
socne.
 7. Cnyllingatun.
 7. Beornhyll.
 7. Cafeld.
 8. Ðorp.
 8. Hyðe.
 8. Eastringatun.
 8. Belleby.
 8. Celpene.
 9. Þis sindon þa land ge mære æt Ealdedrege.
 9. Of Yr on Hrodlafes holm.
 10. Of Hrodlafes holme to se mære on Sigeres ac.
 10. Of Sigeres ac on Usan andlang Usan þ eft up on Yr.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 682 (Birch 1058)
B15.8.329.
Bounds, Sawyer 682: Birch 1885-99, no. 1058.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to drai tune.
 1. Ærest of eglafes forda on dyþ mere.
 2. Þannan on lacing andlang lacing on cealcford þanan on
mærdic.
 3. Andlang dic on mydeling.
 3. Up of mydeling wið norþan hyrdegraf þat on gerihtan on
waneting andlang waneting on oeccene þanan on þa ealdan dic.
 5. Andlang dic on eglafes ford.

END_TEXT

Ch 683 (Birch 1054)
B15.8.330.
Bounds, Sawyer 683: Birch 1885-99, no. 1054; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þæ land boc æt yting stoce þe eadgar cing
gebocode into ealde mynstre.
 3. Ðis sint þara X hida land gemære to Ytingstoce.
 4. Ærest of breting mæde norðe weardre ut on icenan.
 5. Fram brentinge to þære gearn windan fet.
 5. Of ðære gearn windan fæt to stybban snade ðer þær
ða twegen wegas tolicgað.
 6. Þonon to cuntan heale.
 7. Of þan heale to wifeles stigele.
 7. Of ðære stigele to geolesburna.
 8. Of þam burnan to ðam readan fordan.
 8. Of þam forda ut on icena on þet west steð ut andlang
þest staðes.
 9. Eft on brenting þær we ær on fengon.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 684 (Birch 1056)
B15.8.331.
Bounds, Sawyer 684: Birch 1885-99, no. 1056.



 1. Ærest on pen alting þonne on þa ealdan dic on þæt
cristelmæl.
 2. Of þam cristelmæle on welentines get þanon on finfos of
finfos on stream to hryd worwig þanon on uninnenno þanon to carn peran of
carnperan to carnwelm þanon on þa ealdan stræt to beþcywrc þanon
forþ on stræt to dofen soðo þanon on weg on cofer fros þanon on
stream to sæ onnon cuic.
 7. Þis þara IX hida boc æt ti wærnhel þe Eadgar Kyning
Eanulfe gebocude on ece yrfe.

Ch 685 (Birch 1053)
B15.8.332.
Bounds, Sawyer 685: Birch 1885-99, no. 1053.



 1. Þis his þare XX hida land boc æt stantune þe eadgar
cyng gebocode osulfe byscope on ehce yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemære to stantune.
 3. Ærest of holan wylle on þa ruwan hola þonne on þone
ealdan weg up to þam hæþenan byrgelse.
 5. Þonon on þryfyld dene of þære dene on þone scearpan
stan.
 6. Þonon on cobben stan.
 6. Of þan stane on ane hlinc ræwe oþ hit cymð to blacan
grafum þonon on þone mær stan.
 7. Of þam stane on ða foxholu.
 8. Þonne on þane stanigan beorh on þorndune norþewearde of
þam beorge on þa stanas andlang dene neoðewearde of þam on anne stan.
 10. Þonon on anne þorn.
 10. Þonon on þa wearh rode.
 10. On wodnes dic.
 11. Þonon on þa ealdan burh middewearde.
 11. Of þære ealdan on oxna mere þonon on anne crundel lið
an stan ond of þam stane on þone midmestan hrycg on east cumbum.
 13. Þonne on east mores heafod to þam hæþenan byrgelse on
brom lace þonne andlang streames eft on holan wylle.
 16. Þis his þa landes boc æt stantune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 688 (Birch 1067)
B15.8.333.
Bounds, Sawyer 688: Birch 1885-99, no. 1067.



 1. Ærest on weale weg þonne on þa eorðburg þ forð be
wurt walan to mearcwege þonne on wifeles ham westewearde þ forð andlang
burg beces þonne to wadleage westewearde.
 4. Þonne to mearcwege þ west to igfled wege on þa ac on
fileð cumbe.
 5. Þonne andlanges hagan on bidan ham eastewearde þ andlanges
hagan ut to Rod leage westewearde þonne to heað feld geate.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 689 (Birch 1080)
B15.8.334.
Bounds, Sawyer 689: Birch 1885-99, no. 1080; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to hisseburnan.
 1. Ærest begmære of begmere on cogan mere of cogan mere on
guttes cumbes heafod þanon on hengest paþes geat of þam gæte andlang
hagan on standene.
 4. Of standene on henna dene.
 4. Of henne dene on þyrran mere of þyrran mere on þorc mere.
 5. Of þoroc mere on lillan hrycg.
 5. Of lillan hrycge on rupan beorh of rupan beorge on poon lince of
poon lince on geoc hangran on cissan anstigo.
 7. Of cissan anstigan on þone hwitan hagan þæt on gos dene
of gos dene andlang dene þæt on bittan cnolle to wuda of butan cnolle on
wocces geat of wocces geate on hlidgeat.
 10. Of lid geate on wesanham suþeweardne þanon on tanmere.
 11. Of tanmere on begmere.
 12. Þonne sint þis land gemæra þara XV hida æt
eastune.
 12. Ærest on eferfearn on þa Readan dic.
 13. Þ on hyldan hlæw þonne andlang streates oð ceapmanna
del of ceapmanna dele þ on wort manna del.
 15. Þ on hunda hyl.
 15. Of hundan hylle þæt to þan big wind lan þonne a be
wurt walan æt on sot ceorles æcer.
 16. Of sot ceorles æcer oþ þone won stoc.
 17. Of þan stocce þweores ofer bradan lea þ on hors leaga
dene.
 18. Of þare dene þæt on þone grund læsan pyt of þam
putte on hacan pund fald of hacan pund falde oþ eft on þæt eferfearn.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 690 (Birch 1066)
B15.8.335.
Bounds, Sawyer 690: Birch 1885-99, no. 1066.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemæra to rimecuda.
 2. Of þære bricge on west ea andlang ea on biccan pol of þam
pole on dyrnan ford þonne is seo mæd gemæne of þam forda on lucan
beorh of þam beorge on pisteles æc of þæm acum on broclea ford of
þæm forda on þa stigele of þære stigele on cuttes mæd of
þære mæde on afene up on wudeburge hlinc of þam hlince on lind ford.
 7. Of þæm forda on þone sæ troh of þæm troge on
þone hæþenan byrgels of þam byrgelse up to wind geate of wind geate on
spon ford of þæm forda on þone fulan ford of þam forda on mules cumb
of mules cumbe on þone herepað andlang herepaþes on þiofa cumb of þam
cumbe on hlype burnan.
 11. Of þam burnan on leofan mearce on þa dic of þære dic
on þa brembel þyrnan of þære þyrnan on burhrydincg ford on þa
mæd lace of þære lace on þone haran wiðig.
 14. Þonne is seo mæd gemæne of þam wiþige on afene up
on sandford of þam forda on aðelwoldes mearce of his mearce on undernbeorh
of þæm beorge on þone haran wiþig of þæm wiþige eft on þa
bricge.
 17. And þisses landes is ealles XXII hida.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 692 (Birch 1074)
B15.8.336.
Bounds, Sawyer 692: Birch 1885-99, no. 1074.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæra æt Geofanstige.
 1. Ærest of deopan forda andlang camelar oð pyttelles ford.
 2. Up of pyttelles forda andlang ceorla gemære oð þone ellen
styb.
 3. Of þam ellen styb be on þone ealdan seað.
 4. Of þam seaþe swa wyrtruma sceat oð ramleah weg.
 5. Andlang þes weges oþ þone bæþ herpoð.
 5. Andlang þæs herpoðes eft on deopan ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 694 (Birch 1073)
B15.8.337.
Bounds, Sawyer 694: Birch 1885-99, no. 1073.



 1. Ærest westan norþan hyt mæraþ wodnes dic.
 1. Þonne on horscum wyllan andlang broces innon cameler.
 2. Andlang camelar ongean stream on mærbroc.
 3. Andlang broces ongean stream on þa westran seofon wyllas.
 4. Þanon up on dune on mær broc.
 4. Þonne norþ rihte sume hwile.
 5. Þonne hwon west ymbutan ænne garan oþþa ealdan
stræt.
 6. Andlang stræte þ eft on wodnes dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 695 (Birch 1076)
B15.8.338.
Bounds, Sawyer 695: Birch 1885-99, no. 1076; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara ehteðan healfræ hydæ landboc to eastune
þe eadgar cining gebocode brihtelm bisceope on ece yrfe.
 4. Þis synd þa land gemero to Eastune.
 4. Ærest on eadmundes wer.
 5. Of eadmundes were on þa ealdan byrig.
 5. Of þære ealdan byrig upp andlang dic to þam eþenan
byrigelsan.
 6. Of þam æþenan byrigelsan andlang mearce to þære port
stret andlang smalan dune upp to þære dic of þære dic andlang mearce
innan blacan lace.
 8. Of blaca lace &lang watæres on costices mylne.
 9. Of costices mylne.
 9. Andlang mearce to þære fulan flode.
 10. Of þære fulan flode &lang stret to þam eafod
stoccan.
 11. Of þam heafod stoccan andlang stret innan icenan.
 11. Andlang icenan to þæra grenan furh inna þara stræt.
 12. Andlang stræt andlang mearce on stapol þorn.
 13. Of stapol þorne andlang mearce on þa haran apoldran.
 14. Of þara haran apoldran innan þane smalan weg.
 14. Of þam smalan wege innan þa readan rode.
 15. Of þære readan rode andlang þæs mylan weges.
 16. On þone lunden weg.
 16. Andlang þes lundænes weges innan cealc hammæs.
 17. Of cealc hammam andlang mearce innan bicafed.
 18. Of bica setle andlang mearce innan fearninga lege.
 18. Of fearninga lege andlang dic æft on icenan innan eadmundes
wer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 696 (Birch 1071)
B15.8.339.
Bounds, Sawyer 696: Birch 1885-99, no. 1071.



 1. Ðis is þara V hida boc æt eblesburnan þæ eadgar
cyning gæbocodæ Byrhsiæ his þægne on ecæ yrfæ.
 4. Ðis synd þa land ge mere þara V hida æt eblesburnan.
 5. Ærest on þone ealdan wiðig þonne of ðam wigiðe on
butan þone ealdan ham stede.
 6. On ða med dic.
 6. Andlang þere dic ut on stret ford.
 7. Þonne east andlang streames oð ælfredes ge mere.
 7. Þonne þonan suð on þa for yrþe eastewearðe on ðone
ealdan weg.
 8. Þonne suð andlang paðes on ðone hyndes þyfel of
þæm þyfele syð andlang weges oðða greatan dic þonne west andlang
dic of þðet deope sled westeweard.
 11. Þonne norð andlang þere ealdan hlinch rewe.
 11. Þonne norð on ðone lytlan stan beorh of þæm beorge
norð on gerihta oð succan scylfe þonne of succan scylfe norð ofer gyfan
feld þweores ofer east cumb on þa for yrþe westewerdne þonne andlang
þere ealdan land sceare.
 14. Oð ðorn hlinc of þorn hlinh ealswa on dinnes hlinch of
dynnes hlince norð ofer moxes dune of moxes dune norð on eblesburnan.
 16. Þonne andlang streames oð ðone ealdan wiþig.
 18. Þonne an ic twega wæna gang on clætinc to wuduredenne a
on ece.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 697 (Birch 1072)
B15.8.340.
Bounds, Sawyer 697: Birch 1885-99, no. 1072.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to wiþilea.
 1. Ærest on ucing ford.
 1. Of þam forda on gerihte to þam smalan wege.
 2. Forð on þone weg to poddan beorge.
 3. Of þam beorge to wiþig slæde.
 3. Of þam slæde on gerihte to brocenan beorge.
 4. Of þam beorge to wudu forda, of þam forda on gerihte to
lulles beorge.
 5. Of þam beorge forð andlang herpoþes to cynulfes treowe.
 6. Of þam treowe on gerihte to mægen stanes dene.
 7. Of þære dene on þone weg to wiþilea gate.
 7. Of þam gate forð be þære dic eft to ucing forda.
 9. Þis is þæra feower hyda land boc æt Wiþiglea þe
Eadgar cing hæfð gebocod Cenulfe on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 698 (Birch 1075)
B15.8.341.
Bounds, Sawyer 698: Birch 1885-99, no. 1075.



 1. Ðis sind þara III hida land gemæra to hamstede.
 1. Ærest of suðeweardan fif æceran on þ riþe on þa
uuiþigas of þan uuiþigan on heafod stoccas þanan andlang hagan to
gæcce lege estewearde þanan andlang hagan on Riscmere þanan to beonat
lege þær mercweg ut scet þanan andlang weges on gecceleage þanan
andlang uueges to þan forda of þan forda andlang hagan þ eft to fif
æceran.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 699 (Birch 1068)
B15.8.342.
Bounds, Sawyer 699: Birch 1885-99, no. 1068; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemære to Afintune.
 1. Ærest on þa ealdan byrig.
 2. Of þære ealdan byrig andlang stremes on ðonon langan
forda.
 3. Of þam langen forda innon þa dic.
 3. Andlang þære dic east innon waddene of waddene andlang
þære rode innon syx æceres.
 4. Of syx æceræn of þæren uferen legæ.
 5. Of þam uferan lege ut þurh þona wuda on þa readan hane.
 6. Of þaræ readan hane andlang mearce on þone mapoldra
stoc.
 7. Of þam stocce ut þurh þone wudæ on þa fulan flode.
 7. Of þære fulan flode andlang dæne on higan holtes dic.
 8. Of higan holtes dic on þa hocedan dic.
 9. Of þære hocedan dic andlang mearce on þa hwitan dic.
 10. Of þære hwitan dic andlang smalan dune on þone
herpað.
 10. Of þam herpaðe andlang mearce to ðam hæþænan
byrigelsan.
 11. Of þam hæþenan byrigelsan andlang mearce eft on ða
ealdan byrig.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 702 (Birch 1085)
B15.8.343.
Bounds, Sawyer 702: Birch 1885-99, no. 1085.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land gemæro to sunnanbyrig.
 1. Ærest on sunnan hyg þanon andlang streames on crudan
scypsteal þanon ofer ða mæde on eclesbroc &lang broces on ða
mearcdic.
 3. &lang dices on hwæte dene norðewearde of hwæte dene
on þa oðre mearcdic &lang dices on cottes hyrste westewearde of cottes
hyrste on riscmere of riscmere on eadbryhtes hlæw.
 6. Of þam hlæwe on þone ellen stub ðonon on mearcwill of
mearcwille on duddes byre on þone clofenan beorh of þam beorhge on sunnan
hyg.
 8. And her hyrdð to tynn gyrda of þære mæde to halgan
forde & ælce geare into sunnanbyrig of burhwuda fiftig foðra wudes
& fiftig swina mæsten.
 11. Þis is þara X hida land boc æt Sunnanbyrig ðe Eadgar
cyning gebocode ælfhege his mæge on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 703 (Birch 1082)
B15.8.344.
Bounds, Sawyer 703: Birch 1885-99, no. 1082.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæro to ceorles wyrðe.
 1. Of caforda andlang cwyrnburnan þ hit cymð to mannan mearce
þonne þanon andlang wealc hyrste forð be anan burnan þ hit cymð eft
on mannan mearce & on asan þonne þanon andlang heges þ hit cymð to
anre dene þonne swa forð þ hit cymð on þone burnan þe scyt to culan
fenne þonne swa forð andlang þæs burnan þ hit cymð to oswiðes
mearce & eadwoldes.
 7. Þonne forð andlang heges þe scyt of þam burnan þ hit
cymð to stræte swa forð andlang strete þ hit cymð inn on
mearcellan.
 9. Þonne forð andlang mearcellan þ hit cymð þær
cwyrnburna & mearcella sceotað togædere þonne forð andlang
cwyrnburnan þ hit cymð eft in on caford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 704 (Rose-Troup)
B15.8.345.
Bounds, Sawyer 704: Rose-Troup 1929, 251.



 1. Ætswurd leage.
 2. Þis is þæs hiwisces landgemære buton anon eahtoþan
dæle ætswurd lege.
 3. Ærest of cinges bricge ut on afne upon stream.
 4. Þær riþe ut scyt up on riþ to blacan pole.
 4. Of blacan pole on stan hyrst, of stan hyrste on þæs weges
bige þeliþ to beoccan bricge.
 6. Up on ealdan Wege to pentan mæde, þanon west on wege to
græwan stane.
 7. Þanon on wyrttrum oþ þa brocas to gædre sceotaþ adune
on stream to wealding forda.
 8. Þanon on manning ford on lanan oþ eorþburg.
 9. Þanon on dic oþ wulfwylles heafod on swurdleg wyll.
 10. Of swurdleg wylle on wagu fen, þanon on willerdes beorg
þanon eft to cinges bricge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 705 (Birch 1093)
B15.8.346.
Bounds, Sawyer 705: Birch 1885-99, no. 1093.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæro to mordune ærest on hig ford
of higforda andlang hreod burnan on uuorf andlang stremes on purtan ige uuest
werdne on purtan ige norþeuuerdan eft ut on worfe stream andlang streames on
wude bricge þanon ut on æsclace þær æsclace fylð ut on wuorf up
on gean stream on þæs langan furlanges eastende.
 6. Þanne east on þa ealdan dic of þære ealdan dic on
grinde wylles lace an furlang þanon on æt den pæn on þone ellen styb
þanon a be ecge on þa medenunga of þære medenunge niþer on þone
ealdan uuiþig on ættan pennes læce þonon on hortan ford of þon
forde on filican slæd.
 10. Andlang slædes on þone ealdan wylle þonne ut on headdan
dune slæd andlang slædes oð bradan weg of bradan wege andlang slades ut
on hag ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 706 (Birch 1083)
B15.8.347.
Bounds, Sawyer 706: Birch 1885-99, no. 1083.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæro to afene.
 1. Arest of þam.
 1. Ng cumb andlang cumbes on geferþes hlæw of þam hlæwe
andlang weges on þone bradan herpað of þam herepaðe on windryðe dic
of þære dic.
 4. Rinne adune on þone þorn of þan þorne andlang afene eft
on þone ealdan forda.
 6. Þis is þara VIII hida land.
 7. Afene þe Eadgar cyning gebocode Titstane his burþene on ece
yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 708 (Birch 1124)
B15.8.348.
Bounds, Sawyer 708: Birch 1885-99, no. 1124.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to þam IIII hida.
 1. To heast healle east be þam burnan ut oðða sæ &
from þære ealdan heðe ut oð mearc andlang dun & snæp.
 3. And scammandun & scortanwida in to east healle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 709 (Birch 1116)
B15.8.349.
Bounds, Sawyer 709: Birch 1885-99, no. 1116.



 1. This is thære anre hyde land boc æt monawyrhthyge the
eadgar cyng gebocade ælfrice his thegene on ece yrfe.
 4. This synd there are hyde land gemæru to Monawurthige ærust
an Monawurthiges ford.
 5. Of tham forda up on Strem an æstcumb.
 6. Of æstcumbe anriht gemære an Pendancumb up an Pendacumb to
therewille of than wille on riht gemære inan thene thyrlan æst of tham
æste in on Beocceles put of tham pytte on riht gæmære to tham
fægran wille of tham wylle on dune an stream to Codwæala forda.
 10. Of tham forda andune strema on smalabroc andland smalabroces to
Lihtenes forda of Lihtenes forda up on stream to Bectcelesstile of
Bectcelesstile on riht gemære an tha hola dic.
 13. Of there dic suth on thæne herpoth.
 13. Thenne and lad herpothes to Heantune suth weardon.
 14. Of Heuntune on riht gemære to thære bradan apulduran, on
geriht mære on thet hwite styb.
 16. Of than stybbe an clenan mor wæstwearne of clæne more
wæsteweardan an thane stream.
 17. Thanne up on stream.
 17. Eft on Monawyrthigesford and clæna mor eal intro
Monawurthige et Ruwa mor healf and seo læs on stoccum, & seo wurædden
on harhrycge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 710 (Birch 1115)
B15.8.350.
Bounds, Sawyer 710: Birch 1885-99, no. 1115.



 1. Ðis sant þe landimare to Archet of eldmannes wrthe on
irichte anlang hina imares to þan scamelen.
 2. From þanne scamelen anlang hine imares oð wdebrige.
 3. Of wudebricge, a dune anlang streames oð land scorforð.
 4. Of þane forde, anlang leouen imare oð kinghes imare.
 5. And gemare, oð funtemel forð of þanne forð.
 6. Adune mid stream oþes bissopes imare ut sceoþaþ.
 6. Þanen on irichte to þan lipgete.
 7. From þane gete on irichte to anne wonalre.
 8. Of þane alre, on irichte to sucgimade hauede.
 8. Of þane hauede on irichte þurch ðene holte to Wlgares
imaren.
 9. Of þan imaren eft on eldemanneswyrde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 711 (Birch 1099)
B15.8.351.
Bounds, Sawyer 711: Birch 1885-99, no. 1099.



 1. Þis synt þa land gemæra to Stantune.
 1. Ærest on wynlmæddune west heafod þ on þa ealdan dic.
 2. Þ upp on wineces burug.
 3. Þanne of þære byrig þweofer þane sceagan.
 3. Þonne forð a be wyrit truman þ on wodnes dic.
 4. Þanne of wodnes dic on þa byrug norðewearde andlang
gemæres þ innan corsan.
 5. Þonne upp andlang broces on þ swelgend.
 6. Þonne suð andlang broces.
 6. Þ on þa dic.
 7. Þ andlanges dic on þane bæð herpað.
 7. Þ west andlanges herpaðes þ eft on wulmæddune west
heafod.
 8. Þonne is binnan þam tyn hydun ælfsiges þridde healfe
hide.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 712 (Birch 1112)
B15.8.352.
Bounds, Sawyer 712: Birch 1885-99, no. 1112.



 1. Dys synt dara XX hyda Landgemara to scireburnan ðæt
inlandes.
 2. Arest on sude yfardan þ est andlang brotty on done herepoð
nord andlang weges to scearpan brycge.
 3. East danan andlang sledes þ hit cinð on done weg &
healfe hide on hibaldes tofte & ane hide on frysse tune on hillum twegra
oxena gang.
 5. And on on Lundby twegra oxena gang & dridde healfe hyrde on
mysen forda & on stiuetune & on miclan felda II hyda land fy & lal
luttringham butan anre hide & oder healf hyde on fentune & odre healf
hyde on kawuda & eal þ lid de derto gebired andlang usun ge tyfonan weorf
& dacy on wuda & on weter & on felda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 713 (Birch 1121)
B15.8.353.
Bounds, Sawyer 713: Birch 1885-99, no. 1121.



 1. Erest at sunemannes wyrðige on of þam wyrðige on gerihte
on þa heafud stoccas.
 2. Of þan heafod stoccum on þone rugan hlinc niþewearde.
 3. Þonon on gerihte on bryxstanes garan suþeweardan of þam
garan on duddes dene.
 4. Of þere dene on þone ealdan garan suðewearden.
 5. Þonon on ge rihte on þa bradan stanas of þan stanun on
hodan hlæw.
 6. Of þan hlæwe on hremnes byrig westwardon of hremnes byrig
on lea cumb.
 7. Þonon rihte andlang streames þ on tealeburnan.
 8. Andlang tealeburnan þ on þa riþe.
 9. Andlang riðe on þone þorn stub on bulan dic.
 9. Andlang dices on þæs cinges scypena.
 10. Of þan scypenum on þ riscbed.
 10. Of þan riscbedde on þæs cinges þornas.
 11. Þonon on gerihte on þ bean furlang.
 12. Þonon on snelles ufeweardan.
 12. Of snelles lince.
 12. Þ eft on sunemannes weorðig.
 14. And þær hyrð in an hyrde wic æt bada lacing & an
hid landes & XII æceras mæde & an miln æt hyrde grafe.
 15. And XII æceres landes.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 714 (Birch 1125)
B15.8.354.
Bounds, Sawyer 714: Birch 1885-99, no. 1125.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæra to Wasingatuna ærest of
horninga dene to bennan beorges þonon ealdan cristesmæle.
 2. Of þam cristes mæle to blacan pole.
 3. Of þam pole to dunnan heafde.
 3. Þonon to hunnes cnolle to geoc burnan þonon to dunham lea.
 4. Of þam lea to Readdan wylle of þam wylle to lidgeardes
beorge þonne to tatemannes beorgelese of þan beorgelse to haþe burge
hlawe þanne up to þære stan erigan.
 7. Of þære stan erigan to wyrum stealle þonon to
heregræfen.
 8. Of heregrafan west to twam þornne þonon to Remnes dune.
 9. Of þære dune to scortan dene þonon to wigan campe.
 10. Of wigan campe eft on horninga dene.
 11. Þonne sind þis þa den bæra.
 11. Aerest wynburge spear þonne se westra crochyrst.
 12. Þonne oðer croc hyrst þonne þridda crochyrst þonne
horsham þonne yfeles leah þonne heaseluuic.
 13. Þonne gate wic.
 14. Þonne ridan fald þonne scacel uuic þonne hunreding fald
forð oð hrycg.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 715 (Birch 1118)
B15.8.355.
Bounds, Sawyer 715: Birch 1885-99, no. 1118.



 1. Ðis is þæra fif hida land boc to Peattanige eadgares
cinges on dege æfter dege to hebbanne & to sellanne þam þe him
leofust sie.
 4. Ðis synd þara V hida land ge mæro to Pittanige.
 4. Ærest on luling of luling on crawan mor of crawan more on
wiðig mære upp of þam mære andlang broces on cnihta bryc of þam
brycge on wanwyl of wan wylle on stoc broc andlang broces on merh dæne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 716 (Birch 1113)
B15.8.356.
Bounds, Sawyer 716: Birch 1885-99, no. 1113.



 1. Ðis sint þ land gemaera to niwebotle.
 2. Aerest sudweard yes de semaere to seurtre bouan yest wid anes
þornes þonan nord to þan broce & ilc oder acra be fastan hode.
 4. Of þan broce þ est to þan dice andlang dices to elfredes
bricge þonne nord to ysemere & þonan to saxferdes lawe of saxferdes
lawa nord on þa dic &lang dices on þene sic &lang sices be þere
acera anheafda on þa strete of þere strete east onan up one yalde be nordan
faryisdal.
 8. On þa ealdan dic andlang dices to brusun lawa of rusun lawa
andlang þes Greneweges þaet hit cynð to fif lawan & þonne sud
&lang þe sor Deoppendala.
 10. Sud andlang dene up to þan wege andlang weges to þins
housum þon swa ford andlang weges þ eft to saer irtre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 717 (Birch 1101)
B15.8.357.
Bounds, Sawyer 717: Birch 1885-99, no. 1101.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæra to fænge.
 1. Ærest of rum fleotes muðan oð bifleot þonne andlang
ælfwenne mearce oð ða stræte þonne east andlang stræte oð
alfwoldes mearce norð.
 3. &lang alfwoldes mearce oð done herpað þanan east
andlang herpaðes oð ða brycge fram þære brycge norð andlang
stræte oð duddes hyrnan þonne east on cyneferðes mearce suð.
 6. &lang mearce oþ byrhtferðes mearce andlang mearce suð
innon þone fleot be eastan þon æschus andlang fleotes þ eft on rum
fleot.
 8. And se wuda æt tettincgleage.
 9. Þis is þara VII hida land boc æt Fengge.
 9. Þe Eadgar cyning gebocode Ingerame.
 10. His þegne on ece yrfe Latine.
 11. Ðas boc sealde Ingram mid lande Dunstane arcebisceope.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 718 (Birch 1114)
B15.8.358.
Bounds, Sawyer 718: Birch 1885-99, no. 1114.



 1. Þis is þara VIII hida boc æt embresham.
 1. Þe eadgar cing gæbocode gode & sanctæ andree in to
meone on ece yrfæ.
 4. Ðis synt þa land ge mero to æmbresham þara VIII hida
ærest on ummanig of ummanig on mearcdene.
 5. Of mearcdene on þone ealdan fald.
 6. Of þam ealdan falde on manning stan.
 6. Of þam stane on gyldesburnan.
 7. Of þam burnan on ultres denu of þære denu on id hilde
stan.
 8. Of þam stane on woburnan.
 8. Of woburnan on fearndun.
 9. Of fearndune on bunning fald of bunning falde on æcscfald.
 9. Of æscfalde on smeagel hyrst of smeagel hyrste on wufincg
fald.
 10. Of wufincg falde.
 11. On sihter wic.
 11. Of sihter wic on slywhyrst of slywhyrste on umman ig.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 721 (Birch 1104)
B15.8.359.
Bounds, Sawyer 721: Birch 1885-99, no. 1104.



 1. Þis beth þe landmere.
 2. Erest of þan welle þaron otheri endlang stremes on þe
redecliue northward þare op on ame put of þan putte on an withi of þan
withi on an stonberwe.
 4. Of þan berwe est up on þe rigge on hothurne stanberwe
þanen to þan herpoþe endelang herpoþes on þe stanbrugge þar up on
landscherlake on holangcombe heued þanen up on dich.
 7. Þanen on midde þe doune endlang doune on iffingknap medeward
þanen on iffingberlake of þer lake on þe dich of þan dich on þe ifre
northward eft on þe welle endlang rewe þare eft on otheri.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 722 (Birch 1123)
B15.8.360.
Bounds, Sawyer 722: Birch 1885-99, no. 1123.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to Hocan edisce.
 1. Ærest ut on beonan feld.
 2. On oran weg.
 2. Of oran wege on þone ealdan heafod hagan of þan hagan on
fearn fled healf wuda on fearn felda þat sticað on temese andlang temese
þat hit cymþ to þam stoccan andlang furan on esæawa ford up andlang
furan on þone grenan weg of on beonan feld.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 723 (Birch 1119)
B15.8.361.
Bounds, Sawyer 723: Birch 1885-99, no. 1119.



 1. Her his eastunes boc & plesces.
 2. Ærest on diuwuces pæþe on lil sætna ge mære.
 2. Andlang brocæs on eotan ford of eotan forda on þone gretan
alr.
 3. Of þam alre on ðone micclan dic.
 4. Of þam dice on þa haran dene.
 4. Of þære haran dene in þone deopan mor andlang midles
þæs mores in æslicæs ford.
 6. Of æslices forda andlang mores on hina ge mæra.
 7. Of hina ge mæro on þa þreo dicas.
 7. Of þam dican in þæne longan þorn.
 8. Of þam þorne in þæs dices geat of þæs dices geate
on þa bradan ræne.
 9. Of þære bradan rære on mærsic of mærsice on mær
dic.
 10. Andlang mærdices on wig gerdes treo.
 10. Of wig gerdes treo þæt æft on diowuces peþ.
 12. Ðær æfter synt þa land ge mæro to plesc.
 12. Ærest of plæsc in þone broc.
 13. Of þam broce in þæl bricge.
 13. Of þæl bricge to þære heh stræte.
 14. Of þære heh stræte to strea wyllan.
 14. Of strea wellan to þam litlan dice.
 15. Of þam dice to hare dæne.
 15. Of hare dene to þam stan hifete.
 16. Of þam stan hifete upp.
 16. To þam heþe of þam æþe to þam sice andlang sices
to mæne lege.
 17. Of mæne lege to þam broce.
 17. Of þam brocæ þæt æft in plesc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 724 (Birch 1142)
B15.8.362.
Bounds, Sawyer 724: Birch 1885-99, no. 1142.



 1. Þis sind þara X hida land gemæra to henna Riðe.
 2. Ærest on þane litlan wyl of þan wylle on Rypelme hlau of
þam hlauue andlang heafde þæt hit cymð on þæt heafod lond on west
healf ðrym beorgan.
 4. Þonne of ðan heafod londe on þon gratan ðorn styb.
 5. Of þam stybbe on læce mære.
 5. Of þam mere on wanetinge brog andlang broces þæt hit
cymð to þære dic to stifingehaeme ge mæra.
 7. Andlangan heafdan estweard þ hit cymð to þæs
ealdormonnes gemære þonon suð andlang heafdu þ on risc broc.
 9. Þwyres ofer risc broc andlang heafdan þat hit cymð on
lacynge broc on þon lytlan wyl.
 10. Andlang broces on þone oðerne wyl þonne suð andlang
heafda on abban byorh.
 11. Andlang heafda on blacan hylle suðe wearde of þære hylle
west twa furlang to þan heofd land.
 13. Andlang heofd þ hit sticað on ðære dic andlang broce.
 14. West andlang broces eft on þone litlan wyl þær ic ær
on feng.
 16. Seo mæd is on west healf waneting þe ge bureð ing to
ðan X hidan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 725 (Birch 1143)
B15.8.363.
Bounds, Sawyer 725: Birch 1885-99, no. 1143.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to east tune.
 1. Ærest of hacce broce on rugan dic þonne andlang weges on
þone fulan forda of þan fulan ford on eanulfing þorn of þam þorne on
þone hwitan holan weg of þan hwitan hwege andlang langan dune þæt est
on þone stanihtan weg of þan wege on þone crundel.
 5. Þonon on geritha on brochylle slæd of ðan slade on hiccan
ðorn þonon ofer bleo byrig dune on hæcceleas dic þonne andlang
þære dic þæt eft on hæcce broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 726 (Birch 1134)
B15.8.364.
Bounds, Sawyer 726: Birch 1885-99, no. 1134.



 1. Ærest of usmere on heasecan beorh of ðan beorhge on
cuðredes treow.
 2. Of ðan treowe on þa dic andlang dic ðæt on sture.
 2. Ðonne of sture ðæt eft on ða dic andlang dic ðæt
on horsa broc andlang broces on cenunga ford of ðan forda utan wið ðone
wudu ðæt to cynefares stane.
 5. Of ðan stane on hoccan stige of ðære stige on on mær
wylle.
 6. Of ðæm wille on ða dic andlang dic on sture.
 6. Of sture on mær dene andlang dene to windofre.
 7. Of windofre on ðone stapol of ðan stapole on ðone weg.
 8. Andlang weges in ðæt slæd of ðæm slæde on litlan
dune andlang weges þæt eft on usmere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 727 (Birch 1127)
B15.8.365.
Bounds, Sawyer 727: Birch 1885-99, no. 1127.



 1. This is the landmarke to æystone.
 2. Ærest on semnit, of semnit on kefle wirtrim, of than wirtrim
on mileborne, and thanne on fieltham, of than hamme andlang wereforersdone on
cranmere.
 4. Of than mere on metoldes wille, and thanne on clenansticche, of
than sticche on hassukesmor, of than more on holenbrok, thannen on lechmere
thanne on rodestan.
 7. Of than stan on bereburne, of than burne on bis, of bis on
mealm, than on alleburne, thanen on fromesetinga hagen, of than hagen on
wuntfeld, and thanen on burgredes rode.
 9. Of thare rode on marcbrok, and thanen on lambbrok, and thanen on
haranmere, and thanne on leofede hagen, on bys, of bis on tibbenforde, an
thanne on hulpryngmor and thanne on hapeldure hille, of thare hulle on markbrok
eft on semnit.
 14. This is the land mark on mideltone on ælferes forde, of than
forde on than meddyk, and thanen on than north lang dyk, and of thare dyk, on
sevenburges, of sevenburges on hengestes doune.
 17. Of thare doune, on heige weye, of than weye on markescoumbe, of
markescoumbe to the swiran, of than swiran on alenthorn, of than thorne eft on
than mede.

END_TEXT

 1. Þis is þara fiftig hyda land ge mæra to merchamme
ærest of eoccan on mæne mor of mæne moere up on hwite more.

 3. Of hæuokes hamme.

broc of þæn broce on þone pæð.
 5. Of þane paþe on þone ealdan hege of þan ealdan hæge
on pyrtan more of pyrtan more þæt eft on eoccan.

Ch 737 (Birch 1189)
B15.8.368.
Bounds, Sawyer 737: Birch 1885-99, no. 1189.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæru to Hlincgelade.
 1. Of lincgelade andlang ea to yttinga forda.
 2. Of þam forde andlang stræte to tumbaldes treowe.
 3. Of þane trewe andlang strete on þone midlestan hlaw.
 3. Of þanne hlawe andlang stræte to seofan hlawan.
 4. Of seofan hlawan to þan anum hlawe.
 5. Of þan anum hlawe to bærlice crofte to þan up heafdan.
 6. Of þan up heafdan on mær dene midde wearde to þan
riþige of þan Riþie be þæra æcera heafdan to þan ealdan dic.
 7. Andlang dices eft innan þa ea.

Ch 738 (Birch 1176)
B15.8.369.
Bounds, Sawyer 738: Birch 1885-99, no. 1176.



 1. Þis sint þa gemæru to niwanhamme Cattan ege into niwan
ham of þam hæþnan birigelsan up andlang dic innan mær wege up andlang
mær wege þæt up on wearddune þær þæt cristel mæl stod of
þan up on þa readan slo oþ þære ealdan byrig of þære readan slo
on þæt crundel þær se haga utligeþ.
 5. Of þan crundelle innan mid slæde andlang mid slædes on
þa grægan hane of þære grægan hane andlang hearp dene on cealfa
leage neoþe wearde of cealfa leage a be hagen & be þan ealdan wege in
on þ bec siþþan andlang beces on tæmese andlang ea on cattan ege.
 10. Þis is ðara X hida land boc æt Niwanham þe Eadgar
cyning gebocode Aelfgife his magan on ece yrfe.

Ch 740 (Bates)
B15.8.370.
Bounds, Sawyer 740: Bates 1899, 48.



 1. Ðis sindon þa land mere.
 1. Erest of eschforda on clegwey, þanne on eorich miþe up on
streame.
 2. Oþ cytanford þanne on þeodnesfeld, upward oþ eorich.
 3. Enlang streames oþ earn, þanne norþ on mor.
 4. Of more up on stanborg a dun on earn.
 5. Enlang earn on yle up on yle oþ eschford.

Ch 743 (Birch 1188)

 1. Erest of þare forþan strete north on þan braden strete
þanen on þe estlange dich þanen þan ristes ouer Care forde bi Middel
hithe est on estlange dich þanen on þe northlange dich north bi more on
þe greine wei, þanen on þe estlange dich þare on þe southlange dich
to south more.
 5. Þanen on þe westlange dich endlang þere dich on leine

on þare for þan strete.

Ch 744 (Birch 1186)
B15.8.372.
Bounds, Sawyer 744: Birch 1885-99, no. 1186.



 1. Ðis sanden þe land imaren at uppidele.
 1. Of pidelen streame, on hlosstedes crundles suð ecge of þane
crundle, on þat mere sled.
 3. Of þat mere slede on ðeo herepaþe.
 3. Anlang herepaþes, on mearhhilde mere.
 4. Of mearhhilde mere, on þane haþene berielese on midde þane
punfald, of þanne punfalde, on pidelenstream.
 6. Of pidelenstreme anlang burnstowe on gretenlinkes.
 6. Suth ecge of þane gretenlinke, on chellenberghe, þ eft on
pidelen streame.
 8. And se made be frome þat to þanne tune ibereth.

Ch 747 (Birch 1196)
B15.8.373.

 1. Þis bet þe landmere.

west on slade edichs southward þanen on benanberwe þanen on trdmere endlang
ridde north biweste hoppinge ouer þane Mersh on þe rigt on ruanmere.
 4. And þanne est bi wimbedounyngemerke on þer hop bi north
bradenforde on hidebourne and þanne south endelang bournin bi michamingemerke
þar eft on merke pol.

Ch 748 (Birch 1199)
B15.8.374.
Bounds, Sawyer 748: Birch 1885-99, no. 1199.



 1. Ðis is þara V hida land boc æt eastune þæ eadgar
cing gebocode ælfsie his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Þis syndon þa land gemæro þara V hida æt Eastune.
 4. Ærest on þone crundel on þone ellen stub.
 4. Þanan on ge rihte on þa smalan þornas.
 5. Bæ norþan hodes mære.
 5. Þonon ongerihte on bulemæres þorn þonon on ge rihte on
þa ealdan dic andlang dices on þone stubb þonon on ge rihte andlanges
furh on bremel þornan on ða ealdan dic andlang dices on þone ealdan
stoc.
 8. Þonon on ge rihte be þam heafdan þanan on þone ealdan
weg.
 9. Þonne on þæt lege on þone wiðig.
 10. Þonon on ge hrilte on risc leage on þa riðe.
 10. Þonon upp on þone mære þanon on ge rihte be ðam
heafdan upp andlanges fyrh.
 12. Æft be þam heafdan andlanges furh on ðone smalan gare
andlanges fyrh on þa ealdan dic of þære dice on þone holan broc
þæt on west wellan forð.
 14. Andlanges weges on ðone hege andlanges heges on ða dic upp
on þone hyl þonne æft on þone crundel.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 751 (Birch 1201)
B15.8.375.
Bounds, Sawyer 751: Birch 1885-99, no. 1201.



 1. Ærets of bucgan stræt on ða ealdon dic.
 2. Of þære ealdan dic a æfter furan on rischriðig.
 3. Of rischriðie eft æfter furan on turf leo.
 4. Of turfhleo æfter heafdan eft andlang fur on pyde wyllan.
 5. Of pydewyllan andlang weges to þam þeof denne.
 5. Þ eft on bucgan stræt.
 6. Of þære stræt andlang fura on hengestes broc.
 6. Andlang brokes on fildena wyllan.
 7. Of fildena wyllan a andlang furan oð hit cymþ eft on bucgan
stræt.

END_TEXT

 1. Ærest on bradan lege.

 3. Þanon on hlosham suþewerdne.
 3. Þæt land to þære mearce.
 3. And twa cilling hop.

Ch 754 (Birch 1200)
B15.8.377.
Bounds, Sawyer 754: Birch 1885-99, no. 1200; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is seo boc æt meone.
 2. Ðis synt þa land gemera to Meone.
 2. And to Fearnfelda.
 2. Þara æahta hida æræst þær Seolesburna sliht on
Meone.
 3. Of Meone.
 3. Andlang herepaðes on wores sol.
 4. Of wores sole.
 4. On weawan þorn.
 4. Of weawan ðorne on crute brace leage.
 5. Of þære leage on scyteres flodan.
 5. Of scyteres flodan on hriscmere.
 6. Of þam mere on ðone twisledan beam.
 6. Of þam twisledan beame on ceorla geat of ceorla geate on
ðone hagan æt hæð burge dene & lang mearce on þa twisledan ac
of þære æc andlang dene on coggan beam of coggan beame on wytleahe.
 9. Of wytleage to brunes hamme of brunes hamme andlang mearce to
read lefan becan.
 11. Andlang mearce on cealf hanggran of þam hanggran on þorn
wic.
 12. Of þornwycan to wryteles ðorne.
 12. Of ðam ðorne to lyne stede of lyne stede on mearc beorh of
þam beorge on ðone stapol.
 13. Of ðam stapole on clenan ford.
 14. Of ðam clenan forda & lang seolesburnan eft ut on Meone.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 755 (Birch 1197)
B15.8.378.
Bounds, Sawyer 755: Birch 1885-99, no. 1197.



 1. Ðis is þara III hida landgemæru æt lesmanaoc.
 1. Ærest up of worð alaw andlang riðe agean stream to hryt
eselt þonne suð &lang riðe to crouswrah þonne forð suð to
cestell merit fram cestell merit to crucou mereðen.
 4. Þonne east ageriht to lein broinn þonne to hryt catwallon.
 5. Þonne adun andlang cendefrion oð þa lytlan riðe.
 5. Þonne up andlang riðe to fonton gen fram fonton gen
&lang dices to þan herepaðe þanon aðan lytlan dic to þan miclan
dice.
 7. Þonne for on þa dic to fos no cedu þonne adun &lang
riðe eft to werd alau.
 9. Þonne is þis þæs anes æceres landgemæru æt
pennarð ærest fram sæ &lang dic to þa riðe.
 10. Þonne andlang riðe eft on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 756 (Birch 1213)
B15.8.379.
Bounds, Sawyer 756: Birch 1885-99, no. 1213.



 1. Ærest fram bedeuuindan to haran grafan norþeuueardan up
æt þære dices geate æt harandene forð þonne be uurt walan
þær se haga ut cymð be þam wyrt walan to pædes paþe þonone
wið helmes treowes þonne on æmbrihtes gæt.
 4. Þonne wið stæt gætes þonne on hundan dene
neoþewærde þone wið hoces byrgels.
 6. Þonne on hwitan hlinces.
 6. Þonon on abban crundel.
 7. Þonon on þa swelgende þonan on penderes clyf foreuueard an
on wæluueg.
 8. Þonne wið þære eorðbyrig.
 8. Þonne wið byr bæces þonne wið ig felda þonne wið
bydan hammes.
 9. Þonne wið Rodleage meres.
 10. Þonne to sæl gæte þonne to bræcdene geate.
 10. Þonne to wælles mære.
 11. Þonne to gemot leage eastewearde þonne ut to bradan leage
þær Cuðhardes pæð ut ligð.
 12. Þonne on baggan geat þonne on heað feld geat.
 13. Þonne on þone hleadreadan beam þonne on harmmes dene geat
þonne on hors heal gæt ut on beocces heal þanon to Beduuindan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 757 (Birch 1222)
B15.8.380.
Bounds, Sawyer 757: Birch 1885-99, no. 1222.



 1. Ðis sind þa land ge mæra to Cumenoran.
 1. Ærest of stirigan pole to þære dic &lang dices
infyrde a be mære on temese andlang temese on wadleahe.
 3. Of wad leahe þæt on þa ealdan dic.
 3. Andlang þære dic on feower gemæra.
 4. Of IIII gemæra on Ruhan leahe.
 5. Of ruhan leah on þone haran stan.
 5. Of þan stane þæt on wase.
 6. Of wæse eft on stirigan pole.

Ch 758 (Birch 1221)
B15.8.381.
Bounds, Sawyer 758: Birch 1885-99, no. 1221.



 1. Ðis is þara XXV hida landboc æt fifhidan ðe eadgar cyng
gebocede gode and sancta marian in to abbandune on ece yrfe.
 4. Ðis synd þara XXV hida landgemæra to fifhidan ærest of
eoccan on seortan dic of sceortan dic on ælfþryðe dic &lang dic on
þæne mor.
 6. Of þam more on ða ealdan dic of þære dic on temese
streame on þ riðig &lang riðiges on wase of wasan on cyddesige ofer
rigedune on wattes wege.
 9. Of þæm wege on mæne mor.
 9. Of ðam more þ eft on eoccan.

Ch 759 (Birch 1224)
B15.8.382.
Bounds, Sawyer 759: Birch 1885-99, no. 1224.



 1. Ðis sind þa land gemæra to Hanige.
 1. Ærest on þa ealdan dic æt þæm heafod stoccan
&lang dic on waneting þ &lang streames on þone readan mære on
cylle riþe þonne went it ðær est þ &lang streames oð hit scyt
on oeccene þ &lang oeccene oð hit scyt on ealdan wæneting.
 5. Þonne went it dær uuest &lang stræmes oð hit scyt
on snoddan fleot midde weardne þonne went hit þ west on þa heafda þ hit
cymð on þone smalan weg þ endlang weges oð hit gæð eft on þa
ealdan dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 760 (Birch 1225)
B15.8.383.
Bounds, Sawyer 760: Birch 1885-99, no. 1225.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra æt Oran.
 2. Ærest of wintermere &lang riht gemæres on hær
graf.
 2. Þonan andlang hagan ut þurht bradan lea þ on ða heofd
stocces þonan on weal cotes leahe norð wearde þonan andlang hagan on
sandan dene þonon on bysceopes weg andlang weges eft on winter mære.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 761 (Birch 1227)
B15.8.384.
Bounds, Sawyer 761: Birch 1885-99, no. 1227.



 1. Þis sind þa land gemæra to Boxoran ærest æt Uuines
treowe þ andlang herpaðes to dene pytte þanon up on æscmæres hammas
suþeuuearde of þam hammun andlang mearce ut on þone hæðfeld
easteuuardne þ ut on lindene norþeuuearde þanon andlang mearce on weocan
þorn.
 5. Of þam þorne þ andlang mearce on lamburnan on clatford of
clatforda on meos broces heafod þ þanon to allan stapule.
 7. Þanon andlang her paþes ut on þone mersc þ a be mersce
to þam tune on þa hege ræwe þ on þa dic ut on þa burnan þanon ut
on þa blacan græfan.
 9. Of þære græfan on rinda crundel of þan crundle to
þrim þornan þ andlang weges eft on wines treow þær hit ær on
feng.

Ch 762 (Birch 1218)
B15.8.385.
Bounds, Sawyer 762: Birch 1885-99, no. 1218.



 1. Ðis sant þa land imare to Alderescumbe.
 1. Ærest of langan riple up be Wirtrume on Wlfgedyte.
 2. Of Wlfgedyte be Wirtrume.
 3. On deodewoldding lege suðeward of teoþewolding lege adune be
dich.
 4. Of þat dich, forðe be Wirtrime on heahstanes quabben, forð
be Wirtrime andlang riple at twelf akeres yrð landes be þe hege wege went
on putel made.

Ch 763 (Birch 1217)

 1. Ðis is þara XX hyda boc æt mordune þe eadgar cing
gæbocode eadwinæ his þægne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis syndon þa land ge mæra to Mordune.
 3. Ærest of headdan dune slade nyþær on hreodburnan andlang
burnan on stream.
 5. Andlang streames on foslace upp andlang foslace on þæra
æcera and heafda andlang þæra heafda on etta penn on þone ellen stub
þonon a be ecge on ða medemuncga of þære medemuncga beþer on þone
ealdan wiðig þonon on hnottan forð of ðam forda on þone ealdan wylle

Ch 764 (Birch 1214)
B15.8.387.
Bounds, Sawyer 764: Birch 1885-99, no. 1214.



 1. Þis beth þe landmere to stoure þare thritti hide.
 1. Erest op of stoure on trildoune vppe tril on landscher ford ouer
þane ford bi merehale on Conibrok of þan brok bi merehawe on wadeleighe
northward on stanwey.
 4. Of stanweie bi merehawe on deuelisch.
 5. Of defelich on stut þare on vppe stut on þar dich southward
be dich ouer sanddoune on filithleighe þanen on Holambrok of þan brok on
hedemchil/ þanen on Lideman bi lidenan on stoure on þan olde wested vp on
stoure on þer dich be dich on litegesheued.
 8. Of lutegesheued bi groue on minnanlinche þanen north bi heuede
þanen est to hedeswelle.
 10. Þanen bi sixe acres north an heued on þare þorn rewe
þanen on sand mor of þan more on smeryate by seuergate eft on stoure.

END_TEXT

Ch 765 (Birch 1215)
B15.8.388.
Bounds, Sawyer 765: Birch 1885-99, no. 1215.



 1. Edington, þis is þe landmark to Edyndon.
 2. Erest on Mulbourne ewelmen, of þan ewelmen on þan forde, of
þan forde to lechemere, of lecchemere natht fur cranmere, of þan mere, on
Woresotesdoune and andelang Milebourne on rodendich, of þare dich, on
rendburne, on hegweige, of hegweige, on moderancoumbe.
 6. Þanen on ymmanedene, of þare dune, on redeston, þanen nath
fur bodelusburgge, of þane burge, on agelesham, þannen on lusthorn, of
þan þorne, on lullyngestrowe.
 8. Þannene on higedune, of higedune, on rugeburwe, þanen on
padecanstan, of þan stone, on Mileburne ewilmen.
