Ch 766 (Searle)
B15.8.389.
Bounds, Sawyer 766: Searle 1894, 211-13; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1.1. Suð Niwetune.
 1.2. Ðis his þare landa boc þe Eadgar cyng gebocode Gode and
Sancta Marian into Wiltune, swa he hy ær forlet to Wulfðriðe, him to
ecere alysednesse.
 2.1. Þis sint þare x hida landgemære to Niwantune.
 2.1. Ærest, of ðare lace, up andlang Wilig on Stanford;
þanon up andlang þæs hwitan weges; of þan weige on þa dic, andlang
dic east on þone ealdan herpaðe.
 2.3. Of þone ealdan herpaþe ut on Afene, andlang Afene on þas
poles heafod.
 2.4. Þanon on Ættandenes norð hyldan swa seo ealda furh
scæt up to þam stænenan stapole, and swa west to þære ealdan
hlincræwe, and swa be þære yrðmearce nyþer to Higforda.
 2.7. Of þan forda est ofer Wilig on otores hol; of þam hole up
andlang Wilig; of Wilig on þa fulan lace; of þare lace ðwires ofer þa
dic west.
 2.9. Be þære dicheafde on Winding ford ufeweardne; þanon up
andlang þære westemyste lace; swa eft on Wilig.
 2.11. Ðis synt þara x hida landgemæra to Scearntune.
 2.11. Ærest, on Odenford; þanon on heandunsweoran
easteweardan, and swa up andlang wille weges.
 2.13. Þanon on Grimesdic andlang dic on Leofheres garan
westweardan; of þam garan on Bradanleage westeweardan.
 2.14. Þonon andlang hlinces to þam ealdan elebeme, and swa
forð to Wurdeslea middeweardne; and þonne on Mædenbeorge, and swa ut on
Wilig.
 2.17. Ðis synt þare xx hida landgemæra to Defereal.
 2.17. Ærest, of Defereal on þa ealdan dic, and swa andlang dic
to Langan beorge; þonon on þone herpað, andlang paþes on Pudelan ham.
 2.19. Þonon on Hean leage; þonon on Peocesham; of þam hamme
on landes wege; of þam wege on þa ealdan dic.
 2.21. Of þære dic on þone herpað; andlang paþes on Efer
beorhe; of _aðam beorge þanon eft on Defereal.
 2.23. Ðis synt þare x hida landgemære to Hwætincg le þe
hyrað into niwantune.
 2.24. Ærest, of þære sæ, andlang stiðes fleotes
heafod; of þam heafde on þa geclyppedan treowa; of þam treowan on
Heortlege; þanon on þa wylle.
 2.26. Þanon on þa ræwe on ðane haliganstan; þanon on
þære ealdan heort heges ræwe on Motbeorh; þanon on Hretes cumbes
heafde on þane limpyt.
 2.28. Þanon on Hreceleage middeweardre; þonon on Æscstede;
of Æscstede þanon eft on þa sæ.
 2.30. Ðys synt þare III hida landgemære to Fyrstes felda.
 2.30. Ærest of þam sceardan hweole, andlang hemede weges on
þone ealdan mapoldre; þonne on þa ruwan þirnan; þanon on þa oðre
on þæs heges byht.
 2.32. Of þæs heges byhte on Foxhyllæ; þonne west in on
ðone crundel; þanon on ðæne ealdan orcheard eal swa þe hege byhð
swa on ðaere herpæð.
 2.34. Andlang paðes on Dyre broc; of þam broce on þone wylman
on þitan wille;þanon on Hæsyl oran; þonne ut þurh þane holt on
þæt scearde hweol.
 2.37. Ðis synt þære III hida landgemære to Babanstoce.
 2.37. Ærest, of dic on Huna weg, andlang Huna weges on
Æscwylle; andlang Aescwylles ut on Nodre; up on Noddre on Luing lace oð
ðone ford.
 2.39. Þanan norð andlang dic on þa readan hane; þonon on
ealdan þorn; of þam þorne on haran wic westwearde.
 2.41. Þonon on haran apuldre; þanon on þa ealdan gemotewille;
þanon andlang dic; þanon eft on Huna weg.
 2.43. Þonne sealde Eadgar cing twa mylna on Wiltune into
þære stowe swa swa he hy aer Wulfþryþe geseald hæfde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 767 (Birch 1216)
B15.8.390.
Bounds, Sawyer 767: Birch 1885-99, no. 1216.



 1. Þis is þære twege hida boc ðe eadgar cynincg gebocode
gode and sancta marian into wiltune.
 3. Þis synt þare twega hida land gemæra þe Bliðher ær
hafde.
 4. Ærest of þam oter holan on hi ford.
 4. Of þam forda on þæne wotan hlinc þanon up andlang yrð
landes on þa ealdan dic.
 5. Andlang dic on ðæne stapol of þam stapole on attendene
ufewerde of þære dene innan avene on þæne greatan hlinc þonan on
morð crundel.
 8. Of morð crundele on þone bradan herpaþ.
 8. Þanon andlanges þæs smalan weges in on þ yrð land
þæt on ðæne þeod herpað on þæne chelc pyt.
 10. Of ðam pytte andlanges þære dic æt þæne ellen
styb of þam stybbe on wilig.
 12. An cyrche.
 12. And ane mylne.
 12. And her gebyriað of þære gemænan mæde XVI
æcyras.

Ch 770 (Birch 1231)
B15.8.391.
Bounds, Sawyer 770: Birch 1885-99, no. 1231.



 1. Ærest of penpoll lannmoren up bi þam broce oð hræt
winiau þonne forð andlang broces to pen hal þonne to maen wynn þonne to
oðrum pen hal þonne adune bi þam broce to sæ.
 4. Ðis sint þa gemæro to trefnæwð ærist fram fæle
on gerihte to penn beþow to þam pytte þonne on gerihte ofer þa læge
to þam oðrum pitte to tref celestes gemære þonne forð to caer uureh
þonne on gerihte to penn hal weðoc.
 7. Þonne to maenber þonne on gerihte to pen hal þonne forð
to carn winnioc þonne adune to pen hal þonne adune be þære riðe to
fæle.
 10. Ðis synt þa gemæro to tref celest þære are gyrde
æryst fram fæle þonne up bi þam broce to þæs wylles hæfde
þonne forð to caer lydan þonne to cayr uureh þonne lið þis
landgemære.
 12. To trefnewið lande.

Ch 771 (Birch 1230)
B15.8.392.
Bounds, Sawyer 771: Birch 1885-99, no. 1230.



 1. Ðis is þara XXX hidæ boc æt Witanigæ þæ Edgar
cing gæbocode elfhelmæ þis þægne on ece yrfe.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mero ðara XXX hida æt Wyttannige.
 4. Ærest of hafoces hlewe on wenrisc on þa wiðig rewe on
hnut clyf.
 5. Of þam clyfe on hean leage.
 5. Þ on lungan leage weg.
 5. Andlang weges.
 6. Þonne on swon leage þonne on swon weg.
 6. Andlang weges þ hit sticað on norðe weardum cynges
steorte.
 7. Ða non on suga rode.
 8. Andlang rode on huntena weg.
 8. Andlang weges þ hit sticað æt wic ham.
 9. Ða non a be wyrt wale on ofling æcer.
 9. Þo non on ealdan weg Andlang weges on cycgan stan.
 10. Of þam stane on þane grenan weg.
 11. Andlang weges.
 11. Þonne on yccenes feld.
 11. Of yccenes felda on ða hege rewe.
 12. Andlang hege rewe on met sinc.
 12. Andlang met sinces on ecgerdes hel ufeweardne æfter wyrt
walan on wenric andlang wenricces on fulan yge easteweardne.
 14. Þo non æfter ge mære on tidreding ford.
 15. Ðanon on occan slæw.
 15. Þa non on wittan mor suðe wearðne þo non on colwullan
broc of þam broce on þa ealdan dic.
 17. Of ðære dic on fugel sled of þam slede on þa stan
bricge.
 17. Æfter broce on þane ealdan weg of þam wege on horninga
mære ða non on wæredan hlinc suðeweardne þonan andlang slædes on
tycan pyt andlang broces on ða myþy of þas gemyþon on ceahhan mere.
 21. Ðanon on lythlan eorþbeorg of þære byrig on þa
onheafda of þas onheafdon on cytel wylle of ðas wylle on þa stret.
 22. Andlang strete on hafoces hlew of þam hlewe eft on hnut clif
ðer hit ær aras.
 25. And ðis is þæt med land þe þar to ge byrad æt
hengestes ige an & twentig æcra.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 772 (Birch 1229)
B15.8.393.
Bounds, Sawyer 772: Birch 1885-99, no. 1229.



 1. Ðis synt þa land gemæra to æpslea.
 2. Of hysse burnan on wendles dune eastewearde of wendles dune on
flitanhyll þanon on þone hwitan mor.
 3. And siþþan be fenne on þone heafod æcer oþ þone
lytlan hlaw þonon to þære apuldre þær þa þreo land gemæru
togædere gaþ.
 5. Woburninga & wafanduninga.
 6. And æpsleainga.
 6. Fram þam deorgæte ofer þone hæþ to þam cumbe
þonon ymbe westlea.
 7. Of þam lea on þone heafod æcer se is on æpsleainga
gemære on wafanduninga þonon.
 9. Andlang þære ealdan strate on dunnes hlaw.
 9. Þonon on þone ealdan ford on þæs fennes heafod andlang
fennes up on þære dune to þære blacan þyrnan to þam ealdan
stapole.
 11. Of þam stapole eall onbutan fotes eige of fotes eige in on
þone blundan ford andlang streames.
 13. Of þam streame on cranfeldinga dic.
 13. Of þære dic on þone ealdan coll pytt þær þa
þreo gemæru togædere gaþ.
 14. Crancfeldinga.
 15. And mercstuninga.
 15. And holacotan.
 15. Of þam þreom gemæron on þone ealdan mapuldre.
 16. Of þam mapuldre.
 16. On þone sidan healh.
 17. Of þam sidan heale a be þam heh hylte in on þone langan
þorn of þam þorne eft in on hysseburnan.
 18. Of hysseburnan.
 18. Eft in easteweardere wændles dune.
 20. Ðis is þara XV hida land boc.
 20. Æt æpslea.
 20. Þe eadgar cyning.
 21. Gebocade Alfwolde his leofan.
 21. Getreowan þegne a on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT

of ðære stræt in morþhlau of morþhlau on ðone fulan pyt.

Ch 777 (Birch 1257)

 1. Ðis synt þara X hida land gemære to Cliftune.
 2. Ærest afene stream healt þone norð ende.
 2. Of afene upp on smalancumbes broc.
 3. Þonne on æþelburge weg.
 3. Þonne upp on holan weg.
 4. Þonne of holan wege suð on ecge on Hygelaces get.
 5. Þonne on Tunnes treow.

 6. On horscumbes broc.

 7. Þonne suð rihte on Wodnes dic.
 7. Of Wodnes dic.
 7. On fosse streat andlang afene.
 8. Upp eft on smalen cumbes broc.

Ch 780 (Birch 1268)
B15.8.396.
Bounds, Sawyer 780: Birch 1885-99, no. 1268.



 1. Ðis synd ða land into Lintune.
 1. Ðe æðelferð geuðe his sunu Leofric.
 2. Þæt þonne lið hidmælum & æcermælum on
Wilburhtune.
 3. And on hædan ham.
 3. And on hylle.
 3. And on Wichamme.
 3. He hit gesealde ædgare cyninge un besacan.
 4. Eal swa hit his yldron ær mid feo gebohten.
 5. And se fore specena cyning hit gesealde Gode & sancte
æðeldriðe his saule to alysednesse.

Ch 781 (Birch 1269)
B15.8.397.
Bounds, Sawyer 781: Birch 1885-99, no. 1269.



 1. Ðis synt þara X hyda land gemæra æt Stoce þat is
þonne ærest of ðære hyðe andlang streames æt æscmannes yre
& swa forð on midde weardne stream þ hit cymð on brunnan.
 3. Swa forð on ðeofford & þannon on haligwylle on
healdenes ho.
 4. Of þæm ho on pottaforda on hagene forda brygge.
 5. Of hageneforda brygge on hore wade into merscmylne.
 6. Of merscmylne into þer brige.
 7. Ðis is ðræ X hyda land Boc ætstoce ðe ædgar
cyning ge bocade Gode and Sancte ædeldrede into Ely on ece yrfe his saule to
alysednesse ealswa ælfdryd hit ge ærndode his ge bedda.

Ch 782 (Birch 1270)
B15.8.398.
Bounds, Sawyer 782: Birch 1885-99, no. 1270.



 1. Þis syndon þa land gemæro to Baruwe.
 1. Ærest up of Humbre andlanges þere ealdan dic þæt it
cymeð to wyrðe.
 2. Fram wyrðe to Heope bricge.
 3. Fram Heope bricge to merce mot.
 3. Fram merce mote to Cumbre hole.
 4. Fram Cumbre hole to willum.
 4. Fram willum to micle hoh.
 5. Fram micle hohe to middel hille.
 5. Fram middel hille to mære dic.
 6. Swa andlang mære dic eft ut on Humbre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 784 (Birch 1285)
B15.8.399.
Bounds, Sawyer 784: Birch 1885-99, no. 1285.



 1. Þis his þære X hyda land boc æt vuertune þe eadgar
cyng ge bocvde ælflæde on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synt þa land gemæro ærest on þone chiricstede.
 3. Þonne of þam chiricstede innan strædford on þæt
ellen.
 4. Of þam ellenne on seofon beorgas.
 5. Of seofon beorgas innan colta beorg.
 5. Of colta beorg on þa twegen dunne stanas.
 6. Be estan colta beorg.
 6. Of þam stanes innan scrowes bytt.
 7. Of scrowes bytt be tweox II beorgas.
 7. And þær adun innan þone ford.
 8. Of þam forda innan þone dunnan stan wið foran þam burg
gete.
 9. Of þan stane up ofer scyfling dune on þone langan hlinc
eastewerdne.
 10. Of þam hlinche on ænne crundel.
 11. Of þan crundelle innan scyt hangran.
 11. Of scyt hangran on mere grafe eastewerdne.
 12. Of mere grafe on ers lege.
 12. Of ers lege on Eadgardes gete.
 13. Of Ecgardes gete on þone langan sceagan westeweardne.
 14. Of langan sceagan on þæt hæþene byrgils.
 14. Of þan hæþene byrgilse an lorta lea westewerdne.
 15. Of lorta lea eft on þone chiricstede.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 785 (Birch 1287)
B15.8.400.
Bounds, Sawyer 785: Birch 1885-99, no. 1287.



 1. Ærest on corsan stream up on þone ealdan stan weall suð
oðða hyrnan.
 2. Þanon west rihte oþ cildastan.
 2. Of cilda stane on merces burh norðwearde þonne west on þa
burh oðða west hyrnan þanne norþ on herepað oð þone ænlipigan
ðorn.
 4. West þanne on þone hrycg þ on þone ænlipian stan.
 5. Þanne norþrihte on mere mæde westewearde þanne rihte on
þone herepað oþ wifeles cumbes heafod.
 7. Þonne of þære suð ecge on æscwylle oð þ nehste
slæd.
 7. Þanne on stanwylles broc of dune on afene.
 8. Up on afene oð corsan.

Ch 786 (Birch 1282)
B15.8.401.
Bounds, Sawyer 786: Birch 1885-99, no. 1282.



 1. Dis sindon þa lond gemæra þæra tun londa þe into
perscoran belimpað.
 2. Ærest of piriforda on þa dic andlang dic on þa pyrigan of
þære pyrigan on þone longan apuldre of þam apuldre on deap morno
wyllan of ðære wyllan to þam hlæwe be ðære h to Bænincges
byrig/ of Bænincges byrig to wealh geate.
 6. Of wealh geate to mær cnolle of mær cnolle on lind hoh of
lind ho on clottes more of clottes more on mær pul ondlong pulles on afene
of afene on caldan wyllan of caldan wyllan on wyrð hlinc of wyrð hlinc on
hor/ pyt of hor pytte on culfran mere of þæm mere on hag broc hrycg.
 10. Of broc hrycge on þa ealdan dic of ðære dic on swyne of
swyne on reod dic of ðære dic on weorces mere of þære mere on þa
twycene of þære twycenan on þa hæsel ræwe ondlong streames on hor
wyllan of hor wyllan ondlong dic on Cymman leahe.
 13. Of ðære leahe on sæfern ondlong sæfern to ham stede
of ham stede on ropleah geat of ðæm geate ondlong dic þ on east mor
þær on þa rode of ðære rode on heaðeburhe weorðyg of ðæm
worðige.
 16. Ondlong hrycges to bysceopes swyn hege ondlong heges on beartan
weg of beartan wege on calfan leahe þ ondlong dic to hæð halan of
hæð halan on þa ealdan dic ondlang dic on piddes meres weg of þæm
wege on þa ealdan dic of ðære dic on wad beorgas of wad beorgan to þam
hlyp geate.
 21. Of ðæm geate on sealtan mere of þam mere on suð
mæduan of ðære mæde ondlong sices þ on yrse ondlong yrse on hwitan
dune of hwitan dune on lusðor of lusðorne on fulan pyt of þam pytte on
Beornwynne dene.
 24. Ondlong dene þ on hymelbroc æt wudu forda andlang broces
on oxan ers andlang sices to þan stan gedelfe of ðam stan gedelfe on þa
dic ondlong dic on hunigburnan andlang burnan þ on hymelbroc.
 27. Ondlang broces to beccan leahe on þa ealdan dic andlang
mær weges on ceafor leahe of þære leahe on þa heg stowe of ðære
heg stowe on hennuc.
 30. Andlong hennuc þ on þa ðorn ræwe eastrihte þ hit
cyme to þan rah hege æfter þam hege a be þam ofre þ eft on þa dic
þ on pidelan stream andlang streames on afene andlang afene þ eft on piri
ford.
 34. Þis sind þara feower tuna lond gemæra Wihtlafes tun
& Eadbrihtincg tun & niwan tun & ælflæde tun ærest of
pidelan on þa ealdan dic of þære dic andlang wura on þa heafda to
winter burnan.
 36. Of winter burnan on hina gemæran on þone ealdan weg of
þan wege on tittan dune of tittan dune on byligan fen of byligan fenne on
wixena broc ondlang broces on pidelan andlang pidelan þ eft on Wihtlafes
gemæra.
 41. Ðis sind þa lond gemæra into fleferð ærest of
þam ealdan slæde on winter burnan of þære burnan on þane swyn hege
andlang heges on Eomeres mæduan.
 43. Of þam mæduan on Hodes ac of þære æc andlang heges
to þæm wege andlang weges on winter burnan andlang burnan on Hereferðes
maduan þonan in þ sic of þæm sice in þæne cumb.
 45. Of þam cumbe on þa ealdan dic andlang dice in pidelan
andlang pidelan to bradan hamme abutan bradan hamme eft in pidelan andlang
pidelan eft to þæm slæpe.
 49. Þis sind þa lond gemæra to husan treo ærest of
þære stræt andlong dic to bradan forde andlang burnan on seale weorpan
ondlang seale weorpan to col forda.
 51. Of col forda andlang þære miclan dic on alr broc andlang
broces on ðeornan mor of þam more andlang dic on feower gemæra of
þæm gemæron to þorn lehe to þorn lehe andlang dic eft on þa
stræt.
 55. Ðis sind þæs londes gemæra into langan dune ærest
of sæfern on Wiferðes mæduan hege of þam hege on þone hricg of
þam hricge on þone wulf hagan midne of þam wulf hagan to þam ðrym
gemæran.
 58. Of þæm ðrym gemæran to pis brece of pis brece to
Tidbrihticg hamme of þan hamme on pyrt broc andlang broces to pyrtan heale of
peartan heal to hagan geate.
 60. Of hagan geate to twyforde of twyfyrde to lufbece of lufbece
betweonan dune of þære dune on hwitan cumb of þam cumbe on swyngeat of
swyngeate andlang ecge þ on hæðhricg of hæðricge on senetricg of
senetricge on secmor of secgmore on alr of alre on Orices pul of Orices pulle
ef on sæfern.
 66. Ðis sindan þa lond gemæra into Ceatewes leahe & to
Yldres felda & to Stantune & to Wynburhe edisce ærest of an burnan
to cumbran weorðe of cumbran weorþe to þære mæran æc of
þære æc to stanhlincan of stanhlincan to reade burnan of reade burnan
to healre mere.
 70. Of healre mere to þære æc of þære æc to hagan
leahe of þære leahe on secgbroc of secgbroce to þan hean dore of þan
dore to brydbroce andlang broces þ in glencincg.
 72. Andlang glencincg þ in ledene andlang ledene to mærbroce
of mærbroce to brycg geleagan of brycg geleagan on bradan ford on glencincg
andlang glencincg to blacan mores forda.
 75. Of blacan mores forda to þan halgan geate of þan halgan
geate to risc heale of hrisc heale to þam ho of þam ho a be wuda to þam
æsc of þam æsce to þære ecge of to bradan leahe of bradan leahe
to fæles græfe of fæles græfe to crampulle to þam mærhege of
ðæm hege on sæfern of sæfern eft on an burnan.
 81. Þis sindon þa lond gemæra into poincg wican ærest up
of sæfern on Beornwoldes sætan of Beorwoldes sætan on hagan geat of
hagan geate on secg lages strod of secg lahes strode on troh hrycg of troh
hrycge on Tecles mor.
 84. Of þam more on baldan rycg of baldan rycge on flotan rycg of
flotan rycge on þa smeðan ac of ðære æc on lindrycg of lindrycge on
abbandunes wican of abbandunes wican in baldan geat of baldan geate on cust
leahe.
 87. Of cust leahe in Eadwoldincg leahe middewearde of Eadwolding
leahe on steapan leahe of steapan leahe in ða greatan lindan of ðære
lindan on cardan stigele of þære stigele in wearman dene to hreod broc
geate of þam geate on wæðe burnan.
 91. Andlang wæðe burnan þ wiðutan þone snæd hege þ
to scirhylt geate of scirhylt geate on codran ford ondlang codran on croma þ
to ðære ealdan stræt ondlong ðære stræt to maw pul andlang
pulles on temedan andlang temedan eft in sæfern.
 95. Ðis sind þa land gemæra into Beornoðes leahe ærest
of Eadwoldincg leahe an æcer of þæm æce hege andlong mer on
sceanpan hyl of sceanþan hylle on wæðe burnan.
 97. Of þære burnan on gundenling rycg of þam rycge on codran
of codran to syl beame of syl beame to crome of crome to hwitan wyllan of
þære wyllan to hagan geate of hagan geate to þære blacan æc of
ðære æc on þa sand seaðas.
 101. Of ðam seaðan in temedel of temedel on þa lytlan becas
þanan e of Grindles bece swa þ gemære ligð in temedan of temedan
onbutan eldres ege þ eft in temedan andlang temedan þ eft in maw pul.
 105. Þis sind þa londgemæra into actune ærest on horsa
broc of horsa broce in heafod rycg of heafoc rycge on bilincgbroc of byling
broce in atleahe geat of atleahe geate in þa hlydan of þære hlydan in
bycera fald.
 108. Of bycera falde on sand ford of sand forda in scotta pæð
of scottan pæðe in gyslan ford of gislan forda on sond burnan of sond
burnan on scead wællan of scead wellan in lam seaþan of lam seaðan in
ledene of ledene in lin leahe.
 111. Of lin leahe in saltera weg of sealtera wege in hean ofer of
hean ofre in suð broc of suð broce in west broc of west broce in clæg
wyllan of clæg willan in æðelstanes graf of æðelstanes graue on
Hengestes healh of Hengestes heale eft in horsa broc.
 116. Ðis sind þara VII land gemæra into suð stoce ærest
of mæddene westeweardre on beaduc hyl andlang dene on badan pyt of þam
pytte on æsc wyllan broc andlang broces on afene andlang afene on broc
hardes ford.
 119. Of þam forda on swyn burnan of swyn burnan on funtnes burnan
of funtnes burnan on bremer leah of bremer lea andlang dene on stan leah of
stan lea on seonecan dene andlang dene on ehan feldes geat þonne on gate
wyllan.
 122. Of gate wyllan on cyncges crundlu of cyncges crundlan andlang
dene on risc mere of risc mere on æsc dene of æsc dene on hord dene of
hord dene on þone holan weg on luhinc wudu on fileð leahe.
 125. Of filet leahe on æðelan wyllan of þæm wyllan adune
on stream andlang streames up on hyrde wyllan of hyrde wyllan on cyninga
crundel of cyninga crundele on rycg weg andlang weges on þone stapol.
 128. Of þam stapole on þa hlydan of þære hlydan up andlang
streames of ðæm streame be heafdan þ on mihan lea easteweardne on þone
garan up andlang weges of þam wege be heafdan þ eft on mæd beorh.
 132. Þis sind þa land gemæra into deor hamme ærest of
sulan forda on loddra wellan þonon on byd.
 134. Yncel bi Abban grafe to bryde wyllan þ swa on eccan treo
þonon on miclan mædua þ on byd ðonne on Hygeredincg æceras &
swa bi clop æcere ufa in sulig cumb þonon on mus beorh þ swa to
æðeredes wellan ðonon on clæg weg be ciric stede þ swa bi sadol
hongran on fearn beorh wuda on gemær broc þ eft on sulan broc.
 139. Ðis sind þa land gemæra into beo leahe ærest of beo
leahe on cundincg æceras of cundincg æceran on fearn healas of fearn
healan on burh leahe of burh leahe on geahes ofer.
 141. Of geahes ofre on stan geat of stan geate on Wulferes wyllan
of þære wyllan on deawes broc of þæm broce on mapoldren geat of
þæm geate on Beardyncg ford of Bearding forda eft on beo leahe.
 145. Þis sind ða land gemæra into gyrd lea ærest of gyrd
lea on colle of colle on mær dic of mær dice on blacan mearcan of blacan
mearcan on þone hæð garan on Dagarding weg of Dagarding wege on ac
wyllan.
 148. Of ac wyllan on bradan apoldre of ðære apoldre on
mæres ðorn of ðan ðorne on smalan broc of smalan broce on cinctunes
broc of þæm broce on dyrnan ford of dyrnan forda on brom halas of brom
halan on hwitan leahe of hwitan leahe on Leommannincg weg.
 152. Ðonan on colle of colle on meos mor of meos more on ciondan
of ciondan on spel broc ðonan on bulan wyllan of bulan wyllan on þa langan
æc of ðære langan æc to Mundes dene of Mundes dene on colle of
colle eft on gyrd leahe.
 156. Ðis sind þa land gemæra þæs londes þe lympð to
sture þ is ðonne æt ærestan Dene waldincg hommes ende scyt on sture
þonne scyt se dic þ hit cymð foran to byrnan scylfe.
 158. Þonne þonan andlang þære ealdan stræte þ hit
cymð on mær broc andlang mær broces þ hit cymð to langan dune ende
þonon þ hit cymð to pos hliwan þonne of pos hliwan to sealt mere.
 161. Of sealt mere on fugel mere of fugel mere on steapan hlinc of
steapan hlince on bara broc of bara broce ymb wydan cumb of widan cumbe to
hæð hylle þonon on stan hlinces ende þonon on rum beorgas þonne
ðonan to cealc seaðan.
 165. Of cealc seaðan to Tilðegnes triowan þonan to meox
beorhym þonan to Pehtunes triowan fram Pehtunes triowan to Pioles clifan þ
andlang Pioles clifes middeweardes to clop hyrste þonne of clop hyrste on
þa dic þe ligð on sture.
 169. Þis sind þa land gemæra to bradan wege ærest of
mær ende on pes broc þonon on þa heafda æt west mæduwan of weste
medwan on þa heafdan þ on þistel mere of þæm mere andlang slædes
in pincan dene.
 172. Of pincan dene þ up on þeorna dune ufewearde þonon on
þone stapol of ðæm stapole ofer þone ealdan feld þ on fugel hlæw
of þæm hlæwe on egsan mor of ðan more up andlang dune þ on
Bæddes wellan of Bæddes wellan on brer hlæw.
 175. Of þæm hlæwe on norð ham onbutan norð ham andlang
þære ealdan dic þ on sand broc of sand broce on bord riðig of bord
riðig on hor pyttes riþig of hor pytte andlang fura þ on cadan mynster
þonon on þa ecge þ on þa sealt stræt.
 179. Andlang stræt on þa ealdan dic æt nanes mannes lande
of ðære dic on asan wyllan of asan wyllan on þristlinga dene of
ðristlinga dene ufeweardne þ on þa ealdan dic æt wad beorhe andlang
dic eft o mær cumbe.

END_TEXT

Ch 789 (Birch 1286)
B15.8.402.
Bounds, Sawyer 789: Birch 1885-99, no. 1286.



 1. Þis is þare feower hida land boc æt auene þe eadgar
cyng ge bocade Wynstane his burþene on eche yrfe.
 3. Þis synd þara feower hida land gemæra æt afene þe
Eadgar cyning ge bocade Wynstan his burðene on ece yrfe.
 5. Ærest of afene on þa ealdan burhdic on þæne weg.
 5. Ofer ðæne weg east swa Wulfsige hit gemærsode oð hit
cymð to ðæm wege þe scæt fram hambres buruh to æþelware byrig
oð hit cymð to þam wege þe scæt eastan fram winter burnan west to
billan cumbe to þæm ealdan wuduforda.
 9. Þonan up on midne stream oþ hit cymð eft fornangean þa
ealdan burh dic.

END_TEXT

Ch 790 (Birch 1292)
B15.8.403.
Bounds, Sawyer 790: Birch 1885-99, no. 1292.



 1. Ðis is þara VII hidæ boc æt harewellæ þe eadgar
cing gebocodæ ælfricæ his þegne on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis syndan þara VII hida land ge mæro.
 3. Ærest of ðam ællan stubbe on þone oðerenne elle
stub.
 4. And swa on þa ealdan firh.
 5. Þanon to smalan wege & swa ymbutan flegges garan.
 5. Þanon andlang þæs smalan weges utt on humbracumb swa on
ycenilde weg a forh be wege eft on þone ellen stub.
 7. Þa non on þone hærepað.
 7. On harandune.
 8. And swa on cranwylle.
 8. Þa non on heslea broc.
 8. And swa on hreo mæde þa non on þa ealdan cot stowa.
 9. And swa on smalan broc.
 10. Þa non on þæt lange furlang swa on cylmæscumb on
snelles garon.
 12. Ðis syndon þæra mæda ge mæra.
 12. Ærest andlang þæs ealdan broces of suðtuniga lace and
swa on stocwylle broc þa non on þone ealdan broc.
 14. And swa and wudubrigge.

END_TEXT

Ch 791 (Birch 1294)
B15.8.404.
Bounds, Sawyer 791: Birch 1885-99, no. 1294.



 1. Erest on smalmoresheued suthe end lang mors al so þe pil schet
of red mor estward so south to pille endlang pilles on mirranford.
 3. Þanen on wernanford mudeward op on wernanstreme of þe pirie
þanen liggith þritti acres þis kingis and þanen geth hit est on werne.
 5. Op endlang wernestremes on bradan mores heued þanen on þe
smalehegrewe on widanleighe westward þanen on fautesham northward endlang
weies on þe olde dich on swicombesheued on wolcombesheued for biethe of.
 8. Wolschern westward þanen on holanwei upward on þan stone so
eure bi eue on snapan westward þanen on stanwei vpward endlang weies on
russeleighe upward so on henleighe westward þanen on wirtroneshoe on peret
westward þanen on middemor endlang mores eft on smalemor.
 13. Þanen is þis merelande other manne þare kinge and þare
bisschop on pulisswiran to þan seuen hidin at hamme to þe come to Hiwissh
tuelfacres.

END_TEXT

Ch 793 (Birch 1291)
B15.8.405.
Bounds, Sawyer 793: Birch 1885-99, no. 1291.



 1. Erest up on see on hamberghes þanne on smaledich on
merkemere.
 2. On wirfelmere northward.
 2. Þanen suth on bremelwirnan.
 3. Þannen south endelang dich on bremelwil.
 3. Þanen of bremelwille on aishwel on þe hamheved.
 4. Þanen up endelang rewe on þe ellene stubbis.
 5. Þanen so bi heved on smalelinchewey of þan weye on bradenwel
on merepul of merepulle on bisschopiswerthe.
 6. And so endlang pillis on axen.

Ch 794 (Birch 1305)
B15.8.406.
Bounds, Sawyer 794: Birch 1885-99, no. 1305.



 1. Ðis syndon þara þreora hide land gemæra æt wræt
tinge wudes & feldes swa hit binnan þæm mearcum beluð.
 2. Ærest æt ðan hean gatan fram þan gatan east andlang
stræte oð west tuniga gemæra.
 3. Of þam felde on þa wude mearca andlang þæs mæres
oð.
 4. Ldinga gemæra andlang gemæres oð wichamme gemære
andlang gemæres to eanheale of eanheale gemære to bellesham gemære
andlang gemæres þæt eft on þa dic.
 8. Þis is þara þreora hida land boc æt wrettinge þe
Eadgar cyninge gebocode ælfhelme his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT

Ch 795 (Birch 1303)
B15.8.407.
Bounds, Sawyer 795: Birch 1885-99, no. 1303.



 1. Ðis is þæra þreora hida land gemære æt nymed.
 1. Ærest on copelan stan of ðæm stane west on herpoð on
eisandune þonne þanon west on herpoð on readan flodan þonon on
Secgbroces heafod þonne on adune on secgbroc oð Seo lacu scyt west.
 4. Þanon ut on hæðfeld on seohteres heafod of þam seohtere
adune on hane ðanon adune &lang streames oð riscbroc scyt on nymed
þanon east on riscbroc on scipbroc þonne up on scipbroc ðæt eft on
copelan stan.
 8. Copula stanes boc.
 8. Ðis is ðara ðreora hida boc æt Nymed ðe Eadgar cing
gebocude ælfhere his ðegne on ece yrfe.

Ch 800 (Birch 1316)
B15.8.408.
Bounds, Sawyer 800: Birch 1885-99, no. 1316; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þæra fif hida land boc.
 1. Þæ eadgar cing gebocade ælfweard bisceope on æce
yrfe.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mæro to fif hidan ærest to wures
byrgylse norð to wæter dellæ to ælfheres stapole swa norð to
bæhildestoccæ.
 5. Swa forð to Godwines ge mære and swa andlang ge mæres on
healfheages ge mære and swa of ealfheages ge mære on bugan stoc of bugan
stoccæ on þa haran apoldre on blacan grafas to fif beorgan of fif beorgan
on þa mæde of þære mæde þ eft to þan byrigelse.

Ch 801 (Birch 1312)
B15.8.409.
Bounds, Sawyer 801: Birch 1885-99, no. 1312.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæro to madan leage ærest on
witena leage in eardel of eardele in wriman ford of wriman forda ondlong broces
on hedenan mos of hedenan mose ymbe heafca bæce.
 3. Of þan bæce on þone hege of þon hege on wilburge wege
of þæm wege in cærsihtan wyll of þæm wylle in þa dic of
þære dic in þ micle mos of þæm mose in þ sic of þæm sice in
wierdes ford.
 6. Of wierdes forda on þone hreodihtan mor of þon more in þa
hæþihtan lege of þære lege in þa hyrste on þa greatan ac of
þære ac in þ sic of þæm sice eft on witena leage.
 10. Þis is þara III hida boc þe Eadgar cing gebocode
Aþelwolde bisceope on ece yrfe æt Madan liege.

Ch 802 (Birch 1315)
B15.8.410.
Bounds, Sawyer 802: Birch 1885-99, no. 1315.



 1. Þis is ealhhelmes land boc þe eadgar cing him gebocode on
ece yrfe æt eastun.
 3. Ærest on wulferdes treo of þam hlawe.
 3. Andlang þæs leas on þa stræte.
 4. In þæs cynges ge mære of þære stræte in ebban
mor.
 4. Of æbban more in þara hina ge mære.
 5. Swa andlang hina ge mæres in burcels.
 6. Of þam byrcelse on wrocene.
 6. Swa andlang wrocene in upping hæma ge mæra.
 7. Swa andlang þæs ge mæres in þa wellan.
 7. Swa of þæra wyllan in þone mor.
 8. Swa of þam more in þone broc.
 8. Swa andlang þæs mores in þone dic.
 9. On upping hæma ge mæra.
 9. Andlang dices on wæclinga stræte.
 10. Swa of þære stræte on þone lea.
 10. Swa andlang þæs leas.
 11. Þ hit cymð æft on þone stan æt tan hlaw æt
wulfherdes treo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 803 (Birch 1314)
B15.8.411.
Bounds, Sawyer 803: Birch 1885-99, no. 1314.



 1. Ðis is seo boc æt stoce.
 2. Ærest of þam more on mærce cumb & swa to mærc
hamme & swa to hean hammæ.
 3. And swa to ulan hyrste.
 3. And swa to þam west hliþe norð &lang to hogebura
mearce.
 4. And swa utt to crawan ersce & swa to hean lea & swa be
norðan dyrnan hammæ nyþær innan þa ea.
 6. Þys sinð ða ðen into Stoce siblingc hyrst & trowing
sceaddas & rocisfald.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 805 (Birch 1309)
B15.8.413.
Bounds, Sawyer 805: Birch 1885-99, no. 1309.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæra to hamstede.
 1. Of sandgatan suð &lang weges to fox hangran.
 2. Of þam hangran.
 2. West to wætlinga strætæ norð &lang stræte oð
coc cinge pol.
 3. Fram coc cinge pole east oð sand gate.
 5. Þis is þara V hida land boc æt Hamstede þe Eadgar
cining gebocode Manegodan on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 811 (Birch 1319)
B15.8.414.
Bounds, Sawyer 811: Birch 1885-99, no. 1319; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is þara LXV hida boc æt Meone þæ eadgar cinig
gæbocodæ eadwifæ his ealdan moder on ece hyrfæ.
 3. Ðis synt þa land ge mere to Meone.
 3. Ærest on Seolesburnan andlang seolesburnan on clænan
forð of clænan ford on hincstes grefan of hincstes grafan andlang ric
weges on þone litlan beorh be westantune.
 6. Of þam beorhe ðeowres ofer Meone hut to þære strete
andlang strete up to line stode.
 7. Of line stede be þon herpoðe butan writeles þorn.
 8. Of writeles þorne andlang þæs grenan weges to wuda huw on
butan þ hit cymð hut æt beorhtulfes treowe.
 9. Of beorhtulfes treowe andlang weges be þære efisc hutan
plutan mere.
 10. Of plutan mære andlang heðburge dene hutan ceola get of
ceola gete andlang strete on ðet nyrðre geat of ðon nyrðan gate on
ðac sele heale of ðac sele heal on wigið mere.
 13. Of wigið mere on sædeles streat.
 13. Of sædeles steorte innan dosaburnan andlang dosaburnan hutan
esc forð hup to acsceates geate of acsceates gate on sceafles oran fore
weardne of sceafles oran on hwoburnan andlang burnan huton heofes brycce
andlang scyre on hweðeles heal of hweðeles heale &lang burnan.
 17. On ludeburnan ford.
 18. Of ludeburnan ford andlang weges butan wenne of wenne be þam
wyrt trumman hutan waccan ham &lang þære litlan alh rewe hutan wopbinc
&lang wopbinc oð tychel leache west ende.
 21. Of tychel leache west ende on þone greatan mearc beam on
þam wuda lace &lang þam wuda lace hutan greot burnan andlang greot
burnan on wiðig ford of wiðigford innan cirscumbe lace of cirscumbe hracan
hutan on þone mearcam.
 24. Of þæm mearcam on þæt heow bec &lang heowbeces
huppan byrhtes oran of þæm mearc lea on medeman oran nyðer weardne of
þæm greatan helebeame onlang ganlea fore wearðne andlang lang gan lea
hut on finces stapel.
 27. Of fincces stapele west &lang wuda on ða greatan apeldre
of þære greatan apeldre on æsc stede rode &lang wuda on cyrt wara
bæc &lang cytwara bæcce.
 30. Of þeofacumb &lang weges on þone norð langan hlinc of
þone norð langan hlinc on þonne west langan hlinc of ðes west langan
hlinces ende on þonne mearc grefan on seolesburnan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 812 (Birch 1187)
B15.8.415.
Bounds, Sawyer 812: Birch 1885-99, no. 1187; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þis is þe landmarke to Romesye.
 2. Erest up andlang strete þare þat þurstan seit and so to
fareburne up andlang fareburne anon to carebrok.
 3. Of carebrokes on þa rugedich andlang þare rugedich to þare
laþemere, and siþen oure bi bisshopes marke to ris brigge.
 5. Of mearkbrok andlang mearkbrok to cumerantreuwe, of
cumerantreowe on marchbrokesheued on þane brode mere.
 7. Of þane mere sugrist in nan þa willan, of þan willan of
gryndenbrok.
 8. Of gryndenbrok on stennes paeg andlan paþes hut on rusfeld
þanne andlang hegges oue hit comeg to Wirmesie.
 10. Of Wirmesye to bodestan, fram bodestan suthe andlang lauen.
 11. Fram þe lauen in þe dich bi þugen þanne andlang dich in
non þe wiþige, of þan wiþie in an þe heat andlang heae in þan dede
lake.
 13. Of þare dedelake to huntesige.
 13. Of huntesige in and þan alde tersten andlang þar ealde
terste ond þe hit comeþ in þare streit þare þurstan seyt.
 16. Þe gyldenemelle so on þane ledene speketh and þaye
angrenene boges an þare goleggede hauseþ mid golde war on ge sald sanwel
stedte.
 18. Edmond Aeþeling he on þare ministre ligþ and þe kyng
witeþ þane sette þane wode calue sealde in to þare stowe.
 19. On þan gerard þæt noman þare on tiþe nanede hut of
þam hurede.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 820 (Birch 1307)
B15.8.416.
Bounds, Sawyer 820: Birch 1885-99, no. 1307; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Æræst of isen hyrste gate on slahðor weg.
 1. Þonon on ðone norðmæstan weg.
 2. Ðæt on æðeredes hagan æt widighamme forð on þa
mearce in on ða tigel ærnan forð andlang mearce on gisteardes wylle.
 4. Þonon andlang mearce on ðet wot treow æt ðære baran
fyrhðe.
 5. Þonnon on ðet fæster geat swa on ðet deope del ðonon
on icæles æwilmas to æðelbrihtes mearce æt ylfethamme.
 6. Ðonon ut on ðone hæðfeld on fugel mere swa on
bromhyste.
 7. Þ andlang burnan on bedecanlea.
 8. Ðonon ofer ealne ðære hæðfeld up to hnæfes
scylfe.
 9. Ðanan west andlang mearce to strete.
 9. Þ west to ceolbrihtes stane.
 10. Þ west on þa festændic.
 10. Swa on ða mearce on eferæs cumb.
 10. Ðæt andlang mearce on mules fen.
 11. Þ on duddan broc andlang streames on brydan ford.
 12. Þ on fearnlea ford.
 12. Swa in on æscæsslep ford.
 13. Andlang streames in on hrunigfealles wæt.
 13. Ðonon andlang streames op to æmices oran.
 14. Þ andlang weges to ðære wulfruscan.
 14. Ðonan forð to ðon hæðfeld heale.
 15. Andlang mearce oi ðet hig geat.
 15. Ðon on lilles beam.
 16. Ðonan forð on ða mearce to beonet legæ gæmære.
 17. Swa on ðone hæðenan byrgels.
 18. Ðonan west on ða mearce þær ælfstan lið on
hæðenan byrgels þ on badecan dæne.
 18. Swa forð on sibbes weg.
 19. Ðonan wulfstanes mearce æt weargeburnan.
 19. Ðon on cannæn dene westewearde ðon on pattan dene
westewearde.
 20. Ðon on heglea to ceoleages treowe.
 21. Ðon forð on ða dupan furh þær deocca berena stodan.
 22. Swa inon wifæles mære.
 22. Þ in on ðone to brocænan beorð.
 23. Swa on hamstedes wyllas norðewearde.
 23. Ðon eft inon isenhyrstengeat.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 828 (Kem 1276)
B15.8.417.
Bounds, Sawyer 828: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1276.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæro to Cyngestune æcer onder
æcere.
 3. Ærest of Eoccene on mereþorn.
 3. Of mæreþorne on ða heafodæceras.
 4. Ðannon on Swanesig on ðone ealdan garan middewearde.
 5. Of ðan ealdan garan andlang riht gemæres on ælfredes
beorh.
 6. Ðæt andlang riht gemæres innan Cyngestun.
 7. Andlang riht gerið on ðone pyt beneoðan Cyngestun.
 8. Swa andlang riht gemæres on ðone þorn.
 9. Ut on Temese.
 10. Andlang Temese on ðe ealda gemæra.
 10. Up andlang gemæres on ælfðryðe stan.
 11. Of ðane stane andlang dice.
 12. Of ðære dic andlang riht gemæres.
 12. Ðæt eft on Eoccene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 829 (Kem 1277)
B15.8.418.
Bounds, Sawyer 829: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1277.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæro æcer under æcere.
 2. Ærest of Eccene on mereþorn.
 3. Of mereþorne on ða heafodæceras.
 3. Ðanun on Swanesig on ðone ealdan garan middewearde.
 4. Of ðam ealdan garan andlang riht gemæres on ælfredes
beorh.
 6. Ðæt andlang riht gemæres innan Cyngestun.
 7. Andlang riht gerið on ðone pyt beneoðan Cyngestun.
 8. Swa andlang riht gemæres on ðone þorn.
 8. Ðæt ut on Temese.
 9. Andlang Temese on ðæt eald gemære.
 9. Up andlang gemæres on ælfðryðe stan.
 10. Of ðane stane andlang dice.
 11. Of ðære dic andlang riht gemæres.
 12. Ðæt eft on Eoccene.

Ch 830 (Davidson)
B15.8.419.
Bounds, Sawyer 830: Davidson 1883, 281-2.



 1. Ðis is ðære are gyrde land gemæro æt hyples eald
lande.
 2. Ærest fram ðrim staplun rihte iest oð gat wylle.
 3. Þanun iest andlang ruan dune oð stanford, of stanforda iest
on lamford.
 4. Of lamforda iest on ðære weg, andlang weges, on þa ealdan
dic.
 5. Suð andlang dic on hroces fen, oð þær risc broc
utscyt.
 5. Ðanun suð rihte on ða greatan wale ofer midel hylle.
 6. Ðanun suð on ða ealdan dic, andlang þære dic oð
ieccan stoc.
 7. Ðon suð on ða ealdan burh middewerde suð rihte oð
cucan broc.
 8. Up andlang cucanbroces oð þær smæl rið utscyt upon
smæl riðe oða æwylman.
 9. Ðanun west onfryðestanes dic, west on ða dic oð risc
broc.
 10. Upon risc broc oð þri stapulas.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 831 (Kem 611)
B15.8.420.
Bounds, Sawyer 831: Kemble 1839-48, no. 611.



 1. Ðis synt ðara tyn hida landgemæra to Wilig.
 2. Ærest up of Wylle forda ofer bican dune on ðone midemestan
beorh.
 4. Andlang ðæs widan cumbes on ðone hricweg.
 5. Andlang ðæs hricweges on norðewearde geonnan beorh,
ðonne utt on horsgeat to ea on þeofa ford easteweardne on enne crundel.
 7. Ðonne andlang ea æft on Wylle ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 832 (Davidson)
B15.8.421.
Bounds, Sawyer 832: Davidson 1883, 284-5.



 1. Ðis ys seo landscaru to trefwurabo.
 1. Ærist æt pollicerr, þænne be þære dic andlang
weges.
 2. Þonne of þa wege þonne on þa lytlan dic on easthealfe
weges to poll hæscen adun be þam broce to ryt cendeurion.
 4. Þonne be þam broce to carnuið bran to deumaen coruan.
 4. Þanon &lang weges to cruc drænoc, þanon to
carrecwynn.
 5. And eft þanon to pollicerr.
 6. Ðis is seo landscaru to trefualoc.
 6. Ærest to þære dic, þonne fram dice adun to þam
broce.
 7. Of þam broce to crouswrach, &lang weges on þam dic.
 8. Þanon to mayn biw to cruc mur, þanon to carn plicet
&lang þære to þam broc.
 9. Þanon &lang stremes oð tnow wæt eft be þære
dic.
 10. Ðis is seo landscaru to cruc wæð ærest æt
nantbuorðtel, &lang stremes oð lenbroinn.
 11. Þanan to cestelmerit, þanon west to wucou genidor west,
andlang dic oð broc.
 12. Þanon to fonton morgeonec, þanon adune to broce þær
hit æt fruman wes.
 13. Ðis is seo landgemæro to trefdewig.
 14. Ærest æt pennhal meglar suð to þam weg, þanon to
þam forda ongerihte to erliwet.
 15. Þanon forð &lang stremes to lyncenin þanon up to
penhal meglar.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 833 (Birch 1096)
B15.8.422.
Bounds, Sawyer 833: Birch 1885-99, no. 1096.



 1. Þis his þæs wudes land gemære þe Aþelred cyning
bocað Leofrice his þegene on ece yrfe.
 2. Ærest of clæg broce on þa ealdan stræt be westan
dunninc wicon andlang stræt on norþewerde wileardes hyrste on þone feld
þ on þætte riþi andlang Riþiges on Aþelnodes gemære.
 5. Þ on þone rodweg andlang weges þe eft on clæg broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 834 (Kem 621)
B15.8.423.
Bounds, Sawyer 834: Kemble 1839-48, no. 621.



 1. Ðis sint ðara X hyda landgemære æt Ollanege.
 2. Ærest on Calewan were andlang lace into halgan broce.
 3. Andlang broces to halgan welle.
 4. Of ðere welle to dene æccre.
 4. Of dene æcre andlang dene to þreo gemære.
 5. Of þrim gemærum on ecgan croft.
 6. Of ecgan crofte on ða dic.
 6. Andlang dices on ðone feld, ðæt andlang wyrttruman on
Hildes hlæw.
 8. Of Hildes hlæwe on ðone stan.
 8. Of ðam stane on ðone broc.
 9. Andlang broces inon Use.
 9. Andlang Use on Wilinford.
 10. Of ðam forde andlang Use to Kekan were.
 11. Of Kekan were andlang Use on Caluwan wer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 835 (Kem 622)
B15.8.424.
Bounds, Sawyer 835: Kemble 1839-48, no. 622; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd ðara fif hida landgemæru to Suðtune.
 2. Ærest on Wifeles mere, ðæt adune to ðam slede.
 3. Andlangas sledes syx æcera bræde, ðet up be healfan
furlange be riht landmeorce to abrocenan beorge.
 5. Of ðam beorge ut on stræt.
 5. Andlang stræte on ða mære slade.
 6. Of ðan slade innan Witmundes lea, ðanne be wurtruman
anlanges wudes to ðære hwitan dic.
 8. Fram ðære hwitan dic to Effanhamme, ðanan on Trundlesham
niðeweard.
 9. Of Trundleshamme to ættes denes gæate.
 10. Of ðam geate to Gistrældes wille.
 11. Fram ðan wille to Hemstedes geate.
 11. Fram Hæmstedes geate forð bi stræt eft to Wifeles
mære.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 836 (Kem 626)
B15.8.425.
Bounds, Sawyer 836: Kemble 1839-48, no. 626.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæra æt Celcesoran.
 2. Ærest of Solentan on burnan.
 3. Andlang burnan on Wealpaðabrygce.
 4. Of Wealpaðabrygce on Hyldingbroc ufeweardne, swa forð
andlang rewe on bradan fleot.
 5. Andlang bradan fleotes ut on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 837 (Kem 624)
B15.8.426.
Bounds, Sawyer 837: Kemble 1839-48, no. 624; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd ðæs landes gemære æt Hamanfuntan.
 2. Ærest ðær Ocærburna utt scyt on sæ.
 3. Ðæt upp andlang Ocærburnan to halegan mærsce
easteweardan, andlang brocæs, ðanon ofær ða stræt æt
Utelanbricge.
 5. Ðænna ofær ða stræt twam læs ðe þryttig
gyrda.
 6. Andlang burnstowæ ðænnæ ðær east to stucan wisc
æt ðæne mearcbeorh.
 8. Ðonnæ andlang paðæ on þornwic eastæweardæ to
ðam hwitan stoccæ.
 9. Ðonnæ of ðam hwitan stoccæ þurh ðæt wudu
gehæg to neddan leage to ðam hærepaðe.
 11. Ðonnæ andlang greddan leagæ ðe ðam wæge of ða
norðæfes.
 12. Ðonne andlang hærpaðes to dunneburnan on ðonæ
wearrihtan stocc.
 13. Andlang dundeburnan on ðonæ eastheræpað on ðæ
twa æc ðæ standað in on ðær paðæ, ðæt andlang hagan on
Lamhyrstæ eastaweardæ on ywwara hagan.
 16. Andlang iwwara hagan on ðonæ ifihtan stoc.
 17. Of ðam stoccæ suð bæ riht wegæ oðða hyrnan.
 18. Andlang iwwara hagan suð and east on ða burnstowæ.
 19. Of ðære burnstowæ andlang hagan on Lamhyrstæ on
Hærredes leage wæstæweardæ, ðonne bæ leage on ðonæ stocc
ðæ ðæt hlidgeat on hangodæ.
 22. Of ðam stoccæ utt þurh beorhlea middeweardnæ on
ðonæ ealdan æsc.
 23. Of ðam æscce syð ofær ðonæ weg on ða
apoldræ.
 24. Of ðære apoldran on ðæne hwitan hæsl.
 25. Of ðam hæsle on hnutwic eastæweardæ andlang
grænan wæges oð Wuhinglandæs hyrnan, ðæt west andlang wæges
oðða wæstran Wuhinglandes hyrnan.
 28. Syð ðonnæ andlang hægerewæ oð Imbæs dæl.
 29. Of Imbæs dællæ andlang hægeræwæ utt on
Limburnan, ðonnæ andlang Limburnan utt on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 840 (Kem 633)
B15.8.427.
Bounds, Sawyer 840: Kemble 1839-48, no. 633; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest seo landmearce lið of Terstan upp be Hohtuninga
mearce oð hyt cymð to middanweardes eorðbyrig.
 3. Swa hit geð to Heanbyrig.
 4. Of Heanbyrig hit gæð to widian byrig.
 4. Of widian byrig nyðer be ðære dæne oð hyt cymð
nyðer to ðam mylenhammæ and se mylenham and se myln ðærto and
ðæs mearclandes swa micel swa to þrim hidon gebyrað.
 9. Ðis is ðara þreora hida and XXX æcera boc æt Stoce,
ðæ Eðelred cing gebocodæ Leofrice on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 842 (Edwards)
B15.8.428.
Bounds, Sawyer 842: Edwards 1866, 219-21; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis sind þara twegra hida landgemæra to Heantune.
 2. Ærest, on þone stænihtan ford east andlang herpaðes.
 3. Of þan herpaðe, swa hit gemearcoð is, to ðære fulan
dic.
 4. Of þære fulan dic to wynnangeate.
 5. Of wynnangeate andlang mearce, on þa stanynan hlyfan.
 6. Of þære hlyfan, andlang mearce, on þa oðre stænenan
hlyfan.
 7. Of þære hlyfan innan þa widan dic forð, andlang dic, on
Beadinga burnan, to þære ealden hide ðe to niwan mynstre ær hyrde on
Wintanceastre.
 11. Þanon ongerihtne up andlang burnan eft on þone stænihtan
ford.
 13. Ðis synd þara twegra hida landgemæra æt Beadinga
burnan.
 14. Ærest on þæne stanihtan ford.
 15. Of þan forda suð andlang herpaðes to Aðulfes hylle
suð.
 16. Andlang þære hina mearce, to þære widan dic west
andlang dic on þone mor norð.
 18. Andlang mores for mid on Beadinga burnan andlang streames eft
on þane stanihtan ford.
 20. Ðis sind þara twegra hida landgemæra to
Meolcburnantune.
 21. Ærest of þan fulan geate east andlang mearce oð æsces
hege.
 22. Of æsces hege suð andlang mearce.
 23. Oððæt hlidgeat.
 23. Of þan hlidgeate on Byrhtlafes mearce west andlang Bryhtlafes
mearce oð æþerices mearce.
 26. Of æþerices mearce norð ofer dune oððara hina
mearce, andlang þara hina mearce oþ Ceollingwuda east.
 28. Of þara hina mearce oððæt fulegeat.
 30. Ðis synð þara anre hida landgemæra æt Stæðe.
 31. Ærest up of wareðe to þan stane æt þan geate.
 32. Of þan geate suð andlang mearce on þara hina mearce to
Ticcanfelda.
 33. Ðonne gyt suð, anlang mearce, to þan stane þe stænt
æt bennan hamme.
 35. Þanon east, andlang mearce, on þone heal.
 36. Of þan heal suð andlang mearce to Hwatewisc.
 37. Of Hwatewisce west on Ceolling burnan, andlang streames west to
ðære widan dic norð.
 38. Andlang dic, up on þæt geat.
 39. Of þan geate, swa hit gemearcod is, on þone broc.
 40. Andlang broces to fugel fleote.
 41. Of þam fleote ut on sæ.
 42. Ðis synd þara fif hida landgemæra to Frodingtune.
 43. Ærest of þam waroðe up on Bradewater, swa hit gemearcod
is.
 44. Of Bradan wætere norð andlang mearce on Mearran beorg.
 46. Of Mearran beorge east andlang mearce on Suttingwyrð.
 47. Of Suttingwyrðe on Dolmere.
 48. Of Dolmere, andlang mearce, on Wifadel.
 48. Of Wifadaelle andlang mearce, on Goldstede.
 49. Of Goldstede, andlange mearce, ut on waroðe.
 51. Ðis synd þara anre hida landgamæra to Suggincgwyrðe.
 52. Ærest of Ceodorbricge west andlang herpaðes oþþa
treowa.
 53. Of þam treowum on Tidices hlæwe.
 54. Ðanon on þone norðlangan herpað.
 55. Of þam herpaðe west on þæs mores heafod.
 56. Þanon norð, andlang mores, oððone wysctwalan.
 57. Ðanon be ðam wyrtwalan on þone stan.
 58. Ðanon east on þæt æwylle, æt wudatune.
 59. Of þam æwylle east swa hit gemerced is, on þone
stanihtan weg.
 60. Þanon east andlang mearce on Noðheardes meede,
norþewearde.
 61. Þanon suð, andlang mores, on Ceoddorbricge, and utlæse
mid oðrum folce gemæne.
 64. Ðis is seo mæd þe Eadred cyng ge an Lufan his men on ece
yrfe in to Suggingwyrðe on his witena gewitnesse seo ligð betweox Meone and
þære mylendic, ðis he cyð on his witena gewitnese, þæt is,
ærest, ælfsige, ælferes sunu.
 69. And ælfsige, Wulfsiges sunu.
 69. And Eadric cild, to gewitnesse.
 70. And æðelweard, Wulfðryþe sunu, him to gewitnesse.
 71. And þara hina on Ticcefelda, and siððan oþra for
manegra.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 843 (Kem 1279)
B15.8.429.
Bounds, Sawyer 843: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1279.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæro æt Earnigcotan.
 2. Ærest of ðan ealdan slæpe up andlang Giht.
 3. Of Giht on ðæt riðig.
 3. Andlang riðies on ðone mere.
 4. Of ðan mere eft on ðæt riðig.
 4. Andlang riðiges to ðan hindfaldan.
 5. Of ðan hindfaldan on ðone swinhege.
 6. Of ðan swinhege on pippan lege.
 6. Of pippan lege eft on ðone swinhege.
 7. Andlang swinheges innan easthealas.
 8. Swa be wyrtuualen innan ðone smalan weg.
 9. Andlang smalan weges ðæt eft on Giht to ðan ealdan
slæpe ðær hit ær ongan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 845 (Edwards)
B15.8.430.
Bounds, Sawyer 845: Edwards 1866, 229; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Þonne is ærest seo lenge.
 1. On westeweardan, V furlang and V gyrda.
 2. On middeweardan, V furlang and XXVI gyrda.
 3. On easteweardan, andlang ea V furlang.
 4. Ðonne is seo bræd.
 4. Ærest on norðhealfe III furlang and I gyrd.
 5. On middewerdan ðreo furlang and XXVII gyrda.
 6. On suðeweardan ðreo furlang and XI gyrda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 846 (Kem 638)
B15.8.431.
Bounds, Sawyer 846: Kemble 1839-48, no. 638.



 1. Ærest andlang hrigweges to æðelwoldes gemero.
 2. Ðanon andlang weges innan ða dæne.
 2. Syðan be ðan andheafdan ðæt cymð to Clife.
 3. Ðanon innan ðone gemærwyl.
 4. Andlang streames on ða dic to wudetunnincga gemero.
 5. Andlang dic to tocan stanæ.
 5. Ðanon on ceattan broc to micghæma gemæra.
 6. Of ðam gemero eastaweardan æft on ceattan broc.
 7. Ðanon on ceattan gemera to ælflede gemero.
 8. Of ðam gemere eastaweardan æft on ceattan broc.
 9. Ðanon on ðone tunsteal easteweardne.
 10. Ðonne upp on ðone holan cumb.
 10. Of ðam holan wege ufeweardan on ælflede gemeran.
 11. Be ælflede gemere æft on hricwege to Wulfmeres gemere.
 13. Ðis is ðara X hida boc æt Cliuæ ðe æðelred
cing gebocode æðelmere his þegne on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 847 (Hart)
B15.8.432.
Bounds, Sawyer 847: Hart 1966, 187.



 1. Þis synd þa land gemæra into dittune.
 1. Of cranmeresþorne to blacan græfan, of þere blacan
græfan on þa seofan æceras eastewearde.
 3. Of þam seofan æceran on emenan, andlang emenan be healfan
streame innan cytanforð.
 4. Of cytanforða to tatan broke, of tatan broke on
cwicelmeswyrþe eastewerde.
 5. Þis is se wude on þes agan ende to byrlegate.
 6. Fram byrlagate to wiðan gate.
 7. Fram wiðangate to cnuceshirste and to egænlea, fram
ecganlæa to þam haran wyðie.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 848 (Kem 636)
B15.8.433.
Bounds, Sawyer 848: Kemble 1839-48, no. 636.



 1. Ærest andlang hrigweges to æðelwoldes gemæro.
 2. Ðanon andlang weges innon ða dene.
 2. Syðan be ðan andheafdan ðæt cymð to Clife.
 3. Ðanon innan ðone gemærwyl andlang streames on ða dic to
wudetunnincga gemæro.
 5. Andlang dic to tocan stanæ.
 5. Ðanon on ceattan broc to micghæma gemæra.
 6. Ðanon on ceattan mære to ælfflede gemære.
 7. Of ðam gemære eastaweardan æft on ceattan broc.
 8. Ðanon on ðone tunsteal easteweardne.
 9. Ðonne upp on ðone holan cumb.
 9. Of ðam holan wege ufweardan on ælfflede gemære.
 10. Be ælfflede gemære æft on hrigweg to Wulfmæres
gemære.
 12. Ðis is ðara X hida boc æt Cliuæ ðe æðelred
cing gebocode æðelwine his þægne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 849 (Kem 640)
B15.8.434.
Bounds, Sawyer 849: Kemble 1839-48, no. 640.



 1. Of Dærentan on ða ealdan þornræwe to ðam æsce.
 2. On ða þornræwe ðæt eft innon Dærentan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 850 (Kem 641)
B15.8.435.
Bounds, Sawyer 850: Kemble 1839-48, no. 641.



 1. Ðis sant ða landimare ðare twentiwe hiwe at Tissebiri.
 2. Arest ðe cigel marc scheð on nodre andlang stremes oð
Gofesdene.
 3. Ðannen to ðere twichenen.
 3. Of ðere twichene on Wilburge imare on ðane grene wei on
wermundes trew.
 5. Of wermundes tre adun richt inne ðe imade of ðane miðon
anlang stremes on ðane ealde wdeforde on ðare grene wei on neðe
heuedstokes.
 8. Of ðanne heuedstocken forð be twelf aceron ðat it comet to
wealwege.
 9. Ðanen to higwege.
 9. Ðannen to wdesfloda.
 10. Ðannen to suðames forde anlange hegereawe ðat it comet to
nodre.
 11. Anlang nodre on semene.
 12. Anlang semene to rodelee.
 12. Ðanen on ðere hwiten mercs.
 13. Ðannen on mapeldere hille.
 13. Ðannen on ða stigele.
 14. Ðannen on sapcumbe.
 14. Ðannen forder west on cures rigt.
 15. Ðanne cyrder it norð on poles leage.
 15. Ðannen on mare broc.
 16. Ðanen on wiðig broch.
 16. Ðanen on sidinic mor.
 17. Ðannen forð on cnugel lege and on hiclesham.
 18. Ðannen on mearc wei.
 18. Of ðane wege anlang hrigces to inpedeforde.
 19. Anlang weges ðat it cumet to funtgeal on ðone herpoð.
 20. Ðannen to gificancumbe.
 20. Anlang cumbe to stan weie.
 21. Anlang hrygges to ðere litlen lege.
 22. Ðannen on Leofriches imare.
 22. Forð be gemare eft on funtal of fintes hrigce.
 23. Anlang hrigces to Alfgares imare.
 24. Forðer be his imare oð heuedstoccas.
 24. Ðanen to cigelmerc broce.
 25. Anlang stremes eft on nodre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 852 (Kem 1281)
B15.8.436.
Bounds, Sawyer 852: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1281.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæra ðara twegra hida ðe hyrað to
Osanlea.
 2. East on ða lanan, and ðonne andlang slades on ðone blacan
pyt.
 4. Of ðane pytte on ðone lampyt.
 4. Andlang mearce.
 4. Of ðan pytte ut on byrcan slæd.
 5. Of byrcan slade on ða ealdan dic.
 6. Of ðære ealdan dic on henna riðe.
 6. Of henna riðe up andlang slædes to ipan lea.
 7. Of ipan lea on bromhæg andlang weges on ða lanan, and
ðara twegra hyda wuda innan gemænnesse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 854 (Kem 643)
B15.8.437.
Bounds, Sawyer 854: Kemble 1839-48, no. 643.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemære.
 1. Ærest of hicemannes stane on Foss.
 2. Andlang Fosse to æscbeorge.
 2. Of æscbeorge to wudubeorge, adun on strem on weleweheia.
 3. Of weleweheia upp to hlypcumbe.
 4. Of hlypcumbe eft on hicemannes stan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 855 (Kem 1282)
B15.8.438.
Bounds, Sawyer 855: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1282.



 1. Ærest on Cynetan æt Scoelles ealdcotan.
 1. Ðæt up andlang streames oð Eadgife gemære.
 2. Swa norð innan Hydene.
 3. Ðanon norð on Lamburninga mearce.
 4. Swa est andlang mearce oð ælfwiges gemære.
 4. Swa suð andlang gemæres on Hyddene.
 5. Swa suð be gemære ðat eft innan Cynetan strem.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 856 (Kem 648)
B15.8.439.
Bounds, Sawyer 856: Kemble 1839-48, no. 648.



 1. Ærest of Harandune wege ðonne hit sticað on Middelhæma
gemæra on Suttuninga lace.
 2. Of Suttuninga lace on Leofsiges gemæra on ða hnottan dic.
 4. Of ðære hnottan dic on brembel þorn.
 4. Of brembel þorne on Hengestes geat.
 5. Of Hencstes geate on ða ealdan dune to Brihtwoldes gemæra.
 6. Of Brihtwoldes gemæra æft on Harandune.
 8. Ðis is ðara XVII hida land boc æt Harewylle ðe
æðelred cing gebocode æðelricæ his þegne on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 857 (Kem 652)
B15.8.440.
Bounds, Sawyer 857: Kemble 1839-48, no. 652; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Æræst of Terstan upp on Iww cumb.
 2. Of Iwwa cumbe on wænhyrste.
 3. Of wænhyrste on ðone ealde iw.
 3. Ðonone of ðon iwe to Lullan setle.
 4. Of Lullan setle to beocera gente.
 5. Of beocere gente to horsweges heale.
 5. Of horsweages heale to æppen lega.
 6. Of hæppen lege to Higsolon.
 7. Of Higsolon on fæstan ac.
 7. Of fæstan ac on feora burnan æwylman.
 8. Of feora burnan to ceomman bricge.
 9. Of ceomman bricge to wyrtwalun.
 9. Up be wyrtwalun oð Cerswyll.
 10. Of Cæorswylle up to ðam ellene.
 11. Of ðam ellene to populfinige.
 11. Of populfinige to Lambhyrste.
 12. Of Lambhyrste to huntan wican.
 13. Ðonone eft on Terstan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 858 (Kem 1283)
B15.8.441.
Bounds, Sawyer 858: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1283.



 1. Ærest æt gorgrafes slæde on ðæt crundel.
 1. Of ðam crundelle on læces ford, on ðone mor.
 2. Of ðane forda on ceobban hangran.
 3. Of ðan hangran on ðæt wæterslæd.
 4. Of ðan wæterslæde on sceobban oran wylle.
 5. Of sceobban oran wylle on wrohthangran.
 5. Of wrohthangran on cybban stan.
 6. Of ðan stane on ðone hrycgweg.
 7. Andlang weges on Colmenoran.
 7. Of Colmenoran on wændles cumb.
 8. Of ðan cumbe on ðone swanweg.
 9. Of ðan wege on riscleahe ufewearde.
 9. Of riscleahe on ðone rugan weg.
 10. Of ðam wege on ðone lampyt.
 11. Of ðam pytte on ðæs cumbes heafod.
 11. Of ðæs cumbes heafde on ðone portweg, oð ðone
greatan þorn.
 13. Of ðan þorne on foxhola cumbe ofeweardne.
 13. Of ðan cumbe to blacan graue, ofeweardan on ða dic.
 15. Andlang dic to heorthamme.
 15. Of heorthamme to Wudaforda.
 16. Of Wudaforda on Pottenes treow.
 16. Of ðan treowe andlang gemæres on ðone mor.
 17. Ðæt up andlang broces on cealdan wyl.
 18. Of cealdan wylle to ðære þornrawe.
 19. Of ðære þornrawe ðæt eft in on gorgrafes slæd.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 860 (Kem 650)
B15.8.442.
Bounds, Sawyer 860: Kemble 1839-48, no. 650.



 1. Ærest ðer gose broc scyt on sæffan mor.
 2. Ðanon ongean stream of seofan wyllan broc.
 3. Of ðam broce on ane wyllan.
 4. Of ðære wyllan on oðre wyllan.
 4. Of ðære wyllan innan ða dic.
 5. Andlang dic on ane mære.
 5. Of ðam mære on Bilsatena gemæro.
 6. Ðanone on secges leage gemæra.
 7. Andlang gemære ðæt on sceorfes mor.
 7. Of ðam more on hlyðe broc.
 8. Andlang broc ðæt on wæte leahe.
 8. Of wæte leahe upweard on ðone snawan.
 9. Of ðam snawan on gerihte ofer ðone feld hit cymð ðer seo
stige scyt on ða stræte ðe liggeð fram Byrngyðe stane.
 11. Æfter ðære stige ðæt on geaggan treow.
 12. Of ðam treowe on ða bradan stræte ðæt hit cymð on
medwe.
 13. Ðonne æfter medwe sice ðæt hit cymð on tresel.
 14. Upp andlang tresel ðæt heft ðer gose broc scyt on
sæffan mor.
 16. Ðis is ðara X hida boc æt Heantune ðæ æðelred
cing gebocode Wulfrunæ on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 861 (Kem 655)
B15.8.443.
Bounds, Sawyer 861: Kemble 1839-48, no. 655.



 1. Ðis syndon ða landgemere ðere V hida æt Eblesburnan.
 2. Ærest on ðone welig.
 3. Of ðam welige on ðone witan weg.
 3. Of ðam wege on ðone hassuc upp an hrofan hricge.
 4. Of hrofan hricge on Dolemannes beorh.
 5. Of ðam beorge on ða greatan dic.
 6. Of ðere dic on Stanbeorch.
 6. Of ðam beorge on ðæt hlew et hrichwege.
 7. Of hrichwegge on ða witan dic.
 8. Of ðere dic on þornhlinch.
 8. Ðanone on dynes hlinch.
 8. Of ðam hlince on ðæt seade clif.
 9. Of ðam clife on Eblesburnan.
 10. Of ðere burnan on ða streat.
 10. Andlanges streat on Stretford.
 12. Ðis is ðara V hyda boc æt Eblesburnan ðe
æðelræd cyning gebocodæ ælfgare his þegne on ecæ yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 864 (Kem 657)
B15.8.445.
Bounds, Sawyer 864: Kemble 1839-48, no. 657.



 1. Ærest an norðan fram ceddanleage to langanleage
bromleaginga mearc & leofsuhæma.
 3. Þanne fram langanleage to ðam wonstocce.
 4. Þanne fram ðam wonstocce be modinga hæma mearce to cinta
stigole.
 5. Þanne fram cintan stigole be modinga hæma mearce to earnes
beame.
 6. Ðanne fram earnes beame cræg sætena haga on easthealfe
sced hit to leowsandene ðanne fram leowsandene to swelgende.
 9. Ðanne fram swelgende crægsetenahaga to siox slihtre.
 10. Ðanne fram seox slihtre to fearnbeorhginga mearce.
 11. Fearn beorginga mearc hit sced to cystaningamearce.
 12. Cystaninga mearc hit sced suðan to weardsetle.
 13. Ðanne fram weardsetle cystaningamearc to wichæma mearce.
 14. Ðanne seo west mearc be wichæma mearce ut to bipple
styde.
 15. Þonne fram bipple styde to acu styde to beoh hæma mearce.
 16. Fram acu stede to ceddanleage.
 17. Ðonne belimpað þær to ðam lande.
 17. Fif denn.
 18. An on ut wealda brocces ham ðæs dennes nama.
 18. And þæs oðres dennes nama sænget hryc.
 19. Billan ora is þæs þriddan nama.
 20. Þonne twa denn an glæppan felda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 865 (Edwards)
B15.8.446.
Bounds, Sawyer 865: Edwards 1866, 232-3.



 1. Ærest of easteweardan Maningaforda, on þæne heðihtan
hrycgweg, þanon on þæt slæd norð, andlang slædes, on þone
smalan pað.
 3. Of þon smalan pað on þære slæde.
 4. Þonne on þæne hullan geroundel.
 5. Þonne on Swanabeorh.
 5. Of Swanabeorh east, andlang weges.
 6. Þonne eastweardne þone smalan granan bæn to þara bradan
wege wæst, andlang weges, on smalan wege.
 8. Þonne on Myrceford weastweardne of þam forda.
 9. Þanon on þa dic on þa andheafda þan on þa cyricwege.
 11. Of þam wege on ðone ðorn.
 11. Þanon on Bradanwege weast andlang weges on þa ealdan dic.
 12. Þanon on Pubbanwambe weastweardne on þa hlincrewe.
 14. Þanon on þone ðornstyb.
 14. Of þam stybbe on þa rwam holo midwearde.
 15. Þanon on þone ellenstybbe.
 16. Þonne ofer Middeldune on þa holo weastweard.
 17. Þonon on þone lytlan hylde wege.
 17. Of þam wege on Lusebeorh.
 18. Þonne on þone eastan wege suð, andlange weges, to
þære litlan dic þe norð scyt.
 20. Þanon on þa ealden gemærdola.
 20. Þanon on þone litlan ruwan beorh.
 21. Ðenne on þone grenan hlinc, be milandune.
 22. Of þam hlinc on þa langan foryrðe weastewearde.
 23. Þanon on þone litlan æcer, weastweardne of þam
æcere on fulandic.
 24. Of þære dic eft on Manengaford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 867 (Kem 658)
B15.8.447.
Bounds, Sawyer 867: Kemble 1839-48, no. 658.



 1. Ðis syndon ða landgæmæro to Westwuda and to
Cissanhammæ.
 2. Ærest on Stanford.
 2. Of Stanforda andlang streamæs on Igford.
 3. Of Igforda on bæræ hæhgæ.
 4. Andlang hægæs on Afonæ.
 4. Up bæ stræamæ on Windærlæh mæd.
 5. Of ðæræ mæd east onbutan cading lægæ on
hramæs hangran.
 6. Of ðam hangran suð to ðære stræt on ða streatan
hlywan.
 7. Of ðære hlywan suð onbutan færs scagan on ða dic
ðæt hit cymð to ðære rodæ.
 9. Ðanon on crawan ac.
 9. Of ðære æc æft on Stanford.
 10. Ðonnæ licgeað ða þreo gyrda on oðære
hæalfæ fromæ æt Fæarnlæagæ on gæmænum landæ.
 12. Ðis is ðara III hida land boc æt Westwuda and ðara III
gyrda æt Fearnlege ðe æðelred cing gebocode Leofwine his huntan on
ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 868 (Kem 664)
B15.8.448.
Bounds, Sawyer 868: Kemble 1839-48, no. 664.



 1. Ðis syndon ðara V hida landgemæro æt Wigli ðe
æðelwold and ælfhelm his broðor hæddan.
 3. Ærest of Hunighamme westewearden up andlang streames on ða
ealdan dic.
 4. Of ðære ealdan dic swa on bican dune westewearde.
 5. Of bican dune on ðene hricweg.
 6. Ðonne east andlang hricweges on ða ealdan furh.
 7. Of ðære ealdan furh andlangan dune.
 8. Forewearde of langan dune on loc hylle.
 8. Swa æft on Hunigham westeweardne.
 10. Ðis is ðære V hida land boc to Wilig ðæ
æðelred cing gebocade ælfgar bisceope on æce yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 869 (Edwards)
B15.8.449.
Bounds, Sawyer 869: Edwards 1866, 239-40.



 1. Ærest on ða ea, andlang dice on hocces clif.
 2. Of hocces clif on snelles pytt.
 2. Of snelles pytt, andlang dic, on cealfa hlinc.
 3. Of cealfa hlinc on hafakes beorh.
 4. Of hafakes beorh on ðone stan beorh.
 5. Of ðan stan beorhge on ræst hlinc.
 6. On vearncumbe.
 6. Of vearncumbe on eccinga hlæwe.
 7. Of eccinga hlæwe on ðorndene.
 8. Of ðorndene on deopan dell.
 8. Of deopan delle on ðone readan stan.
 9. Of ðan readan stane on wærmundes stan.
 10. Of wærmundes stane on langan hlinc.
 11. Of langan hlince on ðone holan weg.
 12. Of holan wege on kyneware treowe.
 13. Of kyneware treowe on grenan hlince in to ðan fleote æt
ho, of ðan fleote þæt eft in ða ea.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 870 (Kem 665)
B15.8.450.
Bounds, Sawyer 870: Kemble 1839-48, no. 665.



 1. Ðis syndon ðæs hagan gemæru æt sanctus Benedictus
chirichean.
 3. Ærest of utewerdan ðam geate andlang strete þwyres ofer
Wilig on ða smalan twichenan.
 4. And swa andlang twichenan to Wulfriches gemære.
 5. Ðæt ðonne þywres ofer eft on Wilig.
 6. Ðonne swa andlang Wulfriches heigræwe on ða widan
stræt.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 872 (Kem 663)
B15.8.451.
Bounds, Sawyer 872: Kemble 1839-48, no. 663.



 1. Ærest of ðam hlidgeate to wican stigele.
 1. Ðanon to ælfriðe ho.
 2. Ðanon andlang mores to Tilmundes ho.
 3. Ðanan andlang mores to Beorganstedinga mearce.
 4. Ðanne andlang mores to baberham.
 4. Ðanne to þelbrycge.
 5. Ðanne ðanen to sealgate.
 5. Ðannen to mycele mermerinn.
 6. Ðanen to sealt rode.
 6. Ðanen to feðer cirican siðe.
 7. Ðanne to þelbrige.
 7. Ðanne eft to ðam hlidgeate and on hage on Cycester.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 873 (Kem 662)
B15.8.452.
Bounds, Sawyer 873: Kemble 1839-48, no. 662.



 1. Ðys sind ða londegemære to Hamtune.
 2. Ðæt is ðonne ærest of pedredan upweard.
 3. Ðæt on ðene rycgwege.
 4. Of ðam ricgwege ðæt onbuton ða XXX acera.
 4. Ðæt eft on ricgweg.
 5. Of ricgwege ðæt on ða ealdan dic.
 6. Onlong dices ðæt on Eseburne.
 6. Of Eseburne up to ðere ealdan dic.
 7. Of ðere ealdan dic ðæt on wylihte mædwan.
 8. Of wylihte mædwan ðæt on mærbroc.
 8. Onlong broces ðæt on domnipol.
 9. Of ðam pole ðæt on ælles beorh.
 10. Of ðam beorge ðæt on mær wyllan.
 10. Of ðam wylle ðæt æft on Auene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 874 (Kem 673)
B15.8.453.
Bounds, Sawyer 874: Kemble 1839-48, no. 673; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest on Wiðigford eastæweardne.
 2. Ðanon ongehrihtæ on turding sceatt on ðæt
milgemæt.
 3. Swa on ðone wrefet.
 3. Andlang wrefetes on Cynedealle rodæ eastæweardæ.
 4. Ðanan ongehrihte on Stanhæmstede.
 5. Swa andlang mearce on ða lampyttas.
 5. Ðæt andlang mearcæs on broccæs hlæw.
 6. Of broccæs hlæwæ suð on ða hyrnan.
 7. Swa andlang mearcæ on waddunæ.
 8. Of waddunæ on ængelhamstæde westeweardan.
 8. Swa ongehrihtæ on ðonæ hærepað.
 9. West andlang hærepaðes on ða hyrnan.
 10. Swa andlang Fræccændunæ on Cyteling graf
westeweardne.
 11. Ðæt andlang mearcæ on smalan dæne on ðone
hærepað.
 12. Swa utt on sioluc ham.
 13. Of sioluc hammæ on scobban byrygels wæsteweardan on sagel
mære.
 14. Swa on ða fulan flodas.
 14. Ðæt andlang mearce on ða wyllas.
 15. Swa of westæweardan ðam wyllam ongerihte utt on ra lege
norðeweardre.
 16. Swa andlang streames on Wiðigford norðæweardran.
 17. And IX hagan on Wintancestre on Tænnere stret, and on
Embasinga stocæ an med, and æt Hines clifæ an mylen.
 20. Ðis is ðara XV hida boc æt Wudatune, ðe æðelred
cing gebocode æðelwearde his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 878 (Sawyer 27)
B15.8.454.
Bounds, Sawyer 878: Sawyer 1979, 46.



 1. Of ðam lytlan hlawan to þan longan snapan on ða stræte
forþ æfter strete oð cume to þan readan acon & ðær ðwers
ofer ða wuda þæt cyme in pire broces heafde.
 3. & æfter pire broc ðæt hit gæþ in bliðe up
æfter bliþe oð hit cyme in ceabbe broc æfter broce þæt cume in
ðan forde.
 5. From ðan forde æfter þære strete þeligeð cumb
welle lea oð cume on þa grene wege & forð æfter grene wege oð
hit cymeþ æft to ðan lytlan lauwan.
 7. Ðus hit hæfde eadelm & ælfred & æþelwold
swa swa hit Wulfsige ðe blaca & æscbryht hit geærdeden heom.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 881 (Kem 687)
B15.8.455.
Bounds, Sawyer 881: Kemble 1839-48, no. 687.



 1. Ðis syndon ða landgemære to Fobbefunten.
 1. Ðat hys, ærest on ðone haran hæsel.
 2. Of ðam haran hæsle on earnhylle middewerde.
 3. Of earnhylle on pottwyll.
 3. Of pottwille on ða ealdan wyrðe.
 4. Of ðære wyrðe to hearpaðe.
 5. Ðonne andlang hearpaðes to ðam anheafdan.
 5. Of ðam anheafdan on lokeres leage.
 6. Of lokeres leage on sigwynne dic.
 7. Ðonne of sigwynne dic upp on dune þrittig gyrda, be eastan
ceaster blædbyrig on ða byrigenne.
 9. Of ðare byrigenne on ðane hearpað.
 9. Ðonne andlang herepaðes on ðone scearpan garan
westewerdne.
 11. Of ðam garan in on ða yrfe.
 11. Of ðære yrfe in on ða gareðru.
 12. Of ðam gereðran feower ækeras be westan ðam hangran.
 13. Of ðam feower ækeran andlang heafda on blacan hylle
middewerde.
 14. Ðonon of blacan hylle norð to hearpaðe.
 15. Of ðam hearpaðe on ða westran dune westwerde.
 16. Of ðære dune on chealfhylle middewerde.
 17. Ðonne of chielfhylle on wulfhylle middewerde.
 18. Of wulfhylle to wuda.
 18. Swa be ðan eald wyrtruman in on Nodre.
 19. Ðonon andlang streames eft on ðæne hæran hæsl.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 883 (Kem 1289)
B15.8.456.
Bounds, Sawyer 883: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1289.



 1. Ðis sindon ðara fif hida landgemæra æt Eardulfes lea.
 3. Ærest of ðare greatan dic ðæt to æðeluuoldes lea
to ðan landgemære.
 4. Of ðan gemære swa æfter dene in sexig broc.
 5. Of sexig broce ðæt into Uffewylle broce.
 6. Of ðan broce ðæt on ða grenan dic.
 6. Of ðære dic be suðan ðære eorðbyrg ðæt on
Cwicelmes hlæw.
 7. Of ðan hlawe ðæt on ða portstræte.
 8. Of ðære portstræte ðæt wið lytle Ciltene an
æcer bræde.
 9. Ðæt on ðæne grenan weg ðe scyt to hegforda.
 10. Æfter ðan grenan wege ðæt foran ongen Cynewynne
wylle.
 11. Of ðære wylle ðæt into ðære gretan dic.
 12. Andlang ðære dic ðæt into bunon.
 13. Andlang bunan ðæt to ðan ealdan forda.
 14. Of ðan forda ðæt into Eardulfes lea.
 14. Of ðan lea ðæt eft to ðære greatan dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 885 (Cpb 31)
B15.8.457.
Bounds, Sawyer 855: Campbell 1973, no. 31.



 1. Þis sint þara vi sulunga landgemæro to Wuldaham.
 1. Ærest hit fehð on easteweardum Cethæmamearce.
 2. Suð þonon of Cethæmamearce on Burhhæmamearce þonne
west þonon Burhhæmamearce ut andlang Medwæge be middeweardum streame
oþ þara hiwena land to Hrofeceastre þonon norð be þara hiwena mearce
on Hyscendenesmearce of Hyscandenesmearce eft on Cethæmamearce.
 6. & þære mæde þe to Wuldaham gebyrað on
Cingmæde x æceras.
 7. & on Burhham on þam mædum viii æceras & on
myclan wysce v æceras.
 8. & þæt den æt Cildanspic.
 9. & þæt den on Poweshyrste.
 9. & hundteontiga swina ingang æt Horshyrste on þam
snade.
 10. & mid eallum þam mannum swa swa hit stod þa ic hit
ær hæfde.
 11. Þis synt þa landgemæra to Lytlanbroce þæt is
ærest seo eastmearc of Tæmese suð andlang ðæs bisceopes mearce to
Beorhtflædemearce: andlang Beorhtflædemearce to Tryflingesmearce andlang
Tryflingeshagan to þære portstræte.
 14. Þonan west andlang weges to þam wearhbeorge norð andlang
weges to Bicanpole þanan andlang fleotes ut on Temese oð midne stream east
andlang streames oð þæs bisceopes mearce.
 17. & þysne mylenstede þe þær to gebyreð æt
Leoferes hagan; þis is seo wudung þe þær to gebyreð ælce geare
fiftig foðra & an hund of þæs cinges acholte & husbot & þa
mæde flod .mæde. to Wullafinglande & Mædwægan hop &
Wassanmæde oð þone þreordic & þas dæn lwas Hocgetwisle
Lindhyrst Heanhefer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 887 (Kem 1292)
B15.8.458.
Bounds, Sawyer 887: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1292.



 1. Ærest of smalan wylle east be heafdan be ðan gemære
ðæt hit cymð innan cealcseaðes weg.
 3. And swa andlang weges innan Aculfes dene.
 3. Andlang dene ðæt on fildena wuduweg.
 4. Andlang weges ðæt on bryda beorh.
 5. Middeweardne of ðan beorge andlang dene on waddene.
 6. Andlang waddene on wyrðe.
 6. Of wyrðe andlang weges to hean lincan, to rugan hegcan.
 8. Swa andlang hegeræwe on Abban wylle.
 9. Ðannon eft on smalan wylle.
 9. Ðis sind ðas wudes gemæra ðe to ðam lande
gebyriað.
 10. Ðæt is, ærest andlang æcerweges on hreodslæd.
 11. Andlang slædes on gegan dene.
 12. Andlang dene ðæt on gegan lege, eastewearde of ðære
lege andlang burhslædes on burhwege.
 14. Ðanon on hageweg ut on ðæne feld.
 14. And swa þwyres ofer fernfeld on Wynstanes ham.
 15. Of ðan hamme a be wurtruman ðæt eft on ðone
æcerweg.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 889 (Kem 1291)
B15.8.459.
Bounds, Sawyer 889: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1291; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis is ðes hagan embegang ðe æðelred cing geuðe
into Ealdan mynstre, ofer Wulfsiges dæg preostes.
 2. Ærest fram Leofan hagan west andlang cypstræte oð hit
cymð to flæscmangere stræte.
 5. Andlang flæscmangara stræte ðet hit cymð to
scyldwyrhtana stræte.
 6. Andlang scyldwyrhtana stræte east eft ðæt hit cymð to
Leofan hagan.
 8. Ðis is ðæs hagan boc on Winceastre and ðes healfan
weres æt Brægentforda and ðæs æcersplottes ðe ðærto lið,
ðe æðelred cyning geuðe God elmihtigum and his halgan apostolan Petre
and Paule into Ealdan mynstre on ece inhyrnesse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 890 (Sanders)
B15.8.460.
Bounds, Sawyer 890: Sanders 1878-84, III, 35.



 1. Þis synt ðara tweira hida land gemæro æt Sandforda.
 2. Ærest on herpoð of crydian bricge, þonne on þone
norðran weg andlang herpoðes bufan cealdan wylle, of cealdan wylle west on
þa ealdan dic, eft on herpoð.
 5. Þonne west andlang dic be þam wege oþ weard setl, of weard
setle norð oþ hroces ford.
 6. Of hroces forda norð rihte oð henne stigle, of henne stigle
norþ on wyrtruman, of wyrtruman norð on þone hagan & on ðone broc
oþ ðel bricge.
 8. Of þel bricge adune andlang streames oð crydian, þonne
adune andlang streames oð crydian bricge.
 11. Ðys ys seo wude rædden.
 11. Ærest of hwytan wege to þam wurmstealle, fram þam
wurmstealle to hagan gete, fram hagan gete to suðeweardun þære twycenan
andlang þære lace to þære ea.
 14. Adun on þa ea to hwyta weges lace, upp on þa lace eft to
hwyta wege.
 16. Þis is ðara tweira hida land boc æt Sandforda þe
æðelred cinge het gebocan Alfwolde bisceope on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 891 (Kem 698)
B15.8.461.
Bounds, Sawyer 891: Kemble 1839-48, no. 698.



 1. Ærest of crawan crundul on wereðan hylle.
 1. On fyrdinges lea.
 2. On Eblesburnan to Afene.
 2. On wisere.
 2. On ða fulan lace.
 3. On earnes beorch.
 3. On dic et Beoreðes treowe.
 4. On ðon harepoðe to headdan grafe.
 4. Ðonne on ðone hagan to wytan wyrðe.
 5. On ðire broc.
 5. On welewe.
 5. On ða dic et Hiceles wyrðe.
 6. Ðonne ofer ðone feld on hagan ut þurh bremberwudu on
ðone stenenan stapul.
 7. Andlang herepaðes to fobban wylle.
 8. Andlang herepaðes to ðes hagan ende to fegerhilde forda.
 9. On ðone hagan on Ceorles hlewe, on crawan crundul.
 10. Ðonne on ða yferan gemere on Eblesburnan.
 11. On Stretford.
 11. On hrofan hric.
 12. Andlang weges on ða dic to bymera cumbe.
 12. And ðer þwyres ofer þreo crundelas ofer ða streat.
 13. Ðæt þurch ofer ða done to wudu beorch hylle ofer
berigancumb on Eblesburnan.
 15. On beordune.
 15. On ðes hlinces ende.
 16. On ðone smalan weg.
 16. Ofer higcumb on ðan smalan wege on ðone stan, on ðet
heð westeweard on ðone beorch to ðem ricgwege.
 18. Ðonne east andlang hricgweges to Brytfordinga landsceare.
 19. Ðæt suð on Stretford.
 20. Ðis is ðæs landes boc et Duntune ðe æðelræd
cynyg edniwan gebocodæ sanctæ trinitati and sanctæ Pætre and
Paulæ into Ealdan mynstran.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 892 (Nap-Steven 8)
B15.8.462.
Bounds, Sawyer 892: Napier and Stevenson 1895, no. 8.



 1. Þis syn þara X hida longemæra to suþham þe þa III
hida binnan synd þe wistan forworhte wið þone cyning æþelred mid
unrihtum monslihte.
 3. And fifte healf hid æt hlodbroce & æt hreodburnan.
 4. Þe mid þam oþrum lande forworhte wæron.
 4. And he hyra ealra geuþe his ealdormen leofwine a in ece yrfe.
 5. Þæt is þonne þær hlodbroc fealþ on ycænan
æfter streame þæt to þæm hyærde wycan.
 6. Fram þam hyerde wycan up to þam ællenstubbe to þam
mærstanæ.
 7. Of þam mærstane to þæm gemyþan.
 8. And æfter streame þæt to beornewæaldes hlawe.
 8. Of þam hlawe to þam pytte up on þam beanhlande.
 9. And to þæm pytte & swa of þem pytte to coccebyle
& to yppescelfe.
 10. Of yppescelfe æfter þæm heafdan to hæahhewellan.
 11. Of þam wyllan to hlodbroce.
 11. Æfter þæm broce þæt æft on ycenan.
 11. Þis syn þa hlandgemære into hlodbroce & to
hreodburnan.
 12. Þæt is þonne to wylman forda & of þam forda efter
sealtstrete to þam grenan wege.
 13. Of þam wege þæt æft on wylman broce æfter streame
þæt on hreodbroce.
 14. Of þam broce þæt up to þam hlangan þorne.
 15. Of þam þorne æfter þam heafdan þæt on þa wyllan
æt hlodbroce æfter streame þæt þonne up æfter þam heafdan to
þam mere.
 16. Of þam mere to þam hlawe on yppescelfe.
 17. Of þam hlawe to grenan hylle of þam hlawe to cocgebyll.
 18. Of cocgebyll æfter heafdan to þam wætergefeal æfter
streame þæt on stanhemeforde of þam fordæ þæt æft on wylman
forde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 893 (Kem 700App)
B15.8.463.
Bounds, Sawyer 893: Kemble 1839-48, no. 700 App.



 1. Ðis synd ðara syx sulunga landgemæra to Bromleage.
 2. Ærest on eastan Cyselhyrstes gemæra; ðonne on Croptunes
gemæra; ðonne ðanon on Rugebeorges gemæra; ðonne on suðhealfe
Cyssestanes gemæra, forð be weardsetlan.
 5. Ðonne be westan Wichames gemæra and be Ohhahames gemæra;
ðonne be norðan Beringahames gemæra and Modingahammes gemæra; and
ðanon eft east on cynges gemæra; ðæt on Cyselhyrst.
 9. <foreign>Haec utilitas siluarum ad eandem terram pertinet</foreign> in Andrede,
Billanoran, be Lindhyrste, and on Gleppanfelda, Scearnden, and ðæs ryhte
wið ðornden, and Broccesham be eastan ea, and Tannerahole, and Trinhyrst.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 896 (Kem 703)
B15.8.464.
Bounds, Sawyer 896: Kemble 1839-48, no. 703.



 1. Ærest on cattes stan.
 1. Fram cattes stane andlang fyrh on huredes mor.
 2. Of huredes more on ða hean streat.
 3. Andlang ðære hean stræte on motera ford.
 4. Of motera forde andlang motera lace ðæt on oteres ham.
 5. Of oteres hamme innan Cyrne.
 5. Andlang Cyrne on nunnena pol.
 6. Of nunnena pole on haran stan.
 7. Of ðan haran stane on ðonne haran wiðig.
 7. Of ðan haran wigie innan Temese.
 8. Up andlang Temese on hodes lace.
 9. Andlang hodes lace up on ðæt ea denn ðe man hæt west
ea.
 10. Andlang ðæs ea dennes ðe est on Cyrne.
 11. Up andlang Cyrne ðæt on ane lide lace.
 12. Andlang ðære læce ðæt eft on cates stan ðær
hit ær onfeng.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 898 (Kem 705)
B15.8.465.
Bounds, Sawyer 898: Kemble 1839-48, no. 705.



 1. Æryst of stanforda ondlong sices on þone stan.
 2. And þonan on þone ælrenan stob.
 2. Of þam stobbe on mid þone mere.
 3. Of þam mere in ycenan, up ondlong ycenan to cærssan
wyllan.
 4. Of cærssan willan in þone ælrenan stob, & þonan on
þa hehan æc on wulluht grafe middum of þære æc to þæm wiðin
bedde, & þonan to sic hlawe.
 7. Of þæm hlawe to þæm lytlan hlawe & þonan to
haran mere.
 8. Of haran mere to orman ho & þonan to snaw forda.
 9. And dune ondlong ea to þæm ælrenan stobbe.
 10. Þonan to hwerfel dice swa þonan to wullafes wællan &
to fasan dæles hyllæ.
 11. And swa þonan to þæm ælrenan stobbe & þanon to
þæm þyrnbedde.
 12. And swa to cuppan wællan & to holan wyllan & eft in
stanford.
 13. And seo hid æt earnlege belimpeð into yceantune mid
þissum gemærum.
 15. Æryst of þære burnan in þone holan broc.
 16. Ondlong broces on hwitan lege & swa on þone smalan
hæð.
 17. Of þæm hæðe in þone longan dic.
 17. Ondlong dices in þone ealdan weg.
 18. Of þæm wege in þa æspan & þonan in pocalege
broc.
 19. And swa ondlong broces in þa burnan.
 20. Swa ondlong burnan eft in holan broc.
 20. And an haga in wærinc wicum into yceantune.
 21. And healf þæt land æt suðham innur & uttur on
tofte & on crofte into yceantune.
 24. Þis is þara XXV hida boc þe æþelred cyngc gebocode
yceantun clofige his þegne a on ece erfe to geofenne & to geldenne ær
dæge & æft dæge ðæm þe him leofest seo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 899 (Kem 706)
B15.8.466.
Bounds, Sawyer 899: Kemble 1839-48, no. 706.



 1. Ærest of seuen pirien on ðere here wai, ðe schet
suðward wiðuten acceslegle wurð ut wrindes holt and swa anlang Herewines
to ælfwines hlipgate.
 4. Fram ðane hlipgate forð be is landschare inne Auene.
 5. Swa forð be streme inne byssi.
 5. Swa uppe bissy on wret.
 6. Swa onlonghes wret ðat it comet to Brisnodes landschare
scutn/.
 7. Forð be his landshare inne swinbroch.
 8. Forð be broke inne pumberig.
 8. Ut þurh pumberig inne tefleforð.
 9. Forð mid streme ðat it cumet to ælfwerdes landimare at
wutenham.
 10. Ðannes of wigewen broke forð be Leofwines imare innen
Auene.
 12. Forð be Auene ðat it cumet to Ferseforð ðes abbotes
imare innen Mitford.
 13. Of ðanne forde gyet be ðes abbotes imare.
 14. Eft into Auene.
 14. Swo in ðer be Auene ðat it cumet eft to ðes abbotes imare
to Werleghe.
 16. Swa be ðes abbotes imare to ælfgares imare at Farnleghe.
 17. Forð be is imare oð ðat it cumet to ðes kinges imare at
Heselberi.
 18. Forð be ðes kinges imare ðat it cumet to ælfgares
imare at Attenwrðe.
 19. Forð be is imare ðat it cumet to Leofwines landimare at
Coseham.
 21. Of ðan imare to ðes aldremannes imare at Witlege.
 22. Forð be ðanne imare ðat it comet to ælfwiges imare at
Broctune to ðanne wude ðe ierað into Broctune.
 24. Eft at seuen pirien.
 24. Forð be ælfnoðes imare innen æðelwines imare at
Chaldfelde.
 25. Of his imare innen ælfwines imare ðe Horderes.
 26. Forð be his imare innen ælphwines imare at Broctune.
 27. Eft into ðe pyrien.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 901 (Kem 1295)
B15.8.467.
Bounds, Sawyer 901: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1295.



 1. Ærest to Dumeltun eastan on Esingburnan.
 2. Ðanon suðan on Esingburnan westweardes andlang dices.
 3. Ðæt swa up on gerihte on Dagan oran.
 4. Ðæt swa andlang stæðbroces in gemære dic.
 5. Ðæt swa andlang on secgmære.
 6. Ðæt swa of secgmære estrihte in Esingburnan on Dyrna
ford.
 7. Ðonne sindon ðis ða gemære æt Pidwyllan.
 8. Of Pidwellan on crundelu.
 8. Of crundelum suðrihte andlang hricges on tittan dune.
 9. Of tittan dune west on cealdan wyllan.
 10. Ðanon on Winterburnan.
 11. Swa on Pidwyllan.
 11. Of Pidwyllan on Eomæres mædwe.
