 12. And swa on oðerne Winterburnan.
 13. Ðæt on Pidwellan.
 13. And ðeder hyrð inn an haga on port.
 14. And swa andlang Pidwellan up oð crundelu.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 902 (Kem 1296)
B15.8.468.
Bounds, Sawyer 902: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1296.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæra to ðan X hidan æt Hæsellea
to ðan nyðran tune.
 2. Ærest on roppan forda.
 2. Ðæt andlang wicgan dic ðæt hit sticað on wearra
ford.
 3. Swa andlang mores oð ðene bradan herepað.
 5. Ðæt on ðæra æcera heafada ðæt hit sticað on
Humbra.
 6. Andlang Humbra ðæt on roppan broc foron ongean stangedelf.
 8. Andlang ropan broces on hafocgelad.
 8. Eft andlang roppan broces ðæt hit cimð on roppan ford
ðær hit ær onfeng.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 903 (Robinson)
B15.8.469.
Bounds, Sawyer 903: Robinson 1911, 168.



 1. Ærest of þan hlawe into theoburnan, norð anglang
teoburnan to Cuforda.
 2. Of Cuforda to wætlinga stræte, east andlang stræte to
þam setle.
 3. Of þam setle on hinan croftes ge mære, þanon souð to
þan ealdan stræte.
 4. Of þare stræte eft to watlinga stræte, andlang strate to
þare ealden werhrode.
 5. Þanan to þas ealder mannes ge mære, þanan suð rihte
to akemannestræte.
 6. West andlang stræte to cyrringe, þanon eft on þone
hlawe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 905 (Sanders)
B15.8.470.
Bounds, Sawyer 905: Sanders 1878-84, III, 36.



 1. Ærest on easthealfe ys cinges land, & on suðhealfe burh
stræt, & on westhealfe þæs hiredes land to cristes cyricean, &
on norðhealfe se lictun.
 3. Nu is þis þara twegra æcera gemæru, on easthealfe
liþ þæs hiredes land inn to cristes cyricean, & on suðhealfe
þæs abbates inn to apuldere, & on westhealfe portmanna land, & on
norðhealfe cinges stræt.
 7. Nu is eft þis þara oðra twegra æcera gemæru, on
easthealfe liþ æþestanes land, & on suþhealfe cincges stræt,
& on westhealfe & on norðhealfe þæs hiredes land inn to sancte
augustine.
 10. Nu is þis ðæs anes æceres gemæru, on easthealfe
liþ æþestanes land, & on suðhealfe & on westhealfe cincges
stræt, & on norðhealfe ðæs hirides inn to sancte augustine.
 13. Nu is þis þæs syxtan æceres gemæru, on easthealfe
lið cincges stræt, & on suðhealfe hryþera ceap, & on
westhealfe æþestanes land & on norðhealfe.
 17. Þis ys þæs hagan boc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 909 (Kem 709)
B15.8.472.
Bounds, Sawyer 909: Kemble 1839-48, no. 709.



 1. This beth the X hide londe imere into Winchendon.
 2. Erest of Ashullefes well into Beridyke.
 2. Of the dyke on Hundrede trwe.
 3. Of the trwe in twam more.
 3. Of the more into the heuelonde.
 4. Of the heuelonde into twam well yrythie.
 5. Of the rythie into Bichenbroke.
 5. Of that broke into Tamestreme.
 6. Andlange Tamestreme to Ebbeslade.
 7. Of the slade to Merewell.
 7. Fro Merewell to Rugslawe.
 8. Fro the lawe to the foule putte.
 9. Fro the putte to Rusbroke.
 9. Fro Rusbroke to Wottesbroke.
 10. Fro Wottesbroke into Ashulfes well.
 10. <foreign>De Wihthull.</foreign> Thare beth III hide lond eymere into Withull.
 12. That is fro old Hensislade ofre the cliff into stony londy
wey.
 13. Fro the wey into the long lowe.
 13. Fro the lowe into the Portstrete.
 14. Fro the strete into Charewell.
 15. So aftir strem til it shutt eft into Hensislade.
 16. <foreign>De Bolles, Couele, et Hedyndon.</foreign> Thare beth hide lond eymere
into Couelee.
 17. Fro Charwell brigge andlong the streme on that rithe.
 18. Ling croft, endlong rithes estward to that cometh to other.
 20. Shet up norward to the furlonges heued.
 20. Fro the haued.
 21. Estward into Merehuthe.
 21. Fro the huthe into the bro.
 22. Into Deneacre.
 23. Fro the acre into the ockmere.
 23. Fro that mere.
 24. Fro Restell into broke.
 24. Fro the broke into Charwell.
 25. <foreign>De Cudeslawe</foreign>.
 25. Thare beth II hyde lond ymere into Cudeslawe.
 26. Erest of Portstrete into Trilliwelle.
 27. Fro the welle into rithe.
 27. Fro, to Byshopes more.
 28. Fro the more into Wyneleslade into the.
 29. Slade into Wyneles hull.
 29. Fro the hulle on hyme.
 30. <foreign>De Lrii S. Frideswide.</foreign> This priuilege was idith in
Hedington.
 32. Myn owne mynster in Oxenford.
 32. There seint Frideswide.
 33. Alle that fredome that any fre mynstre frelubest.
 34. Mid sake and mid socna, mid tol and mid teme, and with.
 35. Of Hedington, and of all the londe that therto be.
 36. And in felde and alle other thinge and ryth that y.
 38. Belyueth and byd us for quike and dede, and alle other.
 39. Alle other bennyfeyt, and alle other thinge that ther.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 910 (Kem 1301)
B15.8.473.
Bounds, Sawyer 910: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1301.



 1. Ðis syndon ðære anre higde landgemæro to Fleote.
 2. Ærest up of ðære sæ on scypcumb.
 2. Up ðonne on scypcumb on ðæne bydelæcer suðeweardne.
 3. Of ðam bydelæcere up on ðæt slæd be suðan
Dyrnanleage on gerihte to Berhamme.
 5. Up ðonne on Berham suðeweardne on ðæne hricgweg.
 6. Of ðam hricgwege norð on readan weg ufeweardne.
 7. Of readan wege norð andlang hricges on bitun liege.
 8. Of bitun liege west andlang weges on gerihte to Crymelhamme, up
on ða dic on ðone herpoð.
 10. West ðonne on herpoð of cumbweges heafod.
 11. Adune ðanne on cumbweg on horegan ford.
 12. Of horegan forde adune on strem on nyðeran Stanford.
 13. Of nyðeran Stanforda norð be ðæs yrðlandes foton on
gerihte to litegan hlosstede.
 14. Of litegan hlosstede on hreodmæde lace on Axan.
 15. Of Axan eft ut on sæ.
 16. And seo mædræden beniðan dic betweonan cealdan lace and
cullig.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 915 (Kem 1303)
B15.8.474.
Bounds, Sawyer 915: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1303.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæra to Wealtham.
 1. Ðæt is ærest æt Godan parruce.
 2. Of Godan parruce on Ecgeles stiele on hwitan pearruc.
 3. Of hwitan parruce on ðane greatan stoc.
 4. Of ðan greatan stocce on Wassanham.
 4. Of Wasanhamme on Bibban þorn.
 5. Of Bibban þorne on Ceaggan heal.
 6. Of Ceaggan heale on wifeles wyll.
 6. Of wifeles wylle ðæt est on Godan pearruc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 916 (Nap-Steven 11)
B15.8.475.
Bounds, Sawyer 916: Napier and Stevenson 1895, no. 11.



 1. Þis synt þa landgemæro to norðtune.
 1. Ærest of readan wylles heafdan to wiligbyrig.
 2. Fram wiligbyrig andlang stodfald dices.
 3. Swa andlang stodfald gemæres.
 3. Þæt hit cymð to stocc gemære.
 3. Swa in to þære ea.
 4. Andlang ea oþ þæt hit cymð eft to readan wylles
heafdon/.
 5. Ðis synt þære hide landgemæro æt rodan hangron.
 5. Ærest æt bradan wætere of smeðan hleawe to þære
stræt.
 6. Andlang stræte þæt hit cymð to yan lege.
 7. Of þære lege þæt hit cymð to frobirig stocce.
 8. Of þam stocce to þingham gete.
 8. Of þam gete.
 8. To eadwines gemære.
 9. Þanone on gerihte æfter gemære ut to wiþigho.
 10. Þanone eft to smeþan hleawe.
 10. Þis synt þa landgemæro to oxangehæge and to
bæcces wyrðe.
 11. Ærest of watforda into puda wyrðe.
 12. Of puda wyrðe in on mapuldorgeat.
 12. Of þam gate to east heale to þam þrym gemæron.
 13. Of þam gemæron to þam cyrstelmæle.
 14. Of þam cyrstelmæle to þære smalan æc.
 14. Of þære æc to haran þorne.
 15. Of þam þorne to þære defe.
 15. Of þære defe to beorclege.
 16. Of þære lege in to cuðhelming beam.
 16. Of þam beame in on þa stigele.
 17. Of þære stigele on rdingwylle.
 17. Of þære wylle in on colenge.
 19. Þis is þæra þreora landa boc to norðtune & to
rodan hangron.
 20. And to oxan gehæge mid bæcces wyrðe.
 20. Þe ælfric arce bisceop & his broðor leofric abbod
gebohton.
 21. And æþelræd cynincg þa gebocode gode ælmihtigon
into sancte albanes stowe on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 918 (Kem 1305)
B15.8.476.
Bounds, Sawyer 918: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1305.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæru to Mordune.
 2. Ærest on higford.
 2. Of higforda andlang Hreodburnan on Worf.
 3. Andlang streames on wurtanige westeweardne.
 4. Of wurtanige norðeweardan eft ut on Worfe stream.
 5. Andlang streames on Wudebricge.
 6. Ðanon ut on æsclace ðær easclacu fylð ut on Worf.
 7. Up ongean stream on ðæs langan furlanges eastende.
 8. Ðanon east on ða ealdan dic.
 9. Of ðære ealdan dic on Grindewylles lace an furlang.
 10. Ðanon on ætten pen, on ðone ellenstub.
 10. Ðanon a be ecge on ða medemunga.
 11. Of ðære medemungæ niðer on ðone ealdan wiðig on
ætten pennes læce.
 12. Ðanon on hnottan ford.
 13. Of ðan forda on filican slæd.
 13. Andlang slædes on ðone ealdan wylle.
 14. Ðonon ut on headdandune slæd.
 15. Andlang slædes oð bradan weg.
 15. Of ðan bradan wege andlang slades ut on higford, and ænne
hagan on Crocgelade ðe se cyncg ðærto forgifen hæfð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 920 (Sawyer 31)
B15.8.477.
Bounds, Sawyer 920: Sawyer 1979, 59.



 1. Þis syndan þa langemera to Roluestune.
 2. Ærest of dufan on hæcce, of hæcce on þone greatan
þorn, of þan þorne to ðan hæg stowe.
 3. Æfter hæg stowe to dottes hlawe of dotdes hlawe to þere
strete þær on ansidelege, of ansidelege on þa dic.
 4. Of ðan dice on þan fulan sich of ðan fulan siche on
wattiches æces of wattices æces on þan holan gryfe þær ða ealdan
broc holan syndan.
 6. Of ðan holan on þan ufer ende balcan of balcan to middel
lege, of middel lege to ðan scid hæge.
 8. æfter scid hæge þwers ofer bracan hyrste, þ on
mæran broce dune mid broce to þan stanigan forde þe ligeð to eadgares
lege of ðan forde to wulffeges hæge andland hæges on þa ofesan.
 10. Æfter ofesan to ðan fulan syce þ on þan broce of ðan
broce on stoc legan ford of ðan forde abiðan ofesan þ on ðone dic
hæge leofnaðes.
 12. Of ðan dice on þan fulan syce æfter sice on pilebroc dun
æfter broce on þan fulan sic þe scot betux twam lundan æfter sice to
cnapanhylle of cnapanhylle to ðan hæg stowe.
 14. Of ðan hæg stowe on þa deopan dæle of ðan dæle
on dufan, on þa bradan strete æt burtone, anlang stræte to
winstanesgemæra ut ðorh ðone wudu to ðan þorne þer ða þeofes
licgan.
 17. Æfter þære mæd eafden on þ wuda a æfter ofesan
þ eft on ðan bradan stræte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 925 (Kem 720)
B15.8.478.
Bounds, Sawyer 925: Kemble 1839-48, no. 720; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest of ðære cyricean norðeast hyrnan nygan girda
andlang stræte uton ða cypinge.
 2. Swa up anlang cypinge eahta gyrda ðet hit cymh to Wistanes
gemære.
 4. Swa andlang Wistenes gemere nygon girda ðæt hit cymh on
ðone wæterpyt.
 5. Fram ðam wæterpyt X gyrda andlang strete to ðære
cyrcean norðeast hyrnan.
 8. <foreign>De terra</foreign> Gode begeate.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 927 (Kem 1307)
B15.8.479.
Bounds, Sawyer 927: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1307.



 1. <foreign>Primitus</foreign> of Blecces forda on Temese.
 2. Andlang gemære on ðæt suðre stæð.
 3. Of ðam suðram stæðe andlang gemære on ceacca wylles
heafde.
 4. Of ceacca wylles heafde andlang gemære on beamster mere.
 5. Of beamster meare andlang gemære on headdan stigele.
 6. Of hæddan stigele andlang gemære on Leofrune gemære.
 7. Of Leofrune gemære andlang gemære eft on Bleccan ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 930 (Sawyer 35)
B15.8.480.
Bounds, Sawyer 930: Sawyer 1979, 68.



 1. Þis synt þa landgemære to withmere.
 2. Ærst of trente þær þa ðeofes hangað on middan bere
fordes holme, of ðan holme to geriht to þan lewe butan fif lan beheonan of
þan landan to þan sice.
 4. Of þan syce to þan mære þorne usweardan forstun of
þan þorne to an æcer, of an æcere in þone hæge, of ðan
hæge, in þæm broce.
 6. And long broces, þ cume on þone dic, on ansyðelege, norð
æfter dice þ cume on ceolfes crofte, on þone þe ioerneð fram
eansyðelege.
 8. Æfter stræte to þan stubbe, of þan stubbe, on þone
dic, æfter dice þ on stræte þ yrnð bi ebrocan, of ðan stræte
on þone dic.
 9. Of þan dice, on geriht on þone sich þe yrnð be chese
wælle hylle, & hunger hylle, æfter syche on geriht on þe ellen þe
stundað on wihtmere mære ant stretones.
 12. Of þan ellan, on þone forð æfte syce þe scoet of
þan forde on trentan up æfter trente þ cume þære þe þeofes
hengað, l ant pylltunes landes æcer ant mæd land, healf into wihtmere
& healf in to roluestune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 931 (Kem 1308)
B15.8.481.
Bounds, Sawyer 931: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1308.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæro into Twiwel.
 2. Ðæt is andlang nafrist broc up to ðrawoldes wel.
 3. And swa andlang ðæs sclædes up to ðam garan.
 4. And of ðam garan up to ðam mere.
 5. And of ðam mere into ealles herestret.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 933 (Kem 1309)
B15.8.482.
Bounds, Sawyer 933: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1309.



 1. Ærest on ærne dene.
 2. Ðanone on hornes beorh.
 2. Ðanone on leas ende.
 3. Ðanone on miclan corf, on miclan cruc middeweardne.
 4. Ðanone on andlanges hrycges on hlydan pol.
 4. Ðanone on syres ford.
 5. Ðanone on ðone hagan.
 5. Ðanone on Breowoldes ham.
 6. Ðanone on byssan broc.
 6. Ðanone on lyfdic.
 7. Ðanone on lychagan, on grenan weg.
 7. Ðanone on focgan crundel.
 8. Ðanone on Tryndlea wege.
 8. Ðanone on Earna lea wege.
 9. Ðanone forð andlanges herpaðes eft on ærne dene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 934 (Kem 1310)
B15.8.483.
Bounds, Sawyer 934: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1310.



 1. Ærest of Waddune andlang weges to ðan grestune.
 2. Swa andlang ðæs grestunes dic to ðan wege on
eastanwyrðe ðæne tun.
 3. Swa andlang weges to ðære dice hyrnan.
 4. Swa andlang dic innon ðæne æsc.
 5. Of ðane æsce innon ðane ealdan mære.
 5. Of ðane ealdan mære innon ða bræce.
 6. Of ðan bræce andlang beces innon rodstubban.
 7. Swa of rodstybban to loddere þorne.
 8. Swa of loddere þorne to flecge stane.
 8. Of flecge stane to ðan ferngaren.
 9. Of ðan ferngaran eft on Waddune to ðan ealdan bece.
 10. And ðis sind ðære wudubære landgemaru æt
ðæclege ðe herto hyrað.
 12. Ærest of ðam hæcce to Dudemæres hele.
 12. Of Dudemæres hele to merclege.
 13. Of merclege on stanlege.
 14. Of stanlege to ðære dunlege.
 14. Of ðar dunlege swa eft innon ðane hæcc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 935 (Kem 723)
B15.8.484.
Bounds, Sawyer 935: Kemble 1839-48, no. 723.



 1. Ðys syndon ða landgemare ðe syndon on ðese ealdan bec
awritene.
 2. Ærest onlong Foss on ða hocihtan dic.
 3. Of ðere hocihtan dic on ðone bradan þorn.
 4. On Foss.
 4. Onlong Foss on ðene fulan ford.
 4. Ongean stream on langan ford.
 5. Of langaforda on Wenric ongean streame.
 6. Of Wenric on ða grenan dic.
 6. Of ðere dic on ða bradan strette.
 7. Of ðere strætte on ða grenan dic.
 8. Onlong þere dic ðæt eft on Foss.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 938 (Kem 1284)
B15.8.485.
Bounds, Sawyer 938: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1284.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemere to Wike.
 2. Ærest fram ðare westsæ in Saggelorð.
 3. And fram Saggelorð inne muledich.
 3. And swa andlang ðare dich to blake ston.
 4. Fram ðane stone to Soredich.
 5. Fram Soredich to lotomor.
 5. And swo bi richte merke to ellenstubbe.
 6. Of ellestubbe in ðare æstsæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 942 (Kem 712)
B15.8.486.
Bounds, Sawyer 942: Kemble 1939-48, no. 712.



 1. Ærest of Ellenforda on ðæne ænlypigan þorn.
 2. Of ðam þorne on kolan treow.
 3. Ðonan andlang mearce of ðone middemestan beorg.
 4. Ðænne east andlang dænes on ða leage.
 4. Of ðære leage andlang hagan on huredes treow.
 5. Ðanan andlang mearcæ on weoleage.
 6. Of weoleage on ðonæ greatan hlinc.
 7. Of ðam hlince æft utt an Ellenford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 943 (Hart)
B15.8.487.
Bounds, Sawyer 943: Hart 1966, 190.



 1. Þis synd þe land mæro to beccalege.
 1. Of scipwege into meoslege, of meoslege into Westlege.
 2. Of Westlege into holowege, of holowege into mærbroce.
 3. Of mærbroce in to francanslo, of francanslo into miclandic.
 4. Of myclandic into þere ealden ea, up of þere ealdan ea in to
ottanmere.
 5. Of ottanmere þuyrs ouer bugenroda, of bugeroda into
mærmer.
 6. Of mærmere on merþorn, of mærþorn to eadlaues oc.
 7. Of eadlaues ac to luhanþirne, of luhanþyrne on þone ealdan
mærweg into wude.
 8. Andlang þes ealdan mereweges into hildesdene, of hildes dene
into Wyueles ho to roces æcere.
 10. Of roces æcre to þolege, of þolege to gold willan.
 11. Of gold wyllan to grenewe into scipwege.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 944 (Kem 713)
B15.8.488.
Bounds, Sawyer 944: Kemble 1839-48, no. 713.



 1. Ærest of Icenan on cyninges mearce on bican stapol.
 1. Of bican stapole on waddan stocces.
 2. Of waddan stocce andlang mearce on wichyðe.
 3. Upp andlang streames on ða lace.
 5. Upp andlang mearce of ækergeat.
 5. Ðanan upp andlang weges on sweðælingford and feldles
gemæne.
 7. And ðis his ðara fif hida landscaru to Westtune.
 8. Ærest upp of Icenan on rican ford.
 8. Of rican forda suðeast andlang mearcæ on ðes cyninges
hlywan.
 10. Ðanan andlang mearce on ðæne imbstoc.
 10. Of ðam stoccæ andlang mearcæ on ðone beorh.
 11. Of ðam beorge on gerihte utt on sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 950 (Sanders)
B15.8.489.
Bounds, Sawyer 950: Sanders 1878-84, III, 39.



 1. Ðis syndan ðæs dennes land gemæru to Hæselersce.
 1. Ærest andlang Fearnleges burnan oð runanleages mearce, of
runanleages mearce be holanbeames mearce, of holanbeames mearce swa on gerihte
to wiglege bufan ðære smiþðan to þam geate.
 5. Of þam geate innan þæne sihter, andlang sihtres innan
þære bradan burnan, niðer andland bradan burnan, be þæs
arcebisceopes mearce eft innan fearnleages burnan.
 8. Ðis is þæs dennes boc æt Hæselersce þe Cnut cing
gebocode ælfstane arcebisceope on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 955 (Kem 730)
B15.8.490.
Bounds, Sawyer 955: Kemble 1839-48, no. 730.



 1. Ærest of Bertes welle on ðare ealde diches heued.
 2. Of ðare dich on flexcumbes heuede.
 2. On ðane ealde paðe.
 3. Of ðane paðe on ða ellen þirnen.
 3. Of ðare þirnen on deuelisc stream.
 4. Anlang streames on ðone hwiten welle.
 5. Of ðane welle on ðane bergh uppen morhelle.
 6. Of ðane berghe on ða ealde berig.
 6. Of ðane bery on ðane rugen bergh.
 7. Of ðane bergh on sebergh.
 8. Of seberghe on horðiuel.
 8. Of horðiuele on neðan pol.
 9. Of ðane pole inne ða þornen.
 9. Of ðare þyrnen on ðane þorn up an Gretindune.
 10. Of ðane þorne on ðo stancysten on holencumbe.
 11. Of ðane stancyste on blacmanne bergh.
 12. Of ðane berghe be anne hefden on hippe pað.
 13. Of ðane paðe on Cheselburne on shete bergh.
 14. Of ðane berghe on braden bergh.
 14. Of brade berghe on ðare diches hirne.
 15. Of ðere hirne on þorndunes cnep.
 16. Of ðane cneppe on ðane greate hlinc.
 16. Of ðare linke on burestowe on ðat ealden reshbed.
 17. Of ðane bedde bi streame in ðane miliere.
 18. Of ðane miliere on ðo apeltren.
 19. Of ðare apeltren on ðare haren torre on hiwisc bergh.
 20. Of ðane berghe on liscbroc.
 21. Uppe be broke on ða sticelen lane.
 21. Of ðare lane on ðo tweie pettes.
 22. Of ðone petten on ðane hordþiuel.
 23. Of ðane þiuel on ðane bergh.
 23. Of ðane bergh on anne þornstub.
 24. Of ðane stubbe on ðane snieren fyrsgaran.
 25. Of ðan garan eft on Bertes welle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 956 (Edwards)
B15.8.491.
Bounds, Sawyer 956: Edwards 1866, 325.



 1. Ærest of Humeran east be middel hæma mearce to
Tudanbyrig.
 2. Of Tudanbyrig nyþer into Miceldefer, and swa andlang
Miceldefer to Leofwinne mearce.
 4. Of Leofwynne mearce to þam hæþenan beorge.
 5. And of þam hæþenan beorge eft in to Drægtune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 960 (Kem 739)
B15.8.492.
Bounds, Sawyer 960: Kemble 1839-48, no. 739; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgæmæræ to Hanitune.
 1. Ðæt is, ærest on eama sol.
 2. Of eama solæ on Tislea.
 2. Of Tislea on wæcha hric.
 3. Of weca hricg on byrig weg.
 4. Forð bæ byrig wæge on ælfwines mearcæ.
 4. Forð bæ ælfwines mearcæ on lufæ hammas.
 5. Of lufe hamman on dod holcan.
 6. Of dod holcan on dumlæage gæt.
 7. Of dunleage geatæ on grænlægæ.
 7. Of grenlege on ywyrstæ stigele.
 8. Of ðære stigele on Hæringæs gæt.
 9. Of Hæringes geatæ to hæselholtæ.
 9. Forð bæ hæselholtæ on collpytt.
 10. Of collpyttæ on swealewan hlypan.
 11. Of swealewan hlypan on hrittan wæg.
 11. Forð bæ hrittan wæge to bæcce funtan.
 12. Of bæccæ funtan on ða riscæan.
 13. Of ðære riscean on sagelmære on ðæt hæccgeat.
 14. Of ðam hæccgetæ to twybyce.
 14. Of twybycæ to swinhamman.
 15. Of swynhamman to ðære hwitan dic.
 16. Of ðære hwitan dic to ðæra geburna mærcæ.
 16. Forð bæ ðære merce on wudacotan.
 17. Of wudacotan to swacan hlypan.
 18. Of swacan hlypan æft to hrihtan wegæ.
 19. Ðis is ðara VII hida boc to Hanitune ðe Cnut cing
gebocode Leofwine Bondan sunu on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 961 (Kem 741)
B15.8.493.
Bounds, Sawyer 961: Kemble 1839-48, no. 741.



 1. Ærest of Mylebroce on Cuceles hylle.
 2. Of Cuceles hylle on holun.
 3. Of holun on Motbeorh.
 3. Of Motbeorge on þe stræt.
 3. Of ðære stræt on ðone ealdan wæg ðurh ðone graf
& swa on ðone smalan pæð ofer ða stræt on þone ealdan weg
& swa andlang weges on Atange, earh.
 6. And swa on ætstealles beorh.
 7. Of ðam beorge suþ on ða ealdan wale.
 8. Swa on corf getes westran cotan.
 8. Of ðam cotan suþ be wale on ðære dice hyrnan.
 9. And swa west be dic on oþre hyrnan swa suþ be dic on
ðære mæde hyrnan.
 11. And ðær west be dic on oþre mæde hyrnan.
 12. And swa suþ andlang dic on halgan wyl.
 12. Of halgan wylle west be dic on ða clæian lane.
 13. Of ðære clæian lane on Mylebroc adun be streame eft of
Mylebroce on Cuceles hylle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 962 (Kem 743)
B15.8.494.
Bounds, Sawyer 962: Kemble 1839-48, no. 743.



 1. Ðis sind ðera V hida landgemæro æt Wurðige ðæ
Cnut cing het gebocian Lyfince bisceope on æce yrfæ.
 4. Ærest on Beoccing mæde.
 4. Fram Beoccing mæde on ða gewrincloda dic to wassa dic dune
ende.
 5. Ðonne to deopan dæne.
 6. Ðanon to witan dic.
 6. Ðonne fram hwitan dic to ænta dic.
 7. Of ænta dic to ðære rode.
 8. Of ðære to ðam swalan wege.
 8. Ðanan to ðære haran apeldran.
 9. Fram ðæra haran apeldran to stapol þornæ.
 10. Ðonnæ to ðære bæce.
 10. Fram ðæræ bæcæ utt on Icenan adun on stream.
 11. Æft on Beoccing mæde.
 12. Ðis is ðara V hida boc to Worðiæ ðæ Cnut cing
gebocode Lyfinge bisceope on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 963 (Kem 744)
B15.8.495.
Bounds, Sawyer 963: Kemble 1839-48, no. 744.



 1. Ðis is þære healfan hide landgemæro æt mæwi.
 2. Ærest on cleaca þonne adun on mæwi of ælbroc.
 3. Þonne on ælbroc of þone æwylman.
 4. Þonne east on gerihte to þam merc stane.
 4. Of þam merc stane to þam blacan pytte & þanne on
gerihte to odda wylle.
 6. Adun on odda wylles lace to þan ford lace.
 7. Upp on stream to þam æwylman, þanon eastrihte to boc
sætena hig wege.
 8. Þonne ut on þone hig weg to þam cyric wege, þanon on
gerihte to þam mere.
 9. Of þam mere to edswyþe torre.
 10. Fram edswyðe torre on gerihte eft on cleaca.
 12. Þis is þære healfan hide landboc to mæwi þe cnut
cing het gebocian æþerice his þegene on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 964 (Kem 746)
B15.8.496.
Bounds, Sawyer 964: Kemble 1839-48, no. 746.



 1. Ærest of Eoccan east andlang ðære ealdan dic on ða
lampyttes.
 3. Of ðam pyttan est be gemære on byttman dic.
 4. Of ðære dic est be gemære on cyll riðe.
 4. Andlang cyll riðe to bottan ige.
 5. Of bottan ige be Leofrices gemære to Winagares stapule.
 6. Of ðam stapule to Wihtlufe hamme westwerdon.
 7. Eft on Eoccan.
 8. Ðisne landsplot becwæð æðelwine into Abbendune and
ðone hagan on Oxnaforda ðe he sylf onsæt on mycelre gewitnysse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 967 (Kem 751)
B15.8.497.
Bounds, Sawyer 967: Kemble 1839-48, no. 751.



 1. Ðis sind ðara III hida landgemæra æt Mytune.
 2. Ærest on leomenan a be healfon streame.
 3. Swa of leomanan on doddan læw.
 3. Of ðam læwe on ðone haran þorn.
 4. Of ðam þorne on ðone bradan mere.
 5. Of ðam mere on tæceles broc.
 5. A be healfon streame on Auene.
 6. Andlang Auene a be healfon streame eft on leomene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 968 (Farrer)
B15.8.498.
Bounds, Sawyer 968: Farrer 1914-15, I, 25, no. 8.



 1. Ðis sint ða landgemære to Pateringatune.
 1. Ærest hit fehð on pit, and swa andlang þære dice to
þan stane.
 3. And þonan ofer þon mere to ðære scypene.
 3. And swa andlang þære dice be westan þorpe on hole dic.
 4. And swa to sealtan mersce.
 5. And þonan swa man mæge rihtest locian to scelle tofte.
 6. And þonan to þæs dices eastende.
 7. And swa to Earneshoh.
 7. And swa onan to Humbran to Earneshoh welle, and swa andlang
Humbran to Pateringatunes fleotes muðan.
 9. And swa andlang þæs fleotes up to Crosfleote.
 10. And þæt æfre mid þam fleote up oð hit cume to
middes þære bricge betwix Pateringatune and Winestede.
 12. And siððan þurh midden weard þæs fennes to
Bradanholme/, and swa up mid þam sice eft to pitte.
 15. And inland on Pateringatune XXX plogaland, and in Winestede
viii plogaland.
 16. And on Halsaham þriddan healfes plogesland and healf an
oxangang/ and on þorpe ii plogagang landes and i oxangang and healfes
plogesland on Sumeres mersc.
 19. And socne þærto ofer eal Wifestede butan anes plogesland.
 20. And ofer al Halsaham.
 21. And ii plogaland on þorpe butan anes oxangange.
 22. Þæt is ealles X plogaland socnelandes.
 22. Nu syndon ealle þa land þe licgað butan þære yrð
merce æt Pateringatune mid þyssere boc gebohte eal swa wel swa
rilnetune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 969 (Kem 1318)
B15.8.499.
Bounds, Sawyer 969: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1318.



 1. Ærest cealdan broc scyt on Winburnan.
 2. Of Winburnan on Mapoldorlea middeweardne.
 3. Of Mapoldorlea innan eastlea.
 3. Ut of eastlea on ðæt slæget linlæge mor.
 4. Of ðam slægete in achirste on suðbeara suðeweardne.
 6. Of suðbeara on linleaga mor.
 6. Of linleage more on ða gemearcodan lindan.
 7. Of ðære gemearcodan lindan on biricgaran be ðære
norðeage.
 8. Of biricgaran on ðone norðheal.
 9. Of ðam norðheale on blacan dune.
 9. Of ðære dune on ciddesbeara.
 10. Of ciddesbeara on ða haran stanas.
 11. Of ðam haran stanon andlang blacan dune ecge norð on ða
haran apoldran.
 12. Of ðære apoldran suð on ðone mere, on ðona haran
wiðig.
 13. Of ðam wiðige west on wænecan wyrð on ða beorgas.
 14. Of wænecan wyrðe on suðheal suðeweardne.
 15. Of ðan heale on holan broc.
 16. Of ðan broce to ruwan leges gete.
 17. Of ðan gete on hyrn.
 17. Up andlang hyrn on ðone mearchagan.
 18. Of ðam hagan on ðone readan weg.
 18. Of ðam wege on heara Wulfrices gemære.
 19. Of ðam landgemære andlang streames eft on cealdan broc.
 21. Ðis ys ðæra VII hida landboc to Hortune ðe Cnut cining
gebocode Bouige hys huskarle on ece yrfe.
 23. Nu swutelað hit her ðæt Boui mid his scette awerede
ðæt land and forescet on ealre scire gewitnysse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 970 (Kem 752)
B15.8.500.
Bounds, Sawyer 970: Kemble 1839-48, no. 752; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd ðara X hida landgemæra to Polhematune.
 2. Ðæt is ðonne, ærest of þrim beorgan on cobban dene.
 3. Ðæt on suðlege eastewearde.
 3. Of suðlege on beanleage.
 4. Of beanleage on þistelleage.
 4. Of þistelleage andlang stret ðæt on Terstan.
 5. Of Terstan upp on ðone gemenan þorn.
 6. Ðonne on enta hlewe on fecces wuda easteweardne.
 7. Of fecces wuda on bosen hangran.
 8. Of bosen hangran on ða stret.
 8. Andlang stret on ðone wulfpyt.
 9. Of ðam wulfpytte syð andlang dene be ðæs cynges
gemære.
 10. Of ðæs cynges gemære on ðone herepað.
 11. Of ðam herepaðe upp on ceabban dune.
 12. Andlang dune on cealcriðe.
 12. Of cealcriðe on hecenes hangran andlang mearce on
norðeweardne/ sæwwe lea.
 14. Andlang sæwwe lea on ða stret innan suðlea.
 15. Of ðære strete swa on weasteweardan þutinga scylf.
 16. Ðæt be repple on easteweardne cobbelea.
 17. Swa eft to þrym beorgam.
 18. Ðis is ðara X hida boc æt Polhamatun ðe Cnut cing
gebocodæ Godwine urlæ on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 971 (Davidson)
B15.8.501.
Bounds, Sawyer 971: Davidson 1883, 290-92.



 1. Ðis sind þære anre hide land gemære æt stoke.
 1. Ærest of sulforda east andlang herepaþes on culum.
 2. Þanon eastrihte to langan forda, þanon suð andlang
streames oð culum lace, andlang lace.
 3. Of þære lace upp to þære ealdan dic, andlang þære
dic on ceagga cumb.
 5. Þanon on cinges sloh þanon andlang weges to þam mægen
stane.
 6. Þanon suþ þærða wegas to ligcað, þanon on þone
morþmystan hrigc weg.
 7. Andlang hricges to þære eorðburh midde weardre, þanon
on brydena wyll.
 8. Þanon ut on exan, upp andlang exan oð scræwa leges lace
& scræwa leg þærto.
 9. Þonne fram æþelstanes hammes forda eft on sulford.
 10. And iiii eceras bewestan exa forna gean edferðes eald land.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 972 (Kem 750)
B15.8.502.
Bounds, Sawyer 972: Kemble 1839-48, no. 750.



 1. Ðis syndan ðære þryre hida landgemære æt Hylle.
 2. Of ðam ealdan hornforda suð on ðone herpeð.
 3. Of ðam herpaðe west on ða lange rewe on ðone stan.
 4. Of ðon stane west be wyrtrum on fiducforda.
 5. Of fiducforda adun on ðone stream.
 5. Of ðan streame on norðeward efslea.
 6. Of efslea on hrumwyll.
 7. Of hrumwylle on hudecumes heafod.
 7. Of hudecumes heafde adun on ealda tan.
 8. Swa anlang streames on ealda hornford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 974 (Sanders)
B15.8.503.
Bounds, Sawyer 974: Sanders 1878-84, III, 42.



 1. Ðis sindan þa land gemæra to berwican.
 1. Þæt is ærest hit fehð on æt stanforda & æt
winninge.
 2. And swa suð andlang stanstræte oð þæt ciricland.
 3. And þænne andlang cyric landes oð oteres poles
gemæra/.
 4. And andlang oteres poles gemære oð þæt hit cymð to
cynges forda.
 5. And swa forð oð hit cymð into ðære sture.
 6. And andlang sture oð hit cymð to fif æceran.
 7. And ðonne licgeað þa fif æceras of norð healf sture
be/ sture & sturtunes gemæran.
 8. And swa andlang sturtunes gemæran oð þæt hit cymð to
eastan fif æceran.
 9. And swa into ðære sture, & swa andlang sture oð
þæt hit cymð eft into stanforda & to winnincge.
 11. Þa lond gemæra to ðam wudu æt gimmincge þe hyrð
into berwican.
 12. Þæt is ærest fram hægtunes gemæran oð sturtunes
gemæran.
 13. And ðanon suð to wylmingtunes gemæran.
 14. And ðanon west to gemæran.
 14. And swa forð to swanatunes gemæran.
 15. And swa norð to hortunes gemæran.
 16. And swa east eft to hægtunes gemæran.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 975 (Kem 1322)
B15.8.504.
Bounds, Sawyer 975: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1322.



 1. Ærest on Hornesbeorg.
 2. Of ðam beorge on leas ende on Corfget.
 2. Of ðam gete on cruc middeweardne.
 3. Ðonne of cruc on ðone smalan hricg.
 4. Andlang hricges on hlyda pol.
 4. Of ðam pole andlang streames on fyrsford.
 5. Of ðam forda andlang readan hyrstes to hlypegete.
 6. Fram hlypegete to ðam colpytte.
 7. Fram colpette to ðam healfan treowe.
 8. Ðanne forðrihtes on Browoldes heal, and ðanon on staford
upp ongean stream.
 9. Of ðam streame on stochylle.
 10. Of stochylle on fogga crundel easteweardne.
 11. Of ðam crundele forð be wyrtruman on Brumdun middeweardne.
 12. Of Brumdune on murtes wyll.
 12. Of murtes wylle ongean stream on Tollor æwylman.
 13. Of ðam æwylman on Cotte dene.
 14. Of Cotta dene on ruwan beorg.
 15. Of ðam beorge on rigcumb middeweardne.
 15. Of rigcumbe on gyrdlea middeweardne.
 16. Of gyrdlea on ðone stanigan weg.
 17. Of ðam wege on ðone wæter pytt.
 17. Of ðam pytte on Coccelmæres dene.
 18. Of ðære dene on earne dene.
 19. Of earna dene eft on Hornesbeorg.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 977 (Kem 736)
B15.8.505.
Bounds, Sawyer 977: Kemble 1839-48, no. 736.



 1. Ðis syndon þa landgemæra innto niwanham.
 2. Ærest on þa dic þe ælfric biscop let dician.
 3. Of þære dic on þæne cyric pæð.
 4. Andlang pæþes on ðæne bradan weg.
 4. Andlang weges on helmstanes lege.
 5. Of ðære lege betwux þam twam wegum on ðæne stocc.
 6. Of ðam stocce on ða dic.
 6. Of ðære dic on ðone broc.
 7. Andlang broces on þæt fule sic.
 7. Of ðæs sices heafdon into þæm pytte.
 8. Of ðam pytte on þa dic.
 9. Andlang dice on ðone wyll.
 9. Of ðam wylle on ðæne pæð.
 10. Of ðam pæþe on ðæne mær pytt.
 10. Of ðam pytte andland fyrh on þa heafda.
 11. Andlang heafda on ðæne grenan pæð.
 12. Andlang pæþes eft on ða heafda.
 13. Andlang heafda norð on ðone stybb.
 13. Of ðam stybbe on ða stræt.
 14. Andlang stræt on þa mær furh.
 14. Andlang fyrh to þam west heafdon.
 15. Of ðam heafdon norðriht on ðæne wyll.
 16. On þam wylle into dræghæma gemære.
 17. Andlang gemæres on þa hæþenan byrgelsas.
 17. Of ðam byrgelson andlang pæþes on hindehlyp.
 18. Of hindehlype andlang pæþæs on þa wyrtwalan.
 19. Of ðam wyrtwalan on heort sole.
 20. Of heort sole on ðone smeþan hlæw.
 21. Of ðam hlæwe on ða furh.
 21. Andlang fyrh on ða wyrtwale.
 22. Swa be ðære wyrtwale on wiðig wylle.
 23. Of ðære wylle on þæne stodfald þanon on þæm
haran pæð andlang pæþes on ðæne mær ðorn.
 24. Þanon suðriht on ðæne heafod æcer.
 25. Of ðam heafdon on ðæne weg.
 26. Of ðam wege on ða buttucas.
 26. Of ðam buttucon on ðone broc.
 27. Andlang broces on þæt reada clif.
 27. Of ðam clife on þa furh andlang fyrh on leofsunes heafod
æcer syððan æfter doddafordung gemære on ða port stræt.
 30. Of ðære stræt suðriht on þæne mere.
 30. Of ðam mere on ðone broc.
 31. And swa eft upp andlang broces on fearnhylles sic andlang sices
be eofordunenga gemære on þa stræt.
 33. Andlang stræt wiðutan ða wyrtwalan þanon on þa dic
þe we ær onfengon.
 34. And an myln binnan doddafordinga land score.
 35. And of rotaby innto niwanham twa hund swina mæsten.
 36. And wuduræden loca hwæs man beþurfe.
 38. Into niwanham.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 993 (Kem 762)
B15.8.506.
Bounds, Sawyer 993: Kemble 1839-48, no. 762.



 1. Ðis sindan ða landgemæro ðe to Fernbeorgan
gebyrigæð.
 2. Of Fernbeorge west on ðone weg to ðam stanum.
 3. Of ðan stanum suð on ðone weg oð ða andheafda.
 4. Of ðam andheafdum on ða hlincrewe up to ðære dic be
norðan stodfaldan.
 6. Ðonne forð on ða dic to mearflodan be eastan lilling lea.
 7. Ðonne forð andlang ðæs suðeran weges oð ðæt
lange treow.
 8. Ðonne forð west on ðone weg ofer beocum to ðan
stancrundele.
 9. Ðonne norð on ðone smalan weig wið eastan brocan beorh
to ðan wege ðar east ligð.
 11. Ðonne forð on ðone weg to cytelflodan be westan mules
cumbe ðær ða weges twisligað.
 13. Ðonne forð to Scyldmære.
 13. Ðonne forð on ða furh to fyrcumbe.
 14. Andlanges fyrcumbes middeweardes to ðære dene.
 15. Ðonne forð on ða denu to ðæra wega gemyðan.
 16. Ðonne forð to ðam hwitan wege to ðan haran þornan.
 17. Ðonne of ðam hwitan wege on Feornbeorh and se leag be estan
catmere ðe ðærto gebyrað, ðæt is on ðone weg ðe lið to
stanleage.
 20. Ðonne forð siððan suð on ðone stanihtan weg of
stanmeringa gemære.
 21. Ðonne forð on ðone smalan weg to ðam fulan wege se
hatte Stifincweg.
 22. Ðæt is catmeringa gemære and ðæs landes to
Feornbeorgen.
 23. Ðonne forð andlang ðæs weges ut on ðone feld.
 24. And ðonne ealle ða hangras betweonan ðam wege and ðam
ðe to stanleage lið gebyriað ealle to Feornbeorgan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 994 (Kem 763)
B15.8.507.
Bounds, Sawyer 994: Kemble 1839-48, no. 763.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæra to ðære hide æt
Seolescumbe.
 2. Ærest of Seolesburnan andlang ðæs beces.
 3. Of ðam bece suð andlang ðæs weges on Leofwines dene.
 4. Of Leofwines dene east andlang ðæs weges on bradan lea.
 5. Of ðam lea suð andlang weges on Citware mearce.
 6. Of Citware mearce west innan Seolescumb.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 998 (Kem 1332)
B15.8.508.
Bounds, Sawyer 998: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1332.



 1. Ðis syndon ðære healfan hide landgemæro æt
Lytlanhamme.
 2. Ærest on Exanmuðan.
 2. Ðonne up on stryem, be norðan Lydewicnæsse on ðone
norðran mere.
 4. Up andlang riðan of ðone æwylm.
 4. Ðanone eastrihte to hafocys setle.
 5. Ðanone eastrihte to ðan hricgwege.
 6. Andlang ðæs hricgweges on ða ealdan dic.
 7. East andlang ðære dic of ðære wega gelæto be
norðan ðam fulan lande.
 8. Ðanon norð on ðone grenan weg on auan ford.
 9. Of ðam fordan up andlang stryemes on ðone sele.
 10. Of ðam sele norð on ðone grenan weg to ðam slæde.
 11. East up andlang ðæs slædes to ðære pleginstowe.
 12. Ðonne to ðan herpaðe.
 12. Andlang ðæs herpaðes to fugelis beorhdune.
 13. Andlang ðære dune to fuhgeles beorhge.
 14. Fram ðam beorhge suð to ellewurðie.
 15. Ðanon to ðan broce.
 15. Adun ðonne andlang ðæs broces eft ut on sæ.
 17. Ðis is ðære healfan hyde landboc æt Littlanhamme ðe
Eadweard kyng let gebocygean Ordgare his þegne on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 999 (Kem 767)
B15.8.509.
Bounds, Sawyer 999: Kemble 1839-48, no. 767.



 1. Ærest on ða haran apeldran.
 1. Of ðare apeldran andlang pinnan rode.
 2. Of ðære rode betweox morsceagan and middellea þwyres on
ða ealdan dic.
 4. Of ðære dic andlang hricges on byde wil.
 4. Of ðan wille andlang stræte on hægla þorn.
 5. Of ðan þorne andlang hricges on hodan mere on gerihte on fif
þornas.
 6. Of fif þornon þwyres on ðæne ealdan ellenstyb.
 7. Of ðan stybbe on ða ealdan dic.
 8. Of ðære dic andlang herpaðes ðæt hit cymð be
norðan bienhylle in on ðæt slæd.
 10. Swa andlang fura on ðæne smalan weg.
 10. Swa andlang weges on ðone wiðig.
 11. Of ðan wiðige on stanwyl.
 12. Of ðan wille þwyres on ðæne garan.
 12. Of ðan garan on ðæs broces bige.
 13. Of ðan bige on ða ealdan eorðbyrig.
 14. Of ðære byrig on ðone acstyb.
 14. Of ðan stibbe eft on ða haran apeldran.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1001 (Kem 775)
B15.8.510.
Bounds, Sawyer 1001: Kemble 1839-48, no. 775.



 1. Ðis synt ða landgemæra to Wittannige.
 2. Ærest andlang ðæs streames on ðone mædham ðe
hyrnð into Scylftune.
 3. And fram Scylftune andlang streames ðæt it cymð to ðam
mylewere ðe hyrnð into duceling dune.
 5. Of ðæm wære ofær ðone wegean mor into hocslew.
 6. Ðanon on ða niwan dic.
 6. Of ðære dic on horninga mære.
 7. Of horninga mære andlang ðæs gemæres to hlæwan
slæde.
 8. Of ðam slæde into dufan doppe and swa andlang gemæres
into Leofstanes bricge.
 10. Of Leofestanes bricge into kytelaceras.
 11. Of kytelacæras innon ða wudestret.
 11. Andlang ðære strete into hafoces hlæwe.
 12. Of hafoces hlewæ innon wænric.
 13. Of wenric to swondæne.
 13. Æfter swondæne to ðære haran apeldran.
 14. Of ðære apeldran andlang gemæres innan swonlege.
 15. Of swonleage upp to ðam heafdam.
 16. Of ðam heafdan andlang surode innan huntenan weg.
 17. Andlang huntenan wege into Wicham.
 17. Of Wicham a be ðare wyrtruman ðæt hit cymð on sceapa
weg.
 19. Of sceapa wege andlang rihtes gemæres innan æcenes feld.
 20. Of æcenes felda andlang rihtes gemæres on kicgestan.
 21. Of kicgestane into æceres felda.
 21. Of æcenes felda ðær ða cnihtas licgað.
 22. And fram ham ðe ða cnihtas licgað on mætseg.
 23. Andlang metseg into wenric.
 25. Ðis is ðara XXX hidæ boc æt Witanigæ ðe Eadward
cing gebocode ælfwinæ bisceope on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1003 (Davidson)
B15.8.511.
Bounds, Sawyer 1003: Davidson 1883, 292-5.



 1. Ðys sindo þa landgemæro.
 1. Ærest on tenge muðan upp andlang þæs fleotes on
crampan steort.
 2. And swa eft on gean be þam sealternon on þa stræte on
west healfe michaheles ciricean.
 3. And swa norð andlang þære stræt on þam greatan dic.
 4. Þanon norð eft ongerihte on þone blindan will.
 5. Of þam wille norð on gerihte on þone dunnan stan.
 5. Þanon eft norð rihte on þa ealdan dic.
 6. And swa andlang þære dic norð on gerihte ofer þæt
sceota cumb.
 7. Þanon up andlang þære ealdan ræwe on þa stapulas.
 8. Fram þam stapulon on gerihte andlang hricges on sand holcan.
 9. Of sand holcan anglang strete on blacan penn.
 9. Þanon andlang stræte on bradanmores heafdon.
 10. And þanon on gerihte andlang stræte oð eorðbirig.
 11. And swa norð andlang stræte on stan beorh.
 11. And swa niðer andlang stræte on doflisc ford.
 12. And þanon norð of þam forda andlang þære port
stræt on risc slædes heafdon.
 13. Swa niðer andlang streames on cocc ford & swa andlang
þæs fleotes ut on exan.
 14. Niðer eft andlang exan þær sciter lacu ut scit.
 15. And swa up andlang sciter lace on þær fleotes heafod.
 16. Þanon siððan suð on þa ealdan dic.
 16. And swa on gerihte to þam readan stane.
 17. Of þam stane suð ut on þa sæ.
 17. Swa west be sæ eft on tenge muðan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1004 (Sanders)
B15.8.512.
Bounds, Sawyer 1004: Sanders 1878-84, II, Earl of Ilchester, 3.



 1. Ærest of strætforda up andlang þæs grenan weges to
smiceran æc; andlang wegges to Ketanlege upewerdre; andlang herpaðes to
þam herpaþes on norð healfe lobirihtes gete.
 2. Of þam herpaðe benorþan labirihtes gete on ðære dice
hyrnan adune on þære land sceare to þam twam wicon adune andlanges
drianhyrstes lace.
 3. Fram ðære lace to þam ligcgendum æc; fram ðam
licgendum æc innan sticelan ford; of ðam forda andlang herpaðes of
wulfrices dice hyrnan.
 4. Fram þære dice hyrnan andlang hæccean to bridianbeara
lace on þone hnottan stybb; of þam hnottan stybbe andlang hæccean on
ðone mycclan mapeldran.
 5. Andlang hæccean to þære ræw apoldran; andlang
hæccean to cern hlinces herpaðe.
 6. Andlang herpaðes to þan holan wege; andlang dic suð to
þære holan lace; andlang ðære lace up innan þone herpað; andlang
herpaþes innan hweouforda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1005 (Kem 770)
B15.8.513.
Bounds, Sawyer 1005: Kemble 1839-48, no. 770.



 1. Ðys is þære anre gyrde landgemæru be niðan elddin.
 2. Ærest on sehfrod.
 3. Þonne adun andlang stremys of hyt scyt ut on æni.
 4. Þonne adun on strem on þone torr.
 4. Þanune to þan hwitan stan beorhge.
 5. Þanune to þan ealdan wege.
 5. Of þam wege to þam mere.
 6. Fram þam mere a gerihte to eldin byrig middeweardre.
 7. Þanon to þan mægean stane.
 8. Þanone west to þam grenan wege.
 8. Þonne andlang weges eft to sehford.
 10. Ðys is þære anre gyrde landboc beniðan Elddin þe
Eadweard kyng let gebecean ordgære hys þegene to ecere þearfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1006 (Kem 774)
B15.8.514.
Bounds, Sawyer 1006: Kemble 1839-48, no. 774.



 1. Ðis synd ðera XV hida landgemere to Pipmynstre.
 2. Ðæt is, erest on binnacumbes broc.
 3. Ðonne andlang broces ondun to ðære hæcginge.
 4. Ðanon on gerihta on fyrslege.
 4. Of forslege on ðone eastran stream.
 5. Andlang streames on Tugeles mor.
 6. Of Tugeles more to ðære foxec.
 6. Of ðære foxec to heardan geate.
 7. Of heardan geate to Twinteles ham.
 8. Of Twinteles hamme to deopa forda.
 8. Of deopa forda east on gerihte to drindlea.
 9. Of trindlea andlang broces to wægela byrig.
 10. Of wegela byrig on ðone gregean stan.
 11. Of ðan gregean stane to readan forda.
 11. Of reada forda on gerihte to Scora dic.
 12. Of Scora dic andlang herpaðes to langgan hamme.
 13. Of langgan hamme on ðone gregean stan.
 14. Of ðam gregean stane upp on epsgweg to ðære greatan
lindan.
 15. Of ðære greatan lindam on oxena feld easteweardne upp to
ðam stanbeorge.
 17. Of ðam stanbeorge upp on wealderes weg to pidles beorge.
 18. Of piples beorge on wiðicumbes heafod.
 19. Of wiðicumbes heafde west on gerihta to ðære readan
dic.
 20. Of ðære readan dic norð on gerihte on ðone acbeara
easteweardne.
 21. Of ðam acbeara west andlang herpaðes to ðære haran
apelduran.
 22. Of ðære haran apeldyran eft on binnacumbes broc.
 24. Ðis is ðæra fiftyna hyda land boc to Pypmynstre ðe
Eadweard cyng gæbocodæ <foreign>sanctæ Petræ</foreign> and <foreign>sanctæ Paulæ</foreign> into
Ealdan mynstræ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1007 (Kem 780)
B15.8.515.
Bounds, Sawyer 1007: Kemble 1839-48, no. 780.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæro to Heantune.
 2. Ærest on ðone suðan hlinc.
 2. Of ðam hlince on ellenford upp on ðone hricg.
 3. Andlang hricges on wines heafdes þorn.
 4. Of ðam þorne on colan treow.
 4. Of colan treowe on crawan þorn.
 5. Of crawan þorne innan ða bæc.
 6. Of ðam bæce on ðone middemestan beorh on bromdæne.
 7. Andlang bromdæne innan smalan dæne.
 8. Of smalan dæne on clinca leage.
 8. Of clinca leage on ða greatan bæce innon
næddærheall.
 9. Of nedderheale on linleage.
 10. Of linleage on hyrdes treow.
 10. Of hurdes treowe on ðone grætan hlincg.
 11. Of ðam greatan hlince on acstede leage.
 12. Of acstede leage on ðone rugan beorh.
 13. Of ðam beorga on weoleage.
 13. Of weoleage on Wulfredes wyrð.
 14. Of Wulfredes wyrðe on cadan hangre.
 15. Of cadan hangran on ræling beorgas.
 15. Of reling beorgan on ðone greatan hlincg.
 17. Ðis is ðæra eahta hida landboc to Heantune ðæ
Eadweard cing gebocade ælfwine bisceope on æce yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1008 (Kem 781)
B15.8.516.
Bounds, Sawyer 1008: Kemble 1839-48, no. 781; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd þa landgemæra to mylebroce ærest of hreod
bricge/ on tærstan stream.
 3. Andlang streames on hnut scyllinga mearce.
 3. And swa andlang mearce on þone holan weg.
 4. Of þan holan wege andlang mearce on fearninga broc.
 5. And swa andlang mearce on mylebroces ford.
 6. And swa east andlang mearce on þunres lea norðeweardne.
 7. Þanan andlang weges on cynges dic.
 8. And swa andlang mearce on þone oðerne holan weg.
 9. Of þam wege on ða ea & se werstede be suðan hreod
bricge ut þurh þone stream on þæs cynges stæð.
 11. And swa andlang streames eft on hreod bricge and se haga on
hamtune þe þærto gebyrað.
 13. Ðis is þæra VII hyda landboc to mylebroce þe Eadweard
cing gebocade ælfwine bisceope on ece yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1009
B15.8.517.
Bounds, Sawyer 1009: DOE transcript, edited from London, British Library, MS. Add. 15350, fols. 78v-79v.



 1. Þis is haræ VII hydæ landboc þe Eadward cing gebocode
Godwine yrle of mylebroc on ece yrfæ.
 3. Ðis synd þa land gemæro to Melebroce.
 3. Ærest of hreodbricge on tearstan stream.
 4. Andlang streames on hnutscyllinga mearce and swa andlang mearce
on þone holan weg.
 5. Of þam holan wege andlang mearce on fearninga broc; and swa
andlang mearce on mylesbroces ford and swa east andlang mearce on þunres lea
norþeweardne.
 7. Þanan andlang weges on cinges dic; and swa andlang mearce on
þone oðerne holan weg.
 8. Of þam wege on þa ea.
 8. And se westerde be suðan hreoðbricge.
 8. Utt þurh þone stream on þæs cinges steð; and swa
andlang streames æft on hreodbricge.
 9. And se haga on hamtune þe þar to gebyrad.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1010 (Kem 778)
B15.8.518.
Bounds, Sawyer 1010: Kemble 1839-48, no. 778.



 1. Æryst of brytta pole on ðone ealdan weall.
 1. Andlang welles on ða ea.
 2. Of ðære ea on ðane portweg.
 3. Andlang weges on Uggafordinga landscore.
 3. Andlang ðære landscore on ðone wuduweg.
 4. Andlang ðæs wuduweges on ðone grene pað.
 5. Of ðam paðe on ðane greatan þorn ðe stynt wið Grimes
dic.
 6. Andlang ðære diche on ðone haran þorn.
 7. Of ðan þorne þreora ækera brade be westan ðan greatan
beorhge.
 8. And þreora ækera bræde be norðan ðan beorhge on
gerihte ofer ðone hæðfeld in stanwale.
 10. Andlang ðære wale on ðone portweg.
 11. Of ðan portwege on ða ealdan lake.
 12. On ða ealdan ea.
 12. Of ðære ealdan ea on wili stream.
 13. Andlang stremes eft on bryttan pol.
 14. Ðis hys ðære þriddan healfere hide boc æt
Dichæmatune ðe Eadweard cyning gebocude ðorð his þegene on eche
yrfe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1012 (Kem 776)
B15.8.519.
Bounds, Sawyer 1012: Kemble 1839-48, no. 776; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæro to Stanham.
 2. Ærest on swæðeling wylle.
 2. Andlang streamæs uppon ðæs cingæs ræwe, andlang
ræwæ on ða ealdan Icenan.
 4. Of ðære ealdan Icenan on ufwyrd ðonæ orcerd on ða
niwan ea.
 5. Of ðære niwan ea andlang mearcæ on ða lampyttas.
 6. Of ðam lampyttan andlang mearce on waddan stocc.
 7. Of waddan stocce andlang mearce on ðæne hwitan stan.
 8. Of ðam hwitan stane andlang mearce on wichyðe æt miðne
stream.
 10. Andlang streames upp on ða lace.
 10. Of ðære lace andlang mearce to æcergeate.
 11. Of æcergeate on holan broc.
 12. Andlang broces on portes wuda norðewyrðan on ðone
grænan weg.
 13. Andlang stræte æft on swæðeling wylle.
 14. And seo feldles gemæne, and ðæt mynster æt Wic, and
seo hid ðæ ðærto lið, and VI æceras and se iggað æt portes
bricge and healfe sæwære and se mylnstede æt Mannæs bricge.
 18. Ðis is ðara VIII hida landboc to Stanham ðe Eadward cing
gebocode sancte Petre on ece yrfæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1013 (Kem 783)
B15.8.520.
Bounds, Sawyer 1013: Kemble 1839-48, no. 783; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis sind ðæra syx hida landgemæra to Hodingatune.
 2. Ærest of ðære bydene up andlang dic innan ða hyrnan.
 3. Ðet suð anlang dic innan ða hyrnan.
 4. Of ðære hyrnan on horsgerstun suðewurdne.
 5. Ðæt up bæ dic innan ða stret.
 6. Ðet on feower wegas.
 6. Swa andlang hecgan on hlidgeat.
 7. Ðæt up on weargeburninga gemæra.
 7. Ðæt suð andlang ðere hornrewe on mapoldre get.
 8. Ðet anlang dene on ðone gemænen þorn.
 9. Swa be scealdedeninga gemære to ðære dice hende andlang
hricges to wrute sole.
 11. Of wrute sole andlang hricges on riscmære.
 11. And swa on holan dene on upicenes hlywan.
 12. Andlang rewe innan humbaldigraf westeweardne.
 13. Ðæt on heselmæres graf easteweardne.
 14. Swa þurh ðone pryuet on þristan dene.
 15. Ðæt up be hecgan on hadaca lea.
 15. Swa on ælgares hagan æt ðam heðanan byrigelsan.
 16. Ðæt andlang dene eft on ða bydene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1014 (Kem 784)
B15.8.521.
Bounds, Sawyer 1014: Kemble 1839-48, no. 784.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemære into æðelstanes tune.
 2. Ðæt is of ðornham broc into ðures lege broc.
 3. Swa into Martines ho.
 3. Swa into holebroc.
 4. Of holebroc swa into broc holes.
 4. Swa into ræd wege.
 5. Of ræd wege swa into wengeforde.
 6. And swa eft into ðornham broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1020 (Kem 792)
B15.8.522.
Bounds, Sawyer 1020: Kemble 1839-48, no. 792.



 1. Ærest on Cynetan æt Sceolles ealdcotan.
 1. Ðæt up andlang stremes oð Eadgife gemære.
 2. Swa norð innan Hyddene.
 3. Ðanon norð on lamburninga mærce.
 4. Swa est andlang mearce oð ælfwiges mære.
 4. Swa suð andlang gemæres on Hyddene.
 5. Swa suð be gemære ðæt eft innan Cynetan strem.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1022 (Kem 793)
B15.8.523.
Bounds, Sawyer 1022; Kemble 1839-48, no. 793.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæra to Sandforda on ðam gemannan
lande.
 3. Ærest of stibbucwere swa norð æfter ðare Temese be
healfan streame into Sandfordes læce.
 4. Swa andlang ðære lace into Santforda.
 5. Of Sandforda est andlang ðære læce up to ferniges
heafdon.
 6. Of ferniges heafdon up þurh ðone mor east into ðære
stræt.
 7. And swa suð andlang ðære stræt into bealddunheama
gemære.
 9. And swa west andlang gemæres into niwanhæma gemera.
 10. And swa andlang gemæres on suðewerde hochylle.
 11. Of hochylle swa west on gerihte eft on stybbucwere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1023 (Kem 796)
B15.8.524.
Bounds, Sawyer 1023: Kemble 1839-48, no. 796.



 1. Ærest of waddune andlang weges to ðan grestune, swa andlang
ðæs grestunes dic to ðam wege on eastewardne ðæne tun.
 4. Swa andlang weges to ðære dice hyrnan.
 4. Swa andlang dic innon ðæne easc.
 5. Of ðan æsce innon ðæne ealdan mære.
 6. Of ðan ealdan mere innon ðam brece.
 7. Andlang breces innon rodstubban.
 7. Swa of rodstubban to lodderðorne.
 8. Swa of lodderðorne to flecgestane.
 9. Of fleccestane to ðan fearngaran.
 9. Of ðan fearngaran eft on waddune to ðan ealdan beche.
 11. And ðis sind ðæra wudabæra landgemæru æt
ðæclege ðe ðerto hyreð.
 12. Ærest of ðan hæcce to Dudemæres hele.
 13. Of Dudemæres hele to mærclege.
 13. Of mærclege to stanlege.
 14. Of stanlege to ðære dunlege.
 14. Of ðære dunlege swa eft innon ðone hæcc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1025 (Kem 800)
B15.8.525.
Bounds, Sawyer 1025: Kemble 1839-48, no. 800.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemæra to Sandforda on ðam gemannan
lande.
 2. Ærest of stubbucwere.
 3. Swa norð æfter ðære Temese be healfan streme into
Sandfordes læce.
 4. Swa andlang ðære lace into Sandforda.
 5. Of Sandforda east andlang ðære lace up to fernniges
heafdon.
 7. Up þurh ðone mor east into ðære stræt.
 7. And swa suð andlang ðære stræt into bealdanhema
gemære.
 9. And swa west andlang gemæres into niwanhæma gemære.
 10. And swa andlang gemæres on suðewearde hochylle.
 11. Of hochylle swa west on gerihte eft on stubbucwere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1026 (Finberg)
B15.8.526.
Bounds, Sawyer 1026: Finberg 1961, 72-3.



 1. Of foss dun be wulfweardinge lea æfter ðam grenan wege ofer
peos hylle.
 2. Ofer peos hyll þæt cymð into mær wylle.
 3. Of mær wylle up æfter ðam heafde be suðan hættes
lawe into þere ealdan dic.
 4. Of ðere ealdan dic be suðan þam longam beorge west riht be
þam heafdan þæt it cymeð into hundes hylle.
 6. Swa norð in to buggilde stræt þæt cymeð to stret
beorge.
 8. Of stræt beorge into þam grena wege, swa æfter þam
grena wege west riht into fildene wege.
 10. Æfter fildene wege þæt it cymeð to roces mere.
 11. And swa be ðere stige on norþ halde codes byrig þæt
cymeð into twam beorgum.
 12. Of twam beorgum ofer buggilde stræt be þam heafdum
þæt cymeð into hrisc pytte.
 14. Of hris pytte innon ðene litle beorh.
 14. Of þam litle beorge in ðone twiselede beorh, swa east weard
be þam heafdan þæt cymeð innon wenric.
 16. Of wenric innon þam ealdan dic, of ðere ealdan dic in
þæt fule ric.
 18. Æfter þam fule rice in þa bradan furh, æfter ðere
bradan furh innon þa heafda.
 19. Æfter þam heafdam þæt cymeð in þa salt hearpan.
 20. Swa suð æfter salt hearpan þæt cymað into þam
slæde.
 21. Æfter þam slæde innon þa ðreo beorgas.
 22. Of þam ðreom beorgum ondlong þere fureh þæt it
cymeð in to foss.
 24. Swa suð æfter foss þæt it cymeð þer it ær
agann in to wulfweardinge lea.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1027 (Davidson)
B15.8.527.
Bounds, Sawyer 1027: Davidson 1883, 296-8.



 1. Þis is seo landscaru to trefwurabo.
 2. Ærest æt pollcerr, ðenne be þære dic &lang
weges.
 2. Þon of þam wege on ða lytlan dic on easthealfe weges to
pollhæscen adune be þam broce to rytcendeurion.
 4. Þonne be ðam broce to carn nyþbran to deumæn coruan.
 5. Þanon andlang weges to crucdrænoc, þanon to carrec wynn
& eft ðanon to wollcerr.
 6. Þis is se landscaru to trefualoc.
 6. Ærest to þære dic þonne fram dice adune to ðam
broce.
 7. Of ðam broce to crouswrach &lang weges on ða dic.
 8. Þanon to mainbiw to crucmur.
 9. Þanon to carn wlicet &lang ðære to ðan broce.
 9. Ðanon &lang stremes oð tnowpeter eft be dære ðic.
 10. Þis is seo landscaru to crucwæþ.
 11. Ærest æt nantbuorðtel &lang stremes oð lenbrun.
 11. Þanon to cestelmerit, þanon west to wucowgenidor, west
&lang dic oð broc.
 12. Þanon to fonton morgeonec.
 13. Þanon adune to broce ðær hit æt fruman wæs.
 14. Þis is seo landscaru to trefdæwig.
 14. Ærest æt penheal meglar suð to þam wege þanon to
ðam forda on gerihte to erliwet.
 15. Þanon forð &lang stremes to lyncenin.
 16. Ðanon up to penhal meglar.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1028 (HarmApp 2)
B15.8.528.
Bounds, Sawyer 1028: Harmer 1952, App. 2, 538-9.



 1. Þis syndan þa landgemære into Tængtune.
 1. Þæt is ærest of þam readan clife on ælfredes denn.
 2. And of þam denne on þone haran stan.
 3. And of þam stane on Mægnhilde beorh.
 3. And of þam beorge on riscwille.
 4. And of þære wylle on þa ruga ðyrna.
 4. And of þara ðyrne on þon holan broch.
 5. And of þam broche on hæselford.
 5. And of þam forde andlangc weges on þone stapel.
 6. And of þam stapele on dryge pytt.
 7. And of þam pytte on fulla wille.
 7. And of þære wylle on cobbanhyll.
 8. And of þære hylle on cobbanbroc.
 8. And of þam broche andlang streames inne wenric.
 9. And swa to þam readan clyfe.
 9. Þis is þæt gemære to þam more þe þider innto
ligð.
 10. Þæt is of diclace a wilstede.
 10. And of wilstede on ryðera ford.
 11. And of þam forde on wireneges þorn.
 11. And of þam þorne andlang wenric on beafolces ears.
 12. And of beafolces earse andlang Temese be healfan streame eft
inne diclace.
 13. Þis is þæt gemære to þam wuda þider inn.
 14. Þæt is ærest of friðeles stane on þone stanian
weigg.
 15. And of þam wege on fæste graf.
 15. And of þam grafe andlang weges on wiðilea.
 16. And of þære lea swa eft on þone stan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1031 (Gover)
B15.8.529.
Bounds, Sawyer 1031: Gover, Mawer, and Stenton 1938, 313.



 1. Þis sindon þa land gemaru into hwathamstede.
 1. Fram mærforde to þare headic fram þære headic æfter
dene into deorleage.
 2. Fram deorleage to langhecge þæt hit cimð to lippelane.
 3. Fram lippelane to secgham, fram secgham to pollenæstoce.
 4. Fram pollenæstoce to herpedene fram herpedene to þam
æsce to þæt forde.
 5. Fram þam æsce to plumstigele, fram plumstigele to þam
hole beame.
 6. Fram hole beame to gilmere, fram gilmere to þæs
ealdermannes mere.
 8. Fram þæs eldermannes mere into merdene swa into marforde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1033 (Rose-Troup)
B15.8.530.
Bounds, Sawyer 1033: Rose-Troup 1939, 203.



 1. Ænest of street geate ontælenford.
 1. Þonon up on tælen oð blindan wylle.
 2. Þonne on denebeorh.
 2. Þanon on hæð feld mere.
 3. Þanon on finan.
 3. Þanon on otrig on stræt pol.
 3. Þonne on bromdune middeweadre.
 4. Þanon on hoan weg.
 4. Þonne on rædan flodan.
 5. Ðanon suð andlang dune on wyrtrum oð wicgincland.
 6. Of ðare landscore oð waccas treow.
 6. Þanon on berrdes cumbes heafod.
 7. Þonne on Leofan dune suðewearde.
 8. Þanon on cetes holt suþewrdne.
 8. Þonne on otrig, at þam borstan clife.
 9. Þannon on pundfald.
 9. Þonne on þene suþranellen ford.
 10. Ðanon on hric weg.
 10. Þonne on anne apoldor stew.
 11. Þonne on anne stanford.
 11. Þanon on rægenðornas.
 11. Þonne norð on hearpað eft on stræt geat.
 12. Her is seo land scoru wicginc Landes & otrig Landes.
 13. Ærest of landscor hege on land scor broc.
 14. Ðanon on otrig & þonne adun on stream oð rean clif.
 15. Þanon oð hæð pen suþewardne on þone holan stoc.
 16. Þanon on bigulfes burh suþewarde of bigulfes borh on setl
þorn.
 17. Þanon on blacan dune norðeanwearde on herpoð to street
gete.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1034 (Kem 811App)
B15.8.531.
Bounds, Sawyer 1034: Kemble 1839-48, no. 811 App.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæra ðe Eadweard cyng gebocade
Wulfwold abbade into æscwica.
 2. Ðæt is, ærest up of Netelforda up an Nætelingeweg.
 3. Of Nætelingewege andlang weges on ðæt lepegeat.
 4. Of ðam lepegeate on ða hara stanas to Leofesices
suðcroftes heornan.
 6. Of Leofesices suðcroftes heornan niðor on ðone
plægstede.
 7. And of ðan plægstede niðor on ðæt bydeland.
 8. Of ðan bydeland niðor ofer hylda on smedbroc.
 9. And of smedesbrocan andlang brocas on mylnecumbes stræm.
 10. Andlang stremes eft to Neteliforda.
 11. And butan ðam twelf æceras mæde ðe licgað on
suðhealf weges into ðam þreom worðigan his orfe to læsse.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1036 (Kem 813)
B15.8.532.
Bounds, Sawyer 1036: Kemble 1839-48, no. 813.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæra into Passefelde.
 2. Ðæt is, ærest of ðare ealdan hæcce æt freoðene
felde into presta hlype.
 4. Into ðam bece to Staun dune.
 4. And of Staun dune to Scealdeforda.
 5. And of Sceldeforda to coleboge welle.
 6. Of ðere welle eft into ðære ealdan hæcce.
 6. And swa eft into freoðene felda.
 7. Ðis synd ða landgemæra into Welde.
 8. Ærest of Dellen norð into ðere gemyðe.
 9. East into hafegeæte.
 9. Of hafegeæte east into ðam wulfpytte.
 10. Of ðam pytte suð into ðam purce.
 10. Of ðam purce suð to Freobearnes hlype.
 11. And swa into mannes lande.
 12. And ðanon eft into Dellen.
 12. Ðis synd ða landgemære into Upmynstre.
 13. Ærest at Tigelhyrste suð to ðare marcdice.
 14. Of ðare dice west in ingceburne.
 15. And of ðare burne norð into beccengare.
 16. And of beccengare norð andlang ðare strate wald into
stangare.
 17. Of stangare norð into mannes lande.
 17. Of mannes lande eft into Tigelhyrste.
 18. Ðis synd ða landgemære into Walhfare.
 19. Ærst of ðam æssce to ðære ældan hlype.
 20. Of ðare hlype to ðare ealden wude hæcche.
 21. Of ðære hæcce to ðare ealden strate.
 21. And of ðare strate to sandæcere.
 22. And of ðam æcere to beadewan ea.
 23. Of ðare ea to wine broce.
 23. Of ðam broce norð eft to ðan æssce.
 24. Ðis synd ða landgemære into Tippedene.
 25. Ærest in Tippaburne.
 25. Of ðare burne up to ðam heðe.
 26. And of ðam heðe to þecdene gemære wið æffan
hecce.
 27. And swa into ðære ea.
 27. Andlang ðære ea ðæt eft cymð in Tippeburne.
 28. Ðis synd ða landgemare into ælwartone.
 29. Ærest æt Werdhæcce.
 29. Of Werdhacce to eacrofte.
 30. Of eacrofte into beolle pole.
 31. Of ðam pole into Leofsiges mad.
 31. Of Leofsiges mad into Omermad.
 32. Of Omermad into æðerices hlype.
 33. Of ðare hlype into wulfhlype.
 33. Of wulfhlype into þesfalde.
 34. Of þesfalde into stanweges hacce.
 34. Of stanweges hacce into Sateres byrig.
 35. Ðis synd ða landgemare into Wudeforde.
 36. Ærest in Angrices burne to ealdermannes hæcce to ðær
cynges hæcce.
 37. Of ðær cynges hæcce eft into Angrices burne.
 38. Ðis synd ða landgemære into Lambehyðe.
 39. Ærest æt brixges stane.
 40. And swa ford þurwh ðane graf to ðam mærcdice.
 41. And swa to bulce treo.
 41. And fram bulce treo to hyse.
 42. And fram hyse to ælsyges hæcce.
 42. And swa est to ðare strate.
 43. And swa andlang strete est to brixes stan.
 44. Ðis synd ða landgemære into Nassingan.
 44. Ðat is harst of cerlen hacce andlang mearce to scelden
mære.
 46. And of scelden mere to ðare burnan.
 46. And of ðare burnan to buterwyelle.
 47. And of buterwelle to ðuroldes gemaren.
 48. And of ðuroldes gemaren eft andlang marce to cerlen hacce.
 49. And seo mæd ðe ðarto gebyrað lið ut beligean.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1044 (Kem 769)
B15.8.533.
Bounds, Sawyer 1044: Kemble 1839-48, no. 769.



 1. Ðiss synd þæra twegra sulunga gemæro to clife.
 2. On easthealfe þæs hiredes land to dofran æt clife.
 3. And on suðhealfe þæs hiredes land æt cubyrum.
 4. And on westhealfe beocceding land.
 5. And on norðhealfe þæs hiredes land to folcanstane.
 6. Oxena gehæg.
 6. And an mylen be doferware broce, and seofon æceras þarto,
and cubyra, and soltun.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1165 (Birch 34)
B15.8.534.
Bounds, Sawyer 1165: Birch 1885-99, no. 34.



 1. Þis is þare viven hida Boc to Cerotesege & to þorpe
þe Fritheuuold King ybehte Christe and seinte Petre and Erkenuuolde abbude to
fullen friedome þurg alle þing sua se þe londgimere hit bicluppeþ þe
on þisser bok iwrite biez.
 5. Ðys is þe landegemere to Cerotesege and to þorpe.
 5. Þat is erest on Waiemuþe up endlonge Waie to Waigebrugge.
 6. Of Waigebrugge innan þe ælde muledich mide uuerde.
 7. Of þere dich on þere ealde herestræt.
 8. Andlange stræte on Woburne brugge.
 8. Andlang burne on þene grete wiþig.
 9. Of þane grete wiþig endlonge burne in þane pol buue
Crocford.
 10. Of þes poles heuede on gerigte to þane Ellene.
 11. Of þane ellene on gerigte a be wertuualen on þe
herestrate.
 12. Andlange strate to curten stapele.
 12. Of curten stapele eandlonge strate to þene hore þorne.
 13. Of þan þorne to Eccan treuue.
 13. Of Eccan treouue to þen þrem burghen.
 14. Of þam þrum beorghen into þe sihtran.
 15. Of þan siþren into merchebroke.
 15. Of merchebroke on Exlæpes burnen.
 16. Of Exlæpes burne to þene hare mapeldure.
 17. Of þene hore mapeldure to þen þrum treouuen.
 17. Of þam þrem treouuen andlange depenbrokes on gerihte to
Wealagate.
 18. Of Wealagate on shiren pol.
 19. Of shiren pole on fulan broc.
 19. Of fulen broke to þan blake wiþig.
 20. Of þan blaken wiþig on gerihte to Wealas huþe.
 21. Andlange Temese on aþere halve Mixtenhammes in þere ea
betweone Burghege and Mixtenham.
 22. Andlange þes weteres to Netel yge of þan ege andlange
Temese abuten Oxelake.
 24. Forþ andlange Temese to Boresburghe.
 24. And sua forþ endlange Temese to Hamen ege.
 25. And sua forþ andlange stremes be norþen Hamen yge.
 26. And sua forþ andlange Temese be hælven stremes eft on Waie
muþe.
 28. Þus feale synden þere ygetta þe liggeþ into Cherteseye
and to þorpe þat synden <foreign>viii</foreign> leassen and maren and <foreign>vii</foreign> werbære þa
synden ealle betweonen Weales huþe and Waie Muþe.
 31. An oþer landimere me shal vinde herefterward þat was igon
albuten bi ælfredes þe wise kinges daie to Cherte.
 33. Þis bet þe landimere of þe viftene hide lond in Egeham.
 34. Þis bet þe landimere æt Egeham.
 34. Þat is ærest at en shigtren bouen Halsam and swa forþ
riste to þe þrem burghen.
 35. Fram þes burges to Eccan triwe forþriste strechchinde to
þe suþ ende of sire Giffreus Heþe de la Croix.
 37. Fram þe Heþe forþriste to Herdeies overende almest and
swa forþ þurg þere worni hulle to Hertlys nuþerende of þe Menechene
Rude.
 39. Fram þe Rude dunrigte bi one weie an westhalf Poddenhale to
Winebrigth almest fram Winebrigth westrigte to one weie þet geþ to
Winchestre þat is ihoten shrubbeshedde.
 42. Bitwiene þe shrubbes and Winebrigt goinde adun norþrigte
binuþe þe parkesgate and sua forþ fram þe gate goinde bi þe Parkes
heige to Herpesford to þere Mulle.
 44. Fram þere Mulle goinde forþ bi þe parkes heige to þe
niwe Hechche.
 46. Fram þe Hechche endlonge þes frithesbroke to þere hore
epeldure fram þere hore æpuldure to þe kneppe bi þe quelmes.
 48. Fram þe quelmes binuþe þere stonie helde and sua Goinde
adun bi Tigelbeddeburne adun upe þat eigt þe stant in þere Temes æt
Lodderelake.
 50. And sua forþe endelange Temese bi mid streme to Glenthuþe
fram Glenthuþe bi mid streme enlonge Temese to þare huþe afornegene
stone.
 52. Fram þare huþe endlonge Temese bi midstreme dun to
Nippenhale to Wheles huþe.
 53. From Wheleshuþe oferrigte in þene blake wiþge of þe
wiþege in to fulebrok.
 55. Of fulebrok in to Sirepol, of Sirepol in to Whelegate.
 55. Of Whelegate oferrigte in to depenbrok, of depenbrok to þe
þrem triwen.
 57. Of þe þrem triuuen to þe hore Mapeldure, of þare hore
Mapeldure to exlepesburne.
 58. Of þere burne in to Merchebroke, of þene Merchebroke to
þan Shigtren bouen halsam.
 60. Þis bet þe londimere in to Chabbeham.
 61. Þis bet þe londimere into Chabbeham.
 61. Þat is arest on Eccan triuue.
 62. Of Eccan triuue andlange strete to þe Hore þorne.
 63. Of þe hore þorne to wihsan leage.
 63. Of wihsan leghe to woburnen andlange burnen to wopshete.
 64. Of Wopshete to Mimbrugge.
 65. Of Mimbrugge to Wiþelesshete.
 65. Of Wiþelesshete to þe hagan æt Mimfelda.
 66. Sua of Mimfelde to þare greten wich.
 66. Of þere wich to Wuhurste rithe.
 67. Of þere riþe to Siþuuode hagan.
 68. Andlange hagan to fhyþeke mere, of fhyþeke mere to
Hasulhurst.
 69. Of Hasulhurst forþ rigte ofer þane feld to Cuscetes hagen.
 70. Sua bi þan hagen to Cumore.
 70. Of Cumore to þe stondinde stone.
 71. Of þe stone uprigte to Ruggestrate dun into Whiþeke mere.
 72. From Hwyþeke mere to burchshlede, from burchshlede to
Eggelfus brugge.
 73. Of þere brugge to Cyterene forde.
 73. Of cyteren forde to wipsedone.
 74. Of þere done andlange strate to Hertlye.
 74. Of Hertlye eft on Eccan triuue.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1174 (Birch 117)
B15.8.535.
Bounds, Sawyer 1174: Birch 1885-99, no. 117.



 1. West from Wicwone Beornedune at þe stapele.
 2. Siþe Brade mere norþ fro Beornedune, siþe þe Wowe
brondred.
 3. Siþe to þe Waritroe oppe longedune, siþe to þe
þistelmere.
 4. Siþe pinkenden into esthemmere.
 5. Þat cum eft to Beornedune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1185 (Kem 952)
B15.8.536.
Bounds, Sawyer 1185: Kemble 1839-48, no. 952.



 1. Her ge swutelað ðara XV hida land gemæra into Cnihta tune
and Eardgulfes tune.
 2. Ærest of Temede in corna broc.
 3. Andlang brokes ongean stream in corna wudu.
 4. Of corna wudu in corna lið.
 4. Ondlong ðam liðe in ðone oðerne corna broc.
 5. And swa mid stream in ðære ea Nen.
 6. Of Nen in mæra broc.
 6. Of mæra broke in momela gemæra to suðintuna gemæru.
 8. Of suðintuna gemæra betweonan stilla dune to ðam holan
broke, to ðam gemære æt ðam holignan.
 10. Of ðam holigena gemæra into ðam broke to worfes leahges
gemæra.
 11. And swa æfter ðam broke into Stoctune.
 12. Of Stoctune eft into Temede.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1227 (Kem 951)
B15.8.537.
Bounds, Sawyer 1227: Kemble 1839-48, no. 951.



 1. Ðis is ðæt landgemære to sciren ac.
 2. Ærest of wines brycge ondlang lecc to ðæs preostes
mædwe into feccan ham.
 3. Onlang ðæs broces ðæt hit cymeð to ipples berhge.
 4. And swa eal abutan ðæt hit cymð eft in ðone ilcan
brocc.
 5. And swa æfter ðam broce to wahgenes gemære.
 6. Of wahgenes gemære ðæt hit cyme to ðære pirian.
 7. And of ðære pirian to ðam walle ðe is in ðam holan
wege.
 9. And of ðam walle wahgenes gemæres eft into wines brycge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1238 (Kem 963)
B15.8.538.
Bounds, Sawyer 1238: Kemble 1839-48, no. 963.



 1. Ðis is ðara VII hida landgemæra æt Dagelesforda ða
hyrð into Burhtune.
 2. Ærest of Bladene on mulæs law.
 3. Ðæt forð up to heorndune to wettan stanes wylle.
 4. Of wettan stanes wylle on heortbroc.
 5. Of ðam broce on ða stige.
 5. Onlong stige on ða dic.
 6. Onlong dic on ða stræt.
 6. Onlong stræt to ðere oðere stræt.
 7. Of ðere stræt on beagan wylle.
 7. Onlong broces eft on Bladene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1248 (Birch 82)
B15.8.539.
Bounds, Sawyer 1248: Birch 1885-99, no. 82.



 1. Þis syndon þa landgemæru to badrices ege & to wendles
wurðe.
 2. Þæt is ærest heah yfre, of heah yfre into ceokan ege.
 3. Of ceokan ege into gryddeles elrene, of gryddeles elrene into
ðara smalan ac.
 4. Of þara smalan ac into rysmere, of rysmere into leoddebeorge.
 5. Of leoddebyrge into uckebyrge, of uccebyrge into bernneardes
byriels.
 6. Of byrnærdes byrielse inne þane blacan mor, of þan blacan
more oð middan hlida burnan.
 8. Of hlida burnan in gibbe felde, of gibbe felde in þa blaca
dic.
 9. Andlang blaca dic into beferiþi, of beferiðe andlang
stræte into fugel riþie.
 10. Andlang fugel riðie into þære tæmese oþ midne
streame, andlang streames eft into heah efre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1254 (Birch 166)
B15.8.540.
Bounds, Sawyer 1254: Birch 1885-99, no. 166.



 1. Beagan byrig.
 2. Of cunuglan sulhforda ondlong drihtnes dene on leppan crundlas.
 3. Þat on east hleopan.
 3. And swa on rawan berh.
 3. Þonne þweres ofer ða dene on ða aldan dic æt Lec.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1272 (Birch 455)
B15.8.541.
Bounds, Sawyer 1272: Birch 1885-99, no. 455.



 1. <foreign>Et</foreign> on coftune æt þæm ham stalle <foreign>V cassatorum</foreign> on
wreodan hale <foreign>V manentium</foreign>.
 3. <foreign>Primum</foreign> Tomsetna gemære & pencer setna foran rehtes
gæt in wærburge rode <foreign>deinde ad</foreign> risc hylle bi ðæm earðlande fore
weardum.
 5. <foreign>sic</foreign> in stræt mere.
 5. <foreign>Tunc</foreign> in hæðleage sceagan ðær he ðynnest is of
stræt mere.
 6. <foreign>Deinde</foreign> in hæðleage wællan.
 6. <foreign>Sic</foreign> in midlestan dene.
 6. <foreign>Tunc</foreign> ufan in blacan mere.
 7. <foreign>Deinde</foreign> in ceolferðes mor.
 7. Ðæt ymbe ceolferðes æcer utan ðæt ufan in colle.
 8. Suuae andlang streames in wiððan weorðing.
 9. Ðonan in heodenes sceagan fore weardne andlang riðges.
 10. Swa in ða Twislihtran biricean be suðan Coenberhtes
græfe.
 10. Ðæt ofer mearðes hrycg ðueres.
 11. And ðonon in wiðing mere.
 11. Ðæt ut wið hopwudes wica.
 12. Ðonne ondlanges ðæs heagan ðæt ufan be eamban erne
suðan.
 13. Ðæt ufan in haran eapolderne ðonan ufan in crawan broc.
 13. Swa to wendan æt ðonon up in ænne wiðing.
 14. A bi Twige ðæt hit cymeð to Wermundes erne westan sua
ymbe Crawan hyll utan ðæt hit cymeð to ðam gemyðum ðæt up be
ðam gemænan lande in hæð beorh midde weardne.
 17. And ðonne in scir burnan ðonan in readan sloe sua in
mære broc ðonan wið heort solwe ðonne wið rah gelega ðonon in ane
linde Byrnhelmes gemære.
 19. And cyninges & Eadbaldes sua in anne æsc.
 19. And ðonne ut in Creodan ac.
 20. Sue in Tyes mere.
 20. Ðæt ðonan ut ofer ðæt hæð in babban
fælinge.
 21. Sue to Wylheardes Trie ondlang ðæs holan weges.
 22. Ðonne ut ofer ðæt hæð wið cybles weorðiges
suðeweardes.
 22. Ðæt ðær foran rehtes in ða rode ðonan eft in
hæðleage wyllan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1277 (Birch 544)
B15.8.543.
Bounds, Sawyer 1277: Birch 1885-99, no. 544; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ærest from ðæm hlidgate scioteþ se merc on gearnes
egæ.
 2. Ðonne be suðen hriod eg on terstan.
 2. Ðonon andlang testan on mercfrot.
 3. Ðonon anlang fliotes on boddingmed.
 4. Ðonon on boddanstan.
 4. Ðonon ut on aclieh.
 4. Ðonon on stemnes peð.
 5. Ðonon on grindanbroc.
 5. Ðonon on heslea on ðere byri hyrne.
 6. Ðonon ut on hedenes dene.
 6. Suð ut on ðet hlid gæt.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1291 (Birch 997)
B15.8.544.
Bounds, Sawyer 1291: Birch 1885-99, no. 997.



 1. Ðis sinde ðæt land gemeare to Selesie, areste æt
wedering muðe ða be sæ on cymeneres horan.
 2. Swa west be sæ oð þri beorgas.
 3. Forð be stronde to cwuenstane & forð be strande hon
horemuden nord andlang floetes oð wealeflet.
 4. Up on wealeflet oðþ þer brynes dic ut scyt.
 5. West andlang dice on woflet, est andlang floetes & suo suð
to wederingemuðan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1297 (Birch 1108)
B15.8.545.
Bounds, Sawyer 1297: Birch 1885-99, no. 1108.



 1. Ðis synd ða land gemæran to oddungga lea.
 2. Ærest of stigelec on þ riþig ondlong riðies þ on
þane grenan weg ondlong weges on þa mearc þ swa to feower gemæran þ
swa eastrihte.
 4. Ondlong weges on þa dic of þam dice on deor leage þæt
swa on longan dic ondlong dices on eardlæge þæt swa be þam rah hege
on calwan hyll.
 6. Þonne suð rihte on croh hæma gemæra ondlong þæs
gemæres eft on stigelac.
 8. Ða land gemæru æt þære healfre hide æt lawern
ærest of lawern on þ riþig ondlond riþiges on þ graf swa be þam
græfe ut weardon þæt hit cymð to þæm hæþe swa forð be
þam æcerhege þ on sulig graf swa be þam grafe on þa port stræt
ondlong stræte þæt hit cymð to þam grenan wege.
 12. Ondlong þæs weges on haran læh swa eastrihte be
þære gebura londe þ on fearn leage of þære leage on þæt mor
þurh þone onippan burnan ondlong burnan eft on lawern.
 16. Ðonne is ealles þæs landes þe Osuuold bisceop bocað
Cyneþegne þrinde healf hid & VI æceras æt haranlea & XL
æcera be æastan lawern.
 18. And se haga be suðan byrig se is XII gerda lang and VIIII
gerda brand.
 19. On þa gerad wyrce þ he wyrce þ þ land seo unfor worht
into þære halgan stowe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1300 (Birch 1088)
B15.8.546.
Bounds, Sawyer 1300: Birch 1885-99, no. 1088.



 1. Ðis synd þa lond gemæra to uptune ærest of sæuerne
on innan pullæ.
 2. Ondlong pulles þæt to þæra hina gemære.
 2. Ondlong þæs gemæres þæt hit cymð on þone feld a
be þan wuda.
 3. Swa sulh & siþe hit gegan mæge þæt hit cyme to
þære æc.
 4. Þæt swa forð be þam wuda þ on þæ rugan æc.
 5. Of þære æc on þone aldan hagan.
 5. Ondlong hagan þæt on þa lhydan.
 6. Onlong lhydan up onlong alre on þone æcergeard.
 7. A be þæm gearde þæt on þa won ac þæt swa on sec
mor þæt þet dic to sceot þ.
 8. Þonon on gerihte on eowr hyc þæt swa on fulan mor.
 9. Of þæm more on rinnan pul.
 9. Ondlong pulles on mær broc.
 10. Ondlong broces þæt on sciran pul.
 10. Forð on gerihte ofer þæt pul to þan hagan on gerihte.
 11. On þone hagan ondlong þæs hagan on sæfern.
 12. Ondlong sæfern þæt eft to innan pulle.
 12. And IIItene æceras on easthalue sæfern.
 13. And þone wer.
 13. Þonne is ealles þæs landes VI hida þe Osold bisceop
bocað Kynelme his þegne mid his hlafordes leafe þreora manna dæg on
þa ge rad weorce, þæt he weorce þ þæt land seo into þære
halgan stowe un forworht.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1301 (Birch 1087)
B15.8.547.
Bounds, Sawyer 1301: Birch 1885-99, no. 1087.



 1. Þis synd þa lond gemæru to beonetlæge ærust of
sæuerne on bæle.
 2. Onlong bæle on siht forð, of siht forð on bærbroc.
 2. Of bær broce on þa aldan dic, onlong dices on hiort
burnan.
 3. Ondlong hiort burnan neoþan to heafne hrycge þæt swa
norð rihð eft on bæle on þa dic.
 5. Onlong ðære dic in doferic, ondlong doferices on
sæuerne, ondlong sæuerne eft on bæle.
 7. Eadmær wæs se forma man & Wulfrun is þe oðer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1304 (Birch 1105)
B15.8.548.
Bounds, Sawyer 1304: Birch 1885-99, no. 1105.



 1. Æt Heort forda æþelnode and ælfsige þas gen bec
hyrað in to Winces cumbe.
 3. Ðis synd þa land ge mæro þære anre hidæ in to
heort forda of stan forda.
 4. Up on mæres slæd.
 4. Of mæres slæde up on þa cæstello easteweardre.
 5. Of þan cæstello on colomores sic neoþeweardre.
 5. Of colomores sice.
 6. Up on burg hæma weg ondlang þæs weges on þone litlan
beorh.
 7. Þonne swa andlang furu þæt on þa healdan stige.
 8. Ondlang stige þ forð on ælfrices ge mæro.
 8. Þonne andlang hric weges on þa ea æt þære ealdan
mylne andlang ea eft on stan ford.
 10. Þonne is þæs landes an hid þe oswold bisceop bocað
æðelnoðe his þegne þreora manna dæg on þa ge rad wyrce þ he
wyrce þ þæt land sio unforworht.
 13. <foreign>Ego</foreign> Æþelstan cirdward.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1306 (Birch 1109)
B15.8.549.
Bounds, Sawyer 1306: Birch 1885-99, no. 1109.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemære æt reodemære leage.
 1. Of sealter forda ondlong glences þ hit cymð þær riþig
mæres broc sceot of glencing.
 3. Þonan riht to ceolan heafdan, of ceolon heafdon to longan
læge.
 4. Of longan læge to bruttan geate, of bruttan geate to
wærlafes dune.
 5. Suþe weardre of wærlafes dune on miclan feld, of miclan
feldan on wen broc.
 6. Ondlong wen broces þæt hit cymð to þan mære, on efen
cron mere þonon ondlong þæs ealdan gemæres, þ hit cymð þær
afoc broc sceot on glencing.
 8. Þonne ondlong glencing eft on salter forda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1307 (Birch 1111)
B15.8.550.
Bounds, Sawyer 1307: Birch 1885-99, no. 1111.



 1. Tedeces leage & æpsleage.
 2. Ðis syndon þa land gemæru þe ymb be lycgceað teodeces
læge.
 3. Timan hyl, of tyman hylle on widan dene.
 3. Of widdan dene on oslan mere, of oslan mere on diopan seað.
 4. Of diopan seaðe to ulan bearhe.
 5. A be þære æfesce on hrischalh, of hrischalh on eaman
broc.
 6. Of eaman broce on þone dic, of þon dice on scir holtes weg.
 6. Of scir holtes wæge on ealdan læge, of ealdan læge on
forst healh.
 7. Of forst halh a be efæsce on smeþe metue.
 8. Of smeþe metue on teodeces broc of þam broce on dunan hyl.
 10. Ðis synð þa land gemæra to æps læge.
 10. Fiolo meres ford, of fiolo meres forde on færn læge.
 11. Of færn læge on oflic weg, of oflic wege to þære
bradan stræte.
 12. Of þære stræte on cipes broc, of þam broce on bioton
halh.
 13. Of biotan hale in fucces treowe, of fucces treowe in mær
ford.
 14. Of mær ford on cnollan gæte in þa diopan bæce, of
þam diopan bæce in þane ealdan weg.
 15. Of þam ealdan wege in fiolo meres ford.
 16. Ðonne is ealles þæs landes IIII æt Teodeces læge I
æt æps laege IIII þa Oswald bisceop bocaþ Wulfrice.
 17. Þreora manna dæg on þa gerad weorce þ be Weorce þ
þæt land seo unforworht into þære halgan stowe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1311 (Birch 1181)
B15.8.551.
Bounds, Sawyer 1311: Birch 1885-99, no. 1181.



 1. Æt Cliforda II hida Wihtelme.
 1. And Wihtflæde & Godhyse.
 2. Ðonne is þæs landes ealles þe Oswald biscop bocað
Wihtelme his þegne on þa ge rad wyrce, þæt he wyrce þæt þæt
land sy un for worht into þære halgan stowe þreora manna dæg, oþer
healf hid ge dal landes & healf hid on þære ege.
 6. Ðas þreo bec lociað into stræt forda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1314 (Birch 1208)
B15.8.552.
Bounds, Sawyer 1314: Birch 1885-99, no. 1208.



 1. Ðis synd þære twegra hida land gemæra æt penedoc
æt ælfstanes brycce.
 2. Þ andlang Osrices pulle þ hit cymð on ducan seaðe.
 2. Of ducan seaðe þ hit cymð on risc hale.
 3. Of risc hale þ hit cymð on þone lytlan snæð feld.
 4. Þæt on þone haran wiþig west þ hit cymð to þan
hæcce be suðan cran mere.
 5. Þonan þ hit cymð to wen broce.
 5. Ondlong wen broces þ hit cymð on hina gemære benorðan
hege swa forð be Eadredesselde.
 7. Þ hit cymð to þan byhte to æsc apaldre leage.
 8. Norðeweardne on þone west halh þ hit cymð on gynddinc
gærstune.
 9. Forð þonan þ hit cymð æt þære stræte.
 9. Of þære stræte þ hit cymð to west mædwan butan an
furlang hina herð landes betweonan þære stræte & þære
mædwe.
 11. Andlang norð geardes þæt hit cymð be suðan stan
beorh.
 12. In þone byht of wanddinc hale forð be þam grafe þ hit
cymð in þan snæde.
 13. Of þan snæde þ hit cymð in þone norðran styfecinc
in þone swin hagan.
 14. Of swin hagan þ on sealt leage.
 15. Of sealt leage in þone hyrst geard.
 15. Þ forð þ forð on þone haran wiþig þonon ondlong
þæs riþiges þ on osrices pulle.
 16. Ondlong Osrices pulle þ on ælfstanes brycge feodecinc
leage.
 17. And þ lytle linland eal butan anan hrycge þæm west
mæstan twegen æceras on gemang hina lande.
 19. And se westra east healh & an stycce þ west mæstan and
seo þridde hind æt dydinc cotan þ is se ðridde æcer.
 21. Ðonne is ealles þæs landes þreo hida II æt penedoc
& I æt dydinc cotan þe Oswald bisceop bocað Hehstane his þægne
ðreora manna dæg on þa gerad wyrce, þ he wyrce þ þ land seo
unforworht into þære halgan stowe.
 25. Ðæs II bec lociað into ryppel.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1319 (Birch 1237)
B15.8.553.
Bounds, Sawyer 1319: Birch 1885-99, no. 1237.



 1. Ðis syndon þa gemæro to ðeouecan hylle.
 1. Ærest owandes forda eastweard olluncges stete.
 2. Þ hit cymeð to þære hegce olluncges ðære hegge þ
in lawern.
 3. Up be lawern þ swa suðen to ðæm forda.
 4. Ofer ðæm forda ollunc stræte þæt on butan þa cotu
þ swa on ælles burnan.
 5. Olluncges burnan þ swa on ðæt sic, olluncges sices þ
swa wið.
 6. Suþan ðæm more up bi ðæm æcerhege to ðære
