stræt, olluncges stræt þ swa on þa hegce.
 7. Olluncges ðære hegce norð weard þæt on ða
stræt.
 8. Olluncges stræte eastweard, þ swa on ðone hyl.
 9. Olluncges hegce þ swa on lawern, olluncges streames þ swa
norðen in ðone ford.
 10. And ða þreo æcras on þæm hylle foran on easthalfe
lawern & on norðhealfe stræte.
 12. Ælfweard wæs se forma man & nu hit stant his dohtor
on handa & heo is se oðer man.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1321 (Birch 1243)
B15.8.554.
Bounds, Sawyer 1321: Birch 1885-99, no. 1243.



 1. Ðis wæs gedon on Wynsiges gewytnesse muneces & on ealra
munuca æt Weogorna ceastre.
 3. <foreign>His metis prefatum rus hinc inde giratur</foreign>.
 4. Þis syndon þa land gemæru to longan dune.
 4. Ærest on þone mere.
 5. Þonne of þam mere west be þam hæfdan, þonne innan
anne sice.
 6. Þonne andlangc sices þæt cymð to þæm hor pytte.
 6. Þonne norð andlangc dunes, þonne ut æt þæs croftes
heafod þæt sticað on þære lace.
 8. Þonne up ondlong dune ufeweardre þ cymð to þære
wylle.
 9. Þonne andlang are stige þ cymð on þone bradan wæn
weg.
 10. Þonne andlang þara fura þ hit cymð up to þam rigcce.
 10. Þonne of þæm rigcce þ hit cymð to þam ealdan
garan.
 11. Þænne of þam garan innan þone mere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1322 (Birch 1235)
B15.8.555.
Bounds, Sawyer 1322: Birch 1885-99, no. 1235.



 1. Eac we him writað þa mædue æt pirig forda an suð
halue þæs weges swa seo niwe dic hit all hymbutan beligeð his dæge
& æfter twæm yrfweardum swilcan swilce he seolf wille.
 4. Ðis syndon þara V hida land gemæru æt cromban ærest
on winterburne ondlong þære burnan oð hit cymeð to þæm mær
hege.
 6. Ondlong þæs mæres heges þæt hit cymeð up on þa
dune.
 6. From ðære dune west weard þ hit cymeð to þære
ealdan dic west weardre þ hit cymeð on þonne mær weg.
 8. Ondlong þæs mær weges þ hit cymeð on bicce
sætan.
 9. Ondlong biccesætan þ hit cymeð on þæt lytle
ryðig.
 10. Of ðæm riðige a be roldan of þære oldan þ on
þone æcerhege.
 11. Ondlong þæs æcerheges þ hit cymeð on pippan leage.
 12. Ondlong þære leage midde weardre þ hit cymeð to
þæm lytlan wege.
 13. Ondlong þæs lytlan weges þ hit cymeð on þone
norðran mær weg.
 14. Ondlong þæs mær weges þæt hit cymeð on ægles
lonan.
 14. Ondlong þære lonan þ hit cymeð eft in þa burnan.
 15. And XII æcres mædue herto on þære niwan mædue.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1323 (Birch 1242)
B15.8.556.
Bounds, Sawyer 1323: Birch 1885-99, no. 1242.



 1. Ðis syndon þa lond gemæru æt witleag.
 1. Ærest of Grim setene gemære an siht ferð.
 2. Of siht ferð an fearn hege, of fearn hege an gerd wege.
 3. Of gerd wege to fif acan, of fif acan to þrim gemæran.
 3. Of þrim gemæran to kyllan rygce ondlong ðære aldan
dic.
 4. Of cyllan rygce an stan broc ondlong broces an Tæcles broc.
 5. Of Tæcles broce on beferic, of beferic on doferic, onlong
doferic on sæfern.
 7. Eadmær wæs se forma man & Wulfrun is se oðer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1325 (Birch 1238)
B15.8.557.
Bounds, Sawyer 1325: Birch 1885-99, no. 1238.



 1. Eowlangelad Ealhstan.
 1. Æþelstan.
 2. Ðis synd þa land gemære æt eowlan gelade.
 2. Of eowlan gelade andlang bladene.
 3. Of bladene andlang riþiges þ on fugel mære midne.
 4. Of fulgel mere þ on þone oþerne fugel mere.
 4. Of fugel mere þ on gild beorh.
 5. Of gild beorh andlang sealtstræte to þan stane.
 5. Of þan stane to þan oþeran stane þ swa to þan
þriddan stane, & to þan feorðan stane.
 7. Of þam stane to þære grenan stige.
 7. Of þære stige to lafercan beorh.
 8. Of lafercan beorh on þone ealdan weg þ ofer þone broc þ
eft on þone ealdan weg.
 9. Of þam ealdan wege þ forð onlang dune a bi heafdan þ hit
cymð to þan ealdan slo.
 10. Of þan slo to þan lytlan beorhe, of þan beorge on þ
sic.
 11. Ondlong sices ofer þone broc to heort wellan.
 12. Of heort wellan to hwete wellan, & þreo æceras
earðlandes of hwete wellan a bi þan earðlande to þan to brocenan
beorge.
 14. Of þan beorge forð on geriht on þæt sic.
 14. Of þam sice be þan heafdan þ hit cymð to mules hlawe,
& þreo æceras þonne adune andlang þære furh þæt cymð to
bladene.
 16. Swa andlang bladene þ hit cymð eft to eowlan gelade.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1329 (Birch 1298)
B15.8.558.
Bounds, Sawyer 1329: Birch 1885-99, no. 1298.



 1. Þis syndon þære are hide land gemæru to cudinclea þ
is þonne ærest on lytlan mædwe.
 2. Þonne ondlong þære hege wære on cuggan hyl.
 3. Of cuggan hylle on wytles leage.
 3. Þonone ofer þa stræte on cynelde weorþe.
 4. Of cynelde weorðe swa on þære lytlan mædwe, swa on
swines heafde & þær wiðutan XII æcras.
 5. Swa æfter þære stræte be þære wællan on
sunder lond.
 6. Of þon on omer lond þæt a be wudu þæt cymð eft to
lytlan mædwe & to þrym gemærum.
 7. And XXX æcra on þæm twæm feldan dal landes
wiðutan.
 9. Þis wæs gedon on Wynsiges gewitnesse decanus & alra
þara munuca æt Wiogurna ceastre.
 11. Brihtlaf wæs se forma man & nu hit stant his sunan on
handan Byrhtwine & Byrhtmære.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1330 (Kem 614)
B15.8.559.
Bounds, Sawyer 1330: Kemble 1839-48, no. 614.



 1. Ðis syndon ðara V hida landgemære æt Tidelminctune.
 2. Ærest on Sture.
 3. Ondlong Sture ongean stream on Doferburnan.
 3. Ondlong Doferburnan ongean stream æt ða deopan furh.
 5. Of ðære deoppan ferh on ðære sandune.
 5. Of sandune on hor pytte.
 6. Of hor pytte on ðæt riðig.
 6. Ondlong riðig ðæt eft in Sture.
 8. Æt Tidelminctune.
 8. Ælfweard and ælfwine and Wulfware.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1335 (Birch 1299)
B15.8.560.
Bounds, Sawyer 1335: Birch 1885-99, no. 1299.



 1. Ðis synd þa lond gemæro þe gebyriað into codestune.
 1. Ærest on gytincges æwelm.
 2. Of gytincges æwylm on noð dene on þone grenan weg þ on
þone haran stan.
 3. Of þam haran stane andlang grenan weges on scepe clif.
 4. Andlang scepe clifes inon meos mære, of meos mære andlang
dene on geolowon ford.
 5. Of geolowon forda on þrist longan dene, ondlong þristlongan
dene to brocces slæde.
 6. Of brocces slæde ondlong ecce þ on þa twegen þornas.
 7. Of þam twam þornan on wad beorh, of wad beorhce on lafercan
beorh.
 8. Of lafercan beorhge a bi þam æcran heafdan þ on scyttan
fæn.
 9. Of scyttan fæn þ on gytinc ondlong þ eft on gytincges
æwylm.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1340 (Kem 623)
B15.8.561.
Bounds, Sawyer 1340: Kemble 1839-48, no. 623.



 1. Ðis syndan ða landgemære into Dæglesforde.
 2. Ærest on Bladene be westan tune and be norðan andlang
ðæs sices to bægenwelle.
 4. Of bægenwelle up to cynges ferdstræte.
 5. Andlang stræte to dunemannes treowe.
 5. Of dunemannes treowe andlang strete east to Nunnena beorge.
 7. Of ðam beorge west to Babban beorge.
 7. Of ðam beorge eft into Bladene be Suðantune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1346 (Kem 646)
B15.8.562.
Bounds, Sawyer 1346: Kemble 1839-48, no. 646.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæro ðæra þreora hida æt
Bysceopes stoce.
 2. Ærest on ðæs heges hyrnan be Westan stoce.
 3. Of ðam on ða ealdan dic on haran mære norðwardne.
 4. Of haran mære innan filidleage norðwarde.
 5. Of filidleage norðward in ðone holan broc.
 5. Of ðæm holan broce innan sweoperlan stream.
 6. Of sweoperlan streame on dinningcgrafes wyrttruman.
 7. Of dynningcgrafes wyrttruman eall swa se dic sceot on esnig
mædwæ wearde.
 9. Of esnig mædwan eal swa ðæt ealde riðig sceot up on
ðone ealdan hearpað.
 10. Of ðæm ealdan hearpaðe up on ða ealdan dic wið
stoces weard.
 12. Of ðære ealdan dic eal swa se hege sceot be stoce westan
eft on ðæs heges hyrnan.
 14. Geanbec into Gleweceaster æt Bisceopes stoce.
 15. Æðelweard and æðelmære.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1347 (Earle)
B15.8.563.
Bounds, Sawyer 1347: Earle 1888, 207-9.



 1. Þonne is þæs londes þridde half hid þe oswold
arcebisceop selð cynelme his þegne to boc londe.
 3. Swa he hit him ær hæfde toforlæten to læn londe
ægþær ge on earð londe ge on hom londe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1348 (Kem 645)
B15.8.564.
Bounds, Sawyer 1348: Kemble 1839-48, no. 645.



 1. Ðis syndon ðara twegra hida landgemæru to Wulfringtune.
 3. Ærest of ymelmore up ondlong holan broces, ðæt it
cymeð to Monninghæma dice.
 4. And swa ondlong ðæs dices ðæt on ðone salt
herpað.
 5. And swa ondlong ðæs herpaðes ðæt on saltere dene.
 6. Ondlong ðære dene on ðone herpað be westan
fugelmære.
 7. Ondlong ðæs herpaðes on saltere wellan.
 8. Of saltere wellan eastriht on salt broc.
 9. And swa ondlong salt broces eft on hymelmor æt Wuduforda.
 11. Eadwig wæs se forma man, and Wulfgyuu wæs se oðer.
 12. Nu hæft æðelsige hit to ðan ðe ðu wylle.
 13. Wulfringtun.
 13. Eadwige, Wulfgeofe, and heora dohtor.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1351 (Kem 653)
B15.8.565.
Bounds, Sawyer 1351: Kemble 1839-48, no. 653.



 1. Ðis syndon ða gemæru ðe to ðisson londe gebyriað.
 2. Ærest of Sture on ða dic æt suð dene.
 3. Ondlong dices to ðæm heafdum.
 3. A be ðæm heafdum on þreo hlawas.
 4. Of þreom hlawan in ðone weg.
 5. Ondlong weges ðæt on ða aldan stræte.
 5. Ondlong ðære aldan stræte ðæt hit cymeð to
Heortlaforda.
 6. Of Heortlaforda ðæt eft on Sture.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1352 (Kem 649)
B15.8.566.
Bounds, Sawyer 1352: Kemble 1839-48, no. 649.



 1. Ðis synt ða landgemæru æt Cloptune.
 1. Ærest of Wermundingcforda ondlong hegstowe to Wulfrices
gemære.
 3. Ondlong ðæs gemæres on ælfrices gemære.
 4. Ondlong ðæs gemæres on ða ealdan stræt.
 4. Ondlong stræte on breggeburnan ford.
 5. Onlang burnan on ðone hege.
 6. Ondlong heges on færweg.
 6. Ondlong weges on ðone wuduherpað.
 7. Ondlang herpaðes on ciolanweg.
 8. Ondlong weges ðæt be eastan ða bircan on Cyneðegnes
gemære.
 9. Ondlong gemæres in on Lawern.
 10. Ondlong Lawern on ceolanford.
 10. Ðæt swa be Cyneðegnes gemære swa ða ealdan dica
beligcað.
 11. Ðæt eft swa on Weormundinc ford.
 12. Ond ðis is ðæt mæd land ðærto.
 13. Ærest of Temedan on Lullan hlyd on ða hegestowe
ufewardre.
 14. Ondlong hegstowe on langan æcer.
 15. Ondlong æceres on hina hom.
 15. Ðæt swa eft in Temedan.
 16. Ðonne is ealles ðæs landes an hid ðe Osuuald
ercebiscup bocað Wulfgare preoste þreora manna dæg mid his hlafordes
leafe, and ðone hagan binnan mynstre on porte ðe Wulfric mæssepreost
becwæð Wulfwarde his mæge, ic his geon him his dæg and he his wel
bruce.
 21. And æfter his dæge twam mannan swilce him leofeste seu to
brucenne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1353 (Kem 660)
B15.8.567.
Bounds, Sawyer 1353: Kemble 1839-48, no. 660.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæro ðe gebyriað into Codestune.
 2. Ærest on Gytincges æwylm.
 3. Of Gytinges æwylme on norðdene on ðone grenan weg.
 4. Ðæt on ðane haran stan.
 4. Of ðæm haran stane andlang grenan weges on scepe clif.
 5. Andlang scepe clifes in on meos mære.
 6. Of meos mære andlang dene on geolowonford.
 7. Of geolewanforde on þristlongan dene.
 8. Ondlang þristlongan dene to brocces slæde.
 9. Of brocces slæde ondlong ecge ðæt on ða twegen
þornas.
 10. Of ðæm twam þornan on wadbeorh.
 10. Of wadbeorhge on lafercan beorh.
 11. Of lafercan beorhge a bi ðam æcra heafdan ðæt on
scyttanfæn.
 12. Of scyttanfænne ðæt on Gyting.
 13. Ondlang ðæt eft on Gytinges æwylm.
 15. Æt Codestune.
 15. Æðelmund and Wulfhelm and ælfnoð and Godwine.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1356 (Kem 667)
B15.8.568.
Bounds, Sawyer 1356: Kemble 1839-49, no. 667.



 1. Ðis syndan ða landgemæru into Clifforda.
 1. Of Strætforda ondlong ðære mycelan stræte.
 2. Of ðære stræte on ruggan sloh.
 3. Andlang broces on ðone grenan weg.
 4. Andlang ðære dene ðæt on bromhlinc.
 4. Of bromhlince andlang ðære dene innan Sture.
 5. Andlang Sture ðæt cymð innan Afene.
 6. Andlang Afene ðæt eft innan Strætforda.
 7. Mid were and mid mylene, ge inner, ge utter swa to ðæm
þreom hidan gebyrige.
 9. Æt Clifforda, æðelwearde and Eadflæde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1361 (Kem 670)
B15.8.569.
Bounds, Sawyer 1361: Kemble 1839-48, no. 670.



 1. Ðis synd ðara feower hida landgemæru æt Hwitintune.
 2. Ærest on Tydanlægh.
 2. Of Tydanleage ðæt dun be ðæm readan wege.
 3. Ðæt wið westan ðone beorh.
 4. Ðæt on plumhyrgc.
 4. Of plumhyrgce to caldan wellan.
 5. Of caldan wellan to hreodlæge.
 5. Of hreodlæge to ðære hæhstræte.
 6. Andlang stræte ðæt to swynes heafdan.
 7. Of swines heafdan to Cinilde wyrðe.
 8. Of Cynilde wyrðe to wudu mædwan.
 8. Of ðæm mædwan dun be ðære hegceriewe.
 9. Ðæt in langan broc.
 9. Of ðæm broce in bradan mores ric.
 10. Andlang rices ðæt to ðære hæhstræte.
 11. Andlang stræte ðæt in langan broc.
 11. Anlang broces ðæt wið ufan holan dene ofer ða
stræte.
 13. Ðæt eft ongeriht to Tydanlæge.
 14. Hwitintun.
 14. Gardulfe and Leofenoð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1370 (Birch 1139)
B15.8.570.
Bounds, Sawyer 1370: Birch 1885-99, no. 1139.



 1. Æt Grimanlæge & æt Moslege Osulfe &
æþelstane.
 1. And Ufede.
 3. Þis syndan þæs londes gemæru æt grimanleage þe
higen bisceope gesald habbað.
 4. Ærest of særuerne be higna gemære on scaeccan halh
& swa be þære alra ofesce in þa niwan dic.
 5. And swa up onlong þære niwan dice þæt on þa aldan
hege stowe.
 6. And seoððan a onlong þære aldan hege stowe on þone
folc hearpað þæt up onlong þæs hearpoþes to þam Cristes
mæle.
 8. And swa from þæm Cristes mæle of dun weard onlong anre
ealdre dic west weard.
 9. And norð weard þæt in alræ broc & seoðþan a
swæ alr broc ligeð up weard to mos setnæ gemære.
 11. And swæ bi mossetna gemære of sihtferð on þone aldan
cyninges hagan.
 12. Þæt swa onlong þæs ældan cyninges hagan norð
weard to þæm aldan stod falode.
 13. And þonne from þæm ældæn stod falode bi beonet
setnæ gemære on siht ferð & swæ onlong siht ferðes in bæle
swæ onlong bæles in sæferne.
 16. Þis syndon þæs londes gemæru æt mosleage.
 16. Of þæm ældan feldæ west riht on gearuec swa onlong
broces on þone gemær hagan.
 18. Þæt ondlong hagæn ofer fild burnan on timber hrycg.
 19. Þonon on beostinc hrycg swæ eastweard on blæcan
hrycge.
 20. Þonon eft in þone aldæn feld.
 21. Þis syndon þara halfe hide lond gemæru æt wican.
 21. Ærest of turtlingcforda on horsa croft.
 22. Of horsa crofte be wulfrices gemære in þæt pull.
 23. Of þæm pulle up weard bi þære wellan þæt up in
þa lanan.
 24. Ondlong lanan norð weard þæt on æntingc gærstun in
þa hegcan.
 25. Andlang hægcan eastweard þæt on lawern.
 25. Ondlong lawern þæt on streon halh, be streonen halæ
þæt in temedan upongean stream.
 27. Ondlong temedan þæt eft in turtlingc ford.
 28. And seo salt wellingc þe hyrð into griman leage in brad
setena selle oþer into mosleage in þam ilcan sele.
 30. Þis is ealles þe her on þissere bec cweð an Oswald
bisceop his breðer Osulf þreora manna dæg se ðe hit awende æt un
for worhtum þingum God adilgie his noman of lifes bocum buton he ær to
bote gecyrre.
 34. Osulf wæs se forma man & æþelstan munuc is þe
oðer.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1379 (Kem 691)
B15.8.571.
Bounds, Sawyer 1379: Kemble 1839-48, no. 691.



 1. Ðys syndon þa landgemæro to cuces hamme.
 1. Ærest of cudan hlæwe on fildena weg.
 2. Andlang weges þæt on ðone ealdan egsan ford.
 3. Of ðam forda andlang hweowelriðiges þæt on
swæferðes wylles heafdon.
 4. Of ðæs wylles heafdon.
 5. On þone æsc.
 5. Of ðam æsce.
 5. Eft on hweowelriðig.
 6. Of ðam riðige.
 6. On þa ealdan dic.
 6. Of þære dice.
 7. Þæt on þa wudu wic æt wylleres seaðon.
 7. And swa se wudu þe into þam lande gebyrað.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1380 (Dugdale)
B15.8.572.
Bounds, Sawyer 1380: Dugdale 1846, VI, 1444-5.



 1. This beoþ ða land ymere ðe Wlfrun hafaþ, don into ða
mynstre in Hamtune, & ðe tune nome ðe ðis priuilegie ymbe specheþ.
 3. Erest of Earnleie, & Espich, & Bilsetnatun, &
Willenhale, & Wodnesfeld, & Weoleshale, & Ocgintun, & Hiltun,
& Hagenþorndun, & Kinwaldestun, & oþer Hyltun, &
Feoþerstan.
 7. This beoþ ða mere into Earnleie.
 7. Erest of Earesbroce & ða scorte ðornes & of ða
scorte ðornes in Wlsieshorsecroft & ðanen in Alrescagan.
 9. & of ðe scagan in Eadulfescrofte, & of ða crofte in
ðone ryewei, onlang ðane riewei in ða eordbriche, & ðonan duneward
in ða lynleie, & of þare leie iu ðone Swinseaþ.
 12. & of ða seaþe in Heortseges broc, onlang ðes broces
in ða myþan, & of ðare myþen in Byinnigbroc.
 14. & ðanen up efter broce in ðat sych, & of ðan sich
in Sciteresford, & of ðan forde in Bromescumbe, & of ða cumbe in
Eþelsiesymere, onlang Eþelsiesymere in Seferne dune.
 17. Onlang Sefernes in fif aken, of fif aken in ðone styb, &
of ða stibbe in ða strete, onlang strete in winnan trou & of ða troue
on Tudelefbeche.
 20. Onlang beches in Seferne, up efter Seferne in Leofrichesymere,
onlang ðe mere in Thurulfesweie, of ðe weie in ðone aker geard, onlang
ðe gearde in Lamberde leie.
 23. & of ðe leie on Earesbroc ðer hit er on feng, &
ouer Fatestal into Earnleie et ðere wich, and ðritti suinemest on
Scipricge ec into Earnleie.
 26. This beoþ ðe land ymere into Eiswich.
 26. Erest of ebles bece in ða dic, & of ða dice on Sture
dun efter into Tresel, up efter Tresel in Scakeresford.
 29. & of ða forde on ðat sic, onlang sices upward in
Belstowe, & of Belstowa in Tresel.
 31. This beoþ ðe mere to Bilsetnetun, & to Wodnesfeld &
erest of Hindebroce in ðeo dic bitwonem Ettingeshale & Bilsetnetun.
 33. Onlang ða dic forte cume ðer, ðeo dic went estward, &
of ðam dice forþ on ðone ðorne ðar þa ðreo ymere goþ to somne
Hantunes & Ettingeshale & Bilsetnetun ymere.
 34. & of ðam ðore in þone lece mere, & of þa mere
on þone ford þer beorgiþes sanes strete liþ ofer, & of þa forde
ic þone dic þe liþ betueone Wodnesfel ðes ymere, & Hamtunes.
 37. & norþward ford efter dic þet on piates þorn, and of
þe þorne efter þere dic on Penwie þer Wodnesfeldesymere, &
Hamtunes, & Byscopesbyri goþ to somne.
 40. & forþ onlang penwies in Byribroc & of þa broce
þat on þone Ealrescagen, & efter Ealrescagan on þat sice, & efter
siche on þa strete, and forþ efter þer alde strete on þane Haren stan.
 43. & of þa stane on þa suinsete, & of þare suinsete
onlang strete hat on þara dic, onlang dic þet on Kirnesford, & of þa
forde onlang portstrete in þat White sic.
 46. & efter sic on þone broc in Beadgiþeburne, & of
þa burne into landebroce onlang þes broces on meidenesford, onlang þes
broces hat into þare dic hit er of þan broce eode.
 50. This beoþ þa land ymere betuone Kinpaldestune &
Eatuue.
 51. Erest of þa broce on þan heafdan on þone dic, onlang
dices in þonoþorne broce, æfter þan broce into Penchrich, onlang
Penchrich þat cume to þare dic.
 53. Onlang dic into Sealtmere, þer ofer þone mere on þa dic,
efter þere dic wiþ easten ryecroft on þone fule broc, onlang broces þer
hit mon er onteng, & þarto eakan þa fif akeres at tþie fyrde into
Kineuoldestune to Kalfre heie.
 57. This is þo ymere into Hageþorndune.
 57. Erest of Searesbrocesforde on Holeweie, & of þan weie on
þat longa strete, & of þare strete on þone mer heige ford.
 60. Anlang Heies on þreo ymere, & of þreo ymere on
Eþelwier heie on þone feld on þone Ihau, & þanen on þa dic et
þan scagan, onlang dices wiþ þet sled wid mestac.
 62. Onlang sledes op on ea & þat eastward on þat oþer
sled, efter þa slede on þæt white stanas, & þar on þa strete
þe sceoteþ from þere syle, onlang þare strete bi þam hagan heies.
 66. Efter strete in þat white sic, efter þa sice on þone
whiten halh, and þer on þene broc, onlang broces þat in Searesbroc effre
seodþen, onlang broces eft in ðone forde ðe hiter of eode.
 70. This beoþ ða land ymere at Hiltune & at
Feoþerestane.
 71. Erest of Brenesfopde onlan ða strete on Lece broc, upward
efter broce on ðana Stanieford, efter ðare strete ðat hic cume ða dic,
efter ðere dic on þa Heafdan, efter ða heafdan on ðana Stainiewei,
ðar on Eþelwiesheie.
 75. Forþ efter his hagan heies ðat hit cume on ðane
michelemor, and ðonen on ða ealdan byri, & ðanen on ða eastleie,
& sua forþ on Leofwines heie, onlang heies on Kersewille.
 78. & ðanen on ða hyll, & of ða hille on ða
heafdan, forþ efter ðe heafdan on ðone oþerne hil, onlang hilles in
wilspryng/ wiþ Esingetun, & of ðere þille on suienðun & ðanen
on ðane haran stan.
 81. & of ðane stane ðuers ofer ðone mor in Ebroc, onlang
broces in Brunesford ðer hit er of eode.
 84. This beoþ ða land ymere into Ogintune.
 84. Erest on ða greata alres, efter ða more on Wassawillan, of
ða on ðe dic, efter ðare dic on ðat fen, et hare suinsete þet on
þone heig.
 87. Efter þan heie þet forþ richte on blaca leige, on sa leie
suþ forte eft on þe efter strete on þane ford, efter þa broce ongea
streame on þa dic.
 90. Efter heredic ðet on þes ford on þone broc, efter broce
ongea streame þat on ge stret efter strete þat on þa dic, efter dice
þat eft in þa greata alres.
 94. This beoþ ða land ymere into Weoleshale, erest on
Weolesford.
 95. Of Weolesford, efter broce ongean streame þat on myclan mor,
& ðan more þat on rye halan, & of rye halan on þone broc, efter
broce ongean streame.
 97. Þæt on efter dice þæt on þa haran wiþi, of þan
wiþi þat on heortsole, of heortsole on Hunten stye, of Hunten stye on
þel ford.
 99. Of þel forde efter mid streame þet on Ordeiseie, on þan
broce, efter broce ongean streame west on Weolesford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1384 (Kem 1313)
B15.8.573.
Bounds, Sawyer 1384: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1313.



 1. Ðis syndon þa landgemæru to beonetleage.
 2. Of sæfern in bæle.
 2. Andlang bæle in fulebroce.
 3. Of fulebroce in sihtfyrþ.
 3. Of sihtfyrþ in þa ealdan rode.
 4. Andlang ðære rode to þrym gemære.
 5. Of þrym gemære in ða ealdan dic.
 5. Andlang þære ealdan dic in laggeburnan.
 6. Of laggeburnan in cynewardes gemære.
 7. Of cynewardes gemere in doferic.
 8. Andlang doferic eft in sæfern.
 9. Gean boc to beonetleage.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1385 (Earle)
B15.8.574.
Bounds, Sawyer 1385: Earle 1888, 234-5.



 1. Ðis syndan þære halfre hide lond gemæru up æt
þære pirian.
 2. Þæt is ærest fornongean þære cyrcan ollung
þære hegreawe on æglardes mersc.
 3. Ollung þære hegreawe inne þa strete, ollung þære
strete þæt upp on þæne hyl.
 4. Of þam hylle dun in þæt dæll, þæt ollung þæs
dæles.
 5. Þæt up on þone hyll be henon lipperd ofer midne graf.
 6. Þæt in þone midlestan holan weg þæt innan þa
hegreawe.
 7. Ollung þa hegreawe innan þone readan weg.
 8. Ollung þæs readan weges þæt innan þa hecce.
 9. Ollung þa hecce þæt innan þa hecce fornigean þære
cyrcan.
 10. And þæt land þærto þe æþelnoþ ahte up
ættan ofran & þæne hagan þe eadwerd ahte & þæne mæd
æcer þe þærto hyrð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1393 (Earle)
B15.8.575.
Bounds, Sawyer 1393: Earle 1888, 239-40.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemæro into tapen halan.
 1. Þæt is ærest of brada forda east in ða hegreawe.
 2. Æfter þære heghreawe þæt cymð innan ða ealdan
dic.
 3. Æfter þære dic þæt to ðam holan wege.
 4. Ofer þone weg west riht to þære ealdan dic.
 5. Æfter þære dic to þære bradan stræt.
 5. Of þære bradan stræt be þam grafe innan ða port
stræt.
 7. Æfter stræte innan dillameres dic.
 7. Of þære dice ende innan þa wællan.
 8. Of þære wællan in þa sandihte stræt.
 9. Æfter stræte norð on bisceopes scirlett ofer bisceopes
scirlett in lin aceran wege þam innmæstan.
 10. Of lin aceran innan ðone hege.
 11. Æfter þam hege on brocc holes weg.
 12. Of brocc holes wege innan þone croft.
 12. Of þam crofte be þam gearde innan leofesunes croft.
 13. Of þam crofte innan salewearpan.
 14. Æfter salewearpan in oter burnan, æfter oter burnan
þæt cymð eft in salewearpan.
 16. And twegen hagan binnan porte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1395 (Kem 765)
B15.8.576.
Bounds, Sawyer 1395: Kemble 1839-48, no. 765.



 1. Ðis syndon ða landgemæru to Beonetleahge.
 2. Of Sæfern in Bæle.
 3. Andlang Bæle in Fulebroc.
 3. Of Fulebroce in Sihtfyrð.
 4. Of Sihtfyrð in ða ealdan rode.
 4. Andlang ðære ealdan rode to ðære niðerbogenan ac.
 5. Of ðære nyðerbogenan ac eft in ða ealdan rode.
 6. Andlang ðære rode to þrym gemære.
 7. Of þrym gemære in Doferic.
 7. Andlang Doferic eft in Sæfern.
 8. And ða hagan on porte ðæt is se ordceard æt mærdice
on ðe ðærto byriað, ðæt syndon ða betweox ælfrices smiðes
and Eadwines æddan sunan, and ænne mædsplot be eastan Sæfern forne
gean Hyltun, and twegen ofnas æt ðære sealtwic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1396 (Kem 764)
B15.8.577.
Bounds, Sawyer 1396: Kemble 1839-48, no. 764.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemær into Elmlea.
 2. Ðæt is ðonne, ærest of Netelcumbe æfter Wulfrices
gemære in ðone steort.
 4. Of ðam steorte andlang weges on fulan bryc.
 4. Of fulan brycce andlang westbroces ongean stream in ealda ford.
 6. Of ealda forda on halsbroc.
 6. Of halsbroke into ðam halan.
 7. Of ðam halan andlang pohweges innon neoðere hæma
gemære.
 8. Æfter ðam gemære in Nottestan.
 9. Of Nottestane andlang gemære in Byrdingcwican æfter ðam
more in Wifyrððes mere.
 10. Of Wifyrððes mere andlang heafdon on hinhæma gemæru.
 12. Æfter hinhæma gemæru in ða ealdan stræt.
 13. Ðer ofer ða stræt æfter ðam gemære in
saltwyllan.
 13. Of saltwyllan in segchæma gemær.
 14. Of segchæma gemæru on æschæma gemæru into
ðære munuca gemæru up to ðære hyrstte.
 16. Of ðære hyrstte in pohweg.
 16. Ðæt on halsbroc.
 17. Of halsbroke andlang ðæs rycweges innan scirford.
 18. Of scirforda ofer ðæne stanyhta weg ðæt on calcstanes
mor.
 19. Of calcstanes more ðæt eft innan Netelcumbe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1405 (Earle)
B15.8.578.
Bounds, Sawyer 1405: Earle 1888, 247-8.



 1. Ðis is ðære twegra hida boc & anre gyrde æt norð
tune.
 2. And ða feower æceras ðærto of ðære styfycunge
into ðam twam hidan & ða mæde.
 3. And ðone graf ðe þærto mid rihte toligeð.
 4. And ða ðry æceras mæde on afan hamme.
 5. Þe sancte oswold geaf bercstane into ðam lande.
 6. And ðiss synd þa land gemæro into ðam grafe.
 6. Ærost of ðære dune andlang þære rode oð hit
cymð beneoðan stan cnolle.
 8. Þanon on gerihte to cwenn hofoton.
 8. Of cwenn hofoton be norðan þam mere þanon on gerihte eft
up on ða dune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1434 (Birch 378)
B15.8.579.
Bounds, Sawyer 1434: Birch 1885-99, no. 378.



 1. Ærest fram æsce norð to stættincgforda.
 2. Ðanon norð be ea to dreaman uuyrðe on fisc pol.
 3. Ðanon east rihte be suðeuueardan bradan lea.
 4. Swa be suðan pur wuda.
 4. Be pytlea to uuincelcumbe on ðæt sol.
 4. Of ðan sole on ða ealdan stræte.
 5. Ðanon on middan stan mere.
 5. Ðanon on gerihte on cyncges lim fine.
 6. Of ðære fine niðer ofer hean leah andlang mele uueges on
ðone hean æsc be norðan wol tune.
 7. Swa on bisceopesðorn.
 8. Ðanon west ðurh suð tun on middan hyrst.
 8. Ðanon suð up be ea on norðan bord dæne.
 9. Ðanon on neolan mere.
 9. Of ðam on middan hearcincg mere.
 10. Ðanon on sacecumb.
 10. Swa on fearn edisc.
 11. Swa to æsce.
 12. <foreign>Hæc sunt territoria octo aratrorum ad cealfa locum</foreign>.
 12. Ærest of burware felda to buggangete.
 13. Ðanon to cusincg dene of ðære dene to cyncges hamme.
 14. Ðanon to bisceopincg dene.
 14. Ðanon to stod hamme.
 15. Of ðam to cuðrincg dune ðanon on middan bradan mere.
 15. Ðanon to cyneuuoldincge.
 16. Of cyneuuoldincge to dene.
 16. Of dene to burware felda.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1450 (Birch 1351)
B15.8.580.
Bounds, Sawyer 1450: Birch 1885-90, no. 1351.



 1. Ærest up of Temese, andlang Merfleotes to Pollene stocce.
 1. Swa on Bulinga fenn, of tham fenne æfter thær ealdan dic
to Cuforde.
 3. Upp andlang Teoburnan to thære wide herestret, æfter there
herestret to thære ealde stoccene sancte Andreas on Holeburne.
 4. Swa innan Lundane fenn, andlang fennes suth on Temese on middan
streame.
 6. Andlang streame be lande & be strande eft on Merfleote.
 7. Ærest æt Sandgæte thær tha threo marce to gædere
gath, west thanon andlang Hemstedes mearce to Mærburnan.
 8. Andlang burnan to Wætlingan stræte, andlang stræte into
Bræingte.
 9. Up andlang Brægente innan fihte burnan, of tham burnan to
tham wogan æpsan.
 11. Thanon to tham ældan hagtreowe, of tham treowe to tham thrim
mærcum æt Sandgate.
 13. Ærest æt Sandgæte, swa east to bedegares swicleage,
thær suth to Deormodes wican.
 14. Of Deormodes wican to medeman Hemstede, swa forth &lang
hagan to risc leage.
 15. Of risc leage west æfter mærce to tham bæruwe, of tham
bærue west andlang mærce to stangrave.
 17. Of tham grave innan Wætlinga stræte, swa north &lang
wætlinge stræte to mær burne.
 18. Of mær burnan of east æfter mearce to sandgæte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1451 (Birch 1290)
B15.8.581.
Bounds, Sawyer 1451: Birch 1885-99, no. 1290.



 1. Ærest of þam ealdan tunstealle on wæclinga stræt.
 2. Innan ægces wer æfter stan burnan on sulh.
 3. Swa on yburnan &lang yburnan oþ Iccenes ford.
 4. Andlang sihtre oþ þone hagan.
 4. Andlang hagan to grendeles gatan æfter kincges mearce innan
brægentan.
 5. Of brægentan æfter merce innan tatan burnan.
 6. Þanon oþ heandunes gemære on holan riwe.
 7. Þanon on sulh, of sulh eft to þam ealdan tunstealle.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1540 (Stanley)
B15.8.582.
Bounds, Sawyer 1540: Stanley transcript edited from London, British Library, MS. Cotton Claudius C.IX, fol. 200v.



 1. Arest of eoccen andlanges þam lace æt stanbrycge.
 2. Þonne of stanbrycge east andlang þære lace þæ scyt
wið ceren burhg westan.
 3. Þonan norð andlang þære lace æt þam gemyðum; of
þam gemyþan andlang þære lace æt cerenforda.
 4. Of cerenforda andlang lace on eoccen; þonne up andlang eoccen
et landbroce.
 5. Þonne up andlang landbroce on þa mæð dic; þonne up
andlang dic; þonne eft on loccen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1541 (Birch 1170)
B15.8.583.
Bounds, Sawyer 1541: Birch 1885-99, no. 1170.



 1. Ærest of þam hæcce to dudemæres hele.
 1. Of dudemæres hele to merclege.
 2. Of merclege to stan lege, of stan lege to þære dun lege.
 3. Of þær dun lege swa eft innon þæne hæc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1542 (Birch 633)
B15.8.584.
Bounds, Sawyer 1542: Birch 1885-99, no. 633.



 1. Ærest of fearnbeorhge west on þone weg to þam stanum.
 1. Of þam stanum suð on ðone weg on þa andheafda.
 2. Of þam andheafdum on ða hlinc rewe ut to þære dic be
norðan stodfaldon.
 3. Þonne forð on ða dic to mær flodan be æstan
lillinglea.
 4. Þonne forð &lang þes suðeran weges oð þæt
lange treow.
 5. Þonne forð west on þone weg ofer beocumb to þam
stancrundele.
 6. Þonne norðon ðane smalan weg wið eastan brocenan beorg
to þamwege þæ þær east ligð.
 7. Þonne forð on ðone weg to cytelflodan be westan
mulescumbes.
 8. Þær ða weges twisligað.
 9. Þonne forð to scyldmere.
 9. Þonne forð on ða furh to furcumbe.
 10. Andlanges furcumbes middeweardes to þære dene.
 10. Þonne forð on ða dene to þære wega gemyþan.
 11. Þonne forð to þam hwitan wege to þam haran þornan.
 12. Þonne of þam hwitan wege on fearnbeorhg.
 13. And se leag be eastan catmere þæ þær to
gebyræð.
 13. Þ is on ðone weg þæ ligð to stanleage.
 14. Þonne forð syððan suð on þone stanihtan weg.
 15. Of stanmeringa gemere þonne forð on þone smalan weg to
þam fulan wege.
 16. Se hatte stific weg.
 16. Þ is catmeringa gemære & þes landes to
feornbeorhgan.
 17. Þonne ford andlang ðæs weges ut on þone feld.
 18. And þonne ealle þa hangran betweonan þam wege & þam
þe to stanleage ligð.
 19. Gebyriað ealle to fearnbeorgan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1543 (Birch 907)
B15.8.585.
Bounds, Sawyer 1543: Birch 1885-99, no. 907.



 1. Ærest on þa mærdic eastewearde þ innan Tealeburnan.
 2. Andlang tealeburnan þ innan eoccen.
 3. Andlang eoccen þ innan þa merdic.
 3. Of þam mærdic þ innan þa furh.
 4. Of þa furh þ innan þ riðig.
 4. Of þam riðig þ innan lanbroc.
 5. Andlang landbroces ford on butan þone ham.
 5. Eft on þa mærdic eastewearde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1544 (Birch 1261)
B15.8.586.
Bounds, Sawyer 1544: Birch 1885-99, no. 1261.



 1. Ærest of Eoccan on mære ðorn.
 1. Of mære ðornne on ða heafod æceras.
 2. Ðonon on swanesig on þone ealdan garan middeweardne.
 3. Of þam ealdan garan andlang rihtgemeres innan Kingestun.
 3. Andlang riht gerið on þone pyt be neoðan cingestun.
 4. Swa andlang rihtgemeres on þone ðorn ut on Temese.
 5. Andlang Temese on þ ealdgemære.
 5. Up andlang gemæres on ælfðryðæ stane.
 6. Andlang dice.
 6. Of ðære dic andlang rihtgemæres þæt eft on
Eoccene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1545 (Birch 523)
B15.8.587.
Bounds, Sawyer 1545: Birch 1885-99, no. 523.



 1. Æn westeweardum & on suðeweardum sceldmere.
 1. Þonne of sceldmere on smalan weg.
 2. And ðanon on gemærbeorg.
 2. And of gemær beorge on werð welle.
 3. Of werð welle feower æcras be norðan Lakincg.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1546 (Birch 684)
B15.8.588.
Bounds, Sawyer 1546: Birch 1885-99, no. 684.



 1. Ærest on eoccen æt sandfordinga gemære.
 1. Swa ut on gean stream to snitan ige.
 2. On norð healfe þæs igeðes.
 2. And swa on baccan mor middeweardne.
 3. Swa andlang mores on fisclace innan crypeles heale.
 4. And þ andlang fearnbroces.
 4. Þ hit sticað up on þa readan dic.
 4. Swa andlang dic þ on hlydan.
 5. Andlang hlydan on bradan mor.
 5. Of bradan more to preosthamme up on myos wyllan.
 6. Of myos wyllen on þene hricg weg.
 7. Andlang hrycgeweges to þam cristes mæle.
 7. Þonne suð þ hit sticoð eft on Eoccen þ hit onfeng.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1547 (Birch 1323)
B15.8.589.
Bounds, Sawyer 1547: Birch 1885-99, no. 1323.



 1. Þis is Peading tunes landscaro þær æscburne ut scyt.
 1. On dertan stream od wede burne ut scyt.
 2. Up an wede burnan oþ wiði mor, of widi more on cealfa dune.
 3. Middewearde of cealfa dune oð sufonstanas.
 4. Of sufonstanum on hyfan treow, on hyfan treowe on hord burh.
 5. Of hordbyrg on deorford, of deorforda on langa stan.
 5. Of langa stane on eofede tor, of eofede torre on hean dune
forewearde.
 7. Of heandune on þone blindan wille, of ðam wille on
writelanstan.
 8. Of þa stane on ruwa beorh, of ruwan beorge on fyrspenn.
 8. Of fyrspenne on wyrtcumes heafod, of wyrtcumes heafde on rammes
horn.
 10. Of rammes horne on lulca stile, of lulca stile on wice cumes
heafod.
 11. On lymenstream oþ woggawill lacu utscyt, on þa lace oð
wocgawilles hafod.
 12. Of wocggawilles heafde on þone weg oð þa greatan dic oþ
þere dic on þone wille on þæs mores heafod.
 14. On þa lace to þære sweliende, of ðære sweliende on
yederes beorh.
 15. Of iederes beorge on standun niðewearde oþ þa gretan
linde.
 16. Of þære linde on dyra snæd middewearne.
 16. Of dyra snæde on hwita ford, on hwita forda on fulanford.
 17. Of fulanforda on hildes ford, of hildesforda on hildes lege
norðewearde of sole get.
 18. Of soleget to brynes cnolle suðeweardum on puneces wurði.
 19. Of puneces wurþige on hremnes cumes heafod, of hremnes cumbe
on þa riðe oð æscburnan.
 21. Þanon on stream to dertan.
 22. Pedingtunes land gemæro, bunde per dert.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1549 (Hearne)
B15.8.590.
Bounds, Sawyer 1549: Hearne 1723, I, 245-6.



 1. Ðis syndan þa land gemæro to cliue.
 1. Ærost of norð tyrl on mær cumb.
 2. Of þam cumbe on grena weg, of þam wege on cocca byrig.
 3. Of þæra burig on hengestes heafod, of þam heafde on
cippanham.
 5. Of cippenham on tocca byrig, of þære byrce on hinde hlep.
 6. Of hinde hlepe on myle wylla, of þære wyllan on scir
wyllan.
 7. Of þære wyllan on fearnslæd.
 8. Of þam slæde on feower wegas, of þam wegan on patacumb,
þer stondað apeltreo & mapeltreo togædere gewæxen.
 10. Of þam treowan on wulflæge, of þære læge on þa
aldan dic.
 11. Of þære dic on walhwæg, of þam wege on cælf hyl.
 12. Of þam hylle on fina mæde, of þære mæde on
hweolweg.
 13. Of þam wege on sproges læge, of þære læge on aldan
dic.
 15. Of þære dic on alpugan þorn, of þam þorne on honta
hlaw.
 16. Of þam hlawe on swel hongre, of þone haran stan.
 17. Of þam stane on suð tyrl, of suð tyrl to þam hors pole
æt stoce.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1550 (Kem 1359)
B15.8.591.
Bounds, Sawyer 1550: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1359.



 1. Up of Bladene on ðone horpytt.
 1. Of ðam horpytte on ðæt heafodland.
 2. Of ðam heafodlande on ðæt sicc.
 3. Of ðam sicce on ðene greate þorn.
 3. Of ðam greate þorne on cwenna broc.
 4. Of cwenna broce on deopan cumbe.
 5. Of deopan cumbe on Foss.
 5. Of Foss on mordene westwearda.
 6. And anlong ðere sælstræte on ða neoðera heafda.
 7. Of ðam heafda æft on Foss.
 7. Of Foss on fyttigmor.
 8. Of fyttigmore ofer ðene hæðhyll.
 8. Ðæt æft on Bladene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1551 (Finberg)
B15.8.592.
Bounds, Sawyer 1551: Finberg 1961, 79-80, no. 187.



 1. Þis synd þa land ge meru into Deorhyrste þere six &
sioxtuge hida.
 3. Of seferne on merhagan, of merhagan on wanta seaþ.
 4. Of wantanseaþe on salhdune, of salhdune on tyrl.
 5. Andlang streame on hafoc beorge, of hafoc beorges on alr.
 6. Andlang alre on puntes pirian on Deopan rið.
 7. Of Deopan riþe on tores mere, of tores mere on earn læge on
scead willan.
 8. Of sceadwillan on deopan riþe, of deopan riðe on lind
lægen on alr.
 10. Of alr on rucches pulle, & of rucches pulle on sefern.
 11. Of seferne on bracburne, of bracburnan on puddanbroc.
 12. Of puddan broce on þæt oldan, of þan oldan on
beorgwillan.
 14. On beorgwillan on beorg lægen, of barlegen on æscmor.
 15. Of ascmor, on widancumbes geat, of widancumbas geate on
forstricge.
 16. Of forst hricge on east læge, of east læge on corsmersc.
 17. Of corsmersce on litlanhil, of litlanhille on hagann rycg.
 19. Of hægen hricge on glenccinc, of glencincce on brið broc.
 20. Of briþ broce on leas hricg, of leas ricge on þirnefeld.
 21. Of þernefelde on duddes aker, of duddes akere on sciran mor.
 23. Of scirann more on elfaledes, of elfaleden on hreodan burnan.
 24. Of reada burnan on cumbre weorþan on ambran.
 25. Of ambranne on sæferne, andlang streames eft to marhagan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1553 (Kem 1365)
B15.8.594.
Bounds, Sawyer 1553: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1365.



 1. Ðys sind ða londegemæra into Mædelgares byrig.
 2. Ærest of ðes grafes heafdon onlong deopan cumbes.
 3. Innan cwenan broc.
 3. Onlong cwenan broces ðæt hit cymð on cealdanwillan lace.
 4. Onlong lace ðæt hit cymð on ða cealdanwyllan.
 5. Of ðere cealdanwyllan on ðone þyrlan stan.
 6. Of ðam stone in hriswyllan lace.
 7. Of hriswyllan lace on Wulfilde wyllan.
 7. Of Wulfilde wyllan onlong hecge innan sealterawyllan.
 8. Of sealterawyllan lace to mærðorne.
 9. Of ðam þorne innan ða wæterfurh.
 10. Onlong ðere furh on ða litlan dic, on Foss.
 11. Onlong Foss ðæt hit cymð dun innan ðone stream.
 12. Upp onlong streames on Bicanford.
 12. Of Bicanforde onlong stige on ðone blacan pytt.
 13. Of ðam pytte innan ðone lytlan holan weg.
 14. Onlong ðere holan weges innan Foss.
 15. Up onlong Foss ðæt hit cymeð eft to ðere grefes
heauedon ðar hit hear aras.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1554 (Kem 617)
B15.8.595.
Bounds, Sawyer 1554: Kemble 1839-48, no. 617.



 1. Ðis synd ða landgemæra to Teodintune.
 1. Ærest of ðam burhgangeate in kærente.
 2. Of kærente in norð broc.
 3. Andlang brokes in oxna dunes cnol and swa andlang ðære dune
in bula dic.
 4. Of bula dice a butan secglæ mædwan, and swa betweonan
ðære mædwan and Pæuintune in ðære portstræt.
 6. And swa æfter ðære stræte eft in kærente ðære
ea.
 7. Her is seo hond seten.
 9. Æt Tidinctune.
 9. Eadrice and Wulfrune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1555 (Birch 928)
B15.8.596.
Bounds, Sawyer 1555: Birch 1885-99, no. 928.



 1. On dyddan hamme synd XXX hida, IX inlandes & XXI hida ge
settes landes.
 2. To stræt synd XII hida XXVII gyrda gafollandes.
 3. And on sæuerne XXX cytweras.
 3. To middel tune V hida XIIII gyrda gafollandes XIIII cytweras on
sæuerne.
 4. And II hæcweras on wæge.
 5. To cinges tune V hida sind XIII gyrda gafollandes.
 6. And I hida bufan dic þ is nu eac gafolland.
 6. And þ utan hamme is gyt sum inland.
 7. Sum hit is þam scip wealan to gafole ge sett.
 8. To cynges tune on sæuerne XXI cytwera.
 8. And on wæge XII.
 9. To bispes tune synd III hida & XV cytweras on wæge.
 10. On land cawet synd III hida & II hæcweras on wæge
& IX cytweras.
 11. Ofer eall þ land ge byrað at gyrde XII pænegan &
IIII ælmespenegan.
 12. Æt ælcum were þe binnan þam XXX hidan is ge byreð
æfre se oðer fisc þam land hlaforde & ælc seldsynde fisc þe
weordlic byð, styria & mere swyn, healic oðer sæfisc.
 14. And nah man nænne fisc wið feo to syllanne þone hlaford
on land byð, ær man hine him gecyðe.
 17. Of dyddan hamme ge byreð micel weorcrædæn.
 18. Se geneat sceal wyrcan swa on lande, swa of lande, swa hweðer
swa him man byt, & ridan, & auerian, & lade lædan, drafe
drifan.
 20. And fela oðra ðinga don.
 21. Se gebur sceal his riht don.
 21. He sceal erian healfne æcer to wice worce.
 22. And ræcan sylf þ sæd on hlafordes berne ge halne to
cyrcscette sa hweþere of his agenum berne to wer bolde, XL mæra oððe
an foþer gyrda, oððe VIII geocu byld, III ebban tyne æcertyninge XV
gyrda, oððe diche V tyne, & dicie I gyrde burh heges ripe oðer
healfne æcer.
 26. Mawe healfne on oþran weorcan wyrce, a be weorces mæþe.
 27. Sylle VI pennegan ofer estre healfne sester hunies to hlaf
mæssan, VI systres mealtes to martines mæsse an cliwen godes nett
gernes.
 29. On ðam sylfum lande stent se ðe VII swyn hæbbe þ he
sylle III, & swa forð a þ teoþe.
 31. And ðæs naþulæs mæsten rædene þonne mæsten
beo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1556 (Birch 299)
B15.8.597.
Bounds, Sawyer 1556: Birch 1885-99, no. 299.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemær into Widiandune.
 2. Ærest of anna forda innan tilnoþ andlang tilnoþes to
waclescumbe.
 3. Betweoh wacles cumbe & ealdan slæde innan mænanlea.
 3. Fram mænanlea on horsweg.
 4. Of horswege innan gatanstige, þanon innon denebroc.
 5. Of denebroce innon tilnoþ andlong tilnoþes to halgan
wyllan.
 6. Of þære wyllan in hreodcumb ðanon in þa mærdic
andlang þære dic to cnictes ferwege.
 7. Of þam wege on ealdan stanwege, of stanwege on posecumbes
heafdon.
 8. And swa on suð healf þæs mores to wohan æc.
 9. From þære æc þurh þone sceagan on flod leah þanon
on beamweg.
 10. From þam weg on buccan slæd & swa eft on beanweg.
 10. Andlang ðæs weges to colesburnan forda, from þam forda
innon cyrnea.
 12. Andlang ea to mærcumbe, lang cumbes to lind ofres heafdan.
 13. And swa to þam fulanwege to nataleahes æsce, fram þam
æsce to duddan heale.
 14. Fram þam heale andlang mærweges to byrcsies heale, &
swa to pican stapele.
 15. Of þam stapule in catteshlinc, fram þam hlince innan
mærbroc.
 16. Andlang broces to mærforda, of þam forda to sceapan
æcge.
 17. And swa on þone grenanweg, andlang weges to weallehes wege.
 18. And þanon on stanihtan weg to alre wyllan, of alre wyllan to
þære ealdan dic.
 19. Andlang dic ofer huniburnan in þa oþre ealdan dic.
 20. And swa in þone mylen pol, of þam pole to þære port
stræte.
 21. Andlang stræte to þam þorne on annandune.
 22. Of þære dune into annan crundele, & swa æfter
stræte in annanford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1557 (Birch 939)
B15.8.598.
Bounds, Sawyer 1557: Birch 1885-99, no. 939; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis syd þa land gemere to alresforda.
 1. Erest up of cendefer andlang mearce on þa witan dic.
 2. Þ andlang dic on mearc weg andland weges on þer dene.
 3. On þer dene on smalandene, of smalandene andlang hlinces on
bucgen oran.
 4. Þ ford andlang wyrtwale on þa rode, andlang rode on wilames
ord.
 5. Þonon on spreot mere þonon on þo twibutme del.
 6. Þonon on beran delle, on mint mere.
 6. Of mint mere on fel dene, þonne andlang fel dene on þone
hagan.
 7. Þonne andlang hagan on grem meres syðle.
 8. Þonon andlang hagan on bocmeres syðle.
 9. Of bocmeres shiðle on hamer dene gat.
 9. Þonne non on hrombmescumbes geat, of hramnescumbes geate on
dun shihle.
 11. Of dun shihle andlang mearce ut at ricgsceate.
 11. Þ andlang mearce to dregtune on þane ford.
 12. Of ðan forda on wuda ford þ up of þan forda andlang
mearce on þane garan uf werðne.
 13. Of þan garan nord ofer þast ret.
 14. Andlang mearce on þa æwylmas andlang wylla on ticceburnan
þonne andlang streames on iccenan.
 16. Andlang icenan on þer cendefer ut scyt.
 16. Þonne up andlang cendefer oð þar hit on feng.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1558 (Baigent)
B15.8.599.
Bounds, Sawyer 1558: Baigent 1891, 9; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ses boer se boundes bitwene Krundæle and Ælvethæm.
 1. Ærest fræm se Eldefordæ ændlænges weyes forth
biweste Foghelmære; þænne to þe wolfputte; þænne to þe
herepathe.
 3. þænne andlange herepathe to brightmere; þænne
andlænd riðe on bromhurst; þanne ændlang bourne to ðe marke of
Crundele/.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1562 (Perceval)
B15.8.603.
Bounds, Sawyer 1562: Perceval 1865, 49-50.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemære to Stantune.
 2. Ærest of ðære ealdra laca to þam wiðigstubbe.
 2. Of ðam wiðigstubbe suð be Drægtunes gemæra oð þa
stanstræte, swa est be þære stræte oð þa cwealmstowe æt
Maccanho.
 5. Of Maccanho suð be Cunigtunes gemæra oð þa lampyttas.
 6. Of ða lampyttas suð to þan þornstubbe oð mid þam
bradan mere.
 7. Of ðam mere to þæs dices ende.
 7. Of ðære dic be Elleswyrðe gemæra oð þæne grenan
weg.
 8. Swa be þæm grenan wege to þan riðig.
 9. Æfter ðam riðig to Leofwines gare.
 9. Of ðan gare be þan heafdan suð to þan stocce & swa
forð to ðan acstubbe.
 11. Of ðan acstubbe an furlang west be Pappawyrðe gemæra to
Earninga stræte.
 12. Æfter Earninga stræte norð to Lodona beorg.
 13. Swa be broce into Rumboldes becc.
 13. Of Rumboldes becc norð be stræte oð Scornho.
 14. Of Scornho be Hemminga forda gemæra into Use.
 15. Andlang Use est oð da ealdan laca.
 16. Ðis is fixnað þe to Stantune gebyrað þæt is æt
Holanwere & æt Deopanwere & æt suðan ea.
 17. And æt Niyan were & æt Dinde & æt biscopes
were & æt Bradanwere & æt Ninanwere & æt Merbece.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1565 (Kem 1356)
B15.8.605.
Bounds, Sawyer 1565: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1356.



 1. Ærest on Baddanbyrg westweard norðriht on ðone stocc.
 2. Of ðam stocce to wearge dune betweone ðe twege beorges.
 3. Eastriht andlang dice on ðone fulan wylle.
 4. Of ðam wylle on foxhylle norðweard on ðone ealdan
heortwæg on ðone wylle.
 5. Of ðam wylle on ðone ealde heortsole.
 6. Of ðam heortsole on ðone beorge.
 7. Of ðam beorge on ðone graf.
 7. Of ðam grafe on wyðigwylle.
 8. Of ðam wylle on ðone stodfald.
 8. Of ðam stodfalde on ðæt stangedelf.
 9. Ðæt on mæres wylle.
 10. Andlang mæres dene on Weaclinga stræt.
 11. Andlang stræte ðat it cymð to ðam ricgwege.
 11. Andlang ricgweges ðæt it cymð to emnes Doddanforda,
forðriht on ðone stocc.
 13. Of ðam stocce on ðene broc.
 13. Andlang broces to emnes Niwanham.
 14. Andlang slædes on ða dic æt ðam grafe.
 15. Eastweard andlang dice ðæt it cymð æt ðam grafe.
 16. Westweard on ðene ford.
 16. Up andlang broces ðæt it cyme to emnes Baddanbyrig.
 17. Westweard of ðam broce æft on Baddanbyrig westwearde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1566 (Birch 1129)
B15.8.606.
Bounds, Sawyer 1566: Birch 1885-99, no. 1129.



 1. Þis sint þa land ge mæro to Undelan.
 2. Ærest æt cylles ege suðeweardan scytanlacu of nyn æt
cweorn welle.
 3. Þonne lit it andlang þere lace þat it cymð eft on nyn.
 3. Þonne gæd it þer up on ge rihte ofer þet yredland foran
on gean þa ealdan dic.
 5. And siððan up andlang dic oð hit cymð to wuda.
 5. Þonne a be wyrt walan oþ hit cymð to þere ealdan rode.
 6. Þonne andlang rode þat it cymð ut on ciricfeld.
 7. And swa be wyrtwalan þat it cymð eft to þere rode &
þonne eft andlang rode þæt it cymþ ut on beringa feld.
 9. Þonne be wyrtwalan oð hit cymð nyðer on þæt slæd
to þam litlan broce.
 10. And swa norð ofer þonne broc.
 10. And syððan norð be wyrtwalan to þere bradan rode.
 11. And þonne æst andlang þere bradan rode oð hit cymð
to fildena forda.
 12. And of fildena forda andlang broches oð hit cymð eft to
anum oþeran forda mon hæt eac filden ford.
 13. Þonne of þem fildena forda þat it cymð on lytlan
sandlege eastewearde.
 14. And of þere leage on ærnulfes wylle þat it cymð on
bradan leage middewearde.
 16. Þonne þonan on þet ealde fyllet.
 16. Þonne andlang þes fylletes þat it cymð est ut of wuda.
 17. Þonne fehþ it þer on feld.
 17. And swa andlang anre hycgan oð hit cymð ofer ænne fulne
broc.
 18. And swa on ge rihte on þonne heþenan byrgels.
 19. Of þon heþenan byrgelse on ge rihte on anes wylles heafod.
 20. And siððan andlang þes broces oð hit cymð eft on þa
ea æt nyn.
 21. And þat land on beringa feld swa swa hit is mid land ge
mærum liggæð into vndelan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1567 (Birch 760)
B15.8.607.
Bounds, Sawyer 1567: Birch 1885-99, no. 760.



 1. Ærest on wylfing ford on Temese.
 1. Þ of wylfinga ford andlang anre smale dic to niwan hæminga
londgemære on ða heafdo.
 2. Þ forð be ðon heafodon on fippel beorgas.
 3. Of fippel beorgon on Culanhema dic, andlang dic on
æppelford.
 4. Of æppelforda andlang þære richt temese onbutan utan ege
þæt eft on wylfing ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1568 (Hearne)
B15.8.608.
Bounds, Sawyer 1568: Hearne 1723, I, 71-2.



 1. Þis syndan þæs wudes gemeara in to Readanoran, i pirit.
 2. Andlang englungadene eal swa wæterwile yruan innan þæne
hæþenan byrgels.
 3. Of þan hæðenan byrgels be wyrtwalan innan baruot sæd.
 4. And of barfot sæde innan timbersæd, & of timbersæde
innan steapan cnolles scyd.
 6. And of steapan cnolles scydde on hanslædes hæfdan, &
of hanslædes heafdan innan grenan weg.
 8. And of þam grenan wege innan healdæ mæres hling, &
of þam hlince innan stanoranlege.
 9. And of stanoran lege innan stanmeres hling, & of stanmeres
hlince on cadendtes heafdan.
 11. And of cadenes heafdan on holemeres hling, & of holemeres
hling innan stanbeorh.
 12. And of stan beorhge innan þæne smalan ærc, of þon
smalan ærc sce innan þone mapeldre on west halfe asumedcre.
 15. Of þan mapeldre ine es wyrte pitte innan dragemeres hling.
 16. And of dragemeres hlince innan ruganwic, & of ruganwic
innan depan hauisteal on hremryrc.
 17. And of hremhrycce on þere fulan slostendan mapeldere ofer
innan sigerdene.
 19. And of sigerdene innan badandene on clacces wadland, & of
clacces wadlande into lufemere, lufanmere, þær ut on þæne feld.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1569 (Birch 1223)
B15.8.609.
Bounds, Sawyer 1569: Birch 1885-99, no. 1223.



 1. Ærest of Cearwyllan on þæs cliues ende.
 1. Of þæs cliues ende on smalan æceras, of smalan æceras
to eattune.
 2. Of eatune andlang dude weges on langan mores ende, of langan
more ende on grenan beorh.
 4. Þe on eall þorn, of eall þorne þe eft on ceare wylle
fornon cyrices hleawe.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1570 (Bates)
B15.8.610.
Bounds, Sawyer 1570: Bates 1899, 99.



 1. Þys synden wa lande gemer atte Kyngesbury.
 1. Erest on Pedridan op alang stremes on Lambrokes gemoure.
 2. Op alang Lambrokes to Schepton gemer to we þrires dyke.
 3. Adoun þer to þere lake lancke þere dyke adoun to
Foulenbroke.
 4. Alang Foulenbroke out on a Moure to þan Northlangpulle.
 5. Forþ by Lanpulle by Northen Pendanmede wyþ Myddelnyes
Lanpulle.
 7. Of þan Lanpulle to þornylake fornegen Thorny Myddewarde on
Southhal.
 8. Oþ on an lake fornegen Esthele yn an Horsyes Northlandpulle.
 9. Forþ out on an Moure est on Pedrenstreme.
 10. Thys beth Kyngesbery landboundes.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1573 (Hearne)
B15.8.613.
Bounds, Sawyer 1573: Hearne 1723, II, 347.



 1. Þis is ðæt land gemære to scepwæsce tune.
 2. Ærest on sture to læcce pole, & of læcce pole
ondlong þæs sices ongean stream þæt hit cymeð to þam hale.
 4. And from þam hale þæt hit cymð to þam sealtpytte to
hwætdune.
 5. And of hwætdune to torde lande.
 6. And of torde londa up on cyric hyll.
 7. Of cyric hylle to stan hylle, & of stan hylle to þam
hæðenan byrig gelse.
 8. And swa adun to sture.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1574 (Birch 947)
B15.8.614.
Bounds, Sawyer 1574: Birch 1885-99, no. 947.



 1. Ærest of cranmerc on þone ðorn.
 1. Of ðam ðorne andlang stræt on þonne blacan pyt.
 2. Of ðam blacan pytte on ða stræt, andlang strete on
stodfald.
 3. Of ðam stodfalde on þone litlan broc, andlang broces on
blacan mere.
 4. Of blacan mere on þæt slæd, andlang slædes on blacan
mor.
 5. Of þam more on þet slæd, andlang slædes þ hit cymð
on eardes treow.
 6. Of þam treowe on ða sealt stræt, andlang þere salt
strete on wilmanford.
 7. Of wilmanforde on earnes hlewe.
 7. Of earnes hlewe on Cyneuerðæs pyt.
 8. Of Cyneuerðæs pitte, andlang heafdon on hwitan dic, andlang
hwitan dic on ða holan furh.
 9. Of ðære holan furh þ on þene hricweg.
 10. Andlang weges on clæihæma broc, andlang broces þ eft on
cranmere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1581 (Finberg)
B15.8.617.
Bounds, Sawyer 1581: Finberg 1964, 107-8, no. 352; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. This synt þa land ge mære to Duntune.
 1. Ærest of þære readan hane on fobban wylle.
 2. Þonon on crawanlea on eblesburnan.
 3. Andlang burnan on meorh þorn, þonon on ceorla hlæwe.
 4. Of ceorla hlæwe on crawan crundel.
 5. Þonon on fyrdinges lea.
 5. Of þam lea on eblesburnan.
 6. Andlang burnan utt on afene.
 6. Up ofer afene on earnes beorh.
 7. Þonon andlang hæmedes weges on haseloran.
 8. Þonon on wendenes wyrðe.
 9. Of wendænes wyrðæ thweores ofer þane holt to lane
forda.
 10. Of lane forda æft on þa readan hane.
 11. Ðis synt þara XXX hida land ge mæra on wiht þe
þær to hyrad.
 12. Ærest of sæ up on æscstede.
 12. Þonon on þone ge motbeorh.
 13. Of þam beorge on swines heafod.
 14. Þonon on suð sæ.
 14. Upp of þære suð sæ on Eadgylses muþan.
 15. Andlang Eadgylses muþan on bican dæne.
 16. Þonon on Cawelburnan.
 16. Andlang Cawelburnan utt on norð sæ.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1588 (Birch 479)
B15.8.619.
Bounds, Sawyer 1588: Birch 1885-99, no. 479.



 1. Ðis synd þa land ge mæro æt Wenbeorgan stigandes
bisceopes.
 2. Of þan stapole stent innan scocera wege.
 2. Swa innan þa wogan dice.
 3. Of þære wogan dic.
 3. Innan beh hilde sloh.
 3. Of beh hilde sloh uppan beordune.
 4. Of beorh dune to wullafes stane.
 4. Of wullafes stan andlang cumbes innan hlydan æwylmas.
 5. Swa andlang hlydan innan þo ham dic.
 6. Of þære ham dic innan þa heafod stoccas.
 6. Of þam heafod stoccan.
 7. Innan dorcan swa andlang streames innan þa ealdanig dic.
 8. Swa andlang dic innan smitan stream.
 8. Swa andlang streames on easteweard lilles ham up in þane
blacan pyt.
 9. Of þan blacan pytte on midde wyrð þane mære on
þæne stan.
 10. Of þam stane innan þa holan wannan.
 11. Of þære holan wannan up on icen hilde weg on þæne
hæðenan byriels.
 12. Of icen hilde wege innan þa cwealm stowe.
 13. Of ðere cwealm stowe innan swyrd æceras heafod on þonam
hwitan pyt.
 14. Of þam hwitan pytte innan þa twegen stanes on mortan
cumbæ.
 15. Of mortan cumbe andlang þes wogan hlinces.
 15. Of þam wogan hlince innan þa catt hola.
 16. Of þam catt holan innon þone crundel.
 17. Of þam crundele innan folces dic.
 17. And swa eft in on þone stapol.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1589 (Birch 1192)
B15.8.620.
Bounds, Sawyer 1589: Birch 1885-99, no. 1192.



 1. Ðis sindon þa landgemæra æt Winterburnan, to þam II
hidan.
 2. Ærest, of Cipenanna dene, andlang furh binnan Wantercnolle,
innan þone wege.
 3. Þonne of þam wege ut æt norðgæte, on þone smalan
pæþ.
 4. Of þam smalan pæþ innan þa herestret.
 4. Þonne andlang þære herestret inne þære readan han.
 5. Þonne of þære readan han, andlang þære furh eft
inne Cipenanna dene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1590 (Kem 1358)
B15.8.621.
Bounds, Sawyer 1590: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1358.



 1. Ðys synd ða landgemære to Bennicwyrðe.
 2. Ærest of Pergeride in mærdene.
 2. Of merdene on ðone bradam homm.
 3. Of ðam homme on hæðene beorge.
 3. Of hæðene beorga on ða wudustreat.
 4. Of ðere stræte in streones halh.
 5. Of ðam hale up on eanadune, on Langdune.
 6. Of Langadune op on ða foxhole.
 6. Of ðam hola in ða fyrdstræt.
 7. Of ðere stræte in Potintun.
 7. Of Potintune on þirtigan æceran.
 8. Of ðam æceran in richwege.
 9. Of ðam wege in Peodredan.
 9. Of Peodredan in Auene.
 10. Onlong Auene æft on Pergerid.
 10. Binnan ðissan gemæran synde ða fif hida ða Wulstan
archebiscop geuðe ælfrice.
 12. And ehta æceras of mæduwe on Pyrihomme ðe licgað
fornegean ðone orceard æt Cropponðorne.
 14. And ðone hagan on Wygorancestre ðe tuna ða Ufic ahte, and
anne ofen æt Wyc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1591 (Birch 428)
B15.8.622.
Bounds, Sawyer 1591: Birch 1885-99, no. 428.



 1. Ðis is þ land gemæra into crohlea.
 1. Ærest of crohwællan into mægidna brycge.
 2. Of mægidna brycge eall abutotan snoddes lea in hymelbroc.
 3. Æfter hymelbroce in hunigburnan.
 3. Æfter hunigburnan in godincges gemæra æt bradigcotan.
 4. Of godinges gemæra into þam sice be croh lea wuda.
 5. And æfter þam sice into oddinga lea wuda, ondlang þæs
aldan geard stealles into hudigtuna gemæra.
 7. And swa æfter þam hege stealle eft into crohwællan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1592 (Hearne)
B15.8.623.
Bounds, Sawyer 1592: Hearne 1723, II, 347.



 1. Ðis synd ða land gemæra to herefordtun.
 2. Ærest andlang auene þæt hit cumeð to nes brycge.
 3. And þonon æfter þam broce þæt með to heopan
hylle.
 4. Of þam hylle þæt hit cymeð wiþ cærsa wællan.
 5. And æfter þam sice hum steorte.
 6. And þær eft innon auene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1593 (Hearne)
B15.8.624.
Bounds, Sawyer 1593: Hearne 1723, II, 356.



 1. Ðis syndon þa land gemæro to hymel tune.
 1. Þæt is of baddon æsce on þæt brade gemære of
ðam brade gemære on wad lege.
 3. Of wad leage þurh ut þone wudu, norð big þam wuda oð
hit cymð to hymel broce.
 5. Æfter hymel broce oð hit cymð on ennanpol, of enna pole
on wynna stigele, of wynna stigele þurh efna lea oð mærgna brycge.
 7. Of þære brycge inan þone hæge, æfter þæm
hæge on þa þreo gemæru, of þam gemæran on langa læge.
 9. Of þære lege on þa dic, of þære dic on wymingc
wyllan, of þære wellan on langan æcer.
 11. Of þæm æcere þurh þone wudu on ufa læge, andlang
hreawe on lytlan broc, ondlang þæs broces on hymel broc.
 13. Andlang brokes, and of þam broce on þa stræte, andlang
stret in hennuc.
 15. Of hennuc andlang stræt eft on baddan æsc, & ænne
hagan on portan þe þe ligeþ to þam lande þe he ær hæfde, &
ealle his yldran.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1594 (Kem 1355)
B15.8.625.
Bounds, Sawyer 1594: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1355.



 1. Ðis sind ða landgemære to Ambreslege.
 1. Ærest up of Sæfyrne on Lincumb.
 2. Of Lincumbe on Geofandene.
 3. Of Geofandene on mære dic.
 3. Andlang dice on sænceanes.
 4. Of sænceanes on Uffanheales.
 4. Of Uffanheale on mære broc.
 5. Andlang mære broc on Douerdæle.
 6. Andlang Douerdæles on Salewerpan.
 6. Andlang Salewerpan ut on Sæfyrne.
 7. Up andlang Sæfyrne ðæt eft up on Lincumbe ðer it er
aras.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1595 (Hearne)
B15.8.626.
Bounds, Sawyer 1595: Hearne 1723, I, 246.



 1. Ðis syndan þa land gemæro to Pensaxan.
 2. Of Temedan into Mædles bæce, of Mædlesbæce to
ryschala.
 3. Of ryschala to ða woche sæla, of þa woche sælan in
ða hrycges.
 5. Ða hrycgas forð into Cornbæces, of Cornbæce into
koldesbroc.
 6. Of koldesbroc into ealdes wælle sice, of ealdes welle sice
into þa mær gærdan.
 8. Of þa mær gærdan into kælflæges fordan.
 9. Of kælflæges fordan into dunne bæce, of dunni bæce
up into wudewælle sice.
 10. Of ðære wude wælle to ðan lam pytte, of ðan lam
pytte riht into ehcteies wælle.
 12. Of ectnes wælle sice into ðære ealda stræt, ða
ealda stræt to ðan blacan mere.
 14. Of ðan blacan mere into strenges burna, of strenges burna
into soln hæma broc.
 15. Of soln hæma broc into suð fordes broc, of suð fordes
broc to ðan lange sice.
 17. Of ðan lange sice to ðæs læs ende, of ðæs læs
ende to sintlæges hyll.
 18. Of sint læges hyll into Cricce lades broc, of Criccelades
into stoctun.
 20. Of stoctun in dunnibæces broc, of dunnibæces broc into
deope bæc.
 21. Of deopi bæcen up to ðan bircan, of ðan bircan to hludi
læge.
 23. Of hludi læge adun to ðan fulan fenne, of ðan fulan
fenne riht into ða hecge.
 24. Of ða hecge to ða woge ac, of ða wogæ ac in ðære
port stræt.
 26. Of ðære port stræt to ðæs lytles sices hæfde,
ðæt lytle sic into Temeda.
 28. Temeda up into mædles bæc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1596 (Birch 362)
B15.8.627.
Bounds, Sawyer 1596: Birch 1885-99, no. 362.



 1. Ðis is ðæt land gemær into salewarpan ærest ondlong
þære ea saloworpe in colford of colford in uæles broc.
 2. Ondlong þæs sihtran in ðone ealdan secg mor.
 3. Of ðam ealdan secgmor onan betwynan acwudu and wulle lea.
 4. And swa æfre betwyx þam twam wudan in alra broc.
 5. And swa æfre æfter þam broke in þone oðerne
colford.
 5. And swa eft in saloworpan.
 7. Ærest æt colford onlang streames þ hit cymeð þær
dofe dæl and salewarpe togædere licgað.
 8. Ondlang dofer dæles on geing stream to wicforda þ swa
ondlang dices on butan þone wudu.
 9. Þ swa andlang stræte ymb coll hyll.
 10. Þ swa in salewarpan.
 10. Ond æt hunigburnan twegen weorðias.
 11. And twegen aceres earðlandes.
 11. And æt heanlege feower akeras.
 12. And æt birne burnan on twa healfe þ medwe land to
bærlege sice.
 13. And þær birne burne.
 13. And sale warpe to somne licgað oðer half acer mæð
landes.
 14. And on bradan medwad XII æceras mæð landes & on
oðre stowe threo akeras.
 15. And on wic tune an feorda dæl wudu landes & feld
landes.
 16. And to ðissum lande gebyreð VIII æceras æt colforda.
 17. Þæt swa eft on colforda.
 17. And æt neoðe mæstan wic IIII fata stal.
 17. And VIII ringas brynan, V on easthealfe & III on
westhealfe.
 19. And on middel wic, VIII fata stall.
 19. And þeo bryne þærto þ mon mæge beon wel nyt &
untodælede bryne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1597 (Birch 361)
B15.8.628.
Bounds, Sawyer 1597: Birch 1885-99, no. 361.



 1. Ondlong þære ea Salowearpe in Colford.
 1. Of þæs in Nælesbroc.
 2. Ondlong þæs Sihtran in þone Ealdan Secgmor.
 2. Of þam onan betwenan acwudu & wulleleah.
 3. And swa æfre betwyx þam twam wudan in Alrabroce.
 4. Ondlong þæs in þone oðerne Colford.
 4. And swa eft on Saloworpan.
 6. Æt Colforda ondlang þæs streames.
 6. Ondlang þ oð þ hit cymeð þær Doferdæl &
Saleworp togedere licgað.
 7. Ondlong þæs Doferdæles ongean stream to Wicforda.
 8. Sua ondlang þæs dices onbutan þone wudu.
 9. Þ swa ondlang þæs Stræte ymb Collhill þ sua on
Salewearpan.
 10. Ond æt Hunigburnan twegen Weorþias.
 11. And XI æceras Earþlandes.
 11. And æt Heanleag IIII æceras.
 11. And æt Birneburnan þ medwelande to Bærlægesice.
 12. And on Bradanmedewad XII æceras medlandes.
 13. On Wictune feorða dæl wudulandes.
 13. V hida to Wæresleage.
 14. Of þære stræte ðe sceot to Heortlabyrig on þa dic.
 15. Ondlang þæs on þone mor.
 15. Of þam ondlong geardes on þæt lipgeat.
 16. Of þam on Elmesetene gemæres.
 16. Ondlang þæs on Ombersetene gemæres.
 17. Ondlang þæs on þa Portstræt.
 17. Ondlang þæs on Hacedesstubbe.
 18. Of þæs on Cumbranwylle.
 18. Of þæs on Faganstane.
 18. Of þæs on æþelnoþescroft.
 19. Of þæs andlang þæs gemæres eft on þa dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1598 (Hearne)
B15.8.629.
Bounds, Sawyer 1598: Hearne 1723, II, 362.



 1. Ðis þa land gemæra <foreign>De Tyrdebicgan</foreign> tyrdebicgan.
 2. Ærest of wiðibroce in gates hoh.
 3. Of gates ho in sand wællan, & of sand wællan in deope
wællan.
 4. Of deope wællan in heador, of heodore on þa greata lindan.
 5. And of þan greata lindan þæt in mær bæc, of
mærbæce in arwan stream.
 6. And of arwan in in mær broc, of mærbroce on cristel mæl
ac.
 7. Of cristelmælac in cloddes læhge, of cloddes læhge in
cloddes wællan.
 9. Of cloddes wællan in þa styfecinge, of þære
styfecingge in mersc hrycges hege.
 10. And æfter þam hege in þæcsic, & of þam sice on
ealhmundes byrigenne.
 11. And of þære byrigene in ælflæde brycge.
 12. Of ælflæde brycge in to þære ufere læhge, &
of ufere læhge in martines mædwe.
 14. Of þære mædwe to bridene brycge, of britene brycge into
hine gemære to þam holan broce.
 15. And swa andlang broces eft in wiðibroc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1599 (Kem 1368)
B15.8.630.
Bounds, Sawyer 1599: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1368.



 1. Ærest of Twyforde suðward andlang Auene ðære ea swa
ðæt mynstre stondeð ofer Alne stream on Cronochomme.
 3. And swa andlang ea on ða mærdic Fledanbyrig gemære.
 4. Andlang ðære dic swa upp on ða ecgge, and swa þurh
ðone graf be ðan aldan swinhagan.
 6. Ðæt upp on Lencdune.
 6. Swa andlang dune ðæt cymð ðær Lencgemeru and
Herefordtunes landgemæru togædere liggað æt Wænnancumbe.
 8. Ðæt swa dun on ðone fulan broc.
 9. Andlang broces on ðæt lytle sic.
 10. Andlang sices on Auene.
 10. Upp andlang Auene ðæt on blacan pol.
 11. Of ðam poole up on ða ecgge, on piceres homm.
 12. Of piceres homme swa on ðæt lytle sceard ðæt is on
burhhlinceas.
 13. Of ðam hlincean on Bugghilde stræte.
 14. Ðanon on þegna dene, on stanihtan hyll.
 15. Of ðam hylle on cyricstige.
 15. Of cyricstige on ða blacan þyrnan on easthalfan lytel.
 17. Of ðære þyrnan on ðone blacan pytt, andlang furena on
mærðyrnan.
 18. Ðanon on mærdic.
 18. Of mærdic on ða wæterswylian.
 19. Of ðære swylian on mærðorn.
 19. Of ðam þorne on ða lytlan grenan dic.
 20. Of ðare dic on Hunigburnan.
 21. Swa andlang streames on ðam stanihtan ford.
 22. Eft on Bugghilde stret.
 22. Of ðære stret westward on ælfstanes byriels.
 23. Of ðam byrielse andlang sices on bunewyrðe.
 24. Of bunewyrðe on Hunigburnan.
 25. Of Hunigburnan on mæredic.
 25. Of mæredic on Baggenbeorge.
 26. Of Baggenbeorge eft on mæredic.
 26. Of mæredic on Wynburnan.
 27. Of Wynburnan onlong heafde on ðam beadan þorn.
 28. Of ðam þorne on wudanhomme.
 29. Of wudamhomme on polðorne.
 29. Of polðorne on Fugelmære.
 30. Of Fugelmære on mærebroc.
 30. Onlong broces on ða blacan þyrne.
 31. Of ðere þyrne onlong broces on burhwyllen.
 32. Of burwylle on burwealles.
 33. Onlong wealles eft on þeoua dene.
 33. Of þeoua dene on Eadelming garan.
 34. Of Ealdelming garan bi Buggild strete ðe men nonesmonneslond
nemmeð.
 35. Ðonen onlong weige west to ðe beorges.
 36. Of ðen beorges on pycrestan.
 37. Of pycrestane onlong walles on Cadanmynster.
 38. Of Cadanmynstre on blacan pytt.
 38. Of ðam pytte onlong riðies on wyllersege.
 39. Of wylleresegge on sandbroc.
 40. Of sandbroc onlong furena on hegwege.
 41. Of hegewege on norðom.
 41. Of norðomme on bordriðig.
 42. Ðanon on brerðyrnan.
 42. Of ðere þyrna on hecanige.
 43. Of hecanige on Bedeswyllan.
 43. Of ðe wyllen innan ða lytlam þyrnan on westhalue
piccedeshoo.
 44. Of ðere þyrnan on mærðorn.
 45. Of mærðorne on Weremundes lawe, onlong furena on Weremodes
lawe.
 46. Ðonan on Egsanmore on ðe grendic.
 47. Of ðere dic on bradan mere.
 48. Of bradan mære on ðone lytle grene bearh.
 49. Ðonan onlong heafde upon langendune.
 49. Swa on ða ealda foxhole.
 50. Of ðane hole onlong hricgweges on ða æðenan byrielse,
on Ealhmunding wege.
 51. Of ðam wege eft ongean æfter dune ðæt it cymð upp
on ðone cnolle.
 53. So æfter furlange ðæt it cymð on ða fyrdstræt.
 54. Swa æfter stræte ðat hyt cymð on potingdun.
 55. Ðanon on þrittig æcera.
 55. Of ðam þrittig æcera on ricwege.
 56. Of ricwege on ða ealdan dic.
 56. Onlong dices ðæt on Esigburnan.
 57. Of Esigburnan upp to ðere ealdan dic.
 58. Of ðere dic on Wylihtmede.
 58. Of ðer mæde on mærebroc.
 59. Onlong broces on domnipol.
 59. Of ðe pole on Ellesbeorh.
 60. Of ðam beorohge on merwyllan.
 61. Of merwylle ðæt hyt cymð eft on geriht on Auene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1600 (Hearne)
B15.8.631.
Bounds, Sawyer 1600: Hearne 1723, II, 360.



 1. Ðis synd þa land gemæru to wulfringe <foreign>Lyem</foreign> tune.
 2. Ærest of lusþorne in hwitan dene.
 2. Of hwitan dene in yrfe, of yrfe þæt cymð into baldrices
gemæran in þæt fulgerið.
 4. Of þæm fulgeriðe þæt cymeð in þæt heafod
land, of þam heafodlonde þæt sceot spers ofer þone portweig.
 6. Of þam portwege in ða dene, of þære dene up big
þæm fearne.
 7. From þam fearne to norð dic, ondlong þære dic to cowwan
ege.
 8. Of cowwan ege healf brada mor to fnætes wyllan, of fnætes
wyllan þæt cymeð to rommes dene.
 10. Ondlong rommes dene þæt to þære stræte, ondlong
þære stræte þæt cymeð to oswaldes hlawe.
 12. Of oswaldes hlawe ondlong þære sealt stræt to fulan
mere.
 13. Of fulan mere eft in lusþorn.
 14. Ðis syndon þa land gemæru to wulfering tune.
 15. Of wudu for brycge up andlang byrn wynne dene, of byrnwynne
dene up to þam salt pytte.
 17. Of þam sealtpytte ondlang dene, of þære dene andlang
pytten to þære sealtstræte.
 18. Swa forð to þære fyrran dic, andlang þære dice
innan salt broc.
 20. Andlang saltbroce innan hymel broc, andlang hymel broces healf
stream to byrnwynne dene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1602 (Ker 370c)
B15.8.633.
Bounds, Sawyer 1602: Ker 1957, no. 370, c.



 1. Ðis synt ðara viii hida landgemæra to felesbroce.
 2. Ærest on Cynewoldes Forda andlang ðæs cynges gemær to
Certdune.
 3. Of Certdune on gerihte to iii beamum.
 3. Of iii beamum to Wonboge, of Wonboge on gerihte æes
mearce.
 5. Andlang on gerihte on lyge up, Andlang lege þæt eft on
Cyne/.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1604 (Birch 676)
B15.8.634.
Bounds, Sawyer 1604: Birch 1885-99, no. 676.



 1. An earst on þone ealdan triow stede.
 2. Þonne on rugan slæd andlang slædes oð þæs
furlanges ænde.
 3. Þonne on rugan biorg midde wiardne.
 3. Þæt of rugan biorge on hafoces pyt ondlang riðe þæt
on þone pæþe þe lið ðwyres.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1662 (Birch 1024)
B15.8.635.
Bounds, Sawyer 1662: Birch 1885-99, no. 1024; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd þara twegra hyda land gemæra to
Beaddingaburnan.
 2. Ærest of þam stanihtan forda suþ andlang dices.
 2. Oð þone suþ healf on ðone stan.
 3. Þonon west andlang dic on tidearding mor.
 3. Of þære dic norð andlang mores be healfan more on þam
gemyþum.
 4. West andlang beaddingaburnan on þone stanihtan fordan.
 5. And seo ut læs mid oþrum mannum gemæne.
 7. And þis is þæs þriddan hiwisces land gemære æt
linlande.
 7. Of linlande norð weard suð andlang mearce on þone
herpað.
 8. Suð andlang herpaþes on þone ricsihtan mere.
 9. Þonne west on þa mearce.
 9. Þonne norð andlang mearce on þa hæþenan byrgenan.
 10. Of þam byrgenum norð andlang mearce on þæne stan.
 11. Þonon east on linlande norðweard.
 11. And seo ut læs & seo wudu læs mid oþrum mannum
gemæne.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1663 (Birch 1025)
B15.8.636.
Bounds, Sawyer 1663: Birch 1885-99, no. 1025; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. Ðis synd þa gemære to beaddingaburnan.
 1. Ærest of beaddingaburnan east andlang dic on þone stan.
 2. Þonon suð andlang þes grenan weges on þone oðerne
stan.
 3. Of þam stane on þone sandihtan hærepoþ.
 4. Þonon on risc mere.
 4. Of risc mere on stan beorg, þon on holan broc.
 5. Of holan broce on beaddingaburnan.
 5. Siþþan norð andlang beaddinganburnan on þa eastlangan
dic.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1664 (Kem 1299)
B15.8.637.
Bounds, Sawyer 1664: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1299.



 1. Ðys sind ða londgemære to Bennincwyrðe.
 2. Ærest of periride on mærdene, of mærdene ðæt innan
ðone bradan hamm of ðe hamme ðæt on hæðen beorgas.
 4. Of ðam beorge ðæt on ða heafde ðæt it cymð on
ða fildene stret.
 6. Æfter stræte ðæt it cymð on ðe dic.
 6. Of ðere dic ðæt it cymð an anmod swa æfter ðam
furlunge ðæt it cymð uppon eanandune.
 8. Swa æfter heafdan ðæt it cymð on ða heðenan
byrgena.
 9. Æfter dune ðæt it cymð up on ðone cnoll.
 10. Swa æfter ðam furlunge ðæt it cymð on ða
fyrdstret.
 11. Swa æfter stræte ðæt it cymð on Pottingtun.
 12. Of ðam tune ðæt on þrittegan æceran.
 12. Of ðam aceran on ricwege.
 13. Swa æfter wege ðæt innan pederedan.
 14. Swa æfter pederedan ðæt innan Afene.
 15. Swa æfter stræme ðæt it cymð on pedirid.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1811 (Birch 783)
B15.8.638.
Bounds, Sawyer 1811: Birch 1885-99, no. 783.



 1. Vis synt þa land gemæro æt langanforda þara þreora
hida.
 1. Þæt is ærest of þam stapole þe sten on mere dune on
þære dic west andlang dic oþ hunan weg.
 3. And þar norþ ofer herpaþ andlang hlinc ræwe þwyres
ofer botescumb.
 4. And swa forþ andlang hlinc ræwe oþ þone herpaþ.
 5. Þonne andlang herpaþes oþ þære for yrþe up ende.
 5. Þonne adune be þare for yrþe westeage oþ hit cymþ to
þære dic.
 6. Of þære dic on wilig oð midne stream andlang streames
adune oð hit cymþ rihte on gea þa for hyrde midde wearde.
 8. Þonne bufan wege andlang west Cumbes betweah þa twa yrh
mearca.
 9. To greatan hlince of greatan hlinces ende on healdan weg.
 10. Andlang heldan weges on þane pyt of þam pytte ofer
smalandene up on mere dune oþ ðone pyt.
 11. Of þam pytte to þam stapule þær hit ær onfeng.
 12. And swa mæd gemæne swa heo ær wæs.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1862 (Birch 480)
B15.8.639.
Bounds, Sawyer 1862: Birch 1885-99, no. 480.



 1. Ærest on lin leage middewearde & on hean leage
westewearde & an gabul dene eastewearde.
 3. Þanne on stapolas & an beonnan þorn.
 3. Ðonne an tuddeles þorn & an hroces wylle.
 4. Þonne on wulf beorh & an tuddan ham westeweardne.
 5. Þanne on brading leage westeweardne & on fearn lege
westewearde.
 6. Þanne on beber burnan.
 6. Þonne an lawern wylle & an pegdes setl eastewerd.
 8. <foreign>Hæc sunt termini unius cassati</foreign>.
 8. Ærest on hroces wylle, þanne up on þæne weg oþ
grenan hlinc.
 9. Þanon on oden uuielle.
 9. Þanne on dæneheardes hegeræwe.
 10. Þanon on þa hegeræwe on humbor ford.
 11. Þanne andlang humber.
 11. Þanon on eabbincg wylle þanne on risc broc .
 12. Þanon on þa westran fearn leage.
 12. Þanne on þæt land þe æþelswyþ cwen &
Aþelbold ealdorman him geþingedon æt Aþulfe cynge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1863 (Finberg)
B15.8.640.
Bounds, Sawyer 1863: Finberg 1960, 33-5.



 1. Iswuðe treow stede west on herpoð, on smalacumbes heafdo.
 1. On dune on smalacumb, on deretan, a lace.
 2. Upon ferndunalace on ðearfanðornes slo.
 3. Of þearfanðornes slo on readan ford.
 3. Þanon dun oc oð seclace.
 3. Up on seclace eft on wiswuðe treow stede.
 4. And ðriddan healfhe gyrde wudu rædene.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 879 (Sawyer 26)
B15.8.642.
Bounds, Sawyer 879: Sawyer 1979, 43.



 1. Her sutelat wa landgemæru into Bedintun.
 3. Þ is ærest to berhtelmes treo.
 3. & swa forð to mearðes scage & swa forð ofer þa
blacelege to sproges forda.
 4. Of sproges forda andlang þæs broces to gate brycge.
 5. & of gate brycge into swompes næpe.
 5. & of swompes hnæpe into sceddern þorn.
 6. & of sceadder þorn ofer þæne mor into þam sur
æppeltreo æt þære nearawan sætan.
 7. & fram þære nearawan sætan in þæne holgan broc
æt wulfgares more.
 8. & swa forð andlanges þæs broces forð þ hit cymð
to þam stanian forda.
 9. & of þam stanian forda andlang þæs sices þ hit
cymð to þam smæle æcels.
 10. & þanone to þam blacan hale.
 11. & þanone in þone broc.
 11. & swa forð andlangas þæs broces forð þ hit
cymð to hryxies mæne weig.
 12. & þanone oð þ hit cumð to godrices lea.
 12. & of godrices lea to wulstanes forda.
 13. & þanone oð þ hit cymð under þære blacan ecge
to þære srtæte & ofer þa stræte.
 14. Eft in berhtelmes treo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 922 (Sawyer 32)
B15.8.643.
Bounds, Sawyer 922: Sawyer 1979, 61.



 1. Ðis syndan þa landgemæru þe licgeð into westune.
 1. Þ is ærest of siðriðe forda on mæres ford.
 2. & of mæresforda westan wið ðarugandic.
 3. & swa on hina hoh.
 3. & swa of ðan ho westan wiððæne holanmere forð
into ceoleardes beorge & of ðam beorhge in mæresdic.
 4. & of mæresdic in wulfeardes þorn.
 5. & of wulfeardes þorne in þa grenandic.
 5. Andlang þære dice in þone pytt.
 6. & of þam pytte in deorwentan in þa myðan.
 6. & of ðam gemyðan upp æft' treontan eft on
siðriðe ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 1015 (Matthew)
B15.8.644.
Bounds, Sawyer 1015: Matthew 1962, 144.



 1. Þis is þæt landgemere æt meresege þæt is ærest
on pantan streame oð hit cymð to ðam dican betwyx east meresege and west
meresege/.
 4. Ðonne of ðam dican into ðam fleote.
 4. Ðonne of ðam fleote into ðære stræte þæt hit
cymð to ðære petan.
 5. Þonne on fingringaho æt ðam stane fram ðam stane to
bricsfleotes orde æft fram ðam stane to Winnanbricse fram Winnanbricse to
peltandunes meowte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch IWm (Hearne)
B15.8.645.
Bounds, Hearne 1723, II, 413-15.



 1. Ærest of usmere on heasecan beorh.
 1. Of þam beorge on cuðredes treow.
 2. Of þam treowe on þa dic.
 3. Andlang dic þæt on sture.
 3. Þonne of sture ðæt eft on þa dic.
 4. Andlang dic þæt on horsa broc, andlang broces on cenunga
ford.
 5. Of þan forda utan wið þone wudu ðæt to kyne fares
stane.
 6. Of þan stane on hoccan stige.
 7. Of þære stige on mær wylle.
 7. Of ðam wylle on ða dic, andlang dic on sture.
 8. Of sture on mær dene.
 9. Andlang dene to windofre.
 9. Of windofre on ðone stapul, of þam stapole on þone weg.
 10. Andlang weges in ðæt slæd.
 11. Of þam slæde on lyttan dune.
 11. Andlang weges þæt eft on us mere.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch IWm (Earle)
B15.8.646.
Bounds, Earle 1888, 431-2.



 1. Ðis is ðære xxx hyda boc æt Banawelle þe Willhelm
cyng gebocade Sancto Andrea apostolo in to þam biscoprice æt welle a on
ece yrfe.
 4. Ðis syndan þa land gemæro æt Banawelle.
 5. Ærest æt hylsbrokes eawillme east on þone cumb eall
abutan losa leh swa west on þone cumb & swa west of ðam cumbe to
bibricge.
 7. Of bibricge into ture broc.
 7. Of ture broke into locxs.
 8. Of loxs into bridewell to pantes hyd ford.
 9. To fule welle ut on þone mære of ðam mære on ealden
wrinn into catt widige up ford be cyng roda aest in þone wrinnæst streame
ford.
 11. Þat hyt cymð in þone hyls broc up þat hyt cymð æst
inne þa eaa willme.
 13. Ðis syndan þa land gemæru into Cumbtune Ærest on
hryges torr of hrygestorre east on þone smalen weg andlang wæges on ealmes
feald eastwearde swa andlang wæges on þone scyte swa on þone norðernna
weg on þa stygela & swa andlang weges on cearce rode.
 17. Of þære rode on ufe wearde calewen swa rihte nyðer on
þa sand seaþas þone rihte on þone holan weg andlang wæges on ceolc
broc andlang broces ut on reod ræwe on axa to wæde wær swa andlang eaa
to wiht hyrste of ðære hyrste on þa blindan ea.
 22. Swa æst on axa andlang streames on loxan &lang loxan up
on cyrces gemæro & on bertunes gemæru swa up ofer duna est on hricges
torr.
 25. And æt hiwisc þæra v hida c æcere mæde be suðan
heawican & et ceoddor mynster viiii heordas & þæt gemena land uf
bufen melc wæge & eall seo wyrð on sundran & se wudu of ðam
forde up andlang ceodder cumbes on hean næss.
 29. Of ðam næse on þa gemær ac on eadbrihtes cumbe
andlang cumbes æst þæt hyt cymð ut on þone feld.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch IWm (Davidson)
B15.8.647.
Bounds, Davidson 1883, 300.



 1. Ðis synd þa landgemæro þæs landes þe eadwig cyning
ageaf þam halgan were æt bemtune, & þam hyrede, & siððan
leofric biscop be willhelmes cynges unnan, let gebocyan into sancte þetres
mynstre on exancestre.
 4. Ærest þær ceoman lace ut scyt, andlang ceoman lace
þæt hit cymeð on temese, anlang temese westward swa westsexena gemære
is & myrcena þæt hit cymeð up to ðam gemyðan.
 6. Þonne went hit on ða norðeran ea, þæt hit cymeð to
anre lace betwix berhtulfing yge, & hrisyge þæt on ða norð ea,
þæt anlang þære ea.
 8. Þæt hit cymeð eft to ceoman lace, & þæt land
æt cyngbrycge norð andlang broces þæt hit cymð þær holanbroc
ut scytt, andlang broces up to þam wege be norðan cynstanes treowe.
 11. Andlang weges to fulan broces heafdon, andlang broces on þa
stanbricge, of þære stanbricge andlang weges on burgdyc.
 13. Andlang dyc on þone broc, andlang broces eft on cyngbricge, a
onecnisse into sancte petres mynstre on exancestre, & ealle þa teoðunga
þæs cyninges.
 15. Þis synd þa langemæro þære anre hyde &
þære oðerhealfan gyrde æt holacumbe þe læg into doflisc þe
leofric biscop let gebocyan for his sawle into sancte petres mynstre on
exancestre.
 18. Ærest on crampansteort, of crampansteorte on floraheafdo
& of floraheafdo up on þone weg be westa ðære cyrcan up to þa
ferngara.
 20. Of þam ferngara to þam dunnastane, of ðam dunnastane up
to þære dyc, & swa east andlang þære dyc to þan wætere of
þam wætere norð on þæs crohtes heafod & swa norð on þa
smala paðe swa on dun to þære þwirs dic & swa to dofolisces
landscore adun to arietes stane & swa andlang strandes to crampansteorte.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch Wulfstan (Hearne)
B15.8.648.
Bounds, Hearne 1723, II, 420.



 1. Ðis synd þa landgemæra into ælfestune.
 1. Ærest of afene in dodda ford.
 2. Of dodda forda in kyninges broc.
 3. Ondlang kyninges broce in mær dic.
 3. From mær dic into bogilawe.
 4. Of bogi lawe to west broce.
 5. Of west broke into cumere.
 5. Of cumere into clæig dunes hale.
 6. Ondlanges sice to hrucge slo.
 6. And swa ondlanges stræt to stræt forda.
 7. And swa ondlonges þære ea eft in dodda ford.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch Radulfus (Hearne)
B15.8.649.
Bounds, Hearne 1723, II, 429-30; with corrections by Jenkyns.



 1. From mulpol efter ðe siche to ðe forde.
 1. Of ðe forde up long gerdes into ðe weie.
 2. On oðe stude of rodberdes huse in ðe strete onlong gerdes to
waringes rudinge ðonene on lon gerdes to ðe imbe ac.
 5. From ðe imbe ac onlon gerdes to ðe furs tro.
 5. From ðe furs treo onlong gerdes to caue rudinge.
 6. Ðenene onlong gierdes to ða linde.
 7. Ðenene onlong gierdes to henne lega ðennene dunewardes
onlong gerdes to hole fiche.
 9. Ðonene uppard hole fiche to ðam hauede.
 10. From ðam hauede onlong gierdes to ðam stodfolde.
 11. From ðam stodfolda onlong ðe olde weie to Edwines huse at
ðe fenne.
