 12. Ðonene onlong gierdes to wibbe cumbes hauede.
 13. Ðenene onlong gierdes under dune to ðe wulf putte.
 14. Of ðe wulf putte onlong gierdes to totes stige.
 15. Ðonene onlong gierde to ðam eowe.

END_TEXT

 1.23. <foreign>Ab occidente stur usque</foreign> blacanriðe <foreign>ab aquilone et ab
oriente</foreign> Eadwealdes bocland to bradeburnan.
 1.25. <foreign>estque una semis aratra ab oriente sture quæ jacet at
confinium usque Garulfi regis ministri</foreign> to Mersaham & meda be eastan ee sue
ðer mid riahte to ðem lande limpað <foreign>unamque salis coquinariam hoc est</foreign> i
sealternsteall & ðer cota to <foreign>in illa loco ubi nominatur</foreign> herewic.
 1.29. <foreign>Et IIII carris transductionem in silba regis sex ebdomades a
die pentecosten hubi alteri homines silbam cedunt hoc est in regis
communione</foreign>.
 1.31. <foreign>hec sunt pascua porcorum que nostra lingua Saxhonica</foreign>

 1.33. <foreign>nec non XX statera casei</foreign> of mersce <foreign>ad Mersaham reddatur</foreign>.
 2.1. Ic Eadwald sello & forgeofu þis lond et wifeles berge
Agustines higum into hiora beode, minre sawle to are & to leedome.
 2.2. And iow fer godes lufe bidde þet ge hit minre sawle nyt
gedeo & me hit for gode leanie eow to elmessum, amen.

Ch 353 (Birch 563)
B15.8.655.
Bounds, Sawyer 353: Birch 1885-99, no. 563.



 29. <foreign>Hiis igitur limitibus tellus prefata giratur</foreign>.
 30. Ðis is þe landimere to Certeseye and to þorpe.
 30. Þat is arest on Waiemuþe up endlonge Waie, to Waibrugge, to
midstreme.
 31. Of Waibrugge suþuuard to boggesley, of boggeslye bi
midestreme to Wudeham.
 33. Of Wodeham suþriste into Haleuuik bi midestreme, and so
forþ bi tuuene þe londe of Haleuuik and þe londe of Wyntredeshulle
Westrigte.
 35. And so forþ Westrigte in fule brok þe geþ bi twene
fetingelye and þe forthe vergthe, and so forþrigte to þe horestone and
fram þe horestone in to þe derneforde.
 37. And so forþ west rigte endlonge streme in to þe more aet
estuuodesende.
 38. And so up be tuuene estuuode and otershaghe on þe
horeþorne, of þe horeþorne to eccan treiuue, of eccan treouue to þe
þrem burghen.
 41. Of þe þrem burghen in to þe shigtren, of þe shigtren in
to Merchebroke, of Merchebroke on exlaepesburne, of exleapesburne to þene
hore mapeldure.
 43. Of þe hore mapeldure to þe þrem treouuen, of þe þrem
treouuen endlange depebrok rigt to wealegate, of waelegate on Shyrepol, of
Shyrepol rigt to fulebrok.
 45. Of fulebrok to þe blake witghe, of þe wiþeghe forþrigte
to wealeshuþe, andlange temese an oþerehalue Mixtenham in þere ac be
tuuene burgheyge and Mixtenham, enlonge þe waetere rigt to neatel eyghe.
 48. Of þen eyghe endlonge temese, abute oxelake, and so forþ
endlange temese to bores burghe, and so forþ endlange temese rigt to hamen
eyge.
 51. And sua forþ endlange streme rigt be norþen hameneyghe, and
sua for endlange temese be haelue streme eft on Wayemuþe.

END_TEXT

Ch 656 (Birch 1033)
B15.8.663.
Bounds, Sawyer 656: Birch 1885-99, no. 1033.



 1. Þis sant ða land i mare at þortune, þe ierð in to
Hamtune, arest on arcetham.
 2. Of archethamme on Rumanhelle, þanen of breþling made þ on
wigerðes stapel, þanen to tudesleghe of þere lege be kinges imare on
blinnesfeld.
 4. Þanen be wde on þere hinc imare anlang mares þ on
ealdmannes wyerðe þanan on þa seales, of þan sealen þat eft on
arcetham.
 7. And þis sent þe tweire hide land imare þe cyna achte þe
ealde.
 8. Arest on iwern broc, of þane broke on þe lang dich, þan on
þene weie, anlang weies to late mere.
 9. Þane onlang sledes on ða smale þornes, þanne on ða
dich, þanne swo be diche on cranemere, of cranemere eft on iwern broc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Ch 735 (Birch 1164)
B15.8.664.
Bounds, Sawyer 735: Birch 1885-99, no. 1164.



 1. Erest æt wiðig mæde on þone weg oð hit sticað on
ðære ealdan stanbricge.
 2. Syððan be onheafdan od winces burch on þa ealdan dic.
 3. Of ðære dic on edbyrhting leage, of ðære leage be wyrt
walan oð wodnes die.
 4. Of ðere dic þes upp on þone wudu oððone ealdan wæg,
andlang wæges, on ealdan lege, of þære leage on cilda stan.
 6. Of þæm stane &lang hricges on þone ealdan weall, of
þæm weall to steorte þanon on corsan, be corsan andlang streames on
þone sweliend.
 8. Of þæm sweliende andlang broces on ða ealdan dic, of
þære dic on þone ealdan herepað, andlang herepaðes on wynmeduue west
heafdo, þæt eft on wiðig mæde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

ChHead 799 (Birch 1304)
B15.9.8.
Endorsements and Headings: Birch 1885-99



 1. Þis his seo freols boc to Cheolcan and ealra ðare landa ðe
in to ðæ mynechina life æt Wiltune for gifene synt, aðer oððe
ðurh Eadgar cynge, oððe ðurh his yldran, oððe ðurh oðere riht
ge lyfede men & eac fore ge bod.
 5. Ðæt of nanum oðrum mynstre ne sy abbadisse ge coren
æfter oðere forðsiðe buton of ðære sylvan ge ferræde, ne
æfter Godes ge cornnysse, & ealles geres mid cinges geðeahte eal swa
se halga regul tæcð.

END_TEXT

to lefænnæ rumæs butan twigen fyt to yfæs drypæ.

Rec 1 (Hickes)
B16.1.
Barking, List of Lands: Hart 1971, no. 106.



 1. Her seiþ hu mycel landes Gilebeard hæfþ on Stiþforde,
þæt is on norþhealfe þam broce <foreign>XXX</foreign> æceres, 7 þa mæd
þærto, 7 <foreign>XII</foreign> on suþhealf þa broc æt þa stane <foreign>XXX</foreign> æcere and
fower, 7 <foreign>XX</foreign> penege ælce geare.
 3. Þærto is gewitnesse, Siger, Siword, Ægelnoþ,
Ægelwine, Ælfstan, Godwine on Wearlea, Sælide, Baldwine, Hubeard,
Ælfred , Ledbeard.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 2.1 (Earle)
B16.2.1.
Bath, Agreement of Prior: Earle 1888, 270.



 1. Her sutelaþ on þisse cristes boc þa forewardan þe þe
prior on baþan & ealle þa gebroþran habbaþ gemaked wið sæwi
& wiþ þeodgyfu his wif.
 3. Þæt is þæt we habbaþ heom geunnen of godes healf
& of sancte marian & of sancte petres & of ure þa
broþerræddene & þa bedræddene for life & for deþe.
 6. And gelænd heom þæt land of þære stræt þe ure
wæs heore hus on to rymende þa hwile þe hi libbeþ.
 8. And hi us þar togenes gifeþ þæt hi us hyrsumien
wylleþ & holde beon, mid eallan þam þe hi magan & cunnen.
 10. And æfter heore tweire dæie sæwies & þeodgyfe hi
gyfeþ heore hus & heore land & ure criste & sancte petre to þam
þæt me hi fægere underfo & holdlice for heore sawla beo.
 13. Her is to gewitnesse Osward preost & Will þe clerec &
Huga þe portgerefe & Beoring & Leoffric & Heoþewulf &
Burehhard & Wylwi & Geosfræi & Ælfword þe smiþ & Edwi
Scredes sune & Roðð þe frenccisce.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 2.2 (Hunt)
B16.2.2.
Bath, Confraternity with Other Houses: Hunt 1893, 3-4.



 1. On drihtnes naman hælendes cristes, is þæt wulstan,
bisceop on drihtnes naman hæfð gerædd wið his leofan gebroðra þe
him getreowe synd for gode, & for worulde.
 3. Ðæt is þonne ærest ægelwig abbot on eofesham, &
Wulfwold abbot on ceortesige, & ælfsige abbot on baðan, & þa
gebroðra, & Eadmund abbot on perscoran, & rawulf abbot on
wincelcumbe, & Særle abbot on gleweceastre, & ælfstan decanus on
wigraceastre.
 7. Ðæt is þæt we willað georne gehyrsume beon gode,
& Sancta marian, & Sancte benedicte, & us sylfe gerihtlæcan swa
neah swa we nyht magon þam rihte.
 9. And beon swa swa hit awriten is: <foreign>Quasi cor unum et anima una</foreign>
& we willað urum woruldhlaforde Willelme cinincge, & mahthilde
þære hlæfdian holde beon for gode & for worulde.
 12. And habbe we us gerædd betweonan to ure saule þearfe,
& to ealra þara gebroðra þe us underþeodde synd þe munuchades
synd.
 14. Þæt is þæt we willað beon on annesse, swylce ealle
þas <foreign>vii</foreign> mynstras syn an mynster, & beon swa hit her beforan awriten is:
<foreign>Quasi cor unum et anima una</foreign>.
 16. Ðæt is þæt we ælcere wucan singan <foreign>ii</foreign> mæssan
on ælcum mynstre synderlice for eallum gebroðrum, monandæge &
frigedæge.
 18. And wite se broðar þe capitula mæssewuca bið þæt
þas mæssan geforðige for ða gebroðra þe libbende synd & for
ælcan forðfarenan breðer.
 20. Ælc þæra þinga foredon swylce hig ealle
ætgædere on anum mynstre wæron.
 22. & nu is þara abboda cwydrædene þæt hig willað
beon gode gehyrsume & heora bisceope to heora gemænelicum þearfe.
 23. Þæt is þæt heora ælc sceal don an <foreign>C</foreign> mæssan,
& of his agenra handa gebycge & an <foreign>C</foreign> þearfendra manna gebaðige,
& þa fedan, & ealle þa gescygean, & ælc singe himsylf <foreign>vii</foreign>
mæssan, & him foredon <foreign>xxx</foreign> nihta his mete beforan him, & ænne
pænig on uppan þam mete.
 28. God us gefultumige, þæt we hit þus motan gelæstan,
& mid suman gode geeacnian.
 29. <foreign>Sic Fiat</foreign>.
 30. Ðis synd þara gebroðra naman on eofesham.
 30. Þæt is ærest ægelwig abbot & Godric abbot, &
ægelwine decanes, & Ordmær, & Godefrið, & þeodred,
Regnold, & eadric, ælfwine, & eadwig, Colling, & leofwine,
ælfric, & wulfwine, Sired, & bruning, ælmær, & ælfwine,
ægelric, & ægelwyrd, Dunning, & Sægeat, Vhtred, &
eadweard, Eadmund, Vlf, Brihtric, Wulfsige, Sexa, ælfwine, Wlmær,
ægelwig.
 37. Ðis syndon þara broðra naman on ceortesige.
 37. Þæt is ærest wulfwold abbot, & ælfward, &
Sælaf, Oter, & godwine, æþestan, & eadgar, Eadmær, &
godwine, ælfwine, & benedict, Siwine, & alfwold, Brihtnoð, &
ælfric, Godric, & ælfric, Oswold, & ælfric, & wulfward,
& wulfrie.
 42. Ðis syndon þara gebroðra naman on baðan.
 42. Þæt is ærest ælfsige abbot, & ælfric,
leofwig, & hieðewulf, ælfwig, & ægelmær, eadwig, &
godwine, ægelwine, & oswold, ælmær, & þeodwold, eadric,
ægelmær, sæwulf, þured, ægelric, & Hærlewine.
 45. And Godric munuc on mældmes byrig ealswa ure an & ealswa
wulwerd pices broðor on tantune.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 2.3 (Earle)
B16.2.3.
Bath, Manumissions: Earle 1888, 268-71.



 1.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt leofenoð
ægelnoðes sunu æt korstune hæfð geboht hine & his ofspring ut
æt ælfsige abbot & æt eallon hirede on baðon, mid fif oran &
mid <foreign>XII</foreign> heafdon sceapa, on kascilles gewitnesse portgerefan & on ealre
þære burhware on baðon.
 1.4. Crist hine ablende þe þis æfre awende.
 2.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt Ægelsige
æt Linncume hæfð geboht Wilsige his sunu ut æt Ælfsige abbot on
Baðon & æt eallon hirede to ecean freote.
 3.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt ægelsige
byttices sunu hæfð geboht hildesige his sunu ut æt ælsige abbot on
baðon & æt eallon hirede mid syxtigon penegon to ecean freote.
 4.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt godwig se bucca
hæfð geboht leofgife þa dægean æt norðstoke & hyre ofspring
mid healfan punde æt ælsige abbod to ecan freote on ealles þæs
hiredes gewitnesse on baðon.
 4.4. Crist hine ablende þe þis æfre awende.
 5.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt ælsige abbot
hæfð gefreod godwine bace æt stantune for hine & for ealne þone
hired on baðan on sæmannes gewitnesse & wulwiges æt prisctune &
ælfrices cermes.
 6.1. Her swutelað on ðissere cristes bec þæt ælfwig se
red hæfð geboht hine sylfne ut æt ælfsige abbod & eallon hirede
mid anon punde.
 6.2. Þar is to gewitnes eall se hired on baðan.
 6.3. Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
 7.1. Her swutelað on þissere cristes bec þæt edric æt
fordan hæfð geboht sægyfu his dohtor æt ælfsige abbod and æt
þam hirede on baðan to ecum freote & eall hire ofspring.
 8.1. Her swutelað on þisses cristes bec þæt ælfric scot
& ægelric scot synd gefreod for ælsiges abbodes sawle to ecan
freote.
 8.2. Þis is gedon on ealles hiredes gewitness.
 9.1. Her swutalað on þissere cristes bec þæt siwine
leofwies sunu æt lincumbe hafuþ geboht sydeflæde ut mid fif scyllingam
penegan æt iohanne þam biscope & æt eallon þam hirede on baþon
to ecum freote.
 9.3. And herto is gewittnesse Godric ladda, & sæwold &
his twegen sunan, scirewold & brihtwold.
 10.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt iohann
hæfð geboht gunnilde þurkilles dohter æt gode leofenaðes lafe to
healfan punde, on ealles hiredes gewittnysse.
 10.3. Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende, & he
hæfð hi betæht criste & sancte petre for his moder sawle.
 11.1. Her swutelaþ on ðyssere cristes bec þæt sæwi hagg
æt widecume hæfþ gedon ut his twegen sunu ætt ælfsige abbude on
ealles hiredes gewitnesse.
 12.1. Her swutelað on þisse cristes bec þæt lifgið æt
forda is gefreod & hire twa cild for þone biscop iohann & for ealne
þone hired on baðon on ælfredes gewitnesse aspania.
 13.1. Her swutelað on þissere cristes bec þæt
ægylmær bohte sæþryþe æt sæwolde abbude mid <foreign>III</foreign> manxan, on
ealles hiredes gewitnysse & ofer his dæg & hys wifes dæg beo se
man freoh.
 13.3. Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
 14.1. Her swutelað on þissere cristes bec þæt wulwine
hareberd bohte æt ælfsige abbude ælfgyþe mid healfan punde on ealles
hiredes gewitnysse.
 14.2. & crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.
 15.1. Her swutelað on þissere cristes bec þæt ægylsige
bohte wynric æt ælfsige abbude mid anon yre golde.
 15.2. Þysses ys to gewitnysse ælfryd portgereua & eal se
hired on baþon.
 15.3. Crist hine ablende þe þis gewrit awende.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 2.4 (Hunt)
B16.2.4.
Bath, Relics: Hunt 1893, lxxv-lxxvi.



 1.1. Ðis is se haligdom þe ælsige abbot & þa
gebroðra þe mid him wæron fundon on þam scrinon þa þa heom
tweonode hwæt haligdomes hi hæfdon.
 1.3. Þa fæston hi to & undydon þa scrina & fundon
ealswa hit heræfter segð.
 1.4. Þæt is of þære rode þe ure drihten wæs on
ahangen & of his ahgenon reafe, & of his agenre byrgene, & of þam
palme þe drihten sylf sette his agenum handum.
 1.6. & of sancta marian reafe, & of terra promissione,
& of reliquie sancte andree, & of sancte stephane, & of sancte
pancrate, & of sancte oswalde, & of sancte tiburtie, & of sancte
iuliane, & of sancte eadwarde, & of sancte cuthberhte, & of sancte
suuithune, & of sancte siluestre, & of sancte blasi, & of sancte
ceaddan, & of sancte germane de gallian, & of oðran sancte germane,
& of sancto wulmaro, & of sancto wulframno, & of sancto byrnulfo,
& of sancto amando, & of sancto paulo episcopo, & of sancte
medarde, & of sancta cecilian, & of sancta balthildan, & of sancta
margaretan, & of sancta marian magdalen, & of sancta ælfgife, &
of sancta oportuno, & of sancte dewig, & of sancte cadduc, & of
sancte gyltus, & of sancte geretrudis, & of sepulchrum domini, & of
sepulchrum sancte marie, & of sancte fursee, & of sancte
eadwardes byrgene, & of sancte olafes reafe, & sancte dionisius toð,
& of sancte aidane biscop & of sancte tuthei, & of sancte fursini,
& of sancte oswalde biscop.
 2.1. Ðis is se haligdom þe heorstan hæfð begiten into
sancte petres mynstre on baðon.
 3.1. Ðis is se haligdom þe wulwine on readingon gef into þam
mynstre on baðon criste to wurðmynte & sancte petre & eallon godes
halgon for his sawle to eceum gemynde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 3 (Meritt)
B16.3.
Bedwyn, Guild Regulations, Manumissions, Tithe Records: Meritt 1934, 343-51.



 1.1. Æþelweard cyð ceolbrehte, þæt ic wille, þæt
þu agife þa twegen dælas þære teoðunge from bedewindan & fram
lamburnan þam godes þeowum to fostre æt bedewindan.
 1.5. And hie hit dælen betweoh him swa ðe gemetlic þynce:
hæn/.
 2.1. Þyses gegildes gerædnes is, gif hyrra hwylcum foretsit
gebyrige, begyte ælce uif mæssan oððe fif salteras for þa saule.
 2.5. And æt þam þritigeþan dæge twegen & twegen uif
lhafas & an penigweorð sufles swylces he begyttan mæge & æt
hyrra mittingge sceotan twegen & twegen anne pennig for hyra sawle.
 2.10. And æt husbryne twegen & twegen foþor antimbres
& ðæt bewyrcen oþþe twegen peniggas.
 2.11. And þan mæssepreosþe on gagdagas sceotan twa
gesamhiwan an geogscep oþþe twegen peniggas.
 2.14. And gif hwa his gildan gelihinie oþþe gefyxse on his
gildsetle gebete mid fif ambbreon ealaþ & mid þri.
 3.1. Her cyþ þæt eadwine geuþe wynsige & aþelnoþe
his men, þæt he moste adon byrhtgyþe ut of þam geburlande mid tyn
mancusson færfrige on ælc land, þa ælfsige folgaþ hæfde, &
wynstan wæs his gingra, on hyra gewitnesse, & on ælfhehes
mæssepreostes & on æþeldryþe þære nunnan & on titsiges
& on tætiges & on ealra þara godes þeowa æt bedewindan, &
on ceolbyrhtes suna gewitnesse sigestanes & æþelstanes & on ealles
þæs folces.
 4.1. Þis is ecgwynnes gewitnes, þæt eadwine hyre geuþe,
þæt heo hy moste adon ut of þam geburlande færfrige on ælc land
mid tyn mancusson seolfres, þa ælfsige folgaþ hæfde & wynstan
wæs his geongra, on hyra gewitnesse & on ælfhehes mæssepreostes
& on ealra þara godes þeowa æt bedewindan & on ealles þæs
folces.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 4 (Forst)
B16.4.
Bodmin, Manumissions: Forster 1930, 90-98, and from MS.



 1.1. Her ys þæs manes nama, ðe Byrhsie gefreade et Petrocys
stowe, Byhstan hate, Bluntan sunu, on æþelhide giwitnyse, hys agen wif,
and on Byrhisiys mæsepreostes and on Riol and Myrmen and Wunsie,
Morhæþþo and Cynsie preost.
 26.1. Wuennmon and hire team, Moruiw, hire swuster, and hire team,
and Wurgustel and his team, wuarun gefreod her on tune for Eadryde cynigc and
for Æðelgar biscop an þas hirydes gewitnesse, ðe her on tune syndun.
 29.1. Marh gefreode Leðelt and ealle hire team for Eadwig cyningc
on his ægen reliquias; and he hie het lædan hider to mynstere and her
gefreogian on Petrocys reliquias on þæs hirydes gewitnesse.
 30.1. Her kyð on þissere bec, þæt Æilsig bohte anne
wifmann, Ongyneþel hatte, and hire sunu Gyðiccael, æt þurcilde mid
healfe punde æt þære cirican dura on Bodmine.
 30.3. And sealde Æilsige portgereua and Maccosse, hundredes
mann, <foreign>IIII</foreign> pengas to tolle.
 30.4. Þa ferde Æilsig to þe þa menn bohte, and nam hig and
freode uppan Petrocys weofede æfre sacles on gewittnesse þissa godera
manna, þæt wæs Isaac messepreost and Bleðcuf messepreost and Wunning
messepreost and Wulfger messepreost and Grifiuð messepreost and Noe
messepreost and Wurþicið messepreost and æilsig diacon and Maccos and
Teðion, Modredis sunu, and Kynilm and Beorlaf and Dirling and Gratcant and
Talan.
 30.11. And gif hwa þas freot abrece, hebbe him wið Criste
gemene.
 30.12. Amen.
 33.1. Her kyð on þissere bec, þæt Ælfric, Ælfwines
sunu, wolde þeowian Putraele him to nydðeowetlinge.
 33.2. Þa com Putrael to Boia and bed his forespece to Ælfrice,
his breðere.
 33.3. Þa sette Boia þei spece wið Ælfrice: þæt wes,
þæt Putrael sealde ælfrice <foreign>VIII</foreign> oxa æt þere cirican dura æt
Bodmine.
 33.5. And gef Boia sixtig penga for þere forspæce, and dide
hine sylfne and his ofspreng æfre freols and saccles fram þam dæge
wið Ælfrice and wið Boia and wið ealle Ælfwines cyld and heora
ofspreng on þissere gewittnisse: Isaac messepreost and Wunning preost and
Sewulf preost and Godric diacon and Cufure prauost and Wincuf and Wulfwerd and
Gestin, þes bisceopes stiwerd, and Artaca and Kinilm and Godric Map and
Wulfger and ma godra manna.
 37.1. Hær cyð on þyson bec, þæt Ælwold gefreode
Hwatu far hys sawle at Petrocys stow an degye and æfter degye an Ælgerys
gewytnisse and Godric and Walloð and Gryfyið and Bleyðcuf and Salaman.
 37.4. And hebbe he godes curs and sanctes Petrocus and æalle
Welkynes sanctas, þe þæt brece, ðæt ydon ys.
 37.6. Amen.
 46.1. Þes sint þa menn, þe Wulfsige byscop gefreode for
Eadgar cinig and for hyne silfne æt Petrocys wefode: Leuhelec, Welet,
Unwalt, Beli, Iosep, Dengel, Proswetel, Tancwuestel, and lies an þas
gewitnese: Byrhsige mæsseprost, Mermen masseprost Marh.
 47.1. Catuutic, Wenwiu, Puer, Medwuistel, Iosep.
 47.1. Þys syndun þara manna namana, ðe Wulfsige byscop
gefreode æt Petrocys wefode for Eadgar and for hyne silfne and Byrhsiys
gewitnesse masseprost and Mermen masseprost and Morhiðo.
 48.1. Diuset and ealle here team.
 49.1. Ðys sindun þara manna namana, ðe Wulfsie Conmonoc
gefreode at Petrocys stowe for Eadgar cinig on ealle ðæs hiredys
gewitnesse: Iarnwallon and Wenværþlon and Mæiloc.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 5.1 (Arnold)
B16.5.1.
Bury St. Edmunds, Boundaries of Land: Arnold 1890, I, 340-41.



 1. This synden tha landgemæro, the Ædmund kyng gebocade into
Sancte Ædmunde, thonne is theer ærest suth be eahte treouuan, and thonne
up be Ealhmundes treouuan, and suua forth to Osulfes lea, and suua forth on
gerichte be manige hyllan, and thanan up to Hamarluda, and suua forth to fouuer
hogas, and suua æfter them uuege to Litlantune, and thonan ofer tha ea
æfter tham uuege to Bertunedene, and suua on gerihte east to Holegate, and
suua forth an furlang be easten Bromleaga, and thonan suth to Niuuantune
meaduue.

END_TEXT

 1. & twælf oræn under prestæs & dæacnæs

Rec 5.4 (Rob 104)
B16.5.4.
Bury St. Edmunds, Possessions, Rents, and Grants: Robertson 1956, no. 104.



 1. Her stent ða forwarde ðe Æþeric worhte wið ðan
abbode on Niwentune, þæt is III sceppe mealtes & healf sceppe
hwæte, an slægryðer, V scep, X fliccen & X hund hlafe þæt
sceal beon gære on <foreign>pridie nonas Septembris</foreign>.
 4. Leofstan abbot doð to þis fermfultum, an sceppe malt &
III hund hlafe & VI fliccen & oþer VI to fyllincge into þan ealdan
fyrme & X cesen & eallswa mycel Brihtric preost & eallswa mycel
Leofstan buton X cesen wane & ðurstan syflincge to III hund lafe &
twegen oran into kycene & Brihtric XVI penega.
 10. On Elsingtun hundred ah Sancte Eadmund XXVII manslot, on
Spelhoge hundred XLV manslot on In hundred X manslot, on Fuwelege hundred healf
ehteþe manslot, on ærnehogo hundred XXV manslot, on Clencware hundred
healf ehteþe manslot, on Lynware hundred V manslot.
 14. Fram Aþolfes suðtun to alde Walbec, fram Watlingetune
norð into sæ ah Sancte Eadmund landes dæle mid his landemacan.
 17. Ures Drihtnes Hælendes Cristes freo nama a on ecnyssa sy
gewurþod, þe ængla wuldorheap him sylfum to wyrðscipe gegearawode
& eac manna wynsumlic wlita æfter his agenan anlicnessan gehywlæhte
syllende heom genihtsumlice geofa heofonas & eorþan.
 21. Swa he nu dagum Breotanrices fægran iglandes Eadwearde
cyncge sealde & geuþe ealswa he æror geara his magum dyde ðæra
wæs sum æþel & wurðful Sancte Eadmund gehaten & se mid Criste
sylfum nu eardað on heofonum.
 26. Betæhte nu cincg se goda Eadward & se wurðfulla his
mæges mynstere on Bædericeswyrðe Leofstan abbode þæt he bewiste
þæt þæt þær wære inne & ute.
 28. & he þa þær þus mycel funde, X bec inne ðæra
circean IIII Cristes bec & I mæsseboc & I pistelboc & I salter
& I godspellboc & I capitularia & Sancte Eadmundes uita.
 31. In madmhus, XII mæssehacelan & nigon cantercæppa
& IIII roccas & VII stolan & XXXIII pella & IX weofodsceatas
& XV superumerale gerenode & XXV alba & VII setrægl & XIII
wahrægl & III rygcrægl & II scufrægl & V calices & III
offringclaþas & VII corporale & II storscylle & III marmarstan
gesmiðede & IIII scrinan & XIIII rodan.
 37. Blakere hæfð I winter rædingboc.
 37. Brihtric hæfð I mæssereaf calix & disc & I
mæsseboc & winter rædingboc & sumerboc.
 39. Siuerð hæfð an mæssereaf & an mæsseboc &
Leofstan an handboc, æþeric an mæsseboc & capitularia, ðurstan an
psalter, Oskytel hæfð an mæssereaf & an mæsseboc & an Ad te
leuaui.
 42. On Sancte Eadmundes byrig beoð XVI hida eorðes landes VI
hida into þæra byrig & þa X hida manna earningaland.
 43. On Wirlingaweorðe lið anes monðes ferme mid þan berwica
Saham, on Pallegrafe anes monðes ferme mid þorpa, on Redgrafe anes monðes
ferma, on Ricyncgahale anes monðes ferma mid Stoca & Brocaforde, on
Byrtune anes monðes ferma, on Ruhham anes monðes ferma, on Elmeswella anes
monðes ferma mid Wulpettas & Grotene, on Koccefelda anes monðes ferma
mid Ceorlesweorðe, on Hwipstede anes monðes ferma mid Bradefeldæ, on
Horningasearðe anes monðes ferma mid Rysebi, on Lecforde anes monðes
ferma mid Hyrningcwylle, on Runcgetune anes monðes ferma mid Culeforde &
mid Fornham.
 55. Her syndon XXX boca ealre on Leofstanes abbodes hafona butan
mynsterbec.
 57. On Paccenham anes monðes ferma mid Stantune.
 58. Her onstent gewriten hwæt man funde æt Eggemere
syððan Cole hit let <foreign>hic instat conscriptum quid inventum fuerit apud
Eggemere postquam Cole eam dimisit</foreign>.
 60. Ðæt is VII oxen & VIII cy & IIII feldhryþera
& II stottas & V scora scæp & XV scæp under ealde & iunge
& VIII score æcere gesawen & I flicce & I swin & XXIIII
cesen.
 63. <foreign>Hoc est</foreign> seofene <foreign>boues et</foreign> ahte <foreign>uacce et</foreign> fower <foreign>pascuales
uituli et equi uiles et quinquies uiginti oues et</foreign> fiftene <foreign>oues inte et et
octies uiginti agri seminati et</foreign> an <foreign>bacun et</foreign> an <foreign>porcus et</foreign> fower &
twenti casei.
 68. Her stant gewriten hwæt Baldwine abbot hæfð geunnen his
gebroþra to caritatem, þæt is II mylnegafel æt Lacforde, hælf pund
æt þæt an & XII or æt þæt oþer.
 70. Þæt healf pund we sculan habban æt <foreign>natiuitatem
sanctæ Mariæ</foreign> & ða VI or æt Sancte Dionisius messe & VI
or æt Sancte Nicholaus & þær sculan eac II fætte swyn up arisan
to smolte oððe III oran.
 74. Ðis is seo caritas þe Baldwine abbot hæfð geunnon his
gebroðrum for Eadwardes sawle þæs godan kynges.
 75. Þæt is healf pund æt his geargemynde to fisce to þan
forewardan þæt hi hine þæs þe oftor gemunon on heora gebedreddene
& healf pund to þan timan ealswa ic hider com to mynstre <foreign>XIIII
kalendæ Sept</foreign>.
 78. & stande þis pund æfre on Godes est & on Sancte
Eadmundes cume her to se þe cume to minon geargemynde.
 80. Þis feoh sceal arisan of Ixewyrðe þe lið into
Pakenhame.
 81. Æt Vuiges gearimynd abbotes we sculan habben half pund to
fisce & feowerti penega to mede & II mett hwæte & þæt sceal
risen of Lecforde.
 84. Ðis is Sancte Eadmundes ferme on Byrtune, IIII met maltes
under masc & grut, halmet hwæte, an ryðer & II swin IIII ges XX
hennen.
 86. Of Ruham ealswa mycel & of Redgraue ealswa of Pakenham
& of Stantune ealswa mycel.
 87. Of Elmeswelle & of Wulpet & of Grotene ealswa.
 88. Of Herningwelle & of Cunegestune ealswa mycel.
 89. Of Palegraue & of ðorpe ealswa mycel.
 89. Of Horningeseorðe & of Risby ealswa micel.
 90. Of Kokefelde & of Ceorleswurðe ealswa micel.
 91. Of Hwepstede & of Bradefelde ealswa mycel.
 92. Of Wyrlingwurðe & of Saham ealswa mycel.
 92. Of Rungetune & of Culeforde & of Fornham ealswa mycel.
 93. On Brokeforde & of Rikingehale ealswa mycel.
 94. Of Tifteshale I met maltes under masc & grut & I lepene
hwæte & feorðendæl an ryðer & an half swin & an gos &
V hennen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 5.5 (RobApp II 7)
B16.5.5.

 1. Þas bocas haueð Salomon preost, þæt is þe codspel
traht & þe martyrliua & þe æglisce saltere & þe cranc
& ðe tropere, & Wulfmer cild þe <foreign>atteleuaui</foreign> & pistelari &
ðe imnere & ðe capitelari & þe spelboc, & Sigar preost þe
leceboc & Blakehad boc, & Æilmer ðe grete sater & ðe litle
tropere forbeande & ðe donatum, XV bocas.
 7. Ealfric, Æilwine, Godric, & Bealdewuine abbot, &

Rec 5.6 (Rob 119)
B16.5.6.
Bury St. Edmunds, Agreement with Ordric the Cellarer: Robertson 1956, no. 119.



 1. Þis forward was makid wid Ordric hordere, þat es þat aelc
man in sancte Eadmundes Byri husfast on his owe land sal gifen to þe
halegenes Bideripe þe hordor on peni at Petermasse on ginninge heruest.
 4. An sea þat sit on oderes land sea sceal gifen oan halpeni for
þat he aalle scolden sceren þe halegenes corn.
 6. Fram þis sceal naefre no maen be scyr buton sancte Eademundes
þewes & sea cnytes and þe preostes inne þeo singen at þo wyuedes.
 8. God seonde heore frieond þe worden sancte Eadmund.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 6.3 (Kem 1363)
B16.6.3.
Christ Church, Canterbury, Boundaries: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1363.



 1. Æt Hansfleote gæð þæra twegra bisceoprice
togædere, fram Hansfleote to hoingdene, fram hoingdene to Tumwyllan, fram
Tumwyllan to sandhlincan, fram sandhlincan andlanges þær ea to þære
wic, fram þære wic to þære cortan, and swa andlanges to Suðsexan.
 5. Þus hyt stynt and æfre gyt stod buton se arcebisceop
hwæs geunnon wille of hys dæle þam oðran bisceope.

END_TEXT

Rec 6.5 (Whitelock)
B16.6.5.
Christ Church, Canterbury, Codex Aureus Inscription: Whitelock 1967, 205.



 1. <foreign>In nomine Domini nostri Ihesu Christi</foreign> Ic Aelfred aldormon ond
Werburg min gefera begetan ðas bec æt haeðnum herge mid uncre claene
feo, ðæt ðonne wæs mid clæne golde.
 3. Ond ðæt wit deodan for Godes lufan ond for uncre saule
ðearfe, ond for ðon ðe wit noldan ðæt ðas halgan beoc lencg in
ðære haeðenesse wunaden, ond nu willað heo gesellan inn to Cristes
circan Gode to lofe ond to wuldre ond to weorðunga, ond his ðrowunga to
ðoncunga, ond ðæm godcundan geferscipe to brucenne ðe in Cristes
circan dæghwæmlice Godes lof rærað, to ðæm gerade ðæt heo
mon arede eghwelce monaðe for Aelfred ond for Werburge ond for Alhðryðe,
heora saulum to ecum lecedome, ða hwile ðe God gesegen haebbe ðæt
fulwiht æt ðeosse stowe beon mote.
 13. Ec swelce ic Aelfred <foreign>dux</foreign> ond Werburg biddað ond halsiað
on Godes almaehtiges noman ond on allra his haligra ðæt nænig mon seo
to ðon gedyrstig ðætte ðas halgan beoc aselle oððe aðeode from
Cristes circan ða hwile ðe fulwiht stondan mote.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 6.6 (HarmD 19)
B16.6.6.
Christ Church, Canterbury, Manumission: Harmer 1914, no. 19.



 1. Æðelstan cyng gefreode Eadelm forraðe þæs ðe he
æræst cyng wæs.
 2. Ðæs wæs on gewitnesse Ælfheah mæssepreost & se
hired & Ælfric se gerefa & Wufnoð Hwita & Eanstan prafost
& Byrnstan mæssepreost.
 4. Se þe ðæt onwende, hæbbe he Godes unmiltse &
ealles ðæs haligdomes ðe ic on Angelcyn begeat mid Godes miltse.
 6. & ic an ðan bearnan þæs ilcan ðæs ic þan
fæder an.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 6.10 (Stanley)
B16.6.10.
Christ Church, Canterbury, Writ of William I: Stanley transcript, edited from MS.



 1. Willem cyng grete ealle mine biscopas & mine eorlas &
mine gerefan & ealle mine ðegenan frecisce & ænglisce on ðam
ran/ ðe Lanfranc arcebiscop & se hyred æt cristus cyrcean n cantwara
byrig habbað land inne freondlice.
 2. Ic kyðe eow þæt ic hæbbe hem geunnen þæt he beon
ælc ðara landa wurðe e hi hæfdon on eadweardes kynges dæge mines
mæges & aca & socne on strande & on streame on wudan & on
feldan tolles & teames griðbrices & ham socne & for tealles.
 3. & infangen ðeofes & flymena friðinga ofer eora
agena men binnon burgon & buton swa ful, & wa forð swa mine agene
wicneras, hit secean sceoldon eallon ðingon me sylfan to hande & ofer swa
fela gena swa ic heom to to gelætan habbe.
 4. & ic nelle geðaf naðor ne frænciscan ne ængliscan
þæt ænig ðinge on teo buton hi sylfe & heora wicneras ðe hi hi
betæ n willað forðam ðingan ðe ic hæbbe criste ðas gerihta
gyfan/ mynre sawle to ecere alysendnisse eallra weard kyning myn mæg ær
hæfde.
 5. & ic nelle ðurh ðingc þæt ænig mann ðis
abreke be minan fullan freondscype; god eow gehealde.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 7.1 (RobApp II 6)
B16.7.1.
St. Augustine's, Canterbury, Booklist: Robertson 1956, App. II, no. 6.



 1. Þis syndon ða bec þe Æþestanes wæran, <foreign>de natura
rerum Persius, de arte metrica Donatum minorem, Excerptiones de metrica arte,
Apocalipsin, Donatum maiorem, Alchuinum, Glossam super Catonem, libellum de
grammatica arte que sic  incipit terra que pars, Sedulium</foreign> & I gerim wæs
Alfwoldes preostes, <foreign>Glossa super Donatum, Dialogorum</foreign>.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 7.2 (HarmD 6)
B16.7.2.
St. Augustine's, Canterbury, Grants: Harmer 1914, no. 6.



 1. <foreign>In nomine Domini.</foreign> Ealhburh hafaþ geset myd hyre freonda
þeahtunga þæt man ælce gere agyfe þam hywum to Sanctæ Agustine
of þam lande æt Bradanburnan XL ambura mealtes & eald hryðer &
IIII weþeras & XL & CC hlafes & ane wæge spices & cyses
& IIII foþro wudes & XX henfugla.
 5. Swylc man se þæt land hæbbe, þas ðingc agyfe for
Ealdredes saule & for Ealhburge.
 7. & þa hiwan asingan ælce dæge æfter hyra ferse
þæne sealm for hia, <foreign>Exaudiat te Dominus</foreign>.
 8. Swæ hwylc man swa þis abrece, si he asceaden fram Gode
& fram eallum hallgum & fram þan halgan were on þysum life & on
ecnesse.
 11. Þonne synt her æfter þara manna naman to gewitnesse
þisse gesetednesse, þæt is þonne.
 13. Gif hit þonne swa gegæþ, swa we na ne wyscað, þæt
hwylc broc on becume þurh hæþen folc oþþe hwylce oðre
earfoþnesse, þæt hit man ne mæge þæs geres gelæstan, agife on
oþrum geare be tweofealdum.
 16. Gif þonne git ne mæge, sylle on ðriddum geare be
ðryfealdum.
 17. Gyf he þonne git ne mæge ne nelle, agife land & bec
þam hiwum to Sanctæ Agustine.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.1 (Rob 24)
B16.8.1.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Gifts of King Æthelstan: Robertson 1956, no. 24.



 1. <foreign>In nomine domini nostri Ihesu Dhristi</foreign>.
 1. Ic Æþelstan cyning selle þas boc into sancto Cuðberhte
& bebeode on Godes noman & on þæs halgan weres þæt hio
næfre nan monn of þisse stowe mid nanum facne ne reaflace ne afirre ne
nane þara geofona þe ic to þisse stowe gedoo.
 5. Gif þonne hwelc monn to þæm dyrstig beo þæt he
þisses hwæt breoce oððe wende beo he scyldig wiþ God & wiþ
menn & dæl neomende Iudases hletes Scariothes, & on Domes dæge
þæs egeslican cwides to geheranne & to onfone, <foreign>discedite a me
maledicti in ignem æternum et reliq</foreign>.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.2 (RobApp I 2)
B16.8.2.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Grants: Robertson 1956, App. I, no. 2.



 1. Walchear biscop & eal Sancte Cuðberhtes hyred Sealdan
Ealdgyðe þæt land æt ðornhlawa to þyse male þæt is þus
þæt gyf heo hit forlæteð beo hit æt deadum oððe æt cwicvm
swa swa hyre þearfe sy þæt mala is VIII exen & XII cyg & IIII
menn.
 4. & eac he lænde hyre þæt land æt Windegatum ealle
ða hwile þe hyre þearf byð.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.3.1 (Birch 1254)
B16.8.3.1.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Manumissions: Birch 1885-99, no. 1254.



 1. Geatfleda geaf freols for Godes lufa & for heora sawla
þearfe þ is Ecceard smið & Ælstan & his wif & eall heora
ofsprinc boren & unboren.
 3. And Arcil & Cole & Ecferð Aldhunes dohter & ealle
þa men þe heo nam heora heafod for hyra mete on þam yflum dagum.
 5. Swa hwa swa þis awende & hyre sawla þises bereafie
bereafige hine God ælmihtig þises lifes, & heafona rices, & sy he
awyrged dead & cwic aa on ecnysse.
 7. And eac heo hafað gefreod þa men þe heo þigede æt
Cwæs patrike.
 8. Þ is Ælfwald & Colbrand Ælsie & Gamal his sune
Eðred tredewude & Uhtred his steop sune Aculf & þurkyl &
Ælsige hwa þe heom þises bereafie God ælmihtig sie heom wrað &
sanctæ Cuðberh.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.3.2 (Craster)
B16.8.3.2.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Manumissions: Craster 1925, 190.



 1. Þis synd þæra monna noman þe is gefreod for
Mældorðes sawle.
 2. Ferman, Wulfstan, Ukede, Ealdcearle, Buð, Walh, Wulflæd,
Grugele, Ælflæd, Ælflæd.
 3. Se ðe þis awende hem be Judas dæl.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.3.3 (Craster)
B16.8.3.3.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Manumissions: Craster 1925, 190.



 1. Her cyð þæt Ælfred lareow hæfeð gefreolsad vii
men.
 1. An is Ædred webbe.
 2. And oðer his sunu Eðered.
 2. And þridde his dohtor Ealdwif.
 2. And feorðe his broðor dohtor Colawis.
 3. & fift Akulf his groefa.
 3. & seste Akolfes sunu Uhtred.
 4. And seofunde Eþeredes sunu his agenes meges Ælsrig hatte.
 5. Þas seofun men Ælfrid hæfeð gefreolsad Godes þonces
& sancte Cuðberhtes for hine & for his wif Kolawis.
 6. On alles sancte Cuðbertes heoredes gewitnysse.
 7. And hwa þe þis ymbwende bereafige hine God twoegra þinga
her lyfes & heofona rices.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 8.3.4 (Craster)
B16.8.3.4.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, Manumissions: Craster 1925, 191.



 1. Her cyð es þæt Eðered hæfeð gefreolsad his
broðer dohtor Earnones.
 2. And þæt sy aa geton wið eghwylcne monne þe þe
hæfes nebb & ege.
 2. And on all sancte Cuðberhtes heoredes gewitnysse.

END_TEXT

Rec 8.4 (RobApp II 4)
B16.8.4.
Congregation of St. Cuthbert, List of Plate: Robertson 1956, App. II, no. 4.



 1. Tea calices & sex disces & twoegentig bleod & feower
steapas & an bælt & an hana & ðrea condelstafas & fiftene
cuppa & fiftene bleda & nion leoda & an cetel & fif calices
& feawer discas & sextene hornas gerinade & ðrea unrinade.

Rec 9.1 (RobApp II 9)
B16.9.1.
Ely, Farm Accounts: Robertson 1956, App. II, no. 9.



 1. Ðys synd þa þing þe man gedon hæfþ to ðornige,
ærest man bohte twa ðusend hæringes myd xl penegun & þonne to
beansæde xl penega, fif oran Æþelferþe æt Niwantune æt hys men,
twegen oran wæron to scipe & to nettum to Fearresheafde, & wyþ
þrim gegrindum æt þiutforda man sealde oran & xii penegas &
anne wifman v orena wyrþe to Stangrunde & iii egeðan þreora orena
wyrþe, an man sealde to Niwantune, oþer to Geaceslea, þridde to
Stangrunde, & xv penegas wyþ beansæde to Geaceslea, & to oþrum
scipe to Witlesmere & wið nettum peniga, & nigon oran wið anum
mæder werde to Huntandune.
 11. An scip twegra orena wyrþ man sealde fram Elig to
Witlesige.
 12. Þæt is þonne ealles feorðe healf pund butun
þrittigun penega.
 13. Þonne dyde man æfter ðæm hundeahtatig swyna &
þone swan fram Middeltune.
 15. Þa geeahtade man þa swin to oðran healfan punde &
þone swan to healfan punde.
 16. & xii wænas myd hundeahtigum penegun, & iiii scipa
myd eahta oran ælc myd ii oran an man dyde to Niwantune, oþer to
Geaceslea, þridde to Stangrunde, feorðe to Witlesmere.
 19. & man sealde Ælfnoþe tyn mancusas goldes to mylenoxan
to Huntadune & Ælfsige munuce on fif mancesun goldes & Swetan an
pund to mylenoxan to Geaceslea & to x pund.
 22. & butan þæm se abbud sealde Ælfsige munuce to
fyrþrunge to þorniges are mancusa goldes.
 24. & v orena wæron to þrym mylnun to isene twegra orena
wyrþ to Huntandune, twegra to Geaceslea & anes to Stangrunde.
 26. Þæt is þonne ealles geseald of Elig to ðornige butun
hyra scrudfeo þe on golde & on seolfre syxtena punda wyrþ butun
feowertigum penegun.
 28. Þæs þe asme & marun.
 29. Þonne siþþan ofer þa xvi pund man sealde fram
Hæþfelda XXX ealdra swyna ælce to vi pænegum ofer.
 31. & man sealde wyþ þan æt þæm smyþe fif
mancusas gold & dware.
 32. & man sealde Cynesiges swystor mylen Bluntesham gehht.
 33. & ane dægan to Lindune to þiuwan.
 35. & butan þisum eallum þæt heron gewriten is ma
sealde/ ærest se bisceop þriu pund to Geaceslea to fyrþrunge & þa
man sealde þriu punda wyrþ goldes.
 37. Þa nam man þærof an pund to scrude, oþer to
Fearresheafde to dycynge, þæt þridde to fyrþrunge to Geaceslea.
 39. & man sealde Ælfsige munece lx mancusas & fif
pænega gerihta to Geaceslea to fyrþrunga.
 41. Nenien briht.
 42. Æt byryg xlvii ealdra swina & cc geongra butun ðrim.
 43. Æt Strætham xx sugena æt.
 43. Xx sugena & l hogga.
 43. Æt Horningesige xviii ealde swyn & xl hogga.
 44. Æt & xliiii hogga.
 45. Æt Hafucestune xxx ealdra swyna & c hogga butun i.
 46. Æt Meldeburnan xxii sugena, of þære heorde þe Alfwold
heold æt Hæðfelda xii sige & lxxxii geongra swina &
Ælfnoð of þære oþre heorde xiii sige & lx hogga.
 49. Of þæm feo þe æþelflæd sealde man sealde to
sceapum/ to Bromdune lx penega & lx penega.
 50. Iii oran Leofrice æt Strætham æt his corne x penega
ufan æt his.
 51. & x penega þæm sceaphyrde, healf pund þæm abbot,
healf pund Byryhtmære & Wulfrice.
 53. & oran æt i wife æt Strætham & æt twam
werum þærto & iii mancusas hyringmannum.
 55. Þa man betæhte Ælfnoðe þone folgað æt
Hæðfelda þa wæs þær xl oxana, þrydde healf hund sceapa, xlvii
gata & xv cealfra, cc swina butun x, xliii flicca.
 58. Þis is þæs fænnes hyre æt Fordham & æt
Hyllingyge þe get Eadgares sunu & æt Wulfsie, þæt sent iiii
ðusend.
 59. Of ðæm east fenne ii ðusend, pole xx snasa, of
tynadwere/ & of forwerde x snasa, of soþan ea & xx snasa, of
ladwere i þusend, of burhwere ðusend, of mudecanwere wewer & of
ðæm þusend, of sceld xiiii snasa, of were oðer healf, of wratwere
ii ðusend, of bulingge snasa, of batlin ðusend, of brade sealde xx snasa,
of Wulfgaringwere x snasa, of heamuces, of norþwere xx snasa, of Osgoding i
ðusend, of were ii ðusend, of i ðusend.
 69. Þis synd xxvi ðusend & xi sticcan.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 9.2
B16.9.2.
Ely, List of Freeholders: Pelteret 1986, 472-73.



 1. Dudda wæs gebur into Hæðfelda, & he hæfde þreo
dohtor, an hatte Deorwyn, oðer Deorswyð, þridde Golde.
 2. And Wullaf on Hæðfelda hæfð Deorwynne to wife, &
Ælfstan æt Tæccingawyrðe hæfð Deorswyðe to wife, &
Ealhstan Ælfstanes broðar hæfð Goldan to wife.
 4. Hwita hatte wæs beocere into Hæðfelda, & Tate hatte
his dohtor wæs Wulfsiges modor scyttan, & Lulle hatte Wulfsiges sweostar
Hehstan hæfð to wife on Wealadene.
 6. Wifus & Dunne & Seoloce syndan inbyrde to
Hæðfelda.
 7. Duding hatte Wifuse sunu sit on Wealadene.
 8. And Ceolmund hatte Dunnan sunu sit eac on Wealadene.
 8. And Æðeleah hatte Seolecan sunu sit eac on Wealadene.
 9. And Tate hatte Cenwaldes sweostor Mæg hæfð to wife on
Weligun.
 10. And Ealdelm Hereðryðe sunu hæfð Tatan dohtor to wife.
 11. Wærlaf hatte Wærstanes fæder wæs riht æht to
Hæðfelda, heold ða grægan swyn.
 12. Brada hatte wæs gebur to Hæðfelda.
 12. And Hwite hatte þæs Bradan wif wæs gebures dohtor to
Hæþfelda.
 13. Seo Hwite wæs Wærstanes & Wærðryðe &
Wynburge þridde modor.
 14. And se Wærstan sit æt Wadtune hæfð Winnes sweostor
to wife.
 15. And Wine hæfð Wærðryðe to wife.
 15. And Dunne sæt on Wadtune wæs inbyrde to Hæðfelda.
 16. And Deorwyn hatte hire dohtor hæfð Cynewald on Munddene to
wife.
 17. And Deornað hatte hire broðar bið mid Cynewalde.
 18. And Dudde hatte Wifuse dohtor sit æt Wilmundeslea.
 18. Cynelm hatte Cenwaldes fæder wæs gebur into
Hæðfelda.
 19. And Manna hatte Cenwaldes sunu sit æt Wadtune under
Eadwolde.
 20. Buhe hatte wæs Dryhtlafes moddrige wæs afaren ut of
Hæðfelda into Eslingadene.
 21. And Æþelwyn & Eadugu & Æþelgyð heo wæran
ðreo gesweostra.
 22. And Tilewine & Duda wæron ealle þære Buge bearn.
 23. And Ealhstan Tilewine sunu.
 23. And Wulfsige Eaduge sunu.
 23. And Ceolem Æþelgyðe sunu.
 23. And Ceolstan.
 24. And Manwine.
 24. Þis cyn com of Felda, Deorulf Cyneburhe sunu & his twa
sweostar, and Cynric æt Clæfring heora eam.
 25. Þas men synd Tatan magas æt Hæðfelda ðæs
gebures.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 9.3 (Rob 71)
B16.9.3.
Ely, Grant of Land: Robertson 1956, no. 71.



 1. Her is on þysse Crystes bec siu geswytelung þære healfre
hyde æt Pottune þe Ælfhelm Leofsige sealde hys goldsmiþe on lyfe
& æfter lyfe to atenne swa hym leofæst sy.
 3. Þonne wæron þas to gewitnesse þe heron geswyteliað,
Ælfhelm his hlaford, Byrhtnoþ abbod & Ælfgar munuc & Ælfhelm
se gunge & his twegen sunu, Æþelhric & Alfwold, & Wulfmær
þæs bisceopes broþar & Ælmær cild & Leofric æt
Holewelle & his sunu Godric & Æþelric æt Hernicwelle &
Ælfsige preost & his sunu & Osferþ preost.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 9.4 (Thorpe)
B16.9.4.
Ely, Guild Regulations: Thorpe 1865, 610.



 1. Her is on þis gewrite siu geswitelung þære gerædnisse
þe þius geferræden geræd hæfþ on þegna gilde on Grantabrycge.
 5. Þæt is þonne ærest, þæt ælc oþrum aþ on
haligdome sealde soþre heldrædenne for Gode & for worulde, & eal
geferræden þæm a fylste þe rihtost hæfde.
 10. Gif hwilc gegilda forþfære, gebrynge hine eal gegildscipe
ðær he to wilnie, & se þe þærto ne cume gylde syster huniges.
 14. And se gyldscipe hyrfe be healfre feorme þone forðferedan.
 16. And ælc sceote twegen pænegas to þære ælmessan.
 18. & man þærof gebrynge þæt gerise æt Sancte
Æþeldryþe.
 20. And gif þonne hwylcum gyldan þearf si his geferena
fultumes, & hit gecyd wyrþe þæs gildan nihstan gerefan, butun se
gilda sylf neah si, and se gerefa hit forgymeleasige gylde an pund.
 27. Gif se hlaford hit forgymeleasie gylde an pund, butun he on
hlafordes neode beo, oþþe legerbære.
 30. And gyf hwa gyldan ofstlea, ne si nan oþer butun eahta pund
to bote.
 33. Gif se stlaga þonne þa bote oferhogie, wrece eal gildscipe
þone gildan & ealle beran.
 36. Gif hit þonne an do, beran ealle gelice.
 37. And gif ænig gilda hwilcne man ofstlea, & he neadwraca
si, & his bismer bete.
 40. And se ofstlagana twelfhende sy fylste ælc gegylda healf
mearc to fylste.
 42. Gyf se ofstlagena ceorl si twegen oran, gif he Wylisc si, anne
oran.
 45. Gif se gilda þonne hwæne mid dysie & myd dole stlea,
bere sylf þæt he worhte.
 48. And gif gegilda his gegildan þurh his agen dysi ofstlea, bere
sylf wiþ magas þæt he bræc, & his gegilde eft mid eahta pundum
gebycge, oþþe he þolie a geferes & freondscipes.
 54. And gif gegilda myd þæm ete oððe drince þe his
gegildan stlog, butun hit beforan cyninge, oððe leodbisceope, oððe
ealdormen beo, gilde an pund, butun he ætsacan mæge mid his twam gesetlun
þæt he hine nyste.
 61. Gif hwilc gegilda oþerne misgrete, gylde anne syster
huniges.
 64. And gif hwa oþerne misgrete, gylde anne syster huniges butun
he hine mid his twam gesetlun geladie.
 67. Gif cniht wæpn brede, gilde se hlaford an pund, &
hæbbe se hlaford æt þæt he mæge.
 70. And him eal gildscipe gefylste þæt he his feoh of
hæbbe.
 72. And gif cniht oþerne gewundie, wrece hit hlaford, & eal
gyldscipe on, & sece þæt he sece, þæt he feorh næbbe.
 75. And gif cniht binnan stig sitte, gylde anne syster huniges.
 77. And gif hwa fotsetlan hæbbe do þæt ylce.
 79. And gif hwilc gegilda ut of lande forðfere, oððe beo
gesycled, gefeccan hine his gegildan.
 82. And hine gebringan deadne oððe cucene þær he to
wilnie.
 84. Be þæm ylcan wyte þe hit gecweden is.
 85. Gif he æt ham forðferð & gegilda þæt lic ne
gesecð.
 87. & se gegilda þe ne gesece his.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.1 (RobApp I 1)
B16.10.1.
Exeter, List of Books Given by Bishop Leofric: Robertson 1956, App. I, no. 1.



 1. Her swutelað on þissere Cristes bec hwæt Leofric biscop
hæfð gedon innto sancte Petres minstre on Exanceastre þær his
bisceopstol is.
 3. Þæt is þæt he hæfð geinnod þæt ær geutod
wæs þurh Godes fultum & þurh his forespræce & þurh his
gærsuma, þæt is ærost þæt land æt Culmstoke & þæt
land æt Brancescumbe & æt Sealtcumbe & þæt land æt Sancte
Maria circean & þæt land æt Stofordtune & æt Spearcanwille
& þæt land æt Morceshille & Sidefullan hiwisc & þæt
land æt Brihtricesstane & þæt land æt Toppeshamme þeahþe
Harold hit mid unlage utnam & þæt land æt Stoce & þæt land
æt Sydebirig & þæt land æt Niwantune & æt Norðtune
& þæt land æt Clist þe Wid hæfde.
 11. Ðonne ys þis se eaca on landum þe he hæfð of his
agenum þæt mynster mid gegodod for his hlaforda sawlum & for his
agenre þam Godes þeowum to bigleofan þe for heora sawlum þingian
sceolon, þæt ys ærost þæt land æt Bemtune & æt Esttune
& æt Ceommenige & þæt land æt Doflisc & æt Holacumbe
& æt Suþwuda.
 16. & he ne funde þa he to þam mynstre feng nan mare landes
þe ðider ynn gewylde wære þonne twa hida landes æt Ide &
þæron næs orfcynnes nan mare buton VII hruðeru.
 19. Ðonne ys þis seo oncnawenn is þe he hæfð God mid
gecnawen & sanctum Petrum into þam halgan mynstre on circlicum madmum.
 21. Þæt is þæt he hæfð þider ynn gedon ii biscop
roda & II mycele gebonede roda butan oðrum litlum silfrenum swurrodum
& II mycele cristes bec gebonede & III gebonede scrin & I geboned
altare & V silfrene caliceas & IIII corporales & I silfren pipe
& V fulle mæssereaf & II dalmatica & III pistelroccas & IIII
subdiacones handlin.
 27. And III cantercæppa & III canterstafas & V
pællene weofodsceatas & VII oferbrædelsas & II tæppedu &
III bera scin & VII setlhrægel & III ricghrægel & II wahreft
& VI mæsene sceala & II gebonede hnæppas & IIII hornas.
 31. And II mycele gebonede candelsticcan & VI læssan
candelsticcan gebonede & I silfren storcylle mid silfrenum storsticcan
& VIII læflas & II guðfana & I merc & VI midreca & I
firdwæn & I cyste & þær næron ær buton VII upphangene
bella.
 34. And nu þær sind XVI upphangene & XII handbella &
II fulle mæssebec & I collectaneum & II pistelbec & II fulle
sangbec & I nihtsang & I adteleuaui & I tropere.
 38. And II salteras & se þriddan saltere swa man singð on
rome & II ymneras & I deorwyrðe bletsingboc & III oðre & I
englisc christes boc & II sumerrædingbec & I winterræding boc
& <foreign>regula canonicorum</foreign>.
 41. And martyrlogium & I canon on leden & I scriftboc on
englisc & I full spelboc wintres & sumeres & Boeties boc on englisc
& I mycel englisc boc be gehwilcum þingum on leoðwisan geworht.
 44. & he ne funde on þam mynstre þa he tofeng boca na ma
buton ane capitularie & I forealdodne nihtsang & I pistelboc & II
forealdode rædingbec swiðe wake & I wac mæssereaf.
 47. & þus fela leden boca he beget innto þam mynstre,
<foreign>liber pastoralis & liber dialogorum & libri IIII prophetarum &
liber Boetii de consolatione & isagoge Prophirii & I passionalis &
liber Prosperi & liber Prudentii psicomachie & liber Prudentii ymnorum
& liber Prudentii de martyribus & liber Ezechielis prophete &
cantica canticorum & liber Isaie prophete</foreign> onsundron <foreign>& liber Isidori
ethimolagiarum & passiones apostolorum & expositio Bede super
euuangelium Luce & expositio Bede super apocalipsin & expositio Bede
super VII epistolas canonicas & liber Isidori de nouo et ueteri testamento
& liber Isidori de miraculis Christi & liber Oserii & liber
Machabeorum & liber Persii & Sedulies boc & liber Aratoris &
diadema monachorum & glose Statii & liber officialis Amalarii</foreign>.
 60. & ofer his dæg he ann his capellam þider binnan forð
mid him silfum on eallum þam þingum þe he silf dide mid Godes ðeninge
on þæt gerad þæt þa Godes þeowas þe þær binnan beoð
æfre his sawle gemunon mid heora gebedum & mæssesangum to Christe
& to Sancte Petre & to eallum þam halgum þe þæt halige minster
is fore gehalgod þæt his sawle beo Gode þe anfengre.
 65. & se þe ðas gyfu & þisne unnan wille Gode &
Sancte Petre ætbredan si him heofena rice ætbroden & si he ecelice
geniðerod into helle wite.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.2 (Hickes)
B16.10.2.
Exeter, List of Guild Members: Hickes 1705, Dissertatio epistolaris 18-19, corrected against MS. and partial transcripts in Thorpe 1865, 608-9 and Earle 1888, 264-6.



 1.1. On Cristes naman and Sanctus Petrus apostolus an gildscipe is
gegaderod on Wudebiriglande, and se biscop Osbern, and þa canonicas ealle
innan Sanctus Petrus minstre on Excestre habbað underfangen þone ilcan
geferscipe on broðorræddene gemænelice forð mid oðrum gebroðrum.
 1.6. Nu doð hig æt ælcum heorðe to gecnawnisse þam
canonicon anne penig to eastron ælce geare.
 1.8. And ealswa æt ælcum forðfarenum gildan æt ælcum
heorðe ænne penig to sawul sceote, hit bonda si hit wif þe on þam
gildscipe sindon.
 1.10. And þæt sawulgesceot sceulon þa canonicas habban, and
swilce þenisce don for hig swilce hig agon to donne.
 1.14. And ðis sindon heora nama þe beoð on þam gildscipe,
Brihtwi, Wlnoð, Ealdwine, Leofric, Brihtmær, Alfric, Edmær, Edwine,
Algar, Edwi, Wlword, Alword, Edwine, Godwi, Osgod, Aðeleoue, Brihtmær,
Godric.
 2.1. On Wudebiriglande is eac an oðer gildscipe gegaderod criste
and sancte Petre, and hig doð to martinus mæssan of ælcum heorðe anne
penig into sanctus Petrus minstre þam canonicon.
 2.4. And ælc sawulgesceot ealswa æt ælcum heorðe ænne
penig.
 2.5. And ðis sint þæra manna nama, Kytel, ðeodric,
ðurwurd, Ailnoþ, Ailmer, Wulmer, Ailric, Alfgær, Sæwine, Alwine,
Edric, Alwi, Alword, Hierding, Edmær, Godwine, Colswein, Brihtric, Edwine
ælword preost Soemer.
 3.1. Of Colatunes gildscipe, Ordric preost, Almær, Ailwine,
Alword, Aðesta, Godric, Algær, Alfric, Osmær, Hiaðemær, Siric,
Wulword, Ailric, Edric, Alfrid, Almær.
 4.1. Of Clifttunes gildscipe, Isaac preost, Almær, Godwine,
Alwine, Brihtric, Beorning, Hierding, ðeodric and ðeodric, Edrun, Gladwine,
Aluwi, Leowine, Sæwor, Toui, Hemming, Sæiuue, Ailric, Alwine, Edrun,
Ailword, and Lifgine, Edwine, Alfric and Alfric, Edwine, Edgiue, Wlfric and
Wlfric, Wada, Godwine, Alword, Alwine, Hunewine, Ailword, Ailiue, Lifgiue,
Ealdgið, Lifgun, Gunhild, Ailhild, Aluið, Edgiue, Lifgiue, Edgiue.
 5.1. Of Alwines gildscipe on Wudebirig, Alfstan, leowine, Alfric,
Ailwine, Aðelhild, Ailric, ðureword, Algær, Sigær, Aluið, Edmær,
Alword, Fræwine, Dirling, Leowi, Godwine, Edwine, Brihtwine, Ordric,
Brungær, Alwine, Særic, Godwine, Algær, Hierding, Algær, Edwine,
Viuet, Alwine, Edgiue.
 6.1. Of Bridafordes gildscipe, Edwine, Wlfric, Sæwine
Sæmær, Edwine and Edwine, Alfric, Leofwine, Ailric, Leofric, Alwine,
Edmær.
 7.1. Of Cliftwike, Wlatere preost, Edmær, Leowine, Sænoð,
Swein, King, Ailword, Algær, Særic, Edwi, Edwine, and Edwine, Edwi,
Siword, Edwine, Ailmær, Dunning, Godwine, Snelling, Dirwine, Godwine,
Sæwine, Edric, Bruning, Sæwi, Selewi, Ordgiue, Edgiue.
 8.1. Of þam gildscipe on lege, Ailwine preost, Tyrri, preost,
Willm, Alfred, Gosfræg, Ailword, Edwine, Osged, Osword, Godric, Brihtric,
Cola, Wunric, Ailsi, Alword, Alnoð, Algær, Leofric, Dirling, Brihtric,
Bilehald, Lifgiue, Estmær, Limmær, Ailwine, Godric, Sexman, Rocgere,
Siword.
 9.1. Of Hnutwille, Godric, Alwine, Godwine, Godric, Wlfric, Alfric,
Leofric, Dunewine, Algær, Edwine, Edgið.
 10.1. Of Colatune, Alwine Tredda sunu, Godric, Ailric, and Beorn,
Brihtmær, Almær, Ordric, Dirwine, Wurma, Dunning, Siword, Alfric.
 11.1. Of Sidemuða, Algar, Ailric, Wlwine, Wnking, Ailmær,
Edwi, Brihtric, Alfric, Alwi, Luduwine, Kinstu, Wlfric, Ailric, Kipping,
Edwine, Alfgiue, Edgið, Alfgiue, Edwine, Osword, Alfric, Alwi, Alwine,
Leowine, Almær, Sceott, Leowine.
 12.1. Of Halsforda Ilberd preost, Edwine, Alwine, Wlword,
Limmær, Ailmær, Leofric, Edwine, Edwi and Edwi, Edwine, Leofwine, Fugel,
Edwine, Ealdwine, Edwine, Ailword, Ordulf, Sæword, Algær, and Limmær.
 13.1. Of Hwitastane, Edzi, Godric, Edwine, Leowine, Aluric,
Ealdwine, Alwine, Sæwi, Sægar, Wlwi, Algar, Edwi, Kari, Wiking, Wnning,
Siword, Alword, Ailwine, Leowine.
 14.1. Of Axamuða, Godgið, Esgar, Edrid, Ailward, Ailwine,
Leowine, Sænoð, Wiking, Herman, Edword, Sceggi, Atli, Sæword, Rotbert,
Siword.

Rec 10.3 (Thorpe)
B16.10.3.
Exeter, Notice of Guild Assembly: Thorpe 1865, 613.



 1. Þeos gesamnung is gesamnod on Exanceastre, for Godes lufun
& for usse saule þearfe, ægþer ge be usses lifes gesundfulnesse, ge
eac be þæm æfteran dægun þe we to Godes dome for us sylfe beon
willaþ.
 8. Þonne habbaþ we gecweden þæt ure mytting sie þriwa on
XII monðum ane to Sancte Michaeles mæssan, oþre siðe to Sancte Marian
mæssan ofer midne winter, þriddan siþe on eall hælegna mæssedæg
ofer Eastron.
 15. And hæbbe ælc gegilda II sesteras mealtes, & ælc
cniht anne, & sceat huniges.
 18. And se mæssepreost asinge twa mæssan, oþre for þa
lyfigendan frynd, oþere for þa forðgefarenan, æt ælcere mittinge.
 22. And ælc gemænes hades broður twegen salteras sealma,
oðerne for þa lifgendan frynd, oþerne for þa forðgefarenan.
 26. And æt forðsiðe ælc monn VI mæssan oððe VI
salteras sealma, & æt suþfore ælc mon V peningas.
 29. And æt husbryne ælc mon anne peningas.
 31. And gif hwylc man þone andagan forgemeleasige, æt forman
cyrre III messan, æt oþerun cyrre V, æt þriddan cyrre ne scire his
nan mon butun hit sie for mettrumnesse, oððe for hlafordes neode.
 38. And gif hwylc monn þone andagan oferhebbe æt his gescote,
bete be twifealdun.
 40. And gief hwylc monn of þis geferscipe oþerne misgrete,
gebete mid XXX peningum.
 43. Þonne biddaþ we for Godes lufun þæt ælc mann
þæs gemittinge mid rihte healde, swa we hit mid rihte gerædod
habbaþ.
 47. God us to þæm gefultumige.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.6.1 (Thorpe)<extent></extent>
B16.10.6.1.
Exeter, Manumissions: Thorpe 1865, 634.



 1. Her cyþ on þissere bec þæt Gedmer Spernægles sune
hæfð alised Leofilde his maga ut of Toppesham lande mid IIII & XX
penuge at Ceolrice, Heordinges gereua Eadnoðes sune.
 7. And þærto is gewittnes, Ælwine preost, & Ailword
Pudding, & Heording, & his broðras, & Wulword at Iacobes circan,
& Huga se ræda.
 12. And eall þæt hundred at Toppeshamme.
 13. And se þe þis undo, habbe Godes curs, & Sancta Maria,
efre butan ende.
