START_TEXT

Rec 10.6.2 (Dickins-Earle)<extent></extent>
B16.10.6.2.
Exeter, Manumissions: Dickins 1950, 366 and Earle 1888, 257-64.



 1.1. Her kið on þissere bec þat Aluric se canonica of
Execestre alisde Reinold at Herberde & at his cilden & at geal hira
ofspringe mid II scillingen.
 1.3. And Aluric hine clipað freoh & saccles a tune & of
tune for godes luue.
 1.4. And ðis is seo gewitnisse, Iohan alurices sune, & Nicole
& Ailric & Randolf, Alword cild, Osbern clopeles sune Ricard a paules
stret, & Ricard theodbaldes meg, & Andreu & Serle, & Saluin
& Seric & Huberd Randolf cotes sune.
 1.8. Osbern Hod Pilegrim Ialebriht Gesfrei se coc & Pierres se
niulier Ailric, & Gales.
 1.9. And se þe þis undo, habbe he godes curs & Sancte
Marie & sanctes Petres & ealle Cristes halgena a butan ende.
 1.11. Amen.
 2.1. Her kyð on þissere becc þæt Rotberd apoldraham
cwæð saccles Willelm his broðer sune of poldraham lande & of elcre
craurigge.
 2.3. Ðar to is iwitnis Reinald preost, & Dunnig, &
Dalfin, & Seuara, & Sewi, & Girard, & Willelm merescald, &
Ricard a cuic, & Wulfricc wig, & Rau sculdur, & Ricard gealdulesc,
& Herberd, & Segar, & Alger inna busc, & Alger se webba, &
Willelm se webba, Rogere se stiwerd, & Rotberd wianard, & Ricard osanna
sune/. & Semer swetleðer, & Iohel uppa cote, & Ascetill, &
Rotberd edwies meg.
 2.8. Se ðe þiss eure undo, habbe he Godes curs, & sancta
Maria, & ealle Cristes gecorena, a butan ende.
 2.10. Amen.
 3.1. Her kyð on þissere boc þæt Oter & his cild cwede
saccles Aluric þane Reda, & his ofspring.
 3.2. And þarto is iwitnis Alword preostes, & Alured preost,
& Waltere se canon.
 3.3. And Theodbald, & Semer Cipspones sune, & Waltere se
Flemig, & Gesfrei Hoel, & Randolf se cordewaner, & Alwine Modi,
& Alwi Kya, and Alger Oxawamb, & Ailwerd, & Iordan, & Martin,
& Osbern Hauoc, & Willemot Quikeuot.
 3.8. And Ricard se Flemig nam feor penegas to tolle.
 3.9. Se þe þiss mare undo, habbe he Godes curs, & Sancta
Maria, and ealle Cristes gecorena, a butan ende.
 3.11. Amen.
 4.1. Her kið on þissere becc þæt Gesfrei Foliot cweð
saccles Semer Aluredes mæg & eall his ofsprig.
 4.2. And þar to ys iwitnis Ricard se portreua, & Rau
Theodbiscop, & Waltere de sune odin, & Willelm pafard, & Willelm
spalla, & Ailwerd sadelhack, & Seuara, & Edmer Burwolles sune.
 4.5. Seðe þis undo, habbe he Godes curs, & sancte Marie,
& ealle Cristes halgena, a butan ende.
 4.7. Amen.
 5.1. Her kyð on þissere becc þæt Aðelicc Ricardes
swuster scirreua cwæð Hrodolf Sewies sune an Alfintune saccles of elcre
crauigge.
 5.3. Ðar to is iwitnis Ricard se portreua, & Willelm Lambr,
Dunnig, Eorlawine, Reiner, Aluric Spoe, Rotberd Puddig, Wiggere, Dalfin,
Gotselin gorpittel, Leggefot, Iohan, Osbern Ceaca, Rotbern Sceanca, Brihtric,
Ailword Algar sune, Ricard Trencard, Iordan se preostbiscop, Ricard, &
eall þæt hundred of Alfint.
 5.9. Se þe þis undo, habbe he Godes curs, & Sancte Marie,
& ealle Cristes halgena, a butan ende.
 5.10. Amen.
 6.1. Her kið on þissere bec þæt Waltere Wulwordes sune
ureode Aþeluue inna Sanctes Petres minstre ouer his fæder lic, his feder
saule to alisednisse & his.
 6.3. On Viuienes gewitnisse, & mestre Odo, & mestre
Leowines, & Godwines preost, & Edwakeres, & his sune, & agealra
þara hadeda & leweda þe þar igge were.
 6.6. And se þe þiss undo habbe he Godes curs & þere
hlefdia Sancte Marie & Sanctes Petres & gealle Cristes halga, a butan
ende.
 6.8. Amen.
 7.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Gesfræg Feala sune
gebohte Gidiþ Edwiges docter at Alpsta on Wunforda.
 7.2. & at Neæle Pynceune to X scillingas freoh & sacles
ut of Wunforda.
 7.4. And Gyldeberd portgerefa nam þæt toll far þas kinges
hand.
 7.5. & ðys ys seo gewitnisse, Gedmær on Cuike, &
Sæger preost on Hefatriwe, & Randolf de Hage, & Roggere on Pynnoc,
& Morin at Gestgete, Riceard Alpstanes sune, & Wlfword hys broðer,
Godwine Leowines sune & Goda his broþer, & Geda, & Sægær,
Riceard Kykebeauw, & Edmær Norðman sun.
 7.10. And se þe þiss undo, hæbbe he Godes curs, & Sancta
Maria, & Sanctes Petres, & ealle Cristes halgena a butan ende.
 7.12. Amen.
 8.1. Her kyþ on þissere bec þæt Huberd on Clist cræfede
anne wifman þe Edit hatte Liuegeres wif mid unrihte, for þam Liueger hig
alisde ut at Gosfreige bisceope ealswa man sceolde freohne wifman.
 8.4. And ealswa hit hriht wæs on þam dagum ælcne freohne
man wiþ XXX peningas & Huberd wæs leosende þære wifmanne for his
unriht cræfinge þa & æfre mo, hig & eal hire ofspring.
 8.7. And þær to is gewittnis Willelm de Buhuz, & Ruold se
cniht, & Osbern Fadera, & Unfreig de Tettaborna, & Alword
portgereua, & Iohan se cniht, & Rau Foleard.
 8.10. & þeos spæc wæs innan Willelmes bure de Buhuz on
Excestre gespæce.
 9.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Willelm de la Brugere
cwæð saccles Wulwærd ðane webba, inna tune and ut of tune of elce
crafigge.
 9.3. & þar to is iwitnis, Rau Teodberhtes sune, &
Teodberhtes his sune & Atsun se hwita, Hroðolf Alca sune, Hemeri cuta
kig, Philippe pagenes sune, Ricard alka sune, Geffrei hoel,Herbð, &
Gollein, Ailwerd faber & his broðer, Rau de Salcei, Herlawine, Brihtmer
uidic.
 9.7. Se þe þis mare undo habbe he Cristes curs & sancte
Maria, & ealle Cristes halgena a butan ende.
 9.8. Amen.
 11.1. Her kið on þissere becc þæt Willelm bisceop of
Execestre cwæð Wulfric Pig freoh & saccles of þa lande a Teigtune a
þane dæg þe ma dide Osbern bisceop, & Leofric bisceop of þa gealla
minstre inna þæt niwe, & hine freode for Godes luue, & Sanctæ
Mariæ, & ealle Cristes halgena, & for þara bisceopa saule, &
for his saule to alisednesse.
 11.7. Ðar to is iwitniss, Algar se bisceop of Constance, & se
prior of Plimtune, & se prior of Tantune, & se prior of Sanctes Nichol
minster, & se prior of Sanctes Andreas, & Leowine se canon, &
Waltere preost, & Willelm preost, & Rodberd se Blund, & Aluric
preost, & Osbern se kapellan, Willelm & Osbern, Willelm & Guufreg
os/, & Barthol, Odo, & Hugo ou, & Hugo oc, Willelm Edwardes
sune/, Alger Liffels sune, & Iordan his sune, Randolf & Rau mahtille
sune/, Waltere dan, Osbern hauoc, Ascetil buta port, Seuara jalewa sune,
Dunnig, Rau Theodbiscop, Teodbald, Willelm selewies sune, & fela oðra
þe ma nemnia ne meg.
 11.16. Se þe þis efre undo, habbe he Godes curs, & Sancta
Maria, & ealle Cristes gecorena, a butan ende.
 11.17. Amen.
 12.1. Her cyð on þissere bec þæt Bruning Cola sunu gebohte
Roting æt Colewyne & æt Leofa, freoh & sacleas ut of Sceft
beara.
 12.3. On Særla gewytnisse þæs portgereua, & on
Huberdes, & on ælwerdes, & on ælgares Paiardes, & on
Wyllelmes his suna, & on Godwynes Colwines suna, & on Esbernes
ælwerdes suna.
 12.6. And hebbe he Godes curs þe þis æfre undo.
 12.7. Amen.
 13.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Teolling gebohte
ælword Stamera & Edwine his broðor æt Coluwine to VII mancson to
cepe & to tolle.
 13.3. And ælword portgerefa nam þæt toll.
 13.4. And her to is gewitnesse Uiðel æt Culumtune &
Sæwulf & Uitula & Eadmund preost & Snelling Tullinges sunu &
Leowine Leowerdes broðor & ælfgar Helle bula.
 13.7. And hæbbe he Godes curs þe þis æfre undo a on
ecnisse.
 13.8. Amen.
 14.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Leowine Lundenisca &
Ialdgið his wif gebohton ælfilde æt Touie to feower & sixtuge
penegon.
 14.3. And ælfric Hals nam þæt toll innan Touies bure for
þæs kynges hand.
 14.4. And her to is gewitnesse Roðsalin preost, & Ailword
diacon, & Alwine diacon, & Dunstan Peoning.
 15.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Wulword bohte Leouede
æt Hierdinge Eadnoðes sune wið V scillingas to cepe & to tolle.
 15.3. And þæt toll nam Garwise gerefa to Toppeshamme.
 15.3. On Smewines gewitnesse preost,es, & on Alwines preost
& on Ailwordes æt Oteri, & on Dunninges Tailiferes, & on
Ailwordes Liuinges sunu & on Dunewines, & on Godwines æt Hina tune,
& on Hierdinges, & on Brihtmares Alfgares suna.
 15.8. & se þe þiss undo habbe he Godes curs a butan ende.
 15.9. Amen.
 16.1. Her kið on þissere bec þæt Regenere bohte Alfiðe
at Regenolde þam muneke at Cuicu wið V scillingas freoh & sacles uppan
Cuiclande to beonde on fridome.
 16.3. On Edmæres gewitnesse preost & on Edwines þas gereua
& on Roberdes, & on Agelrices at Stanlince, & on ealles þas
hundredes on Cuicu.
 16.6. And Alfric Hals nam þæt toll.
 16.6. And habbe Godes curs þe hit æfre undo.
 16.7. Amen.
 17.1. Her kið on þissere bec þæt Sewine Pinca bohte hine
silfne to X scillingas at Willelme, on Edmæres gewitnisse preoste & on
Edwines, & on Tailiferes, & on Rodberdes and ealles þas hundredes on
Cuicu.
 17.4. And Alfric Hals nam þæt toll.
 17.5. And habbe he Godes curs þe hit æfre undo.
 17.5. Amen.
 18.1. Her cyð on þisse bec þa Osbern biscop halgode Sancta
Maria portic.
 18.2. Þa freode Folcard þær Agelwine his man & his of
spring Criste to lofe & Sancta Maria & his sawle alisednisse.
 18.4. And let him ceosa hlaford loc hwær hig wolde, &
hæbbe he Godes curs & ealra halgena þe þis æfre undo.
 18.6. Amen.
 19.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt Liueger se bacestere on
Excestre alysde an wifman Ediþ hatte, Godrices dohter Cocraca ut of Clist
lande at Gosfreige bisceope to XXX peningas æfre ma freoh & saccles, heo
& eal hire ofspring.
 19.4. And Gesfreig bisceop wæs hlaferd ofer Clist land on þam
dagum.
 19.6. And þærto is gewitnis Colswein & Roger on Buin,
& Hereberd on Clist, & Edric se cipa.
 19.7. And se þe þis undo hæbbe he Godes wræðe a butan
ende.
 19.8. Amen.
 20.1. Her cyð on þissere bec þæt Huscarl lisde hine silfne
wið ealuwb mid XL peningas on Godwines gewitnesse preost, & on Alwordis
portirefa, & on Ealdrides his suna, & on Osbern & on Walteres his
broðra, & on Sæmæris, & Godwine preost, & Swegn.
 20.5. And Wulfet namon þæt toll for þas cinges hand, &
for Særles þe þa was portigerefa.
 20.6. Godes curs he habbe þe hit æfre undo.
 20.7. Amen.
 21.1. Her cyð on þissere bec þæt Leowine Feala sunu bohte
hine silfne & his ofspring æt Wulfworde Alfrices sunu at Iacobes cyrca
to healfe punde.
 21.3. On Willelmes gewitnesse preostes, & on Godwines preoste
& on Arnoldes preost & on Edwines preost, & on Bartholomeus
Floheres suna, on Floheres, & on Algares Pagardes, & on Cona, &
Algares Leoflæde suna, & Haim, & Oter Dirlinges sunu, Edwacer,
Agelword Ofstanes sunu, Osber, Alwordes sunu, Alfsta on Wunforda, Edwi, Nobol,
Ocing, Agelword Pudding diac, & on ealles þas hundredes on Excestre to
ceosende him hlaford & his ofspring swa hwær swa hig woldon.
 21.12. And Alword portgerefa & Alwine Dirlinges aþum fangon
to þam tolle for þæs cynges hand.
 21.13. & habbe he Godes curs & ealra halgena þe þis
æfre undo.
 22.1. Her cyð on þissere bec þæt Ediþ Leofrices docter
Locces bohte hi silue & hire ofspring at Hul to IIII & XX peningas on
Willelmes gewittnisse stiwerdes, & on Agilwerdes Wudinges, & on Edmeres
preostes, & on Edwies Hreawa sun, & on Huscarles, & on Algeres
þrcge/ Godwines preost, & on Leowines Lundeniscea.
 22.6. And habbe he Godes curs & ealra halgena þe hit æfre
undo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.6.3.1 (Kem 1353)<extent></extent>
B16.10.6.3.1.
Exeter, Manumissions: Kemble 1839-48, no. 1353.



 1. Her cyð on þisse bec ðæt Humflæd gebohte Wulfgyþe
æt Ælfrice Æþestanes suna Æþelminges on Winemines gewitnisse
ealdportgerefan, and on Godrices his suna, and on Ælfwines Mannan suna, and
on Leofrices Cildes æt Nymed, and on Ælfrices Ælfhelmes suna geongan.
 6. And Brun bydel nam þæt toll on ælfstanes gewitnisse
mæssepreostes and on Leofrices Winemines suna, and on ma.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.6.3.2 (Thorpe)<extent></extent>
B16.10.6.3.2.
Exeter, Manumissions: Thorpe 1865, 623.



 1. Eadwi cing het gefreon Abunet ælfnoð cyrceweard an
Exanceastre fryo & færewyrþe on Aþelwoldes ealdermannes gewitnesse,
& Daniel biscop, & Byrhtrices profastes, & on Wulfrices
cyrceweardes.
 8. And Eadwi cing het hit bryga Bryhtric her binnon Cristes bec.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.6.4 (Earle)<extent></extent>
B16.10.6.4.
Exeter, Manumissions: Earle 1888, 253-4.



 25.1. Halwun hoce on excestre freode hægelflæde hire wimman
þi hy bocte & tilde for hire sawuale crist & sancte peter & ialle
cristes halga him wurþe wrað þe hi hæfre ge þywie.
 25.3. Amen.
 26.1. Her kyð on þisse bec þæt æilgyuu gode alysde hig
& dunna & heora ofspring, æt mangode to XIII mancson.
 26.2. & æignulf portgerefa & Godric gupa namon þæt
toll on manlefes gewittnisse, & on leowerdes healta, & on leowines his
broþor, & on ælfrices map happes, & on sweignis scyldwirhta.
 26.5. And hæbbe he godes curs, þe þis æfre undo a on
ecnysse, Amen.
 27.1. Her kyð on þyssere bec þæt godwine blaca bohte hine
sylfne & his wyf & his ofspring æt willelme hosethe mid XV
scillingas on edmæres gewittnisse preost, & on ælwies & on
dunninges, & on sæmæres, & on ælmæres, & on ealles
þæs hundredes on cuic lande, & ælfric hasl nam þæt toll for
þæs kynges hand.
 27.5. And hæbbe he godes curs þe hit æfre undo amen.
 28.1. Her kyð on ðysse bec þæt edwy beorneges sunu lysde
hyne and his wif and his cyld on edwerdes dæge cynges æt hunewine hega
suna ut of toppes hamme lande.
 28.3. A kynstanes gewittnesse preost, and a leofsuna gewittnisse a
wunforda & an ælfrices hwita & on wycinges batswegenes, & on
sæwines lufa sunu & on leofsies & on ælfsies.
 29.1. Her kyð on þissere bec þæt ediuuu sæuugeles laf
bohte gladu æt colewine wyð healfe punde to cepe & to tolle.
 29.2. And ælword portgerefa nam þæt toll.
 29.3. And þær to was gewitniss leowine leowordes broðor
& ælwi blaca & ælwine se cyng & land byriht & Alca, &
Sæwerd, & hæbbe he godes curs þe þis æfre undo on ecnisse.
 29.5. Amen.
 30.1. Her cyð on þisse bec þæt brihtmær æt holacumbe
hæfð geboht hine & ælfgifu his wif & hira cild, & hira
ofspring æt rocgere derindig to twam pundum æfre to freolse.
 30.3. On dudemannes gewitnisse preostes on exancestre & on
leofwines preostes on hwita stane, & on ælfgæres portgerefa &
ælfwærdes portgerefa þe þæt toll namon for þæs cynges hand
& leofwærdes his broðor & edwines leofede suna & oteres
dyrlinges suna, & ælfgæres ælfrices suna, & blakemanes &
leofrices sæwines suna & dunstanes sæwines suna, & randolfes,
& alboldes, & smewines on holacumbe, & ægilwærdes ælfsies
suna, & ælfmær cynges suna, & ælfsiges mid þam berde &
edwine leofrices suna & edwine edmæres suna, & edric on hremna
hricge & on ealles þæs hundrides gewitnisse on holacumbe.
 30.11. And hæbbe he cristes curs & sancta marian &
sanctus petre þe þis æfre undo.
 30.12. And on ealles þæs hundrides gewitnisse on exancestre.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.7 (Earle)
B16.10.7.
Exeter, Permission to Ring Bells: Earle 1888, 260.



 1. Wita ða þe nu beoð & ða te cumene sy þat yc Osbern
Execestres biscop gef leaua ðam munche on Sancte Nicholaus minstre to
hringinde hyre tyde be dage & be nihte, hwanne hy efre willat swa swa
belympð to hire andebernisse, bute an Cristes masseniht, & giester
sunneue, & Sancte Petres and Paules massedeg.
 7. And þeos leaua þurh hyre abbed Henri, & to foran him
& his munchun & to foran eallum mynum canunche innan minum capitule of
myne & hyre eallre helf swa fastlice ys ysett, þat non man after þys
ðas ysettinge undon ne mage.
 11. And for þyse leaua, twygys elce gere þat is an
Palmsunnendeg, & Cristes upstigan deg, to processiun mid þam canunche hy
gan sceule.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.8 (Forst)
B16.10.8.
Exeter, List of Relics: Forster 1943, 63-80.



 1. Her swutelað on þisum gewrite be þam halgum reliquium,
þe æþelstan se wurðfulla kyning geaf into sancta Marian & sancte
Petres mynstre on Exancestre, Gode to lofe for his sawle alisednisse &
eallum þamþe þa halgan stowwe gesecað & gewurðiað, to ecere
hæle.
 6. Wytodlice se ilca kyning æðelsta, þaþa he æfter his
fæder Edwarde cynerice onfeng & þurh Godes gife ana geweold ealles
Englalandes, þe ær him manege cyningas betwix heom hæfdon, þa com he
on sumne sæl hider to Exancestre, swaswa hit of soðfæstra manna sage
gefyrn gesæd wæs.
 10. And he ongan smeagan & þeahtian, hwæt him sælost
wære to geforðienne of his cynelicum madmum Gode to lofe & him silfum
& his ðeode to ecere þearfe.
 13. Se ælmihtiga God, þaþe eallum þamþe wel þencaþ
simle is fultum & firþriend, gesende þam godan cyninge þone geþanc
on, þæt he mid þam gewytendlicum madmum þa unateoriendlican madmas
begitan sceolde.
 16. He sende þa ofer sæ getriwe men & gesceadwise.
 17. And hig ferdon swa wide landes swa hig faran mihton & mid
þam madmum begeaton þa deorwurðestan madmas, þe æfre ofer eorðan
begitene mihton beon, þæt wæs haligdom se mæsta of gehwilcum stowum
wydan & sydan gegaderod.
 21. And hig þone þam foresædan cyninge brohton & se
cyning mid micelre blysse Gode þæs þancode.
 23. He bebead þa, þæt man her on Exancestre,
þærþær him ær God þone nyttwirðan geþanc onbesende, mynster
aræran sceolde Gode to wurðminte & þære heofenlican cwene sancta
Marian, Cristes meder, & sancte Petre, þæra apostola ealdre, þone se
ylca cyning him to mundboran gecoren hæfde.
 27. And he geaf þiderinn six & twentig cottlifa & þone
þryddan dæl þæs foresædan haligdomes þyderinn let don his sawle
to ecere alysednisse & eallum þam to hylpe, þe þa halgan stowwe, þe
se haligdom on is, mid geleafan gesecað & wurðiaþ.
 32. Nu wille we eow segcan butan ælcere leasunge, hwæt se
haligdom is, þe her on þisum halgan mynstre is, & gewrytu forðmid
þe geswuteliað butan ælcere tweonunge, hwæt anra gehwilc þæra
haligdoma beo.
 36. Erost Of þam sylfan deorwyrðan treowe þære halgan
rode, þe Crist on þrowode & us ealle þæron of þæs deofles
anwalde alysde.
 39. Of Drihtenes byrgene.
 40. Of þam gyrlan, þe ure Drihten silf on him hæfde,
þaþa he her on worulde betwix mannum wæs.
 42. Of þære bynne, þe ure Drihten on læg, þaða he
wæs of sancta Marian acenned.
 44. Of Iordane, þe ure Drihten wæs on gefullod.
 45. Of þam spere, þe ures Drihtenes halige syd wæs mid
geopenod on þære rode.
 47. Of þam beode, þe se Hælend onuppan hine gereordode mid
his twelf apostolum.
 49. Of þære dune Synay, þærðær God anuppan atiwde
þam halgan Moyse & him ðær þa ealdan æ geswutelode.
 51. Of þam þornþifele, þe wundorlice barn & þeah
ungewemmed wæs fram ælcere bærninge, þaða God silf of þære
ilcan þyrnan spræc wið þone halgan Moysen.
 54. Of þære dune, þe ure Drihten onuppan fæste.
 55. Of þære candele, ðe Godes engel ontende mid heofenlicum
leohte æt ures Drihtenes sepulchre on easteræfen.
 57. Of þam altare, þe ure Drihten silf gehalgode.
 58. Of þære stowwe, þe ure Drihten wæs on geeacnod.
 59. Of Oliuetes dune, uppan þære se Hælend hine gebæd
gebigedum cneowwum to his heofenlican Fæder, ær his þrowunge, & eft
he of þære ilcan dune to heofenum astah.
 62. Of þam girlan þære heofenlican hlæfdian sancta
Marian.
 63. Of þam heafodclaðe þære ilcan Godes modor & of
hire fexe.
 65. Of sumere halignisse, þe se heahengel Michahel on eorþan
geswutelode.
 67. Of sanctus Iohannes lichaman þæs fulluhteres & of his
gewædum.
 69. Of sanctus Petrus apostoles berde.
 70. Of sanctus Petres fexe.
 71. Of sanctus Petrus girlan.
 72. Of sanctus Paules apostoles swurbane & of his claðon.
 73. Of sanctus Andreas stafe þæs apostoles.
 74. Of sanctus Iohannes claðon þæs apostoles &
godspelleres, þe ure Drihten to ðon swiðe lufode, þæt he æt his
gereorde uppan his breost hlinode.
 76. And þaða he on þære rode for us ðrowode, þa
betæhte he þam ilcan Iohanne, his dyrlinge, sancta Mariam, his leofan
modor, þæt he hire begiman sceolde.
 79. Eac her is of þam heofenlican mete, þe wæs funden on
Iohannes byrgene þæs apostoles.
 81. Of sanctus Bartholomeus heafde þæs apostoles.
 82. Of sanctus Iacobes reliquion þæs apostoles.
 83. Of sanctus Stefanes heafde þæs forman Cristes martyres
& of his halgan blode & of þam stane, ðe he wæs mid oftorfod.
 85. Of sancto Oflamno þam martyre, þe wæs Petrus mæg
þæs apostoles.
 87. Of sanctus Laurentius reliquion þæs æðelan martyres
& of þam glædon þe he wæs mid for Cristes naman gebrædd.
 90. Of sancto Uincentio þam dyacone & martyre.
 91. Of sanctus Georgies banum þæs mæran Cristes cempan
& martyres.
 93. Of sancte Sebastiane þam martyre manege ban.
 94. Of reliquion þæra twegra broðra & martyra Tyburtius
& Ualerianes.
 96. Of sancto Urbane þam papan & martyre.
 97. Of sancto Apollonare þam biscope & martyre.
 98. Of sancte Candides banum þæs martyres.
 99. Of sanctus Mauricies reliquion ðæs martyres.
 100. Of sancto Quintino þam martyre.
 101. Of þam martyrum Luciane & Maximiane.
 102. Of sancto Quirino martyre.
 103. Of sancto Cornelio þam papan & martyre.
 104. Of sancto Marcelle.
 105. Of sancto Petre þam martyre.
 106. Of sancto Iuliane þam martyre.
 107. Of reliquion sanctus Cyriaces þæs wurðfullan dyacones
& martyres.
 109. Of reliquion Crisantes þæs martyres & Darian þæs
mædenes.
 111. Of sancto Geruasie þam martyre.
 112. Of sancto Christofore þam martyre.
 113. Of sancte Conones lichaman þæs martyres.
 114. Of sancto Uite þam martyre.
 115. Of þam deorwirðum martyrum Crispine & Crispiniane.
 116. Of sanctus Nicasies reliquion þæs martyres.
 117. Of sancte Iuuenales reliquion & of his earme.
 118. Of sancto Tiburtio þam martyre.
 119. Of sancte Uiuianes blode þæs martyres.
 120. Of þam martyre Eresie.
 121. Of sanctus Benignes banon þæs martyres.
 122. Of sancto Pancratio þam æðelan martyre.
 123. Of sancto Desiderio þam martyre.
 124. Of sancto Iusto þam martyre.
 125. And of sancte Ladio.
 126. Of sancto Felice þam papan.
 127. Of sanctus Cesaries banum þæs martyres & of his
claðon.
 128. Of sancte Eustachie þam martyre.
 129. Of sanctus Eadwardes reliquion þæs cyninges, þe wæs
unsceððig acweald.
 130. Ac hine siððan Crist wurðode mid mænigfealdum
tacnum.
 132. Eac her beoð manegra martyra reliquias, þe on Hierusalem
for Cristes naman wæron gemartyrode.
 134. Of sancto Uitale þam unoferswiðodan martyre, se wæs swa
cucu for Cristes naman on eorðan bedolfen & þær mid eorðan &
stanum to deaðe ofhroren.
 136. Ac he lifað nu mid blisse on þam heofenlican rodere, &
eallum, þamþe her on eorðan mid geleafan to him clypiað, to Criste
þingað welwillendlice.
 139. Her is eac sanctus Mauricies toþ þæs eadigan martyres,
þe under Maximiane þam casere for Cristes naman þrowode.
 140. And sixðusend & six & sixtig martyra forð mid him
þrowedon, þæge ealle þurh his tyhtinge to þam wuldorbeage
martyrdomes becomon.
 144. Þis sind eac þa reliquias þæra haligra confessorum,
þæt is Cristes andettera, þæge forsegon þas swicolan woruld &
mid stiðre drohtnunge þæt heofenlice rice geearnodon.
 147. Erost of sanctus Martines reliquion þæs wuldorfullan
biscopes, seþe her on life betwix manegum oðrum tacnum þri men of deaðe
to life arærde mid his gebedum.
 150. Of sancto Siluestre þam wurðfullan papan.
 151. Of sancto Gregorie.
 152. Of sancto Hieronime þam æþelan lareowe, seþe betwix
oðrum mænigfealdum bocum, þe he gedihte, þa mycelan bibliothecan, on
ðære beoð twa & hundseofentig boca, of ebreisce & of greccisce
to ledene æðelice awende.
 156. Of reliquion sanctus Augustines þæs wisan & þæs
snoteran biscopes, se gedihte an þusend boca Criste to lofe & ealre
Cristes gelaðunge to ecere nyttwirðnisse.
 159. Of sancte Germane þam apostolican were, þe on þisum
lande & eac on oðrum landum gehwær manege wundra ðurh God geworhte.
 162. Of sanctus Basilius toðe & of his biscopstafe.
 163. Of sanctus Euurties lichaman þæs biscopes, þam atiwde
<foreign>dextera Dei</foreign>, þæt is Godes swiðre, þaðe he mæssode & þa
offrunge mid heofenlicre bletsunge gebletsode.
 166. Of sanctus Audoenes reliquion.
 167. Of sancte Medardes banum þæs biscopes.
 168. Of sancto Crispino.
 169. Of sancte Maurilie þam biscope.
 170. Of sancto Galle þam biscope.
 171. Of sancto Lupo ðam biscope.
 172. Of sancte Benedicte þam halgan abbude.
 173. Of sancte Remigies reliquion þæs deorwirðan biscopes,
þe eall Francrice to Cristes geleafan gebigde, & of his kæppan &
of his tunecan & of his hæran, ðe he werode.
 176. Of sancte Anianes lichaman þæs halgan biscopes.
 177. Of sancte Maximines lichaman confessoris.
 178. Of sanctus Wulframnes reliquion þæs biscopes.
 179. Of sancto Crispo.
 180. Of sanctus Nicolaus reliquion þæs arfæstan &
þæs bentyðan biscopes, þe þurh Godes mihte manege godnissa gehwær
kyð on sæ & on lande, þamþe him innwerdlice mid geleafan on Godes
naman to clypiað.
 184. Of sancte Petroces banum & of his fexe & of his
claðon.
 185. Of sancte Winwaloe þam abbode.
 186. Of sancte Winarde þam biscope.
 187. Of sancte Wernoco.
 188. Of sancte Wigenoce.
 189. Of sancte Tutes hæron ðæs biscopes.
 190. Of sanctus Odones reliquion þæs mæran biscopes.
 191. Sancte Iuuenales earm þæs biscopes.
 192. Of sancte Dyonetes earme þæs biscopes.
 193. Of sancte Ipotemies earme, Cristes andetteres.
 194. Of sancte Concanes heafde & of his earme.
 195. Of sancte Designates reliquion.
 196. Sanctes Auites ribb þæs biscopes.
 197. Of sanctus Melanies banon þæs biscopes.
 198. Of sancte Wiðenoces lichaman þæs biscopes.
 199. Of sancte Valerianes reliquion.
 200. Of sancte Tuduale.
 201. Of sancte Simeones sepulchro.
 202. Of þam stane, þe sanctus Siluinus bær ðriwa to Rome.
 203. Of sancte Saluines claðon.
 204. Of sancte Maioce & sancte Ermelane.
 205. Of sancte Liudgere þam biscope.
 206. Of sancte Sigebrane.
 207. Of sancte Marcelle þam deorwirðan Cristes halgan & of
sancte Viuiane.
 209. Of sancte Wulmare þam halgan abbode.
 210. Of sanctus Petrus reliquion þæs halgan dyacones, þe
wæs sanctus Gregories leorningcnyht þæs æðelan papan, þe us
engliscum mannum Cristendom & fulluht hyder to lande asende.
 213. Eac her beoð reliquie of manegum halgum fæmnum &
of þam halgum Cristes mædenum, þæge þurh Godes gife þone ealdan
deofol & ealle flæsclice unlustas oferswiðdon & sume þurh
haliges lifes drohtnunge, sume þurh sigefæstne martyrdom þam heofenlican
bridguman Criste beoð geþeodde.
 218. Erost of sancta Maria Magdalene fingerliðe, seoþe her on
life ures Drihtenes fet mid hire tearum aþwoh, þæge ure Drihten to þon
swiðe lufode & wurðode, þæt he hire firmest atiwan wolde, þaða
he of deaðe aras.
 222. Of sancta Elisabeth.
 223. Of sancta Agaða reliquion of hire toðon sume IIII & of
hire haligrefte.
 225. Of sancta Iuliana þam halgan mædene, þe on þam
gewinne hire martyrdomes swa swiðe wæs þurh ða godcundan gife
gestrangod, þæt heo þone deofol band & swang, þe hire on ðam
cwerterne tocom.
 229. Of sancta Cecilia þam æðelan mædene.
 230. Of sancta Agnete.
 231. Of sancta Praxede þam mædene.
 232. Of sancta Eugenia.
 233. Sancta Felicula ribb þæs halgan mædenes.
 234. Of sancta Margareta.
 235. Of sancta Lucia.
 236. Of sancta Mamilla.
 237. Of sancta Balthilde þære halgan cwene.
 238. Of sancta Leonilla.
 239. Of sancta Gerethrude þam æþelan mædene.
 240. Of sancta Genouefa reliquion.
 241. Of sancta Morenna.
 242. Of sancta Alfgiua þære halgan Cristes ðinene, seo wolde
dæghwamlice hire andettnisse don, ær heo into cyrcan eode.
 244. Of sancta Satiuola þam bylewitan mædene, seo wæs
unsceððiglice acweald fram hire fæder mædmannum.
 245. And God ælmihtig siððan æt hire birgene geswutelode
mænigfealde wundra.
 247. Of sancta Sigeburga.
 248. Of sancta Wærburga.
 249. Of sancta Brigida hleorbane þæs deorwirðan mædenes,
þe manege wundra her on life þurh God geworhte & manegra manna heortan
onlihte þurh þa bisne hire halgan drohtnunge.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 10.10
B16.10.10.
Exeter, Sales of Land: Dictionary of Old English transcript, edited from MS.



 1.1. Ðis sinte ða gewitnisse of þam lande ðe Alfric paz
bohte at frewines laue at hire on paules stret, Waltere restolles sune, Alfred
preost, Adam preost, Alger liflædes, sune Waltere, and Osbern Alworð wuna
portr Godwi, Seiner and suelger, Liword lozel, Alger teonnes sune, Rocgere
sibus/.
 2.1. Ðis sinte ða gewitnisse of ðam wiman leduue ialdit and
of Ieleire, reinfrei þæt is Gedmer, Acuic, and Alger, Lifleð, Alwne,
seuara wif, adeleg.
 3.1. Ða sint þage gewitnisse of þam lande þe Alfric bohte
at Ailworde þat is walword at iacobes circa: Siword and Swæin, Giðwine,
Heisucg Alword se scinr and oþre genoge.
 3.5. And Særle and Pain namen þæt toll.
 4.1. Of þam lande bute gestete þe Alfric bohte at Ricerde.
 4.2. Ðis sint þage gewitnesse Osbern, Alger <foreign>filius</foreign> and ware
scolfues sunu Rob se ce, and Alger lifflæd, Ralf se nuueuð and Ascetild
and Godric puddiges and oþre genoge, and Gilebert nam þæt toll.
 5.1. Of þam lande a martines stræt þa Alfric bohte at
Ragenilde, Gewitnisse and oþre genoge and Guldebert nam þæt toll.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 11.1 (Forst)
B16.11.1.
Hereford, Boundaries of See: Forster 1941, 769.



 1. Ðus ligð þæt bisceoprice into Hereforda of
Munuwimuðan up andlang Sæferne to Mynsterworðige, of Mynsterworþige in
Doddesæsc, of Doddesæsce in Ceolanheafdan, of Ceolanheafdan in
Mælfern, ondlang Mælfern in þa stycinge, of þare stycince in Temede,
up onlang Temede in Stanfordesbrycge, of Stanfordesbrycge in Mærtleages
ecge, ondlang ecge in Carcdune, of Carcdune in Eardigtun, of Eardigtune eft in
Sæfern in Quattford.

Rec 15 (Birch 106)
B16.15.
Malmesbury, Bull of Pope Sergius: Birch 1885-99, no. 106.



 1. Sergius papa, Godes þeowa þeow, Aldhelme abbode æt
Mealdumesbyrig & his æfterfylgendum.
 2. & þurh eow eowrum arwyrðum mynstre æw fulre
drohtnunge munecum, godes þeowum.
 5. Þa þincg þe ðar synd tobrohte & togyfene for frigre
are & æhte to libbenne, na for luðre gelæfednesse.
 6. Ac for geornfulnesse wel to drohtnienne.
 7. Þeowdomum hi sylfe þa munecas nædsyndrige gewissunge to
þeowigienne.
 8. Buton ælcum twyn beon hi generude fram bisceopum & Godes
biggencgerum.
 9. Þa ðe Godes butan alysede fram bende ælces mennissces
domes eallicre his.
 11. Fram ælcere gærsuman woruldlicra brucunga geworðene
clæne & unmæne.
 12. Eall swa hyra munuc behat & hyra regol him cyþ.
 13. Þ hi Gode hi sylfe geæmtigean.
 13. & his sylfes þeowdome beon atihte.
 14. For þæs mycelan mægan þrymmes arwyrþnysse hi synd
gefreode.
 15. Na þ an woruldlicra doma hefitemum byrþenum.
 16. Ac eac swylce beon hi wyrþe þæs mæstan wyrþscipes
for þære rihtre regules lufan.
 17. Þanon eower eadmodnyss & eower æwfæstnyss us bitt
þ we scylon getrymman mid apostolicum sunder freo domum þ mynster þ is
sancte petre & sancte paule gehalgud.
 19. On þam mæran gemynde gelogud æt Meldum, þ is oþrum
naman Maldumes buruh geclypud, gesett & aræred on angel sexena scire.
 21. & eac oþer mynster is aræred on þære ylcan
scire.
 22. Wiþ þa ea þeo is geclypud Fron.
 23. On wyrþscipe þæs mæran fulluhteres Iohannis is.
 23. Þis we doþ for ure ealdres lufe sancte Petres þa.
 24. & ure alysend hælend Crist gemedemude be.
 25. To gewriþenne & to unbindenne on heofenan.
 26. Ðenunge & ciricean we eac brucaþ & Gode.
 27. Gendum geendebyrdaþ & dihtaþ þeah þe we unwyrþe
& ungelice synd.
 28. Be þisum forespecenum cyricum we habbaþ.
 28. Manegra soþra race gehyred þe to us.
 29. Ðu him.
 29. Fore gleawlice & wislice wissudest & dihtest.
 30. Þæs wel uþon eowre est fulre eadmodnysse, to eowrum
fultume.
 31. We mynegiaþ eow gebroþru & halsiaþ þ ge beon on
Godes lofu carfulle.
 32. & on gebedum þurh wacule.
 32. On forhæfednysse & on clænnysse fæsthafule &
on clyfigende.
 33. Cumliþnysse & manscipes wel dædum beon underþeodde.
 34. Hyrsumnysse & Cristes eadmodnysse þurh wunian æfre
lufigendras & eow eall abutan mid þære arfæstre soðre lufe
anræde gastlicum bebodum & haligra yldrena regulum to þeowigenne.
 37. & þæs apostolices geleafan rihtincge ungewemmedlice
gehealdan.
 38. Godum biggencgum simble to geæmtigean.
 39. Manscipe gyfan be þearfendum & æl þeodigum.
 39. Godes cyricena bisceopum & mæsse preostum arwyrðnysse
gegearwian swa hi hit geearnian.
 41. Gode æfre geæmtigean, gemedemunge & þearflicnysse
lufian.
 42. On sealmum & on gastlicum ymnum & on singalum gebedum,
on eallum Godes bebodum eow gemænelice awreccan & beoþ hicgende
æfre & þeonde fram beteran to beteran.
 44. & huru on eornust þ ge beon carfulle embe eowre saule
þearfe.
 45. & simble truwian on Godes fultum eow sylfe ungewemmede þ
clænnyss & sidefulnys eowres lichaman & saule ætforan Godes
eagan.
 47. Þ se inra mann þ is seo saul sie mid mihte Godes gyfe &
eac se uttra þ is se lichama begyte lof goddre drohtnunge & Godes hlisan
eornige.
 50. We gedemaþ & gesettaþ mid andweardum apostolicum.
 51. Sunderfreodomum beon to bewerigende &.
 51. Þas fore sædan & arwyrþan mynstru forþi þe.
 52. Nað & beon sceal ure bisceoplicre gyfe wel dæd
þylcum Godes freondum þe hi þus healdaþ swa we gefyrn embe spæcon.
 54. Þ hi under rihtum dome & bewerunge þas sylfan þe we
þeowiað ures aldres þæs eadigan petres apostoles & his haligan
cyricean þære we dihtniað eall swa þin godnyss & þin
æwfaestnyss us bæd þ scel þurh wunian mid godes fultume & mid
sancte petres nu & on ecnysse.
 58. Na hi næfre na gyrnan nanne oððe bisceopa oþþe
sacerda.
 59. Oþþe ænigra cyriclicre endebyrdnysse preost.
 59. Na hi huru þinga na gesetten nanne bisceopstol innon hyra
cyricean oððe furþon þær lætan þæne bisceop mæssan singan
butan gyf he þyder cymð gelaþud of þam abbude & þære
geferræddenne gyf hi neode habbað to halgigenne enigne mæsse preost
oþþe diacon for mæssena neode & þ buton ælcum tweon halgie
buton ælcum scette under godes dome swa swa ealle þincg to þam haligan
regule belimpan.
 66. Gyf þ getimie þ is eallum mannum gemære þ se abbud
gewite of þissum life & hit cume þærto þ hi beon cyres wyrþe na
awende man næfre of þære halgan gegaderunge gemænum geþeahte.
 68. Þ þæne þe hi ceosað of godes þeowum si þ stede
fæst þ nan lyre oððe.
 70. Acume on þa lare þære munuclicre drohtnunge.
 70. Þincg forwyrþan for abbudleaste.
 71. Se bisceop.
 71. Ne awiste beo be ure apostolicre leafe & ealdordome
nime/.
 72. Ræd þærto þ þær abbud wyrþe.
 73. Nu ge gebroðru.
 73. Þincg synd þus gelogud.
 73. Gyf ænig bisceop si oððe mæsse preost oþþe
æniges gehadudes oþþe læwedes na si he na swa rice þ se ne
understande þas þincg to awendenne oþþe geþristlæcre to abreccenne
þe her sind under Godes dome & sanctus petrus & uru eac gesette.
 77. Wite he hine scyldigne ætforan godes gesihþe & fram
ascyrudne fram gemænnysse þæs halwendes lichaman blodes ures drihtnes
hælendes Cristes & gehleote eac þa genyþerunge is ðe Scarioth ures
drihtnes hælendes Cristes belæwend geearnude.
 81. Si he gedemed eall swa wæs Annanias & Zafira his wif
fram sancte petre þæs apostol.
 82. E & si he to bealue & to ecere yrmþe efre geteald
& betæht, buton he hit er hæle & bete.
 84. Si æfre lif & hæl & ece eadignyss þam þe
þas ðincg gehealdan & þam þe hi beo to healdenne.
 86. Hand tacen æþelredes Myrcena kyncges.
 87. Hand tacen Ines Wessexena cyncges.
 88. Ic Ealdhelm brohte to Ine Wessexena kyncge & to
Æþelræde Myrcena kyncge þas privilegia.
 89. Þ sind syndrie freodomas þe se apostolica papa Sergius
awrat to ðæra apostola mynstre Petres & Paules.
 91. & hi geþwæredon & hi hit swa geendudon, þ swa
hweþer swa hit wære swa sibb swa twyrednys betweonan Saxan &
Myrcenum.
 92. Þ þæt mynster beo æfre on sibbe & þa þe
þær/ Gode ðeowiað.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 16.1 (Rob 52)
B16.16.1.
Rochester, List of Estates: Robertson, 1956, no. 52.



 1. Þis is þære bricce geweorc on Hroucæstre.
 2. Her syndon genamad þa land þe man hi of scæl weorcan.
 3. Ærest þære burge biscop fehð on þone earm to wercene
þa land peran & þreo gyrda to þillianæ & III sylla to
lyccanne.
 5. Þæt is of Borcstealle & of Cucclestane & of
Frinondesbyrig & of Stoce þanne seo oðer per gebyrað to Gyllingeham
& to Cætham & an gyrd to þillanne & III sylla to leccanne.
 7. Þonne seo þridde per gebyrað eft þam biscope &
þridde healf gyrd to þillianne & III sylla to leccenne, of Heallingan
& of Trotescliue & of Meallingan & of Fliote & of Stane &
of Pinindene & of Falchenham.
 11. Þonne is se feorðe þe per þæs cinges & fiorðe
healf gyrd to þillanne & sylla III to leccanne, of ægelesforda &
of ellan þam læþe þe þær toliþ & of Ufanhylle & of
Aclea & of þam smalanlande & of Cusintune & of Dudeslande &
of Gisleardeslande & of Wuldeham & of Burhham & of æcclesse
& of Horstede & of Fearnlege & of Cærstane & of Cealce &
of Hennhyste & of ædune.
 17. Þonne is sy fifte per þæs arcebiscope, to Wroteham &
to Mægþanstane & to Woþringabyran & to Netlestede & to þam
twam Peccham & to Hæselholte & to Mæranwyrþe & to
Lillanburnan & to Swanatune & to Offaham & to Dictune & to
Westerham & IIII gyrda to þyllanne & III selle to leccanne.
 22. Þonne is syo syoxte per to Holinganburnan & to eallan
þam læþe & IIII gyrda to þelliene & III sylla to leccenne.
 24. Þonne is syo syoueþe & syo eahteþe per to Howaran
lande to wyrcenne & fifte healf gyrd to þillanne & VI sylla to
lyccanne.
 26. Þonne is syo nigaþa per þæs arcebiscopes, þæt is
syo landper æt þam west ænde, to Flyote & to his Cliue & to
Hehham & to Denetune & to Melantune & to Hludesdune & to
Meapeham & to Snodilande & to Berlingan & to Peadleswyrþe &
ealla þa dænewaru & IIII gyrdu to þilianne & þryo sylle to
leccanne.

END_TEXT

Rec 16.2
B16.16.2.
Rochester, List of Serfs: Pelteret 1986, 493.



 1. Þis wæron ða æhtemen into Wuldaham and heora
ofsprinc.
 1. Ðas man dyde þider of Æglesforda, Tottel, and Eadwig his
broðor, and heora ofteam, and Totteles suster, and hire cild.
 3. And his suster dohtor and hire twa cild.
 3. Ðas coman suðan of Cincestune, Æþelflæd and hire
cild.
 4. And of Æglesforda, Sigburh and hire cild, and Garwig and his
wif.
 5. And Boia and his wif and Guðhelm and his wif, and heora
ofteam.
 5. And þas coman of cealce, Bunel and his wif and Hidda and his
wif.
 6. And Noðbald and his wif and heora ofteam.
 7. Þa gebohte Ælfstan þæt land Ælfehes fæder æt
Eadmunde cince mid eallum þam þe ðaron stod on ece yrfe mid
hundtwelftigan mancesan goldes, and mid þrittigan pundan.

Rec 16.3 (Kem 975)

 10. Her geswutelaþ on þisum gewrite þæt Ægelsi on
Wuldeham hæfð gelened be Siwordes dægge biscpes his dohter and hiore
dohter ut of Totteles cynne, and hæfð oþra mænn þærinn gedon be

geferan.

Rec 19 (Earle)
B16.19.
Tavistock, Manumissions: Earle 1888, 254-6.



 1. Freode huna æt ocmund tune on mides sumeres messe æuen for
þon.
 1. And for þa.
 1. On feower wegas on brunes gewitnesse messe preostes & on
ealra þæra preosta.
 2. Birhtric freode hroda æt curi tune on sunnan dæge ofer
pentecostenes messe daig on.
 2. Preosta.
 2. Ealra þara hyred preosta & on.
 3. Þys sint þara manna naman ðe man freode for ordgar æt
bradan stane ða he læg on adle.
 3. Þæt ys cynsie fram liwtune & godcild of lamburnan &
leofric of swuran tune dola wines sunu & eadsige of cyric forda &
ælfgyþ of boc lande & smala of ocmund tune & wifman of brada stane
& byrhflæd of tref meu tune & ælflæd of clymes tune.
 3. On wynstanes gewytnysse mæsse preostæs & on wulfsies
æt lamburnan & on eallra þara hired preosta.
 4. & ælfgyð of swuran tune & þær his to
gewitnysse cynsie preost and goda preost, & ælfric preost, ðe þis ge
wryt wrat.
 4. Þis was æt borslea gedon for ordgar.
 5. Eadgifu gefreode ælfgiðe birhsies dohtor hlaf bryttan æt
borslea on feower wegas.
 5. On wynstanes gewittnesse mæssepreostes, & on goda
preostes, & on cynstanes goda suna, & on afan.
 5. Birhtric gefreode æffan æt curritune on brunes gewitnesse
mæssepreostes, & on wynstanes preostes, & on ealra þæra hyred
preosta.
 6. Eadgyfu gefreode leofrune æt curritune for ordgar on brunes
gewittnesse messe preostes & on ealra þæra hyred preosta.
 7. Byrhtric gefreode ribrost & hwite on middes wintres mæsse
dæg æt tiwarhel on prudes gewitnysse mæsse preostes.
 8. Eadgyfu gefreode wulfric on feower wegas þrim ucan ær
middan sumera.
 8. On gewittnesse byrhstanes mæsse preostes, & on cynstanes
& on clerices þe þis gewrat.
 9. Eadgyfu gefreode wulfwunne on middes sumeres mæsse dæg on
wulfnoþes gewitnysse mæsse preostes & on ealra þæra hired
preosta.
 10. Eadgyfu gefreode æþelgyfe wuncildes wif on feower wegas on
middes sumeres mæsse æfen æt bræg.
 10. On brunes gewittnisse mæsse preostes & on wulfnoðes
mæsse preostes & on eallra þæra hyred preosta.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

 1. Ælfric and Wulfwine, Eadgife goldsmiðes geafen to
broþerrædenne twegen orn weghenes goldes þæt is on þis ilce boc her
foruten gewired.

Rec 21.1 (Birch 1338)
B16.21.1.
New Minster, Winchester, Boundaries of an Estate: Birch 1885-99, no. 1338.



 1. Westryhte be ðære suð streate to ðæm lictune VII
gerda, & VI fet, ðonne ryhte norð V gerda, donne is ðæs ymbganges
ealles ðreo furlang & ðreo met gerda.

END_TEXT

 1. Þis is se halidom ðe is on ðam grecysscan scrine ðe seo
hlæfdige geaf into niwan mynstre.
 3. Þæt is of Sancte Iohanne baptista, and of montem Sion, and

Rec 22 (Birch 630)
B16.22.
Nunnaminster, Winchester, Estate Boundaries: Birch 1885-99, no. 630.



 1. Þæs hagan gemære þe Ealhswið hæfð æt
þintan ceastre lið up of þæm forda on þone west mestan mylengear
westeweardne þæt east on þone ealdan welig & þonan up andlanges
þæs eastran mylengeares þæt norð on þa ceapstræt.
 4. Þonne þær east andlanges þære ceapstræte oð
cyninges burghege on þone ealdan mylen gear þæt þær andlanges
þæs ealdan mylegeares oð hit facað on þæm ifihtan æsce.
 7. Þæt þær suð ofer þa twifealdan fordas on þa
stræt midde þæt þær eft west andlangæs strete.
 8. And ofer þone ford þæt hit sticaþ eft on þæm
westemestan mylen geare.

END_TEXT

Rec 23.3 (RobApp I 6)

 1. Ðis mycel is gegolden of þære cyricean William cyninge
syððan he þis land ahte wiðutan þam hidgelde þe nan man wiðutan
Gode anum atellan ne mæg.

hrygilebuc gecleopad X pund & of þam XV hrodan VI marc & of þam
oðran æscene & of þam hlæfle & of þære crucan & of
þam hnæpfe XI marc & of þære hlangan scrine VIII pund & of
þam III hornan III marc & of þam candelstæfe X pund & of
þære hæcce XXXIII marca & þærtoeakan XL marca & sixte half

 1. III or & leofric I pennig.

pennige to þam ilcan andaga.

Rec 23.5 (Birch 1320)
B16.23.5.
Worcester, Calendar of Lands: Birch 1885-99, no. 1320.



 1. Cenulf Mercna cyng gebette & gefreode þ to Wigerna ceastre
lið on twa healfe SÆFERNE XXX hida.
 2. & Æþelred & Æþelflæd ge trymedon þa burh
& þa stowe wel gegodedan mid heora ælmæssan.
 3. & Norð Heanbyrig Wiglaf cyning gefreode & becte into
mynstre, & Heortlanbyrig Burhred cyning.
 4. & Ælfgyðe cyrcan Æðelstan cyning gebecte XX hida
into Wigora ceastre.
 5. & Wuda tun XX hida Æþelbald cyning gebecte into mynstre
& Æþelrice betæhte.
 6. & Hamtun Offa cyng gebecte XVII hida & into mynstre Gode
to lofe ge uðe.
 7. & Strætford Byrhtulf cyng gebecte & on Godes est
Heabyrhte bisceope betæhte XX hida.
 8. & Tredingtun XXX hida Eanbyrht cyning gebecte &
betæhte Milrede bisceope.
 9. & Bloccan lea Burhred cyning gebecte & gefreode &
betæhte Alhwine bisceope L hida.
 10. & Speoles byrig Byrhtulf cyng gebecte XV hida & on
Godes est Heabyrhte bisceope betæhte.
 11. & æt Wyrigtune Offa cyng gebecte XLV hida mit þam
æt Fiscesburnan & Milrede bisceope betæhte on Godes est.
 12. Westbyrig & Stoc Æþelric becwæð into Wigora
ceastre, & Offa cyng hit gebecte ærest Æþelmunde, Æþelrices
fæder, & eft Offa gebecte into Wigera ceastre ægðer ge Westbyrig ge
Stoc LX hida ge Heanbyrig XX hida & Tettanbyrig.
 13. & Beaganbyrig Burhred cyng gebecte into Wigera ceastre, þ
is be Culne X hida & æt Pultune VIII & æt Bærendes lea V &
æt Esig V.
 14. Æt Colesburnan VIII hida Deneberht bisceop alænde
Balthune.

END_TEXT

Rec 24.1 (Rob 84)
B16.24.1.
York, Survey of Lands: Robertson 1956, no. 84.



 1. Ðis is seo socn into Scyreburna mid folcrihte, twa dæl of
Cauda & Wicstow eal & ufer Seleby eal & twa oxnagang on Fleaxlege
& healf Bernlege & eal Breiðetun butan healf plogesland & eall
Byrne & eall Burhtun butan healf plogesland & eall Gæiteford &
eall twegen þorpas & twa Hyrst eal & twa Haðelsæ eall & fif
oxnagang on þriddan Haðelsæ & healf Byrcene & eall Suðtun
& eall Byrum & Breiðetun eal & Broðertun eall & eall
Farenburne butan healf þridde plogesland & twa plogesland on Ledesham
& an on Niwan þorp & eall Miclafeld & eall Hyllum & eall
Fristun & eal Lundby & eall Styfetun & eall Myleford & eall
Fenntun butan healf plogesland & twa plogesland & fif oxnagang on
Barcestune.
 12. & eall Luteringtun & eall Hehferðehegðe & eall
Hudelestun.
 14. On Scireburnan toecan þam inlande syndan IIII hida
weorclandes & on Luteringatune III hida & on Barcestune I hid & fif
oxnagang & of Styfingtune tune þreora oxnagang.
 17. & on Wicstowe twegea oxnagang & on Cawuda twa dæl
þæs landes is agenland into Scireburnan & Fentun is læn oðer
healf plogesland.
 20. Into Ottanleage IIII plogaland & on Bægeltune II, on
Hafecesweorðe II, on oðeran Hafecesweorðe II, on Dentune II, on Timbel
oðer healf plogesland, on Ectune healf plogesland.
 23. Þis is unbesacen agenland.
 23. & þærto eacan hyrað þas socnland into Ottanleage,
on Ottanleage II ploh & on Bældune II & on Hafecesweorðe II &
on oðeran Hafecesweorðe II, On Scefinge I, on Mensingtune III, on Burhleage
VI, on Meðeltune III, on Yllicleage syx oxnagang, on Dentune II ploh, on
Cliftune I, on Biceratune III, on Fearnleage IIII, on Ectune oðer healf, on
Pofle III, on Lindeleage III.
 31. Æt Rypum ærest milegemet on ælce healfe.
 31. & Biscoptun is in on þam II hida & Carlewic V hida
& healf Munecatun his agenland feorðe healf hide & healf Mercingatun
þridde healf hide.
 34. On Herelesho healf hid, on Stodlege III hida, on Suðtune
oþer healf hide, on Nunnewic III hida, on þorntune II hida.
 37. & þys synd weste land, an is Sallege, oðer is
Grantelege, þridde is Efestun & feorðe is Wifeleshealh & V is healf
Cnearresweorð.
 40. Þonne syndan þis preostaland, on Westwic IIII hida, on
Norð Stanlege IIII, on Gyðingdale I hide, on Mercingtune þreo oxnagang,
on Munecatune þreo oxnagang, on Hotune II oxnagang.
 44. Ðis syndan socnland into Rypum, on Gyþingadeal VIII hida
& ofer eall Munecatun VII hida & on Eastwic II hida, on Mercingatune
þridde healfe hide & on Herelesho þridde healfe hide.
 47. & on Suðtune oðer healf hide, on nyrran Stanlege V hida
& on Norð Stanlege I hide & on Nunnewic I hide & on Heawic V hida
& on Sleaningaforda II hida.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Osulf ond Wulfeh, Folcric ond Elfred, Wegga and Aldsceorl, Gamal presbyter,

Menning ond Wulger, þor in Ca ond Arcetel, Siuerð, Rauan, Arn, Colbrand ce,
Blih, Eluwine vel Snel, Godwine, Lef, Eðastan, Ulf, Elnod fre, Roscetel ond

Rec 25 (Ker)
B16.25.
Boundary: Ker 1957, 441-2.



 1. Ðis synt ðara VIII hida landgemæra to felesbroce
ærest on Cynewoldes forda andlang ðæs cynges gemær to Cert.
 2. Of Cert dune on gerihte to III beamum.
 3. Of III beamum to wonboge.
 4. Of wonboge on gerihte.
 5. Mearce andlang.
 6. On gerihte on lyge up andlang lege þæt eft on cyne.

Rec 26.1 (RobApp II 1)
B16.26.1.

 1. Þreo hund hida hyrð to Eorpeburnan & XXIIII hida to
Hæstingaceastre hyrþ V hund hida & to Læwe hyrþ twelf hund hida.
 3. & to Burham hyrþ seofan hund hida & XX hida.
 4. To Cisseceastre hyrþ XV hund hida.
 4. Þonne hyrþ to Portceastre V hund hida & oþer healf
hund hida hyrþ to Hamtune.
 6. & to Wintaceastre hyrþ feower & twentig hund hida
& to Wiltune hyrþ feowertine hund hida.
 7. & to Tissanbyrig hyrþ V hund hida & to Tweoneam hyrþ
V hund hida butan XXX hidan.
 9. & to Werham hyrþ XVI hund hida & to Brydian hyrþ
eahta hund hida butan feowertigan hidan.
 10. & to Eaxanceastre hyrþ feower & XXX hida & VII
hund hida & to Halganwille hyrþ þreo hund hida.
 12. & to Hlidan hyrþ oþer healf hund hida butan X hidan
& to Pilletune hyrþ feower hund hida butan XL hidan.
 14. & to Weced hyrð V hund hida & XIII hida & to
Axanbrycge hyrþ feower hund hida.
 15. & to Lengen hyrþ C hida & to Langport hyrð VI hund
hida & to Baðan hyrð tyn hund hida.
 17. & twelf hund hida hyrð to Mealdmesbyring & to
Crecgelade hyrþ XIIII hund hida & XV hund hida to Oxnaforda.
 18. & to Wælingforda hyrð XXIIII hund hida & XVI hund
hida hyrð to Buccingahamme.
 20. & to Sceaftesige hyrð X hund hida & VI hund hida
hyrþ to Escingum & to Suþriganaweorce hyrþ eahtatyne hund hida.

Rec 26.2 (Birch 297)
B16.26.2.
Tribal Hidage: Birch 1885-99, no. 297.



 1. Myrcna landes is þrittig þusend hyda þær mon ærest
myrcna hæt.
 2. Wocen sætna is syfan þusend hida.
 2. Westerna eac swa.
 3. Pecsætna twelf hund hyda.
 3. Elmed sætna syx hund hyda.
 3. Lindesfarona syfan þusend hyda mid hæþ feld lande.
 4. Suþ gyrwa syx hund hyda.
 5. Norþ gyrwa syx hund hyda.
 5. East wixna þryu hund hyda.
 6. West wixna syx hund hyda.
 6. Spalda syx hund hyda.
 6. Wigesta nygan hund hyda.
 7. Herefinna twelf hund hyda.
 7. Sweord ora þryu hund hyda.
 8. Gifla þryu hund hyda.
 8. Hicca þry hund hyda.
 8. Wiht gara syx hund hyda.
 9. Nox gaga fif þusend hyda.
 9. Oht gaga twa þusend hyda.
 10. Þæt is syx & syxtig þusend hyda & an hund hyda.
 10. Hwinca syfan þusend hyda.
 11. Ciltern sætna feower þusend hyda.
 11. Hendrica þryu þusend hyda & fif hund hyda.
 12. Unecung ga twelf hund hyda.
 12. Arosætna syx hund hyda.
 13. Færpinga þreo hund hyda is in middelenglum Færpinga.
 14. Bilmiga syx hund hyda.
 14. Widerigga eacswa.
 15. East willa syx hund hyda.
 15. West willa syx hund hyda.
 15. East engle þrittig þusend hida.
 16. East sexena syofon þusend hyda.
 16. Cantwarena fiftene þusend hyda.
 17. Suþ sexena syufan þusend hyda.
 17. West sexena hund þusend hida.
 19. Ðis ealles twa hund þusend & twa & feowertig
þusend hyda & syuan hund hyda.

END_TEXT

Rec 26.3 (RobApp II 1)
B16.26.3.
Hidage for Defence: Robertson 1956, App. II, no. 1.



 1. To anes æceres bræde on wealstillinge & to þære
wære gebirigeað XVI hida.
 2. Gif ælc hid byþ be anum men gemannod þonne mæg man
gesettan ælce gyrde mid feower mannum.
 3. Þon gebyred to twentigan gyrdan on wealstillinge hundeahtatig
hida & to þam furlange gebirgeað oþer healf hund hida & X hida be
þam ilcan getæle þe ic her bebufan tealde.
 6. To twam furlangum gehyrað XX hida & þreo hund hida to
þrim furlangum hundeahtatig hida & CCCC hida þonne gebyrigeað.
 8. To IIII furlangum XL hida & VI hund hida.
 9. To fif furlangum gebyreð ymbganges eahta hund hida on
wealstillinge.
 10. To six furlangum gebyreð sixtig hida & nigan hund hida.
 11. To VII furlangum XX hida & XI hund hida.
 12. To eahta furlangum ymbeganges wealstillinge hundeahtatig hida
& XII hund hida.
 13. To nigan furlangum XL hida & XIIII hund hida.
 14. To X furlangum gebyreþ XVI hund hida.
 15. To XI furlangum gebyreþ LX hida & XVII hund hida.
 15. To XII furlangum ymbeganges wealstillige gebyreð XX hida
& nigantyn hund hida.
 17. Gif se ymbegang mara biþ þon mæg man eaþe þone
ofereacan geþencan of þisse tale for þon ealning to anum furlange
gebyreð sixtig manna & C þonne biþ ælc gyrd mid feower mannum
geset.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 26.4 (RobApp I 3)
B16.26.4.
The Northamptonshire Geld Roll: Robertson 1956, App. I, no. 3.



 1. Ðis is into Suttunes hundred, þat is an hundred hida swa hit
wæs on æduuardes deige kynges.
 2. & þerof is gewered an & tuenti hide & twadel an
hide & fourti hide inland & X hide þes kynges ahhen ferme land &
VIII & XX hide weste & þriddel an hide.
 5. Þis is into Werdunes hundret, þæt is an hundret hida swa
hit was on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 6. & þerof is gewered XVIII hide buton are gearde & XL
hide inland & I & XL hide weste & I gearde.
 9. Þis is into Klegele hundred, þæt is an hundred hide swa
it wes on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 10. & þerof is gewered XVIII hide & fourti hide inland
& II & XL hide weste.
 12. Þis is into Grauesende hundred, þæt is an hundred hide
swa it wes on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 13. & þerof is gewered XVIII hide & I alfhide & V
& XXX inland & V hidæ þes kynges agen ferme land & I & XL
hide weste & I healf hide.
 15. Þis is into Eadboldesstowe hundred, þæt is an hundred
hida swa it wes on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 17. & þerof is gewered III & XX hida & I healf hide
& V & XL hide inland & V hide þes kynges & XXVI hide weste
& I healf hide.
 20. Þis is into Egelweardesle hundred, þæt is an hundred
hide swa hit wes on Eadwardas dege kynges.
 21. & þerof is gewered XVI hide & I healf hide & XL
hide inland & æt Nortune seueðe healf hide ne com nan peni of,
þæt ah Osmund þes kynges writere, & seuen & XXX weste.
 25. Þis is into Uoxle hundred, þæt is an hundred hida ealswa
hit was on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 26. & þerof is gewered XVI hide & XXX hide inland & I
& XX hide þes kynges ahhen land & III & XXX hide weste.
 29. Þis is into Uyceste hundred, þæt is an hundred hida swa
hit wes on Eadwardas dege kynges.
 30. & þerof is gewered XVIIII hide & XL hide inland &
XX hide þes kynges ahhen land & I & XX hida weste.
 33. Þis is into Hocheshlawa hundred, þæt is II & LX hida
þus hit was on Edwardes dege kynges.
 34. & þerof is gewered VIII hida & XV hida inland &
VIIII & XXX hida weste.
 36. Þis is into Wilebroce hundred, II & LX hida þus hit wes
on Edwardes dege kynges.
 37. & þerof his gewered VII hida & XI hida inland &
XIII hida weste þis is into þæt healfe hundred & þæt healfe
hundred eal unwered þæt heah se kyng.
 40. Þis is into þas twa hundred to Uptunegrene, fif syðe
twenti hida & nigeða healf hida þus it was on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 41. & þer is gewered fifti hida & VII & XX hida
inland & VIIII & XX hida weste & I healf hida & of V siðe XX
hidæ is þridde healf hide unwered & þæt heah Ricard engaigne.
 45. Þis is into Nauereslund, twa hundred VIII syðe twenti hide
þus hit wes on Eadwardes dege kynges.
 46. & þus micel is gewered into þas twa hundred, þæt
is VIIII & XX hida & I hida & VIIII & fifti hida inland &
twelfta healf hide westa & of þas VIII syða twenti hida is VIII hida
unwered & þæt eah si læfdi þes kynges wif.
 50. Þis is into Neresforda hundred, II & LX hida þus hit
wes on Edwardes dege kynges.
 51. & þus micel is gewered XV hida & XIIII hida inland
& III & XXX hida westa.
 53. Þis is into Pocabroc hundred, II & LX hida þus it was
on Edwardas dege kynges.
 54. & þer is X hida wered & XX hida inland & II &
XXX hida westa.
 56. Þis is into ðet oþer healfe hundred into Neowbotlegraue,
þæt is oðer healf hundred hida þer is inne fif & feorwerti hida
buton an healf gearde wane sea land & gewered.
 58. & þer is healf hundred hide & II & XX hide inland
& III & XXX hida & I healf gerde westa & þus hit wes on
Edwardes dege kinges.
 61. Þis is þæt oðer healfe hundred into Gildesburh &
þer is inne oðer healf hundred hida & þer is XVI hida sett &
gewered.
 62. & þer is healf hundred hida & XVIII hide inland &
þer is healf hundred hida & XVI westa & þus hit wes on Eaduuard
dege kynges.
 66. Þis is into Spelhoh hundred four syðe twenti hida & X
hida & þer is twenti hida & I alf hida sett & gewered & fif
& XX hida byrigland & into Habintune X hida, Ricardes land, ne com nan
peni of.
 69. & into Multune VI hida, Willelmes land, ne com nan peni of
& VIII & XX hida weste & an healf hida.
 71. Þis is into Hwiccleslea west hundred, þæt syndon
foursyðe XX hida & þus hit wes on Edwardes dege kynges & þerof is
gewered X hida & fourti hit inland & XXX hida weste.
 74. Þis is into Hwicceslea east hundred, þæt sindon
foursyðe XX hide ealswa hit was on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 75. & þerof is XV hide wered & þer is four & XXX
hide inland & I & XXX hide weste.
 77. Þis is into Stotfalde hundred, þæt is an hundred hide
swa hit wes on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 78. & þer is gewered of VIIII hide & I healf gerde &
þer is fourti hide inland & fifti hide weste & ferðe healf gerde.
 81. Þis is into Stoce hundred, þæt is fourti hida swa hit
weron on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 82. & þerof his gewered eahtetende healf hide &
ælleofte healf hide inland & XII hide weste.
 84. Þis is into oðer healfe hundred into Hehham, þæt is
oðer healf hundred hide swa hit wes on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 85. & þerof is gewered fifti hide buton an alf hide &
four & fourti hide inland & six & fifti hide weste & X hida
mare þæt lið into Anforðesho.
 88. Þis is into Malesle hundred, þæt is foursiðe XX
hida.
 88. & þerof is wered XII hide & þer is XXX hide inland
& þer is XXX hide weste & þer is VIII hide unwered þæt ah se
kyng.
 91. Þis is into Corebi hundred, þæt is VII & XL hide swa
hit wes on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 92. & þerof is gewered VIII healf hide & XII healf hide
inland & þer is XII hide & I gerde þes kynges fermeland weste &
unwered & V hide unwered þa III hide eah þe ðe Scotte kyng &
oþer healf hide eah þy læfedi & Vrs I healf hide & XI hide weste
buton ane gerde.
 97. Þis is into Roðewelle hundred, þæt is LX hida þus
hit wes on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 98. & þerof is X hide wered & XX hida inland & XV
hide unwered þa seuen hide & I healf hide eah ðe kyng & seuen hide
& I healf hide eah ðes kynges wif & Rodbertes wif heorles &
Willelm enganie.
 102. Þis is into Anduerðeshoh hundred, þæt is IIII siða
twenti hida & X hida þus hit was on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 103. & þerof is gewered V & XX hide inland & IX &
XXX hide weste.
 105. Þis is into Ordlingbære hundred IIII syðe twenti hide
þus hit wes on Edwardes dæge kynges.
 106. & þerof his gewered VIIII & XX hide & I healf
hide & IIII & XX hide & I healf hide inland & V hide unwered
þæt eah Willelm enganie & Witeget preost & I & XX hide weste.
 110. Þis is into þæt oðer healfe hundred into Wimereslea,
þæt is oðer healf hundred hida swa hit wes on Edwardes dæges kynges.
 111. & þerof is wered I & XL hide & III syðe twenti
hide inland & VIIII & XL hide weste.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 27.1 (Thorpe)
B16.27.1.
Abbotsbury, Orky's Guild: Thorpe 1865, 605-8.



 1. Her cyð on þisum gewrite þæt Orcy hæfð gegyfen
þæ gegyldhealle & þone stede æt Abbodesbyrig Gode to lofe &
Sancte Petre.
 5. & þam gyldscipe to agenne on dæge & æfter
dæge him & his gebeddan to langsumum gemynde.
 8. Se ðe þis awendan wyle hæbbe him wið Gode gemæne on
þæm micclan dome.
 12. Ðonne syndon ðis þa forword þe Orecy & þa
gegyldan æt Abbodesbyrig gecoren habbað Gode to lofe & Sancte Petre to
wurðmynte & heora sawlum to þearfe.
 18. Ðæt is ærost, ðrym nihton ær Petres mæssan
æt ælcon gegyldan ænne peningc oððe an peningcwurð weaxes, loc
hwæðer mare neod sy into þam mynstre.
 23. & on mæsse æfen æt twam gegyldum ænne bradne
hlaf well besewen & well gesyfled to urum gemænum ælmyssan.
 28. & fif wucan ær Petres mæssedæge sceote ælc
gegylda ænne gyldsester fulne clænes hwætes, & þæt beo
gelæst binnan twam dagum.
 32. Be þæs inganges wite, þæt syndon þry sestras
hwætes & se wudu beo gelæst binnan ðrym dagum æfter ðam
corngesceote, æt ælcon riht gegyldan ane byrðene wudes, & twa æt
ðam ungyldan, oððe gylde ænne gyldsester cornes.
 41. And se ðe bryðene underfehð, & þæt gecweme ne
deð, beo he his inganges scyldig, & þær ne beo nan gyfu.
 45. & se gylda þe oðerne misgret innan gylde on eornostne
hige, gebete he þæt be his ingange wið ealre geferrædene.
 49. & syððan wið þone man þe he mysgrette, swa swa he
hit findan mæge, & gif he nele to bote gebugan, þolige he þære
geferrædene, & ælcere oðre gyldrædene.
 55. And se ðe ma manna inlæde ðonne he sceole buton ðæs
stiwerdes leafe & ðæra feormera gylde his ingang.
 58. And gyf ænigum on urum geferrædene his forðsið
getide, sceote ælc gegylda ænne peningc æt þam lice for þære
sawle, oððe gylde be þry gegyldum.
 64. & gyf ure ænig geuntrumod sy binnan syxtigum milan
þonne findon we fiftyne men þæt hine gefeccon.
 68. & gyf he forðfaren sy XXX, & þa hine gebringon to
þære stowe þe he to gyrnde on his life.
 71. & gyf he on neawyste forðfaren sy, warnige man þone
stiwerd to hwylcere stowe þæt lic sceole, & se stiwerd warnige
syððan ða gegyldan.
 76. Swa fela swa he mæge mæst to geridan oððe to
gesendan, þæt hi þærto cumon, & þæt lic wurðlice
bestandan, & to mynstre ferian, & for þære sawle georne gebiddan.
 82. Þæt byð rihtlice gecweden gyldrædene þæt we
þus don, & hit geristð þæt well, ægðer ge for Gode ge for
worolde.
 86. Forðan ðe we nyton hwylc ure hraðost forðfærð.
 88. Þonne gelyfe we þurh Godes fultume, þæt us fremige
eallon þas forword gecweden on ær gif we hit rihtlice healdað.
 92. Uton biddan God ælmihtigne georne mid inwerdre heortan,
þæt he us miltsige & eac swa his halgan apostol Sancte Petre, þæt
he us geþingige & urne weg geryme to ecere reste.
 97. Forðan ðe we for his lufon þis gegyld gegaderodon.
 99. He hæfð þone anweald on heofenum, þæt he mot
lætan into heofenon þone þe he wyle, & forwirnan þam þe he
nele.
 103. Swa swa Crist sylf cwæð to him on his godspelle, Petrus
ic betæce þe heofenan rices cæge, & swa hwæt swa þu wylt
habban gebunden ofer eorðan þæt byð gebunden on heofenum.
 109. & swa hwæt swa ðu wylt habban unbunden ofer eorðan
þæt byð unbunden on heofenum.
 113. Uton habban hyht & hopan to him þæt he us bewite a
her on worulde.
 115. & æfter forðsiðe ure sawla gehelpe he us gebringe
on ecere reste: Amen.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 28.1 (Earle)
B16.28.1.
Crediton, Declaration of Indulgences: Earle 1888, 416-17.



 1. Hich egger bischob bebude alle mine afthercomende to cridintones
ministre, þat þe geuenisse þat hich behet afther þat þat hich forsoc
sainte marie ministre for mire pride and to rome hy wende.
 4. And þar hich hontromede sove yer and more an thar me bifore
hylomp þe reue quene on heuene marie, and nedede me to scrifte go to þan
holiapopa leon and be his lore do.
 8. And he me radde anbidia ones similissamuis on rome, and behithe
to giuenisse to bote mire mere leuedie and to mire cherche.
 10. And þar hich be geth of souentine archebischobes to þousent
dages to giuenesse of hure sinna.
 12. Alle þane ministre criditones aginnas an godieras of bute
hende heuereche day to comde, and the worke bitrende and for adþelston
synge.
 14. And of oþer bischopes on estende romes burg and on westende
of þas mountes mougeus feour þousent dages and sonne dages.
 17. And of hoþer archebischopes and bissopes on þisser side
þas mountes on wale londes þe ich alle hi sogte hoþer bi wise sende, so
mi scrift was, þru þousend dage and souene.
 20. Of þru archebischopes on bruthude and of hyre onderbischopes
on þousent dages and sixsti dages.
 22. Of feour archebischopes of hirlonde and of hire ondersetele
bischopes nunhenne honderd dages and tin dages.
 24. And þo hich com hom to þan gete on þan cherchay, hich
silf sinfol hi astahelede þar on hondred dage in helf þan gete euemore wo
so bith for wrecche edger.
 27. And þo hich halgede þane cherichay at hechere hurne at
hondreid dage.
 28. And eft hich busþide to rome for mire lacthere to bote and se
holiapopa lion þay geuenisse iuasnede and morede hit mid on þousend dage,
and a wirgede alle þaye þe hit asþide and þane minister of cridiantone
wiþ sette.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 28.2 (Earle)
B16.28.2.
Crediton, Grants of Indulgences: Earle 1888, 419.



 1. Hondret bischoc gief on hondred dage.
 1. Porte bischop on hondreid dage and bihet þrou hondreit dage.
 2. Leueger bischop bihet to hondreit dage.
 3. Eadberht bischop biget frou hondreit dage, and tin dage.
 4. Eansberht bischop biget sonne hondreit dage.
 5. Ealnod bischop biget and hondreit dage.
 6. Alger bischop bihet þru hondreit dage and souenti and þru
dages.
 7. Eadluf bischop biget sixsti dage.
 8. Luhing bischop to hondreit dage, and on oþer leon popa hit
ivasnede on echenisse ant aywilday.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 28.3 (Earle)
B16.28.3.
Crediton, Indulgence of Lifing: Earle 1888, 420.



 1. Her kied on þise iwrite þat hich luuig bischop at mine
fuyrsiþe wram crediton hi ministre to þare cherche of examchestre for mine
leue broþeren to hwreyrighe at mine out ganhes iuasnede þay geuenisse þat
egger þe luf minetheude bischop bitende into cridiamtones ministre and heg
þat alle oþere bischopes sidþe of mine dages were igeue and bigite of
oþer bischopes hek hich habbe out igadere of bokes fale.
 8. And ido in on oþe masse boc at sainte marie weuede to gadre hi
broght þar ma hit schel i su.
 10. And in on oþer boke þat hatte penitencialis bodde to hourde
and ich hit itrimde mid on hondreit dages of bute ende and ich on cursie þat
hit oþeruise isette, and hek alle þare churcha yvo.

END_TEXT
START_TEXT

Rec 28.4 (Earle)
B16.28.4.
Crediton, Pledge of Eadnoth: Earle 1888, 422-3.



 1. Ich eadnod bischob kiþe on þis writon þat ihc onborgede
XXX marca goldes be lead wigte to minre lond reddinge at beorhtnoðe and ich
gesealde him ane gurde londes to underwedde bi cridia to þan foreword þat
he habbe his deis.
 5. Ou his deis be queþe þane schuch þam þe him luuest bu
þe in þan londe stent.
 7. Þis his sint þalondes imeara þare gurd bi cridia: erest on
schokebrokes ford þanne east on þan paþe on þam litel gore estward
suð on þam dede lake on cridia, opon gen strem on þan elpenian aker,
þanne est on þam hpaþe eft on schokebroces ford.
 11. Þis her is towitnesse cnut ching wolstan archebischop and
luwing archebischop and britgloþ bischop, and gednod bischop, and burthloþ
bischop and adþelwine bischop and bristyne bischop and adþelword elþerne
man and adþelwold abbot.
 16. And þat hyred of exancestre and þat hired of credithamton
and þis iþidde þe bischop þane borg ton to examcestre and to tottenesse
and to lidauorde and to beardestaple.
 20. And þisses iwrites idoua is on cridiamtone mid hure elder
boken.
